Row.Cell: a08__figh_pomsti_se_breti_0CO0
Help the bathmaid Anna
帮助澡堂女仆安娜
a08__figh_vyzvedni_si_odm_KuJy
Collect your prize from the innkeeper
向酒馆老板领取你的奖赏
a08__figh_zarid_aby_se_fi_up0I
Make sure the barber Fiala can participate in the fights.
确保理发师菲亚拉能参与比武。
absolvuj__absolvuj_duel_s_Or6f
Duel with Lord Semine.
与塞米大人决斗。
absolvuj__v_duelu_jsem_ce_0pF8
I won the duel quite convincingly. Fortunately, Lord Semine took it chivalrously and didn't get angry with me. That's how a true nobleman behaves.
我以压倒性优势在决斗中胜出。幸运的是，塞米大人很有骑士风度地接受了这件事，没有生我的气。这才是真正的贵族。
absolvuj__v_duelu_jsem_do_sMrx
I didn't last very long in the duel. Unwritten lines were crossed. But after all I'm not a nobleman who fights according to some rules.
我没能在决斗中坚持太久，还违背了约定俗成的规则。但毕竟我不是贵族，决斗时不必受规则约束。
absolvuj__v_duelu_jsem_do_xSS2
I got quite a beating in the duel. Never mind, after all I'm not a nobleman and I have slightly different tasks in this world.
我在决斗中被打得落花流水。没办法，毕竟我不是个贵族，我生来有着截然不同的使命。
ambush__event_caption_rNR9
Ambush!
埋伏！
ambush__event_description_hLjk
You hear the sound of movement. Before you can look in the direction it came from, a man with his weapon is already rushing at you!
你听到了一些动静，还没来得及看向声音的来处，一个男人突然窜出，他挥舞着武器，便朝你扑来！
ambush_npc__event_caption_jA89
Ambush!
埋伏！
ambush_npc__event_descrip_uBqv
You see armed men surrounding an innocent person. You hear them shouting as they approach. And then they notice you too.
你看到一些手持兵器之人正围着一个无辜的家伙。你听见他们朝他叫嚷着并且步步逼近他。随后，他们还发现了你。
ambush_npc__player_caption_qxYA
Ambush!
埋伏！
ambush_npc__player_descri_Pbym
You see an ambush! A defenceless person is cowering as armed men approach with weapons drawn. They’re shouting and laughing. They haven't noticed you yet.
你目睹了一场伏击！一位手无寸铁之人身体蜷缩，与此同时，一些挥舞兵器之人叫喊着、大笑着，正在向他靠近，他们全然没有察觉到你的出现。
ambush__player_caption_LB1K
Trap.
陷阱。
ambush__player_description_D6TZ
Somewhere close by you hear a snapping sound followed by a muffled noise. You stop and look around. There's someone there and you know it.
你在附近听到了一声断裂声，随之而来的是一声闷响。你停了下来，四处张望着。没错，此处有人。
amuletfor_p_ale_kdyz_jsem_zfS1
But when I talked to the Voivode about the amulet for Marika, he got really annoyed.
但是当我跟司令官谈及要将那枚护身符拿给玛丽卡时，他非常生气。
amuletfor_p_marika_chtela_j1TN
Marika wanted me to try to get the Voivode to exchange the amulet for the letter of safe conduct she had taken from him. But he didn't agree even to that.
玛丽卡想要用她从司令官那里取走的安全通行函交换那枚护身符，但是司令官根本不同意。
amuletfor_p_na_shaneni_am_xvLj
I gave up on trying to get the amulet and solve Marika's problems.
我已放弃获取那枚护身符，不再协助玛丽卡解决麻烦。
amuletfor_p_promluil_jsem_dFQ0
I found Marika, the daughter of the nomads' Voivode, in a cave hideout in Apollonia. She needs his magic amulet, but the Voivode won't give it up.
我在阿波罗尼亚的一处隐蔽洞穴内找到了游民司令官的女儿玛丽卡。玛丽卡想要得到司令官的魔法护符，但是后者并不打算拱手相让。
amuletfor_p_rekni_si_u_va_24hc
The Voivode has an amulet with him, which is said to be endowed with magical powers that protect the wearer from all illnesses and troubles. Marika wants to get the amulet.
游民司令官有一枚护身符，据说这枚护符被赋予了神秘的能量，能保护佩戴者免于病痛与灾祸，玛丽卡想要得到那枚护符。
amuletfor_p_vajda_amulet__Mzmh
I found Marika, the daughter of the nomads' Voivode, in a cave hideout in Apollonia. She needs his magic amulet, but the Voivode won't give it up.
我在阿波罗尼亚的一处隐蔽洞穴内找到了游民司令官的女儿玛丽卡。玛丽卡想要得到司令官的魔法护符，但是后者并不打算拱手相让。
amuletfor_p_vajda_nosi_am_DIYS
The Voivode wears an amulet, which is said to be endowed with magical powers that protect the wearer from all illnesses and troubles. Marika wanted to get the amulet to help Bohush.
游民司令官佩戴着一枚护身符，据说这枚护符被赋予了神秘的能量，能保护佩戴者免于病痛与灾祸。玛丽卡想要得到那枚护符，以此帮助博胡什。
amuletfor_p_vajda_odmita__qbI2
The Voivode doesn't want to give up the amulet, I suppose I'll have to find some other way. I'll try to talk to some of his family, maybe they could think of something.
游民司令官并不想放弃那枚护符，看来我得想想别的办法了。我该试着跟他的其他家人谈谈，或许他们会有主意。
amuletfor_p_zkus_vymenit__cH9P
If the Voivode won't give me the amulet, Marika thought he might be willing to trade it for the letter of safe conduct she took from him.
如果司令官不肯轻易交出护符，玛丽卡认为可以将她从司令官那里带走的安全通行函与之交涉，他也许会愿意交换。
arrest_ev__event_caption_LlJC
You're under arrest!
你被捕了！
arrest_ev__event_descript_cmKS
You've run into a guard who's trying to arrest you for your crimes.
你碰到了一个警卫，他因为你的罪行欲要将你逮捕。
arsdimica_pridej_se_k_men_x6h5
Tell Menhard when you are ready for the duel with the Kuttenbergers.
准备好与库滕堡人决斗后便可告知门哈德。
arsdimica_promluv_si_s_me_6lI7
Help Menhard defeat the Kuttenbergers.
帮助门哈德打败库滕堡人。
arsdimica_promluv_si_s_me_eJzk
Talk to Menhard at the inn.
到旅店与门哈德交谈。
arsdimica_stan_se_clenem__SaBS
Become a member of the swordfighting brotherhood.
加入剑术兄弟会。
arsdimica_ukradni_mec_kut_VjZC
Steal the Kuttenberg brotherhood's sword.
偷走库滕堡兄弟会的剑。
asidovezi_obstarej_parler_aubX
Get a thunderstone for Johann.
为约翰找一块雷石。
asidovezi_obstarej_parler_Vt61
Find a thunderstone for Johann.
为约翰找一块雷石。
asidovezi_odnes_sekeru_ja_8lvf
Bring the axe to Johann Parler.
将斧头拿给约翰·帕勒。
asidovezi_predej_parlerov_uU8J
Give Johann the thunderstone.
将雷石交给约翰。
asidovezi_ukradni_hreb_z__SfQB
Steal the nail from the rafter.
偷走椽子上的钉子。
asidovezi_ukradni_minci_z_ClE2
Steal the coin from the building's foundation.
偷走建筑地基上的硬币。
asidovezi_ukradni_podkovu_gugS
Steal the horseshoe hanging above the door.
偷走悬挂在门上的马蹄铁。
asidovezi_vykovej_sekeru__6wjG
Forge a protective axe.
铸造一把防护斧。
asidovezi_ziskej_zpatky_h_nL4P
Get the nail back.
将钉子带回来。
asidovezi_ziskej_zpatky_p_6gvb
Get the commemorative coin back.
将纪念币找回来。
asidovezi_ziskej_zpatky_p_F8OV
Get the horseshoe back.
将马蹄铁找回来。
askaboutp_dozvedel_jsem_s_4FSi
I learnt that Pavlena was hanging out with the Troskowitz woodcutters. I asked their leader Dushko about her.
我得知帕芙莱娜会去找特罗斯科维茨的樵夫。我向他们的头儿杜什科问了问她的下落。
askaboutp_dozvedel_jsem_s_9qcg
I learnt that Pavlena was hanging out with the Troskowitz woodcutters, but with their leader Dushko dead, I won’t learn anything from them.
我得知帕芙莱娜会去找特罗斯科维茨的樵夫，但他们的头儿杜什科死了。我没法从他们这获得任何线索。
askaboutp_dozvedel_jsem_s_iztX
I learnt that Pavlena was hanging out with the local woodcutters. People say they live in a village by the road to Zhelejov. I should find some woodcutter and ask about Pavlena.
我得知帕芙莱娜会去找当地的樵夫。人们说他们住在一座村子里，沿着去哲勒约夫的路走就能看到。我应该找个樵夫问问帕芙莱娜的下落。
askaboutp_hospodoska_mi_o_diMf
I learned all I could about Pavlena at the tavern.
我在酒馆这里掌握了一切关于帕芙莱娜的线索。
askaboutp_hospodska_uz_mi_ovyN
The innkeeper won't tell me anything more about Pavlena. In fact, she won't tell anything to anyone anymore.
老板不会再告诉我任何关于帕芙莱娜的事情了，或者应该说，她不会再告诉任何人任何事了。
askaboutp_pokud_nekdo_vi__Tpny
I was advised to ask for Pavlena at the tavern. I should probably start with Betty the innkeeper.
有人建议我去酒馆打听帕芙莱娜的下落，我应该先从老板贝塔问起。
askaboutp_rychtar_by_z_po_5l00
I was advised to ask the Bailiff about Pavlena. Thrush the Bailiff should know what's going on in the village.
有人告诉我可以去问问执行官瑟鲁什有关帕芙莱娜的事情，他应该对村里的事了如指掌。
askaboutp_zeptal_jsem_se__FIVg
I asked Thrush the Bailiff of Troskowitz about Pavlena. He couldn't tell me much about her disappearance, but he gave me good advice on who to ask next.
我去找了特罗斯科维茨的执行官瑟鲁什，问问帕芙莱娜的下落。他对她的失踪知之甚少，不过给我提供了很好的方向。
azzahrob_dones_pecetidlo__dueJ
Take the seal to Rat
将印章交给“耗子”
az_za_hrob_prines_kryse_p_RoCp
Find the seal in the tomb
在坟墓里寻找印章。
azzahrob_zeptej_se_mnicha_P9M8
Ask a monk.
询问一位修士。
azzahrob_ziskej_zpatky_pe_dSYR
Try to get the seal back.
尝试取回印章。
az_za_hrob_zkus_prohledat_6Hzj
Try to rob the gravedigger
尝试抢劫掘墓人
az_za_hrob_zkus_prohledat_nPqP
Try searching the gravedigger's house
搜查掘墓人的房屋
back_to_b_mel_bych_bete_o_LvDH
I should go and tell Betty how it went with Tuchmacher.
我得将与图赫马赫的事告知贝蒂。
back_to_b_mel_jsem_se_vra_QZ71
I should have returned to Betty, but it doesn't matter anymore. Nothing will come of the plan now.
我本该回到贝蒂那里，但是已经不重要了。这场计划如今毫无成果。
back_to_b_mel_jsem_se_vra_xwU9
I should have returned to Betty, but it doesn't matter anymore. Nothing will come of the plan now.
我本该回到贝蒂那里，但是已经不重要了。这场计划如今毫无成果。
back_to_b_musim_beta_rict_Umh0
I have to tell Betty that I did a good job drumming up business for her bathhouse in the city's squares.
我得告诉贝蒂，我在城市广场上成功地为她的澡堂招揽了生意。
back_to_b_sabotaz_je_u_ko_3AO9
I have to go to Betty and tell her how it went at Adam's. Let's hope I've done enough to make Naaz willing to discuss who he'll vote for once he's fallen out with Adam.
我得将亚当澡堂里发生的一切告知了贝蒂。但愿我的努力足以让纳兹与亚当反目成仇，并心甘情愿地与我们讨论他的投票人选。
back_to_b_vratil_jsem_se__8v5p
I went back and told Betty how things went at Adam's place. Let's hope I've done enough to make Naaz willing to discuss who he'll vote for once he's fallen out with Adam.
我已将亚当澡堂里发生的一切告知了贝蒂。但愿我的努力足以让纳兹与亚当反目成仇，并心甘情愿地与我们讨论他的投票人选。
bandits_d__event_caption_jm3B
Accident
意外
bandits_d__event_descript_dj9J
On the road ahead you see dead bodies and two bandits. One is searching the bodies while the other keeps watch. They notice you before you can hide.
就在前方的路上，你发现了一些死者以及两个强盗。其中一人正在搜刮尸体，而另一人则在望风看守。你还没来得及躲藏，他们就发现了你。
bandits_d__player_caption_sBrh
Accident
意外
bandits_d__player_descrip_y8H6
On the road ahead you see dead bodies and two bandits. One is searching the bodies while the other keeps watch. Neither has spotted you yet.
就在前方的路上，你发现了一些死者以及两个强盗。其中一人正在搜刮尸体，而另一人则在望风看守，但他们两人均未察觉到你的出现。
bandits__event_caption_cX9z
Tax collector Matthew?
“税吏”马修？
bandits__event_caption_M66H
Encounter
偶遇
bandits__event_description_u77Z
A giant of a man has blocked your path. He's wearing armour and is well armed. He gestures for you to stop.
一个身材魁梧的男人挡在了你的面前。他身着坚甲，全副武装。他朝你示意，想让你停下。
bandits__event_description_Zz8l
Some fellah stopped you on the road. What if it's Matthew? He's not alone so be careful.
路上有个家伙拦住了你，会是马修吗？他并非孤身一人，所以还是小心为妙。
bandits__player_caption_4Zis
Encounter
偶遇
bandits__player_caption_6xlf
Tax collector Matthew?
“税吏”马修？
bandits__player_descripti_faMu
In front of you there's a fellah standing in the road. What if it's Matthew? He hasn't noticed you but he's not alone so be careful.
前方的路上正站着一位不明人士，会是马修吗？他并未注意到你，但也并非孤身一人，因此还是小心为妙。
bandits__player_descripti_uBVt
You see a figure on the road ahead. Brawny, heavily armed, obviously waiting for something. He adjusts the straps on his armour. He hasn't noticed you yet.
你在前方的路上看到了一个身影，那是一位健壮的男人，全副武装的他很明显在等待着什么。他正调整着护甲上的系带，始终没有注意到你。
bandits_r__event_caption_NDvb
Encounter
偶遇
bandits_r__event_descript_uXG7
There's an agitated man on the road ahead, looking this way and that, but when he sees you he breaks into a relieved smile, as if it's you he was waiting for.
道路的前方正站着一个神情不安的男人。他左顾右盼，但就在看到你的一霎那，他脸上就露出了如释重负的笑容，仿佛你就是他在等待的人。
bandits_r__player_caption_up6k
Encounter
偶遇
bandits_r__player_descrip_VN7l
There's an agitated man standing on the road ahead. He's looking this way and that and shuffling his feet. It looks like he's waiting for someone or something.
道路的前方正站着一个神情不安的男人。他一边不安地踱步，一边左顾右盼，似乎正在等待着什么。
barnabas__trosecky_zapasn_H1CM
The Trosky fighting grandmaster is dead. May God rest his soul.
特罗斯基的那位格斗大师已然与世长辞，愿上帝让他的灵魂安息。
bav_se_na_pres_den_se_jed_00rI

There were negotiations during the day and celebrations in the evening. Godwin had already managed to drink to the successful beginning of their plan with many lords at Raborsch. It was late in the evening, the guests were enjoying themselves and Godwin was having a bit of a nap. He and Botschek of Kunstadt were discussing the forthcoming wedding of Lord Capon and his bride-to-be, Lady Jitka.
白天谈判，晚上庆祝。古德温已经和拉博施的诸位领主们为他们计划的成功干了杯。已是深夜，客人们都在享受，而古德温也打了个盹。 他和库斯塔特的博舌克正在讨论卡蓬领主和他的准新娘吉特卡小姐即将举行的婚礼。
bav_se_na_pres_den_se_jed_40aV

There were negotiations during the day and celebrations in the evening. Godwin had already managed to drink to the successful beginning of their plan with many lords at Raborsch. It was late in the evening, the guests were enjoying themselves and Godwin could finally unwind after a long day. He stopped to chat to the Dry Devil, who was getting a bit bored at the gathering. He and Botschek of Kunstadt were discussing the forthcoming wedding of Lord Capon and his bride-to-be, Lady Jitka. Godwin spoke to Baron Brabant about the winemaking traditions of the Bohemian lands and Brabant's own homeland.
白天谈判，晚上庆祝。古德温已经和拉博施的诸位领主们为他们计划的成功干了杯。已是深夜，客人们都在享受，而古德温终于可以在忙碌了一天后放松一下了。 他停下脚步，和酒鬼聊了几句。酒鬼在这场聚会里有点无聊。 他和库斯塔特的博舌克正在讨论卡蓬领主和他的准新娘吉特卡小姐即将举行的婚礼。 古德温和布拉班特男爵交流了波希米亚和布拉班特老家的酿酒传统。

白天谈判，晚上庆祝。古德温已经和拉博施的诸位领主们为他们计划的成功干了杯。已是深夜，客人们都在享受，而古德温也打了个盹。 古德温向布拉班特男爵介绍了波希米亚和布拉班特老家的酿酒传统。他也停下脚步，和酒鬼聊了几句。酒鬼在这场聚会里有点无聊。
bav_se_na_pres_den_se_jed_R5BI

There were negotiations during the day and celebrations in the evening. Godwin had already managed to drink to the successful beginning of their plan with many lords at Raborsch. It was late in the evening, the guests were enjoying themselves and Godwin was having a bit of a nap. He stopped to chat to the Dry Devil, who was getting a bit bored at the gathering.
白天谈判，晚上庆祝。古德温已经和拉博施的诸位领主们为他们计划的成功干了杯。已是深夜，客人们都在享受，而古德温也打了个盹。 他停下脚步，和酒鬼聊了几句。酒鬼在这场聚会里有点无聊。
bav_se_na_this_is_placeho_INhI

There were negotiations during the day and celebrations in the evening. The guests were enjoying themselves and Godwin could finally unwind after a long day. He was looking forward to good wine and good company. If only he had known what this memorable evening would bring next…
白天谈判。晚上庆祝。宾主尽欢之后，古德温终于能在忙碌了一天后放松一下了。他期待着美酒和好伙伴。要是他知道这个难忘的夜晚接下来会发生什么就好了……
ber_koldo_dopsat_prosim_2DYz

I met some fellah called Kolda, who's working on building the gallows for Capon. Naturally, I wasn't too keen on helping him, but one never knows what a good deed might lead to. Kolda has shitty tools and he asked me to sharpen his axe for him.
我遇到了一个叫科尔达的人，他正在为卡蓬建造绞架。自然，我并不热衷于帮助他，但谁也不知道做好事会带来什么回报。科尔达的工具很差劲，他让我帮他把斧头磨利。

据说司令官是个好赌之徒，说不定我能通过这种方式来为玛丽卡取得那枚护身符。而司令官也愿意以护身符为赌注，但前提是我得接受他的条件——我将以通行函为赌注。
bez_na_au_jsem_volan_k_ma_utPe
I've been called to see Margrave Jobst. I should hurry.
有人叫我去见约布斯特侯爵。我得快点了。
bez_na_au_kdyz_ale_doslo__dQ51

What surprised me, though, was that the Margrave has no intention of doing anything to save Sir Hans. He claimed that Bergow would want a ransom, so Hans's fate would be in the hands of his family, headed by Lord Hanush. Zizka, evidently angry, arrived at the audience, having just discovered why Dry Devil wasn't at the fortress. Jobst had refused to provide him refuge. Things were very tense and it seemed that Zizka was going to explode. It ended with the Margrave forbidding us from leaving Suchdol.
然而，令我惊讶的是，侯爵根本不打算拯救汉斯爵士。他声称冯·波尔高会想要赎金，因此汉斯的命运将掌握在他家人，尤其是瀚纳什爵士手中。就在这时，目露凶光的杰式卡冲进门来。他刚刚发现“酒鬼”之所以不在堡垒，是因为约布斯特拒绝为他提供庇护。形势瞬间变得严峻，杰式卡都要气炸了。侯爵表示如果我们离开苏赫多尔就需要承担后果。
bez_na_au_slyseni_u_markr_intE

The audience with the Margrave was truly interesting. He was not in the least bit surprised to hear that Bergow had been stringing us along the whole time; it even seemed as if the Margrave was expecting it. The conversation also turned to Liechtenstein, who had apparently stopped communicating with Jobst under mysterious circumstances. I'm worried whether he's still alive.
与侯爵的会面相当有趣。当听到冯·波尔高一直在欺骗我们时，他一点也不惊讶，甚至像是早有预料一般。我们谈话期间还提到了列支敦士登，他不知何故音信全无，和约布斯特断了联系。我很担心他现在是否安好。
bez_na_au_to_jsme_samozre_lwjr

This was of course unacceptable to either me or to Captain Zizka, who showed himself to be a good friend and promised to help me. He sent Katherine ahead to Kuttenberg to make enquiries: where Sir Hans might be imprisoned and where Liechtenstein had gone. Meanwhile, Zizka and I set off on the trail of Dry Devil.
我们当然选择离开。杰式卡也很讲义气，向我保证会帮助我。他派凯瑟琳前去库滕堡打探情况，寻找汉斯爵士被囚禁的地点以及列支敦士登领主的去向。与此同时，我们则动身追查“酒鬼”的去处。
bez_na_na__placeholder_pr_8njF
I didn't catch up with Hashek and Capon before their departure for Semine! All I can do now is try to catch up with them if I can.
我没能在哈舍克和卡蓬启程前往塞米之前与他们会合！现在我能做的就是尽可能地追上他们。
bez_pro_d_doslo_nam_piti__tzoD
We ran out of drink, but Vasko knows of a hidden stash in the forest where the locals go to hide booze from their wives. We set off to take it.
酒喝完了，不过瓦斯科知道本地人会背着妻子，偷偷在森林里藏酒，于是我们打算拿走点。
bez_pro_d_mam_chlast_a_me_vbRh
I've got the booze, now I should get back to the camp quick. I don't have a good feeling about this forest.
我拿到酒了，不过这片森林让我感觉不妙，得赶快回到营地那。
bez_pro_d_mluvici_pes__bo_CUR0
A talking dog - God, maybe I should stop drinking! - told me where the woodcutters' stash is. I should go and find it.
有只会说话的狗——天哪，也许我不能再喝了！——告诉我樵夫们将东西藏在哪里，我去找找看。
bez_pro_d_ten_pes_mluvi_m_zqnF
Did that dog just… talk? Maybe I should speak to him.
那条狗刚刚…说话了吗？也许我该找他谈谈。
bez_se_vy_byl_to_dlouhy_d_Kd5I
All I had to do now was get some sleep.
现在我得好好睡上一觉。
bez_se_vy_byl_to_dlouhy_d_S7ie
It was a long day. I should get some sleep and wait for the rest of the gang to arrive at Ruthard Palace.
过去的一天真是漫长无比，我得好好睡一觉，等待其他同伴抵达鲁瑟德宫。
bez_si_pr_domluvil_jsem_s_C6oN
I spoke to Radmil about the duel and all the necessary formalities. He also tried to convince me to let him win for a bribe. No chance!
我与拉德米尔讨论了格斗一事，并商讨了一切必要规则。他想利用一份贿赂诱劝我输掉比赛，但是没门！
bez_si_pr_domluvil_jsem_s_hy4I
I spoke to Radmil about the duel and all the necessary formalities. We also agreed that I would let him win on purpose, for a price, naturally.
我与拉德米尔讨论了格斗一事，并商讨了一切必要规则。同时，我们也达成了交易，我将故意输掉决斗，而他自然得给我报酬。
bez_si_pr_gerda_vdova_po__4cYt

Gerda, the widow of a German merchant, asked me for help in a delicate matter. The will left by her late husband wishes his dispute with Radmil the cobbler be settled once and for all by a duel. But Gerda has no one to stand for her, so she has turned to me. I'll probably find Radmil in the cobbler's workshop.
一位德国商人的遗孀格尔达请求我帮她处理一件棘手的事情。她的亡夫有件未竟之事，即是他生前与鞋匠拉德米尔的争端能以决斗的方式得以了结。但是格尔达没能找到代替她进行决斗的人，所以向我求助。或许我能在鞋匠铺找到拉德米尔。
bez_si_pr_ted_uz_nema_smy_epKN
There's no point in fighting a duel right now.
现在没必要进行决斗了。
bez_s_kum_nabidl_jsem_se__4GdQ
I offered to help interpret for the Cuman, Jasak, in the nomads' camp. He'd like to confess his love to one of their women. I should go with him so he can show me which one he means.
我提出帮库曼人贾萨克在游牧民族营地里做翻译。他想和他们族的一个女人表白，我要跟他一起去，看看他喜欢哪个。
bez_s_kum_snazil_jsem_se__nMnE
I followed Jasak to the nomads' camp, and he showed me the woman he's interested in.
我跟着贾萨克到了游牧民族营地，见到了他喜欢的那个女人。

It seems sorted out the dispute between Tachov and Zhelejov, though it might've juist because they all ganged up against me. But that doesn't matter, I just suppose I shouldn't show my face in either town for a while... Especially since they couldn't even give me a proper hiding because I ran away.
似乎塔霍夫人和哲勒约夫人之间的矛盾已然平息，也可能是为了对付我而暂时联手。但对我来说无伤大雅，只是最近不能再在这两个镇子中露面......更何况我跑得太快，他们连半点拿我撒气的机会都没有。

I need to get to the City Council convened by Sigismund to find out what Sigismund is up to. But getting to the king himself won't be easy. Perhaps Mint Master Vavak could help me – I know many things about him that the king would not be pleased to hear.
我必须混进由西格斯蒙德召集的市议会里，查明西格斯蒙德到底做何居心。但是要接近这位国王可没那么简单，不过或许铸币官瓦万克能够给我提供帮助，这位铸币师的行为作风估计会让那位国王焦头烂额。
blackmail_pohrozil_jsem_v_1MzA
I threatened to expose Vavak for stealing silver, so he had no choice but to help me. I'm supposed to replace the royal waiter. By coincidence, it is the son of Vavak's cook, one Franta Kuldaun.
我威胁瓦万克要将其中饱私囊之事公之于众，他因此别无选择，不得不向我提供帮助。我要做的就是顶替一位皇家侍从，而巧合的是，此人正是瓦万克的厨师弗兰塔·库尔丹的儿子。

I demonstrated to Capon how to block by placing your blade between you and your opponent's. But that kind of defense is quite exhausting and can't be kept up for long.
我向卡蓬展示了如何格挡对手的攻击。但这种防御相当消耗体能，并非长久之计。

You can defend against ordinary strikes just with the strength of your weapon. All you have to do is get it between you and your foe's weapon. I should show Capon how to do it.
只需将武器架在自己和对手武器之间，便可单靠武器的力量抵御普通攻击。出招吧，卡蓬。

bolek_1_v__event_descript_sbSm
There's a man digging a hole at the side of the road. He's panting from the effort and is covered in earth.
路边还有个正在挖洞的男人，他累得气喘吁吁，身上沾满了污泥。
bolek_1_v__player_caption_ozuB
Man digging a hole
挖洞之人
bolek_1_v__player_descrip_HY7B
There's a man digging a hole at the side of the road. He's panting from the effort and is covered in earth.
路边还有个正在挖洞的男人，他累得气喘吁吁，身上沾满了污泥。
bolek_2_m__event_caption_5Ukr
Miller
磨坊主
bolek_2_m__event_descript_f8UM
You see a miller by the wayside. He doesn't have either a cart or a single sack of flour. He starts to wave to you. He looks strangely familiar.
你在路边遇到了一位磨坊主，他的身旁既没有马车，也没有一袋面粉。他朝你挥手，他身上一股难以言喻的熟悉感朝你袭来。
bolek_2_m__player_caption_Zdoh
Miller
磨坊主
bolek_2_m__player_descrip_k4hf
You see a miller by the wayside. He doesn't have either a cart or a single sack of flour. He starts to wave to you. He looks strangely familiar.
你在路边遇到了一位磨坊主，他的身旁既没有马车，也没有一袋面粉。他朝你挥手，他身上一股难以言喻的熟悉感朝你袭来。
bolek_3_m__event_caption_fZ2R
Monk
修士
bolek_3_m__event_descript_n2Wt
You see a monk by the side of the road. Something is odd about him. Monks don't usually look like that. You also have the feeling you've seen him before.
你在路旁遇到了一个修士。他看起来有些古怪，毕竟一般的修士向来不是那副样子。而且，你对他有种似曾相识的感觉。
bolek_3_m__player_caption_GogR
Monk
修士
bolek_3_m__player_descrip_GnWb
You see a monk by the side of the road. Something is odd about him. Monks don't usually look like that. You also have the feeling you've seen him before.
你在路旁遇到了一个修士。他看起来有些古怪，毕竟一般的修士向来不是那副样子。而且，你对他有种似曾相识的感觉。
bolek_4_m__event_caption_bVFK
Miner
矿工
bolek_4_m__event_descript_cRlo
There's a lone miner standing by the side of the road. Seeing you, he calls your name. Taking a better look you recognise Bolek, this time dressed as a miner.
一个孤零零的矿工正站在路旁，他注意到你，随即便喊出你的名字。你仔细端详一番，认出了波勒克，这一次他打扮成了矿工模样。
bolek_4_m__player_caption_1Z9w
Miner
矿工
bolek_4_m__player_descrip_rWra
There's a lone miner standing by the side of the road. Seeing you, he calls your name. Taking a better look you recognise Bolek, this time dressed as a miner.
一个孤零零的矿工正站在路旁，他注意到你，随即便喊出你的名字。你仔细端详一番，认出了波勒克，这一次他打扮成了矿工模样。
bonetrigg_kosti_jsem_vyko_7x9r
I dug up the bones. It's up to me what I do with them now.
我挖出了那些骨头，就由我来决定该如何处理它们吧。
bonetrigg_musim_najit_dra_BvSz
I have to find the dragon bones!
我必须要找到那些龙骨！
bonetrigg_musim_najit_dra_kFKn
I have to find the dragon bones!
我必须要找到那些龙骨！
bonetrigg_o_kosti_se_zaji_Bnmh
Lots of people were interested in the bones and they're bound to be gone by now. There's no point looking for them now.
有太多人惦记着那些神秘骨头，想必它们早已落入他人之手，所以现在已经没必要再去寻找它们了。
bonetrigg_slava_zahadne_z_BQFu
Slava died mysteriously, so I have to find the bones by myself.
斯拉瓦的离奇死亡让我不得不独自寻找那些骨头。
bran_hrad_prazane_nam_zni_2k31
We managed to repel the attack on the front wall.
我们成功击退了敌人对前方城墙的进攻。
bran_hrad_prazane_nam_zni_FbJ4
We mustn't let the Praguers take the front ramparts and gate! At them!
干掉布拉格人！我们绝不能让他们占领城堡前垛和城门！
bran_hrad_prazane_nam_zni_ik3V
We mustn't let the Praguers take the front ramparts and main gate. At them!
干掉布拉格人！我们绝不能让他们占领城堡前垛和城堡大门！
bran_hrad_prazane_nam_zni_Qf4G
We managed to repel the attack on the front ramparts.
我们成功击退了敌人对城堡前垛的进攻。
bran_pred_brana_byla_pror_u60I
The gate has been breached and Erik's soldiers are getting in. We must defend the Italian Court's outer bailey!
城门已被攻破，埃里克手下的士兵打了进来。我们必须保卫意大利宫外堡场！
bran_pred_nakonec_ale_pro_CTrk

In the end, they managed to breach the gate and we had to fight them in the outer bailey. We fell back to the courtyard only to come face to face with the rest of Erik's men and Erik himself. Erik nearly struck me down but I was saved by an unexpected ally, Musa of Mali. We escaped into the secret passage and the Dry Devil caved in the path behind us with a barrel of gunpowder.
敌人们最终攻破了城门，我们不得已跟他们在外堡场进行殊死搏斗。随后撤回了城堡庭院内的我们，却迎面碰上了埃里克本人以及他的其他士兵。我险些被埃里克撂倒，所幸马里的穆萨向我施以援手，真是出乎意料。我们一同逃进了秘密通道，酒鬼在我们身后用一桶火药炸塌了那条通道。
bran_ptac_nejenze_se_pan__etMB
Not only did Capon start quarrelling, he lost his temper and started a brawl. I have to go to his side and protect him!
卡蓬不仅挑起争端，动怒的他还与人动起了手。我得在旁保护他！
bran_ptac_nejenze_se_pan__sYxI

Not only did Capon start quarrelling, he lost his temper and started a brawl. I tried to help him, but the bailiff arrived with some guards and put an end to it. We were put in the stocks like common criminals! Capon then tried to blame everything on me. As soon as we were let out of the stocks, we went our separate ways...
卡蓬不仅挑起争端，动怒的他还与人动起了手。我本想帮他，但执政官带了警卫过来，制止了这场争端，我们像普通犯人一样，上了颈手枷！卡蓬试图把一切都怪到我头上，在被释放以后，便与我分道扬镳……
bran_se_dostal_jsem_pres__I0vX
I got my arsed kicked. It's not the first time, and definitely not the last.
我被打得不轻。这不是第一次了，肯定也不是最后一次。
bran_se_jeseka_jsem_kurti_tYw1
I talked Jasak up to the woman, but her other suitor arrived and wants to beat me up. I should defend myself.
我向她夸起了贾萨克，但另外一个追求者也来了，想揍我一顿。我要自卫。
bran_se_nechtel_jsem_se_n_5HRX
I didn't want to get beaten up and I did hold my own. But when the guards finally came, everyone blamed me and I ended up in chains alongside Lord Capon.
我并不想被暴打一顿，也在打斗中护住了自己。但最终当警卫抵达现场时，所有人都将矛头指向了我，我也因此被关进了牢房，与卡蓬大人为伴。
bran_se_nechtel_jsem_se_n_DCTe
I didn't want to get beaten up, but alas! I got my arse handed to me and blacked out. Now I can forget about talking to Lord von Bergow.
我并不想被暴打一顿，可是能怎么办呢！最终，我受了一顿痛揍，还晕厥了过去，现在我没法儿跟冯·波尔高交谈了。
bran_se_nesmis_nechat_zml_0ueV
I can't let them beat me up or I might lose my chance to talk to Lord von Bergow.
我可不能让他们收拾我，不然可能就会因此失去与冯·波尔高交谈的机会。
bran_se_porazil_jsem_jese_XJ9B
I beat Jasak. I think he'll be fine, but we probably won't be best friends.
我打了贾萨克。他应该没事，不过我们可能不会再是最好的朋友了。
bran_se_p_podarilo_se_nam_ir4P
We killed Hashek and his men and there's no longer any threat that any of them will talk about what happened today in Semine. But it remains to be seen what we'll tell von Bergow back at Trosky.
我们歼灭了哈舍克及其部下，而今日在塞米发生之事也将随着他们的消逝而无人知晓。但是至于我们回到特罗斯基后该如何向冯·波尔高汇报，仍有待商榷。
bran_se_p_purkrabi_hasek__iBau
Burgrave Hashek left me with no choice, I had to kill him. But he still managed to call the rest of his troops to attack, so now we have to finish them off too.
哈舍克城伯让我别无选择，我不得不杀了他。他已经向手下的士兵发出了进攻指令，现在我们也得把他们赶尽杀绝。
bran_se_tomu_druhymu_napa_NUQw
I showed the other suitor what for.
我把那个追求者教训了一顿。
bran_se_trochu_jsem_to_po_jDY9
I messed up a bit and now they want to kick my arse. I can't let that happen, or I might lose my chance to talk to von Bergow.
我把事情搞砸了，现在他们想把我收拾一顿。我可不能让此事发生，否则可能就会失去与冯·波尔高交谈的机会。
bran_se_udelal_jsem_si_z__A0ZE
I messed up the translation and Jasak got angry at me. Nothing too serious, but he still wants to beat me up. I should defend myself.
我的翻译出了问题，导致贾萨克对我发火了。虽然不是太严重，但他还是想揍我。我应该自卫。
bran_ustu_byli_jsme_zraze_GdyY

But at that moment Erik and his men appeared beneath the walls and attacked the Italian Court. We have to defend ourselves against greater numbers and buy some time for Brabant's men taking the silver to Ruthard Palace!
但就在那时，埃里克和他的同伙出现在了城墙下方，对意大利宫发起了攻击。我们必须在以寡敌众的条件下保住自身，并争取时间，让布拉班特的同伴们将白银顺利搬到鲁瑟德宫！
bran_ustu_byli_jsme_zraze_Gl6R

But at that moment Erik and his men appeared beneath the walls and attacked the Italian Court. We had to defend ourselves against greater numbers and buy some time for Brabant's men taking the silver to Ruthard Palace!
但就在那时，埃里克和他的同伙出现在了城墙下方，对意大利宫发起了攻击。我们不得不在以寡敌众的条件下保住自身，还给布拉班特的同伴们争取时间，好让他们往鲁瑟德宫搬运白银！
bran_z_hr_musime_s_ptacke_3nO3
Capon and I have to keep the Praguers away from our men by shooting at them from the walls.
卡蓬和我必须在城墙上向布拉格人射击，以掩护我方突袭部队。
bran_z_hr_podarilo_se_nam_JgK0
We managed to help our men on the raid by shooting from the walls.
我们设法在城墙上射击，以掩护我方突袭部队。
bratrizci_checkpriest_OdrE
Search for a priest among the fallen.
在倒下的人中寻找神父。
bratrizci_followbalsancum_HfUq
Follow the trail of the Cumans with Posy.
和“花骨朵”一起追踪库曼人。
bratrizci_followbalsantob_ynSR
Mount a horse and follow Posy to the battleground.
骑上马并跟随“花骨朵”前往战场。
bratrizci_freemiroslav_5fAy
Free Miroslav.
解救米洛斯拉夫。
bratrizci_gethalberd_kPFp
Arm yourself with a halberd.
用战戟武装自己。
bratrizci_infiltrationres_dOAf
Free Miroslav stealthily and arm him.
悄悄解救米洛斯拉夫并将他武装起来。
bratrizci_lootersconflict_C2WY
Sort out the situation with the looters.
解决劫掠者的问题。
bratrizci_planattackwithb_3xow
Think up a plan of attack with Posy.
和“花骨朵”一起思考攻击计划。
bratrizci_takecimburk_yHKu
Conquer Zimburg!
攻占齐姆博格！
bratrizci_talktobalsanaft_3vkD
Tell Posy what you found.
告诉“花骨朵”你的发现。
bratrizci_talktobalsanbat_QhYt
Talk to Posy.
和“花骨朵”交谈。
budovanil_back_to_beta_xuEC
Go back to Betty.
回去找贝蒂。
budovanil_clean_vomit_bkVY
Scrub the floor.
擦洗地板。
budovanil_fetch_package_mYdU
Pick up the package.
收拾行囊。
budovanil_first_marketing_B2Sd
Grain Market.
谷物市场。
budovanil_fourth_marketing_29Wp
Merchants' Street.
商人街。
budovanil_hide_clothes_2GBX
Pick up the clothes.
拣起衣服。
budovanil_hide_drunkards_nitW
Hide the drunk guests.
将醉酒的客人藏起来。
budovanil_hide_pitchers_pWLP
Pick up the tankards.
拾起酒杯。
budovanil_leave_with_girls_2Y5N
Get onto the wagon and set off.
坐上马车出发。
budovanil_marketing_Rg5M
Persuade people to come to the new bathhouse.
说服人们光顾这家新澡堂。
budovanil_pomoz_bete_otev_xttZ
Help Betty open the new bathhouse.
帮助贝蒂开设新澡堂。
budovanil_resolve_talk_WUjP
Listen to the alderman's verdict.
倾听市议员的裁决。
budovanil_second_marketing_jdTt
Horse Market.
马市。
budovanil_third_marketing_MYCs
Vintners' Street
红酒商街。
budovanil_tidyup_1B1d
Tidy up the bathhouse.
清理澡堂。
budovanil_vrat_se_za_betou_pN2D
Go back to Betty's.
回去找贝蒂。
budovanil_wait_to_end_g9Ly
Wait for the alderman to inspect the premises.
等待市议员检查经营场所。
burygejza_abych_mohl_gejz_A9bt
I have to find Gejza's body so that his family can bury him. Tibor told me it should be somewhere around the woodcutters' camp, where they have it displayed for ridicule.
我必须得找到盖萨的尸体，好让他的家人们安葬他。提波告诉我盖萨的尸体应该就在伐木工营地附近，他们在那边将尸体绑起，以示嘲弄。
burygejza_gejzovi_uz_asi__mguf
I don't think we'll be able to hold a funeral for Gejza now…
看来我们没法为盖萨举办葬礼了…
burygejza_gejzovo_telo_uz_i78I
There's no point in getting Gejza's body now.
现在没必要带走盖萨的尸体。
burygejza_p_abych_mohl_ge_AZDX
In order to bury Gejza, I first have to find out from Tibor where the body is and take it.
要想安葬盖萨，我得先向提波询问盖萨尸体的位置，并将其带回。
burygejza_p_gejzovo_telo__c0HW
I found Gejza's body tied to tree close to the woodcutters' camp, just like Tibor said.
正如提波所言，我在伐木工营地周边发现了盖萨的尸体，就绑在一棵树上。
burygejza_p_gejzovo_telo__Q4U6
Gejza's body really is tied to tree close to the woodcutters' camp like Tibor said. I have to untie him so his family can bury him.
果然如提波所言，盖萨的尸体就被绑在伐木工营地周边的一棵树上。我得给他松绑，好让他的家人将其安葬。
burygejza_p_gejzovo_telo__t9IM
I saw Gejza's body tied to a tree close to the woodcutters' camp.
我在伐木工营地周边发现了盖萨的尸体，就绑在一棵树上。
burygejza_p_mel_bych_gejz_leGH
I should put Gejza on the ground where Tibor prepared the grave.
我得将盖萨搬到提波事先挖好的坟墓里。
burygejza_p_musim_odnest__C0rU

I must take Gejza's body to his favourite place so we can bury him. According to Tibor's description, it's to the west of the woodcutters' camp. If I walk on the rocks by the edge of the woods, I shouldn't miss it.
我必须将盖萨的尸体带到他生前最喜欢的地方，我们要在那里将其安葬。依照提波的描述，那个地方就在伐木工营地的西边，只要沿着树林边缘的山岩走去，我就能找到它。
burygejza_p_musim_zvednou_H3ch
I untied Gejza and now I have to pick him up.
我已为盖萨松绑，是时候把他带走了。
burygejza_p_musim_zvednou_UEaw
I must take Gejza's body to his favourite place so we can bury him there.
我必须将盖萨的尸体带到他生前最喜欢的地方，我们要在那里将其安葬。
burygejza_pohreb_gejzy_uz_paT6
There's no point in burying Gejza now.
现在没必要安葬盖萨了。
burygejza_p_pripravil_jse_5deP
I prepared Gejza's body for burial. Tibor will go to the camp for the rest of the family, and we will finally be able to bury the poor man.
我已找回盖萨的尸体。提波将会回到营地里通知家人，届时我们将一同安葬这位苦命青年。
burygejza_p_tibor_mi_rekl_D4It
Tibor told me Gejza was killed by woodcutters and they hauled his body away, probably to their camp.
据提波所言，盖萨是被伐木工人杀死的，尸体也被他们拖走了，很可能被拖到了他们的营地里。
burygejza_vajduv_syn_gejz_NezR
The Voivode's son Gejza died fighting the villagers. The Voivode and his wife Aranka want me to take care of him and bury him properly.
游民司令官的儿子盖萨在与村民的冲突中死亡，司令官和他的妻子阿兰卡请求我将其安葬。
camp2_druhy_pytlak_se_pry_Zfmi

I'm supposed to look for the first poacher to the west of Rocktower Pond. So that's where I started exploring the Trosky district. They say there's a ruined building among the rocks between the pond and some dense woods. Could that be the poacher's hide-out? Vostatek said I was more likely to find him there before dawn or after dusk than during the day.
我得往石塔池塘西边寻找第一个偷猎者，我也是从那里开始探索特罗斯基地区的。据说在池塘和一片茂密树林之间的山岩中，有一处破败的建筑，那里会是偷猎者的藏身之处吗？沃斯塔克还说，我更可能在黄昏之后、黎明之前找到那个偷猎者，大白天可不好找。
camp2_nakonec_jsem_se_roz_UMig
In the end, I decided to end Vostatek's life and with it all this pointless running around the woods.
最后，我决定结束沃斯塔克的生命，同时为那些毫无意义的林间奔波画上句点。
camp2_prvniho_pytlaka_jse_jTRQ
I was supposed to look for the first poacher to the west of Rocktower Pond. I found one there and dispatched him straight to hell. That's all he deserved.
我朝着石塔池塘西边开始寻找第一个偷猎者。在那里我的确找到了一个偷猎者，当场便将他送进了地狱，这也是他应有的下场。
camp2_prvniho_pytlaka_jse_LkQx

I was supposed to look for the first poacher to the west of Rocktower Pond. I found one there. The poor fellah was in a desperate state, but that doesn't justify trespassing in his lord's forests. I took him straight to the bailiff.
我朝着石塔池塘西边开始寻找第一个偷猎者。在那里我也的确发现了一个偷猎者，那可怜的家伙已经走投无路，但那也不是他私闯林地的理由，而后我直接将他交给了执行官。
camp2_prvniho_pytlaka_jse_MI1U

I was supposed to look for the first poacher on the western side of Rocktower Pond. I found one there. The guy was very desperate. I felt sorry for him, and we agreed that he would stop poaching and disappear from the area
我朝着石塔池塘西边开始寻找第一个偷猎者。当我找到他时，才发现那家伙的境况极为窘迫，我对他心生怜悯。随后我们达成了共识，从此他将停止偷猎，这片区域中不会再有他的身影。
camp2_prvniho_pytlaka_mam_vML3

I'm supposed to look for the first poacher to the west of Rocktower Pond. Near a dense patch of forest I found a ruined building containing some clues. The poacher must be around here somewhere. Vostatek said that the poacher might come out before dawn or after dusk.
我得往石塔池塘西边寻找第一个偷猎者。在一片茂密树林内，我发现了一处破败的建筑，并在其中发现了一些线索，想必那个偷猎者就在这附近。沃斯塔克也说过，那个偷猎者可能会在黄昏之后、黎明之前出没。
camp2_pytlak_je_mrtvy_mus_GgF8
I was supposed to look for the first poacher to the west of Rocktower Pond. And I did indeed find a small camp in the forest in the rocks. But where's the poacher?
我朝着石塔池塘西边开始寻找第一个偷猎者，也确实在山岩里的树林中发现了一处小营地，但是偷猎者哪儿去了呢？
camp2_stejne_jsem_ho_kuch_SOhr

I was supposed to look for the first poacher on the western side of Rocktower Pond. I found one there. The guy was very desperate. I felt sorry for him, and we agreed that he would stop poaching and disappear from the area. At least that's the lie I said just before I cut him down like the pest he was.
我朝着石塔池塘西边开始寻找第一个偷猎者。当我找到他时，才发现那家伙的境况极为窘迫，我对他心生怜悯。随后我们达成了共识，从此他将停止偷猎，并会在这片区域中消失。不过，那只是个谎言，最后我还是把他像害虫一样除掉了。
carryhunt_jak_se_zda_vost_fCE7

It seems Vostatek knows all of the creatures of the forest and where to find them. The second stop was by an anthill. But in the end, it won't be Vostatek vising the ants, but rather the ants visiting him when they feast on his corpse.
沃斯塔克似乎熟知树林中的各种生物以及它们的栖息地。第二站是一个蚁丘。但最后却不是沃斯塔克拜访那些蚂蚁，而是蚂蚁拜访沃斯塔克，在他的尸体上酣享盛宴。
carryhunt_jak_se_zda_vost_WrUD
It seems Vostatek knows all of the creatures of the forest and where to find them. The second stop was by an anthill.
沃斯塔克似乎熟知树林中的各种生物以及它们的栖息地。第二站是一个蚁丘。
carryhunt_jsme_tu_vostatk_SKum

Vostatek's camp is not far now. From the birch tree, I'm supposed to keep going deeper into the forest till I reach a tree marked with a gamekeeper's mark - there should be a cross carved into it. There's also a pile of stones beside the tree.
沃斯塔克的营地现在不远了。我应该从那棵桦树开始，继续深入林中，直到找到一棵被猎人做了标记的树——上面应该刻着一个十字，树旁还有一堆石头。
carryhunt_pobliz_vostatko_nuFw
There's a strangely shaped, split birch tree near Vostatek's hideout. I carried Vostatek there and received further instructions.
沃斯塔克的藏身之所附近有一棵奇形怪状又裂开的桦树。我将沃斯塔克背到那里，接受进一步的指示。
carryhunt_tabor_jsme_nasl_iQOI
We found the huntsman's mark. It seems that's how huntsmen and gamekeepers mark places of interest in the forest.
我们找到了猎人的标记。看来这就是猎人和猎场看守人标记重要地点的方法。
carryhunt_uz_se_blizime_p_aIE4

The next stop on the way to the huntsman's hideout is a split birch tree. Its white bark and strange shape should make it unmissable. It seems it's further to the north from the anthill, in a thicker part of the forest.
前往猎人藏身之处的下一站是一棵裂开的桦树。它有显眼的白色树皮和奇特形状，所以我们应该不会错过这个路标。它似乎在蚁丘更往北的方向，位于树林深处。
carryhunt_vostatek_je_bez_yAs1
Vostatek is safely in his hideout. He surely wouldn't have managed on his own.
沃斯塔克安全到达自己的藏身之处。他自己一个人肯定无法走到这里。
carryhunt_vostatek_ma_pre_uwAN

Vostatek knows all the creatures of the forest and where to find them. The next stop on the way to his hideout is by an anthill. From the tree, I'm suppsed to head north along the water's edge. I should come across an anthill somewhere along the way.
沃斯塔克熟知树林中的各种生物以及它们的栖息地。前往他藏身之处的下一站是一个蚁丘。我应该从那棵树开始，沿着水边向北前进。我应该会在途中遇到一个蚁丘。
carryhunt_vostatek_umrel__R7V7
Vostatek died. He just died. I won't elaborate.
沃斯塔克死了，反正就是死了。我就不细说了。
carryhunt_vostatek_z_pohl_R7Jb
The sight of the hard-working ants made Vostatek thirsty, so he ordered me to take him to the tavern. Fortunately, he realized what a stupid idea that would be at the moment.
沃斯塔克看到那些忙碌的蚂蚁就感到口渴，所以他让我背他去酒馆。幸好他意识到这个念头在当下就是个愚蠢的想法。
carryhunt_vostatek_z_pohl_XjAT
The sight of the hard-working ants made Vostatek thirsty, so he ordered me to take him to the tavern. That was the last straw. The only place he'll be drinking now is in Heaven.
沃斯塔克看到那些忙碌的蚂蚁就感到口渴，于是他让我背他去酒馆。这个念头夺走了他的最后一线生机。他现在只能去天堂喝酒了。
carryhunt_vostatkuv_tabor_ADcZ
Vostatek's camp was within reach, but so was death. It'll come for all of us one day.
沃斯塔克的营地就在附近，但死亡也同样近在咫尺。终有一天，死亡会光顾我们所有人。
carryhunt_vostatkuv_zpuso_Qcx8

Vostatek's style of navigation is a bit peculiar, but what can I do? The first stop was supposed to be by a fallen tree, but due to unfortunate circumstances, Vostatek's first stop was in the hereafter. May he rest in peace.
沃斯塔克的寻路方式有点古怪，但我有什么办法呢？我们的第一站原本是一棵倒下的老树，但不幸的是，沃斯塔克的第一站直通来世。愿他安息。
carryhunt_vostatkuv_zpuso_tJ0Y
Vostatek's style of navigation is a bit peculiar, but what can I do? From the tree where I found him, I'm supposed to head north along the water's edge till I find an old fallen moss-covered tree.
沃斯塔克的寻路方式有点古怪，但我有什么办法呢？从找到他的那棵树开始，我应该沿着水边向北走，直到走到一棵卧倒在地、遍布青苔的老树那里。
carryhunt_vostatkuv_zpuso_U8TL
Vostatek's style of navigation is a bit peculiar, but what can I do? First, I carried the gamekeeper to an old fallen tree.
沃斯塔克的寻路方式有点古怪，但我有什么办法呢？我先将这个猎人背到了一棵倒地的老树那里。
carryhunt_zmena_planu_hos_Y7V9
Change of plans! Onwards to the tavern!
计划有变！前往酒馆！
carryhunt_zmenit_jsme_na__1Emv
Vostatek asked me to carry him to his hideout, which is further into the forest. He's going to give me directions.
沃斯塔克让我将他背到其藏身之处，那里就在树林深处。他会给我指路。

A priest from the Sedletz monastery also travelled in the Lord of Zimburg's company. Lord Posy requested I search for his body amongst the fallen. I'm told he carried something of great value.
塞德莱茨修道院的一位神父也在齐姆博格领主的那一行人中。“花骨朵”领主要求我在死人堆里寻找他的尸体。我听说他带着一样很有价值的东西。
checkprie_v_druzine_panu__uaOJ

塞德莱茨修道院的一位神父也在齐姆博格领主的那一行人中。“花骨朵”领主要我去寻找他的尸体，但我已经受够了。我离开了，我们的结伴旅行到此结束。

The next one I have to visit is Willow. He lives in a cottage on the left above the creek, looking down from the village green. When I speak to him, he gladly tells me where I can find his supplies. Willow himself is standing with his wife in front of the gate to their yard.
接下来我要探访的人是温洛。从村庄草坪俯瞰的话，小溪上方位于左侧的小屋就是他家。温洛和他的妻子正站在他们家庭院门前。跟他交谈的话，想必他会很热情地告诉我他的物资在哪。
checkthel_mel_bych_zkontr_M9Pm

现在该清点村中长老拜涅克的物资了，他的房子就在马车后方。据说他女儿索芙卡能告诉我物资在哪。他们正在小屋门前的院子里。

The killer we're looking for is somewhere around here. He just left behind a dead girl.

chyt_vraha_jeden_ze_svedk_QqSg

据某位目击者所言，凶手沿街逃到了马市那边。
chyt_vraha_jeden_z_kolemj_k517
One of the passers-by told me the killer ran into a nearby tower, where he was surrounded by a mob.

chyt_vraha_kdyz_mi_doslo__9JQe
When I realised that this killer was someone else, I lost all interest in him. I didn't want to waste my time with him.

chyt_vraha_mel_bych_se_ne_9mmb

chyt_vraha_podarilo_se_mi_1mOR
I managed to convince the killer to give himself up and he let himself be taken to jail. He'll get the noose, but it's still better than bleeding to death on the tower's dirty floor.
我成功说服了凶手缴械投降。他也接受了自己将被押进监狱的命运，并等待绞刑的惩罚，但那也好过躺在塔楼那肮脏的地板上、死在血泊之中。
chyt_vraha_podarilo_se_mi_ftHP

chyt_vraha_po_promluveni__oSaZ

confrontl_laszlo_mi_nabid_MXNy

László made me an offer. If I help him conspire against Jan, I'll receive the dead Peter's equipment. Politely but clearly, I turned him down. I have my honour, after all. The handover will still take place, so that Jan can properly bury his brother. I hope László doesn't cause any more problems.
拉斯洛提出一个条件。如果我帮助他密谋反对杨，我将得到死去彼得的装备。我礼貌而明确地拒绝了他。我毕竟要维护自己的荣誉。交接还是要进行，这样杨就可以安葬他的哥哥。我希望拉斯洛不会再制造任何麻烦。
confrontl_laszlo_mi_nabid_Zanm

László made me an offer. If I help him conspire against Jan, he'll provide me with such equipment that many a knight could only dream about. Sounds interesting, but I don't like the idea of joining up with his Cumans.
拉斯洛向我提出了一个条件。如果我帮助他密谋对付杨，他将为我提供许多骑士梦寐以求的装备。听起来很有意思，但我不想与他的库曼人联手。
confrontl_p_kdyz_jsem_zji_l9or
When I learned that Peter was dead, I knew that László wasn't playing fair with Jan. But that's all I learned.
当我得知彼得死了，我知道拉斯洛对杨使了诈，但我就知道这么多。
confrontl_p_naoko_jsem_la_mTFg
I lied to László, telling him I would betray Jan and lead him into a trap. If I tell Jan about these plans in time, we can think up a way to protect ourselves.
我对拉斯洛撒了谎，告诉他我会背叛杨，把他引入陷阱。如果我把这些计划及时告诉杨，我们可以想出一个保护自己的办法。
confrontl_p_oboril_jsem_s_aerd
I told László that I know what happened to Peter. He responded that Jan will want his body back to bury it. So a handover should take place in any case.
我告诉拉斯洛，我知道彼得发生了什么。他回答说，杨会希望要回尸体埋葬。所以无论如何都应该进行交接。
confrontl_vim_ze_je_petr__9XzL
I know that Peter of Suchotlesky is dead. I wonder how László Farkas would react to this fact.
我知道苏霍茨基的彼得已经死了。我想知道拉斯洛·法卡斯对这一事实会有什么反应。
confrontl_vim_ze_je_petr__GuHY
I know that Peter of Suchotlesky is dead. I wonder how László Farkas would react to this fact.

confrontl_vim_ze_je_petr__qzHp

The pig herder saw Straw the farmhand leaving the forest with a shovel. In the end, he confessed to the murder, so I took him to the Bailiff, who had him locked up. He will decide what to do with Straw later.
猪倌看到农场工稻草拿着铲子离开了森林。最终，他坦白他杀了人。我把他带到执行官那里，他被关了起来，静候发落。
confronts_pasak_prasta_vi_A2I7
The pig herder saw Straw the farmhand leaving the forest with a shovel. In the end, though, I didn't confront him.
猪倌看到农场工稻草拿着铲子离开了森林，但我没有找他对峙。
confronts_pasak_prasta_vi_dgim
The pig herder saw Straw the farmhand leaving the forest with a shovel. In the end he confessed, but insisted it was an accident. I let him go.
猪倌看到农场工稻草拿着铲子离开了森林。最终，他坦白他杀了人，但坚称那只是个意外。于是我就放走了他。
confronts_pasak_prasta_vi_I1Pn
The pig herder saw Straw the farmhand leaving the forest with a shovel. I should find Straw and confront him.
猪倌看到农场工稻草拿着铲子离开了森林。我应该去找稻草，跟他对峙。
confronts_pasak_prasta_vi_ngXI

continuei_nemel_bych_nech_ESmY

continuei_prisel_jsem_poz_1Fit

我迟到了，没能说服磨坊主邀请我吃晚饭。
continuei_prisel_jsem_poz_YhU7
I arrived late. Luckily, I was able to convince the miller to invite me to dinner.
我迟到了。幸运的是，我说服了磨坊主邀请我吃晚饭。
co_s_rozb_po_upusteni_lou_Swoo
There's nothing for it, the lute needs to be restrung. And who else can get new strings but me?
没有什么可谈的，这鲁特琴需要重新上弦。但除了我，还有谁能找到新琴弦呢？
co_s_rozb_pri_nestastne_u_6OFM
I should talk to the musicians to see what their plans are...
我得同乐师谈谈，看看他们有什么打算…
councilman_fifle_uz_nam_v_jqXi
Tuchmacher won't help us in our efforts now.
图赫马赫现将无法向我们提供帮助。
councilman_konsel_je_na_n_O6WM
I fought a duel of honour on Tuchmacher's behalf against Jan of Lesztin. I won, and Tuchmacher promised me he'd support the Kingfisher baths in the council vote.
我代表图赫马赫进行了一场荣誉决斗，在这场与列斯汀的杨的较量中，我成功胜出。图赫马赫也因此向我承诺，他将在市议会投票时向翠鸟澡堂提供他的支持。
councilman_konsel_pro_bet_PxGf
The Councillor won't vote for Betty.
议员将不会给贝蒂投票。
councilman_musim_si_proml_Y0Ku
I thought my work was done, but in the meantime Betty found out there's another councillor who might vote differently in return for some kind of favour. I'll go and talk to him and see what I can do.
本以为事情已得以了结，但在此期间贝蒂发现竟还另有一位议员惦记着别的投票人选，以此换取其它利益。我得去跟他谈谈，看看自己能做点什么。
councilman_tak_je_dobojov_8tQj
And so the fight is over. I need to talk to Tuchmacher.
战斗已经结束，我得跟图赫马赫谈谈。
councilman_udelaj_pro_kon_joYk

I thought my work was done, but in the meantime Betty found out there's another councillor who might vote differently in return for some kind of favour. The councillor's called Tuchmacher and he has some kind of dispute with a nobleman about fabrics or something. Basically, he wants me to stand in for him in a duel that will decide which one of them is in the right.
本以为事情已得以了结，但在此期间贝蒂发现竟还另有一位议员惦记着别的投票人选，以此换取利益。那位议员名叫图赫马赫，据说他因为某些布料之类的东西与一位贵族起了争端。总之，他想让我代替他进行一场决斗，以此决定在这场纠纷中谁是谁非。
craft_and_po_par_mensich__UmPn
After a few minor hitches, I managed to forge a fine sword out of the strong but flexible Damascus steel.
在经历一些小插曲后，我成功地用坚固且柔韧的大马士革钢锻造出了一把好剑。
craft_and_takhle_to_nepuj_6EVX
This won't do. A good sword has to be clean and well-honed. It's no use for anything in a shoddy state and I'll have to sharpen it again.
这样不行，只有干净且锋利的剑才能叫一把“好剑”。劣质的剑派不上用场，我得把它再磨一磨。
craft_and_ukoval_jsem_mec_IIsK
I forged the sword for Master Tomcat. Doing so, I defended blacksmith Radovan's reputation, along with his wellbeing.
我为公猫大师锻造了这把剑。这样做，我捍卫了铁匠拉多万的声誉和利益。
craft_and_vykoval_jsem_me_vx1t
I forged the sword for Lord Semine. This splendid gift could have got me an invitation to his wedding, where I was supposed to meet Lord Otto von Bergow.
我为塞米大人锻造了这把剑。这份大礼可以让我得到他婚礼的邀请，我可以在婚礼上见到奥托·冯·波尔高大人。
crimescen_nasel_jsem_myti_fRVh
I found the clearing in the woods south of Troskowitz that Pavlena and Roman often go to, according to Dushko.
我找到特罗斯科维茨南部森林里，杜什科说帕芙莱娜和罗曼经常去的那块空地了。
crimescen_po_prohledani_r_e0g7

After I searched Roman's house, Dushko told me that young lovebirds go to a clearing by the stream south of Troskowitz. Maybe that's where Roman and Pavlena are. I'm supposed to follow the stream from Roman's house to a place where the water flows between two large rocks. There, I'm supposed to face downstream, turn left and keep going till I hit a clearing.
搜完罗曼家，杜什科告诉我，那对小情侣沿着特罗斯科维茨南边的溪流，到一块小空地上去了，或许可以在那里找到他们。我要从罗曼家出发，沿着溪流，走到溪水流经两块巨石的地方，再面向下流的方向左转，最后再直走就到了。

Me and Sir Hans are not alone in the pond. A little further along by the banks there are some girls bathing, and Sir Hans, gentleman that he is, wants to go and spy on them. We'll have to keep our heads down in the reeds, otherwise we'll cause a stir.
光顾这片小湖的，不止我和汉斯少主。沿岸稍远处有群姑娘在洗澡。汉斯少主一展绅士风度，欲要上前窥探。我们得在芦苇丛中藏好，不然麻烦就大了。
cvic_syna_do_domu_se_mi_p_61JF

I got into the house as a master of swordsmanship, who'll be teaching young von Grolle. The servant told me to wait for him in the courtyard, where he soon arrived. To prove myself to him, I have to defeat him in a duel.
我以剑术大师的身份进入了冯·格罗尔家中，也将向小冯·格罗尔传授剑术技艺。家里的仆人让我在庭院内等小冯·格罗尔，没过多久他便现身了。为了向他证明我的实力，我得在一场决斗中战胜他。
cvic_syna_do_domu_se_mi_p_JiIs

I got into the house as a master of swordsmanship, who'll be teaching young von Grolle. Right in the first duel I convinced young von Grolle that I have something to teach him. Now he's training diligently in the courtyard, so his bedroom is unguarded.
我以剑术大师的身份进入了冯·格罗尔家中，也将向小冯·格罗尔传授剑术技艺。第一场决斗刚刚结束，小冯·格罗尔确信自己能从我这里学到点剑术。现在的他正在庭院里专心致志地训练，所以他的房间应该已空无一人。
cvic_syna_do_domu_se_mi_p_OLSO
I got into the house as a master of swordsmanship, who'll be teaching young von Grolle. But young von Grolle beat me in our first duel, so I didn't convince him of my ability to teach him anything.
我以剑术大师的身份进入了冯·格罗尔家中，也将向小冯·格罗尔传授剑术技艺。但在我们的首次交锋中，小冯·格罗尔将我击败，因此他并不认为我有实力对他进行教学。
cvic_syna_do_domu_se_poda_O81f
I got into the house as a master of swordsmanship, who'll be teaching young von Grolle. The servant told me to wait for him in the courtyard.
我以剑术大师的身份进入了冯·格罗尔家中，也将向小冯·格罗尔传授剑术技艺。家里的仆人让我在庭院内等小冯·格罗尔。
damavnesn_dostan_lacka_do_0stS
Try to knock Latsek out somehow.
想办法打倒拉塞克。

Follow Margaret.
跟着玛格丽特。

damavnesn_pomoz_markete_s_TkRT
Help Margaret get the wealthy burgher's money.
帮助玛格丽特得到富有市民的钱。
damavnesn_promluv_si_s_ma_3vJq
Talk to Margaret about what to do next.
和玛格丽特谈谈下一步该怎么做。
damavnesn_promluv_si_s_ma_4CQP
Talk to Margaret.
和玛格丽特谈谈。

尽可能显得典雅。

达米安见上帝去了。

defeatjan_p_laszlo_padl_v_V3ul
Everything that could go wrong did go wrong. Sir Peter is dead, Jan of Suchotlesky is dead, and so too is Baron Farkas. No one gained anything from it all. There was no winner…
满盘皆输。彼得爵士死了，苏霍茨基的杨也死了，法卡斯男爵也死了。没有人从中获利。没有赢家……
defeatlas_p_jan_padl_v_bo_oQHZ
Unfortunately, Jan did not survive his second encounter with László's Cumans. But at least he's now with his brother. May the earth rest lightly on them.
不幸的是，与拉斯洛的库曼人进行第二次对抗时，杨没有幸存下来。但至少他现在和哥哥在一起了。愿他们安息。
dej_henik_majku_jsem_vyre_9a3V
I've solved the maypole problem and now I don't have to worry about Henik anymore.
我已解决五朔节花柱相关的麻烦，现在我已无需再担忧亨尼克。
dej_henik_procek_tachovsk_flRy
Prochek would like to straighten out Henik. He said I might goad him to fight if I mention his brothers' leaving.
普罗切克想要搞定亨尼克。他说只要我跟亨尼克提及他兄弟的离开，被激怒的他就会和我干架。
dej_henik_ted_uz_je_zbyte_e8fH
There's no point in discussing anything with Henik now.
现在没必要再跟亨尼克讨论任何事情了。
dej_henik_utekl_jsem_ze_s_uOpC
I fled from the fight with Henik. I didn't do very well there.
我从与亨尼克的战斗中逃走了，我在战斗中发挥得不太好。
dej_henik_vojka_by_chtela_MtaD
Voyka would like to teach Henik a lesson, she said I might goad him to fight if I mention his brothers' leaving.
沃伊卡想要给亨尼克一点教训。她说只要我跟亨尼克提及他兄弟的离开，被激怒的他就会和我干架。
dej_henik_vyprovokaval_js_BrTd
I provoked Henik into a fight, but he gave me a good walloping. This is a dead end. I'll have to think of something else.
利用激将法，我让亨尼克跟我打了一架，但是他却把我暴打了一顿。无计可施的我得想想别的办法。
dej_henik_vyprovokaval_js_q7Oi
I goaded Henik into fighting me and kicked his arse. Hopefully it will help me tonight…
利用激将法，我让亨尼克跟我打了一架，把他暴揍了一顿。但愿此事能在今晚帮到我......
dej_hlase_dal_jsem_zizkov_5vbh
I gave Zizka a report about the raid.
我向杰式卡报告了突袭的情况。
dej_hlase_vypad_je_u_konc_gRWK
The raid is over. I should tell Zizka how it went.
突袭结束了。我该向杰式卡报告进展。
dej_hromo_hromovy_kamen_j_Mbjp
I eventually found the thunderstone and gave it to Thomlin, who had originally found it. It felt like the right thing to do.
我最后还是找到了雷石，并把它给了最初发现它的托姆林。我觉得这是正确的选择。
dej_hromo_hromovy_kamen_j_TUCg
I eventually found the thunderstone and gave it to Kona, who was really desperate for it. It felt like the right thing to do.
我最后还是找到了雷石，并把它给了柯娜。因为她真的很想得到它，我觉得这是正确的选择。
dej_hromo_kona_me_pro_ten_oXss
It was Kona who originally asked me to get the stone, and she seemed quite desperate for it.
一开始是柯娜让我去找这块石头的，她似乎很急切的想要得到它。
dej_hromo_thomlin_chtel_s_t6CC
Thomlin wanted his stone back. He was the one who found it, so I suppose it's his after all.
托姆林想要回他的石头，这石头最初是他发现的，所以我觉得理应给他。
dej_kopii_podstrcil_jsem__XG7O
I slipped Basan a replica of his sword.
我将一把巴桑佩剑的仿制品塞给了他。
dej_obkre_muzu_tajemstvi__jN4D
I can also tell Knuckles the secret of the symbols.
我也可以告诉巧指符号的秘密。
dej_obkre_odmitl_jsem_stu_gxqQ
I refused to give Knuckles the symbols. I don't think he'd make any beneficial use out of them.
我拒绝把符号交给巧指。我认为他无法有效地利用这些东西。
dej_obkre_znacky_jsem_dal_BsFl
I let Knuckles copy the symbols. I hope he keeps his word and makes us rich.
我让巧指誊写这些符号。我希望他遵守诺言，让我们发财。
dej_pokla_poklad_jsem_nas_5Pwi
I had already found the family inheritance. I can give it to Hanka.
我找到了那些家族遗产，可以把它们交给汉卡。
dej_pokla_poklad_jsem_nas_KlYz
I had already found the family inheritance. Hanka claimed he deserved it, so I handed it over to him.
我找到了那些家族遗产，但是汉卡一再声称它们归他所有，因此我便将遗产交给了他。
dej_umelc_lovci_vostatek__YmXu
New strings could be bought in Kuttenberg. But Michael and George have no money, and who else but me could give them some?
也许到了库滕堡就能买到新的琴弦，但是迈克尔和乔治却身无分文，而且除了我还有谁能给他们钱呢？
dej_umelc_taplatil_jsem_u_8kLN
I paid the musicians so they could afford new lute strings.
我给了两位乐师一些钱，这样他们就能买得起新琴弦了。
deliverfo_jidlem_ze_zikmu_98YP
Now I should go and feed the city's poor. Let the beggars feast like kings for once in their life! I will find them mostly near churches and city gates.
我该去接济城里的穷人了。就让那些穷苦之人也享受一次皇家盛宴吧！他们大部分都在教堂和城门周边。
deliverfo_jidlem_ze_zikmu_V8sb
I used the food to feed the poor of Kuttenberg. How happy they were to feast like kings for once!
我将西格斯蒙德库存中的食物偷走，接济了库滕堡的穷人。体验了一次国王用餐待遇的他们，别提有多幸福了！
deliverho_pepika_jsem_ose_3hN6
I mounted Pepik and rode him back to Vostatek.
我骑着佩皮克，回到沃斯塔克身边。
deliverho_pepika_jsem_sic_xS86
Vostatek died. There's no reason to save Pepik now.
沃斯塔克死了，现在也没必要救佩皮克了。
deliverho_pepika_musim_do_xoKO
I need to get Pepik back to Vostatek. The first step would be to get in the saddle…
我得将佩皮克带回沃斯塔克身边，而第一步就是坐上马鞍…
deliverho_pepik_bohuzel_u_8yO9
Unfortunately, Pepik died. I did what I could. Vostatek will surely mourn his loss…
不幸的是，佩皮克死了。我已经尽力了。沃斯塔克肯定会为失去他的马而悲痛…
deliverho_pepik_je_poslus_hXHb
Pepik is well trained and let me mount him. Now I just need to ride him back to Vostatek.
佩皮克受过良好的训练，让我骑到了它背上。现在我只要骑着它赶回沃斯塔克身边。
deliverof_knez_marian_ves_0zKe

Father Marian doesn't believe in the local legend about a gateway to hell in the abandoned mines near Old Kutna. Nevertheless, he hired me to look into it to put a stop to the rumours. He gave me some food to prepare as an offering for demons in the mines. We'll see who really comes to pick it up.
当地传说称老库特纳附近的废弃矿场有一个通往地狱的通道，神⽗⻢⾥安并不相信。尽管如此，他还是雇我去调查，以终止谣言。他给了我一些食物，用来献祭矿井里的恶魔。我们可以看看究竟是谁会来拿走这些东西。
deliverof_knez_marian_ves_hL9O

Father Marian doesn't believe in the local legend about a gateway to hell in the abandoned mines near Old Kutna. Nevertheless, he hired me to look into it to put a stop to the rumours. He gave me some supplies to lower into the mine. That will no longer be possible, since the locals were stricken by an unforseeable event...
当地传说称老库特纳附近的废弃矿场有一个通往地狱的通道，神⽗⻢⾥安并不相信。尽管如此，他还是雇我去调查，以终止谣言。他给了我一些物资，让我下放到矿井。这将不再可能实施，因为当地人被一个不可预知的事件所困扰......
deliverof_knez_marian_ves_y2gR

Father Marian doesn't believe in the local legend about a gateway to hell in the abandoned mines near Old Kutna. Nevertheless, he hired me to look into it to put a stop to the rumours. He gave me some supplies and I lowered them into the mine. But what I lured out were no demons. Or were they?
当地传说称老库特纳附近的废弃矿场有一个通往地狱的通道，神⽗⻢⾥安并不相信。尽管如此，他还是雇我去调查，以终止谣言。他给了我一些物资，我把它们下放到矿井。但我引出来的东西究竟是不是恶魔，我心里也没数。
deliverpo_doporucil_jsem__aspj
I delivered the potion from Kuba to the miller for his horse. Hopefully, it will help his horse.
我把库巴给的药水交给磨坊主，让他治疗马。希望它能帮助他的马。
deliverpo_dostal_jsem_od__IS30
I received a potion from Kuba to give to the miller. Supposedly, it'll help cure his horse.
库巴给了我一种药水，让我交给磨坊主。这应该可以治疗他的马。
deliverpo_i_kdyz_jsem_ved_dCB8
Even though I knew it was poison, I still gave it to the miller. He's a prick, anyway.
尽管我知道那是毒药，但我还是把它给了磨坊主。反正他是个混蛋。
deliverpo_kdyz_jsem_zjist_4W7c
When I learned that Kuba had given me poison for the miller's horse, I went to give him a proper scolding.
当我知道库巴交给我的其实是毒药时，我把他训斥了一顿。
deliverpo_kdyz_jsem_zjist_5QcE
When I learned that Kuba had given me poison for the miller's horse, I decided I'd better give him my own healing decoction instead.
当我知道库巴交给我的其实是毒药时，我决定最好把我自己的治疗药水给磨坊主的马用。
deliverpo_kdyz_jsem_zjist_pflb
When I learned that Kuba had given me poison for the miller's horse, I went straight to the miller to warn him about Kuba.
当我知道库巴交给我的其实是毒药时，我直接去找磨坊主，警告他当心库巴。
deliverpo_mlynarovi_jsem__QCiD
Instead of Kuba's potion, I gave the miller my own healing decoction.
我给磨坊主的不是库巴的药水，而是我自己的治疗药剂。
deliverpo_tak_ten_lektvar_faiI
Well, the potion I received to give to the miller for his horse is actually poison.
好吧，我收到的给磨坊主治马的药水实际上是毒药。
deliver_t_jak_jsem_slibil_hbgg
I brought the hermit's broken sword to Radovan the blacksmith for reforging.
我把隐士的断剑带到铁匠拉多万那里进行重新锻造。
deliver_t_v_hrobe_skutecn_NaQi
Radovan the blacksmith was right: the blade of the old Toledo sword will be a good base for a new sword. Now I just have to take it to his smithy.
铁匠拉多万是对的：旧托莱多剑的剑身可以作为新剑的良好基底。现在我只需把它送到铁匠铺。
deliverwa_mech_je_naplnen_RRxf
The waterskin is full, now I just have to bring it to Vostatek.
水袋装满了水，现在我要将水拿给沃斯塔克。
deliverwa_vostatek_byl_po_QX0r
Vostatek got thirsty on the way. He handed me his empty waterskin for me to fill up. But instead of relief in clean spring water, he found death.
沃斯塔克在路上口渴了。他将自己的空水袋递给我，让我去装水。但清泉水并没有给他带来慰藉，他还是死了。
deliverwa_vostatek_dostal_aGRx
Vostatek got his water and, relieved, thanked me.
沃斯塔克喝了水，松了一口气并感谢了我。
deliverwa_vostatkuv_mech__YGQ3
Vostatek is thirsty. He gave me his waterskin to fill up from the barrel in his hideout.
沃斯塔克口渴了。他将水袋递给我，让我从营地的桶里装水。
deserters__event_caption_I0pt
Encounter
偶遇
deserters__event_descript_PrV7
On the road stands a man. His eyes bear a smug grin, and he holds a weapon. He wears assorted armour, most of which doesn't match. He gestures for you to stop.
有个男人站在路上，手上拿着一把武器，眼眸中流露出得意的神情。他身上还堆着各式各样的护甲，但是大部分并不相配。他朝你示意，想让你停下。
deserters__player_caption_fMRt
Encounter
偶遇
deserters__player_descrip_kfcG
There's an armed man on the road ahead, wearing a few battered bits of armour and holding a weapon. He's likely waiting for something. He's yet to notice you.
前方的路上有个人，看起来似乎还戴着装备。他穿着几件破旧的护甲，手中还攥着一把武器，很有可能在等待着什么，而他始终没有注意到你。
devil__event_caption_oeYA
Focused man.
专注的男人。
devil__event_description_gsfN
There's a man standing by the road, fervently chanting something. He's completely engrossed in what he's doing and hasn't noticed you.
路边站着一个男人，正满是热情地反复念叨着什么。他完全沉浸在自己正在做的事情里，根本没有注意到你。
devil__player_caption_aBFC
Focused man.
专注的男人。
devil__player_description_meud
There's a man standing by the road, fervently chanting something. He's completely engrossed in what he's doing and hasn't noticed you.
路边站着一个男人，正满是热情地反复念叨着什么。他完全沉浸在自己正在做的事情里，根本没有注意到你。
dezerteri_katz_rikal_ze_z_SzB3
Katz said that what he needs most is to find the charter the lost soldiers were taking to Sedletz. It seems the charter was in a large painted chest.
卡茨说过，他最想拿到的就是由那伙失踪士兵带往塞德莱茨的特许状，而据说那份特许状就存放在一个大型彩绘箱里。
dezerteri_lektvar_nespave_sA1b
The rousing remedy is ready, now I just have to pour it down Myshek's throat.
唤醒麦士克的药物已准备好，我只需要往他喉咙里灌就行。
dezerteri_nakonec_jsem_ne_0s2I
In the end, I let the sodding Prague soldiers live.
最终，我给那些该死的布拉格士兵留下了活路。
dezerteri_nakonec_jsem_se_lurf
Now that Myshek's dead, he can't help me at all.
麦士克已死，我无法再向他寻求帮助。
dezerteri_nasel_jsem_truh_wTNv
I found the chest and in it the charter Katz was so keen to get back.
我找到了那个箱子，还在其中发现了卡茨迫切想要取回的那份特许状。
dezerteri_pobil_jsem_vsec_NCxP
I killed all the lost Prague soldiers.
我杀死了所有失踪的布拉格士兵。
dezerteri_podarilo_se_mi__Iblg
I managed to rouse Myshek for a while.
我成功唤醒了麦士克。
dezerteri_pokud_ale_chci__JOlt
If I want to find out more, though, I should try to mix a remedy to rouse Myshek. It won't cure him, but it should keep him awake long enough for me to ask him a couple of questions.
要想找到更多线索，我就得想办法医治麦士克，让他振作起来。尽管无法将其治愈，但至少能让他清醒一会儿，好让我有足够的时间向他问话。
dezerteri_ted_kdyz_uz_vim_sBis
Now that I know where the soldiers are hiding, I should get rid of them. It's not like anyone will shed any tears over them…
我已知晓那些士兵的藏身之处，该把他们处理掉了。反正也没人愿意为他们流一滴泪......
dezerteri_velitel_bude_mi_4OWO

Commander Katz will be pleased - the lost soldiers are hiding in a sawmill close to Old Lhota. When I tell him, I hope he'll finally give the order to move out and my time serving with the Prague forces will come to an end.
那些失踪的士兵正躲在一间离老洛塔很近的锯木厂里，指挥官卡茨知道的话会很高兴的。但愿在我跟他汇报情况后，他就能下达迁离的命令，届时我便不必再为布拉格军队效力。
dezerteri_velitel_me_nave_ADfn
I have the feeling I'm close to resolving this business with the lost soldiers.
我有预感，与失踪士兵有关的问题很快就能解决。
dezerteri_velitel_me_nave_BUiq

Commander Katz said he'd talk to me, but first I have to help him find the lost soldiers, the wagon and the document they were taking to Sedletz. Unfortunately, nobody has any idea where to look for them. I need more information…
指挥官卡茨说过会跟我谈一谈，但我得先帮他找到被派往塞德莱茨却半路失踪了的士兵、马车和文件。可惜的是，没人知道该到哪里去找他们，所以我需要更多的线索......
dezerteri_velitel_me_nave_GdT2
In a fever, Myshek told Musa about some place called Lhota - maybe the other soldiers are hiding there? It's not much, but at least I know where to begin…
发烧中的麦士克向穆萨诉说了某处名叫洛塔的地方，说不定其他士兵就在那里躲着？尽管线索还不够多，但至少我知道该从哪里着手调查了……
dezerteri_velitel_me_nave_pAXw
Myshek revealed where I should look for the other lost soldiers. I have to be careful, though - most likely they don't want to be found…
麦士克向我透露了可以找到其他失踪士兵的地方，但是我必须得小心一点，因为他们大概并不希望自己被找到……
dezerteri_v_taborovem_spi_e8RD
In the camp hospital I found Musa, the sawbones who's tending the wounded Myshek.
我在野战医所找到了穆萨，这位大夫正照顾着受伤的麦士克。
dezerteri_zkusim_se_popat_pknv

I could ask the camp sawbones Musa. It seems one of the lost soldiers, a man called Myshek, is in his field hospital. Maybe Musa managed to get some information out of him, at least the direction I should go in. Without any clues I'll be looking for the soldiers till winter and we'll never steal the cannon from the camp.
或许我可以向营地里的医生穆萨询问消息，似乎一位名叫麦士克的失踪士兵正待在他的野战医所里。没准穆萨已经从那个士兵口中问到了些线索呢，至少能告诉我该往哪个方向去找。要是连半点线索都没有，我就得找到猴年马月，这样我们就永远也别想把营地里的火炮偷走。
dezerteri_ztracenou_listi_R17Z
In the end, I didn't manage to find the lost charter, but that doesn't matter.
最后我未能找到那份遗失的特许状，但是无伤大雅。
dinner_a_od_te_chvile_si__5A1N
And from that moment on, all I remember is waking up in Anna's chamber.
在那之后，我只记得在安娜的房间里醒来。
dinner_a_od_te_chvile_si__Yh28
And from that moment on, all I remember is waking up in the middle of nowhere.
在那之后，我只记得在荒郊野外醒来。
dinner_a_taky_jaka_zeleni_f1zE
And what kind of vegetable.
还有哪种蔬菜。
dinner_a_taky_jake_maso_V9Sg
And what kind of meat.
还有哪种肉。
dinner_a_taky_jake_vino_yvBs
And what kind of wine.
还有哪种酒。
dinner_jidlo_bylo_vazne_d_gJjs
The food was especially good. The miller revealed the recipe, saying it needed wine, vegetables, meat, and some herb. When we finished eating, the miller brought out the wine and we talked some more.
食物特别好吃。磨坊主透露了食谱，说需要酒、蔬菜、肉和一些草药。当我们吃完后，磨坊主把酒拿出来，我们又聊了一会儿。
dinner_mezi_pohary_vina_s_E1Nu
Between the cups of wine, I managed to get the Miller to tell me which herb goes in the meal.
在觥筹交错之间，我设法从磨坊主嘴里套出，饭菜里有哪种草药。
dinner_mlynar_to_nakonec__RuLA
In the end, the miller couldn't hold out, falling asleep at the table.
最后，磨坊主撑不住了，在餐桌上睡着了。
dinner_nakonec_jsme_se_ro_VssO
In the end, we said farewell and went our separate ways.
最后，我们告了别，各奔东西。
diskutuj__mestane_stali_n_MdtJ
The burghers stood firmly on the side of the Brotherhood.
市民们坚定地选择站在了兄弟会一边。
diskutuj__mistr_albik_sta_hEG9
Albich stood firmly on the side of the monastery.
阿尔比赫毅然决然地选择站在了修道院一边。
diskutuj__mistr_musa_z_ma_IMIE
Musa of Mali was in favour of an amicable solution and division of powers.
马里的穆萨支持以温和的方式解决问题，划分权力。
diskutuj__musim_probrat_o_ndfs

I have to discuss in Latin what the Church dispute is actually about, especially with the two parties. I have to make sure I'm not too sober and not too drunk - too sober and my Latin will be bad, too drunk and I'll lose control and attract attention, so I might give myself away. So I have to drink sensibly!
在商讨教会争端的具体内容时，我必须使用拉丁语进行交流，更何况还得跟两方阵营进行交涉。我得确保自己始终保持微醺状态，因为过于清醒的我无法说出像样的拉丁语，而太过迷醉则会让我失去控制，引起不必要的注意，进而暴露身份。总而言之，我必须控制酒量！
diskutuj__promluvil_jsem__iHgZ
I've spoken to the Sedletz Monastery representatives.
我跟塞德莱茨修道院的代表进行了交谈。
diskutuj__promluvil_jsem__RSsp
I've spoken to the Brotherhood representatives.
我跟兄弟会的代表进行了交谈。
diskutuj__promluvil_jsem__y7Q7
I've spoken to both sides of the dispute, so I can give my speech now.
我跟矛盾双方进行了交谈，现在可以发表演讲了。
dlc_brunc_sloz_zkousku_lo_ZoaZ
Find a piece of Brunswick's armour by the two trees.
在两棵树旁找到一件布伦瑞克护甲。
dlc_brunc_sloz_zkousku_mo_nxpF
Solve the riddle and find a piece of Brunswick's armour.
解开谜语并找到布伦瑞克护甲中的一件。
dlc_brunc_sloz_zkousku_od_ehxd
Find a piece of Brunswick's armour at the stone cairn.
在石标处寻找布伦瑞克的护甲。
dlc_brunc_sloz_zkousku_pe_iR3H
Find a piece of Brunswick's armour at the crosses on the rock.
在一处岩石上的十字架寻找布伦瑞克的护甲。
dlc_brunc_sloz_zkousku_vy_3yvw
Find a piece of Brunswick's armour near the old skeleton.
在破旧遗骸旁寻找布伦瑞克的护甲。
do_bitvy_komori_ulrich_vo_M71l

Chamberlain Ulrich von Schaumberg has been tasked with taking the castle, catching the bandits and rescuing Sir Jaromier of Nebakov. Moving out in the early morning had one goal - to catch the bandits by surprise.
管家乌尔里希·冯·沙恩伯格已受命攻占城堡、捉拿强盗并营救内巴科夫的雅罗米尔爵士，而清晨出征为的就是打他们个出其不意。
do_bitvy_u_spodni_brany_n_bo6z

Chamberlain Ulrich and his cavalry unit are waiting for us at the lower gate. My role in this campaign is to serve and protect Capon. We've both been assigned to the cavarly, so we're supposed to arrive in armour and on horseback.
管家乌尔里希和他的骑兵部队正在下城门等着我们。我在本次征战中的任务就是保护卡蓬并为他效力。我们俩都被编进了骑兵队伍中，因此也需要披肩戴甲、坐上马背、踏上征途。
dobre_se__po_bujarem_vece_i8sF
The revelry of the castle banquet was followed by a peaceful, quiet night.
城堡宴会的狂欢过后，便是平静安详的夜晚。
dobre_se__pred_bitvou_bud_22Qg
It's a good idea to get a good night's sleep before a battle - but more importantly, not to oversleep.
战斗前夜睡上一次好觉可不是什么坏事，但是千万记住，可别睡过头了。
dobyj_zpa_jostova_armada__eo6f
Jobst's army has finally arrived to help Suchdol. I ride at its head with Radzig, Hanush and Jobst.
约布斯特的援军终于抵达了苏赫多尔，拉德季、瀚纳什、约布斯特和我一同骑着马行进在部队最前方。
dobyj_zpa_jostova_armada__v2Xq
Jobst's army has finally arrived to help Suchdol. I ride at its head with Radzig, Hanush and Jobst. Our goal is clear: to take back Suchdol fort and scatter our enemies once and for all!
约布斯特的援军终于抵达了苏赫多尔，拉德季、瀚纳什、约布斯特与我一同骑着马行进在部队最前方，我们当前的目标很明确：夺回苏赫多尔堡垒，并将敌人赶尽杀绝！
dodelej_c_az_budu_priprav_AFiF
Once I'm ready to leave and I've said goodbye to everyone, I'll wait on the ramparts for Samuel and for twilight.
待我做足准备，跟各位好友道别之后，我就该到城墙上等待塞缪尔，并静待暮色降临。
dodelej_c_pockal_jsem_na__Np2T
I waited on the ramparts until dusk. Now, we can crawl out of the fortress.
我在城墙上等到了黄昏，现在我们可以爬出堡垒了。
dojdi_do__mlynar_chce_aby_un94
The miller wants me to join him in The Lair. He says he'll tell me what all this effort was for. I'm on tenterhooks…
磨坊主想让我和他一起去”巢穴“。他说他会告诉我这一切行动的目的。我真是迫不及待了…
dojdi_do__mlynar_chtel_ab_ALvb

The miller wanted me to join him in The Lair. He was supposed to tell me what all this effort was for. And he did. This whole time I've been involved in the preparation of black powder! We tried it out, and it was such an explosion that it knocked over an entire tree. My mission ended with a bang. Lower Semine has an interesting future in store...
磨坊主想让我和他一起去”巢穴“。他要告诉我这一切行动的目的，他也的确做到了。原来我这段时间都在参与制备黑火药！我们试用了火药，它的爆炸威力甚至震倒了整棵树。我的任务在爆炸声中结束了。下塞米的未来想必很有意思……
dojdi_nab_i_se_mnou_chce__Osty
Hanush also grumbled to me that his brand new sword went blunt in the battle. I offered to hone it for him.
瀚纳什崭新的佩剑在此次战斗中因磨损而变钝，他为此向我发起了牢骚，因此我决定帮助他打磨佩剑。
dojdi_nab_i_se_mnou_chtel_gOWw
Hanush also grumbled to me that his brand new sword went blunt in the battle. I offered to hone it for him and got to work straightaway.
瀚纳什崭新的佩剑在此次战斗中因磨损而变钝，他为此向我发起了牢骚，因此我决定帮助他打磨佩剑并立刻投入到打磨工作中。
dojdi_na__tajnou_chodbou__4AA6
We went through the passageway. But we're not in the clear yet.
我们走出了密道。但我们还没脱险。
dojdi_na__ted_jen_projit__2lMM
Now to go through the passageway to the end.
现在要穿过密道，一直走到底。
dojdi_si__mel_bych_si_doj_Vref
I should go and collect my wage for my day's work from Jerome the caretaker.
我应该去找看守人杰罗姆领取我当天的工钱。
dojdi_za__misto_zapasu_s__k56w
Instead of fighting with Goliath, I'm supposed to go up against Damian and Zavish together.
眼下无需跟歌利亚搏斗，我得同时迎战达米安和扎维什。
dojdi_za__s_vazounem_uz_z_y9dx
I can't fight with Goliath anymore, but maybe Mole will find a new opponent for me.
我无法再与歌利亚进行决斗，但摩尔应该能给我找来其他对手。
dokonci_c_nezvladnul_jsem_Eaa2
I couldn't do it. I just couldn't kill Chenyek. So I killed Knuckles instead.
我无法对程叶科下手，我做不到，所以只能把巧指给杀了。
dokonci_c_sice_jsem_udela_clr6
I did everything I was supposed to in the mine, but Chenyek is still alive because I fucked up my previous attempt to kill him. Before I return to Knuckles, I need to finish Chenyek off.
我完成了所有应该在矿洞中执行的任务，但是现在程叶科依然还活着，都怪我之前搞砸了，没能杀死他。在回去找巧指之前，我得了结程叶科的性命。
dokonci_c_zabil_jsem_cenk_WjcS
I killed Chenyek, just like Knuckles wanted. I can go and get my reward.

I took the bones to the abbot. He believes he'll smooth things out and the Bylany locals will forget about the dragon. I don't know what he has planned for the bones, but I reckon that was the last I'll see of them. I was happy to help the Church when it was in need. That's something every good Christian should do without having to think twice.
我将那些骨头交给了修道院院长，他很有信心自己能把事情处理妥当，也相信那只巨龙将不再是比兰尼人茶余饭后的谈资。我也不知道院长打算如何处置那些骨头，总之想必我将难有机会再看到它们。不过能够帮到有需要的教会，我很是高兴，毕竟作为一名基督徒，总有些好事是不需要再三考虑的。
dones_kos_kosti_jsem_si_n_l2yG

dones_kos_opat_umrel_PXFK
