I got the seal of the dead mine owner for Rat. Rich mine owner Hanuman Rot died without heirs and in his will he left his property to the church, the city and King Sigismund. With the seal in hand, however, the Guild could make a few changes, much to the chagrin of the Hungarian king and his allies.
我将已故矿主哈奴曼·罗特的印章交给了“耗子”。这位富裕的矿主后继无人，死前立下遗嘱决定将遗产留给教会、市政厅以及西格斯蒙德国王。如今有了那枚印章，公会将会掀起风浪，这将让那位匈牙利国王以及他的盟友很是苦恼。
dones_pen_pavlovi_jsem_do_4lLh
I took the coin to Pavel like I promised, and he can finally start a new life in Kuttenberg.
我已遵照承诺，将银币交给了帕维尔。如此一来，他也终能在库滕堡开启他崭新的生活。
dones_pen_ted_musim_pavlo_ZQMT
Now I have to take the coin to Pavel like I promised so he can finally start a new life in Kuttenberg.
现在，我得遵照承诺，将钱交给帕维尔。如此一来，他也终能在库滕堡开启他崭新的生活。
dones_pta_donesl_jsem_pta_kdG3
I brought Sir Hans the armour and wine for the journey. As expected, Sir Hans couldn't resist making a few of his typical remarks, but he didn't suspect it could have been much, much worse.
我把为汉斯爵士准备的红酒和装备悉数交给了他。不出所料，他没忍住发了几句牢骚，但他不知道的是，情况本来还会更加糟糕。
dones_pta_na_tvrzi_pomalu_y09k
Food supplies are dwindling at the fortress, but I managed to find something to eat, so our hunger is satisfied, at least for a while.
堡垒中的物资越来越少，好在我找到了一些食物，勉强充饥。
dones_pta_pan_ptacek_bude_l77Z
Capon will be just as hungry as the rest of us. I won’t bother looking for food.
就让卡蓬和大家一起挨饿吧。我才懒得去找吃的。
dones_pta_pred_odjezdem_m_THj3
Sir Hans is still waiting for the promised wine and, above all, his sword and armour. I have to bring him something, but I should think about armour for myself as well.
说好的给汉斯爵士弄到红酒，他现在还在等着呢，当然最重要的，还有他的佩剑与护甲。我必须把东西拿给他，不过我也应该为自己的护甲做考虑才对。
dones_pta_ptacek_odmitl_s_JEVb
Sir Hans refused the shoddy armour. I guaranteed Hanush I'd keep him safe, so I'm going to have to come up with a solution. And I have to think about armour for myself as well.
汉斯爵士拒绝收下那些破烂的护甲。我向瀚纳什担保过会保他周全，所以我必须想个解决办法来，而且我也得为自己的护甲做考虑。
dones_pta_s_takovym_hlade_SbXR
When you're this hungry you can't think straight, never mind fight. We are slowly running out of supplies. If I can't find anything to eat soon, me and Capon will both go mad.
饥饿到这种程度，完全无法思考，更别提战斗了。我们的补给已经所剩无几了，如果再找不到吃的，我和卡蓬都得疯掉。
dones_pyt_pytlacke_talism_d2BC
I handed the poachers' talismans to the huntsman and collected the bounty.
我将偷猎者的护身符交给猎人并领取赏金。
dones_pyt_s_nasbiranymi_t_DlFC
With the talismans collected, there is nothing stopping me from handing them over to the huntsman and collecting the bounty.
拿到护身符后，我就可以毫无障碍地将它们交给猎人以领取赏金。
dones_ryc_dyku_jsem_nasel_aYZv
I found the goblet, and I'm sure the Bailiff is waiting impatiently for it.
我找到了那只高脚杯，想必执行官现在已经等不及了吧。
dones_ryc_rychtar_plumel__wETi
Bailiff Plumel ordered me to bring a confiscated goblet from his study. I'd better do it quickly so I don't miss the thirsty lords' orders.
执行官普卢梅尔要求我将一只被收走的高脚杯从他的书房里取来。我最好赶快动身，免得耽误了这位心急如焚的大人的命令。
dones_ryc_rychtar_za_dyku_x6BJ
The Bailiff didn't even thank me for the goblet and waved me away like an annoying fly. At least I know how the city lords treat their subjects.
执行官竟未为那只高脚杯向我表示感谢，像对待恼人的苍蝇一样手臂一挥便让我离开，不过我至少算是见识到城里的达官贵人们都是如何对待平民百姓的了。
dones_ryc_zdrzel_jsem_se__WQyP
I took too long looking for the goblet, and the Bailiff didn't even want it in the end. I'm getting tired of being ordered around by the nobles.
为了找到那只高脚杯，我费尽心思，结果没想到那个执行官已不再需要。这些身居高位之人总是对我呼之即来，挥之即去，真是让人摇头叹息。
dones_sou_mam_ve_svem_drz_RYdk
I've got the barrel of black powder. It's time for me to bring it to the guildsmen waiting near the mine.
我已取得那桶黑火药，是时候将它交给正在矿场附近等待的公会成员了。
dones_sou_po_te_co_jsem_z_Y1W9
After getting my hands on the barrel of black powder, all I had to do was to bring it to the guildsmen waiting near the mine. Now nothing stands in the way of the most exciting part of our plan.
我取来了那桶黑火药，接下来的任务便是将其交给正在矿场附近等待的公会成员。如此一来，我们计划中最扣人心弦的一环便蓄势待发。
dones_sou_uz_nic_nikam_no_FJI8
I don't have to go anywhere now, it's over. Someone died, and I happened to be there…
现在的我无需再去别处，一切都已然结束。有人命丧黄泉，而我碰巧就在现场......
dones_str_donesl_jsem_lov_coip
I brought sheep gut to Vostatek the gamekeeper so he can make strings for the lute.
我将羊肠交给了猎人沃斯塔克，如此一来他便能制作鲁特琴弦。
dones_str_driv_nez_jsem_o_zTPd
Before I could get the strings from the huntsman, he died a tragic death.
我还没能从猎人那里弄到琴弦，他就死于非命。
dones_str_sehnal_jsem_ovc_vZ3Z
I got some sheep gut. The sooner it stops making my pockets reek, the better. I should take it to Vostatek the gamekeeper.
我弄到了一些羊肠，现在最好赶快把它拿给猎人沃斯塔克，省得它把我的口袋给熏得臭气冲天。
dones_vdo_poustevnik_je_o_AoEA

The hermit told me where his old sword is hidden. His only condition was that I have to bring a small cross, as well as a message of forgiveness, to Margaret, and old widow in Troskowitz. It's strange - it seems very important to him but he didn't want to do it himself.
隐士把旧剑的藏匿之处告诉了我。他唯一的条件是，我必须把一个小十字架以及宽恕的信息带给玛格丽特，玛格丽特是特罗斯科维茨的一个老寡妇。这很奇怪——这对他来说似乎非常重要，但他却不想亲自去做。
dones_vdo_poustevnik_me_p_XmUf
The hermit asked me for a favour in return for his sword. It's all a bit strange, but passing on a wooden cross to an old widow is not a request a good Christian can refuse.
隐士希望用自己的剑来交换，请我帮一个忙，让我把一个木制十字架交给一个老寡妇，虽然一切看似很奇怪，但作为一个虔诚的基督徒，我无法拒绝这个请求。
dones_vdo_rozhodl_jsem_se_hCmE
I decided to do something different. I didn't pass on Ambrose the Hermit's forgiveness.
我决定不这么做。我没有传达隐士安布洛斯的宽恕。
dones_vdo_rytir_konrad_me_FYZF

Knight Konrad will tell me where the hermit's broken sword is. His condition is to bring the cross of forgiveness to the old widow Margaret in Troskowitz. He cares enough to do it, but because of the people pursuing him, he can't do it alone.
骑士康拉德同意将隐士断剑的所在之处告知于我，但前提是我得将宽恕十字架交给特罗斯科维茨的老寡妇玛格丽特。他对此事尤为上心，只是因为正遭他人追捕，才无法亲自完成此事。
dones_vdo_souhlasil_jsem__0NLv
I agreed to bring a cross of forgiveness to an old widow in Troskowitz. Her name is Margaret and she was probably once quite familiar with the dead hermit Ambrose.
我同意将宽恕十字架带给特罗斯科维茨的一位老寡妇，据说这位名为玛格丽特的女人曾对那位已故隐士安布洛斯很是了解。
dones_vdo_vdova_marketa_z_61Zj

The widow Margaret knew Ambrose the hermit before he joined the Order, following the death of his brother John. Margaret knew that John would never have killed himself, but was killed in a fight by his rival for Margaret's heart. When Ambrose returned to Troskowitz many years later, nobody recognised him, and he settled in Apollonia, living as a poor hermit. Thanks to me, Ambrose finally forgave the old widow for his brother's death.
隐士安布洛斯在他的兄弟约翰死后加入了骑士团，在此之前，寡妇玛格丽特就认识他。玛格丽特知道，约翰绝不会自杀，而是在争夺玛格丽特的芳心时被情敌杀死。许多年后，当安布洛斯回到特罗斯科维茨时，没人认出他，他在阿波罗尼亚定居，过着贫穷的隐士生活。因为我，安布洛斯终于原谅了那个老寡妇，那个害死他兄弟的元凶。
dones_vdo_vyridil_jsem_st_RHc5
I told the old widow Margaret the hermit's wish and handed over the small carved cross.
我告诉老寡妇玛格丽特这位隐士的心愿，并把雕刻的小十字架交给了她。
dopadni_l_celnika_jsem_na_0Dir
I found the Collector and dealt with him.
我找到了“税吏”，并干掉了他。
dopadni_l_celnika_jsem_na_f5nW

I found the Collector, but instead of bringing him in, we came to an agreement. Now I don't know what to tell the captain Frenzl in Suchdol, but maybe he will be satisfied if I bring him the book. He himself said that was the monastery's main concern.
我找到了“税吏”，但并没有将其逮捕，而是与之达成了协议。现在，我也不知该如何向苏赫多尔的弗伦队长交代了。但或许把这本书带给他就能让他满意，毕竟他自己也说了，这就是修道院最关心的事宜。
dopadni_l_celnika_jsem_na_f6an
I found the Collector and dealt with him. I then returned the book to the captain in Suchdol, who duly rewarded me for my services.
我找到了“税吏”，干掉了他，把书交给了苏赫多尔的队长，他如约给了我报酬。
dopadni_l_celnika_jsem_na_gAJM

I found the Collector but I didn't kill him. I did get the book and returned it to the captain in Suchdol. He wasn't happy that the Collector is still alive, but he didn't deny me the reward that was promised.
我找到了“税吏”，但我没有杀他。不过我拿到了那本书，并把它交给了苏赫多尔的队长。他因为“税吏”还活着不太满意，但也没有拒绝兑现他承诺的奖赏。
dopadni_l_celnika_jsem_na_gqKH

I found the Collector, but I didn't kill him. I did, however, get the book and returned it to the bailiff in Miskowitz. He wasn't too happy that the Collector was still alive, but he didn't deny me the reward that was promised.
我找到了“税吏”，但我没有杀他。不过我拿到了那本书，并把它交给了米斯科维茨执行官。他因为“税吏”还活着不太满意，但也没有拒绝兑现他承诺的奖赏。
dopadni_l_celnika_jsem_na_iE4L

While I found the Collector, I didn't kill him. But I did get the book and returned it to the captain in Suchdol. I managed to deny that he was still alive, so the captain was happy to give me the promised reward.
我找到了“税吏”，但我没有杀他。不过我拿到了那本书，并把它交给了苏赫多尔的队长。我骗他说“税吏”已经死了，因此他很满意地兑现了他承诺的奖赏。
dopadni_l_celnika_jsem_na_mY4x
I found the Collector and dealt with him. Then I brought the book back to the bailiff in Miskowitz, who rewarded me accordingly.
我找到了“税吏”马修并把他收拾了一顿。事后我带着那本书返回米斯科维茨并将它还给了执行官，相应地，我也得到了他提供的报酬。
dopadni_l_celnika_jsem_na_rZOA

I found the Collector, but I didn't kill him. I did, however, get the book and returned it to the bailiff in Miskowitz. I managed to deny that he was still alive, so the bailiff was happy to give me the promised reward.
我找到了“税吏”，但我没有杀他。不过我拿到了那本书，并把它交给了米斯科维茨执行官。我骗他说“税吏”已经死了，因此他很满意地兑现了他承诺的奖赏。
dopadni_l_celnika_jsem_na_vbVU
I found the Collector. Now I have to deal with him.
我找到了“税吏”马修，是时候做个了断了。
dopadni_l_celnika_jsem_na_zghJ

I found the Collector, but instead of bringing him in, we came to an agreement. Now I don't know what to tell the bailiff in Miskowitz, but maybe he will be satisfied if I bring him the book. He himself said that was the monastery's main concern.
我找到了“税吏”，但并没有将其逮捕，而是与之达成了协议。现在，我也不知该如何向米斯科维茨的执行官交代了。但或许把这本书带给他就能让他满意，毕竟他自己也说了，这就是修道院最关心的事宜。
dopadni_l_celnika_jsem_si_NBrB

I eventually found the Collector, but instead of dealing with him we came to an agreement. Without the book I had no choice but to tell the bailiff in Miskowitz that I was giving up the hunt. He wasn't happy about it, but didn't press me any further.
我最终找到了“税吏”，但并没有干掉他，而是和他达成了协议。因为没拿到那本书，我只能告诉米斯科维茨执行官我放弃了追捕。他对此有些不满，但也没有多问。
dopadni_l_celnika_jsem_si_YEPY

While I did find the Collector, instead of dealing with him we came to an agreement. Without the book I had no choice by to tell the captain in Suchdol that I was giving up the hunt. He wasn't very happy about it, but didn't press me any further.
我最终找到了“税吏”，但并没有干掉他，而是和他达成了协议。因为没拿到那本书，我只能告诉苏赫多尔的队长我放弃了追捕。他对此有些不满，但也没有多问。
dopadni_l_jestli_chci_zis_0wvL
If I want to get that reward, I'll have to find him first. I should probably start somewhere on the roads between Miskowitz and Suchdol.
要想拿到那笔悬赏就得先找到马修。或许我该到米斯科维茨和苏赫多尔之间的道路上开始寻找线索。
dopadni_l_mezi_miskovicem_KCvg

A bandit they call the Collector preys upon people between Miskowitz and Suchdol. This is none other than Matthew from the Devil's Gang. In Miskowitz they have put a hefty bounty on his head. Well, not actually on his head, but more on the book he stole from Sedletz Monastery.
一个号称“税吏”的强盗在米斯科维茨和苏赫多尔之间劫掠，而他正是“酒鬼”前帮派的成员马修。在米斯科维茨，人们重金悬赏，盼将其捉拿归案，不过他本人相对无关紧要，更多是为取回他从塞德莱茨修道院偷走的书。
dopadni_l_mezi_miskovicem_P7jP

A bandit they call the Collector preys upon people between Miskowitz and Suchdol. This is none other than Matthew from the Devil's Gang. In Miskowitz they have put a hefty bounty on his head. Well, not actually on his head, but more on the book he stole from Sedletz Monastery.
一个号称“税吏”的强盗在米斯科维茨和苏赫多尔之间劫掠，而他正是“酒鬼”前帮派的成员马修。在米斯科维茨，人们重金悬赏，盼将其捉拿归案，不过他本人相对无关紧要，更多是为取回他从塞德莱茨修道院偷走的书。
dopadni_l_potreboval_jsem_jzYc
I needed to find the Collector, but he found me instead, ambushing me with his men on the road. If I'm to deal with him, it should be now.
我正要寻找“税吏”马修，但是他却先找上了我——我被他和他的手下伏击了。事不宜迟，我现在就得解决他。
dopadni_l_potreboval_jsem_TmyH
I needed to find the Collector and so I found his camp. If I want to deal with him, I know where to find him.
我得找出“税吏”马修，也因此在这一过程中发现了他的营地。若是想解决掉他，我就得到他的营地里去。
dopadni_l_potreboval_jsem_TquU

I needed to find the Collector, but he found me instead, ambushing me with his men on the road. I managed to get away from them, but now I've also lost him. If I want to deal with him, I'll have to find him again.
我正要寻找“税吏”马修，但是他却先找上了我——我被他和他的手下伏击了。我成功逃出了马修设下的埋伏，但也因此与之失之交臂。如果想要解决他，我就得重新找到他。
doplnit_f_doplnit_IkII
I had other things to worry about than going hunting with Capon. It's too late for it now.
相比于和卡蓬一起打猎，我还有其它要操心的事情，现在可不是打猎的好时机。
doprova_o_dosli_jsme_az_k_lzGB

We made it all the way to the third church outside Kuttenberg. The parish priest from St. George's showed so much love for his fellow man that he didn't throw us out as soon as he saw us and let me take the pitman's oath instead of my drunken friend.
我们一路前行，抵达了库滕堡之外的第三座教堂。圣乔治的教区牧师看到我们时，并没有立刻将我们赶走，反而流露出对同伴的爱戴之情，还让我代替我那个早已酒气逼人的矿工朋友吟诵矿工誓词。
doprova_o_mam_doprovazet__cWe3

I must accompany Anton and protect him so that nothing happens to him or the ceremonial standard. On the way to the Church of St. George, the Tonies want to stop for a beer at the Black Horse tavern in the Hradek quarter.
我必须陪同并保护安东，避免他或是那面仪式性旗帜有所闪失。在前往圣乔治教堂的途中，“条纹托尼”一行人想要稍作歇息，在赫拉德克区的那家黑马酒馆喝上一杯。
doprova_o_mam_doprovazet__GaLN
I must accompany Anton and protect him so that nothing happens to him or the ceremonial standard. First we have to go to the Upper Church of the Virgin Mary.
我必须陪同并保护安东，避免他或是那面仪式性旗帜有所闪失。首先，我们得前往童贞玛利亚上教堂。
doprova_o_mam_doprovazet__k7WZ
I must accompany Anton and protect him so that nothing happens to him or the ceremonial standard. The last part of the journey to St George's Church still awaits us.
我必须陪同并保护安东，避免他或是那面仪式性旗帜有所闪失。前往圣乔治教堂的旅程还有最后一段路正在等着我们。
doprova_o_neochranil_jsem_dstp
I failed to protect miner Anton Kaspar.
我没能保护好矿工安东·卡斯帕。
doprovod__cestou_se_od_na_HXfD

On the way, we ran into Radzig Kobyla and Hanush of Leipa's entourage heading to an important meeting at Raborsch. Capon and Vaquelin joined them, and thus my task was complete - Hans Capon was finally safe. This will be a story worth telling.
在路上，我们遇到了正在前往拉博施参加一个重要会议的拉德季·科比拉和莱佩的随从瀚纳什。卡蓬和瓦奎林也加入了他们，而我的任务也就此完成——汉斯·卡蓬终于安全了。真是一场惊心动魄的冒险。
doprovod__dohodl_jsem_si__kd7O
I arranged to go for a walk with a local girl, Klara, but I blew her off and left it be.
我约好了与当地一位名叫克拉拉的女孩一起散步，但我最终选择了爽约。
doprovod__doprovod_jp_a_n_wzd2
I reckon I'm as ready as I'll ever be. All that's left to do is set off with Capon and escort him safely to Nebakov.
看来我已经做好了一切准备，现在唯一要做的就是与卡蓬出发，将其安全护送至内巴科夫。
doprovod__hezky_jsem_se_p_5FrU
I had a nice ride. Now I'll wait for Sir Hans by the wayside shrines. I hope the race will improve his mood. I should have a chat with him once he arrives.
真是一场酣畅淋漓的骑行。现在我得在路边神龛等待汉斯爵士，但愿这场赛马能提振他的心情，待他到抵达后我也得跟他聊一聊。
doprovod__jdu_se_projit_z_imBA
I arranged to go for a walk with a local girl, Klara. I'll take her around the area…
我约好了与当地一位名叫克拉拉的女孩一起散步。我要带着她在这附近转转......
doprovod__koho_by_napadlo_doD2

Who would have thought the ruins of a farmhouse outside Kuttenberg would conceal a secret passage to the Jewish Quarter? Samuel, Kubyenka and the Kuttenberg rabbi went to the synagogue, while Liechtenstein and I headed to the King Solomon inn.
谁能想到，就在库滕堡外边的一处废弃农舍里，竟暗藏一条通往犹太区的密道呢？塞缪尔、库宾卡以及库滕堡的拉比已去往犹太教堂，与此同时，列支敦士登与我则前往所罗门王酒馆。
doprovod__nyni_musim_vyzv_X1DC

Now I need to pick up Hans Capon and escort him to Nebákov. I didn't make it the first time soon enough and in daylight, so I should remember to do it right the second time and come to Capon at the second gate at a suitable hour, before noon.
现在我得叫上汉斯·卡蓬，将他护送到内巴科夫。上次我的动作不够快，未能趁天亮时将他及时送到，所以这次我得在中午之前就去第二道门找到卡蓬。
doprovod__pani_roza_mi_pr_NNIJ

The plan requires a lot of preparation and we need to act quickly. First, I must escort Lady Rosa back to Kuttenberg. She told me we could get into Ruthard Palace through a secret entrance. She's ready to go right now and lead me to the entrance to the passageway. I shouldn't dilly-dally.
此计划需要做好充分准备，我们也必须尽快行动。我得先护送罗莎小姐回到库滕堡，而据她所说，有条密道能让我们进入鲁瑟德宫。她现在已做好了离开的准备，也将领我前往那处密道，我不能耽搁。
doprovod__presto_jeste_ne_pjFe
We're not home free yet. We'll have no rest until Hans is safe in Suchdol.
我们尚未成功。在汉斯安全到达苏赫多尔之前，我们不能休息。
doprovod__ptacek_ceka_ze__WqHs
Capon is getting ready to head back to Trosky. I should go and see him and escort him back safely.
卡蓬已经做好了返回特罗斯基的准备，我得去跟他见面，将其安全护送返回。
doprovod__ptacek_se_zda_b_7fBx
Sir Hans seems to be in a better mood, which is good news. But it's still a long way to Nebakov, where I'm supposed to escort him to in safety.
汉斯爵士的心情似乎有所好转，这真是个好消息。但是我们距离内巴科夫还有很长一段路要走，而我也得在此期间护送汉斯，保其周全。
doprovod__ptacek_se_zda_b_ldIZ
Sir Hans seems to be in a good mood - the ride did him a world of good, it seems. Now we have to discuss what route to take and continue to Nebakov Fortress together.
汉斯爵士看起来喜上眉梢，似乎这趟骑行让他变得神采奕奕。现在我们得商讨一下行进路线，继续踏上前往内巴科夫堡垒的旅程。
doprovod__ptak_odjel_beze_QLrq
I escorted my lord safely back to Trosky castle.
我将我的大人安全护送回了特罗斯基城堡。
doprovod__s_malymi_obtize_FyF8

The first step of the preparations was to escort Lady Rosa back home. With some minor difficulties, we walked through the underground tunnel to the entrance to Ruthard Palace. I had a feeling the real trouble was yet to come.
准备工作的第一步是护送罗莎小姐返回家中。尽管途中出现了些小波折，但我们还是穿过地下通道，抵达了鲁瑟德宫的入口。但我总有预感，真正的麻烦还在后头。
doprovod__spolu_s_ptackem_LJOA
Then we set off on the long journey through the region and arrived safely at Nebakov Fortress, where we were welcomed by the local lord.
我们踏上了漫长旅途，最终安全抵达了内巴科夫堡垒，也在此地受到了当地领主的盛情接待。
doprovod__s_ptackem_jsme__IUlp

Capon and I set off for Nebakov, but I abandoned him by mistake, so his only option was go back to Trosky. This has delayed our Nebakov expedition, which is bound to annoy Capon. I should talk to him, but it's unlikely to be particularly pleasant…
就在卡蓬与我出发前往内巴科夫的途中，我不小心与之走散，他因此不得不对返回特罗斯基，而我们前往内巴科夫的旅途也因此受到耽搁，这势必会惹恼卡蓬。我得跟他谈谈，尽管交谈的过程或许难有愉悦。
doprovod__tajna_chodba_na_upo0
The secret passageway to Ruthard Palace was partially flooded. At first it was a real problem, but we managed to get to the other end at last. From there it was only a short way.
通往鲁瑟德宫的密道里有些地方被水淹没了。起初，这确实是个棘手的问题，但我们最终成功抵达了通道的另一端。现在，只剩下一小段路要走。
doprovod__ten_tajny_vchod_gqqu
That secret entrance Lady Rosa told me about is actually a dark underground passage, where we'll have to wade through cold water up to our ankles. Thank God Capon didn't come with me.
罗莎小姐所说的密道实际上是一条漆黑的地下通道，里边的积水冰冷刺骨，水位可达脚踝，我们得在其中跋涉前进。好在卡蓬没有跟我一同前往。
doprovod__tvl_uz_se_dlouh_HG94
Capon is getting ready to leave for Trosky. It's high time I joined him, otherwise I'll be asking for trouble.
卡蓬已经做好了返回特罗斯基的准备，我该赶紧跟他碰面，不然我就是在自找麻烦。
doprovod__x_KoY6
Shit, I waited too long and Capon left for Trosky without me! He won't be happy about that…
该死，我耽搁了太久，而卡蓬独自一人返回了特罗斯基！他会为此感到失望的......
dostan_an_musim_vzit_anto_pYzo
I have to take Anton and carry him to the Church of St. George, where Father Tobias is waiting for us.
我得将安东带到圣乔治教堂，神父托比亚斯正在那里等着我们。
dostan_an_pujdu_s_francke_XFbP
Me and Franzi have to go to the Church of St. George, where Father Tobias is waiting for us.
我得和弗兰齐一同前往圣乔治教堂，神父托比亚斯正在那里等着我们。
dostan_an_u_kostela_svate_R1DT
I helped Anton and carried him to the Church of St. George. Priest Tobias was already waiting there for us.
我将安东带到了圣乔治教堂，神父托比亚斯早已在此等候多时。
dostan_an_vykaslal_jsem_s_mk5v
I refused to help the drunken miners.
我拒绝帮助喝醉的矿工。
dostan_ja_cesta_se_zda_vo_HbjA
The path seems to be safe, I gave a signal to Capon and Brabant... Now I just need to wait until they get to the horses...
此路看似畅通无阻，我已向卡蓬和布拉班特发出了信号......现在只需等待他们抵达马厩即可......
dostan_ja_nezbyva_nic_jin_rn1Q

All we can do is get to the lower courtyard and take some horses! We agreed that I would go first and make sure the way from the tower to the stables is safe. After all, fortune favours the brave, but the prudent perhaps even more... And when I’ve made sure it’s safe, I have to let Capon and Brabant know somehow. Either directly, or I’ll give a signal with the torches when I'm by the horses...
我们必须抵达下庭院并骑走马匹！经过商讨，我将负责打头阵，确保从塔楼通往马厩的路途畅通无阻。虽然命运垂青勇者，但谨慎之人或许更得青睐...... 待确认道路安全后，我就得想办法告诉卡蓬和布拉班特。我要么直接告诉他们，要么就在马厩边用火把传递信号......
dostan_ja_nezbyva_nic_jin_yqx6

All we can do is get to the lower courtyard and take some horses! We decided not to wait for anything and do it as quickly as possible. If we come across resistance, we’ll just fight our way to the horses. Audentes Fortuna Iuvat!
我们决意不再等待，尽快离开，现在必须抵达下庭院并骑走马匹！万一路上遇到了阻挠，我们就只能杀出条血路来。Audentes Fortuna Iuvat（天助勇者）！
dostan_od_markolt_me_odme_7P42
Markold rewarded me for helping him get rid of the blackmailing miners.
马尔科因为我帮助他摆脱了那些敲诈他的矿工而给了我报酬。
dostan_od_promluv_si_s_ha_hVtG
I'm certain Myslibor will reward me for everything I did for him and his pals.
我相信迈斯利博尔会因我为他和他伙伴们所做的一切而给予我回报。
dostan_od_promluv_si_s_ma_xF4U

尽管我的做法不太体面，但我还是找到了进入瓦伦丁爵士坟墓的路。

我们穿过教堂墓穴抵达了鲁瑟德宫。

I broke through to the secret passageway to Maleshov and eavesdropped on what von Bergow was talking about with Markvart and Erik, who then departed. Luck was on my side!
我找到了通往马列索夫的秘密通道，偷听了冯·波尔高与马科瓦尔和埃里克的谈话，他们随后离开了。好运眷顾我！
dostan_se_rytir_me_pozada_uTVt
The knight asked me to find the crypt under the Sedletz temple. Now, how do I get there?
那位骑士希望我能找到位于塞德莱茨教堂下方的墓穴，但是，我该怎么到那里去？
dostan_se_vchod_do_ni_naj_mD2n

I’ll find the entrance on the steep slope beneath the road leading from the town via the Hradek Gate down to the river. About halfway along the road, there should be a hewn-out entrance to the heraldic adit, from which water flows out of the mines.
要想找到入口，就要找到位于道路下方的陡峭斜坡，那条路始于城镇，途径赫拉德克要塞大门，最终延伸到一条河。大约在这条路中途，有一个画着矿坑纹章的入口，有矿井里的水从此处流出。
dostan_se_v_hospode_se_po_4aQQ
I was told that the Lower Semine miller could help me gain access to the wedding party. When I paid him a visit, he said I had to pass his test first. So I started carrying sacks for him.
我得知下塞米磨坊主或许能协助我参加婚宴。我去见他时，他要求我得先通过他的考验，因此我开始帮助他搬运麻袋。
dostan_se_v_hospode_se_po_5wqN

I was told that the Lower Semine miller could help me gain access to the wedding party. When I paid him a visit, he said I had to pass his test first. So I started carrying sacks for him. But soon enough, it turned out he wasn't exactly an honest man. Next, he needed me to find out where the knacker buries carcasses and I promised to oblige. When I figured that out, he suddenly needed me to get a book for him.
我得知下塞米磨坊主或许能协助我参加婚宴。我去见他时，他说他得先考验我一下，因此我开始帮助他搬运麻袋。但我很快就发现他不是个老实人。随后，我受命寻找屠夫埋葬动物死尸的坑洞。完成此事后，他竟又突然要求我替他弄到一本书。
dostan_se_v_hospode_se_po_aqq1

I found out that the Lower Semine miller could get me into the wedding. When I went to see him, he said he had to test me first. So I started carrying sacks for him. But it soon turned out he wasn't exactly an honest man. Now he needs me to find a carcass pit somewhere round here.
我得知下塞米磨坊主或许能协助我参加婚宴。我去见他时，他说他得先考验我一下，因此我开始帮助他搬运麻袋。但我很快就发现他不是个老实人。现在他还要求我到附近寻找一处堆放动物尸体的坑洞。
dostan_se_v_hospode_se_po_FpmG

I was told that the Lower Semine miller could help me gain access to the wedding party. When I paid him a visit, he said I had to pass his test first. So I started carrying sacks for him. But soon enough, it turned out he wasn't exactly an honest man. Next, he needed me to find out where the knacker buries carcasses and I promised to oblige. When I figured that out, he asked me to find him a book he was looking for. But the book is in Trosky. That's why he's sending a girl to the wedding. Supposedly to seduce the Chamberlain and be taken to Trosky. The miller promised I could go to the wedding with her, so I did.
我得知下塞米磨坊主或许能协助我参加婚宴。我去见他时，他说他得先考验我一下，因此我开始帮助他搬运麻袋。但我很快就发现他不是个老实人。随后，我受命寻找屠夫埋葬动物死尸的坑洞。完成此事后，他又要求我弄来一本他正在找的书。但那本书却在特罗斯基，因此他要将一位姑娘派去婚宴，她的任务是色诱管家，让他将她带进特罗斯基。而磨坊主承诺我可以与她一同参加婚宴。于是我就去了。

dostan_se_v_hospode_se_ta_41YT

I was told that the Tachov blacksmith could assist me in gaining access to the wedding party. When I paid him a visit, he said I had to pass his test first. We forged iron together and he was pleased with my work. But then he needed my help finding weapons for Lord Semine, and I promised to oblige. We found the weapons in a bandit camp, which is also how I met Lord Semine, a local nobleman. Then we had to forge a sword for his son, which we did. We can go to the wedding now. I should dress nicely for such an occasion so I don't embarrass myself.
我听说塔霍夫的铁匠或许能协助我进入婚宴。我去找铁匠后，他要求我得先通过他的考验。我和他一起锻铁，他对我的手艺很满意。但是后来，他还向我提出了为塞米大人寻找武器的请求，而我也答应了。我们最终在一处强盗营地里找到了这些武器，还因此遇到了本地的贵族塞米大人。而后我们顺利地为塞米大人之子锻造了一把剑。我们现在可以去参加婚宴了。这样的场合我得穿着得体些，以免让自己难堪。
dostan_se_v_hospode_se_ta_8PWX

We found them in a bandit camp, and I met Lord Semine, a local nobleman, on that occasion. Now all we have to do is forge a sword for his son, but I haven't made up my mind yet.
我听说塔霍夫的铁匠或许能协助我进入婚宴。我去找铁匠后，他要求我得先通过他的考验。我和他一起锻铁，他对我的手艺很满意。但是后来他还让我帮他寻找失踪的学徒们，而我也答应了。我们最终在一处强盗营地里找到了他的学徒们，还在那里遇到了本地的贵族塞米大人。现在，我们需要为塞米大人的儿子锻造一把剑，但我仍未想好是否答应这个要求。

dostan_se_vstup_do_tajne__vZ7r
The entrance to the secret passageway is in the cellars right next to the ruined house. It's enough to go down the steps, go through the hole in the rock and mind my head on the way.
密道的入口就在废弃房屋旁的地窖里。只需走下台阶，穿过岩石里的洞口，路上还要记得小心别撞到头。
dostan_se_zbytek_cesty_mu_sIff

We have to walk the rest of the way. Tempers are surely running high in Kuttenberg and we'd rather not fall right into the hands of the armed mob. Fortunately, Samuel and the rabbi know a secret passage that will lead us where we need to go. I should follow them.
我们必须走完剩下的路程。如今，库滕堡的人们怒焰高涨，我们可不想落入那些手持利器的暴民手中。万幸的是，塞缪尔和拉比知晓一条秘密通道，能带我们到达目的地，我得跟着他们。
dostan_vi_musim_najit_vik_fwpL
I have to find Victoria. I could look for her around here, and think about where she usually goes.
我必须找到维多利亚。我可以在这附近找找她，好好想想她通常会去哪里。
dostan_vi_nedokazal_jsem__nqe1

我没能帮到维多利亚，愿上帝让她的灵魂安息。
dostan_vi_nedokazal_jsem__TmHJ
There was nothing I could do to help Victoria. God rest her soul.

dostan_z__mam_soudek_z_vo_qjEX

dostan_z__nemusim_se_uz_v_Y0sn

克雷泽的计划正在进行中。恩内琳穿着最好的蒂罗尔锦缎，喷着薄荷香水，将引诱总管上钩。而现在就都看她的了。

doved_kur_kurtyzanu_jsem__ObIL

Kreyzl's plan is underway. Enneleyn, wearing finest Tyrolean brocade and Mintha perfume, will be bait for the chamberlain. As her bodyguard for the evening, I have to hope she'll do what we agreed and we'll both go straight to Trosky from the wedding. But ideally separately: Enneleyn with the chamberlain, and me with von Bergow. Shall we got to it?
克雷泽的计划正在进行中。恩内琳穿着最好的蒂罗尔锦缎，喷着薄荷香水，将引诱总管上钩。而我作为她今晚的保镖，希望她能够遵守我们之间的约定，我们俩将在婚礼上直接去往特罗斯基。但最好是分头行动：恩内琳和总管一起，我和冯·波尔高一起。我们可以走了吗？

That doesn't mean I'll have to stop tracking in the forests, though. Vostatek thinks that Varel, another gamekeeper in the region, might have work for me. If I don't bump into him on his rounds, he'll be in his cottage near the Nebakov Mill.
但那并不意味着我就得停止在树林里的搜查。沃斯塔克认为，这片区域内的另一位猎场看守瓦雷尔或许会有任务给我。如果我没能在他巡察的时候碰巧遇到他，想必他就应该待在内巴科夫磨坊附近的小屋里。

drunkencz_kdybych_se_za_t_bXPg
If I pretended to be a drunken bathhouse guest at night, I might be able to lure Goatskin out. But I have to look like I'm wealthy.
如果我趁着夜色假装成一位喝醉的澡堂顾客，或许就可以把山羊皮引出来，但是我得看起来像个富人。
drunkencz_napadlo_me_ze_k_AG0Y
I figured if I pretended to be drunk and hung around the bathhouse at night, Goatskin would jump me. It seemed to be working, Goatskin really did jump me, but I messed up and didn't catch him.
我想，如果我假装喝醉，晚上在浴场附近游荡，山羊皮就会对我下手。这似乎很有效，山羊皮真的对我下手了，但我搞砸了，没能抓住他。
drunkencz_napadlo_me_ze_k_rhm9

I figured if I pretended to be drunk and hung around the bathhouse at night, Goatskin would jump me. And since I'm not the best actor, I actually got drunk. It turned out that my disguise worked brilliantly, because it didn't take long for Goatskin to fall for my act.
我想，如果我假装喝醉，晚上在浴场附近游荡，山羊皮就会对我下手。但我不是个好演员，我真的喝醉了。不过事实证明，这样的伪装反而很成功，因为没过多久山羊皮就上了我的当。

找到那个被俘的骑士，苏霍茨基的彼得。
dvojityag_telljanlaszlois_LObM
Tell Jan that László died.
告诉杨，拉斯洛死了。
dvojityag_telljanwhatyouk_Bp4g
Tell Jan what you found out in the camp.
告诉杨你在营地里发现了什么。
dvojityag_zabij_jana_pKMM
Kill Jan.
杀了杨。
dvojityag_zkus_se_poptat__7AhJ
Try and ask the camp chaplain.
去问问营地牧师。
dvojityag_zkus_se_poptat__oN6B
Try and ask Musa the healer.
去问问大夫穆萨。
dvojityag_zkus_se_poptat__Rz1H
Try and ask the camp bathhouse owner, Milada.
去问问营地的澡堂老板米拉达。
eatwithot_po_sermu_byl_ca_3nfE
After our swordfight, it was time for supper. Sir Hans and me reminisced about the old days.
比剑结束，该吃晚饭了。汉斯少主和我叙旧。
eatwithot_po_sermu_je_cas_qGzQ
After the swordfight, it's time to go and sit by the fire and have supper.
比剑结束，要到火堆边吃晚饭了。
enemy_eve__event_caption_9l8R
Enemy!
敌影突现！
enemy_eve__event_descript_BSAS
Someone with hostile intentions has gotten in your way.
心怀敌意之人挡在了你的跟前。
erik_nasleduj_zizku_a_zji_NkM5
Follow Zizka and find out what's going on.
跟杰式卡一起看看发生了什么事。
erik_nebo_zustan_na_hrade_ATOV
Speak with Zizka about Erik.
和杰式卡谈谈埃里克。
erik_odejdi_z_hradu_a_pom_LtR7
Speak with the guard to let you out and respond to Erik's challenge.
与卫兵交谈，说服他让你出去和埃里克决斗。
erik_posad_se_k_ostatnim_NmoI
Sit with the others.
与其他人坐在一起。
erik_promluv_s_hansem_merK
Speak with Janosh.
与亚诺什谈谈。
erik_promluv_s_kubenkou_6oD6
Speak with Kubyenka.
与库宾卡谈谈。
erik_rozluc_se_s_rozou_a__uKGB
Say goodbye to Rosa.
与罗莎道别。
erik_rozluc_se_s_rutharde_JXC0
Say goodbye to Ruthard.
与鲁瑟德道别。
erik_vrat_se_na_suchdol_a_jmgC
Get to Suchdol before the Prague army!
抢在布拉格军队之前抵达苏赫多尔！
erik_vyhraj_nad_erikem_Ul20
Defeat Erik!
打败埃里克！
escapemin_co_se_to_sakra__bOhI
What the hell just happened?! I wanted to peak into an abandoned mineshaft near Old Kutna, but the scaffolding collapsed under my feet. I've got to get out of this awful place!
刚才到底发生了什么事？！我本想爬上老库特纳附近的一个矿井，但脚下的脚手架竟忽然坍塌。现在我得离开这个可怕的地方！
escapemin_konecne_cisty_v_P6ug
Finally fresh air and the sky overhead! I got out of the mine alive.
终于呼吸到新鲜空气，看到了头上的天空！我活着走出了矿井。
escapemin_v_dolech_neco_j_4toX

There's something here in this mine. The scaffolding collapsed under my feet and I fell down the shaft. Someone then dragged me deeper into the mine and stole all my things. They probably thought I was dead. I've got to get out of here somehow and save my skin.
这座矿井里竟有些不明人士。随着身下脚手架的坍塌，我便坠入了矿井里，后来有人将我拖进了矿井深处，把我身上的东西尽数偷走，他们大概是认为我已经没了呼吸。我得想办法逃出这里，保住自己的性命。
escortign_ignace_jsem_zan_VCre
Siegfried lent me Ignatius to use as wolf bait. I almost felt sorry for the creature when I left him by the birches.
西格弗里德将伊格内修斯借给了我，作为引诱狼群的诱饵。当我将这只小家伙放在桦树边上时，竟感到了些许良心不安。
escortign_ignac_za_mnou_p_0pvq
I got a sheep named Ignatius who I can use as bait. I should bring him up to the forked birches up on the slope. Ignatius is a stubborn animal and won't go anywhere unless I have a carrot for him.
我得到了一只叫做伊格内修斯的小羊，它也将被我用作诱饵。我得把它带到斜坡上树枝繁茂的桦树下，但是不弄根胡萝卜来，这只倔强的小羊羔是不会跟我走的。
escortign_ignac_zemrel_ObPt
Unfortunately, I couldn't keep Ignatius alive.
十分不幸，我没能保住伊格内修斯的性命。
escortign_nakonec_nebyl_i_TKij
I managed to take care of Siegfried's wolves without Ignatius.
即便不将伊格内修斯作为诱饵，我也处理掉了那些侵扰西格弗里德的狼群。
faillogs_cenek_umrel_ppYq
Chenyek died.
程叶科已死。
faillogs_pokus_navazat_no_YwJq
I killed one of the guards.
我杀死了一名警卫。
fail_po_k_ted_mame_na_sta_qvUX
We have more important things to worry about now than hunting. We have a battle ahead of us.
与打猎相比，我们现在有更重要的事情需要处理——一场战斗在等着我们。
fail_ques_od_cele_zalezit_HN98
I walked away from the entire matter with innkeeper Beikovetz. I didn't want to poke around in his dark past.
我和酒馆老板贝科维茨撇清了关系。我不想再去探究他的黑暗过往了。
faily_pavel_zemrel_snad_s_Qu8f
Pavel died and is hopefully now in a place where everyone's equal.
帕维尔已死亡，但愿他去到了一个众生平等的世界。
faily_pivec_je_mrtvy_treb_qEEF
Pivetz is dead. Maybe things will still turn out alright somehow?
维茨已死亡，但没准事态也会有所好转呢？
faily_videli_me_krast_nas_BuVZ
I was caught stealing. That's the end to our plan.
我的偷盗行为被抓了个现行，我们的计划也就此泡汤。
faily_videli_mi_zabijet_t_BcK4
I was caught killing, that was a mistake.
有人目睹了我的杀人行径，可那是个失误。
faily_vorsilka_zemrela_to_inQO
Ursula died. Pavel will be upset.
乌苏拉已死亡，帕维尔会因此坐立不安的。
faily_zda_se_ze_nekdo_nas_gXUJ
It seems someone found a dead body in the village, and that spoils our plan.
似乎有人在村里发现了一具尸体，我们的计划也因此泡汤。
falesnapo_najdi_tabor_voj_A4lg
Find the soldiers' camp.
找到士兵的营地。
falesnapo_odnes_glejt_hos_0gin
Take the writ to the innkeeper.
将令状交给酒馆老板。
falesnapo_promluv_si_s_ve_fR7P
Talk to the commander.
与指挥官交谈。
falesnapo_ziskej_od_vojak_Hlxv
Get the writ from the soldiers' commander.
从士兵指挥官身上取得令状。
fasttrave__event_caption_5u50
Scene of an ambush.
伏击现场。
fasttrave__event_caption_AdgS
Wolves.
狼群。
fasttrave__event_caption_b8W6
Dead soldiers.
阵亡士兵。

伏击现场。

狼群。

伏击现场。
fasttrave__event_caption_Iemb
Scene of an ambush.
伏击现场。
fasttrave__event_caption_jJg3
Wolves.
狼群。
fasttrave__event_caption_LX3t
Ambushed cart.
遇袭的车。
fasttrave__event_caption_nmtI
Scene of an ambush.
伏击现场。
fasttrave__event_caption_QwA6
Scene of an ambush.
伏击现场。
fasttrave__event_caption_rhwC
Wolves.
狼群。
fasttrave__event_caption_rjoV
Abandoned cart.
被遗弃的马车。
fasttrave__event_caption_sgQ0
Scene of an ambush.
伏击现场。
fasttrave__event_caption_ueW9
Horse and rider.
马与骑手。
fasttrave__event_caption_VAEQ
Wolves.
狼群。
fasttrave__event_caption_XkeE
Dead horse.
死去的马。
fasttrave__event_caption_YyIP
Scene of a massacre.
屠杀现场。
fasttrave__event_caption_z2j5
Scene of an ambush.
伏击现场。
fasttrave__event_descript_2pvn
You see a dead horse on the road. Its lifeless rider is lying a short way off. His clothing's torn. Someone already searched him.
你在路上看到一匹司马，而它那短命的主人就躺在不远处。他的衣物已经破损，定是有人搜刮了他。
fasttrave__event_descript_2qxo
There's an empty cart on the road, with the dead carter a short way off, lying in a pool of blood. He's had his throat cut. You can't see or hear anyone else.
路上停着一辆空车，不远处就是它死去的主人，正躺在血泊之中。死者的喉咙已被割断，四处也见不到他人的踪影。
fasttrave__event_descript_3aTO
There's a cart on the road and a dead body beside it. There are wolves there. They notice you and come towards you.
有辆马车停在了路上，旁边躺着一具尸体，而周围还游荡着一群狼。注意到你的狼群正朝你袭来。
fasttrave__event_descript_5Q04
You've come across the bodies of men-at-arms. Someone looted their armour and weapons. They must have been ambushed. There's no sign of the attackers.
你发现了一些士兵的尸体，有人还扒下他们的护甲，取走了他们的武器。他们肯定是遇到了埋伏，但周围没留下偷袭者的踪迹。
fasttrave__event_descript_5Zaa
You see a pack of wolves ahead, pacing around some dead bodies. Then they notice you and move towards you.
你看到了前方的一群狼，正绕着几具尸体四处走动。随后它们注意到了你，便朝你走来。
fasttrave__event_descript_caj5
There's a dead body lying right in front of you on the road. You can't see or hear anyone. You've no idea how long it's been lying there.
路上有具尸体就躺在你的眼前，但周围见不到其他人的身影。至于尸体在那里躺了多久，你也不得而知。
fasttrave__event_descript_EgpC
A dead horse and rider lay on the road with two armed men standing nearby. One searches while the other keeps watch. They notice you and draw their weapons.
路上正躺着一匹死马和它的主人，他们身旁站着两个携带武器的男人，其中一个正在搜刮，而另一个则在望风观察。他们注意到你，便掏出了武器。
fasttrave__event_descript_f2D7
On the road you see a pack of wolves and a motionless body. The wolves notice you and start coming towards you.
你在路上遇到了一群狼，旁边还有个一动不动的人。那群狼察觉到了你的出现，迈步向你走来。
fasttrave__event_descript_FmYM
You've stopped in front of a pack of wolves who are slowly coming towards you. On the road behind them is a dead horse, and the rider lying a short way off.
你在一群狼面前停了下来，它们正缓慢地朝你走来。在它们身后的路上，一匹死马躺倒在地，而它的主人也正躺在不远处。
fasttrave__event_descript_gxWY
There are bandits up ahead bending over a dead body and searching it. They notice you and draw their weapons. They don't look like they want to negotiate.
就在道路前方出现了一些强盗，他们正俯身搜刮着几具尸体。他们注意到你，随即便掏出武器，看来和他们没有半点商谈的余地。
fasttrave__event_descript_jXBt
A few men-at-arms are lying on the road. Two bandits are moving among the corpses, searching them. Suddenly they see you, draw their weapons and approach you.
有些士兵倒在了路上，正有两个强盗在他们的尸体之间来回走动，对他们进行搜刮。突然，他们看到了你，掏出武器便向你走来。
fasttrave__event_descript_k5ka
There's an empty, abandoned cart ahead of you. The cart went off the road and the grass all around has been trampled down. You can't see or hear anyone.
你的眼前出现了一辆被遗弃的空车。这辆车冲出了道路，附近的青草被踩得乱七八糟，而你并未看到任何人的踪影。
fasttrave__event_descript_MQFJ
You've come across a kneeling man who's searching a corpse on the ground. He's mumbling to himself, but then notices you. He draws a weapon and approaches you.
你遇到了一个男人，正跪在地上搜刮着一具尸体。他嘴里正念叨着什么，但随后就注意到了你。他掏出武器，朝你走来。
fasttrave__event_descript_NuBX
The body of a horse is lying in the road ahead of you.
就在你前方的路上，躺着一匹死马。
fasttrave__event_descript_QavE
On the road you came across a horse, torn apart by wolves, who unfortunately noticed you and are moving towards you.
你在路上遇到了一匹马，已被狼群撕咬得四分五裂。倒霉的是，那些狼群还注意到了你，正朝你袭来。
fasttrave__event_descript_To5c
On the road you see two armed men surrounded by the corpses of villagers. They are searching and looting them. One of them spots you and draws his weapon.
你在路上看到了两个携带武器之人，他们周围躺着一些死去的村民。那两人正搜刮掠夺着死者身上的物品，后来，其中一人发现了你，随即便掏出了武器。
fasttrave__event_descript_uqtT
There are two men ahead of you, bending over the corpse of a merchant lying by a cart. They noticed you and drew their weapons before you could do anything.
你的前方出现了两个人，他们正俯身搜刮一具商人的尸体，旁边就停着一辆马车。你还没来得及反应，他们便注意到了你，还掏出了武器。
fasttrave__event_descript_uxXz
You've come across the scene of a massacre. Corpses are strewn all over the road ahead. There was clearly some kind of fight here. No sign of anyone alive.
你经过了一处屠杀现场，前方的道路上尸横遍野。显然此处曾发生过打斗，四处都找不到活人的迹象。
fasttrave__event_descript_yLaZ
There's a horse and rider lying in the road. There's a bandit beside them, searching the saddle bags. Then he sees you, draws his sword and moves towards you.
一匹马和一名骑手倒在了路上的尘土中，身旁还有个强盗正搜刮着马鞍袋。后来他发现了你，掏出武器便向你走来。
fasttrave__event_descript_yLSk
You see a man bending down on the road ahead with a motionless body lying next to him and a cart nearby. He notices you, stands up and walks towards you.
你发现前方的路上蹲着一个男人，在他身旁有个一动不动的人，不远处还停了一辆马车。那个男人注意到了你，随即站起身，朝你走来。
fasttrave__player_caption_1OEM
Scene of an ambush.
伏击现场。

马与骑手。

伏击现场。
fasttrave__player_caption_wL1W

伏击现场。
fasttrave__player_caption_wzfG
Wolves.
狼群。
fasttrave__player_caption_YNC3
Dead horse.
死去的马。
fasttrave__player_descrip_1ZmP
You've spotted a man bending down on the road ahead. He's searching a body lying on the road. There's a cart a short way off. You can't see anyone else.
你发现前方的路上蹲着一个男人，他正在搜刮一具躺倒在地上的尸体，就在不远处还停着一辆马车，除此之外四下无人。
fasttrave__player_descrip_2DvX
On the road you see a pack of wolves devouring a dead body. They take no notice of you.
你在路上看到了一群狼，正在啃食着一具尸体，它们也并未察觉到你的出现。
fasttrave__player_descrip_2Yrr
A few men-at-arms are lying on the road. Two bandits are moving from one dead body to the other, searching them.
有些士兵倒在了路上，正有两个强盗在他们尸体之间来回走动，对他们进行搜刮。
fasttrave__player_descrip_4RTJ
The body of a horse is lying in the road ahead of you.
就在你前方的路上，躺着一匹死马。
fasttrave__player_descrip_5VSa
You've come across a kneeling man looting a corpse on the ground. He's mumbling to himself as he searches for something worth taking. He's yet to notice you.
你遇到了一个男人，正跪在地上搜刮着一具尸体。他嘴里正念叨着什么，大概是企图找出一些有价值的东西。他对你的出现全然不知。
fasttrave__player_descrip_bC2X
On the road you see two armed men surrounded by the dead bodies of some villagers. The men are searching and robbing them. You saw them before they saw you.
你在路上看到了两个携带武器之人，他们周围躺着一些死去的村民。那两人正搜刮掠夺着死者身上的物品，他们也并没有看到你。
fasttrave__player_descrip_DLmE
On the road you came across a horse being eaten by wolves, who haven't noticed you yet.
你在路上遇到了一匹正被狼群啃食的马，而那些狼并未注意到你。
fasttrave__player_descrip_ELop
You've come across the scene of a massacre. Dead bodies are strewn all over the road ahead. There was clearly some kind of fight here. No sign of anyone alive.
你经过了一处屠杀现场，前方的道路上尸横遍野。显然此处曾发生过打斗，四处都找不到活人的迹象。
fasttrave__player_descrip_FGG9
There's a cart on the road and a dead body beside it. There are wolves pacing around.
有辆马车停在了路上，旁边躺着一具尸体，狼群则在周围来回走动。
fasttrave__player_descrip_IxBv
There's a horse and rider lying in the road. An armed man is bending over them. He's searching the saddlebags and the rider's pockets. He's yet to notice you.
一匹马和一名骑手倒在了路上的尘土中，一个全副武装的人在一旁俯身，正搜刮着马鞍袋和骑手的口袋，对你的出现全然不知。
fasttrave__player_descrip_JNhv
On the road ahead, you see a dead body and some bandits. They’re talking loudly among themselves, clearly pleased with their loot. They are yet to notice you.
就在道路前方，你看到了一具尸体，还有一些强盗。他们正热火朝天的交谈着，显然对这场“狩猎”很是满意，他们也仍未注意到你的出现。
fasttrave__player_descrip_KOPP
Up ahead you see a pack of wolves pacing around some dead bodies. The wolves pay no attention to you.
你看到了前方的一群狼，正绕着几具尸体四处走动，但它们并没有注意到你。
fasttrave__player_descrip_rH6v
There's an empty, abandoned cart ahead of you. The cart went off the road and the grass all around has been trampled down. You can't see or hear anyone.
你的眼前出现了一辆被遗弃的空车。这辆车冲出了道路，附近的青草被踩得乱七八糟，而你并未看到任何人的踪影。
fasttrave__player_descrip_rUmz
There's an empty cart on the road, with the dead carter a short way off, lying in a pool of blood. He's had his throat cut. You can't see or hear anyone else.
路上停着一辆空车，不远处就是它死去的主人，正躺在血泊之中。死者的喉咙已被割断，四处也见不到他人的踪影。
fasttrave__player_descrip_TuIp
You've come across the bodies of men-at-arms. Someone looted their armour and weapons. They must have been ambushed. There's no sign of the attackers.
你发现了一些士兵的尸体，有人还扒下他们的护甲，取走了他们的武器。他们肯定是遇到了埋伏，但周围没留下偷袭者的踪迹。
fasttrave__player_descrip_xUY0
A dead horse and rider are lying on the road. There are two armed men beside them, one searching them, the other keeping watch. They haven't noticed you yet.
路上正躺着一匹死马和它的主人，他们身旁还有两个携带武器的男人，其中一个正在进行搜刮，而另一个则是在望风观察，但他们均未注意到你的出现。
fasttrave__player_descrip_y9b1
You see a dead horse on the road. Its lifeless rider is lying a short way off. His clothing's torn. Someone already searched him.
你在路上看到一匹司马，而它那短命的主人就躺在不远处。他的衣物已经破损，定是有人搜刮了他。
fasttrave__player_descrip_YtCN
There's a dead body lying right in front of you on the road. You can't see or hear anyone. You've no idea how long it's been lying there.
路上有具尸体就躺在你的眼前，但周围见不到其他人的身影。至于尸体在那里躺了多久，你也不得而知。
fasttrave__player_descrip_YwrJ
There's a dead horse on the road, with the rider lying a short way off. There are wolves pacing about there.
有一匹马死在了路上，而他的主人正躺在不远处，周围还有一群狼正来回走动着。
fasttrave__player_descrip_ZxRf
Ahead of you are two men bending over the corpse of a merchant. One of them is searching the body. They haven't seen you but it may be only a matter of time.
你的前方出现了两个人，他们正俯身在一具商人的尸体上。他们中的一人正在忙着搜刮，你还没有被他们发现，但那也不过是时间问题而已。
fetch_pac_beta_po_me_chce_MYoy
Betty wants me to bring her some package from Grund and to pick up Matsek the wagoner, who went there before me.
贝蒂希望我能从格兰德为她取回一些包裹，并将早先前往那里的⻢⻋夫⻢切克接回。
fetch_pac_po_ceste_sme_po_Nmo9
Unfortunately, I didn't manage to bring the new bathhouse maids to the city.
可惜我未能带新的澡堂女仆进城。
fetch_pac_zasilka_byly_no_UW90
"The package" consisted of new bathmaids whom Betty arranged to work for her. Matsek was scared of his own shadow, but I managed to deliver the bathmaids to the spa.

fight_nechal_jsem_se_troc_qTc3
I got a bit carried away and my opponent… well, he died. I know the duel wasn't to the death, but it can happen sometimes. Tuchmacher isn’t going to be pleased.
我有点忘乎所以，把我的对手…呃，打死了。就算这种格斗讲究点到为止，但有时难免也会闹出人命来，图赫马赫可要愁眉苦脸了。
fight_nejak_se_to_tady_zv_Mjro
It's all gone tits up! I can forget about claiming victory.
真他妈糟透了！我还是快把战前宣言忘掉吧。
fightorfl_vlci_smecka_ke__ycTj
The pack of wolves Mutt joined doesn't want to let us go. We have to fight or run.
呆呆结识的那群狼并不想把我们放走。我们得进行战斗，或是拔腿逃跑。
fightorfl_vlci_smecka_nas_Fn6m
I managed to take care of the wolf pack (with some help from Mutt). Now, I'll need to keep a closer eye on my dog. Who knows what pack of wild animals he might join next!
我成功解决掉了那群狼（无形之中受到呆呆的帮助）。今后我必须要看紧这条狗子，不然谁知道它以后又会跟什么样的野兽混在一起呢！

finale_vrat_mec_hanusovi_r3ct

finale_zjisti_nalezitosti_0Npd
Find out what rites a Jewish burial involves.
调查犹太葬礼所涉及的仪式。
finaltalk_knez_marian_me__wSNx
Father Marian rewarded me for my help. There's no one guarding the pit to hell now, as the only demon turned out to be the deranged knight, Taras Mura.
神⽗⻢⾥安奖励我伸出援手。现在通往地狱的深坑无人看守，因为疯狂的骑士塔拉斯·穆拉才是唯一的恶魔。
finaltalk_placeholder_pri_avnx
Taras' service did not end well. After everything was said and done, he decided to leave the region and start over somewhere where the mines of Old Kutna will be but a distant memory.
塔拉斯的坚守没能以好结尾收场。在一切尘埃落定之后，他决定离开这片区域，到别处去开启崭新的生活，到时，老库特纳矿场就会成为一段遥远的回忆。
finaltalk_po_vsem_co_se_s_RWva
After all that took place, Taras decided to leave the region. I can't blame him for doing so. His service was long, but he kept his knightly word and everything turned out well in the end.
经历了诸多波折后，塔拉斯最后决定离开这片地区，我也无权对他的选择指手画脚。他坚守职责，在漫长的岁月中捍卫了骑士之誓，而最终一切皆有了圆满的结局。
finaltalk_situace_s_rozli_d0t7
The situation with the furious villagers is taken care of. Still, things didn't end so well for Taras.
村民的愤怒已经平息。不过，塔拉斯的下场并不好。
finaltalk_situace_s_rozli_o59u
The situation with the furious villagers is taken care of. I should ask Taras what he plans to do now that his oath has ended.
村民的愤怒已经平息。我应该问问塔拉斯，既然他的誓言已经破除，他之后有什么打算。
finaltalk_vsechno_co_se_s_j3B4
I should visit Father Marian and discuss everything that happened.
我应该去拜访神⽗⻢⾥安，讨论所发生的一切。
finaltalk_vsechno_co_se_s_nwao
After what happened, I won't discuss anything with Father Marian anymore.
介于过去发生的事，我将无法再与神父马里安商讨任何事情。
findandbu_naposledy_jsem__67RY
Maybe Capon is right that Mutt's dead. Or maybe he isn't... But I ought to go and look at the place where Mutt fell and see for myself.
也许卡蓬说得对，呆呆可能已经死了。可是，万一没死呢...总之我得亲自去呆呆坠落的地方看看。
findandbu_vyrazil_jsem_na_YSal
I went to search the area under the rocks to find my lost dog, but he wasn't there. It looks like he survived the fall, but I have no idea where he went afterwards.
为了找到走丢的呆呆，我在山岩下的区域内搜寻了一番，但并没有发现它的踪迹。看来坠崖后的它并无大碍，至于它后续去了哪里，我也无从得知。
findbonea_jsem_na_konci_c_Uu60
From the hide, I have to walk along the slope next to the rocks until I reach the destination. It shouldn't be far.
以藏身处为起点，我得走上一片山岩附近的陡坡才能抵达目的地。应该很快就要到了。
findbonea_musim_najit_ctv_V6Zi
From the tree stump I have to walk past the thick undergrowth and then straight on as far as an old hunters' hide. Roughly in the direciton of Mesoles.
以树根为起点，我得穿过一片茂盛的灌木丛，一直走到一处老旧的猎人藏身点，大概就在前往梅索莱斯的方向。
findbonea_musim_najit_tre_GezL

findbonea_musim_zacit_s_h_4M9H
I have to start my search at the woodcutters' camp.
我得在伐木工营地开始我的搜查。
findbonea_najdi_druhou_st_H1Uo

我在拉布斯坦附近找到了瓦谢克所说那条浅河。
findcave_slama_prozradil__4q8x

Straw revealed what had actually happened in the clearing by the stream. He and his brother Ota ambushed Pavlena, but Roman saw them and tried to defend her. He ended up dead and Straw's brother dragged Pavlena to a place in the rocks south of here. It seems they're hiding in an abandoned poacher's hideout in a rocky gorge, with a ladder leading down to it.
稻草说了当时发生的事情。他和他哥哥奥塔埋伏在溪流边的空地四周，抓住了帕芙莱娜，不巧被罗曼发现。罗曼奋力保护帕芙莱娜，最后却被打死了。他哥哥把她拖到南边，一处崎岖多石的峡谷那里，藏在废弃的偷猎者藏身处，顺着那里的梯子往下走就能到。
findcave_slama_prozradil__5kxJ

Straw revealed what had actually happened in the clearing by the stream. He and his brother Ota ambushed Pavlena, but Roman saw them and tried to defend her. He ended up dead and Straw's brother dragged Pavlena to a place in the rocks south of here. I found the gorge in the rocks, exactly as Straw described it.
稻草说了当时发生的事情。他和他哥哥奥塔埋伏在溪流边的空地四周，抓住了帕芙莱娜，不巧被罗曼发现。罗曼奋力保护帕芙莱娜，最后却被打死了。他哥哥把她拖到南边，一处崎岖多石的峡谷那里。我找到了那个峡谷，和稻草描述得一模一样。
findcave_slama_prozradil__eOoU
Straw revealed what had actually happened in the clearing by the stream, but I couldn't find the gorge where Straw's brother had taken Pavlena.
稻草说了当时在溪流边的空地发生的事情，但是我找不到他哥哥挟持帕芙莱娜去的那个峡谷。
findhunts_hajnyho_jsem_na_UW4t
I found the gamekeeper at his campsite in the forest.
我在森林里的营地找到了猎物看守人。
findhunts_hajny_neni_u_se_IekC
The gamekeeper isn't home. I should try to find him.
猎物看守人不在。我应该试着去找他。
findingma_p_dozvedel_jsem_P8ob
Marika slept in the nomadic camp right next to Aranka's stall beside the rocks.
玛丽卡睡在了游民营地，就在山岩附近，紧挨着阿兰卡的马厩。
findingma_p_vajda_po_me_c_KKek
The Voivode asked me to find his daughter, Marika. I didn't promise him anything, but I met her by chance.
游民司令官请求我帮他找回他的女儿玛丽卡，虽然我并没有答应他任何事，但却碰巧遇到了玛丽卡。
findingma_vyptal_jsem_se__3DLi
Bozhena only said something about Apollonia. Since I have no other leads, I have no choice but to look there.
博珍娜只告诉了我一些与阿波罗尼亚相关的事情。既然现在已无其它线索，去打探那个地方是在所难免的。
findingre_jednim_z_podezr_D4CL
One of the people suspected of murdering Chertan is Stephen, known as Crow, a corporal in the Prague forces. I should have a look in his tent and see if I can find any evidence.
布拉格军队中的下士、以“克劳”而为人熟知的斯蒂芬是赫尔坦谋杀案件中的嫌疑人之一。我得到他帐篷里看看能否找到有关证据。
findingre_prohledal_jsem__nuVk
Lord Grozav of Borumlaca doesn't have much in his tent, but even so I found some strange herbs. Is it possible he made poison out of them?
博鲁姆拉卡的格罗扎夫领主的帐篷里东西不多，但即便如此我还是找到了一些古怪的草药，难道他用草药制毒了吗？
findingre_prohledal_jsem__yZOF
I found a lot of interesting things in Crow's tent. There may not have been any poison, but there were several things needed to make Kiss of Death.
我在克劳的帐篷里发现了不少有趣的东西。虽然大概是没找着什么毒药，但却发现了一些用于制作“死神之吻”的材料。
findingre_sam_velitel_tab_EiZ3
The camp commander himself - Grozav of Borumlaca - is suspected of murdering Chertan the Cuman. I have to search his tent and see if I can find any evidence there.
营地指挥官，博鲁姆拉卡的格罗扎夫，涉嫌谋杀了库曼人赫尔坦。我得搜查他的帐篷，看看能否在其中找到有关证据。
findmarika_p_hledej_v_apo_1SzJ
The Voivode tracked his lost daughter Marika to the rock towers in Apollonia. I'll have to search the place.
游民司令官为找回他失踪的女儿玛丽卡，已追查到了阿波罗尼亚的石塔附近，我该去那个地方打探一番。
findmarika_p_hledej_v_apo_eBTH
I don't think Bozhena would help me in any way, but the Voivode mentioned something about Apollonia.
看来博珍娜很难给我提供帮助，不过司令官曾提到过有关阿波罗尼亚的事。
findmarika_p_hledej_v_apo_h34M

Marika was very afraid, so she and her sweetheart Bohush ran away to hide somewhere in Apollonia. I should look for a valley with a small rock between big ones and then find a path that leads right. It should be in the direction away from Trosky where the woodcutters cut a gap in the forest.
受惊的玛丽卡与她的爱人博胡什一同逃离后，躲藏到了阿波罗尼亚的某个地方。我得找到一个被巨岩环绕、中央点缀着小岩石的山谷，然后找到一条向右铺开的道路。在远离特罗斯基方向的一处树林里，伐木工人凿出了一处缝隙，应该就是那里。
findmarika_p_mariku_jsem__U3dG
I found Marika, just like her father, the nomads' Voivode, asked me to. But she is afraid to return to the camp because her brothers stabbed Bohush, her lover.
依照游民司令官，即玛丽卡父亲的嘱托，我找到了玛丽卡。但她对返回营地一事表现得很是惶恐，因为她的兄弟将她的爱人博胡什刺伤了。
findoutwh_k_bozene_prisli_eJ8P
Some fellows came to Bozhena's looking for us. They claimed to be from Lord von Bergow, but that was a lie. More likely they belong to that band that attacked us down by the pond.
有几个人来博珍娜家找我们，自称是冯·波尔高大人的人。胡说八道，分明像是在湖边袭击我们的那伙人。
findoutwh_povedel_jsem_ji_96Oz
Thankfully, I managed to throw them off our trail with a masterful lie and make them leave, but it was a close call.
谢天谢地，我巧妙地把他们哄走了。太惊险了。
findoutwh_zda_se_ze_u_boz_TpzU
It seems there's something going on at Bozhena's. I'd better find out what, but cautiously...
博珍娜家似乎出事了。我最好去弄清楚怎么回事，但要小心……
findpavle_pavlena_dcera_k_BJcV
Pavlena, the daughter of Bozhena the herb woman, has not returned home and her mother is getting worried. I promised to find her, but I failed.
采药女博珍娜的女儿帕芙莱娜很久没回家了，博珍娜为此忧心忡忡。我答应她会找到她的女儿，可惜我失败了。
findpavle_pavlena_dcera_k_eicT
Pavlena, the daughter of Bozhena the herb woman, has not returned home and her mother is getting worried. I promised to find her.
采药女博珍娜的女儿帕芙莱娜很久没回家了，博珍娜为此忧心忡忡。我答应她会找到她的女儿。
findpavle_pavlena_dcera_k_fujD
Pavlena, the daughter of the herbalist Bozhena, had not returned home for a long time and her mother was getting worried. In the end, I managed to find Pavlena.
采药女博珍娜的女儿帕芙莱娜很久没回家了，她的母亲为此忧心忡忡。最后我找到了她。

我找到了食谱。
findrecipe_podle_hostinsk_cYxI

I fucked it up and didn't make it to dinner. According to the innkeeper, I should at least try to find the recipe somewhere at the mill.

finishbot_vetsinu_certovy_a8lN
I found most of Dry Devil's companions, and there's a good chance Sam will be back by now.

finishbot_zizka_rikal_ze__Jfzf
Zizka said that we can't do anything until Sam gets back from Kolin. And since that will probably take a whole day, he asked me in the meantime to track down the warriors Dry Devil told us about.
杰式卡说过，在塞缪尔从科林回来之前我们什么都不能做。我们或许得等上整整一天的时间，因此他让我在此期间找到“酒鬼”说过的那些战士。
finishmag_nedopadlo_to_zr_IITP

finishmag_zizka_mi_rekl_z_1RIy
Zizka told me that there's no point doing anything until we find Dry Devil's companions. I should see if I can find them.

事态终究演变成了一场冲突，而我也寡不敌众，输掉了战斗。随后那些人把那位修士暴揍了一顿。
fistfight_nakonec_se_to_c_YI1p
In the end it descended into a brawl, but I defended the monk despite being outnumbered.
事态终究演变成了一场冲突，但我最终以少胜多，保护住了修士斯拉瓦。
fistfight_nenechal_jsem_s_xr77
I didn't let them intimidate me. I persuaded the man and his bodyguards to let the poor monk be.
我没有被这几位不速之客吓到，还说服他们放走了那个可怜的修士。
fistfight_poraz_strazce_mmSA
Defeat the bruisers!
打败护卫！
fistfight_ten_muz_leopold_M3M1
The man, Leopold, found out what he needed to know and left. Most likely he set off for the woods around Bylany so he'd be the first to find the bones.
这个名叫利奥波德的人问到线索后便离开了。他很有可能要前往比兰尼附近的树林，这样他就将成为第一个找到那些骨头的人。
fistfight_utekl_jsem_uiPL
Did I run away?
我逃掉了吗？
followbal_balsan_se_opet__89VR
Lord Posy has once again taken the lead, guiding us along the trail left by the band of Cumans, deep into the forest. I better stick close to him and ready myself for a fight.
“花骨朵”领主再次带头，带领我们沿着库曼人队伍留下的踪迹深入森林。我最好紧跟在他身边，做好战斗准备。
followbal_balsan_se_po_pr_1Ess
Having inspected the scene of the battle, Lord Posy assumed the lead, but I chose to set off on my own. I can't help Lord Posy anymore.
在视察了战斗现场后，“花骨朵”领主承走到了最前面。但我选择独行。我不能再帮助“花骨朵”领主了。
followbal_balsan_se_po_pr_SMX6
Having inspected the scene of the battle, Lord Posy assumed the lead. We followed the Cumans' trail together all the way to their hideout.
在视察了战斗现场后，“花骨朵”领主承走到了最前面。我们一起沿着库曼人的踪迹，前往他们的藏身之处。
followbal_rytir_jan_balsa_bxKH

Sir Jan Posy of Zimburg ran into some trouble while travelling with his company around the Kuttenberg region. They were attacked by a group of Cumans, and Jan's brother Miroslav was taken captive. I was meant to help Jan search for his brother, but I left him behind and decided to go my own way.
齐姆博格的扬·“花骨朵”爵士带人前往库滕堡时，遇到了一些麻烦。他们被一群库曼人袭击，扬的哥哥米洛斯拉夫被俘。我本来要帮助扬寻找他的哥哥，但我把他甩掉，决定独行。
followbal_rytir_jan_balsa_CVjc

Sir Jan Posy of Zimburg ran into some trouble while travelling with his company around the Kuttenberg region. They were attacked by a group of Cumans, and Jan's brother Miroslav was taken captive. I promised Jan that I'd help him track down his brother. First, we'll go to where the Cumans attacked and pick up their trail from there.
齐姆博格的扬·“花骨朵”爵士带人前往库滕堡时，遇到了一些麻烦。他们被一群库曼人袭击，扬的哥哥米洛斯拉夫被俘。我答应过扬，要帮他找到他哥哥。首先，我们要去库曼人袭击的地方，从那里追寻他们的踪迹。
followbal_rytir_jan_balsa_L8Jk

Sir Jan Posy of Zimburg ran into some trouble while travelling with his company around the Kuttenberg region. They were attacked by a group of Cumans, and Jan's brother Miroslav was taken captive. I promised to help Jan, and our shared journey first brought us to the location of the attack, where we stumbled upon a group of villagers looting the corpses of the Zimburg company.
齐姆博格的扬·“花骨朵”带人前往库滕堡时，遇到了一些麻烦。他们被一群库曼人袭击，扬的哥哥米洛斯拉夫被俘。我答应要帮助扬，我们首先一起去了遇袭地点，在那里，我们碰巧遇到一群村民在搜抢那队齐姆博格人的尸体。
followdru_podarilo_se_mi__9vos
I managed to lure out a drunken German from the bathhouse. I should follow him, he seems like the perfect victim for Goatskin.
我设法从浴场引出了一个喝醉的德国人。我应该跟踪他，他似乎是山羊皮的完美受害者。
followdru_podarilo_se_mi__Pji0
I managed to lure out a drunken German from the bathhouse. But I messed up and I didn't catch Goatskin in the act.
我设法从浴场引出了一个喝醉的德国人。但我搞砸了，我没有当场抓到山羊皮。
followdru_podarilo_se_mi__qTLo
I managed to lure out a drunken German from the bathhouse. Goatskin took the bait, tried to rob the poor German, but he didn't expect he'd have company.
我设法从浴场引出了一个喝醉的德国人。山羊皮上钩了，想抢劫这个可怜的德国人，但他没想到对方有同伴。
followtra_z_krvave_sceny__CjbG
I found signs of fighting and blood in the clearing south of Troskowitz. I should thoroughly search the area to find out exactly what happened and how it relates to Pavlena.
我看到特罗斯科维茨南面空地上有打斗过的痕迹还有血。我应该仔细搜查这片地方，看看到底发生了什么，跟帕芙莱娜有什么关联。
followtra_z_krvave_sceny__LThW
I found signs of fighting and a hastily buried corpse in the clearing in the woods. There's nothing more to find here, and I should focus on finding Pavlena now.
我在森林里的空地发现了打斗过的痕迹和草草掩埋的尸体，除此之外没有更多线索了。接下来我应该专心找帕芙莱娜在哪。
foodforhy_dones_jidlo_hyn_Umf9
Bring food to Hynek.
把食物带给海尼克。
foodforhy_hynek_mozna_pos_SWWb
Hynek might have starved to death.
海尼克差点就饿死了。
foodforhy_hynek_po_dobrem_7b83
Hynek seems to have cheered up after some good food.
饱食一顿之后，海尼克似乎振作了起来。
foodforhy_sezen_pro_hynka_uBkY
Find some meat for Hynek to eat.
给海尼克找点肉吃。
foodforhy_sezen_pro_hynka_VTQ2
Find some meat for Hynek to eat.
给海尼克找点肉吃。
freemiros_bitva_je_vybojo_dE3l
The battle is won but Miroslav remains a captive. We must search the old castle ruins and find him.
战斗胜利了，但米洛斯拉夫仍然是个俘虏。我们必须搜索旧城堡的废墟并找到他。
freemiros_bitva_je_vybojo_TPXD
The battle is won but Miroslav remains a captive. I didn't manage to free him.
战斗胜利了，但米洛斯拉夫仍然是个俘虏。我没有救出他。
freemiros_po_bitve_jsme_o_AGiv
After the fight, we freed Miroslav, and the two brothers of Zimburg, the ancestral lords of the ruins near Kuttenberg, were reunited once more.
战斗结束后，我们释放了米洛斯拉夫，齐姆博格的两兄弟，库滕堡附近废墟的世袭领主，再次团聚。
frisk_eve__event_caption_1MiN
Check!
搜身检查！
frisk_eve__event_descript_ZxvN
Local guards are trying to stop you to see if you have anything stolen on you.
当地的警卫正要拦住你，想看看你身上是否携带失窃的赃物。
gatherfle_jedna_z_lazebni_33iN
One of the wenches told me the bathhouse once got infested with fleas. I figured if I could fetch some, I could release them around Naaz's tub. But Betty won't appreciate it anymore anyway.
我从一位姑娘那里得知，澡堂内曾一度跳蚤肆虐。这让我意识到，要是能弄来些跳蚤，或许就能将它们放到纳兹的澡盆附近。只不过贝蒂可不会赞成这种行为。
gatherfle_p_mensi_area_QtY9

One of the girls told me the bathhouse once got infested with fleas. Now there's an idea! If I find something covered in fleas and pour them on something near Naaz's tub, it'll be a nightmare for them. Especially if the little bastards get into Naaz's clean kecks and sheets! So it seems there might be some flea-ridden rags in the beggars encampment. I'm supposed to look by the city wall behind the biggest tent. They say there might be a blanket like the one I'm looking for.
我从一位姑娘那里得知，澡堂内曾一度跳蚤肆虐，这可是个不错的思路！如果我能找来些跳蚤滋生的东西，然后把它放进纳兹澡盆附近的某些物品里，那就有意思了。要是有小东西钻进纳兹干净的裤子和被单里，那将会是一场噩梦！ 似乎乞丐的营地里就有些跳蚤滋生的破布。我应该去城墙边最大的帐篷后面找找，据说那里就有一条正合我意的毯子。
gathering_beta_vymyslela__FWKw
We wanted to spoil Councillor Jerome Naaz's visit to Adam's bathhouse, but it didn't go quite according to plan.
我们本想搞砸议员杰罗姆·纳兹对亚当澡堂的探访计划，但却事与愿违。
gathering_mam_toho_dost_t_hEYw
We want to spoil Councillor Jerome Naaz's visit to Adam's bathhouse, so I asked the bathhouse wenches about him. I think I've found out all I can.
我们计划在议员杰罗姆·纳兹对亚当的澡堂视察期间进行捣乱，所以我向那里的澡堂女仆打探了与议员有关的消息，现在看来我也想到了办法。
gathering_musim_se_poptat_QTs9

I'll go to Adam's place and ask his wenches about that Councillor Naaz. I hear he's a frequent guest, so they're bound to know what he likes and dislikes. Maybe we can spoil his next visit enough to make him change his mind about Adam and get him to vote for Betty.
我要到亚当的澡堂去，向那里的女仆们打探与议员纳兹有关的信息。据说纳兹是那里的常客，所以姑娘们一定对他的喜好有所了解。或许我们可以让他在下一次造访中吃瘪，好让他改变对亚当的看法，因此决定将选票投给贝蒂。
getdisgui_musim_mit_kompl_C6gF
To be allowed to serve the king, I must be properly dressed as a royal waiter.
要想得到服侍国王的机会，我必须打扮成皇家侍从的模样。
getdisgui_musim_ziskat_od_Ctxk

Appearing at a royal banquet as a waiter is not a simple task. I will need a fine dress from Franta Kuldaun, who had it made for the occasion by tailor Schneider. The tailor can certainly be found at the market during the day, there’s no point looking for him at night.
以侍从的身份出席皇家宴会并不容易，因此我得从弗兰塔·库尔丹那里拿到一身合适的装扮，据说此人曾委托裁缝施耐德为那样的宴会量身定做了一套衣裳。裁缝白天肯定会在集市上现身，在晚上是找不到他的。
getdisgui_odev_ma_franta__UR8T
Franta Kuldaun now has the royal waiter's fine dress. I have to get it from him somehow. He is said to frequent the Iron Eagle, a German tavern.
弗兰塔·库尔丹手里就有一套皇家侍从的服饰，我得想办法从他那里弄到那套衣服，也据说此人频繁出没于一间名为“铁鹰”的德国酒馆。
getdisgui_povedlo_se_zbla_UYL2
I got myself a royal waiter's dress.
我给自己弄到了一套侍从服饰。
getdocume_musim_ziskat_vy_FKpM
To pass myself off as a royal waiter, I'll need his certificate, otherwise I won't be able to get to the Council.
要想冒充皇家侍从，我就得拿到他的执照，否则我将无法混入市议会。
getdocume_povedlo_se_neod_JmV5
I got the king's waiter certificate.
我拿到了皇家侍从的执照。
getdocume_straz_vzala_vyu_FZne
The guard took Franta's certificate from me.
警卫从我身上取走了弗兰塔的执照。
gethalberd_rytir_jan_mi_d_29hr

Sir Jan recommended I take one of the halberds previously carried by his men. We won't have the numbers on our side in this fight, so keeping the enemy back will be crucial. I decided to follow the knight's advice.
杨爵士建议我拿上他手下以前携带的一把战戟。在这场战斗中，我们要以寡敌众，所以拦阻敌人至关重要。我决定听从这位骑士的建议。
gethalberd_rytir_jan_mi_d_6E1O
Sir Jan recommended I take one of the halberds previously carried by his men. We won't have the numbers on our side in this fight, so keeping the enemy back will be crucial.
杨爵士建议我拿上他手下以前携带的一把战戟。在这场战斗中，我们要以寡敌众，所以拦阻敌人至关重要。
gethalberd_rytir_jan_mi_d_XHfu
Sir Jan recommended I take one of the halberds previously carried by his men. I prefer my own weaponry, however, and don't require anything else.
杨爵士建议我拿上他手下以前携带的一把战戟。不过，我更喜欢自己的兵器装备，不需要其他东西。
gethunter_mel_jsem_si_seh_7IOT
I was supposed to get my own horse and pick up Vostatek, but Vostatek died in the meantime.
我本该给自己弄一匹马，然后去接沃斯塔克，但他在此期间就过世了。
gethunter_potrebuju_vosta_79je
I need to get Vostatek home, but because Pepik died, I need to get myself another horse. Once I've got hold of a horse, I'll have to go back for Vostatek.
我得带沃斯塔克回家，但因为佩皮克死了，我得自己再找一匹马。我找到一匹马之后，就会带沃斯塔克回家。
gethunter_sehnal_jsem_si__33mD
I managed to get my own horse and pick up Vostatek at his hideout.
我给自己弄到了一匹马，去沃斯塔克的藏身之处接他。
get_privi_nepovedlo_se_hoU9

We did what we could, but it wasn't enough. The city council awarded the Municipal Bathhouse title to Adam, so Betty has to pay the huge Clean Tax. Judging by what she told me, the Kingfisher baths won't last long.
即便我们已经竭尽全力，但却还是未能如愿。市议会最终还是将市立澡堂的头衔颁给了亚当名下的澡堂，贝蒂也因此不得不支付巨额的“清洁税”。从她口中所说的一切可以看出，翠鸟澡堂离倒闭不远了。
get_privi_pomoz_bete_zisk_7cvf
I have to help Betty get the title, otherwise it'll be the end of the Kingfisher and all her work doing it up will have been for nothing!
我必须帮助贝蒂拿下市立澡堂的名号，否则翠鸟澡堂将不复存在，而她过往投入的心血也将付诸东流！
get_privi_povedlo_se_kVbG

We did what we could, and me and Betty managed to persuade enough councillors to award the Kingfisher the status of Municipal Bathhouse. That put an end to the worries about paying the Clean Tax, and Betty can keep running the best bathhouse in Kuttenberg.
在历尽艰辛以后，我和贝蒂成功说服了足够多的议员为翠鸟澡堂投票，将其选为了市立澡堂。对于支付“清洁税”的顾虑也终于得以打消，贝蒂也将能够继续经营着这间库滕堡最好的澡堂。
getreinfo_musim_najit_nek_hCka
I have to find some hard men who won't back down from Cumans. But I can't think of anyone at the moment.
我必须找一些不会在库曼人面前退缩的硬汉。但我现在想不到任何人选。
getreinfo_p_bohuzel_se_mi_KXO2
No reinforcements will arrive at the meeting point.
没有任何增援的人马会前去会合。

我并未与杨指派任何援军来对付拉斯洛。
getreinfo_p_musim_najit_n_5XlT
I have to find some hard men who won't back down from Cumans. I've thought of a few people, but I can't overdo it. I can't show up to the meeting with an army.
我必须找一些不会在库曼人面前退缩的硬汉。我想到了几个人选，但我不能太过分。我不能带着一支军队参加和谈。
getreinfo_p_musim_najit_n_bIv0
I have to find some hard men who won't back down from Cumans. I've thought of a few people, but I can't overdo it. I can't show up to the meeting with an army.

getreinfo_p_musim_najit_n_WqnV
I have to find some hard men who won't back down from Cumans. I've already found a few, but a couple more won't hurt.

getreinfo_p_na_janovu_zad_1EFU
At Jan's request, I've found a few fearless men who I can count on.
在杨的要求下，我找到了几个可信而无畏的人选。
getreinfo_p_na_janovu_zad_o9ni
A nice little group will be accompanying me to meet László. I hope Jan will be happy.
一支精锐小队将陪同我去见拉斯洛。我希望杨会很高兴。
getrespect_jeden_ze_zpuso_SRQO
One of the ways to gain the locals' respect is to fight a man called Goliath.
要想获取人们的敬意，办法之一就是打败一个名叫歌利亚的人。
getrespect_jednim_ze_zpus_AasU

One of the ways to make an impression on Chenyek, who seemed to be in charge of everything in the Hole in the Wall, was to fight someone called Goliath. All I can say is his nickname is well deserved, because he gave me a serious pummelling.
程叶科似乎对“墙洞”的一切都了如指掌，但要想撬动他的心，办法之一就是要打赢一位人称“巨人歌利亚”的家伙。不得不说，他的绰号也名副其实，因为我刚被他狠狠地揍了一顿。
getrespect_jednim_ze_zpus_Rl82

One of the ways to make an impression on Chenyek, who seemed to be in charge of everything in the Hole in the Wall, was to fight someone called Goliath. All I can say is he didn’t live up to his nickname.
程叶科似乎对“墙洞”的一切都了如指掌，但要想撬动他的心，办法之一就是要打赢一位人称”巨人歌利亚“的大块头，而我只能说这家伙可真是名不副实。
getreward_tovarysstvo_byl_fRjH
The Guild has been broken up thanks to my efforts and I'm entitled to a reward! I should pick it up from the bailiff and then go and see where they hanged the Guild members.
我的付出也终让公会分崩离析。如此艰辛配得上一份报酬！我该向执行官索要报酬，然后看看人们在哪里绞死了那些公会成员。
getstrings_jediny_kdo_umi_Vt72
The only person who knows how to make strings is Vostatek, the local gamekeeper. Fortunately, he owes me...
本地猎人沃斯塔克是唯一了解如何制作琴弦的人。他正好还欠我个人情……
getstrings_jediny_kdo_umi_wZQm
The only person who knows how to make strings is Vostatek, the local gamekeeper, but he's away. I've got to do something about this...
本地猎人沃斯塔克是唯一了解如何制作琴弦的人，但是他不在。我得处理一下这件事……
getstrings_jediny_kdo_umi_xoq7
The only person who knows how to make strings is Vostatek, the local gamekeeper. I'll have to find him and talk to him.
本地猎人沃斯塔克是唯一了解如何制作琴弦的人。我得去找他谈谈……
getstrings_lovsi_zemrel_d_VZm8
The huntsman died before he could make the strings. It looks like George and Michael aren't going to be bards just yet...

getstrings_nechal_jsem_lo_PyUM

我让猎人用肠线制作了新琴弦。
getstrings_vostatek_uz_je_c35o
Vostatek's home at last, I hope he can make me those strings.
沃斯塔克终于到家了，希望他可以为我制作琴弦。
gettinggl_p_dostan_od_mar_Q0JV

When Marika fled from the camp, she took with her the Voivode's letter of passage as security. The Voivode is furious, because the letter gives him freedom from the law and the right to travel. I should get that letter back.
玛丽卡逃出营地时，带走了司令官的通行函作为保障。司令官非常愤怒，因为通行函授予了他不受法律约束和自由通行的权利。我得要回那封通行函。
gettinggl_p_glejt_po_kter_9RCj
I managed to find the letter of safe conduct that the Voivode was looking for. It was in the hollow of a tree.
我成功找到了司令官所需的那张通行函，它就被藏在一处树洞中。
gettinggl_p_glejt_po_kter_vHDU
I didn't find the letter of safe conduct That the Voivode was looking for.
我没能找到司令官所需的那张通行函。
gettinggl_p_marika_mi_rek_IkpV
Marika told me where she'd hidden the Voivode's letter of safe conduct and that's exactly where I found it.
玛丽卡将司令官通行函的藏匿处告诉了我，我也因此找到了它。
gettinggl_p_najdi_schovan_ur6w
Marika told me where she hid the Voivode's letter of safe conduct. It's in the hollow of a tree, a short distance downhill from her hideout. There should be a natural spring nearby.
玛丽卡将司令官通行函的藏匿处告诉了我。它就被藏在一个树洞中，而那棵树在玛丽卡藏身点的山下不远处，树的附近应该还有一口天然泉水。
gettingsa_kdyz_marika_ute_JNPC

When Marika escaped from the camp, she took Vajda's letter of passage with her as a guarantee. This infuriated the Voivode, because the letter gives him nomad's rights and the freedom to travel. So he wanted me to get it back for him.
玛丽卡逃出营地时顺手带走了通行函，以作保障。司令官对此非常愤怒，因为通行函授予了他游民固有的权利以及自由旅居的资格，因此他想让我替他取回通行函。
gettingsa_p_glejt_sem_nas_4C5a
I found the letter before the Voivode even asked for it.
在司令官提出请求之前我就已经找到通行函了。
gettotown_dostal_jsem_se__UK9l
I pretended to be a royal waiter and got into the City Council convened by Sigismund.
我假扮成了一名皇家侍从，混入了由西格斯蒙德召集的市议会。
gettotown_mam_den_a_pul_JMDB
The Council is slowly approaching, I should start my preparations, if I haven't done so already.
市议会举办的日子正逐步临近，如果我仍未有所准备，最好赶紧动身。
gettotown_mam_den_rhB0

市议会即将召开。
gettotown_mam_dva_dny_FfZq

在市议会开始前我仍有足够的时间。

市议会很快就要开始了，我必须抓紧时间！

I handed over the dragon bones to Gerhard. He was extremely pleased and gave me the promised reward. I just hope I don't get into trouble with the Sedletz monastery and the abbot for not doing what he asked. The reward was so hefty that it was definitely worth it, though.
我将那些龙骨交给了格哈特，他为此而欣喜若狂，还将先前约定好的报酬都给了我。但愿我不会因为没有完成修道院院长的委托而陷入与塞德莱茨修道院之间的麻烦。不管怎样，格哈特提供的诱人报酬让这一切都物有所值。
givebones_gerhart_mi_za_k_BXuq
Gerhard is offering me a hefty reward for the bones. I have to take them to him.
格哈德提出以一份丰厚的报酬向我换取那些骨头，我得把它们拿给他。
givebones_kosti_jsem_done_9N94

我将那些骨头交给了斯拉瓦。
givebones_kosti_jsem_gerh_6zPs
I didn't bring Gerhard the bones. I didn't fall for his fishy offer.
我对格哈特提到的报酬心存疑虑，因此没将那些骨头交给他。
givebones_musim_najit_dra_G2OM
I have to bring the bones to Slava before someone else finds them.
趁着别人还没找上门来，我得赶快将骨头交给斯拉瓦。
giveheali_bozena_uz_se_o__kiv0
Bozhena is taking care of Sir Hans. I just have to give her the remedy and she'll do the rest.
博珍娜正在治疗汉斯大人。我只需把药水交给她，剩下的就交给她来做。
giveheali_predal_jsem_odv_Rzuk
I gave the remedy to Bozhena. She'll take treat Sir Hans with it and take care of him.
我把药水给了博珍娜，由她来治疗并照料汉斯大人。
gotodinner_jsem_pozvany_k_cUHa
I'm invited to the miller's for dinner. I was told to come whenever suits me, but I should make sure the miller has enough time to make dinner first.
磨坊主邀请我去他家吃晚饭。我被告知，我随时可以去，但我应该先确保磨坊主有足够的时间准备晚餐。
gotodinner_prisel_jsem_br_JXOr
I arrived early but preferred to just wait at the miller's anyway. What a mistake that was. He didn't shut his trap once, droning on about flour the entire time.
我提前到了，但还是想在磨坊主家等着。这真是个错误。他话说个没完，一直在唠叨面粉的事。
gotodinner_prisel_jsem_ta_103c
I arrived at a good time, so we went straight to eat dinner.
我去得正是时候，于是我们直接去吃晚饭。
gotosleep_bozena_rikala_z_z0XW
Bozhena said I should get some more rest. The sensible thing would be to take her advice and go and lie down. A good sleep works wonders.
博珍娜建议我多休息一会。我应该听她的再去躺一会。好好睡一觉总有好处。
gotosleep_udelal_jsem_co__nrMe

我把能做的都做了，然后听从博珍娜的建议躺下了。一觉睡到天亮。

gowithjan_vzhledem_k_nast_wFK2

鉴于这种情况，和杨一起去约定的交接地点没有意义。

格林戈莱死了。杰泽克再也见不到它了。

Prove yourself with Bibrek.
hadkakona_osvedc_se_u_mik_Hg8G

Prove yourself to Mikolai.

I stopped by the gamekeeper Vostatek's place to see if he had slept off his hangover and if he might have some other work for me. For a moment, it looked like I would be his personal server, but in the end, he managed his thirst himself and tasked me with dealing with the local poachers. The woods are full of them, and it's up to me to track them down and bring them to justice
我拜访了猎场看守人沃斯塔克，想知道他是否已经从宿醉中恢复，同时也想知道他是否要给我安排任务。一时间，我差点成了他的私人仆从，但是最后他亲自解决了干渴问题，并将处理偷猎者的事托付给了我。偷猎者们在树林里横行霸道，我得追踪他们，将他们绳之以法。
hajny_mi__mel_bych_se_zas_leV2
I could stop by gamekeeper Vostatek's place and see if he has slept off his hangover. Who knows, maybe he'll have some work for me this time that doesn't involve carrying him on my back.
我可以去拜访猎场看守人沃斯塔克，看看他是否从宿醉中恢复了过来。谁知道呢，说不定他这次会给我安排一些不用伤肩劳背的差事。
handlesee__doslo_na_zbran_Vq8q
It came to a fight and I killed one of those men who came to Bozhena's. To hell with the other.
事情演变成一张战斗，我杀了其中一个闯入者。另一个随他去吧。
handlesee__doslo_na_zbran_VSaX
It came to a fight and I had to kill both of those men who came to Bozhena's.
事情演变成一张战斗，而我杀掉了博珍娜家的两个不速之客。
handlesee_postaral_jsem_s_CeXx
I have taken care of them, and Bozhena and we should be free of them.
我已经解决了那两个家伙，他们不会再来捣乱了。
handlesee_ti_chlapci_co_b_mrk3
Those fellows who came to Bozhena's accosted me. I've got to get rid of them to save Sir Hans, Bozhena and myself.
博珍娜家的不速之客过来找我了。为保护汉斯大人、博珍娜和自己，我必须解决掉他们。
hastal_ze_hastla_jsem_zab_DXfO
Hashtal went looking for his horse but found death instead. Life is a struggle.
哈斯塔尔外出寻找那只失窃马匹的途中遭遇了不测，真是命途多舛呐。
havirskyt_vyhraj_streleck_S8JC
Win the shooting competition.
赢得射鸟比赛。
havirskyt_zitra_rano_si_p_btkn
Talk to Vlach early in the morning.
在清早时分与弗拉赫交谈。
helptaras_tajemny_rytir_z_fo5U

The mysterious knight in the mine is Taras Mura, bound by his oath to guard the mine. I believe he's in the right, so I decided to help him in the conflict with the villagers. We didn't manage to avoid violence, but Taras certainly didn't deserve to be lynched by the mob.
矿井里的神秘骑士是塔拉斯·穆拉，他发誓要守住矿井。我认定他是正义的一方，并与他一起对抗村民。我们不得已使用了暴力，但塔拉斯肯定不应该被暴徒处以私刑。
helptaras_tajemny_rytir_z_KHcw
The mysterious knight in the mine is Taras Mura, bound by his oath to guard the mine. I decided that he's on the side of righteousness and joined him in the conflict with the villagers.
矿井里的神秘骑士是塔拉斯·穆拉，他发誓要守住矿井。我认定他是正义的一方，并与他一起对抗村民。
helptaras_tajemny_rytir_z_Wlc0

The mysterious knight in the mine is Taras Mura, bound by his oath to guard the mine. I believe he's in the right, so I decided to help him in the conflict with the villagers. Things didn't quite go our way, however, and Taras died in the fight.
矿井里的神秘骑士是塔拉斯·穆拉，他发誓要守住矿井。我认定他是正义的一方，并与他一起对抗村民。但事情进展并不顺利，塔拉斯在战斗中死去。
helpvilla_tajemny_rytir_z_i2Uw

The mysterious knight in the mine is Taras Mura, bound by his oath to guard the mine. But all those years underground darkened his mind, and he fell upon us in a fit of insanity. We had to defend ourselves and kill the knight.
矿井里的神秘骑士是塔拉斯·穆拉，他发誓要守住矿井。但多年的地下生活，使他的思想变得黑暗，他在精神错乱的情况下冲向我们。我们不得不进行反抗，并杀死这个骑士。
helpvilla_tajemny_rytir_z_LRDG

The mysterious knight in the mine is Taras Mura, bound by his oath to guard the mine. But all those years underground have darkened his mind, and he fell upon us a fit of insanity. I wasn't able to save the villagers from his wrath.
矿井里的神秘骑士是塔拉斯·穆拉，他发誓要守住矿井。但多年的地下生活，使他的思想变得黑暗，他在精神错乱的情况下冲向我们。村民们死于他的怒火，我无力拯救。
helpvilla_tajemny_rytir_z_qOVe

The mysterious knight in the mine is Taras Mura, bound by his oath to guard the mine. But all those years underground have darkened his mind. The whole situation has escalated, and I have to save the villagers from the mad knight!
矿井里的神秘骑士是塔拉斯·穆拉，他发誓要守住矿井。但多年的地下生活，使他的思想变得黑暗。局势已经升级，我必须要把村民们从这个疯狂骑士手中拯救出来！
