hynek__event_caption_RIcc
Campsite.
营地。
hynek__event_description_ioVn
In a small campsite, there is a man and a woman sitting. The man is dressed in armour, and the woman is wearing fine clothes. But they have no escort with them.
一处小营地内坐着一男一女。男人全副武装，女士则身着华服。但他们的身边不见任何侍从。
hynek__player_caption_STO4
Campsite.
营地。
hynek__player_description_KFIa
In a small campsite, there is a man and a woman sitting. The man is dressed in armour, and the woman is wearing fine clothes. But they have no escort with them.
一处小营地内坐着一男一女。男人全副武装，女士则身着华服。但他们的身边不见任何侍从。
important_konu_uz_pozemsk_ucG8
Kona is no longer troubled by earthly pains, for I have sent her to eternity. God have mercy on my soul.
柯娜无需再承受世俗之痛的困扰，因为我已将她送往天堂。愿上帝宽恕我的灵魂。
important_thomlin_bruthan_tpun
Thomlin Bruthans has passed away, taking the secret of the thunderstone with him.
托姆林·布鲁桑斯已经离世，关于雷石的秘密也与之一同奔赴了天堂。
important_zasahem_vyssi_m_mkLi
By an act of divine intervention, poor Peter has passed away, and the mystery of the thunderstone will likely remain unsolved forever.
在神圣的干预下，可怜的彼得从此长眠不起，而雷石的秘密或许也将永远无法揭开。
infiltrat_rozhodl_jsem_se_6lry
I decided to quietly venture into the enemy's camp alone first. Like a ghost, I crept through the old castle ruins, all the way to the dungeon. There I found Miroslav imprisoned, and freed him.
我决定先独自悄悄地冒险进入敌人的营地。我像个幽灵一样，蹑手蹑脚地穿过旧城堡的废墟，一直走到地牢。我发现米洛斯拉夫被囚禁在那里，于是释放了他。
infiltrat_rozhodl_jsem_se_98XZ
I decided to quietly venture into the enemy's camp alone first, but I was discovered. Time to take Zimburg back by force!
我决定先独自悄悄地冒险进入敌人的营地，但我被发现了。该用武力夺回齐姆博格了！
infiltrat_rozhodl_jsem_se_9JMd

I decided to quietly venture into the enemy's camp alone first and dispatch as many of them as I can. If I also manage to quietly free and arm Miroslav, then there'll be three of us to fight the Cumans.
我决定先独自悄悄冒险进入敌人的营地，尽量多杀一些。如果我还能悄悄地解救出米洛斯拉夫并将他武装起来，那么我们就可以三个人联合对付库曼人。
infiltrat_rozhodl_jsem_se_DO5h
I decided to quietly venture into the enemy's camp alone first. But let's face it, it was a thick-witted plan that went to hell and I had to beat a retreat. Fuck Posy!
我决定先独自悄悄地冒险进入敌人的营地。但让我们面对现实吧，这是个执行得一塌糊涂的愚蠢计划，我不得不匆忙撤退。去他妈的“花骨朵”！
infiltruj_dostat_se_do_do_4qie

It's not all that easy getting into the von Grolle house, it's a reclusive family. I need a good reason for them to let me in. Apparently, the son is trying to learn sword fighting, and the father is chronically ill and needs a healer.
要想进入冯·格罗尔家可没那么轻易，这一家人历来不与外人亲近，所以我们得编造个正当的理由，好让他们允许我们进去。天无绝人之路，这家儿子正努力学习剑术，而患有慢性病的父亲需要有人帮他治病。
infiltruj_kdyz_se_dari_ta_TWva
When things go well, they go well. I had trouble getting a proper look around the house, but in the end things worked out, and I was able to make progress with the investigation...
时来天地皆同力，虽然我在观察房子的时候遇到了一些麻烦，但之后很顺利，调查也有了不少进展……
infiltruj_musim_prijit_ko_34tJ
I have to come around noon to be able to get in easily.
我最好午时前后过来，这样便可轻易进入其中。
infiltruj_nepovedlo_se_mi_Rzb1
Searching the house took a deadly turn... someone died, and the whole thing went to hell.
在我搜查房子期间，情况急转直下......有人死了，整件事都变得一团糟。
infiltruj_podarilo_se_mi__0dLR
I managed to get inside the house, now I need to look around discreetly.
我成功进入了这座宅子，现在得仔细搜查一番。
infiltruj_podarilo_se_mi__TJs2
I managed to find several different locks of hair in Hendl's room. I was sure that was the evidence we needed.
我在亨德尔的房间里发现了几撮不同的头发，很确信它们就是我们要找的线索。
infiltruj_uz_mi_dochazi_c_eX5k
My time's running out, I'll have to leave any time now. I have to hurry.
时间所剩无几，最好快点，我差不多得离开了。
infiltruj_uz_mi_vyprsel_c_XRqX
My time's run out, I have to leave the house before they try to throw me out.
时间不多了，趁着他们没把我赶出去，我得赶快离开。
informuj__at_to_je_jak_to_VsgF
Maybe I should go and see Andreas Plumel, the baillif at the Kuttenberg town hall. The business with the letter isn't entirely above board and maybe I'll get a reward for reporting it.
也许我应该去找安德烈亚斯·普卢梅尔。库滕堡市政厅的执行官。信里的交易并不光彩，或许我能举报它换来奖励。
informuj__dostal_jsem_zas_2S2c
The bailiff dealt with Markold and the miners and I got my deserved reward.
执行官处理了马尔科和矿工们，我得到了应有的奖励。
informuj__obesel_jsem_vse_yayj
I investigated all the cases that Lumir told me about and found out several things that could help us catch the killer.
我调查了所有卢米尔提到过的案件，在其中发现了一些或许能帮助我们揪出凶手的线索。
informuj__rychtar_mi_neuv_8V2p
I wanted to be law-abiding and upstanding, but the Kuttenberg bailiff didn't believe me.
我想做个正直守法的人，但库滕堡执行官不相信我。
informuj__rychtar_nepocho_q8pS
The Kuttenberg bailiff must be mad. He didn't understand how honestly I'd tried to behave and he had me punished!
库滕堡执行官一定昏了头，他不理解我有多么诚实，居然还惩罚了我！
informuj__tolik_behani_ko_OjqJ
So much running around and questioning people and all for naught. There was no way to continue without Lumir.
我们已为案件的调查竭尽全力，而今这些努力却化作云烟，缺少卢米尔的帮助将很难有所进展。
informuj__tolik_behani_ko_WLDX
So much running around and questioning people and that was just the beginning! A long debate ensued about who the killer really was, and we thought long and hard about every hint and clue.
四处奔走、打探只不过是调查的开始！关于凶手真实身份的讨论持续了很长时间，而我们也对每一处细节、每一则线索投入了很多的思绪与精力。
informuj__udal_jsem_co_js_MsrM
I did what every honest person should. I reported the business with the letter and the miners to the bailiff. It's not my concern any more.
我做了每个诚实的人该做的事，向执行官报告了这封信和矿工的事。之后就不关我的事了。
inquisitor__event_caption_XP21
Encounter
偶遇
inquisitor__event_descrip_VmM8
A man in a monk's habit approaches you on the road. He started waving at you from a distance, trying to get you to stop. Three armed men march behind him.
路上有位身着修士袍的男人正朝你走来，还在远处的他就已经开始向你挥手，尝试让你停下，而在他身后，还跟着三个全副武装的人。
inquisitor__player_caption_pey9
Encounter
偶遇
inquisitor__player_descri_wl1e
Four men are standing in the road. One is wearing a monk's habit, the others armour. They're probably travelling somewhere and have stopped for a rest.
路上正站着四个人，其中一位穿着修士袍，其余三人则身着护甲。他们或许要前往某个地方，只是中途停了一会儿。
investiga_abych_zjistil_c_4tEI
Chertan's corpse holds the key to everything. I should examine it closely.
赫尔坦的尸体就是一切调查的关键，我得仔细检查一番。
investiga_jsou_tu_nejaky__fbXZ

Arnold, a Knight of the Cross with the Red Star, and his brothers were hunting a murderer named Konrad, who was pretending to be Ambrose the hermit. But that didn't answer the question of what happened to the old hermit, and why Konrad hadn't fleed a long time ago.
红星十字勋章骑士阿诺德和修士们正在追捕一个名叫康拉德的杀人犯，此人乔装打扮成了隐士安布洛斯。但我们依然不知道老隐士遭遇了什么，也不知道康拉德为什么没有早早逃走。
investiga_na_rukou_mel_ch_hSM6
Chertan had lots of strange sores on his hands.
赫尔坦的手上布满了诡异的疮。
investiga_podle_toho_smra_YIUv
Judging by the stench, the poison must have made Chertan empty his guts.
通过那股令人窒息的恶臭可以看出，那种毒药一定彻底清空了赫尔坦的肠胃。
investiga_u_poustevnik_as_hfyQ
Damn it, I have to find out what's going on here and where the old hermit fits in. What are the monastic knights after?
该死，我必须弄清楚这里发生了什么，老隐士是怎么回事。那些清心寡欲的骑士们到底想要什么？
investiga_vypada_to_ze_se_9xLv
It looks like Chertan threw up before he died.
似乎赫尔坦死前呕吐过。
jantlama_dones_cervenakov_5omx
Bring the Gob's shield to Gules.
把大嘴约翰尼的盾牌带给古勒斯。
jantlama_rozbji_bandu_hon_iXC6
Break up Johnny the Gob's gang.
解散大嘴约翰尼的团伙。
jdi_do_do_mam_pomoci_kvet_syJ9

I'm supposed to head to Kuttenberg and somewhere in the Miners' Quarter find his office. He said the house is inside the city walls and beyond the grain market. It also looks run-down from the outside, so I hope it doesn't collapse before I find it.
我得前往库滕堡，在矿工区找到他的办公室。他说过那栋建筑设立在城墙内，就在谷物市场之外，而且据说那屋子从外部看显得很是破旧，但愿在我找到之前它最好别倒塌。
jdi_do_do_pomohl_jsem_jim_adKj

Kvyetoslav sent me to some half-collapsed building where two of his pals were waiting. I helped them write the letter. But instead of some ordinary business dispute, it looks like I've got caught up in something a lot more complicated.
科维托斯拉夫送我到了一座几乎塌了的房子里，他的两个伙伴正在那等我。我帮他们写了信，但我觉得这好像不是普通的生意纠纷，我可能被卷进了一件更复杂的事里。
jdi_do_do_zacalo_to_cteni_Hp1o
I wanted to help the local miners with writing a letter, but something went wrong, and it didn’t work out.
我本想帮助当地的矿工写一封信，但出了点岔子，结果没能办成。
jdi_dopec_bez_zajice_mam__lFSr
Without Hare I have a problem though. I don't know where to go. I have to find Pasha's camp on my own. I hope it's somewhere nearby.
没了哈尔，我倒有了麻烦。我不知道方向。我得自己去找帕夏的营地。我希望它就在附近。
jdi_dopec_hura_kemp_jsem__tkWD
Hurray! I found the encampment, even without Hare. I'll give the arrow to Pasha, grab the reward and vanish.
万岁！即使没有哈尔，我还是找到了营地！我把箭交给帕夏，拿上赏金就消失无踪了。
jdi_dopec_jeste_ze_jsem_n_l9yV
Good thing I helped Karel carry those sacks recently. Otherwise I wouldn't have known where the encampment was. I'm in luck.
幸好我最近曾经帮助卡雷尔搬运麻袋。否则我就不知道营地在哪里。我很幸运。
jdi_do_ro_neprisel_jsem_n_FwFG
I missed my duel and was disqualified from that discipline according to the rules. I hope I'll do better in a different discipline or maybe another time.
我输掉了比武，按照规则，我已被淘汰出局。但愿我能在其它项目中或是下一次参加时大放异彩。
jdi_do_ro_prave_ted_soupe_rH08
It's time for my duel. I need to step in the red corner and wait until my opponent shows up and Fridusch starts the fight.
是时候开始我的决斗了。现在我只需站到红色角落上，等候我的对手出现，并等待弗里杜斯一声令下，宣布决斗开始。
jdi_do_sv_jdi_do_sveho_ro_h3vO
The time has come for me to take up arms. I need to go to the yellow corner of the tournament pen and wait until Fridusch starts the fight. Then I'll get to it.
攥起武器的时刻已经来临。我得前往决斗围场的黄色角落等待，等候弗里杜斯宣布决斗开始，之后便可大展拳脚。
jdi_do_ta_dorazili_jsme_s_fXqR
We reached the miners' camp and set about dispensing justice!
我们到了矿工营地，开始伸张正义！
jdi_do_ta_nabidl_jsem_se__7Kx6
I offered to join Markold when he went to sort out the miners, who we have to get rid of once and for all. They have a camp near Grund, in a wood on a hill called Sukov.
我主动加入了马尔科前去解决矿工的队伍。我们必须彻底除掉他们。他们的营地在格兰德附近，一个叫苏科夫的山上的树林里。
jdi_do_ta_povedlo_se_ted__CM4j
It worked! Now I just have to return to the miners' camp and get a reward for a job well done out of them. The camp's supposed to be somewhere near Grund, in a wood on a hill called Sukov.
事情做完了！现在我只需要回到矿工营地从他们那拿奖励就好了。营地应该在格兰德附近，一个叫苏科夫的山上的树林里。
jdi_do_ta_prisel_jsem_do__Xhoa
I arrived at the miners' camp, but things began to get complicated.
我到了矿工营地，但事情开始变得复杂。
jdi_do_ta_prisel_jsem_poz_yOfg
It looks like I was too late. There was nothing but a couple of dead bodies in the camp.
看来我来晚了，营地里除了几具尸体以外什么也没有。
jdi_do_ut_musime_dobyt_vn_H7A9
The way into the castle is open. Now we must defeat the castle's last defenders.
进入城堡的道路已经破开，现在我们必须打败城堡内最后的守军。
jdi_do_ut_posledni_linie__OPkv
We have fought our way into the inner courtyard! The tide had finally turned, and we could get our revenge for Nebakov and that terrible pogrom in Kuttenberg.
我们杀进了城堡内庭！局势终于得以扭转，我们可以为内巴科夫和那场在库滕堡发生的残忍屠杀报仇雪恨了。
jdi_do_ve_cesta_do_veze_j_n58D

If there's no other choice, we'll have to defeat Otto von Bergow by sheer force. In any case, we have to take him alive. He'd be no use to us dead! I'll try to clear a path into the tower for the others.
倘若别无他选，我们就只能动用武力，击败奥托·冯·波尔高。无论如何，我们都得活捉他，要是他死了就毫无用处了！我将为其他人扫清通往塔楼的障碍。
jdi_do_ve_stestena_nam_pr_OOKh
Fortune shone upon us, and the defenders of Maleshov fortress eventually surrendered. We captured the royal chamberlain and rescued Rosa Ruthard.
受到幸运之神的眷顾，马列索夫堡垒的守卫们最终选择了投降。我们抓住了那位皇室总管，也救出了罗莎·鲁瑟德。
jdi_do_vl_kdyz_bylo_vse_p_Z3zj
The first step was simple. We walked from Ruthard Palace through Italian Street to the Italian Court. People were curious about us, but they believed we really were the legate's retinue.
计划的第一环简洁明了。我们从鲁瑟德宫出发，穿过意大利街后抵达了意大利宫。路上行人纷纷对我们投来好奇的目光，但是他们始终相信我们就是特使随从。
jdi_do_vl_vse_je_priprave_ZGV6
The first chapter of the plan unfolds. The group, pretending to be the legate's retinue, is on its way to the Italian Court. People are watching so we have to play the part.
计划的第一环已经揭晓。负责假装成特使随从的小队已经在前往意大利宫的路上，众目睽睽之下，我们得演好自己的角色。
jdi_ke_dv_bala_se_ze_je_z_ARUN
She was afraid there was another bandit behind the door, but it turned out to be Mikush who'd hobbled home. What a welcome!
她担心门后躲藏着其他强盗，结果竟是正踉踉跄跄赶回来的米库什，欢迎他回家！
jdi_ke_dv_boji_se_ze_je_z_2q2W
She's afraid there's another bandit behind the door. I should check it out.
她担心门后藏着其他强盗，我得前去检查一番。
jdi_ke_dv_note_failne_pok_VtA2
I wasn't able to complete the simple task of seeing who's at the door, so this whole story came to an unexpected close.
就连查看门后的人是谁如此简单的任务我都没能完成，整件事情也因此以出人预料的方式迎来了结局。
jdi_k_lip_po_uspesnem_dop_F5Sc

After successfully capturing the murderess, we waited for Lumir at his house, where he then told us what happened at the bailiff's. Justice was carried out, perhaps too severely, perhaps too carefully, but we had succeeded in stopping the rampage of the Kuttenberg murderer, and that was good.
成功抓住了那个女魔头以后，我们便在卢米尔家中等候，随后返回的他也将执行官那里发生的事告诉了我们。正义终于得到了伸张，严苛也好，慎重也罢，总之我们成功终结了凶手在库滕堡犯下的恐怖行径，这便是好事。
jdi_k_lip_tak_nase_past_s_vSMy
So our trap worked like a charm. Lumir went to the bailiff's to explain what happened while Katherine and I are to wait at his house.
我们的陷阱非常管用。在我与凯瑟琳于卢米尔家中等候之时，他前去将所发生之事汇报给了执行官。
jdi_na_hr_prazane_utoci_n_LR4w

The Praguers are attacking the walls. We must repel their attack, otherwise yesterday's success and the sacrifices made by our friends will be for naught. I must get to the wall of the outer palisade and help defend the castle.
布拉格人正在进攻城墙。我们必须打退他们的进攻，否则我们昨天的胜利和朋友们的牺牲都会付之东流。我必须到外面的城墙上去帮助保卫城堡。
jdi_na_hr_prazane_zautoci_xTc5
The Praguers have attacked! I have moved to the walls and have joined in on the defence of the castle.
布拉格人攻击了城墙！我已经到了城墙上来保卫城堡。
jdi_na_ji_podle_mikova_po_sbhl
According to Mika's directions, I have to go south till I reach some rock split in two where there's a broken cart! Let's hope I find it in the dark!
依照米卡的指引，我得一路往南，直到看见一块裂成两半的岩石，它旁边有一辆破损的马车！希望我能摸黑找到它！
jdi_na_kr_nasel_jsem_kriz_0s0H
I found the crossroads where an ambush likely happened. I should look around and see if I can find any other clues.
我来到了一些路口，这里似乎还发生过伏击。我得四处转转，看看能否找到其它线索。
jdi_na_kr_podle_nacmarane_jvkW
I'll try to find the place marked on that roughly drawn map.
我会设法找到那张绘制粗糙的地图上的标记点。
jdi_na_kr_vendula_ale_boh_Zn7o
Unfortunately, Vendula died, so there was no point in continuing my search.
芙恩德拉已不幸殒命，因此再继续我的调查已然没了意义。
jdi_na_mi_i_kdyz_me_kater_mwlL

Even though I checked out the scene of the crime the gravedigger told me about, I didn't find much there. Everything was pretty much trampled by onlookers and workers and the blood half washed away...
尽管我查看了掘墓人提到的案发现场，但是并未找到太多线索。现场的一切都被围观者和工人们踩踏得乱七八糟，有一半血迹也已被冲刷掉了……
jdi_na_mi_katerina_mi_rek_TIdX
The gravedigger told me that Alice was found by the walls behind The Hole In the Wall tavern. Maybe I could uncover something there.
我从掘墓人那里得知，人们在“墙洞”酒馆后方的城墙边发现了遇害的艾莉丝，或许我能在那里发现点线索。
jdi_na_mi_mel_bych_najit__7Fdy
Two large roads intersect there. There's no other crossroads like it between Bylany and Mesoles. That description alone should be enough to find the place.
两条大路在此处交汇，此地也便是比兰尼与梅索莱斯之间唯一的路口，仅凭那些描述就足以找到这个地方。
jdi_na_mi_misto_prepadeni_pCMx
Unfortunately, Svatava died, so there was no point in continuing my search.
斯瓦塔娅已不幸殒命，因此再继续我的调查已然没了意义。
jdi_na_mi_nasel_jsem_mist_AaYE
I found the crossroads. There were bloody tracks nearby. It looks like somebody was attacked here!
我找到了那些路口，还发现附近有些血迹，看来有人曾在此地遇袭！
jdi_na_na_dostal_jsem_se__37Z5
I've reached the courtyard and can now take part in the battle.
我已抵达城堡庭院，现在可以加入战斗了。
jdi_na_na_mel_bych_se_dos_otmf
I should go to the courtyard and help defend the castle.
我得前往城堡庭院与战友们一同保卫城堡。
jdi_na_tu_na_turnaj_jsem__zEgz
I signed up for the tournament, but I couldn't make it in the end. I can try again next time and maybe even actually show up.
尽管我报名了比武大会，但最后却没能及时参与。那就以后再说吧，也许下次我能准时到场。
jdi_na_tu_turnaj_kazdou_c_uQ1e

The Kuttenberg tournament is starting soon! I need to get there between 6 and 10 in the morning so I don't get disqualified. The tournament takes place on the ground by the walls between the New Gate and the Horse Market.
库滕堡比武大会即将开幕！这场盛会将在“新门”和马市之间的城墙边的空地上如期举行，要想顺利参赛，我就得在上午6到10点之间抵达现场。
jdi_na_tu_turnajova_pravi_Tvut

The rules of the tournament are simple. I have to wait for Fridusch to announce my duel and get into the pen with the correct gear. Then comes the actual duel. I'll need to beat my opponent twice to advance to the final round and then do the same to win the final. If I win the final round, I'll get the prize for the chosen discipline. For the sword and shield and longsword disciplines, I must use borrowed tournament gear, including the weapon and shield. I shouldn't forget to return the gear afterwards. The free combat discipline allows me to use any armour and melee weapon I bring with me. All in all, I just need to use common sense, listen to Fridusch, not be an arsehole and not commit any crimes during the tournament.

比武的规则非常简单。 首先，我得等候弗里杜斯宣布对局开始，随后再携带合规的武器进入比武场地。 其次，在比武的过程中，我得击败对手两次才能晋级决赛，并在决赛中同样击败对手两次方可取得最终胜利。 一旦赢得决赛，我将获得所选比武项目提供的奖赏。 若要参与剑盾项目或长剑项目，我必须借用主办方提供的包括武器与盾牌在内的比武装备，但也别忘了事后将装备如数归还。 自由搏斗项目将允许我使用随身携带的任意护甲装备与近战武器。 总而言之，保持平常心态，听从弗里杜斯安排，在比武期间别当混蛋，更别犯罪。
jdi_po_sc_prazane_nam_zni_2MH9

The Praguers destroyed our bridge with a trebuchet shot, but the battle is just getting started. I have to help defend the ramparts! I'm needed on the front wall, that means going up the stairs beside the main gate.
布拉格人的投石机射出的一记巨石摧毁了我们的桥梁，但是战斗才刚刚开始，我必须协助防御城墙！现在前方城墙需要我的支援，我得赶快登上主城门旁的阶梯。
jdi_po_sc_prazane_nam_zni_4xUG
The Praguers destroyed our bridge with a trebuchet shot, but the battle's just getting started. The enemy began their assault on the front ramparts and gate.
布拉格人的投石机射出的一记巨石摧毁了我们的桥梁，但是战斗才刚刚开始。敌人们展开了对城门与城堡前垛的进攻。
jdi_po_sc_prazane_nam_zni_AlJy
The Praguers destroyed our bridge with a trebuchet shot, but the battle is just getting started.
布拉格人的投石机射出的一记巨石摧毁了我们的桥梁，但是战斗才刚刚开始！
jdi_po_sc_prazane_nam_zni_m7Rv

The Praguers destroyed our bridge with a trebuchet shot, but the battle's just getting started. I have to help defend the ramparts! I'm needed on the front wall, and I can get there by taking the stairs by the main gate.
布拉格人的投石机射出的一记巨石摧毁了我们的桥梁，但是战斗才刚刚开始，我必须协助防御城墙！现在前方城墙需要我的支援，登上主城门旁的阶梯就能抵达。
jdi_po_st_cerstve_stopy_k_5FeZ
Fresh wheel tracks! I'm certain the merchant's wagon didn't run off the road by accident. I should have a look in the woods.
崭新的车轮痕迹。我肯定商人马车驶出路面不是偶然。我应该到树林里去看看。
jdi_po_st_krev_na_tom_pyt_jkXo
The blood on the sack points to an ambush. If Hensel was attacked here, maybe I can find more clues in the area.
麻袋上的血迹说明这是一场伏击。如果亨泽尔在这里遇袭，也许我可以在这个地方找到更多线索。
jdi_po_st_mlyn_na_danemar_Hfu8

Something is rotten in Danemark. The mill there has been seized by a band of robbers. They don't look like desperate refugees, more like seasoned outlaws. Fresh traces prove the ambush on the way to Bylany was their doing, so the Striped Tonies' standard will be somewhere in the mill.
丹恩麦状况很糟。那里的磨坊已经被一伙强盗占领。他们看起来不像是绝望的难民，更像是老练的亡命之徒。新的痕迹证明，是他们在去比兰尼的路上发起伏击，所以条纹托尼帮旗杆可能在磨坊里面。
jdi_po_st_odstaveny_kupec_kgeR
The unhitched merchant's wagon and pieces of the harness. I'll have a look around the wagon for other clues.
未拴好的商人马车和零落的马具。我会查看马车四周，寻找其他线索。
jdi_po_st_stopy_vedou_k_m_DR3h
The tracks lead to a mill down by the river. Who knows who or what might be concealed there, so I'd best be cautious.
车辙通向河边的一个磨坊。谁知道什么人或什么东西藏在那里，我最好小心点。
jdi_po_st_ten_kdo_prepadl_jEZK

Whoever ambushed and hid the merchant's cart can't have gone far. Otherwise they'd have used it to move the goods. And there must've been more than one. Those bandits must have a den somewhere nearby.
伏击并隐藏商人马车的人不可能走远。否则他们会用马车来搬运货物。而且肯定不止一个人。那些强盗附近一定有窝点。
jdi_pro_k_mam_cerstve_kve_Co93

Finding fresh roses for Tess in Kuttenberg was truly no simple task. This mining town isn't overflowing with gardens in bloom, but in the Cobblers' Quarter I found a hidden garden and picked some flowers there.

杰式卡和我抵达了目的地，但愿我们能遇到对酒鬼和他部下有所了解的人。

I lost Zizka, but I suppose he's waiting for me at the tavern he mentioned. What was it called again?
我跟杰式卡走散了，但我猜他应该正在先前提过的酒馆里等着我，不过它叫啥来着？
jenik_zem_jenik_uz_ma_od__iYVB
No more fights for poor Hensel.
可怜的亨泽尔无法再进行搏斗了。
jezekalibi_becvar_jezek_n_IlIb

Jezhek the cooper isn't on good terms with Pavlena, and besides he's quite beaten up. I should check if Jezhek's stories add up. He said he got into a fight in the tavern and that's where he got the black eye. The innkeeper should know if that's true.
箍桶匠杰泽克和帕芙莱娜关系并不好，还被人打得很惨。我应该去查查杰泽克说的话是否属实。他说他在酒馆里打过架，眼睛也是在那受伤的。酒馆老板应该可以作证。
jezekalibi_becvar_jezek_n_LNHL
Jezhek the cooper is not on good terms with Pavlena and looks like he's been in a fight recently. I could have verified his story in the tavern, but I can't do that now.
箍桶匠杰泽克和帕芙莱娜关系并不好，而且最近似乎还打过架。我本来可以去酒馆查查他说的话是否属实，但是现在不行。
jezekalibi_krcmar_potvrdi_hwUk
The innkeeper confirmed that Jezhek had got into a fight in the tavern. She also thinks that a wretch like him would have no chance with Pavlena.
酒馆老板说杰泽克确实在酒馆里跟别人打过架，还说像他这种人对帕芙莱娜简直就是瘌蛤蟆想吃天鹅肉。

礼貌的武装分子
jezek__player_description_kiwN
A man is standing in the middle of the road. He's smiling and looking for someone. He doesn't look dangerous, but he's armed. Who knows what he's doing here...
一个男人站在路中间，满脸堆笑，正在找人。他看似人畜无害，但却全副武装，也不知道他在这里有何打算……
jezek_zem_jezek_je_mrtvy__VZWi
Jezhek is dead. He won't need a horse or armour anymore.

I learnt something interesting about the Guild's plans. I should go and see bailiff Plumel and tell him what I know.

keeptheba_rychtar_ze_mne__x8a0
The bailiff made me his spy and wants me to keep him informed of what the Guild is up to. Otherwise, I should act like nothing has changed and continue working for them.
执行官让我成为了他的间谍，希望我能够随时向他通报公会的行动。此外，我得表现得泰然自若，继续为他们效力。

killbandi_lesy_opet_patri_qUrU
The woods once again belong to the wildlife, not poachers and thieves. I got rid of all of them, so I'm sure the huntsman will reward me.
这片树林再次成为野生动物的家园，而不是偷猎者和盗贼的天堂。我除掉了他们所有人，猎人一定会酬谢我的。
killbandi_vostatek_se_zmi_HvHG
Vostatek mentioned I could dispose of the poachers, but in the end it wasn't necessary.
沃斯塔克提到，我可以除掉那些偷猎者，但最后却发现没有这种必要。
killbandi_zlodeji_se_po_m_BihH
Poachers have been roaming the local woods for some time now, it seems. Vostatek mentioned he would reward me if I managed to dispose of them.
看起来偷猎者已经在本地树林里游荡了一段时间。沃斯塔克提到，如果我成功除掉他们，他就会酬谢我。
killjakes_bozena_se_chce__8Kb4

Bozhena wants revenge for what happened to Pavlena. She believes it was all because of her old feud with Farmer Jakesh. After all, it was Jakesh's farmhands who attacked Pavlena. I promised Bozhena to kill Farmer Jakesh.
博珍娜想为帕芙莱娜报仇。她坚信这一切源于与农场主贾克西的宿怨，毕竟那个袭击了帕芙莱娜的人就是贾克西的农场工。我答应博珍娜会杀了他。
killjakes_bozena_se_chce__kePb

Bozhena wanted revenge for what happened to Pavlena. She believes it was all because of her old feud with Farmer Jakesh. After all, it was Jakesh's farmhands who attacked Pavlena. But I wanted nothing to do with murder so I refused.
博珍娜想为帕芙莱娜报仇。她坚信这一切源于与农场主贾克西的宿怨，毕竟那个袭击了帕芙莱娜的人就是贾克西的农场工。但我不想杀人，所以我拒绝了。
killjakes_bozena_se_chtel_F2MV

Bozhena wanted revenge for what happened to Pavlena. She believed it was all because of her old feud with Farmer Jakesh. After all, it was Jakesh's farmhands who attacked Pavlena. I did what Bozhena wanted and Farmer Jakesh is dead.
博珍娜想为帕芙莱娜报仇。她坚信这一切源于与农场主贾克西的宿怨，毕竟那个袭击了帕芙莱娜的人就是贾克西的农场工。我满足了博珍娜的心愿，贾克西现在已经死了。
killjakes_bozena_se_chtel_MNyF
Bozhena wanted to take revenge on Jakesh, but instead revenge came to her.
博珍娜想要向贾克西复仇，复仇却先找上了门。
killjakes_namisto_zabijen_8K8M
Instead of killing Jakesh, I decided to take revenge elsewhere.
我决定不杀贾克西，转而到别处进行复仇。
killjakes_vyjednavani_s_j_ErVm
Even though I couldn't make peace between them, I'm not going to kill Jakesh. There's been enough bloodshed.
即使我没能让他们和解，我也不会杀了贾克西。已经太多人流血受伤，甚至死亡了。
killjakes_vyjednavani_s_j_Ewlt
In the end I decided that it was better to give Bozhena the revenge she wanted, and I killed Jakesh.
最终我还是决定满足博珍娜的心愿，杀了贾克西替她报仇。
killjakes_vyjednavani_s_j_SaP0
I wasn't able to settle the feud between Bozhena and Jakesh, but I still have the option to fulfil Bozhena's original wish. But do I really want to kill Jakesh?
我没能解开博珍娜和贾克西之间的心结，但是我还可以满足博珍娜原来的心愿。但我真的想杀了贾克西吗？
killthefi_nepodarilo_se_m_Nx1b
I didn't manage to deal with the pack of wolves that have been troubling Siegfried the shepherd.
我没能处理掉那些给牧羊人西格弗里德制造麻烦的狼。
killthefi_pasacek_po_me_c_EmmM
The shepherd Siegfried asked me to take care of a wolf pack that's been killing his sheep. I agreed because I was interested to know if Mutt has joined the pack.
牧羊人西格弗里德的羊遭到了一群狼的猎杀，他请求我把那些狼处理掉。因为很想知道呆呆是否就混迹在狼群中，我接受了这一请求。
killthefi_podarilo_se_mi__hr5p
The shepherd Siegfried wanted me to take care of a pack of wolves that were killing his sheep. I dealt with them, but Mutt wasn't among them.
牧羊人西格弗里德希望我能处理掉一群先前一直在猎杀他羔羊的狼，而我也已将它们处理掉了，但是没在其中发现呆呆的身影。

konfrontu_konfrontoval_js_35H2

I confronted Thomlin about the fake rock and eventually got it out of him that someone had recently stolen his real rock. Thomlin suspects Peter and Hensel from Dolany, who had been asking him about the stone not long before it went missing.
我向托姆林询问这块假石头的事，他最终告诉我最近有人把他的真石头偷走了。托姆林怀疑是多兰尼的彼得和亨泽尔干的，因为他们在石头被偷前一直在向托姆林打听这块石头的事。
konfrontu_thomlin_me_urci_5n3p
Thomlin must have been trying to hoodwink me with that fake rock. Let's see what he has to say.
托姆林一定想用那块假石头骗我，让我看看他要说什么。
konfrontu_vsichni_mlynari_fK4d

All millers seem to be the same. Though they swear blind that they're honest tradesmen, they still steal on the side. By exposing Kreyzl, I backed him into a corner, and suddenly he had other work for me. He wants me to steal some sort of document from the Troskowitz Rathaus.
所有的磨坊主都一个样。尽管他们总是坚称自己是良心商人，却总是两面三刀。通过揭发克雷泽，我让他无处遁形，他也因此突然提出了另一份差事：他希望我能够到特罗斯科维茨市政厅偷取一份文件。
kopie_dej_kopii_do_basano_j0Bk

The next day, Sir Hans and I were both fit enough to carry on with our mission. We had breakfast with Bozhena and her daughter Pavlena and then set out for Trosky to deliver the message we were sent with by Sir Hanush and Sir Radzig.
第二天，汉斯大人和我状态都很好，可以继续我们的任务。我们与博珍娜还有她的女儿帕芙莱娜一起吃了早餐，然后出发前往特罗斯基递送瀚纳什大人和拉德季大人交付的信函。
leavearea_jan_ptacek_uz_j_5oYh
Sir Hans is in better shape. We need to get a move on and continue on our journey to Trosky to deliver the message from Sir Hanush and Sir Radzig.
汉斯大人的状态有所好转。我们要抓紧时间赶去特罗斯基，把瀚纳什大人和拉德季大人的信送到。

log_k_bozene_prisli_nejak_tea6
Some men came to Bozhena's place, probably looking for me and Capon. Soon the situation became very heated and we had defend ourselves.
博珍娜家中有不速之客闯入，似乎是来找我和卡蓬的。场面一度失控，但我们得以自保。
lootersco_dranciri_z_boji_C9t3
By the grace of God, the looters left the scene of the battle in one piece. A knight is meant to protect ordinary people, not kill them.
由于上帝的恩典，劫掠者们离开了战斗现场。骑士的职责是保护平民，而不是杀害他们。
lootersco_jak_to_s_dranci_wKNG
I'll never know what happened to the looters because I simply walked away. I can't expect Jan to forgive me for doing so.
我永远不会知道那些劫掠者发生了什么，因为我直接走开了。我不能指望杨会原谅我的所作所为。
lootersco_osud_dranciru_b_GChI
The fate of the looters was sealed the moment Sir Jan beheld their godless behaviour. No one was left alive.
当杨爵士看到他们的大逆不道行为时，这些劫掠者已经难逃一死。最终没人幸免。
lootersco_situace_s_dranc_tlKF

The situation with the looters slowly escalated to violence. They're ordinary people whose bread was taken right out of their mouths by the ongoing war of kings. And yet, they have committed a serious sin. How should this be handled?
我们与劫掠者的冲突慢慢升级为暴力。他们是平民，诚然正在进行的诸王之战将每日的食粮直接从他们的嘴里夺走，但他们却犯了严重的罪行。这事应该如何处理？
lootvilla_kdyz_dosla_puto_Pbo9
By the time Puta's patience ran out, we already had enough supplies. The villagers thought we'd taken too much, so they rose up in revolt. I wasn't there, so I couldn't prevent it.
我们在普塔彻底失去耐心之前搜集到了足够的物资。但那些村民认为我们拿走了太多物资，随即便发起了反抗，而我当时并不在现场，因此没能阻止此事发生。
lootvilla_kdyz_jsem_putov_6efl
When I told Puta what happened to the men he sent as an advance party, he gave the order to kill all the villagers. But I wasn't going to let that happen.
当普塔得知那些他先前派来探路的士兵们的下场后，他便下令将村民全部杀死。但我没有让如此悲剧发生。
lootvilla_kdyz_jsem_putov_Ygep
When I told Puta what happened to the men he sent as an advance party, he gave the order to kill all the villagers.
当普塔得知那些他先前派来探路的士兵们的下场后，他便下令将村民全部杀死。
lootvilla_podle_puty_jsem_34Ls

Puta said I've found enough supplies for the next few days, but the villagers weren't happy and decided to chase us out. Thankfully, I managed to talk the villagers round, so we could set off back to the camp in peace.
普塔说我找到的物资足够我们度过好一阵子了，但是那些村民并不乐意，最终决定将我们赶走。万幸的是，我成功说服了那些村民，我们能因此安然无恙地启程回营。
lootvilla_podle_puty_jsem_NbDB
Puta said I've found enough supplies for the next few days, but the villagers weren't happy and decided to chase us out.
普塔说我找到的物资足够我们度过好一阵子了，但是那些村民并不乐意，最终决定将我们赶走。
lootvilla_podle_puty_jsem_nWqG
Puta said I've found enough supplies for the next few days.
普塔说我找到的物资足够我们度过好一阵子了。
lootvilla_podle_puty_jsem_SP9e

Puta said I've found enough supplies for the next few days, but the villagers weren't happy and decided to chase us out. Thankfully, I managed to scare the villagers off, so we could set off back to the camp in peace.
普塔说我找到的物资足够我们度过好一阵子了，但是那些村民并不乐意，最终决定将我们赶走。万幸的是，我成功吓退了那些村民，我们才能因此安然无恙地启程回营。
lootvilla_podle_puty_neby_7DRG
According to Puta, there were not enough supplies to let the villagers live. He gave the order to kill them, and I had no choice but to obey.
普塔说村民们已经彻底失去了足以支撑他们生存的粮食，所以他又命令我把他们全部杀死，而我别无选择。
lootvilla_podle_puty_neby_ZBud
Puta said the supplies weren't enough to let the villagers live. He gave the order to kill all the villagers, but I wasn't going to let that happen.
普塔说村民们已经彻底失去了足以支撑他们生存的粮食，所以他又命令我把他们全部杀死，可我并未让此事发生。
lootvilla_podle_velitele__7sx3

Puta gave me an order to check all the supplies prepared for the camp and load everything up. If necessary, I'm supposed to check the villagers' cottages. The commander thinks they're bound to have hidden something from us. As soon as I'm finished, I'm supposed to go to him and we'll head back to the camp.
I should hurry up, though: the time left till nightfall is running out, and with it the commander's patience.

普塔命令我去清点所有为营地准备的物资并全部装车。必要的话，我还得搜查每个村民的房子，因为普塔认为他们一定将部分物资藏了起来。等将事情办妥后，我就该回去找他并一起返回营地。
我得抓紧时间，趁着黄昏来临前、指挥官厌烦前把事办妥。
lootvilla_podle_velitele__cWqt
Puta gave me an order to check all the supplies prepared for the camp and load everything up. I had to search the cottages and the village as a whole.
普塔命令我去清点所有为营地准备的物资并全部装车，我也不得不仔细搜查每户人家乃至整个村庄。
lootvilla_podle_velitele__rrqE

Puta gave me an order to check all the supplies prepared for the camp and load everything up. If necessary, I'm supposed to search the villagers' houses. Puta thinks they're bound to have hidden something from us. As soon as I'm finished, I'm supposed to go to him and we'll head back to the camp.
普塔命令我去清点所有为营地准备的物资并全部装车。必要的话，我还得搜查每个村民的房子，因为普塔认为他们一定将部分物资藏了起来。等将事情办妥后，我就该回去找他并一起返回营地。
lootvilla_putovi_dosla_tr_tOPg
Puta's patience ran out. Thankfully, we already had enough supplies, so when I took them back to him he gave the order to move out.
普塔彻底失去了耐心，幸亏我们已经搜集到了足够的物资，所以在我将物资交给他后，他便下令离开。
lootvilla_putovi_dosla_tr_WZkK
Puta's patience ran out. We didn't have enough supplies, so he gave the order to kill the villagers. I wasn't there, so I couldn't prevent it.
我们没能搜集到充足的物资，普塔也彻底失去了耐心，因此他下令杀死那些村民。我当时不在现场，因此没能阻止此事发生。

lukostrel__event_descript_eyY1

你来到了一处小营地，看到一群活力四射的人停留于此。他们将食物架在火堆上烘烤，还在进行着射箭比赛。
lukostrel__player_caption_tEjL
Camp.
营地。
lukostrel__player_descrip_yl64
You arrive at a small camp. A group of boisterous people has stopped there. They are cooking food over a fire and competing in target shooting.
你来到了一处小营地，看到一群活力四射的人停留于此。他们将食物架在火堆上烘烤，还在进行着射箭比赛。
lurewolves_je_tu_misto_od_eSos
Just off the path by the forked birch the bush is so thick you could hide a whole army there. That'll be the perfect spot for me to watch the wolves as they arrive.
那棵桦树旁的路边长满了灌木丛，枝叶茂盛到能掩藏一整支军队，那对我来说将是一处监视狼群动向的绝佳藏身点。
lurewolves_mel_bych_poloz_o7Fj
If I want to make finding that wolf pack easier, I should place some bait on the hill above the shepherd's hut near the last group of birches.
如果我想轻松找到那群狼，我就得在山坡上、牧羊人小屋下方的最后一棵桦树边放置一些诱饵。
lurewolves_to_se_moc_nepo_xMWc
The wolves are slyer than I thought. They ate the bait and then ran away. I have to put more out and this time keep closer watch.
没想到那些狼竟会如此狡猾，吃掉诱饵后的他们便逃之夭夭。我得再多拿点诱饵出来，而且这次还得更靠近一些。
lurewolves_ukryl_jsem_se__EI0g
I waited in the bushes for the wolves to come. That was the easy part.
我就在灌木丛里等待者狼群的出现，这一过程并不困难。
lurewolves_zibrid_zemrel__of3v
Siegfried, the shepherd at Kopanina, was unable to help me look for Mutt.
科帕尼那的牧羊人西格弗里德没能协助我寻找呆呆。

makeheali_musim_uvarit_le_998V
I have to brew a herbal remedy for Sir Hans. Bozhena has an alchemical apparatus in an alcove here, and if I'm at a loss she'll tell me what to do, so it should be easy enough.
我得为汉斯大人熬制治疗药剂。博珍娜的壁龛里有一套炼金器械，如果我不会，她会教我怎么做，应该很容易。
makeheali_nasbiral_jsem_b_EnJl
I picked the herbs as Bozhena advised and brewed the chamomile remedy for Sir Hans. I handed it over to Bozhena, and now she'll take care of Sir Hans.
我按照博珍娜的指示采摘了草药，为汉斯大人熬制了甘菊药水。我把它交给了博珍娜，她会去治好汉斯大人。
maketruce_bozena_volala_p_Bv2b
I tried to persuade Jakesh to let bygones be bygones, but he wouldn't listen.
我努力说服贾克西，让过去的事过去，但他不听。
maketruce_bozena_volala_p_fFcN
I didn't manage to persuade Jakesh to make peace, because he died. So Bozhena got her way in the end.
贾克西死了，我没办法劝他和解。博珍娜的心愿实现了。
maketruce_bozena_vola_po__hsmk

Bozhena is out for revenge for the attack on her daughter. She believes it was all because of Farmer Jakesh, who can’t forgive her for an old wrong. Bozhena wanted me to kill Jakesh, but I convinced her that she should try to make peace instead. I can find Jakesh on his farm in Troskowitz. I hope I can persuade him.
博珍娜认为整件事是农场主贾克西对过往心怀怨恨而做下的，她想杀了他报仇雪恨，不过我劝她先讲和试试。我能去贾克西在特罗斯科维茨的农场上找到他，希望我能说服他。
maketruce_myslel_jsem_ze__7LuG
I thought that Bozhena would be able to make up with Jakesh, but that won't be possible now.
我还以为博珍娜会与贾克西冰释前嫌的，但是现在看来已经不可能了。
maketruce_promluvil_jsem__5l8B
I talked to Jakesh and told him everything. In the end, he agreed that it would be better to make peace with Bozhena. He gave me money to deliver to her by way of an apology for Pavlena's abduction.
我把来龙去脉都告诉了贾克西。最后他愿意和博珍娜和解，还给了我一笔钱，让我交给博珍娜，作为对绑架帕芙莱娜的道歉。
malik_zem_chudak_malik_uz_ldJ5
Poor Malik won't be fighting ever again.
可怜的马利克再也无法进行搏斗了。
manure_najdi_hnuj_TQ01

One of the girls told me the bathhouse once got infested with fleas. Now there's an idea! If I find something covered in fleas and pour them on something near Naaz's tub, it'll be a nightmare for them. Especially if the little bastards get into Naaz's clean kecks and sheets! I could try asking the beggars around Kuttenberg. They might have some flea-ridden rags, or something like that.
我从一位姑娘那里得知，澡堂内曾一度跳蚤肆虐，这可是个不错的思路！如果我能找来些跳蚤滋生的东西，然后把它放进纳兹澡盆附近的某些物品里，那就有意思了。要是有小东西钻进纳兹干净的裤子和被单里，那将会是一场噩梦！ 我可以去问问库滕堡里外的乞丐们，他们应该会有些跳蚤滋生的破布或者类似的东西。
manure_no_fuuj_iNJC

One of the wenches told me the bathhouse once got infested with fleas, so I found a blanket with so many fleas on it you can practically hear them. Once I set them loose in Adam's bathhouse, I'm certain they'll make themselves at home.
我从一位女孩口中得知，澡堂内曾一度跳蚤肆虐。我也找来了一张满是跳蚤的毯子，跳蚤多到你甚至能听到它们的声音。等我把跳蚤投放到亚当的澡堂里，我敢肯定，它们将会扩散到每一个客人的家中。

我需要采摘甘菊和鼠尾草。

People have to find out about the bathhouse, and the best way is for me to drum up business in the city's main squares. I should do it during the daytime, so I don't annoy people at night.
我们得让人们了解这家澡堂，而最好的办法就是在城里的大广场上招揽生意。我应该在白天做这件事，以免夜间扰民。
marketing_vyhlasil_jsem_n_kALB
I pitched the new bathhouse in Kuttenberg's squares. Now I just have to wait and see if it did any good.
我在库滕堡的广场上推销了这家新澡堂。现在，我只需要等着看看这些宣传产生了什么效果。

meet_cath_je_nacase_pomst_XS4j

It's time to take revenge on von Bergow for everything he's done to us. If we're going to take Maleshov, where he's holed up, we first need to get hold of a cannon from Sigismund's camp. That's going to be my job.
是时候向冯·波尔高复仇了，他必须为对我们做出的一切付出代价。冯·波尔高正藏身于马列索夫，如果我们想要拿下那里，就得先从西格斯蒙德的营地中弄到一台火炮，我也将负责完成此事。
meet_cath_katerina_mi_rek_vhxR
Katherine told me not to go to the bathhouse until evening. There are too many prying eyes there during the day.
凯瑟琳让我天黑之前都别去澡堂，因为白天会有很多人窥探着那里。
meet_cath_pokud_chci_zjis_NvAS

It's time to take revenge on von Bergow for everything he's done to us. If we're going to take Maleshov, where he's holed up, we first need to get hold of a cannon from Sigismund's camp. Zizka wants me to meet up with Katherine in the camp bathhouse and ask her how we can pretend to join the Prague forces who are in charge of the cannon. That will make it a lot easier to steal.
是时候向冯·波尔高复仇了，他必须为对我们做出的一切付出代价。冯·波尔高正藏身于马列索夫，如果我们想要拿下那里，就得先从西格斯蒙德的营地中弄到一台火炮。杰式卡想让我到营地里的澡堂与凯瑟琳见面，并询问她我该如何假装加入掌管着火炮的布拉格部队，这样便能更轻而易举地将火炮偷走。
meetingwi_a_ukazalo_se_ze_Engm

We're on the same side - Samuel is protecting Liechtenstein, whom Sigismund's spies have tried several times to assassinate. By asking so many questions, I seemed like exactly the sort of person who means Liechtenstein harm.
我们实际上是同一阵线。塞缪尔是在保护列支敦士登，后者此前已经成功躲过了西格斯蒙德的许多次暗杀。而或许是因为我之前的质问，让他们觉得我对列支敦士登心怀不轨，才发展成这样的事态。
meetingwi_mam_domluvenou__qARe

A group who stoke anti-Jewish sentiment meet in an abandoned yard in the mining district. Samuel asked me to join the group and warn him if they're planning anything. It's after sunset so I should get going.
一伙煽动反犹太情绪的人约定在矿区内的一处废弃庭院里进行会面。塞缪尔打算让我混入其中，还要求我如若得知那伙人有所预谋就立刻向他汇报。此刻黄昏已过，我该动身了。
meetingwi_mam_domluvenou__QrnR
A group who stoke anti-Jewish sentiment meet in an abandoned yard in the mining district. Samuel asked me to join the group and warn him if they're planning anything.
一伙煽动反犹太情绪的人约定在矿区内的一处废弃庭院里进行会面。塞缪尔打算让我混入其中，还要求我如若得知那伙人有所预谋就立刻向他汇报。
meetingwi_na_schuzku_se_s_CKIR

A group who stoke anti-Jewish sentiment meet in an abandoned yard in the mining district. Samuel asked me to join the group and warn him if they're planning anything. But I didn't like the sound of it. It sounded like a trap, so I didn't take it any further. Even so, I have to find Samuel again because he's my only lead. If nothing's changed, he'll be in the synagogue by day and the King Solomon Tavern by night.
一伙煽动反犹太情绪的人约定在矿区内的一处废弃庭院里进行会面。塞缪尔打算让我混入其中，还要求我如若得知那伙人有所预谋就立刻向他汇报。但是我对此心存疑虑，那听起来宛如一个陷阱，所以我没有过分在意。但即便如此，我还是得重新找到塞缪尔，因为他现在是我唯一的线索。不出意外的话，他白天应该就在犹太教堂，而晚上则会待在所罗门王酒馆。
meetingwi_p_na_schuzku_js_KPGm

Samuel tried to get me to go to some meeting of a group who whip up hatred of his people. The idea was to join the group and then tell Samuel what they're planning. The whole thing struck me as suspect, if I'm honest. Telling me all that when he doesn't know me. So I didn't go to the meeting. But now I have to find Samuel again and find out what he knows about Liechtenstein.
有一伙人煽风点火，勾起了人们对塞缪尔及其同伴们的仇视。塞缪尔想让我前去参与他们的会面，并加入其中，以此来替他打探那伙人的行动计划。但实话实说，我对此事心存疑虑，既然他对我并不了解，又为何要将此事告知于我，所以我并没有参与那场会面。不过现在还是得重新找回塞缪尔，我想看看他对列支敦士登有何了解。
meetingwi_samuel_si_se_mn_94r7
A group who stoke anti-Jewish sentiment meet in an abandoned yard in the mining district. Samuel asked me to join the group and warn him if they're planning anything. The meeting starts at sundown.
一伙煽动反犹太情绪的人约定在矿区内的一处废弃庭院里进行会面。塞缪尔打算让我混入其中，还要求我如若得知那伙人有所预谋，就立刻向他汇报。会面将会在日落时分开始。
meetingwi_samuel_si_se_mn_BUST
A group who stoke anti-Jewish sentiment meet in an abandoned yard in the mining district. Samuel asked me to join the group and warn him if they're planning anything. The meeting has already started.
一伙煽动反犹太情绪的人约定在矿区内的一处废弃庭院里进行会面。塞缪尔打算让我混入其中，还要求我如若得知那伙人有所预谋，就立刻向他汇报。会面已经开始了。

Musa advised me how to go about looking for the murderer. First I need to find out what poison was used to kill Chertan. I can also talk to people who got caught up in the murder, or go back to the ammunition store and take another look around.
穆萨向我提供了追查凶手的建议。我得先查明用于毒害赫尔坦的毒药是何物，也可以跟与此次谋杀有所关联的人谈谈，要不就回到火药库再调查一番。
musadlg_i_potrebuju_prozk_JZ0m

To solve this murder, I should first talk to Musa. He was the last person to see Chertan alive. But Grozav has put him under guard. I'll have to lure the guard away from his post somehow. But without killing him, that's the main thing.
要想查明这一谋杀案件，我得先跟穆萨谈谈，他也是赫尔坦死前见到的最后一个人，只不过格罗扎夫已经把他软禁了起来。我得想办法把看管他的守卫引开，但重点是不能杀死守卫。

mysi1_povez_prockovi_co_s_A2qV
Tell Prochek what happened.
向普罗切克汇报情况。
mysi1_povez_prockovi_jak__edTy
Tell Prochek how things went.
将事情经过告知普罗切克。
mysi1_sezen_neco_na_klidn_Q30x
Get something to calm the bull.
找来能让安抚公牛的东西。
mysi1_zabiti_procka_nebo__FcxA
Killing Prochek or Olbram
将普罗切克或者奥尔布拉姆杀死
mysi1_zeptej_se_na_pomoc__9k4O
Ask Radovan the blacksmith for help.
向铁匠拉多万寻求帮助。
mysi_konc_ted_kdyz_uz_jsm_1Jmy
Now that we have decided to resolve the dispute between Tachov and Zhelejov directly on the pasture over which the two villages are arguing, there is no point in helping Prochek with his games.
既然我们已经决定，要直接在塔霍夫和哲勒约夫存有争议的牧场中解决双方的矛盾，那现在就没有必要再帮助普罗切克完成他的把戏了。
nabidni_k_behem_hadky_s_m_mhIi
During an argument with some local fat-heads, I offered help treating the men wounded in the battle. I'm certain the herbalist Klara expects me to fulfil my promise as soon as possible.
在与当地一些蠢货争吵的过程中，我曾提出要协助照顾那些在战斗中负伤的人。想必草药师克拉拉会希望我能尽快履行承诺。
nabidni_k_po_hadce_jsem_z_fMD4
After the argument, I went to see the young herbalist Klara.
在那场争吵之后，我去见了青年草药师克拉拉。
nabrus_ko_o_pomoc_me_poza_6dMQ
I've got Kolda's axe. Now I have to sharpen it and give it back to him.
我拿到了科尔达的斧头。现在我得把它磨利，然后还给他。
nabrus_ko_o_pomoc_me_poza_gGKV

I gave Kolda back his axe nicely sharpened, so now he'll have an easier time building the gallows for Sir Hans... Which wasn't exactly my intention, but like Pa used to say, no one will ever punish you for a good deed. Or something like that...
我把磨好的斧头还给了科尔达，他可以更加轻松地为汉斯爵士建造绞架…这并不是我的本意，但就像我爸常说的，没人会因为你做了一件好事而惩罚你。或者类似的话…
nafasuj_j_dozorem_nad_kuc_9f5B
Janosh Uher has been put in charge of the kitchen and supplies. I should go and get my rations from Janosh so I don't fight on an empty stomach.
亚诺什·乌赫尔负责厨房和补给。我应该去找亚诺什要口粮，以免饿着肚子打仗。
nafasuj_j_dozorem_nad_kuc_fO8T
Janosh Uher has been put in charge of the kitchen and supplies. I need to go and see him if I want to eat.
亚诺什·乌赫尔负责厨房和补给。如果我想吃饭就该去找他。
nahlaseni_getreward_i4QI
Pick up a reward at the bailiff's.
向执行官索要报酬。
nahlaseni_keepthebailiffu_rqmU
Keep the bailiff informed of what the Guild is up to.
随时向执行官通报公会的行动。
nahlaseni_reporttothebail_QizF
Report the Guild to the bailiff.
向执行官举报公会。
nahlas_pl_nahlasil_jsem_r_Exjp
I told the bailiff about what the Guild is planning. I'm supposed to go along with the plan and not to worry - the guards will show up just in time to put a stop to it.
我向执行官举报了公会的计划。他让我继续依照计划行事，不必过多担忧，警卫们将会及时出手，制止罪行。
nahlas_pl_vybral_jsem_si__nvpb
I chose a side. Death to Sigismund and his collaborators!
我做出了选择，就让西格斯蒙德和他的同僚们都去死吧！
nahlas_pl_zacina_jit_do_t_YDD5

Things are starting to get serious. Collapsing the silver mine is a major crime against the crown as well as the city. I'm under no illusions, I know that all accomplices should be executed. I could save my own neck at least by telling the bailiff everything!
局势变得愈发严峻。摧毁银矿场本就是违抗城镇乃至王权的重大罪行，而且我也很清楚，所有共犯将无法逃过处决的惩罚，但至少我还可以向执行官告发此事，进而保住自己的脑袋！
nahlas_se_majordomus_me_p_3QDN
The steward at the Town Hall hired me as the new royal waiter.
得到市政厅管家的聘用，我成为了新任皇家侍从。
nahlas_se_mam_vse_potrebn_bgMh
I have everything I need to apply as a new royal waiter. I'd better hurry down to the Town Hall and see the steward. And I mustn't forget to dress appropriately!
我已做好了一切应聘皇家侍从的准备，现在最好赶快前往市政厅与管家会面，当然也别忘了穿上得体的衣裳！
najdi_a_p_franz_rosenthal_Z0Se

Franz Rosenthal said he had forgotten his gloves in the chapel and was afraid someone would take them if I didn't go and get them for him right away. And while I'm there, I'm supposed to count the winged figures on the paintings…
弗朗茨·罗森塔尔将他的手套落在了教堂，要是不抓紧时间，他很担心那些手套就会落入别人手里，因此让我赶快前去取回。到了那里以后，我还得数一数画像上长着翅膀的人物…
najdi_a_p_najit_rukavice__zJUN
It didn't take me that long to find the gloves, but counting the winged figures will be a chore.
找到那些手套并没有花去我太多时间，但是要数那些长翅膀的人物将会是件麻烦事。
najdi_a_p_tak_se_mi_zda_z_ByWv
I am beginning to think they take me for a fool rather than a waiter. Franz took the gloves, but he made a fool of me with the numbers.
我愈发觉得他们就是在把我当成傻子而非侍从。弗朗茨取走了那些手套，但是却又戏耍了我一番。
najdi_a_p_tohle_nemam_v_p_6NRR
That's not what I signed up for! Let Franz go count the winged monsters himself.
我才懒得做这些事情！让弗朗茨自己数那些长翅膀的怪物去吧。
najdi_a_v_konrad_mi_popsa_ma80

Konrad told me that he buried his friend Ambrose somewhere close by. His grave is above the hermit's hovel, at the edge of a meadow. The spot is marked by two entangled birch trees, as well as the broken sword I'm looking for.
康拉德告诉我，他把朋友安布洛斯埋在附近。他的坟墓位于隐士小屋的上方，在一片草地的边缘。埋葬地有两棵相互缠绕的白桦树，我正在寻找的那把断剑也在那里。
najdi_a_v_mam_se_podivat__1JXm
I'm supposed to look for the stolen Striped Tonies miners' standard.
我要寻找被盗的条纹托尼帮的旗杆。
najdi_a_v_nasel_jsem_zast_VVbW
I found the lost St. Anthony standard in the stash of a band of cutthroats.
我在一伙盗贼的赃物中找到了丢失的圣安东尼旗杆。
najdi_a_v_v_poustevnikove_bkVG
I did indeed find the broken old sword at the hermit's grave. You can tell at first glance that it's a precious piece made of steel by the master craftsmen of Toledo.
我的确在隐士的墓前找到了那把断剑。一看就知道，这是托莱多的工匠大师用钢铁铸造的宝剑。
najdi_a_v_zastavu_svateho_v8s6

I finally tracked down the St. Anthony standard beyond the walls of Kuttenberg in a mill in Danemark. Joerg Preng, the foreman of the All Saints, sold it to a merchant called Hensel, but then Hensel was robbed of it by a band of outlaws. It seems the standard brings bad luck to anyone who seizes it.
我终于在库滕堡城墙之外丹恩麦的一家磨坊里追踪到了圣安东尼旗杆。圣徒矿场的领班乔格·普伦把它卖给了一个叫亨泽尔的商人，但后来一伙亡命之徒把它从亨泽尔手中抢了去。这个旗杆似乎会给夺取它的人带来厄运。
najdi_a_v_ze_zapisniku_ko_yY6k
I learnt from Konrad's diary that the knight buried his friend at the edge of the meadow above his hovel. The spot is marked by two entangled birch trees, as well as the broken sword I'm looking for.
我从康拉德的日记中得知，骑士把他的朋友埋葬在他小屋上方的草地边缘。埋葬地有两棵相互缠绕的白桦树，我正在寻找的那把断剑也在那里。
najdi_a_v_ztratil_jsem_i__B5z1
I lost the last trace.
我失去了最后的线索。
najdi_ban_musel_jsem_naji_IhxE
Matthew and his men ambushed me on the road outside of Miskowitz. Luckily, he's a reasonable bloke and we parted on good terms.
马修和他的手下在通往米斯科维茨的路上袭击了我，但好在他是个通情达理之人，最终我们握手言和，送别了彼此。
najdi_ban_musel_jsem_naji_qFEk
I found Matthew's camp in the woods near Miskowitz. But we couldn't come to an agreement and he attacked me with his men. He won't be returning to the Dry Devil now.
我在米斯科维茨附近的树林里找到了马修的营地，但我们未能达成共识，他带着手下对我发起攻击。现在，他再也无法回到“酒鬼”身边了。
najdi_ban_musel_jsem_naji_quK7
Matthew and his men ambushed me on the road outside of Miskowitz, so I had to defend myself. He won't be returning to the Dry Devil now.
马修和他的手下在通往米斯科维茨的路上袭击了我，所以我不得不拔剑自保。如今他再也回不到“酒鬼”身边了。
najdi_ban_musel_jsem_naji_sq58
I found Matthew's camp in the woods near Miskowitz. I tried to convince him to return to the Dry Devil, but he's having none of it. He'd rather keep robbing.
我在米斯科维茨附近的树林里找到了马修的营地。尽管我试图说服他回到“酒鬼”身边，但他并无此意，只想继续肆行劫掠。
najdi_ban_musim_najit_ban_7px8

I needed to find Matthew, but it looks like he found me first. He and his men ambushed me on the road. But I didn't want to take chances and I ran away. Now I'll have to go looking for him again on the roads between Miskowitz and Suchdol, where he obviously robs people.
我本该找到马修，可现在看来他却亲自找上了门来。我在路上遭到了他和他手下的伏击，但我并不想冒险，因此拔腿就跑。显而易见，马修果然就在米斯科维茨和苏赫多尔之间的路上抢劫，现在我得再回去找他。
najdi_ban_musim_najit_ban_RSpB
I needed to find Matthew, but it looks like he found me first. He and his men ambushed me on the road. I need to talk to him. Maybe he will let me go if I tell him the Dry Devil sent me.
我本该找到马修，可现在看来他却亲自找上了门来。我在路上遭到了他和他手下的伏击，现在我得跟他谈谈，让他知道是“酒鬼”将我派来的，没准他会把我放走。
najdi_ban_musim_najit_ban_yAaC
Matthew is said to ambush travellers somewhere between Miskowitz and Suchdol. I should look around those trails then. Maybe I'll run into him.
据说马修就在米斯科维茨和苏赫多尔之间的某地伏击过往行人，我得调查那些踪迹，说不定会撞上他。
najdi_ban_nasel_jsem_band_Oc4A
I found Matthew's camp in the woods near Miskowitz. Hopefully I'll find him too.
我在米斯科维茨附近的树林里发现了马修的营地，但愿我也能找到他。
najdi_cer_dostal_jsem_z_t_1xQA

This is the second time the fellah fooled me. I hope he will tell me the truth the third time around. The devils are said to have taken up residence in the palace under the Crone and conjured up a door near the women's chamber. I hope I can overpower them.
这已经是那家伙第二次捉弄我了，希望第三次他能说出真相。据说那些魔鬼在老妪塔下方的宫殿里住了下来，它们还在妇女们的房间旁召唤出了一扇门，但愿我能将其制服。
najdi_cer_misto_u_strazni_V43a

Many devils were said to be stinking up the guardhouse in the west courtyard with the arena. I found the place, but it was just a garderobe where the guards go to take a shit. The blacksmith must have been confused.
据说很多魔鬼将竞技场西边庭院内的警卫室弄得臭气熏天。我找到了那个地方，但那不过是守卫们用来排泄的衣柜间而已，那个铁匠一定是搞错了。
najdi_cer_sel_jsem_na_mis_g4Wi
The blacksmith swore he knew about the devils' hiding places, but he sent me to castle garderobes twice. And the third time? In the palace under the Crone I found… of course, another toilet!
铁匠发誓说他了解那些魔鬼的藏身之处，但竟两次将我派去城堡中的衣柜那里。那第三次会怎样？我在老妪塔下方的宫殿里发现了......不出所料，又是个厕所！
najdi_cer_spousta_certu_p_7Bir
Many devils are said to be stinking up the guardhouse in the west courtyard with the arena. I will go check it out. I hope that should anything happen the soldiers will help me.
据说有很多魔鬼将竞技场西边庭院内的警卫室弄得臭气熏天，我要去那里看看。万一发生了什么事，希望那里的士兵能够帮助我。
najdi_cer_tajemny_dvere_j_4878
The devils were said to be appearing in mysterious doors in the palace chambers under the Maiden. I found the door, but it just lead to another toilet. The blacksmith must be yanking my pizzle.
据说那些魔鬼出现在了少女塔下方宫殿房间的神秘之门里。我找到了那扇门，发现它不过是通往另一间厕所而已，那个铁匠肯定是在瞎扯淡。
najdi_cer_v_hradnich_komn_8eKQ

He said there are doors sometimes appearing near of Otto von Bergow's chambers in the palace under the Maiden and the devils are peeking out of them. If they want to drag me down to hell, Lord Capon will come to my rescue.
他说在少女塔下方宫殿里的奥托·冯·波尔高房间附近有时候会出现一些门，那些魔鬼就从门后窥探着人间。如果它们想把我拖进地狱里，卡蓬领主一定会来救我的。
najdi_ces_druhy_zasek_odr_aJ3O
A second barricade cut off our cavalry van from the infantry in a narrow forest gorge. It was another massacre, just like the one up in the rocks.
在狭窄的树林峡谷内，又有一个路障将我们的骑兵与步兵分隔开来。又一场腥风血雨席卷于此，就像发生在山岩上的一样。
najdi_ces_potreboval_jsem_ZDNS
I needed to get into the wedding party and, finally, I found a way.
我得进入那场婚宴，而最终我也找到了办法。
najdi_ces_potrebuju_se_do_ufWk
I need to get into the wedding party.
我得进入那场婚宴。
najdi_ces_pres_cestu_je_d_HAMV
There's an obstacle blocking the path. I have to find a way round the barricade. Capon is covering my back. I have to act fast, otherwise we're finished!
有个路障挡住了去路，我必须想办法绕过它。卡蓬正在给我打掩护，我必须快点，否则我们都要命丧黄泉！
najdi_ces_pri_hledani_kos_Q5i6
In my search for bones, I fell into an underground crypt full of… Well, even more bones. I should get out as fast as I can, but first I need to gather more bones for the pyramids up in the chapel.
在我寻找骨头的过程中，我掉进了一个地下墓室，里面全是……呃，更多的骨头。我应该尽快离开这里，但在此之前我需要为教堂的骨堆收集更多骨头。
najdi_dev_aby_dostal_tu_s_8bU3

I was told I can find this fearless Enneleyn in the nomads' camp by the Rocktower pond. I heard she'll likely ask for quite a tidy sum in return, so let's hope she agrees to take part in our plan and doesn't ruin me and Kreyzl in the process.
有人告诉我，可以在石塔池塘边的游牧民营地里找到这位无所畏惧的恩内琳。我听说她可能会索要一笔数目不小的报酬，希望她能同意参加我们的计划，并且别在这个过程中毁了我和克雷泽的生活吧。
najdi_dev_aby_dostal_tu_s_DKek

This time, Kreyzl doesn't even want me to steal the book. He's found some girl called Enneleyn for that. He'll take her to the Semine wedding and dangle her like bait in front of Chamberlain Ulrich's eyes. I ended up going to the wedding with the Tachov blacksmith, so it's hard to say how that turned out.
这次，克雷泽甚至都不想让我去偷书。他找来了一个叫恩内琳的姑娘做这件事。他会带她去参加塞米的婚礼，然后让她作为诱饵在总管乌尔里希面前晃悠。最后我和塔霍夫的铁匠去参加了婚礼，所以结果如何就不好说了。
najdi_dev_aby_dostal_tu_s_KDFu

I was told I can find this fearless Enneleyn in the nomads' camp by the Rocktower pond. I heard she'll likely ask for quite a tidy sum in return, so let's hope she agrees to take part in our plan and doesn't ruin me and Kreyzl in the process. The locals says she's usually by the pond or with the horses.
有人告诉我，可以在石塔池塘边的游牧民营地里找到这位无所畏惧的恩内琳。我听说她可能会索要一笔数目不小的报酬，希望她能同意参加我们的计划，并且别在这个过程中毁了我和克雷泽的生活吧。当地人说她通常会在池塘边，或者和马儿在一起。
najdi_dev_aby_dostal_tu_s_X2jJ

I was supposed to find this fearless Enneleyn in the nomads' camp by the Rocktower Pond. I had heard she was likely to ask for quite a tidy sum in return, but she turned out to be a reasonable and experienced woman and more importantly, she agreed to the plan. I even got the impression she was really looking forward to meeting the chamberlain.
我应该在石塔池塘边的游牧民营地里找到这位无所畏惧的恩内琳。我听说她可能会索要一笔数目不小的报酬，但结果她是位通情达理且老练的女人，更重要的是，她同意了这个计划。我甚至感觉她实际上非常期待见到总管。
najdi_haj_slibil_jsem_haj_Y4w2
I promised to check on Vostatek. I finally found him completely drunk in the corner of the fortress
我承诺过会看住沃斯塔克，最后却发现他窝在堡垒的角落里，早已烂醉如泥。
najdi_haj_slibil_jsem_haj_yT4T
I promised to check on Vostatek.
我承诺过会看住沃斯塔克。
najdi_han_musel_jsem_naji_6Nai
When I rescued Adder, he started asking about Janosh. He said they were last in Miskowitz together. That's where I found him. In the pillory! He was there because he had injured one of the locals.
救下了阿德尔之后，他开始谈起了亚诺什。据说他们最后一次碰面是在米斯科维茨，而我也在那里的示众台处找到了身着木枷的亚诺什！这全然是因为他伤害了本地的一位村民。
najdi_han_musel_jsem_naji_eKfe

When I rescued Adder, he started asking about Janosh. He said they were last in Miskowitz, so I promised him I'd look for him there. The Miskowitz Bailiff told me that Janosh was in the pillory because he had seriously injured one of the locals.
救下了阿德尔之后，他开始谈起了亚诺什。据说他们最后一次碰面是在米斯科维茨，我答应了他会到那里去寻找亚诺什。米斯科维茨的执行官告诉我，因亚诺什重伤了一个村民，他现已被套上木枷示众。
najdi_han_potreboval_jsem_htKM

When I rescued Adder, he started asking about Janosh. He said they were last in Miskowitz together. That's where I found him. In the pillory! I didn't waste any time and got him out of there immediately.
救下了阿德尔之后，他开始谈起了亚诺什。据说他们最后一次碰面是在米斯科维茨，而我也在那里的示众台处找到了身着木枷的亚诺什！我没有浪费时间，立马带他离开了那里。
najdi_han_potrebuji_naji__abD0
When I rescued Adder, he started asking about Janosh. He said they were last in Miskowitz, so I promised him I'd look for him there.
救下了阿德尔之后，他开始谈起了亚诺什。据说他们最后一次碰面是在米斯科维茨，我答应了他会到那里去寻找亚诺什。
najdi_han_potrebuju_naji__xYKY

When I rescued Adder, he started asking about Janosh. He said they were last in Miskowitz, so I promised him I'd look for him there. The local innkeeper told me to go straight to the pillory, saying I'd find Janosh there.
救下了阿德尔之后，他开始谈起了亚诺什。据说他们最后一次碰面是在米斯科维茨，我答应了他会到那里去寻找亚诺什。当地的旅店老板让我直接到示众台去看看，他说亚诺什应该就在那里。
najdi_hej_jedinou_nasi_na_Ie57
Our one and only hope is Captain Thomas, but he's badly wounded. As it doesn't look good for him, the garrison have moved him into the chapel in Maiden Tower, hoping help will come from above.
托马斯队长是我们唯一的希望，但如今他已身负重伤。因其状态不佳，守备军已将他转移到少女塔内的小教堂里，祈求上帝的庇佑。
najdi_hej_od_zacatku_bykl_fBPg

It was clear from the start that I had to find the wounded Captain Thomas, who'd been moved into the chapel in Maiden Tower during the night. Unfortunately, Thomas was in a worse state than I'd expected - feverish and delirious. There was no way he could testify that me and Sir Hans are envoys from Rattay.
目标从一开始就很明确，我必须找到负伤的托马斯队长，他在夜间已被转移到了少女塔内的小教堂里。不幸的是，托马斯的状况比我预想中的更为恶劣，负伤的他早已浑身发烫、神志不清，这样的他根本无法证明汉斯爵士和我就是来自拉泰的特使。
najdi_jan_chtelo_to_troch_V0wv
It took a few threats, but I learned from Lady Ophelia that Capon is locked up on the top floor of the Maleshov tower.
通过严词威逼，我从奥菲利亚夫人那里了解到，卡蓬就被关在马列索夫塔的顶层。
najdi_jan_od_kucharky_dra_NeRP
It took a bit of… convincing, but I learned from the cook Drahomira that Capon is locked up on the top floor of the main tower.
尽管费了些......口舌，但我还是从女厨德侯米娅那里了解到，卡蓬就被关在主塔的顶楼里。
najdi_jan_podarilo_se_mi__QB56
I managed to deceive Lady Ophelia that I was a nobleman visiting Lord von Bergow. She even offered me a place to stay!
在我的欺瞒之下，奥菲利亚夫人以为我是来探访冯·波尔高领主的贵族。她对此深信不疑，甚至还给我安排了住处！
najdi_jan_slava_nasel_jse_P6RG
Hurray! I found Hans Capon. And Fortune was on my side since the castle garrison is oblivious to my presence… so far.
很好！我找到了汉斯·卡蓬！好运眷顾着我，因为城堡守备部队没有察觉到我的存在…到目前为止还没有。
najdi_jan_slava_nasel_jse_vrzk
Hurray! I found Hans Capon. But Fortune was not entirely on my side this time. I was caught red-handed and the alarm was raised in the fortress…
很好！我找到了汉斯·卡蓬！但这次好运并未眷顾我。我被当场抓住，堡垒里发出了警报…
najdi_jan_ted_zbyva_jen_n_1Of4
Now I just need to find Capon. But I have to be careful not to betray my presence to the castle garrison.
现在我只需要找到卡蓬。但我必须小心，不要让城堡守备部队察觉到我。
najdi_jan_z_pacholka_vitk_S4Hz

I found out from the stable boy Vitek that Capon is locked up on the top floor of the main tower. Lady Ophelia, von Bergow’s companion, also lives somewhere in the tower. I don't know what to make of that, but it’s better to know than to not know.
我从马童维特克那里了解到，卡蓬就被关在主塔的顶楼里，而冯·波尔高的女伴奥菲利亚夫人也住在塔楼之中。我尚不清楚这意味着什么，但能得知此消息终归是好事。
najdi_jan_z_pacholka_vitk_WRWR
I found out from the stable boy Vitek that Capon is locked up on the top floor of the main tower. The cook Drahomira should have the keys to the tower and to Capon’s room.
我从马童维特克那里了解到，卡蓬被关在主塔的顶楼里。进入塔楼和卡蓬所在房间的钥匙应该就在厨师德侯米娅手里。
najdi_kar_souhlasil_jsem__AjL5

I agreed to help the bandits and bring them the magic arrow that's stuck in their dead leader's head. They didn't give me much advice on where to look, though. The only hint I got was that the grave might be somewhere in Sedletz. I asked the local gravedigger. He was very unpleasant at first, but in the end he helped me. He buried the leader of the bandits, Karel, under the big willow tree next to the cemetery.
我同意帮助这些强盗，去把插在他们首领尸首头部的魔箭带给他们。不过，至于去哪里找，他们没说明。我得到的唯一提示是，坟墓可能位于塞德莱茨的某个地方。我询问了当地的掘墓人。他起初很不高兴，但最后还是帮了我。他把强盗首领卡雷尔埋在了公墓旁边的大柳树下。
najdi_kar_souhlasil_jsem__ops9

I agreed to help the bandits and bring them the magic arrow that's stuck in their dead leader's head. Unfortunately, they're not sure where their chief is buried. Maybe at the Sedletz cemetery. Well, I'll have a look around there.
我同意帮助这些强盗，去把插在他们首领尸首头部的魔箭带给他们。不幸的是，他们不确定自己的首领埋在哪里。也许在塞德莱茨公墓。好吧，我去那里看看。
najdi_kar_souhlasil_jsem__VYWC

I agreed to help the bandits and bring them the magic arrow that's stuck in their dead leader's head. I found the grave in Sedletz and pulled the arrow from the corpse. I have to say, this was a really weird job, but I have the arrow.
我同意帮助这些强盗，去把插在他们首领尸首头部的魔箭带给他们。我在塞德莱茨找到了坟墓，从尸首上拔出了箭。我不得不说，这份差事实在奇怪，但我拿到了那支箭。
najdi_kar_souhlasil_jsem__YqF2
I agreed to help the bandits and bring them the magic arrow that's stuck in their dead leader's head, but sometimes plans change. I'm not going to help them.
我同意帮助这些强盗，去把插在他们首领尸首头部的魔箭带给他们，但有时计划会改变。我不打算帮助他们了。
najdi_kom_komar_se_kamsi__0t9O
But Adder has wandered off somewhere. We have to find him.
但是阿德尔早已溜到了别处，我们得找到他。
najdi_kom_komar_se_zdrzel_4ksn
It's just that Adder couldn't control his lust and got held up in the kitchen with a cook.
没想到阿德尔竟按耐不住自己的欲望，在厨房里与一位厨师搞到了一起。
najdi_kom_musim_najit_kom_vxkm
When I asked where I could find Adder now, the innkeeper sent me to the butcher's wife. She told me that her husband thinks she had an affair with Adder, and he wants to kill him.
就在我打探阿德尔下落的过程中，旅店老板让我去找屠夫的妻子。我从那位妇人口中得知，她的丈夫认为她与阿德尔通奸，所以他想杀了阿德尔。
najdi_kon_byla_krasne_jas_XC2t

It was time to leave. The night was clear and warm, and I met Sam and Godwin on the ramparts. None of us felt like talking, so Godwin gave us our last rites - a blessing, I mean.
The plan's simple: me and Sam will climb down a rope from the ramparts and steal horses in the enemy camp. Then we'll ride to Jobst and ask for his help. His army will wipe the floor with that Prague rabble!
Sam made the rope fast and went first. Shortly after, I followed him down, but things went wrong as usual! Sam wasn't there when I reached the ground!

是时候离开这里了。当天晚上明亮又温暖，我在城垛上碰到了塞缪尔和古德温。当时我们都无意交流，于是古德温为我们举行了最后的圣礼……我是说，向我们致上了最后的祝福。
我们此行的计划简单明了：塞缪尔与我二人将顺着城墙边的绳索离开，在敌人营地内偷走马匹，随后骑马前去寻找约布斯特以获取他的帮助。他的军队一定会把那群布拉格混蛋全都干翻在地！
塞缪尔很快就准备好了绳索，并已先行离开。片刻后我也紧随其后，但坏事竟也“如期而至”！刚抵达地面的我压根没有看到塞缪尔的踪影！
najdi_kon_nasel_jsem_kone_fiBm
I found a horse and set off to get help. I've no idea where Sam is. I hope they haven't caught him. His stubbornness is just causing more problems! I hope he's already set off.
我找来一匹马后便启程外出寻求帮助。不知道塞缪尔现在身处何处，他的那股倔强只会让他麻烦不断，只希望他还没有被抓住，也但愿他早已在旅途之中。
najdi_kon_p_naslas_ho__ne_akTp
Kurva! They caught Sam! I knew he wouldn't make it as soon as I saw him. I had to leave him there! What else could I do?! I'll be back for him as soon as I can! I'll pray for you, Sam.
Kurva（该死）！他们居然抓住了塞缪尔！看到他的状况就知道他已难堪大任，我别无选择，所以不得不把他留在那里！我一定会尽快回来救他的！塞缪尔，我会为你祈祷的！
najdi_kon_prisel_za_mnou__4vsv

The Chamberlain came to me, devastated, asking where the concubine had gone. He is all down in the mouth. I have to find her before I get in trouble. Last thing I need is to get thrown out of the wedding before Lord von Bergow even arrives. He said some young fop he doesn't know has been hanging around her. He gave me a few clues to help me in my search. Eventually I found out that it was none other than our Lord Capon, whom I found with the concubine. But before he could talk to her, a drunken Vuytek came and started raising hell. I had to get rid of him first. That was a piece of cake. I think he won't be causing any more trouble. However, the concubine said she would not return to the Chamberlain because he was weird. I'm supposed to make up an excuse for her. She gave me a ring he had gifted her as proof.

管家找到我询问小妾的下落，心急如焚的他神态尽显忧愁。趁着陷入麻烦之前我得赶紧找到那位小妾，毕竟我可不想在冯·波尔高大人抵达之前就被赶出婚宴。据管家所言，一位衣着讲究的陌生男子曾出现在小妾身边。为协助我进行寻找，管家还给我提供了一些线索。而最终我也查明，那位与小妾待在一起的男子不是别人，正是我们的卡蓬大人。他还没能与小妾说上几句，醉醺醺的维特克突然冒了出来，开始大肆捣乱。我不得不先把维特克解决掉，好在这不过是小菜一碟，估计今后他也不会再到处捣乱了。后来，那位小妾却告诉我，因管家性格古怪，她不打算再回到他身边。小妾还将管家赠予的戒指交给了我作为证据，而我需要编造借口为她开脱。
najdi_kon_prisel_za_mnou__ijYu

She gave me a ring he had gifted her as proof.

najdi_kon_p_staje_sou_tam_lmoW
Now I know where they keep the horses. That should speed things up a lot.
现在我知道他们的马匹在哪里，应该能替我提高不少办事效率。
najdi_kon_sakra_vojaci_ch_TZV6

It was a terribly hard decision to make, but two on one horse? We'd never have reached Jobst in time. I had to leave Sam there. Kurva! It breaks my heart, but what choice did I have?! I'll be back for him as soon as I can! I'll pray for you, Sam.
这简直让人左右为难，但是怎么可能让两个人骑着一匹马呢？这样的话我们永远都别想及时找到约布斯特，所以我不得不把塞缪尔留下，Kurva（该死）！我还有别的选择吗？！只能忍痛割爱。我一定会尽快回去找他的！我为你祈祷，塞缪尔。
najdi_kon_situace_na_tvrz_tRNl

I took Sam on my back and carried him to the stables. I couldn't just leave him there - a half-brother is still a brother! I helped him get on the horse and sat behind him so I could hold onto him. It will take a lot longer to reach Jobst this way, but if it saves his life, it'll be worth it.
我背起塞缪尔，将他带到了马厩。我不能就这样对他置之不理，就算是继兄弟也有血缘关系！我协助他登上了马背，并坐在后方以便将他搀扶。现在要想赶去约布斯特那里将会花去更多的时间，但是如果能救下塞缪尔的命也是值得的。
najdi_kon_splnil_jsem_roz_MD8m
I found a horse and set off to get help. I've no idea where Sam is. If he'd waited for me, we could have gone together, but he's too stubborn for that. I hope he's already set off.
我找来一匹马后便启程外出寻求帮助。不知道塞缪尔现在身处何处，他就应该等着我一起出发，他真是太固执了，但愿他已经离开。
najdi_kos_drevorubec_kter_r3DI
The woodcutter who found the bones is dead. I have to find them by myself. Slava advised me to explore the woods around Bylany.
那位发现了那些骨头的伐木工人死了，因此我不得不独自寻找。斯拉瓦建议我到比兰尼附近的树林里一探究竟。
najdi_kos_kosti_jsem_nase_1miN
I found the bones in the woods, not far from Mesoles.
就在梅索莱斯不远处的树林里，我找到了那些骨头。
najdi_kos_kosti_uz_byly_p_UJ0F
The bones were gone when I found the spot.
当我抵达目的地时才发现骨头早已不见踪影。
najdi_koz_kuzi_z_bileho_s_wP7u
I found the white roebuck's hide in the poachers' camp.
我在偷猎者的营地找到了白獐皮。
najdi_koz_pokud_pytlaci_k_dGfl
If the poachers didn't sell the white roebuck's hide, it must be hidden somewhere in their camp.
如果偷猎者没有卖掉白獐皮，那么它肯定就藏在他们的营地里。
najdi_kri_mym_pruvodcem_a_gF6i

My investigation in the Horschan royal mines is aided by Christian of Pisek, brother of the former Mint Master and lord of Suchdol, Peter. Christian is Vavak's direct subordinate, steward of the royal mint in the Italian Court, but since he wanted the Mint Master office for himself and Vavak beat him to it thanks to his connection to Sigismund, he has a personal interest in a successful investigation. I went to see him and proved my allegiance using Ruthard's password "via argentum".
我在针对霍斯昌皇家矿场的调查中将会得到皮塞克的克里斯蒂安的帮助。此人曾是苏赫多尔领主兼前任铸币官彼得的兄弟，而如今的他正是瓦万克的直系下属，即意大利宫皇家铸币厂的管家。克里斯蒂安原本想为自己争得铸币师的官职，却在竞争中因瓦万克借助了西格斯蒙德的关系而落败，出于个人恩怨，他对完成一次成功的调查应该饶有兴致。我去见了他一面，并凭借鲁瑟德提供的暗号“via argentum”，银之路，证明了我的忠诚。
najdi_kri_mym_pruvodcem_a_IGFY

My investigation in the Horschan royal mines is to be aided by Christian of Pisek, brother of the former Mint Master and lord of Suchdol, Peter. Christian is Vavak's direct subordinate, steward of the royal mint in the Italian Court. Since he wanted the Mint Master office for himself and Vavak beat him to it due to his connection with Sigismund, he should have a personal interest in a successful investigation. I must go and see him and prove my allegiance using Ruthard's password "via argentum".

我在针对霍斯昌皇家矿场的调查中将会得到皮塞克的克里斯蒂安的帮助。此人曾是苏赫多尔领主兼前任铸币师彼得的兄弟，而如今的他正是瓦万克的直系下属，即意大利宫皇家铸币厂的管家。克里斯蒂安原本想为自己争得铸币师的官职，却在竞争中因瓦万克借助了西格斯蒙德的关系而落败，出于个人恩怨，他对进行一次成功的调查应该饶有兴致。我必须去见他一面，并凭借鲁瑟德提供的暗号“via argentum”，银之路，来证明我的忠诚。
najdi_kun_abych_vysvobodi_5ef4

I learned from Liechtenstein that my best option to rescue Lord Capon is to contact Kunzlin Ruthard, a wealthy nobleman and mine owner. Because of his loyalty to Wenceslas, he fell from grace and lost a number of holdings, including the Maleshov fortress, which Sigismund then gave to von Bergow. If anyone knows how to get into the fortress undetected, it's him. I went to visit him in his Kuttenberg residence, Ruthard Palace.
我从列支敦士登那里得知，跟昆兹林·鲁瑟德取得联系是营救卡蓬的最优选择。昆兹林·鲁瑟德不仅是个富有的贵族，还是个矿主，曾因效忠于瓦茨拉夫而导致自身地位一落千丈，还因此失去了大量财产，其中就包括后来被西格斯蒙德转让给冯·波尔高的马列索夫堡垒。如果有人知道如何悄无声息地潜入那座堡垒的话，就得非他莫属。我到库滕堡的鲁瑟德宫跟他见了一面。
najdi_kun_jan_ptacek_je_v_XI0Y

So I was wading through rotting sewage until I found Ranyek at its bottom.
我在这摊烂池臭水中艰难跋涉，直到在水底找到拉涅克。
najdi_luk_dostal_jsem_na__zsWO
So now I'm wading through rotten sewage to find Ranyek at its bottom.
现在我得踩过这摊烂池臭水，从水底捞出拉涅克。

They said I should find him. Fuck that! Let them find him themselves. No way I'm doing that.
他们想让我找到他，但是去他妈的！他们自己找去吧，我才不干。
