但他们把我痛揍了一顿，我不得不踩过这摊烂池臭水，直到从水底找到拉涅克。
najdi_luk_nez_abych_dosta_pJwN
But they beat me up and now I have to wade through rotting sewage to find Ranyek at its bottom.
但他们把我痛揍了一顿，现在我必须踩过这摊烂池臭水，从水底捞出拉涅克。
najdi_mat_ted_musim_najit_pW40

Now I have to find Matthew without the bailiff's help. From Kubyenka, I only know that he's raiding near Miskowitz but that's so much area to cover that it could take forever to find him. But if he really is raiding there, maybe he'll find me.
现在即便缺少执行官的帮助，我也得找到马修。库宾卡只知道马修正在米斯科维茨周边抢劫，但是那里地域广阔，估计我下辈子都找不到他。不过，如果他真的在那里抢劫，没准他会亲自找上我。
najdi_mec_konecne_jsem_na_Qivo
I finally found the guild sword.
我终于找到了那把行会剑。
najdi_mec_menhart_je_mrtv_YP7a
Menhard is dead, that sword would be useless to him now.
门哈德已经死了，现在那把剑对他来说也失去了意义。
najdi_mec_nasel_jsem_ryti_dkbR
I found an engraving depicting Sir Valentine with his sword.
我发现了一板描绘着持剑瓦伦丁爵士的版画。
najdi_mec_nebylo_to_zrovn_uPrM
Now all that is left is to find the sword.
现在只需找到那把剑即可。
najdi_mec_nedaleko_sedlec_XCYc
It isn't exactly the cleanest work in the world, but why not? Going into a crypt and finding a sword there can't be that hard.
如此差事或许会受到世人唾弃，但那又何妨？不过是前往教堂墓穴找到一把佩剑而已。
najdi_mec__potreba_najit__BPTg
No matter the cost I must find the lost guild sword for Menhard.
无论付出怎样的代价，我都必须为门哈德找到那把遗失的行会剑。
najdi_mec_prisel_za_mnou__0Qi1

The blacksmith came to me sick with worry and told me he couldn't find the sword for young Lord Semine. We have to find it or we're in trouble. He said he had no idea how he lost it. Maybe someone took it. He told me there was some young fop he didn't recognise skulking about. He gave me a few clues to help me in my search. Fortunately, I didn't have to look for him at all, because I had already found the sword. I'll probably never know who took it though.
铁匠满脸愁容地来见我，说他找不到塞米少主的那把剑了，但我们必须将其找回，否则必定麻烦缠身。至于那把剑是如何遗失的，铁匠也不知道，或许被人拿走了也说不定呢。铁匠说有个生面孔的穿着讲究的青年在附近鬼鬼祟祟。对于该去哪里找那小伙子，我有了些头绪。但走运的我已无需再继续寻找那人了，因为我已经找到了那把剑。至于拿走剑的人是谁，可能永远是个谜了。
najdi_mec_prisel_za_mnou__NrqX

The blacksmith came to me sick with worry and told me he couldn't find the sword for young Lord Semine. We have to find it or we're in trouble. He said he had no idea how he lost it. Maybe someone took it. He said there was some young fop he didn't recognise skulking about. He doesn't really remember much about him, but at least he gave me a few clues. I have to find him because he's my only lead.
铁匠满脸愁容地来见我，说他找不到塞米少主的那把剑了，但我们必须将其找回，否则必定麻烦缠身。至于那把剑是如何遗失的，铁匠也不知道，或许被人拿走了也说不定呢。铁匠说有个生面孔的穿着讲究的青年在附近鬼鬼祟祟。虽然他想不起其他细节了，但至少我也有了些头绪。我必须找到那个人，这是我唯一的线索。
najdi_mec_prisel_za_mnou__uK4c

The blacksmith came to me sick with worry and told me he couldn't find the sword for young Lord Semine. We have to find it or we're in trouble. He said he had no idea how he lost it. Maybe someone took it. He told me there was some young fop he didn't recognise skulking about. He gave me a few clues and I managed to find the lad. It turned out to be none other than our Lord Capon. I had to get him out of a jam related to some girl before he told me that the Bailiff's son Svatya had taken the sword. When I talked to him, I managed to get him to tell me why he had taken the sword and, more importantly, where he had hidden it.

铁匠满脸愁容地来见我，说他找不到塞米少主的那把剑了，但我们必须将其找回，否则必定麻烦缠身。至于那把剑是如何遗失的，铁匠也毫无头绪，或许被人拿走了也说不定呢。铁匠还注意到了某个行迹可疑、着装讲究的青年在附近出没。通过铁匠提供的线索，我找到了那名青年，谁曾想到他不是别人，竟是我们的卡蓬大人。我先是帮他从一个姑娘那里解了围，然后他才告诉我执行官之子斯瓦蒂亚把剑拿走了。通过与斯瓦蒂亚交谈，我成功让他说出了拿走剑的缘由，更关键的是，我让他交代了剑的下落。
najdi_mec_prisel_za_mnou__Vcrj

The blacksmith came to me sick with worry and told me he couldn't find the sword for young Lord Semine. We have to find it or we're in trouble. He said he had no idea how he lost it. Maybe someone took it. He told me there was some young fop he didn't recognise skulking about. He gave me a few clues and I managed to find the lad. It turned out to be none other than our Lord Capon. I had to get him out of a jam related to some girl before he told me that the Bailiff's son Svatya had taken the sword. I talked to Svatya but couldn't get him to tell me what he'd done with the sword. I'll have to find it myself. Lord Capon said he saw him take the sword from the blacksmith by the latrine near the gate and then disappear with it on the battlements. Then he saw him emerging from the corner of the courtyard under the dove-cote and leaving without the sword. It's gotta be somewhere between those two places.

铁匠满脸愁容地来见我，说他找不到塞米少主的那把剑了，但我们必须将其找回，否则必定麻烦缠身。至于那把剑是如何遗失的，铁匠也不知道，或许被人拿走了也说不定呢。铁匠说有个生面孔的穿着讲究的青年在附近鬼鬼祟祟。通过铁匠提供的线索，我找到了那小伙子，谁曾想到他不是别人，竟是我们的卡蓬大人。我先是帮他从一个姑娘那里解了围，然后他才告诉我执行官之子斯瓦蒂亚把剑拿走了。尽管我已与斯瓦蒂亚交谈，却没能从他那里得知那把剑现在何处，因此我不得不亲自寻找。卡蓬说他曾看到斯瓦蒂亚从大门旁的公厕边把铁匠的剑拿走，随后便消失在了城墙之上，而后他竟又在鸽舍之下的庭院角落里现身，离开时身上并未携带那把剑。看来，那把剑应该就在这两个地点之间的某个地方。
najdi_mec_prisel_za_mnou__wLk1

The blacksmith came to me sick with worry and told me he couldn't find the sword for young Lord Semine. We have to find it or we're in trouble. He said he had no idea how he lost it. Maybe someone took it. He told me there was some young fop he didn't recognise skulking about. He gave me a few clues and I managed to find the lad. It turned out to be none other than our Lord Capon. I had to get him out of a jam related to some girl before he told me that the Bailiff's son Svatya had taken the sword. He saw him take it from the blacksmith by the latrine near the gate and then disappear with it on the battlements. Then he saw him emerging from the corner of the courtyard under the dove-cote and leaving without the sword. I should probably talk to Svatya. Maybe he'll tell me what he did with the sword.

铁匠满脸愁容地来见我，说他找不到塞米少主的那把剑了，但我们必须将其找回，否则必定麻烦缠身。至于那把剑是如何遗失的，铁匠也不知道，或许被人拿走了也说不定呢。铁匠说有个生面孔的穿着讲究的青年在附近鬼鬼祟祟。通过铁匠提供的线索，我找到了那小伙子，谁曾想到他不是别人，竟是我们的卡蓬大人。我先是帮他从一个姑娘那里解了围，然后他才告诉我执行官之子斯瓦蒂亚把剑拿走了。卡蓬曾看到斯瓦蒂亚从大门旁的公厕边将铁匠的剑拿走，随后便消失在了城墙之上，而后他竟又在鸽舍之下的庭院角落里现身，离开时身上并未携带那把剑。或许我得去跟斯瓦蒂亚谈谈，没准能知道他如何处置了那把剑。
najdi_mec_prisel_za_mnou__Y3nU

The blacksmith came to me sick with worry and told me he couldn't find the sword for young Lord Semine. We have to find it or we're in trouble. He said he had no idea how he lost it. Maybe someone took it. He told me there was some young fop he didn't recognise skulking about. He gave me a few clues and I managed to find the lad. It turned out to be none other than our Lord Capon. I had to get him out of a jam related to some girl before he told me that the Bailiff's son Svatya had taken the sword. Last time he saw him, he was somewhere over there, and that's exactly where I found the sword.

铁匠满脸愁容地来见我，说他找不到塞米少主的那把剑了，但我们必须将其找回，否则必定麻烦缠身。至于那把剑是如何遗失的，铁匠也不知道，或许被人拿走了也说不定呢。铁匠说有个生面孔的穿着讲究的青年在附近鬼鬼祟祟。通过铁匠提供的线索，我找到了那名青年，谁曾想到他不是别人，竟是我们的卡蓬大人。我先是帮他摆脱了某个姑娘的纠缠，然后我才从他那里得知是执行官之子斯瓦蒂亚拿走了那把剑。上一次卡蓬看到斯瓦蒂亚的时候，后者就在那附近出没，也就是我找到剑的地方。
najdi_mec_prisel_za_mnou__Z2Y6

The blacksmith came to me sick with worry and told me he couldn't find the sword for young Lord Semine. We have to find it or we're in trouble. He said he had no idea how he lost it. Maybe someone took it. He told me there was some young fop he didn't recognise skulking about. He gave me a few clues and I managed to find the lad. It turned out to be none other than our Lord Capon. I had to get him out of a jam related to some girl before he told me that the Bailiff's son Svatya had taken the sword. I talked to Svatya and learned what he'd done with the sword. He threw it into the pond behind the fortress because he was angry with Lord Semine. I hope I can find it there.

铁匠满脸愁容地来见我，说他找不到塞米少主的那把剑了，但我们必须将其找回，否则必定麻烦缠身。至于那把剑是如何遗失的，铁匠也不知道，或许被人拿走了也说不定呢。铁匠说有个生面孔的穿着讲究的青年在附近鬼鬼祟祟。通过铁匠提供的线索，我找到了那小伙子，谁曾想到他不是别人，竟是我们的卡蓬大人。我先是帮他从一个姑娘那里解了围，然后他才告诉我执行官之子斯瓦蒂亚把剑拿走了。通过与斯瓦蒂亚交谈，我得知，斯瓦蒂亚对塞米大人心怀怨气，已将那把剑抛入了堡垒后方的池塘里，但愿我还能找到它。
najdi_mec_rytir_okouzleny_BkKo
The knight enchanted by the life of Sir Valentine will soon probably meet him in heaven. And he won't need a sword for that journey.
那位陶醉于瓦伦丁爵士传奇一生的骑士或许很快就要在天堂与他的榜样见面了，而他的升天旅途也不再需要一把佩剑为伴。
najdi_mec_valentinuv_hrob_cyV8
Valentine's grave was empty, not a trace of the sword. But maybe I could find it somewhere in the crypt. I should look around there.
瓦伦丁爵士的坟墓内外空空如也，看不到半点佩剑的痕迹。但或许可以在墓穴内找到它，那就到里边去看看吧。
najdi_mla_ten_mladik_kter_1R7t

The young man I'm looking for was said to be dressed in yellow. So I'm trying to talk to anyone wearing yellow attire. One such person told me he had seen someone matching the description in the barn.
据说我正要找的那位青年身穿黄衣，我得试着寻找穿着黄色服饰的人并与之交谈。我从一个身着黄衣的人口中得知，他看到谷仓里就有个与描述相符的人。
najdi_mla_ten_mladik_kter_rJcx
The young man I'm looking for was said to be dressed in yellow. I'll try to look for anyone wearing yellow attire.
据说我正要找的那位青年身穿黄衣，所以我得试着寻找穿着黄色服饰的人。
najdi_mla_ten_mladik_kter_sGz1
The young man I'm looking for was said to be dressed in yellow. So I'm trying to talk to anyone wearing yellow attire but with no luck so far.
据说我正要找的那位青年身穿黄衣，所以我得试着寻找穿着黄色服饰的人并与之交谈，但目前为止并不走运。
najdi_mor_bratr_morticius_jgnQ
I managed to find brother Morticius. At least what's left of him. What remains to be said? Memento mori.
我找到了莫提修斯修士。至少是他的遗骸，我还能说什么呢？Memento mori（勿忘你终有一死）。
najdi_mor_hromady_kosti_j_QVWY
He is not in his usual place. Where could he have gone?
他不在他通常待的地方，他可能去哪里了？
najdi_mor_konecne_jsem_to_PENp

I finally found the old bastard! He was no monk, but a lowly vagrant who was just pulling my leg! I got almost nothing for my efforts, but at least I left something behind in this world. Three beautifully arranged piles of bones.
我终于找到了这个老杂碎！他根本不是修士，只是个卑贱的流浪汉，他耍了我！我的努力几乎一无所获，但至少我在世界上留下了三堆整齐的骨头。
najdi_mor_musim_najit_mni_fQNQ
I must find the monk and rhymer Morticius to reward me for my labours.
我必须找到修士兼打油诗人莫提修斯来为我的劳动付报酬。
najdi_mrs_hrobnik_se_s_ni_J74n

After a short ride on the wagon, we stopped at a run-down cottage in Slatego. The gravedigger had a trap for wild animals set up inside, and my job is to go and see if something got caught in it. The last time Ignatius was here, a pack of wolves took him by surprise, so I'd better stay vigilant.
短暂行驶一段路程后，我们在斯拉戈的一处废弃农舍边停了下来。掘墓人曾在里边放置了一个用于捕捉野生动物的陷阱，我将前去回收陷阱并查看是否捕捉到了猎物。据说上次伊格内修斯于此遭到了一群狼的突然袭击，所以我最好保持警惕。
najdi_mrs_hrobnik_se_s_ni_U6Mz

After a short ride on the wagon, we stopped at a run-down cottage in Slatego. The gravedigger had a trap for wild animals set up inside, and my job is to go and see if something got caught in it. I got into the cottage and found a rotting deer there.
短暂行驶一段路程后，我们在斯拉戈的一处废弃农舍边停了下来。掘墓人曾在里边放置了一个用于捕捉野生动物的陷阱，我将前去回收陷阱并查看是否捕捉到了猎物，而在进入农舍后我发现了一只腐烂的鹿。
najdi_na__hledat_hreb_je__GiDQ
It's useless to look for a nail now, without Thrush's word, there's no way I can convince the two towns to make up.
现在寻找铁钉没有用，没有瑟鲁什，我没办法说服两个村镇重修旧好。
najdi_na__mel_bych_zajit__NNMn
I should go to the pasture and try to find the nail that marks the boundary between the Tachov and Zhelejov parts. The Troskowitz chronicle should tell me exactly where to look for it.
我应该去牧场，试图找到标志着塔霍夫和哲勒约夫地区边界的铁钉。《特罗斯科维茨编年史》应该会记载铁钉的位置。
najdi_na__nasel_jsem_hreb_H7yU
I found the nail marking the border between the Tachov and Zhelejov parts of the pasture.
我找到了标志着塔霍夫和哲勒约夫牧场边界的铁钉。
najdi_na__nasel_jsem_na_t_Abt8
I found enough scrap metal in the fortress that can be reforged to make ammunition.
我在堡垒中找到了足够用以制造弹药的零碎金属。
najdi_na__nase_zasoby_str_Eb3s

Our ammunition supplies are running thin, but there's plenty of unneeded metal in the fortress that can be reforged to make more. Cutlery, old horseshoes, nails… But definitely not weapons and armour. We need those more than ammunition.
我们的弹药不多了，但是堡垒里还有许多用不上的金属，足以重新熔炼出更多的弹药。刀叉、旧马蹄铁、钉子……但武器和盔甲绝不能熔掉。比起弹药，我们更需要这些装备。
najdi_nek_cast_zapisu_v_t_XIJh

Some of the entries in the Troskowitz chronicle were written in Latin. Most of it is probably useless to me, but one sentence seemed important. If I want to move forward in my search, I need to find a scribe, priest, or maybe even a merchant to tell me what "Fecit ordinem in regione ope clavi ferrei" means.
《特罗斯科维茨编年史》中的一些条目是用拉丁文写的。大部分内容对我来说可能毫无用处，但有一句话似乎很重要。如果我想继续搜索，我需要一个抄写员、牧师，甚至是一个商人，帮我翻译“Fecit ordinem in regione ope clavi ferrei”这句话。
najdi_nek_konecne_uz_vim__YNpt
I finally know what the sentence from the Troskowitz chronicle means. It seems that the border of the pasture between Tachov and Zhelejov should be marked with an iron nail.
我终于知道《特罗斯科维茨编年史》中的那句话是什么意思。看来，塔霍夫和哲勒约夫之间的牧场边界应该是由铁钉标记。
najdi_nek_rychtar_drozd_j_VIR1
Bailiff Thrush is dead, now there's no reason to translate the Latin phrase.
瑟鲁什执行官死了，现在已经无需翻译这句拉丁语了。
najdi_opr_hynek_nedavno_v_sWdz
Heinz recently hanged a cheating gambler just outside the town. I'm supposed to use to it to make a hilt wrap for the new executioner's sword.
海因兹最近在镇外绞死了一个出千的赌徒。我应该使用它来为新的行刑剑做一个剑柄包边。
najdi_opr_neobeslo_se_to__mz0F
It wasn't easy, but I've got the hanged man's noose.
虽然不容易，但我拿到了那根绞刑绳。
najdi_pav_mohl_bych_se_vy_TyEV
I could ask among the local merchants.
我可以向附近的商人们打探消息。
najdi_pav_od_suchdolskyho_y7pt

I learned the Suchdol captain is looking for that hired hand Pavel. They say he stole a few valuables in the village and then disappeared. That boy must have cheated me and instead of giving everything to Pivetz kept it all to himself. Supposedly I should look around Kuttenberg.
听说苏赫多尔队长正在寻找那个雇工帕维尔，人们说他在村里偷走了些贵重物品后便音讯全无。那小子肯定骗了我，明明将赃物全都占为己有，却还声称全部交给了维茨。我得前往库滕堡打探一番。
najdi_pav_pavel_zemrel_te_ezaR
Pavel died, now he'll be sewing in another world.
帕维尔已死，愿上帝也需要一名裁缝。
najdi_pav_scuhdolskej_hej_0Z0Y
The Suchdol captain is looking for that hired hand Pavel because of those stolen items. He had to find out sooner or later. Supposedly I should look around Kuttenberg.
为了那些失窃的物件，苏赫多尔队长正在搜寻雇工帕维尔。他迟早会找到的，但我还是得到库滕堡去转转。
najdi_pav_snad_mi_pomuze__QR1U
Maybe the local cobbler will help me.
或许附近的鞋匠能给我提供帮助。
najdi_pav_snad_mi_pomuze__ZoG2
Maybe one of the local cobblers will help me.
或许附近的鞋匠能给我提供帮助。
najdi_pav_tak_jsem_taky_p_Tt3f
So I eventually found Pavel. He was apprenticing with one of the Kuttenberg cobblers.
我终于找到了帕维尔，他正在库滕堡的一名鞋匠身边当学徒。
najdi_pav_takovou_knihu_j_eIUj
You can't sell a book like that just anywhere. Perhaps the local scribe will know something.
像那样的书无论何处都买不到，但或许此地的抄写员知道点什么。
najdi_pav_tak_to_jsem_vaz_VLfw
Well I really botched that. If I hadn't killed that person, he could have helped me look for Pavel. Now I'll have handle it myself.
真是弄巧成拙，那个人本可以协助我寻找帕维尔，但我竟将其杀死，现在我得自己想办法了。
najdi_pav_taky_bych_se_mo_rLEu
I could also ask some merchants he might try to sell the stolen goods to.
他或许会将偷来的物品卖给一些商人，我也可以向他们打探一番。
najdi_pav_treba_se_pokusi_Regr
Maybe he tried to sell those stolen goods to a local trader from the Hole in the Wall tavern.
或许他想将那些偷来的物品卖给“墙洞”酒馆里的一个本地商人。
najdi_pav_zemrel_clovek_k_AqO0
The person I was supposed to help with the search died.
我帮忙搜寻的那个人已经死了。
najdi_ple_nakonec_to_ale__eKgp
However, it didn't end well. Gules died, and the whole thing fell apart.
不过，结局并不如人所愿。古勒斯死了，事情都搞砸了。
najdi_ple_nejdriv_ze_vseh_OT9S

First of all, I need to find Canker and his camp. Gules himself doesn't know where that godless man is hiding. He only told me that Canker had been ambushing wayfarers on the road from Troskowitz to Nebakov Mill. His advice was to let myself be ambushed. Let Canker's men find me first, and then I would beat out of them where their camp is.
首先，我得找到“溃疡”和他的营地。古勒斯自己也不知道那个无信者藏在哪里，只告诉我“溃疡”一直在特罗斯科维茨到内巴科夫的路上袭击旅人。他的建议是让我故意被他们伏击，然后从“溃疡”手下的嘴里问出他们营地的位置。
najdi_ple_nejdriv_ze_vseh_XMM6

First of all, I need to find Canker and his camp. Gules himself doesn't know where that godless man is hiding. He only told me that Canker had been ambushing wayfarers on the road from Troskowitz to Nebakov Mill. His advice was to let myself be ambushed. Let Canker's men find me first, and then I would beat out of them where their camp is.
首先，我得找到“溃疡”和他的营地。古勒斯自己也不知道那个无信者藏在哪里，只告诉我“溃疡”一直在特罗斯科维茨到内巴科夫的路上袭击旅人。他的建议是让我故意被他们伏击，然后从“溃疡”手下的嘴里问出他们营地的位置。
najdi_ple_nejdriv_ze_vseh_yfzx

First of all, I need to find Canker and his camp. Gules himself doesn't know where that godless man is hiding. He only told me that Canker had been ambushing wayfarers on the road from Troskowitz to Nebakov Mill. His advice was to let myself be ambushed. And so it happened. When I fought Canker's men, one of them surrendered, and to save his skin, he revealed where to find their camp. At the bottom of the Troskowitz ravine.
首先，我得找到“溃疡”和他的营地。古勒斯自己也不知道那个无信者藏在哪里，只告诉我“溃疡”一直在特罗斯科维茨到内巴科夫的路上袭击旅人。他的建议是让我故意被他们伏击，我也这么做了。打赢了“溃疡”的手下之后，其中一个人投降了，告诉了我他们营地的位置，也就是特罗斯科维茨峡谷底部。
najdi_ple_nejdriv_ze_vseh_zexI

First of all, I had to find Canker’s camp, because even Gules didn’t know where it might be. I found them at the bottom of a ravine, through which a stream runs from Troskowitz to Nebakov Mill. It was just a few tents under the cliffs.
首先，我得找到“溃疡”和他的营地，因为古勒斯自己也不清楚它的方位。我在峡谷底部发现了营地，那是几顶在悬崖下的帐篷，就在一条从特罗斯科维茨流往内巴科夫磨坊方向的小溪旁。
najdi_pod_nasel_jsem_kouz_mgc9
I managed to find the special spiked horseshoe.
I managed to find the special spiked horseshoe.
najdi_pod_v_cikanskem_tab_QKQH
There must be at least one of their mysterious horseshoes lying around somewhere in the nomads' camp. If I can find it and inspect it properly, I should be able to forge an entire set.
There must be at least one of their mysterious horseshoes lying around somewhere in the nomads' camp. If I can find it and inspect it properly, I should be able to forge an entire set.
najdi_pok_mam_vsechno_ale_Acxr
I found everything I came for, even if it isn't much. It appears that if Beikovetz ever had any money stashed at All Saints, he sank it into his tavern long ago.
我找到了所有我要找的东西，尽管并没有想象中多。要是贝科维茨确实将钱财私藏在圣徒酒馆里，那他一定很久之前就将其用作酒馆的运营资金了。
najdi_pok_musim_se_tady_p_NJJi
The treasure should be buried inside an abandoned mineshaft. I should take a look there.
宝藏应该就埋在一处废弃矿井里，我得进去打探一番。
najdi_pok_najdi_poklad_po_3SDQ
Innkeeper Beikovetz is said to have stashed some blood money from his dark past somewhere in the cellar under his tavern.
据说酒馆老板贝科维茨的黑暗过往让他积累了一笔血腥钱财，就私藏在他酒馆的地下室里。
najdi_pok_porad_to_neni_v_cyme
The cellar isn't that big and I appear to have found something from Beikovetz's past. But it's still not everything, I should look more closely.
这间地下室并不大，我似乎还发现了些与贝科维茨的过去有关的物品。但是仅凭这些还不够，我得更仔细地寻找一番。
najdi_pok_svatava_mi_rekl_ddv6

Svatava told me where in Mesoles I would find her family inheritance and asked me to bring it to her. From her house, the third on the right in the village when coming from the main road, she took it in secret at night on a handcart through a hole in the fence behind the house, along a path behind the yard, around the neighbour's barn, taking it out of the village and across a field to the woods, where the handcart got stuck and she had to bury everything quickly. Her description should help me locate the exact spot.

斯瓦塔娅将他们家族遗产的埋藏点告诉了我，并请求我前往梅索莱斯将其取回。我找到了他们那早已被焚毁的房屋，即是主路进村路上的右侧第三座。据说当时斯瓦塔娅悄悄地把遗产转移到了一辆手推车上，趁着夜色推车穿过了屋后篱笆上的一处漏洞，沿着邻居家谷仓周围一间庭院后的道路离去。她在将遗产带出村庄后穿过了一片通往树林的田地，而手推车却在田地中卡住不动，她因此不得不迅速将遗产都埋了起来。她对埋藏点的描述应该能帮助我锁定遗产具体位置。
najdi_pok_svatava_mi_rekl_HzX6
Svatava told me where in Mesoles I would find her family's inheritance and asked me to bring it to her. But unfortunately, she died, so even if I find the treasure, I won't have anyone to give it to.
斯瓦塔娅将她家族遗产在梅索莱斯的埋藏点告诉了我。即便我找到了那些遗产，遗憾的是，她却撒手人寰，如今的遗产也已无人认领。
najdi_pok_svatava_mi_rekl_okpe

Svatava told me where in Mesoles I would find her family's inheritance and asked me to bring it to her. Following her instructions, I found it near a flipped-over handcart near the forest, where I dug it up.
斯瓦塔娅将他们家族遗产的埋藏点告诉了我，并请求我前往梅索莱斯将其取回。根据她的描述，我在树林周边一辆侧翻的手推车旁找到了那些遗产，并将它们挖了出来。
najdi_pok_svatava_mi_rekl_pFCr

Svatava told me where in Mesoles I would find her buried treasure, her family inheritance. Unfortunately, Vendula died in the meantime and Svatava now refuses to speak. Even if I find the treasure, I won't have anyone to give it to.
斯瓦塔娅将她家族遗产在梅索莱斯的埋藏点告诉了我。即便我找到了那些遗产，遗憾的是，在此期间芙恩德拉不幸遇难，悲伤的斯瓦塔娅对一切避之不谈，遗产也因此无人认领。
najdi_pok_todo_hrac_dosel_Cohq

Svatava told me where in Mesoles I would find her family inheritance and asked me to bring it to her. I foudn their burned down house, the third on the right in the village when coming from the main road. She took it in secret at night on a handcart through a hole in the fence behind the house, along a path behind the yard, around the neighbour's barn, taking it out of the village and across a field to the woods, where the handcart got stuck and she had to bury everything quickly. Her description should help me locate the exact spot.

斯瓦塔娅将他们家族遗产的埋藏点告诉了我，并请求我前往梅索莱斯将其取回。我找到了他们那早已被焚毁的房屋，即是从主路进村路上的右侧第三座。据说当时斯瓦塔娅悄悄地将遗产转移到了一辆手推车上，趁着夜色推车穿过了屋后篱笆上的一处漏洞，沿着邻居家谷仓周围一间庭院后的道路离去。她在将遗产带出村庄后穿过了一片通往树林的田地，过程中手推车却在田地中卡住不动，她因此不得不迅速将遗产都埋了起来。她对埋藏点的描述应该能帮助我锁定遗产的具体位置。
najdi_pok_zatracene_nic_t_3eRW
I've been back and forth all over the place, searched wherever I could, but there's nothing here! Damn it! That bastard tricked me. Good thing I got rid of him. Exactly what he deserved!
我在这个鬼地方兜兜转转，四处探查，但是什么都没有找到！妈的！那个混蛋敢糊弄我，好在我把他解决掉了，真是活该！
najdi_pok_zatracene_nic_t_7tdJ
I've been back and forth all over the place, searched wherever I could, but there's nothing here! Damn it! You can't trust anything these days. Not even a properly stolen map.
我在这个鬼地方兜兜转转，四处探查，但是什么都没有找到！妈的！当今世道，早无信任可言，就连一张偷来的地图都不能相信。
najdi_pok_zatracene_nic_t_wdYf
I've been back and forth all over the place, searched everywhere I could, but there's nothing here! Damn it! I'm starting to feel like that bastard swindled me and sold me worthless scribbles.
我在这个鬼地方兜兜转转，四处探查，但是什么都没有找到！妈的！我都开始认为，那个混蛋就是在诈骗，卖给我的不过是一张一文不值的破纸。
najdi_pou_kovar_se_zminil_otS9

Radovan the blacksmith wants me to bring him the hermit's sword, so that he has high-quality steel to complete the wedding order for Lord Semine. Word has it that the hermit once fought against the heathens, and has a sword from the faraway Andalusia. Unfortunately, it was broken long ago, but we surely won't find any better steel to forge a new sword.
铁匠拉多万想让我把隐士的剑拿给他，这样，他就有了优质钢材，可以完成塞米大人的婚礼订制宝剑。据说，这位隐士曾经与异教徒作战，拥有一把来自遥远的安达卢西亚的剑。不幸的是，剑早就断了，但我们肯定找不到更优质的钢来锻造新剑。
najdi_pou_ziskal_jsem_sta_dlv4
I got hold of the hermit's broken sword. It hasn't been used for ages, but even so, there's hardly any rust on it. It's simply outstanding Damascus steel from Toledo.
我拿到了这位隐士的断剑。剑已经很久没有使用，但即便如此，上面几乎没有任何锈迹。不愧是托莱多的优质大马士革钢。
najdi_pre_henslovo_telo_j_IYAC
I haven't found Hensel, dead or alive. If he wasn't killed, he might be on the run from the law himself.
我没有发现亨泽尔，不知他是生是死。如果他没有被杀，他可能正在逃避法律制裁。
najdi_pre_moje_podezreni__Dgeb
My suspicions about an ambush were confirmed. I found a merchant's cart hidden in the forest close to the road and the body of the merchant Hensel nearby.
我对伏击的猜测得到了证实。我在靠近公路的森林里发现了一辆商人马车，并在附近发现了商人亨泽尔的尸体。
najdi_pre_musim_se_podiva_CO8S

I've got to track down the merchant Hensel. Preng told me he left with a wagon for Prague a while ago. The heavy goods wagon won't be moving fast and can't have got too far. Being a merchant, Hensel won't head straight for Prague, so I should catch up with him before he reaches Bylany.
我必须要找到商人亨泽尔。普伦告诉我，他不久前乘着一辆马车去了布拉格。那辆重型马车的速度不会很快，不可能走得太远。作为一个商人，亨泽尔不会直接前往布拉格，所以我应该在他到达比兰尼之前追上他。
najdi_pre_zatracene_u_ces_GVTl
I found a suspiciously fresh trail of blood on the road. It might have nothing to do with Hensel, but I'd better check around to be certain.
我在路上发现了一条可疑的新鲜血迹。这可能与亨泽尔无关，但我最好查明真相。
najdi_pre_ztratil_jsem_i__zYOZ
I lost the last trace of Hensel.
我失去了亨泽尔最后的踪迹。
najdi_pro_krejzl_po_me_ch_cXNT
I finally found the book, and a dead man lying next to it. I wonder what happened here?
我终于找到了那本书，旁边还有一具尸体。我想知道这里发生了什么事？
najdi_pro_mlynarovi_pry_z_uXMz
Where in the world could that book be?
那本书到底会在哪呢？
najdi_pro_nasel_jsem_nikv_2gxa
What can you do? The important thing is that I finally have that book the miller wanted and it doesn't look too worn.
我对此也无能为力。总之，重要的在于我终于拿到了磨坊主想要的那本书，而且看起来破损得不严重。
najdi_pro_o_knihu_jsem_pr_ZNe5
I lost the book. I'll have to go back for it.
我弄丢了那本书得将其取回。
najdi_prv_ruthardi_mi_pro_0RTZ

The Ruthards revealed that a secret passage leads to Maleshov. I have to find its entrance and dig my way inside so I can get to the castle unobserved. The path to it is well hidden, however. Rosa said to start looking at the crossroads by Hashtal’s stud farm. There I’ll find a white wayside shrine. From there, I should see a group of stones by the side of the road and behind it I should find an old chapel. Once I find it, I have to look through its arch, which will reveal the next place I should continue.
我从鲁瑟德一家那里得知了一条能够进入马列索夫的密道，只要找到并挖穿它，我就能悄然潜入城堡。 可是，那条通道却极为隐蔽。据罗莎所说，我得从哈斯塔尔种马场旁的十字路开始寻找，那里我将能找到白色的路边神龛。从那里，我应该能看到路旁的一堆石块，石块后就有一座老旧教堂遗迹。待到寻得那座老教堂遗迹，其拱门之后便是我要找的下一处地点。
najdi_pta_musim_najit_pta_HD8D
Damn it! Otto von Bergow is holed up in the castle tower. We must talk about what to do next.
该死！奥托·冯·波尔高躲进了城堡塔楼里，我们必须制定下一步计划。
najdi_pta_ota_z_bergova_s_UrbW

Unfortunately, we lost the element of surprise, and Otto van Bergow holed himself up in the castle tower. The only hope we had left was to make a quick and clever deal to end everything before reinforcements from the Hungarian camp arrived.
很是遗憾，我们错失了出奇制胜的机会，奥托·冯·波尔高已经躲进了城堡塔楼里。目前，我们唯一的希望就是想出一个妙计，在匈牙利军队的增援到来之前，尽快结束这场冲突。
najdi_pta_ptacek_na_me_ce_vZag
I found Sir Hans by the exit point from the rocks. He got away from his pursuers at the last moment, but he got lost like I did.
我在岩石堆的出口处找到了汉斯爵士。千钧一发之际，他成功摆脱了追击者，但随后也像我一样迷了路。
najdi_pta_tam_kde_mel_byt_ij5T
Sir Hans is gone, and there are soldiers blocking my path! But I didn't hear them say they'd caught Sir Hans. Most likely he escaped into the rocks. I have to find him.
汉斯少主不见踪影，我的去路又被兵寇层层围堵！但我并未听到汉斯被俘的消息，他大概已遁入层岩之中。我得找到他。
najdi_pyt_pytlaci_se_pry__A3MU

It's said a poacher has turned up in the Slatego forests to the east, beyond Troskowitz. Ignatius the gravedigger has the closest cottage, and all he's noticed is some wolves that have moved into the area. Behind his cottage there's a small path lined with boulders leading straight into the forest. I can start my search around there.
据说特罗斯科维茨之外的斯拉戈树林东边出现了一个偷猎者。掘墓人伊格内修斯的小屋距离那里最近，而他近期只发现了些刚刚迁徙到这片地区的狼群。在他的小屋之后有一条直通树林的小路，路旁则遍布着巨石，我的搜查就可以从那里开始。
najdi_pyt_pytlaci_se_pry__jCfz
According to Varel the gamekeeper, a poacher has turned up in the Slatego forests to the east, beyond Troskowitz. Now I have to search the forests.
我从猎场看守瓦雷尔那里得知，特罗斯科维茨之外的斯拉戈树林东边出现了一个偷猎者。现在我得去搜查那片树林。
najdi_pyt_pytlaci_se_pry__oemg

It's said a poacher has turned up in the Slatego forests to the east, beyond Troskowitz. While searching the area I came across a small camp that must have been the poacher's. It was a complete mess, and now it's home to some wolves. Where could the camp's founder be? Did he get away?
据说特罗斯科维茨之外的斯拉戈树林东边出现了一个偷猎者。在搜索区域的途中，我发现了一处小营地，它肯定就是偷猎者的据点。营地内一片狼藉，现在也已成了一些狼的窝点，至于营地的主人，他逃跑了吗？现在又会在哪里呢？
najdi_pyt_pytlaci_se_pry__Qh1Q

It's said a poacher has turned up in the Slatego forests to the east, beyond Troskowitz. While searching the area I came across a dead body. I'd guess it's the local wolves' doing. Where could the poor man's camp be?
据说特罗斯科维茨之外的斯拉戈树林东边出现了一个偷猎者。在搜索区域的途中，我碰到了一具尸体，似乎就是此处狼群的“杰作”，而那个可怜人的营地会在哪里呢？
najdi_pyt_pytlaci_se_pry__yjox

It's said a poacher has turned up in the Slatego forests to the east, beyond Troskowitz. I searched the area and found the poacher and his camp. But I didn't have to mete out punishment - the local wolves had seen to that.
据说特罗斯科维茨之外的斯拉戈树林东边出现了一个偷猎者。在搜索区域的途中，我发现了那个偷猎者和他的营地。但是在我将他绳之以法之前，此处的狼群似乎已经代我解决了他。
najdi_ran_jenze_ja_uz_toh_xU6H
But I'd had enough of it and decided to deal with it my own way.
但我忍无可忍，决心以自己的方式解决此事。
najdi_ran_ranka_jsem_nase_v9dG
I found Ranyek completely by accident. He had drowned in a pool of shit.
偶然间，我竟找到了拉涅克，而他早已淹死在一池粪坑里。
najdi_roz_kdyz_nejsou_na__S3Gn
If the orders aren't in the Crone, they must be in the Maiden. I'll go and see how Godwin is doing.
如果密令不在老妪塔，就一定在少女塔。我得去看看古德温那边的进展。
najdi_roz_rozkazy_mame_by_CWZN

After a long search, we found Sigismund's orders among von Bergow's personal effects. I hope there's something interesting in them. We'd have been long gone by now if we hadn't had to search for them.
经过漫长搜寻，我们在冯·波尔高的私人物品中找到了西格斯蒙德的密令，但愿能从中获取有用信息。要不是为了找到这些东西，我们老早就离开了。
najdi_sam_dozvedel_jsem_s_4cea
I heard some tragic news. The besiegers caught and hanged my stepbrother Samuel. I should find his body and take care of it.
我得知了一些不幸的消息。据说那些围城的敌人曾抓住了我的继兄塞缪尔并将他绞死，我得找到他的尸体并为他举行葬礼。
najdi_san_jamu_jsem_konec_P5px
I finally found the pit and tasted it to make sure there's actually saltpetre in it. I'd really like to forget all about that last bit!
我找到了那处硝石坑，并通过味道确定了其中确实蕴藏着硝石。我真是巴不得忘掉那种感觉！
najdi_san_konecne_stojim__6pLn
I finally found the pit. All that's left to do is to taste the damned saltpetre. Maybe I should hold my nose?
我终于找到了硝石坑。剩下要做的就是舔舐那该死的硝石，或许我得掐住鼻子才能办得到。
najdi_san_na_jamu_jsem_do_zLqa

The local gravedigger was supposed to help me find the pit, but he definitely won't help me now. I'll have to find it myself! But where could it be? I have an idea... The Troskowitz scribe is a clever fellah and knows a lot about what goes on around here. Maybe he'll be able to help.
本以为此处的掘墓人会协助我找到那处硝石坑，但现在可以确信的是他不会提供任何帮助，而我将独自寻找那处矿坑！可是该去哪里找呢？真是毫无头绪……好在特罗斯科维茨的抄写员是个聪明人，而且对附近的一切了如指掌，或许他能帮得上忙。
najdi_sch_kuratko_mi_proz_5unM
Fowl told me he saw Smil with several barrels of beer. He said he must've hidden them somewhere.
福尔告诉我，史麦尔手里还有好几桶啤酒，还说他一定把啤酒藏了起来。
najdi_sch_od_vrby_jsem_se_24LT
I learned from Willow that Fowl has two cows that he had to hide from us. According to Willow, he leads them to drink at a watering hole. There I found tracks leading further beyond the village.
我从温洛那里得知，福尔将两只牛藏了起来，以免被我们夺走。据温洛所言，福尔常带着那两只牛到一处水洞内喝水，而我也在水洞内找到了一些通往村外的踪迹。
najdi_sch_od_vrby_jsem_se_2Vrb
I learned from Willow that Fowl has two cows that he hid from us. Eventually, I found them in the woods near the village.
我从温洛那里得知，为避免被我们抢走，福尔将他的两只牛给藏了起来。而我最终也在村庄附近的树林里找到了它们。
najdi_sch_od_vrby_jsem_se_632B

najdi_sch_slepicka_mi_nak_ko3b
Fowl eventually told me he hid his cattle in the forest.
最终，福尔还是坦白了他将牛藏在树林里的事实。
najdi_sch_u_smila_jsem_na_mGpE
At Smil's I found beer, which the camp will definitely be interested in.
我在史麦尔的地窖里发现了啤酒，营地的士兵们要是知道了一定会为此欣喜若狂。
najdi_sch_v_lese_jsem_nas_rnjC
I found cows hidden in the forest. Puta'll be happy about that.
我在树林里找到了那些被藏起来的牛，普塔一定会很高兴的。
najdi_sch_vrba_mi_prozrad_XaMm
Willow told me Smil bought a large amount of beer. He told me to look in the cellar Smil has in the hill behind the cottage.
温洛告诉我，史麦尔曾买回了不少的啤酒，还让我到史麦尔的地窖里看看，而那个地窖就在史麦尔屋后的山上。
najdi_sch_ze_smila_jsem_d_0mIH
I learned from Smil he had beer hidden in the cellar, which the camp will definitely be interested in.
我从史麦尔口中得知，他在地窖里藏了啤酒，营地的士兵们要是知道了一定会为此欣喜若狂。
najdi_sek_kdyz_pujdu_po_s_UZMe

I'd like to find the silver axe from Zdenyek's story. The best place to start would be to find the Rocktower Pond pier. That is where Matthias encountered the water goblin. From here I should walk uphill between the rocks to the place where an old oak tree grows. Then past the stone that Matthias tried to smash the axe on, to the top of the hill where Matthias's brother is buried. I'd best not forget my shovel.
我想要寻找兹登耶克故事里的那把银斧。 石塔池塘码头是最好的搜寻起始点，那里也是马蒂亚斯遭遇水妖的地方。 从此地出发，我得沿着山岩间的道路上山，前往一棵老橡树的生长地。之后经过那块马蒂亚斯曾试图用来砸毁斧子的石头，随即爬上埋葬马蒂亚斯兄弟的山顶。我最好别忘记带上铲子。
najdi_sek_nasel_jsem_tu_s_Xldw
I found the axe from Zdenyek's story. But time had taken its toll on it.
我找到了兹登耶克故事里的那把斧头，但岁月的侵蚀已经在它身上留下了印记。
najdi_si__az_donosim_pytl_DVIm
I can go down to the gallows to ask about work.
我可以到绞刑架那里找份差事。
najdi_smo_ovce_jsem_nasel_sRmu
I found the sheep along with her killers.
我找到了那只羊，以及杀死它的凶手。
najdi_smo_smolikovi_ovce__igWx
Smoliek's sheep got lost somewhere in the forest. I have to find her and bring back her ear as proof she's dead.
斯莫利克的羊迷失在了森林里。我得把她的耳朵找回来，以确认她确实死了。
najdi_spo_komar_me_poveri_Y1i8
Adder instructed me to put my ear to the wall and find the spot where the cellar meets the corridor leading from the crypt where our friends were already waiting.
阿德尔让我将耳朵贴在墙上，以此寻找地窖与通往墓穴的走廊的交汇处，至于我们的朋友，他们也早已在那里等候多时。
najdi_spo_po_sluchu_jsem__8aDt
I managed to find the spot where the cellar meets the corridor leading from the crypt by ear. All we had to do was knock out some bricks and the Italian Court was as good as ours!
我用耳朵成功找到了地窖与通往墓穴的走廊的交汇处。只需将几块砖头敲碎，意大利宫就是我们的了！
najdi_sta_musim_vylustit__WYtO

I have a riddle to solve:

A vineyard in the town? Strange, but who knows!
And yet there it is, quite nearby.
By the water that gushes, now listen and try
to keep your eyes open, so that you can tell
shortly after the midday bell,
you'll find us where the shadow goes.

我需要解开一个谜语：

葡萄园，居镇中？岂谓无可能！
尚且有一处，须臾间可及。
潺潺流水过，聆听寻此声。
瞪眼观六路，竖耳听八方。
午时稍稍过，阴影指明路。
随其往而行，彼处寻我等。
najdi_sta_vepr_z_mazaka_d_Bu9R

I have a riddle to solve:

A vineyard in the town? Strange, but who knows!
And yet there it is, quite nearby.
By the water that gushes, now listen and try
to keep your eyes open, so that you can tell
shortly after the midday bell,
you'll find us where the shadow goes.
If I need any advice, maybe Chenyek can help me. He's in the Hole in the Wall.

我需要解开一个谜语：

葡萄园，居镇中？岂谓无可能！
尚且有一处，须臾间可及。
潺潺流水过，聆听寻此声。
瞪眼观六路，竖耳听八方。
午时稍稍过，阴影指明路。
随其往而行，彼处寻我等。
如果我需要建议，可以找程叶科帮忙，他就在“墙洞”酒馆里。
najdi_sta_vypada_to_ze_js_MrUf
It seems I found the thieves' hideout! Now I have to decipher the symbols' meanings…
看来我找到了盗贼的藏身之处！现在我必须破解这些符号的含义......
najdi_svo_potrebuju_svoje_1IRP
Fleeing from the castle empty-handed would be foolish. Katherine said Istvan ordered our things to be taken to his chambers. All the more reason to finally settle the score with that rat.
空手逃离城堡并非明智之举。凯瑟琳说过伊斯特万命人把我们的东西带去他的房间，那我就更要跟这个卑鄙小人好好算账了。
najdi_svo_svoje_veci_jsem_WCRe
Fleeing from the castle empty-handed would be foolish. Istvan had confiscated our things and had them taken to his chambers. Luckily I found them, and it seems like nothing's missing.
空手逃离城堡并非明智之举。伊斯特万收走了我们的东西，还命人将其送至他的房间。幸运的是，我找回了它们，而且似乎无一遗漏。
najdi_tab_abych_se_mohl_s_DNDL

To meet with the group of rebellious peasants, I first have to find them. Vlasta, the herbwoman living near Miskowitz, told me where their camp was, and gave me some food for them to make a good first impression.
要与这群起义的农民会面，我首先要找到他们。住在米斯科维茨附近的女草药师弗拉斯塔将他们营地的位置告诉了我，并让我给他们带一些食物，好给他们留下一个好印象。
najdi_tab_hospodsky_ma_pr_WMQv

Word has it the soldiers even bear a writ from Sigismund himself authorising them to collect tolls. If I managed to take that from them, everything would be settled… But I could also try talking to them, or simply kill them. But I have to find them first.
据说西格斯蒙德亲自授予了一份令状，允许那些士兵向过往商人收取过路费。如果我能从士兵那里取得那份令状，问题将迎刃而解…不过我也可以跟他们进行谈判，或是直接杀死他们，总之还是先找到他们为妙。
najdi_tab_jelikoz_jsem_se_Lqpw

Because I stood up for the Cumans at the tavern, their leader, Vasko, told me where I could find their camp. It should be somewhere to the west, under the cliffs near Rocktower Pond. I should go there and try to talk to them.
因为我之前在酒馆出手相助，库曼人的头目瓦斯科告诉我他们营地的位置。营地在西边，石塔池塘旁边的悬崖下面。我应该去那里，跟他们谈谈。
najdi_tab_lidi_ze_semina__h6YC
The villagers told me the Cumans had joined up with the nomads, so their camp might be near to theirs. It'd be worth looking into.
村民告诉我库曼人和游牧民族联合在一起，所以他们双方营地可能很近。这点值得研究一下。
najdi_tab_nejaka_banda_uk_CAy9

Some gang stole a horse from Hashtal's stables. But in doing so the fools made quite a racket. Hashtal caught them in the act and managed to lock one of the bunglers up in his barn. The others got away with the horse. The good news is that the caught bandit spilled the beans to Hashtal, on where his accomplices hide and where they took the horse. The bad news is that Hashtal beat him to death during their little chat.
Now I have to find that horse and bring it back. It'll be for a handsome reward, so why not?

一伙盗贼从哈斯塔尔的马厩中偷走了一匹马，但这群蠢货也因此弄出了不小的动静。哈斯塔尔当即抓住现行，并成功将其中一个盗贼关进了他的谷仓里，而其余的犯人则带着那匹马消失得无影无踪。不过好在，那个被拘捕盗贼将他同伙的藏匿点和马匹的去向都一五一十地交代给了哈斯塔尔。但也有坏消息，哈斯塔尔在交谈时把他打死了。
现在我得找到那匹马并将其带回，反正能拿到一份丰厚报酬，何乐而不为呢？
najdi_tab_nejaka_banda_uk_RVT9

Some gang stole a horse from Hashtal's stables. But in doing so the fools made quite a racket. Hashtal caught them in the act and managed to lock one of the bunglers up in his barn. The others got away with the horse. The good news is that the caught bandit spilled the beans to Hashtal, on where his accomplices hide and where they took the horse. The bad news is that Hashtal knocked his teeth and his soul out of him during their "friendly" chat.
I set off for the place described and found their camp.

一伙盗贼从哈斯塔尔的马厩中偷走了一匹吗，但这群蠢货也因此弄出了不小的动静。哈斯塔尔及时抓住现行，并成功将其中一个盗贼关进了他的谷仓里，而其余的犯人则带着那匹马逃之夭夭。不过好在，那个被拘捕盗贼将他同伙的藏匿点和马匹的去向都一五一十地交代给了哈斯塔尔。但也有坏消息，哈斯塔尔在他们“友好交谈”的过程中将他打得得牙齿脱落，魂飞魄散。
我前往了那个被捕盗贼所描述的地点，发现了他们的营地。
najdi_tab_nejdriv_musim_n_Zt5e
First I have to find the Cumans' camp, but where could it be?
首先我得找到库曼人的营地，但会在哪呢？
najdi_tab_nejsem_si_jisty_Of2C

I have to find the Cumans' camp, but I'm not sure who could point me in the right direction… I should look for it on my own. Vuytek said they came here from somewhere around Semine. I could search the forests around there.
我得找到库曼人的营地，但我不清楚谁能为我指明方向…我得自己找找看。维特克说他们是从塞米附近的某地来到这里的。我可以搜索一下那附近的森林。
najdi_tab_promluvil_jsem__QyU0
I arrived at the Cumans' camp.
我到库曼人的营地了。
najdi_tab_s_mistnimi_vzpu_l6Tr
I don't think I'll be meeting with the local rebellious peasants. Vlasta is dead, and I shouldn't draw attention to myself by continuing the search.
我想我不会和当地起义的农民会面。弗拉斯塔死了，我不能继续寻找，以免引起注意。
najdi_tab_snazim_se_vypat_3YOp

I'm trying to track down the poachers who killed a white roebuck in the woods near Suchdol. There's a bounty on the poachers' heads. According to Wolfram the knacker, the poachers are holed up somewhere near water in the woods along the road to Raborsch.
我正在追查在苏赫多尔附近的树林中猎杀了一头白獐的偷猎者。有人悬赏缉拿偷猎者的人头。据屠夫沃尔夫勒姆说，偷猎者躲在通往拉博施路边的树林里，那地方附近有水。
najdi_tab_snazim_se_vypat_8q76
I'm trying to track down the poachers who killed a white roebuck in the woods near Suchdol. There's a bounty on the poachers' heads.
我正在追查在苏赫多尔附近的树林中猎杀了一头白獐的偷猎者。有人悬赏缉拿偷猎者的人头。
najdi_tab_ten_nemecky_hos_IKuI
Poor Geldstück sold his last beer. Up in heaven there'll be no soldiers troubling him.
再也没人会购买盖尔斯塔克的酒水了，愿天堂没有给他添乱的士兵。
najdi_tab_uz_trochu_tusim_KD3j
I have some idea where to look for the Cumans' camp - it should be somewhere near Rocktower Pond, where the cliffs are.
关于寻找库曼人的营地，我有了些线索，它应该在悬崖那里，石塔池塘附近。
najdi_tab_vypatral_jsem_p_YBph
I tracked down the band of poachers that killed a rare white roebuck in the woods near Suchdol.
我正追查在苏赫多尔附近的树林中猎杀了一头罕见白獐的一群偷猎者。
najdi_taj_tajnou_mincovnu_7VeS
I found the secret mint near Old Kutna.
我在老库特纳附近找到了那间秘密铸币厂。
najdi_taj_ta_tajna_mincov_fI6v
The secret mint is obviously the key to the whole fraud. I must find it and have a look inside.
那间秘密铸币厂显然就是整个案件的关键线索，我必须找到它，并在其中调查一番。
najdi_ukr_bratri_z_cimbur_wacU
Now we have to search the camp together and finally find that lost chest of theirs.
现在我们得一同搜查营地，并找出那个失窃的箱子。
najdi_ukr_k_memu_prekvape_ZiHo
To my surprise, we also found a underground hideout beneath the city. No wonder the items were of no use to Goatskin - an old book and some strange device.
比较出乎意料，虽然我们发现了地下藏身处，但难怪那些东西对山羊皮没有用——因为只有一本旧书和一些奇怪的装置。
najdi_ukr_majitel_lazni_k_R9wQ
The bathhouse owner who entrusted me with the search was right to assume it was Goatskin who'd taken the things. I managed to find him and make him talk. Unfortunately, things aren't all that simple.
委托我调查这件事的澡堂老板猜对了，确实是山羊皮偷的东西，我找到了他，并让他说出了实情，但很不幸，事情没那么简单。
najdi_ukr_myslim_ze_uz_js_87QW
I think I'm close now. The miner's stolen stang should be around here somewhere.
我猜离目标不远了，失窃的矿工旗帜应该就在附近。
najdi_ukr_nasel_jsem_truh_nvrz
I was able to find the chest they care so much about, but it doesn't look like there are any valuables in it. It's decorated with holy pictures. Strange…
我终于找到了那个他们惦记许久的箱子，但是这个箱子看起来并非收纳着某种贵重宝物。箱子外部由神圣图饰装点着，很是奇怪…
najdi_ukr_pana_sindela_ur_qxEX
Schindel must have been robbed by the vagrant Goatskin. I'm looking for him anyway, so I might as well see what he has to say.
辛德尔一定是被流浪的山羊皮抢劫了。反正我也在找他，所以我不妨和他聊聊。
najdi_ukr_ted_je_potreba__LJKu
Now I have to head to Goatskin's hideout beneath Kuttenberg.
我得去山羊皮在库滕堡的地下藏身处。
najdi_ukr_vyrazili_jsme_d_myNz

Jan Posy and Miroslav Tugbone asked me to help with the Cumans who stole a chest of theirs, but I don't have time to chase after treasure. They're capable fellows and will surely manage without my help. After all, there are two of them.
扬·“花骨朵”和“扯骨”米洛斯拉夫请求我帮助他们从库曼人那里夺回失窃的箱子，但是我没有时间去完成此事。他们都是些能干的人，而且即便是没有我的帮助也定能夺回箱子，谁让他们是两个人呢。
najdi_vep_cenek_me_pozada_k7OK

Chenyek asked me to find Hog, who went to find out something about the mysterious symbols in Kuttenberg from a former thief, Hynek, and hasn't returned yet. Hog can take care of himself, but I should go check on him.
程叶科让我去找霍格。霍格去拜访曾当过盗贼的人了，为了了解有关库滕堡神秘符号的事情，现在还没有回来。霍格应该能照顾好自己，但我还是想要去看看他。
najdi_vep_ted_uz_nema_smy_NlHk
There's no use searching for Hog now.
现在就算找到霍格也没意义了。
najdi_vep_vepre_jsem_sice_nO8N

I managed to find Hog, but he got himself into an unpleasant situation. The fool killed the only person who could point us in the right direction regarding the symbols. Maybe he managed to get something out of him before he died.
我设法找到了霍格，但他让自己陷入了一个不愉快的局面。这个傻瓜杀了唯一能帮助我们解密符号的人。也许在那人死之前，他设法套出了一些东西。
najdi_v_h_o_pecetidlo_jse_bNQv
I'm not bothered anymore with the dead miner's seal.
我没必要再去操心已故矿主的那枚印章了。
najdi_vik_dorazil_jsem_na_IDXj
I've arrived at the place Black described to me.
我已抵达布莱克所描述的地点。
najdi_vik_musim_co_nejryc_QBhX
I have to find Victoria fast before she does anything.
我得赶在维多利亚做出傻事前找到她。
najdi_vlc_nasel_jsem_mist_pHbQ
I found the place the wolves stay during the day.
我找到了狼群白天停歇的地方。
najdi_vlc_pokud_budu_chti_GD2f

If I want to catch the wolves that keep attacking Siegfried´s sheep, I need to track them down. Siegfried says one of the sheep was killed on the path, across from his hut. That's where I should start my search.
要想抓住那些一直袭击西格弗里德羊群的狼，我就得追寻它们的踪迹。西格弗里德说，有只羊在他小屋对面的路上遇袭而死，我得在那里开始我的搜查。
najdi_vlc_pokud_budu_chti_jXl3

If I want to catch the wolves that keep attacking Siegfried's sheep, I need to track them down. On the way from Siegfried's hut I found a sheep torn into pieces. Maybe Mutt could pick up the wolves' scent.
要想抓住那些一直袭击西格弗里德羊群的狼，我就得追寻它们的踪迹。在途径西格弗里德小屋的道路上，我发现了一只被撕咬得七零八碎的羊羔，或许呆呆能从中闻出狼群的气味。
najdi_voj_nedaleko_ratibo_rGh5
Near Raborsch I found the remains of an old mill and, true enough, a military encampment among them.
在拉博施附近，我找到了一个老磨坊的遗址。而且军营的确就在其中。
najdi_voj_stopa_hromoveho_0v3b

So the trail of the thunderstone leads to the troops' camp... Peter said they had set up camp in the ruins of an old mill. I should be able to find it if I go from the fork in the road between the ponds and follow the water downstream.
那么雷石现在到了军营里……彼得说他们在废弃的老磨坊那扎营。那么我从池塘那边的岔路，顺着水流往下走应该就能找到。
najdi_vok_p2_vokraka_sem__0KMt
I found Volkmar in Grund, near a large house by the stables, he recently bought with money from God only knows what. I searched him and found a map showing the way to the secret mint among his stuff!
我在格兰德马厩旁的一处大屋子找到了沃尔克马尔，这屋子是他最近用一笔来路不明的钱购买的。我进行了一番搜索，在他的物品中发现了一张地图，其上指明了通往秘密铸币厂的路径！
najdi_vok_p2_vokraka_sem__NQED
I found Volkmar in Grund, near a large house by the stables, he recently bought with money from God only knows what. I dealt with him once and for all.
我在格兰德马厩旁的一处大屋子找到了沃尔克马尔，这屋子是他最近用一笔来路不明的钱购买的。最终，我彻底了结了他。
najdi_vok_vokraka_jsem_na_Tfjm

I found Volkmar in Grund, at a large house by the stables, he recently bought with money from God only knows what. He was ready for me, my investigation of the smelters had apparently caused quite a stir. Armed men attacked me and tried to kill me!
我在格兰德马厩旁的一处大屋子找到了沃尔克马尔，这屋子是他最近用一笔来路不明的钱购买的。很显然，我对冶炼厂的调查掀起了不小风波，而他也早已恭候多时。一群手持利器的人攻击了我，还企图将我杀死！
najdi_vok_vokrak_bydli_v__f96j
Volkmar lives in Grund, in a large house by the stables, he recently bought with money from God only knows what. I should pay him a visit. I'd better be careful though…
沃尔克马尔住在格兰德，他的居所是紧邻马厩的一座宽敞宅邸，是他最近用一笔来路不明的钱购买的。我得去拜访他，但是最好得小心点......
najdi_vor_lovci_se_zminil_CSUN
The gamekeeper mentioned a pack of wolves is on the hunt in the forest near Semine. Maybe I'll be lucky and I'll find Mutt there!
猎物看守人提到，塞米附近的树林里正有一群四处捕猎的狼，要是走运的话没准我能在那里找到呆呆！
najdi_vor_na_miste_prepad_0SKo
I didn't find Mutt under the rocks. That means he's alive! I should ask the people around here about him.
我没有在山崖下找到呆呆，那就说明它还活着！我得向附近的人打听它的下落。
najdi_vor_nasel_jsem_vore_2SyF
After a long, difficult journey, I managed to find Mutt. While I was looking for him, he joined a pack of wolves.
我终于在历经千辛万苦之后找到了呆呆。在我寻找它的这段时光里，它竟跟一群狼混到了一起。
najdi_vra_ted_kdyz_vim_ci_wTuM
Now that I know what poison was used on Chertan, I have to search all the suspects' tents. If I manage to find the poison, or at least the materials needed to make it, I'll have the murderer.
既然已经弄清了赫尔坦中的毒，我就得搜查所有可疑的帐篷。要是能找到那种毒药，哪怕是制作它的相关材料，我就能找到凶手。
najdi_vra_v_jednom_ze_sta_ndJL
I found the materials needed to make the poison used to kill Chertan in one of the tents.
我在一间帐篷里发现了用于制作毒害赫尔坦的毒药的材料。
najdi_vst_ruthardi_mi_rek_ROO5

The Ruthards told me about a secret passageway to Maleshov. I have to find its entrance and dig my way to the passageway so I can get to the tower unobserved. I found the old chapel. Now I have to look through its arch to find those ruins that Rosa was talking about. I have to go there and look for a stone cross. Once I find it, I have to go in the direction shown by the top of the cross. Then I should find another cross and once again go in the direction shown by its top. According to Rosa, I should then reach a marked spot where the entrance to the secret passageway is buried.
我从鲁瑟德一家那里得知了一条能够进入马列索夫的密道，我必须找到它的入口，然后挖开通道，就能神不知鬼不觉地潜入城堡。我找到了他们说的那个老教堂，据罗莎所说，废墟之中有一个倒下的石质十字架。如果我沿着十字架顶端指向的方向走，就会发现另一个十字架，以此类推，一路走下去，最后就能找到暗道被掩埋的入口了。
najdi_v_t_aulitz_je__8m5G

It seems von Aulitz is in the camp, but I don't have time for senseless revenge. The Almighty will weigh his sins soon enough, and the bastard won't escape God's punishment. I've got more important things to do, and all my friends depend on me. I can't let them down.
似乎冯·奥利茨就在营地里，但我没那闲心进行无谓的复仇。全知全能的神主很快就会审判他的罪行，那个混蛋别想逃过上帝的责罚。而现在，我还有要事在身，朋友们都依仗于我，绝不能让他们失望。
najdi_v_t_aulitz_je_pry_v_UC4g

I've been told von Aulitz is in the camp! That fucking bastard's here! Apparently sitting in that big, guarded house on the square. I shouldn't let this get in the way of my mission, but I have an itch to pay him a visit!
听说冯·奥利茨就在营地里！那个畜生就在广场上那个戒备森严的帐篷里！我不想让此事打乱我的计划，但还是迫切想要见到他！
najdi_v_t_aulitz_je_v_tab_EGNQ

Von Aulitz is in the camp, and I couldn't pass up the opportunity to visit him. It's strange: after all he did, I let him live. Our Lord will deal with him out soon enough. I don't want to defile myself with his blood.
冯·奥利茨就在营地里，我当然不会错过这个见他的机会。很奇怪，尽管他做尽坏事，我却饶了他一命。我相信上帝很快就会惩罚他，我也不想让他的血脏了我的手。
najdi_v_t_aulitz_je_v_tab_YmS8
Von Aulitz is in the camp. Or rather he was. Now he's with his Maker, who's weighing his sins. Rest in peace, you bastard!
冯·奥利茨就在营地里，只不过魂身分离罢了。现在的他已然站在他的造物主跟前，清算着自身犯下的罪孽。享受死亡吧，杂碎！
najdi_v_t_nakonec_sem_ho__t4TB
Von Aulitz is in the camp, and I couldn't pass up this opportunity to visit him. We had a long talk, and I almost thought I'd let him live, but he doesn't deserve it. Rest in peace, you bastard!
冯·奥利茨就在营地里，我也没错过这个跟他见面的机会。我们进行了一次漫长对话，我差点就刀下留情，但他不配得到我的原谅。去死吧，混蛋！
najdi_v_t_nasel_jsem_sama_yJDw

I couldn't leave him in the lurch! I searched the camp and found the building he was being kept in. And he wasn't there alone! That traitor Brabant was with him! I'd be only too happy to deal with him, but I must get to Sam fast.
我就不该对他弃之不顾！在将营地搜查了一番后，我发现了他曾被囚禁的地方，但是人却早已没了踪影！那个叛徒布拉班特当时肯定就和他在一起，我真是巴不得把他立马干掉！但是我必须尽快找到塞缪尔。
najdi_v_t_nedozvedel_jsem_3Y5m
I haven't heard what happened to Markvart von Aulitz. I should look for him in the camp.
马科瓦尔·冯·奥利茨目前的状况还尚不得知，我得在营地里找到他。
najdi_v_t_patral_jsem_po__C3uU

I tried to find out what happened to Markvart von Aulitz. I found him dead in the camp, where he evidently succumbed to his wounds. I took a final look at my parents' murderer, bringing our story full circle.
我正要打探马科瓦尔·冯·奥利茨的状况，结果发现他死在了营地里，显然受了伤的他终究是没能挺过去。我最后看了一眼这位杀害了我父母的凶手，为我们之间的恩怨点上了句号。
najdi_v_t_urcite_ho_drzi__g6HQ

If I go and look for him, I'll lose a lot of time, and every moment lost plays into the Praguers' hands. But if he's been caught and I leave him here, who knows what they'll do to him. He's no nobleman… sakra!
要去寻找他将会花费很多时间，而我们耗费的每一分钟都会让布拉格人变本加厉。但是如果我对被俘虏的他置之不理，谁知道那些人会干出什么事来呢，而且他又不是贵族…妈的！
najdi_zap_tenhle_mrtvy_me_sy0t
This dead man can't tell me anything about the broken sword. I have to look for another clue in the hermit's hovel.
死人不能告诉我关于这把断剑的任何事情。我必须在隐士的小屋里寻找另一条线索。
najdi_zap_ve_skrysi_za_ko_FIeX
I found a strange little diary in a stash behind the chimney. It wasn't dusty, so it can't have been there long.
我发现烟囱后面藏着一小本奇怪的日记。日记上没有灰尘，所以可能没放那多久。
najdi_zdr_mimochodem_mist_9MpN

Two pigs dying out of nowhere? Ignatius thinks there's a catch. The locals believe it's because of a curse of some sort, but the gravedigger reckons they were more likely poisoned. He told me to have a look around the creek in the woods below the cottage where the pigs go to drink. Maybe I'll find something suspicious.
两头猪竟毫无征兆地死亡？伊格内修斯认为那是由一场传染病所致。尽管人们认为那两头猪是受到了某种诅咒，但那位掘墓人还是坚信那更像是中了毒。他让我到农舍下方的森林里调查一处水源，据说那曾是猪仔们解渴的地方，没准我能在那里找到疑点。
najdi_zdr_mimochodem_nase_IjI4

Two pigs dying out of nowhere? Ignatius thinks there's a catch. The locals believe it's because of a curse of some sort, but the gravedigger reckons they were more likely poisoned. I took a look around the nearby stream and found a dead herd of deer rotting in the riverbed. It's no wonder this water didn't sit well with the pigs. I'll go back and tell Ignatius we need to take away more than just the two pigs.
两头猪竟毫无征兆地死亡？伊格内修斯认为那是由一场传染病所致。尽管人们认为那两头猪是受到了某种诅咒，但那位掘墓人还是坚信那更像是中了毒。我到附近的一片溪流调查了一番，发现了一群死在河床边的鹿，且早已腐烂不堪。如此看来，这片水源确实不适合作为家猪的饮用水源。我该回去了，得让伊格内修斯知道我们要运走的不只有那两只猪。
najdi_zik_ani_v_komnatach_Lp5c
Istvan himself might have the orders. He did take all our things, after all. But I didn't find them in his chambers.
密令可能就在伊斯特万手中，毕竟他把我们的东西都收走了。可是我并未在他的房间里找到密令。
najdi_zik_mozna_budou_roz_OkR0
The orders should be somewhere in the Crone, maybe in the nobles' chambers. I'll have a look there once I've settled things with Istvan.
密令应该在老妪塔某处，没准就在贵族的房间里。等处理了伊斯特万之后，我就去那里搜查一番。
najdi_zik_nekde_na_babe_b_4kOy
Somewhere in the Crone tower there should be orders from Sigismund. I'll check the scribe's chests, it would make sense for it to be there.
西格斯蒙德的密令应该在老妪塔某处。去检查抄写员的箱子，很有可能在里面。
najdi_zik_u_pisare_rozkaz_8JwH
One of the places I searched were the scribe's chambers, but the orders weren't there, so I had to keep looking.
我搜查过了抄写员的房间，却没在那发现密令，所以我只得继续寻找。
najdi_ziz_musim_se_podiva_V8Uu
I need to look for Zizka. I hope he didn't cause any trouble at the fortress last night. It seems I'll find him down in the courtyard.
我得去找杰式卡，希望他昨晚没在堡垒里惹麻烦。他似乎就在下面的院子里。
najdi_ziz_rano_jsem_chtel_W04i

Zizka's injuries looked horrible yesterday, but a solid night of sleep and the barber's care has evidently improved his mood. He doesn't want to accompany me to the audience because he doesn't like the Margrave.
杰式卡的伤势在昨天看起来相当严重，但经过一夜的睡眠和理发师的照料，他的情绪显然得到了改善。不过他不想陪我去觐见，因为他不喜欢侯爵，所以我只好自己去了。
najdi_ztr_nasel_jsem_bera_jd2i
I found the ram. He was grazing in a forest clearing, not far from the path.
我找到了那只公羊。他正在一片林间空地吃草，离道路不太远。
najdi_ztr_safarik_me_popr_Lfjt
Stanislav asked me to find his lost ram. He ran off somewhere to the east, probably to the clearing by the path in the forest. He'll apparently follow me if I have a carrot with me.
斯坦尼斯拉夫让我帮他找那只丢失的公羊。它跑到了东边的某个地方。可能是林间小径旁的空地。如果我带着胡萝卜，可能能把它引出来。
najdi_ztr_starsimu_z_vejm_eRxA
The older Vejmola has lost his gold St. Francis medal. Pavel said it must have been taken by a magpie, so I might find it in one of the nests in the village.
老维约莫拉弄丢了他那金制的圣弗朗西斯奖章。帕维尔认为那枚奖章一定是被一只喜鹊叼走的，或许在村里的某个鸟巢里就能找到。
najdi_ztr_starsimu_z_vejm_j5sH
The older Vejmola has lost his gold St. Francis medal. Pavel said it must have been taken by a magpie. He was right, I found it in one of the nests in the village.
老维约莫拉弄丢了他那枚金制的圣弗朗西斯奖章。而据帕维尔所言，那枚奖章一定是被一只喜鹊叼走的，他也果然没说错，我在村里的某处鸟巢里找到了那枚奖章。
najez_se_mam_hlad_jako_vl_q7UA
I'm as hungry as a wolf. I'd better have something to eat to get me fit and strong. Bozhena said I'd find something outside on the table. And if it's not enough, there's a pot of soup on the stove.
我饿得像头狼。最好吃点东西恢复体力和力量。博珍娜说，我可以到外面的桌子上找东西吃。如果不够的话，炉子上还有一锅汤。
naklon_si_ukazuje_se_ze_d_2zw8

It turns out the Hole in the Wall is not an ordinary alehouse. Nobody wants to talk to me. They all tell me to speak to the local boss Chenyek. I should try and get him to talk to me and find out what he knows about Goatskin.
谁曾想到“墙洞”竟是个非同寻常的酒馆。这里的人们惜字如金，有话要说就只能去找这里的头子程叶科。我得试着跟他谈谈，看看他是否了解山羊皮。
naklon_si_ukazuje_se_ze_d_rmJb
Now that I dared stand up to Goliath, the local bruiser, Chenyek might accept that I kind of fit in and tell me more about Goatskin.
既然我有勇气直面这里的大块头歌利亚，程叶科应该会把我当作自己人，向我透露更多与山羊皮有关的事情。
naklon_si_v_dire_jak_se_m_69IN

Nobody wanted to talk to me in the Hole in the Wall, as the local drinking hovel is called, so my only option was to win the respect of the local boss, Chenyek. It's true Goatskin said something in the tavern about spying for some lord, but his reputation meant nobody believed it, even though he did have coin, which was unusual for him. Later, a strange bunch of men turned up, dragged Goatskin out into the street and gave him a battering. Nobody's seen Goatskin since. But I got a tip where to look for him. It seems he mugs people in the streets between Hradek and the Horse Market.
在这个人称“墙洞”的酒馆里，没人愿意跟我说话，所以我唯一的办法就是赢得此处话事人程叶科的尊重。山羊皮曾在酒馆里说过为某些领主做间谍的事并非戏言，但他败坏的名声使得人们对此将信将疑，手捧钱财的他反而也显得更为诡异。不久前，一伙来路不明的人突然出现，将山羊皮拖到街道上并进行了一顿毒打，自此山羊皮便消失得无影无踪。如今我也取得了一些能帮助我找到他的线索，而据说他就在赫拉德克和马市之间的街道上抢劫行人。
nakup_si__aby_bohuta_v_ro_rXIa
In order to make himself look more credible, Godwin could strike up a conversation with Kuttenberg street traders and buy something from them.
为了让自己看起来更为可信，古德温得跟库滕堡街道上的商人们搭话，并从他们那里购买些东西。
nakup_si__bohuta_po_ceste_X0D1
On the way, Godwin engaged in a conversation with Kuttenberg traders in the Italian Street and even bought something from them.
古德温在路上与意大利街的库滕堡商人们聊上了几句，甚至还从他们那里买了点东西。
nalevej_v_musim_davat_dob_yITR
Wine pitchers are set out on the table by the chapel door.
教堂门口旁的桌子上摆放着不少红酒罐。
nalevej_v_zvladl_jsem_obs_1JU0
I managed to serve the Kuttenberg nobility without arousing suspicion that I was just pretending to be a waiter.
在不被发现是假冒侍从的情况下，我成功服侍了库滕堡的贵族阶级。
naloz_pyt_nakladani_zasob_HUgM
The loading of supplies went off without a hitch, and the cart was soon ready to depart.
给马车装货的工作进展顺利，马车很快就可以出发了。
naloz_pyt_pobocnik_michal_5fPH
Adjutant Michael mentioned I could help his people load the cart so it can leave. I can find the wagon in front of the stables in the fortress bailey.
副官迈克尔提到让我协助他的部下给马车装货，这样马车就能离开了。那辆马车现在就在堡场的马厩前。
naloz_pyt_pobocnik_michal_Asyf
Adjutant Michael mentioned I could help his people load the cart so it can leave. I can find the wagon in front of the stables in the fortress bailey.
副官迈克尔提到让我协助他的部下给马车装货，这样马车就能离开了。那辆马车现在就在堡场的马厩前。
naloz_pyt_pobocnik_michal_t5k3
Adjutant Michael mentioned I could help his people load the cart so it can leave. I can find the wagon in front of the stables in the fortress bailey.
副官迈克尔提到让我协助他的部下给马车装货，这样马车就能离开了。那辆马车现在就在堡场的马厩前。
naloz_pyt_pobocnik_michal_THHW
Adjutant Michael mentioned I could help his people load the cart so it can leave. I can find the wagon in front of the stables in the fortress bailey.
副官迈克尔提到让我协助他的部下给马车装货，这样马车就能离开了。那辆马车现在就在堡场的马厩前。
nanos_pyt_jako_vezen_jsem_CrSz

As a convict, I was given the task of hauling sacks from a bogged-down cart to the shed where the local blacksmith stores his charcoal. It's heavy work, but maybe while I'm doing it, I can find out how to help Hans.
作为一名囚犯，我的任务是把麻袋从一辆陷进泥潭的车里运到当地铁匠存放木炭的棚子里。这是一项繁重的工作，但也许在做这件事的时候，我可以发现帮助汉斯的办法。
nanos_pyt_jako_vezen_jsem_Gia8

nanos_pyt_jako_vezen_jsem_oARO

As a convict, I was given the task of hauling sacks from a bogged-down cart to the shed where the local blacksmith stores his charcoal. It's heavy work, but maybe while I'm doing it, I can find out how to help Hans.
作为一名囚犯，我的任务是把麻袋从一辆陷进泥潭的车里运到当地铁匠存放木炭的棚子里。这是一项繁重的工作，但也许在做这件事的时候，我可以发现帮助汉斯的办法。
nanos_pyt_na_rozdl_od_pan_wy8q

Unlike poor Hans, I was released from jail, but I was put to work. First I had to haul sacks from a bogged-down cart to a shed. It was tough work, but I didn't want to draw attention to myself by not putting my back into it.
与可怜的汉斯不同，我从监狱里被释放出来，但我需要做工。首先，我得把麻袋从一辆陷进泥潭的车里运到棚子里。这是一项繁重的工作，但我不想因为懈怠而引起别人的注意。
nasad_si__ptacek_se_chce__hyEU

Sir Hans wants to loosen up after the long ride with some swordplay, naturally with me. What an honour! He's waiting for me in the arena. Before we begin, I must get my armour on and let him know I'm ready to start.
长途跋涉之后，汉斯少主想放松一下，找人练剑。我自知躲不过陪练的命运，多么荣幸！他现下就在竞技场等我，但在亮剑前我得先穿上盔甲，准备就绪后再与之交谈。
nasad_si__ptacek_se_chtel_nV8s
Sir Hans wanted to loosen up after the long ride with some swordplay, naturally with me. What an honour! I put on my armour and let him know I'm ready to start.
长途跋涉之后，汉斯少主想放松一下，找人练剑。我自知躲不过陪练的命运，多么荣幸！我穿上盔甲，告诉他我已经准备好了。
nasedni_n_boudica_me_nech_wnxA
Boudica let me mount her.
波提卡允许我骑乘。
nasedni_n_boudica_si_niko_1ArU
Boudica won’t let practically anyone get near her. Let's see if I can mount her.
波提卡无论如何都不会让任何人靠近，但不妨让我试试能否骑上她。
nasedni_n_cesta_na_voze_d_XUBX
The journey to Kuttenberg was long and tortuous, but hopefully we've arrived on time.
前往库滕堡的旅途蜿蜒漫长，不过好在我们最终及时抵达。
nasedni_n_je_to_vazne_hez_iQWJ
Looks like they haven't sold the horse yet, or worse, eaten it! It's truly a beautiful animal. It'd be a shame to lose it.
看来马儿还没有被卖掉，下场也没坏到成为他们的盘中餐！它真是一匹俊美的马儿，要是失去它就太可惜了。
nasedni_n_na_nebakov_poje_Eaba
We'll ride to Nebakov. Another journey awaits my faithful Bibiana.
我们将骑马前往内巴科夫。比比亚娜，我最忠实的伙伴又踏上了新的旅程。
nasedni_n_nasedl_jsem_na__jIpa
I am ready. Now onwards to Nebakov!
我做好了准备，现在该前往内巴科夫了！
nasedni_n_nejrychlejsi_bu_Efwr
Looks like they haven't sold the horse yet, or worse, eaten it! I'll quickly saddle him up and we'll be off!
看来马儿还没有被卖掉，下场也没坏到成为他们的盘中餐！我得赶快给它套上马鞍，这样我们就能离开了！
nasedni_n_pridej_se_k_ost_llUt
I need to get on a wagon with the others and get to the city fast!
我得跟其他人一起登上马车，尽快进城！
nasleduj__dorazili_jsme_n_Wkch

We arrived in view of Trosky Castle, but on the road we encountered a company of Lord von Bergow's men led by one Captain Thomas. The situation was tense, but we managed to calm things down. Captain Thomas suggested that we should camp for the night, since we wouldn't make it there before nightfall.
特罗斯基城堡映入眼帘。此时我们路遇冯·波尔高大人一行人，领头的是托马斯队长。初遇，气氛十分紧张，不过后来得以相安无事。托马斯队长提议，既然我们无法赶在日落前抵达城堡，还是先扎营歇息，留待明日启程。
nasleduj__dosli_jsme_s_ma_CuPG
Me and Margaret have arrived outside the bastard's shop!
我和玛格丽特已经到了那杂碎的店外！
nasleduje_kostkari_mi_nab_6h5p
The dice players said they would lead me to Ranyek. I'm supposed to follow them.
赌客们打算带我去见拉涅克，我得跟着他们。
nasleduje_kostkari_mi_nab_7EOU

The dice players said they would lead me to Ranyek. So I followed them. That was a mistake. They led me to a pen full of shit. They said I would find Ranyek in there. He had drowned. That idiot tried to run away through the latrines after losing too much money again. But he never made it out. They wanted me to pay them or pull him out. So I promised I'd pull him out.
赌客们打算带我去见拉涅克，所以我跟上了他们。谁知这不过是场诡计，他们将我带到了一处堆满粪便的围栏，还说拉涅克就淹死在粪堆里。据说那个蠢货在输掉大笔钱以后，想从茅厕逃走，只不过他再也没有出来。赌客们让我要么偿还赌资，要不就把拉涅克从粪堆里捞出，所以我答应会将他捞出。
nasleduje_kostkari_mi_nab_IYTN

The dice players said they would lead me to Ranyek. So I followed them. That was a mistake. They led me to a pen full of shit. They said I would find Ranyek in there. He had drowned. That idiot tried to run away through the latrines after losing too much money again. But he never made it out. They wanted me to pay them or pull him out. Luckily, I talked my way out of it.
赌客们打算带我去见拉涅克，所以我跟上了他们。谁知这不过是场诡计，他们将我带到了一处堆满粪便的围栏，还说拉涅克就淹死在粪堆里。据说那个蠢货在输掉大笔钱以后，想从茅厕逃走，只不过他再也没有出来。赌客们让我要么偿还赌资，要不就把拉涅克从粪堆里捞出。万幸的是，我说服了他们。
nasleduje_kostkari_mi_nab_OW01

The dice players said they would lead me to Ranyek. So I followed them. That was a mistake. They led me to a pen full of shit. They said I would find Ranyek in there. He had drowned. That idiot tried to run away through the latrines after losing too much money again. But he never made it out. They wanted me to pay them or pull him out. But I refused.
赌客们打算带我去见拉涅克，所以我跟上了他们。谁知这不过是场诡计，他们将我带到了一处堆满粪便的围栏，还说拉涅克就淹死在粪堆里。据说那个蠢货在输掉大笔钱以后，想从茅厕逃走，只不过他再也没有出来。赌客们让我要么偿还赌资，要不就把拉涅克从粪堆里捞出，但是我拒绝了此提议。
nasleduje_kostkari_mi_nab_RDWb

The dice players said they would lead me to Ranyek. So I followed them. That was a mistake. They led me to a pen full of shit. They said I would find Ranyek in there. He had drowned. That idiot tried to run away through the latrines after losing too much money again. But he never made it out. They wanted me to pay them or pull him out. So I paid rather than wade through shit.
赌客们打算带我去见拉涅克，所以我跟上了他们。谁知这不过是场诡计，他们将我带到了一处堆满粪便的围栏，还说拉涅克就淹死在粪堆里。据说那个蠢货在输掉大笔钱以后，想从茅厕逃走，只不过他再也没有出来。赌客们让我要么偿还赌资，要不就把拉涅克从粪堆里捞出，为了不用去粪堆里走一遭，我支付了赌资。
nasleduj__ignac_ma_byteln_Ha0Q
Ignatius has a sturdy four-wheeler drawn by two horses, so at least we won't have to walk. It's a shame he won't let me drive, though.
伊格内修斯有一辆稳固的两驾马车，既然如此我们至少不必再徒步前行。但可惜的是伊格内修斯没打算让我驾驶马车。
nasleduj__jakmile_jsme_me_P4Ln
Me and Godwin went back down to the secret passageway. We were lucky - nobody came across Zizka or Katherine.
我和古德温回到了秘密通道里。杰士卡和凯瑟琳没被人撞见，我们真走运。
nasleduj__jsem_poprve_v_z_G1Tj
I have never been this far from home before. I should stay close to Zizka and Katherine so I don't get lost.
我从未离家这么远过。我应该紧跟杰式卡和凯瑟琳，以免迷路。
nasleduj__jsme_pod_utokem_SGh5
This is no time for heroism - Sir Hans and I need to vanish quickly, otherwise we're unlikely to get out of this with our lives!
现在可不是逞英雄的时候，我和汉斯少主必须赶快开溜，否则性命不保！
nasleduj__kubenka_jede_na_gy3u
Kubyenka knows the way to the place where we are to ambush the caravan transporting the captured Devil. I should follow him.
我们计划要伏击押运酒鬼的车队，而库宾卡知道伏击点的位置，我得跟着他。
nasleduj__kubenka_me_priv_aONo
Kubyenka led me to their old camp where the hand cannons were supposed to have been hidden. All we had to do was to find them.
库宾卡把我带到了他们的营地旧址，那些手炮应该就藏在这个地方，我们得找到它们。
nasleduj__kubenka_vi_kde__gtT2
Kubyenka knows where to find firearms that could help us rescue the Dry Devil. I'm supposed to go with him and help him find them.
库宾卡知道哪里可以找到能帮助我们救出酒鬼的枪炮，我得协助他找到那些枪炮。
nasleduj__kubenka_vi_kde__Qzaj
Kubyenka knows where to find firearms that could help us rescue the Dry Devil. I was supposed to go with him, but somehow, I lost him…
库宾卡知道哪里可以找到能帮助我们救出酒鬼的枪炮，本该跟随他的我却在不知不觉中与之走散。
nasleduj__mel_jsem_jit_s__OyNy
I was supposed to go to Latsek's home with Margaret, but nothing will come of it now.
我本该和玛格丽特一起去拉塞克的家，但现在已经毫无意义。
nasleduj__musime_za_nim_d_DvNx
We have to go and see him while he's in a weakened state, otherwise it will all have been for nothing!
我们必须趁着他还虚弱的时候去找他，否则一切都白费了！
nasleduj__musim_jit_za_sa_zG3e
Samuel's mother Sara is waiting for us at her house. I have to get to her quickly and take her to safety.
塞缪尔的母亲萨拉正在她的家里等着我们。我得尽快去找她，并将其带到安全之地。
nasleduj__na_hradbach_se__OWWZ
Something is happening at the castle walls. An alarm is being sounded at the gate. Something is approaching.
城堡的城墙上有情况。门口响起了警报。有东西在靠近。
nasleduj__nakonec_jsem_na_ZrFG
Kubyenka waited for me at their old camp where the hand cannons were supposed to have been hidden. All we had to do was to find them.
库宾卡在他们的营地旧址等着我，那些手炮应该就藏在这个地方，我们要做的就是找到它们。
nasleduj__nase_kompanie_v_GfCr
Our company set out to search for the cart, but I had other plans, and soon left Captain Gnarly and Lord Semine to their own devices.
我们一行人着手开始搜寻那辆马车，但我另有打算，很快就让格纳利队长和塞米大人自由行动了。
nasleduj__nase_kompanie_v_HxMc
Our company set out to search for the cart. I should stick with Lord Semine so I don't lose him.
我们一行人着手开始搜寻那辆马车。我应该紧跟着塞米大人，这样就不会走散了。
nasleduj__nase_skupina_po_3WZV

Our group continued on foot into the rocks. Lord Semine and Gnarly were telling each anecdotes from their childhood, so we almost missed the conversation and laughter coming from a gorge in the rocks.
我们一行人继续走入岩石之间。塞米大人和格纳利正在讲述他们的童年轶事。我们差点就错过了岩石峡谷中传来的谈话声和笑声。
nasleduj__nase_skupina_po_wOKC

Our group continued on foot into the rocks. Lord Semine and Gnarly were telling each anecdotes from their childhood and if I hadn't alerted them, they might have missed the conversation and laughter coming from a gorge in the rocks.
我们一行人继续走入岩石之间。塞米大人和格纳利正在讲述他们的童年轶事。要不是我提醒他们，他们可能就错过了岩石峡谷中传来的谈话声和笑声。
nasleduj__nase_spolecnost_20ne
Wounded, dirty, and tired, we arrived at Suchdol Fortress, where we were in for a surprise. Instead of Dry Devil, we met Margrave Jobst, who invited us to rest in the fortress.
我们伤痕累累，拖着疲惫不堪且脏污的身体抵达了苏赫多尔要塞，但在那里却发生了一些意外。我们见到的不是“酒鬼”，而是约布斯特侯爵，他邀请我们在堡垒里休息。
nasleduj__nejprve_nase_kr_vzgE
We made one stop along the way as Lord Semine wanted to test my fighting skills. Thankfully we came across a pig pen, which served as our fighting arena.
塞米大人想考验一下我的搏斗技能，所以中途我们停下了一段时间。好在我们碰巧路过一个猪圈，那里成了我们的搏斗场。
nasleduj__podarilo_se_nam_Qrpo
Erik's soldiers got into the Jewish quarter!
埃里克的部下已经进入了犹太区！
nasleduj__pokracujeme_pes_kgap
We continued on foot into the rocks. I have to keep my eyes peeled - we could easily be ambushed here.
我们继续走入岩石之间。必须留心观察——我们很容易在这里遭到伏击。
nasleduj__po_zuby_ozbroje_2hUO
Armed to the teeth, Kubyenka and I arrived at the ambush spot.
全副武装的库宾卡和我抵达了伏击点。
nasleduj__prazane_svuj_ut_2kdt
The Praguers will focus their attack on the side rampart. We have to move our defensive forces there.
布拉格人将集中进攻侧面城墙，我们必须将防守兵力转移到那里。
nasleduj__prazane_svuj_ut_MiZO
The Praguers will focus their attack on the side rampart. We need to move our defensive forces there.
布拉格人的进攻将集中在侧边城墙，我们必须将防守兵力转移到那里。
nasleduj__tbd_stci
But before that we need to equip ourselves for the journey. Chamberlain Ulrich is taking care of that.
但是在那之前，我们得为这趟旅程做好充足准备，管家乌尔里希将为我们提供帮助。
nasleduj__uz_mame_vsechno_jb6a
We've already got everything, so now I have to hurry back to Godwin. Zizka and Katherine are waiting.
东西都到手了，我得尽快跟古德温汇合。杰士卡和凯瑟琳还在等着我们。
nasleduj__za_chvili_doraz_IGg4

In a while we'll arrive at Trosky, where we're supposed to deliver a message to the lord of the castle. I'd better stick close to Capon. As the only noble in our company, he'll be the one to hand over the letter.
特罗斯基近在咫尺，我们此行目的是给当地领主传信。我得跟紧卡蓬。作为一行人中唯一的贵族，卡蓬将亲手向领主递交信函。
nasleduj__zastupce_mestan_iMs4
At the Italian Court, we were welcomed by the representative of burghers, Jerome Naaz, who escorted us through the courtyard to the Mint and to the Great Hall where the Church Council takes place.
我们在意大利宫受到了市民代表杰罗姆·纳兹的盛情欢迎，他还护送我们穿过庭院前往铸币厂，以及通常用于召开教会议会的大殿。
nasleduj__zastupce_mestan_K1Vk

The representative of burghers, Jerome Naaz, then welcomed us to the Italian Court and led us to the Mint and to the Great Hall. Godwin and Janosh headed to the Church Council. Meanwhile, the rest of the retinue was to make themselves at home in the kitchen…
在我们抵达意大利宫时，市民代表杰罗姆·纳兹向我们表达欢迎之情，还将我们带到铸币厂和大殿中，而古德温和亚诺什前往了教会议会。与此同时，其他随行同伴都快把厨房当成自己的家了......
nasleduj__zautocila_na_na_ltPL
An unknown band of armed men attacked us. Me and Sir Hans swam across the pond. Our company in the camp was slain to the last man and I was wounded too.
我们遭到了一队陌生兵寇的袭击。我和汉斯少主游过小湖，得以幸存。营地里所有人都被杀了，我也身负重伤。
nasleduj__z_brany_byl_sly_IXYY
An alarm could be heard from the gate. When we ran to see what was the matter, the army of Markvart von Aulitz was already on the horizon. The lord who led the sacking of Skalitz…
大门处可以听到警报声。当我们跑去查看时，马科瓦尔·冯·奥利茨的军队已经出现。是带头洗劫斯卡利茨的领主...
nastraz_p_dozvedel_jsem_s_26xy
I found out that Goatskin specialises in German merchants. Probably because they're rich and don't put up much of a fight. I thought I could use that. But how?
通过了解，我发现山羊皮专门抢劫德国商人，或许是因为此类商人更为富裕，而且向来鲜有反抗。或许我可以利用这点，但是该怎么办呢？
nastraz_p_dozvedel_jsem_s_OBWn

I found out that Goatskin specialises in German merchants. Probably because they're rich and don't put up much of a fight. But because of Goatskin not many of them visit the baths these days. But it seems there's one called Udo who goes there in the evenings. Maybe he'd help me lure Goatskin out.
通过了解，我发现山羊皮专门抢劫德国商人，或许是因为此类商人更为富裕，而且向来鲜有反抗。但正因为山羊皮的劫掠，这段日子很少有德国商人再造访澡堂，不过据说有位名为乌多的人一到晚上就会去那里，没准他能帮我引出山羊皮。
natroskach_ber_koldovu_se_5Dzw
Help Kolda with his axe.
帮助科尔达打磨斧头。
natroskach_dones_lek_zpat_4qYW
Take the medicine back to Thomas.
将药物带给托马斯。
natroskach_dones_podkovu__gXno
Take the horseshoe to Kabat.
将马蹄铁交给卡巴特。
natroskach_nabrus_koldovi_xXeu
Bring Kolda the sharpened axe.
将磨利的斧头交给科尔达。
natroskach_najdi_hejtmana_mP7Q
Get to Thomas.
去找托马斯。
natroskach_najdi_si_praci_EU1G
Find work around the gallows.
在绞刑架周围找份差事。
natroskach_nanos_pytle_do_xXwH
Haul the sacks to the charcoal shed.
将麻袋搬至木炭棚。
natroskach_obstarej_tonic_DHWT
Get hold of fever tonic.
取得退烧药。
natroskach_odemkni_fance__srWq
Unlock Fanka's spice chest.
打开芬卡的香料箱。
natroskach_prines_kovari__tg2t
Take care of the horseshoe for the blacksmith.
为铁匠准备马蹄铁。
natroskach_promluv_si_s_k_lsuT
Talk to the blacksmith.
与铁匠交谈。
natroskach_sezen_kabatovi_gCP5
Find Kabat's rosary.
找到卡巴特的念珠。
natroskach_sezen_panu_kom_DrPz
Get hold of something for the chamberlain's stomach.
给管家弄点治疗胃病的药物。
natroskach_sezen_panu_kom_xvpS
Get hold of some stomach potion for the chamberlain.
给管家弄点胃药。
natroskach_zachran_pana_p_33fA
Save Sir Hans from execution.
营救汉斯爵士，帮他逃脱死刑。
natroskach_zjisti_jaky_le_hmZb
Find out what medicine to give to Captain Thomas.
查明托马斯队长服用的药物。
nauc_se_m_cert_mi_slibil__silJ
The Dry Devil promised to teach me the master strike. All I need to do is meet him at the arena near the Devil's Den when he's there.
酒鬼承诺会教我大师一击。我要做的就是与他在“魔窟”附近的决斗场会合。
nauc_se_m_cert_mi_slibil__ujFb
Dry Devil promised me he'll teach me master strike. He taught me step by step how to perform this ultimate technique - the most difficult a swordsman can learn.
酒鬼承诺会教我大师一击。他循序渐进地向我传授了如何施展这种顶级的剑技——这对于一个剑士来说是最难学技巧。
nauc_se_m_mistr_kocour_uz_29eL
Master Tomcat won't teach me anything anymore because he's dead. I'll have to find someone else to learn the master strike from.
公猫大师已死，没办法从他那里学到大师之击了。我得另求高明。
nauc_se_m_v_arence_mi_vas_Nqt1
In the arena, Tomcat will show me how to perform a master strike.
公猫会在竞技场中教我如何施展大师之击。
nauc_se_m_v_arenec_mi_pak_SIEj
In the arena, Tomcat showed me step by step how to perform a master strike. Apparently it is the ultimate sword fighting technique.
在竞技场，公猫向我逐步展示如何施展大师之击。显然这是一种终极的剑术格斗技巧。
nauc_se_s_nauc_se_strilet_ig2U
Zizka's band has one truly diabolical secret: gunpowder and special metal pistoles that can shoot lead balls.
杰式卡的队伍中竟深藏着一个令人胆寒的秘密，与火药和某种能够发射铅弹的特殊金属枪支有关。
nauc_se_s_zatraceny_certo_ehwX

Bloody handgonne! Aiming was nigh impossible and it was more dangerous to us than to those straw targets on the other side. Anyhow, the result unexpectedly dampened Godwin's initial enthusiasm and belief in any promising future for firearms.
去他妈的手炮！这东西几乎很难进行瞄准，而且与对面那些稻草靶子相比，它对我们来说更为危险。总而言之，如此结果出乎预料，古德温最初对它们的热情和美好期盼也随之消减。
nauc_se_z_se_zakladnimi_f_A2K4
Vauquelin Brabant is supposed to help me with some basic Italian phrases.
瓦奎林·布拉班特能够教我一些基本的意大利语。
nauc_se_z_zaklady_vlastin_fYGY
I had a hard time learning the basics of Italian, but at least I'm not the worst of our group. We have to be careful and not let Adder speak too much.
对我而言，基础意大利语非常难学，好在至少我不是团队里说得最烂的。我们要留意的是阿德尔，可不能让他过多发言。
naverbuj__do_moji_roty_se_0Ozs
Janek and Jaroslav, Radzig Kobyla's men, volunteered for my company.
雅内克和雅罗米尔，拉德季·科比拉的人，他们自愿加入我的连队。
naverbuj__do_moji_roty_se_D2EJ
A few of Radzig Kobyla's men volunteered for my company. I should have them assemble with the others.
拉德季·科比拉的几个人自愿加入我的连队。我应该让他们和其他人会合。
naverbuj__jestli_mistni_l_2QF7
The local hunter Dobrosh Pecker won't be shooting deer anymore but Praguers as a member of my company.
本地的猎人“啄木鸟”多布罗什不会再猎鹿了。作为我们连队的一员，他将把箭矢瞄准布拉格人。
naverbuj__jestli_mistni_l_zw0s
The local hunter Dobrosh Pecker won't be shooting deer anymore but Praguers. I should have him assemble with the rest of the company.
本地的猎人“啄木鸟”多布罗什不会再猎鹿了，他的箭矢将瞄准布拉格人。我得让他和连队的其他人会合。
naverbuj__kozlik_je_jedni_6Dsb
Kozliek has been serving under Zizka for a long time. Now he's a member of my company.
科兹⾥克曾在杰式卡手下工作了很久。现在他是我连队的一员了。
naverbuj__kozlik_je_jedni_r0GH
Kozliek has been serving under Zizka for a long time. Now he'll be reporting to me.
科兹⾥克曾在杰式卡手下工作了很久。现在他要向我报道了。
naverbuj__nejzkusenejsimi_HCIM
The most experienced members of my company are Samuel and Kubyenka. I should find them and have them assemble with the others.
我们连队最有经验的人就是塞缪尔和库宾卡。我应该找到他们，并让他们和其他人会合。
naverbuj__nejzkusenejsimi_oeeO
The most experienced members of my company are Samuel and Kubyenka. I had them assemble with the others.
我们连队最有经验的人就是塞缪尔和库宾卡。我应该让他们和其他人会合。
naverbuj__obrany_tvrze_se_50PB
Every man must pitch in to help defend the fortress. Wolfram the knacker is no soldier, but still, he is a member of my company and he should assemble with the others.
每个人都必须参与保卫堡垒，屠夫沃尔夫勒姆不是士兵，但他也是我们连队的一员，他应该与其他人一起集合。
naverbuj__obrany_tvrze_se_sGJh
Every man must pitch in to help defend the fortress. Wolfram the knacker is no soldier, but still, he is a member of my company.

naverbuj__zizka_mi_dal_ve_1cxY
Zizka assigned two of his most experienced men to my company: Mikesh and Kozliek.
杰式卡把他最有经验的两个人派给了我的连队：米凯什和科兹⾥克。
naverbuj__zizka_mi_dal_ve_1zA6
Zizka put me in command of two of his experienced men. I’ll likely find Mikesh and Kozliek on the battlements.
杰式卡让我指挥他那两个身经百战的手下。我去城垛上或许就能找到米凯什和科兹⾥克。
naverbuj__zizka_mi_dal_ve_6rKr
Zizka assigned one of his most experienced men to my company. I should speak to Mikesh.
杰式卡把他最有经验的人派给了我的连队：我应该和米凯什谈谈。
naverbuj__zizka_mi_dal_ve_V7N8

Bonnie told me the creator of the saltpetre pit is none other than the Troskowitz gravedigger. I'll go and see him at the cemetery past Troskowitz. It should be near the butcher's cabin, where I could pick up some sausage as a gift.
邦妮告诉我，硝石坑的开掘者不是别人，正是特罗斯科维茨的掘墓人，我也将前往特罗斯科维茨之外的墓地拜访他。那个墓地应该就在一间肉铺附近，我可以在那里弄点香肠，作为给掘墓人的见面礼。
navstiv_h_od_bonky_jsem_z_vvju
Bonnie told me the creator of the saltpetre pit is none other than the Troskowitz gravedigger, Ignatius, but he wasn't willing to tell me where it is.
邦妮告诉我，硝石坑的开掘者不是别人，正是特罗斯科维茨的掘墓人伊格内修斯，可他却不愿告知我硝石坑的位置。
navstiv_l_zastavil_jsem_s_zax6
I stopped by Gamekeeper Vostatek, not to get a new job from him, but to end his sad and miserable life.
我顺路拜访了猎人沃斯塔克，但并非为了讨一份新工作，而是为了结束他那悲惨的一生。
navstiv_m_nas_novy_spojen_cLWJ
Our new ally Musa and Katherine have set up an infirmary in the fortress to take care of the wounded. It seems we will need their help.
我们的新盟友穆萨和凯瑟琳已经在堡垒里建立了一个医务室以照顾伤员。看来我们需要他们的帮助。
navstiv_m_nas_novy_spojen_cONk
Our new ally Musa and Katherine have set up an infirmary in the fortress to take care of the wounded. I can go and see if they need help with anything.
我们的新盟友穆萨和凯瑟琳已经在堡垒里建立了一个医务室以照顾伤员。我可以去看他们是否需要帮助。
