nebo_zust_erik_se_utoku_n_UzbH

Erik did not participate in the attack on Skalitz. I certainly don’t need to take revenge on him, and maybe I should just stay at the castle. If I want to stay here, I should probably discuss it with Zizka and tell him what I've decided.
埃里克没有参与对斯卡利茨的袭击，所以我当然没必要向他复仇。或许我应该就待在城堡里。如果要留在这的话，我也许该和杰式卡商量一下，告诉他我的决定。
nebo_zust_pomsta_vuci_eri_BNMD
Giving Erik the chance to get revenge would be pointless. Zizka and I both agreed on that. Our conversation, however, was interrupted by a disturbance in the outer bailey.
向埃里克复仇毫无意义。我和杰式卡都同意这一点。但是我们的谈话被城堡外的骚乱打断了。
nech_radm_dodrzel_jsem_na_RS3L
I honoured my agreement and let Radmil win.
我遵守了约定，并让拉德米尔赢得了决斗。
nech_radm_mel_bych_nechat_xWlp
I should let Radmil win like we agreed.
我该遵照我们先前的约定，让拉德米尔获胜。
nech_radm_porusil_jsem_na_DSe5
I broke our agreement and won the duel, even though Radmil and I had other arrangements.
尽管拉德米尔与我另有商量，但我最终违反约定并赢下了决斗。
nech_radm_ted_uz_nema_smy_Xd1g
Now there is no point in worrying about who should have won.
现在没必要再操心谁才应该是胜者了。
nech_se_n_nebylo_to_lehke_ai3S
It wasn't easy, but I managed to join the Prague regiment of Sigismund's forces. All I have to do now is find a way to make them leave the camp for a while. Then we'll seize their cannon on the road.
尽管来之不易，但我还是成功混进了西格斯蒙德手下的布拉格军队当中。现在我要做的就是想办法让他们离开营地一阵子，这样我们便能在路上拦截他们的火炮。
nech_se_n_s_katerinou_jsm_U7Do

Katherine told me that I should go and see a soldier called Stephen Crow who lives near the shooting range and pretend to enlist in the Prague regiment in Sigismund's camp. Then I should somehow try to get the Praguers to take the cannon out of the camp, where it will be easier to steal.
凯瑟琳让我去见一个名叫斯蒂文·克劳的人，他就住在靶场附近，通过他我就能假装应征，混进西格斯蒙德营地的布拉格军队当中。后续我应该想办法将布拉格人的火炮弄出营地，这样便能更轻易地将火炮偷走。
nech_se_p_misto_podvadeni_eqp4

After I won all the bouts, Tobias, who everyone calls Darling, asked me to have one more bout with him, which I would lose on purpose. Instead of throwing the fight I trained Darling for a while and taught him a few tricks. It increased his confidence a bit so now maybe Stanley will leave him alone. In return, Darling said he'd teach me something about the animals he takes care of.
未尝一败的我完成了所有搏斗，而这位人称“达令”的托比亚斯却还想向我发起挑战，并希望我故意输掉对局。但与其将胜利拱手相让，我最终决定向达令提供短暂的训练，并向他传授了些许战斗技巧，这也稍微提振了他的自信，或许斯塔尼克也将因此不再烦扰他。而作为回报，达令说他可以向我传授一些他在与动物相处时参悟的心得。
nech_se_p_nechal_jsem_se__hC5w

After I won all the bouts, Tobias, who everyone calls Darling, asked me to have one more bout with him, which I would lose on purpose, in hopes of Stanley leaving him alone. I told myself, why not get pummeled for a good cause? The victory was already mine anyway. I got a proper beating, but it made Tobias happy, and if it helps him not get bullied, then I'll be happy for him too.
未尝一败的我完成了所有搏斗，而这位人称“达令”的托比亚斯却还想向我发起挑战，并希望我故意输掉对局，好让他不再受到斯塔尼克烦扰。我也认为，出于善意而挨揍又何尝不可，毕竟我已尝过了胜利的滋味儿。尽管我遭了一顿胖揍，但是托比亚斯很是高兴，如果这能从此让他免受欺凌，那我也会为他开心的。
nech_se_p_nechal_jsem_se__TkDH
I let myself be persuaded to fight again, but I definitely did not intend to lose on purpose. So Darling took another loss and plenty of shame to boot.
被说服的我决定再打一场，但却无意将胜利拱手相让，达令也因此再尝败绩，并受到了从头到脚的耻辱。
nech_se_p_potom_co_jsem_v_1ZCh
After I won all the bouts, Tobias, who everyone calls Darling, asked me to have one more bout with him, which I would lose on purpose, in hopes of Stanley leaving him alone.
未尝一败的我完成了所有搏斗，而这位人称“达令”的托比亚斯却还想向我发起挑战，并希望我故意输掉对局，好让他不再受到斯塔尼克烦扰。
nech_se_p_potom_co_jsem_v_zQKz

After I won all the fights, Tobias, who everyone here calls Darling, asked me if I would fight him one more time and this time let him win. He says everybody just laughs at him here and this would help him boost his reputation a bit.
未尝一败的我完成了所有搏斗，而这位人称“达令”的托比亚斯却还想向我发起挑战，并希望我故意输掉对局，如此一来，时常被众人嘲笑的他将因此得以获取人们的些许尊重。
nech_se_p_proc_se_nenecha_Hbz5

After I won all the bouts, Tobias, who everyone calls Darling, asked me to have one more bout with him, which I would lose on purpose. I went along with it but certainly had no intention of rolling over. So Darling took another loss and plenty of shame to boot.
未尝一败的我完成了所有搏斗，而这位人称“达令”的托比亚斯却还想向我发起挑战，并希望我故意输掉对局。尽管嘴上同意了他的要求，但是我并没有将胜利拱手相让的打算，因此达令的战绩再添一败，他也感受到了从头到脚的巨大耻辱。
nech_se_p_proc_se_nenecha_nDwn
Why not get pummeled for a good cause? The victory was already mine anyway. I got a proper beating, but it made Tobias happy, and if it helps him not get bullied, then I'll be happy for him too.
出于善意而挨揍又何尝不可呢？毕竟我已尝过了胜利的滋味儿。尽管我遭了一顿胖揍，但是托比亚斯很是高兴，如果这能从此让他免受欺凌，那我也会为他开心的。
nech_se_v_lazebnice_se_o__fId2
I got beaten up a bit and I need to get myself together before the next duel. I can either take care of myself or else go to the local healer.
我刚被揍得不轻，要么自己收拾收拾，要么就去看看当地的医生，总之最好让自己在下一场决斗之前重新打起精神来。
nech_se_v_potrebuju_troch_HbAe
I've taken some beating and I need to patch myself up. I can either do it myself or visit the local healer.
我身上挨了几拳，需要稍做治疗。我可以到附近的医生那里看看，也可以进行自我疗伤。
nech_se_z_chodit_po_vinic_S2ET
I can't just stroll into a vineyard, people get their hands cut off for that. So I found a way around it and got myself employed as a hired hand.
我不能随便进入葡萄园，这样可能会被砍掉双手。所以我想了个办法，让自己成为了一名雇工。
nech_se_z_jednou_z_moznos_A5Sf
One way to be able to move about the vineyard undisturbed is to be employed there. At this time of year, they take on hired hands.
能够在葡萄园随意活动的一个方法是成为雇工。在每年的这个时候，他们会雇佣一些人。
nech_se_z_jednou_z_moznos_eOek
One of the ways to move around the vineyard undisturbed was to get hired as a labourer. I tried that, but it's not a job for me.
要想在葡萄园内肆无忌惮地行走，办法之一就是成为其中的一名劳工。尽管已做出尝试，但我显然不是做劳工的料子。
nechuta_z_nechuta_se_uz_p_wWJ4
Natan won't find the truth about the werewolf now.
纳坦再也无法知晓与狼人有关的真相了。
negotiate_nastoupil_jsem__UE7j

I told László that I know what happened to Peter. His response surprised me. Not batting an eyelid, he made me an offer, a rather dishonourable one. In my situation, though, it would be foolish to turn it down. I do feel sorry for Jan though…
我告诉拉斯洛，我知道彼得发生了什么。他的反应让我吃惊。他眼皮都不眨一下，给我开了个条件，一个相当可耻的条件。不过，如果我拒绝，就显得愚蠢。但我确实为杨感到难过......
negotiate_oslovil_jsem_la_Qaz6

I spoke to László and introduced myself as Jan's intermediary. Although László received me, during our negotiations he made it abundantly clear that he was the one setting conditions. He agreed the handover would take place on neutral ground, but when I wanted to see the captive, László adamantly refused. I hope Jan won't be disappointed with the outcome.
我与拉斯洛交谈，说自己是杨的中间人。虽然拉斯洛接待了我，但在我们的谈判中，他非常清楚地表示，他才是开出条件的人。他同意在中立地点进行交接，但当我要看俘虏时，拉斯洛坚决拒绝。我希望杨不会对这个结果感到失望。
negotiate_p_laszla_jsem_r_fT31
I immediately told László I know what happened to Peter. László claimed that Jan will certainly want to bury Peter's body. We agreed where the body will be handed over. Jan should be cautious though…
我立即告诉拉斯洛我知道彼得发生了什么。拉斯洛称，杨肯定会想埋葬彼得的尸体。我们商定了要在哪里进行尸体交接。但杨应该谨慎行事......
negotiate_p_nejak_to_nevy_sFuh
That didn't work out. The woodcutters won't let me have the body for good!
事与愿违！伐木工们根本就不想交出盖萨的尸体！
negotiate_p_premluv_preda_d8TL
I hope I can talk the woodcutters' foreman into handing Gejza's body over.
希望我能说服伐木工头将盖萨的尸体交还。
negotiate_p_vyreseno_muzu_tfHS
I made a deal with the woodcutters to bring back Gejza's body.
我与伐木工们达成共识，取回了盖萨的尸体。
nekdo_z_m_p_muzikanti_jso_KXEh
Michael and George will never achieve earthly fame now, but perhaps their art will be recognised in the hereafter...
迈克尔和乔治再也无法实现世俗意义上的成名了，但或许他们的创作会在未来得到认可......
nekdo_z_v_vytahl_jsem_pri_ry0Z
I pulled out a weapon during the tavern brawl... And it ended in bloodshed. There's no point in dealing with the Cumans now.
在那场酒馆斗殴中，我拔出了武器......最后以杀戮收场，现在已没必要再应付那些库曼人了。
nemcuvpok_najdi_poklad_UTP5
Find the treasure.
找到宝藏。
nemcuvpok_odnes_zbozi_pre_F2Do
Take the goods to a trafficker.
将货物带给走私商。
nemcuvpok_ziskej_zpet_saty_a4Ot
Get the clothes back.
取回衣物。
nemcuvpok_ziskej_zpet_sta_HtTo
Get the old sword back.
取回老旧的剑。
nemcuvpok_ziskej_zpet_sva_aU3e
Get the holy statuette back.
取回雕像。
nemcuvpok_zrada_tovarysst_6iWv
Quest fail
任务失败
nenapadne_chtel_jsem_ty_b_QnNo
I was going to pour the fleas in the basket of clean laundry, but they saw me do it! That's not good. I'm certain they'll clean it up before they spread anywhere. Nothing will come of this now.
我本打算将跳蚤放入装着干净衣物的篮子里，但是却被逮了个正着！可恶，人们肯定会在跳蚤扩散之前将衣物清洗干净，现在一切计划都已落空。
nenapadne_kos_s_cistym_pr_xokN
The basket of clean laundry is infested with fleas.
那一篮子干净衣物里已经布满了跳蚤。
nenapadne_nenapadne_vysyp_Plp5
I'll pour the little buggers into the basket of clean laundry beside Naaz's tub when nobody's looking. And then I'll just let them do their thing.
我得趁着四下无人之时，将这些小麻烦精倒进纳兹浴池旁的一篮干净衣物里，然后就任由它们大展拳脚吧。
nenapadne_vedle_nazovy_ka_PVwc
Next to Naaz's tub is his laundry chest with clean clothes, and now with a whole load of fleas. This will be an experience he will never forget!
纳兹的浴盆旁安静地躺着他那装满干净衣物的箱子，而现在里边早已跳蚤肆虐，如此经历必会让他终生难忘！
nenapadne_vedle_nazovy_ka_QHOo
Next to Naaz's tub is his laundry chest with clean clothes that I wanted to pour the fleas in, but they saw me do it. Sakra! Nothing will come of this now.
纳兹的澡盆旁边就放着他的衣物箱，里面装着干净的衣服。我本想将跳蚤放入其中，却被众人逮了个正着。妈的！一切计划都已落空。
nenapadne_vedle_nazovy_ka_zTdh
Naaz's laundry chest with clean clothes is next to his tub. The fleas will love it in there.
纳兹那装满干净衣物的箱子就放在他的澡盆旁，想必跳蚤们一定会喜欢那个“新家”的。
nenech_ka_kardinala_pozza_w6q8

Two aides led Cardinal Pozzo to the horses and all three of them fled, while the rest took up arms. As the others fought, I mounted my horse and followed the fleeing trio. Fortunately, I managed to stop them before anyone noticed us.
两名随从将红衣主教波佐带上了马，三人随之就扬长而去，与此同时，其他随从则拔出了武器。趁着人们打斗之时，我骑上了马，紧跟那逃离而去的三人，所幸终于赶在被人察觉之前拦住了他们。
nenech_ka_neohlasena_audi_1IAY

The unannounced audience didn't go well. Godwin was unable to get more than two sentences together and Kubyenka ended up with a knife in his leg. To make matters worse, two aides led Cardinal Pozzo to the horses and all three of them fled.
我等未经通报便擅自与红衣主教会面，而结果并不顺利。古德温压根说不出两句连贯的话，而库宾卡的腿最后还挨了一刀。更糟糕的是，两名随从将红衣主教波佐带上了马，三人随之就扬长而去。
nesmi_pro_brana_byla_zaji_v3QI
We defended the gate to the fortress and the Prague infantry had to retreat.
我们守住了堡垒城门，布拉格步步兵团不得不撤离。
nesmi_pro_brana_byla_ztra_8QUg
As soon as the Praguers broke through the gates, our defence became more than desperate.
布拉格人攻破城门的那一刹那，我们的抵抗便显得不堪一击。
nesmi_pro_pokousi_se_pror_IKN3
The Praguers are back on the offence, this time trying to break through the gate directly. We have to force them to retreat. The gate must not fall!
布拉格人再次袭来，而这一次，他们竟试图直接攻破城门。我们必须把他们打退，绝不能让城门沦陷！
nespust_p_dohodli_jsme_se_ZI5d
We agreed that, I'll launch a stealth attack on the soldiers. Let's hope it goes well.
我们决定暗杀那些士兵，但愿一切顺利。
nespust_p_mel_jsem_stesti_Ec21
I got lucky and managed to resolve things quietly. Sometimes the dagger is mightier than the sword.
真是万幸，我不声不响地干掉了那些士兵，有时候匕首可真是比剑还要称手呢。
nespust_p_nekdo_si_me_mus_jn78
Someone must have noticed me!
我被发现了！
nettlegat_bozena_rikala_z_2uRh
Bozhena said that there's a path that leads from behind the cottage through the rocks to a glade where I'll find the sage she needs.
博珍娜说，小屋后面有一条路，穿过岩石，通向一片林中空地，那里有她需要的鼠尾草。
neutop_se_nevim_sice_jak__VSqK
We were sparring a bit, and suddenly I found myself in the middle of the pond! I don't know how, but I managed to return to the shore safely.
我们只是争论了几句，结果我就突然掉池塘里去了！我也搞不懂当时做了什么，反正我是平平安安回到岸上了。
neutop_se_vyhral_jsem_sou_wzIk
I won a swimming competition and found myself in the middle of the pond on some log. One wrong step and… No! I mustn't drown!
我赢了一场游泳比赛，发现自己抱着一跟木头漂在池塘中间。稍有不慎就…不行，我可不能淹死！
newborn__event_caption_4hPL
Happy man
兴高采烈的男人
newborn__event_description_S1Wc
You see a cheerful man. He's probably had a drink or two. He laughs and calls out cheerfully.
你在路上看到了一个兴致高昂的男人，大概是刚喝了两杯酒。他凝视着你，两眼放光，随即便兴奋地大笑、叫唤起来。
newborn__player_caption_wKaD
Happy man
兴高采烈的男人
newborn__player_descripti_ayD2
There's a man in high spirits standing on the road. When he sees you, he calls out on you cheerfully, overflowing with happiness.
路上有一个兴致高昂的男人。他一看到你，便兴奋地叫起你来，那股高兴劲儿简直溢于言表。
new_dones_done_lol_uf7N
I gave Katz the document he sent me to get.
我将卡茨委托我取得的文件交给了他。
new_dones_velitel_dezerte_j7Dm
I finally found the lost charter. Now all I have to do is take it to my camp commander.
我终于找到了那遗失的特许状，现在只需将其交给营地里的指挥官即可。
nobody__event_caption_FqLL
Accident
意外
nobody__event_description_pPXw
You saw some dead bodies by the side of the road. Hard to tell how long they've been there or what killed them. But it wasn't death by natural causes.
你在路旁发现了几具尸体，但很难看出他们在那里躺了多久，也很难说清他们到底死于何人何物之手，总之他们绝非自然死亡。
nobody__player_caption_ZfaK
Accident
意外
nobody__player_description_EH6B
You saw some dead bodies by the side of the road. Hard to tell how long they've been there or what killed them. But it wasn't death by natural causes.
你在路旁发现了几具尸体，但很难看出他们在那里躺了多久，也很难说清他们到底死于何人何物之手，总之他们绝非自然死亡。
nomadshon_to_se_nepovedlo_ZcYt
It didn't work out. I can probably forget about solving the Voivode's family troubles.
失败了。我大概可以放弃解决司令官的家庭问题了。
noseni_py_mam_zase_nosit__qUm1

I'm supposed to lug around sacks of flour, ideally long enough to make at least ten groschen. Which, if my counting isn't out, should only take about twenty years. I reckon the children around here must be born with sacks over their shoulders.
要赚到至少十枚格罗申我可得搬很久的面粉搬。如果我没算错的话，大概要花上将近二十年的时间。看来附近的孩子生来就得背麻袋。
noseni_py_nejdriv_to_vypa_xG37
I thought I'd have to spend ages lugging sacks of flours back and forth to make some coin, but Kreyzl couldn't have expected one of the sacks to rip open and a load of trouble to come spilling out.
本以为为了赚点钱我得搬运面粉搬到天荒地老。可克雷泽未曾料想到，一袋面粉包装的撕裂让一连串的麻烦接踵而至。
noseni_py_tahat_pytle_s_m_qqM7
I didn't feel like lugging around sacks of flour, so I killed the miller. He should've given me a better job!
我可不想走来走去搬运袋装面粉，所以我杀死了那磨坊主。谁叫他不让我干一份更体面的活呢！
nos_pytle_jenze_pak_se_v__Av7C
But then there was some… unpleasantness in the tavern, so I didn't finish hauling the sacks.
后来酒馆内发生了一些......不愉快的事情，因此我没能搬完所有面粉。
nos_pytle_mam_zase_nosit__EmVc

I'm supposed to lug around sacks of flour, ideally long enough to make at least ten groschen. Which, if my counting isn't out, should only take about twenty years. I reckon the children around here must be born with sacks over their shoulders.
要赚到至少十枚格罗申我可得搬很久的面粉搬。如果我没算错的话，大概要花上将近二十年的时间。看来附近的孩子生来就得背麻袋。
nos_pytle_mam_zase_nosit__ttQx

I'm supposed to lug around sacks of flour, ideally long enough to make at least ten groschen. Which, if my counting isn't out, should only take about twenty years. I reckon the children around here must be born with sacks over their shoulders.
要赚到至少十枚格罗申我可得搬很久的面粉搬。如果我没算错的话，大概要花上将近二十年的时间。看来附近的孩子生来就得背麻袋。
nos_pytle_mel_bych_se_pus_Fe4i
I should get to work - the sacks are waiting.
得动身干活了，那些面粉在等着我呢。
nos_pytle_pytle_k_odnosen_mpp1
The sacks are waiting on a cart.
那些面粉正堆放在马车上。
nos_pytle_pytle_k_odnosen_SkTs
The sacks are scattered on the ground.
面粉袋四散在地上。
nos_pytle_pytle_patri_do__Fwfc
The sacks belong in the tavern pantry.
那些面粉应该存放于酒馆储藏室内。
nos_pytle_pytle_se_mi_pod_U1sI
I carried all the sacks to the pantry. It was backbreaking work.
我已将所有面粉搬至储藏室，可真累。
nova_spoj_s_zizkou_jsme_n_gvKM

We found some common ground with Zizka, but his men still thought we're at worst the enemy, at best noble dandies who shouldn't be trusted. During the last evening in Nebakov we tried to earn their trust, but it didn't go too smoothly.
我们与杰式卡在彼此身上发现了一些共同点，尽管如此，他的部下依然认为我们是他们的敌人，要不充其量是些不值得信任的贵族子弟。在内巴科夫停留的最后一晚，我们曾尝试获取他们的信任，但事情进展得并不顺利。
nova_spoj_s_zizkou_jsme_n_KmsG

We found some common ground with Zizka, but his men still think we're at worst the enemy, at best noble dandies who shouldn't be trusted. It's no surprise, though. Only this morning we were at each other's throats. Maybe it would be good to use some time to convince them we're really on their side.
我们与杰式卡在彼此身上发现了一些共同点，尽管如此，他的部下依然认为我们是他们的敌人，要不充其量是些不值得信任的贵族子弟。他们有如此看法并不奇怪，毕竟今天早上我们双方还在刀剑相向，或许还是得需要点时间让他们相信大家实属同一阵营。
novypocke_hasek_pripravil_aTu8
Hashek has prepared his company for the expedition to Semine. Me and Sir Hans should join them.
哈舍克及其部队已为前往塞米的征程做好了准备，我得和汉斯爵士一同加入他们。
novypocke_purkrabi_hasek__jfY6

Burgrave Hashek needs a little time to get his company ready for the expedition to Semine, so me and Hans also have some time to prepare. I'd better not get too far away from Trosky though, so as not to miss the departure. Maybe I should have a word with Sir Hans. He might not want to wait.
哈舍克城伯需要一些时间让他的部队为此次前往塞米的征程做好准备，因此我和汉斯也有了一些准备时间。总之我最好不要离特罗斯基太远，不然就会错过出发的时间。或许我该跟汉斯爵士谈谈，他也许并不想等待。
novyproml_mel_bych_zajit__TKP3
I should talk to Capon about leaving for Semine. I'd better not hang around too long - I got the feeling from Hashek that he doesn't care much whether we ride with him or not.
我得与卡蓬商讨前往塞米一事。我最好不要四处转悠太久，我有预感，哈舍克并不在乎我们是否会与他同行。
novyproml_setkali_jsme_se_JTwS
We set out to ride to Semine.
我们踏上了前往塞米的旅程。
obchod__event_caption_4nJQ
Camp.
营地。
obchod__event_description_4sLY
There's a small camp by the road. A few logs and a small fire pit. And some wayfarer with a little cart. He nods at you in greeting when he sees you.
路旁有个小小的营地，还堆着几根木材，设着一处小火堆。有位带着小车的旅者，看到你的时候朝你点了点头。
obchod__player_caption_4NEd
Camp.
营地。
obchod__player_description_00ER
There's a small camp by the road. A few logs and a small fire pit. And some wayfarer with a little cart. He nods at you in greeting when he sees you.
路旁有个小小的营地，还堆着几根木材，设着一处小火堆。有位带着小车的旅者，看到你的时候朝你点了点头。
objective1_nasel_jsem_u_j_53Xm
If I'm lucky I'll be able to figure out where the map leads before Krizhan notices it's gone.
如果足够幸运，我就能在克里赞发现地图丢失之前找出宝藏的位置。
objective1_nasel_jsem_u_j_5T24
I think I've found the place the stolen map leads to, but it looks like there's a camp here…
看来我已经找到了这张偷来的地图所指向的地点，但似乎那里有一个营地…
objective1_odnosil_jsem_h_eHIq
I carried the sacks for the innkeeper.
我帮酒馆老板完成了麻袋的搬运。
objective1_od_podivneho_t_ApxN
Krizhan was unfortunately unable to find out where the map actually leads, I hope I'll have better luck…
很遗憾克里赞没能找出这张地图实际指向的目的地，但愿我比他能更走运些…
objective1_od_podivneho_t_GRv1
I think I've found the place Krizhan's map leads to, but it looks like there's a camp here…
看来我已经找到了克里赞的地图指向的地点，但似乎那里有一个营地…
objective1_podarilo_se_na_431N
We managed to throw down the ladders the Praguers were using to climb over the palisade during their night-time attack.
我们设法推倒了布拉格人用来夜袭时翻越栅栏的梯子。
objective1_povedlo_se_nam_1lGb

We managed to fight off the guards, the mine was collapsed, mission accomplished. Today was a great day for the resistance against Sigismund! Chenyek was thrilled that everything turned out as it should and immediately began to make big plans for the future. My role in the Guild ends here, I should be proud of myself!
我们成功击退了警卫，矿洞也已坍塌，任务大功告成。对西格斯蒙德的反抗有所成效，今天也是颇具意义的一天！一切都按照计划顺利实施，程叶科感到非常满意，并立即开始为未来制定更多更大的计划。而我在公会中的角色也就此谢幕，我应该为自己感到自豪！
objective1_povedlo_se_nam_8K7M

We managed to collapse the mine and Chenyek is dead, mission accomplished. Today was a great day for the resistance against Sigismund as well as the Guild, which rid itself of its tyrant! Knuckles was thrilled, and starting thinking up big plans for the future. My role in the Guild ends here, but I'm not sure if I should be proud of myself.
我们成功摧毁了矿场，程叶科已经死亡，任务大功告成。对西格斯蒙德的反抗有所成效，今天也是颇具意义的一天，对整个公会来说亦是如此，因为他们摆脱了组织当中的暴君。巧指感到非常满意，并开始着手为未来制定庞大计划。而我在公会中的角色也就此谢幕，也不知道我是否该为自己感到自豪。
objective1_povedlo_se_nam_cXJJ

We managed to collapse the mine, mission accomplished. Today was a great day for the resistance against Sigismund! Chenyek was thrilled everything went as it should have, and starting thinking up big plans for the future. My role in the Guild ends here, I should be proud!
我们成功摧毁了矿场，任务大功告成。对西格斯蒙德的反抗有所成效，今天也是颇具意义的一天！一切都按照计划顺利实施，程叶科感到非常满意，并立即开始为未来制定更庞大计划。而我在公会中的角色也就此谢幕，我应该为自己感到自豪！
objective1_povedlo_se_nam_SWGA

We fought off the guards, the mine was collapsed, and Chenyek is dead. Mission accomplished. Today was a great day for the resistance against Sigismund, as well as the entire Guild, as they rid themselves of their own tyrant. Knuckles was thrilled that everything turned out as it should and immediately began to make big plans for the future. My role in the Guild ends here, I'm not sure I can be proud of myself!
我们成功击退了警卫，矿洞已经坍塌，程叶科已然命丧黄泉，而我们的任务也已大功告成。对西格斯蒙德的反抗有所成效，今天也真是颇具意义的一天，对整个公会来说亦是如此，因为他们摆脱了组织当中的暴君。一切都按照计划顺利实施，巧指感到非常满意，并立即开始为未来制定庞大计划。而我在公会中的角色也就此谢幕，也不知我是否该为自己感到自豪！
objective1_prazane_po_zeb_GZd9
The Praguers are climbing up ladders into the outer bailey! We must throw them down!
布拉格人正在爬梯子来进入外堡场！我们必须把他们推下去！
objective1_predal_jsem_re_8HBm
I handed the chest over to Jan Posy and he paid me a reward. It doesn't matter what's inside, the main thing is that everyone is happy. I've got coin and the brothers have their treasure.
我将箱子还给了扬·“花骨朵”，他也给了我一份报酬。无论箱子里躺着怎样的东西，现在最重要的就是我们大家都已得偿所愿——我拿到了银子，而他们取回了那份“宝藏”。
objective1_predal_jsem_re_wSY0

I handed the chest over to Jan Posy and he finally started to explain. There are no valuables inside. It's a reliquary in which the brothers carried the remains of their father to the Sedletz Monastery. They wanted to do him one last honour, and prove to their mother that they're old and wise enough to take over the administration of their estates.
It's a good thing I found that reliquary for them, otherwise those two knights would have been left without a roof over their heads...

在我将箱子还给扬·“花骨朵”后终于知晓了事情的全貌。箱子内部并未收纳任何贵重物品，它只是一尊用于安置兄弟俩亡父遗骨的圣骨匣，而他们也要将此圣骨匣护送到塞德莱茨修道院。他们这么做的目的除了完成亡父的夙愿以外，还为了展示他们的老练与睿智，好向他们的母亲证明自身已具备管理家族财产的能力。
看来替他们找回那个圣骨匣是件好事，不然这两个骑士今后就得风餐露宿了...
objective1_predam_relikvi_IF92
I'll return it to Jan Posy and maybe he'll finally explain what this is all about.
我得将箱子还给扬·“花骨朵”，或许他会跟我解释这一切的来龙去脉。
objective1_soucasti_dluhu_OTwD

The debt with the innkeeper includes carrying sacks of chaff from the yard to the barn. Unlike cleaning out a latrine, it's fairly easy, sweet-smelling and dignified work. If only my back didn't hurt so much...
欠客栈老板的债包括将一袋袋糠从院子搬到谷仓里。与清理厕所不同，这是相当轻松、容易且体面的工作。要是我的背没那么疼就好了…
objective1_zalezitost_s_d_5b11
The operation surrounding the mine is over, I should head back to the Hole in the Wall and say what happened.
围绕矿场展开的行动已经结束，我得回到“墙洞”，将所发生之事告诉众人。
objective1_zalezitost_s_d_CsMp
The operation surrounding the mine is over, I should head back to the Hole in the Wall and say what happened.
围绕矿场展开的行动已经结束，我得回到“墙洞”，将所发生之事告诉众人。
objective2_az_bude_pani_r_Hd7Q
If we're going to get inside the royal treasury, we have to have the Mint Master's key. And that's in Ulrich Vavak's possession.
要想进入皇室宝库，我们就必须拿到铸币官的钥匙，而它就在乌尔里希·瓦万克手里。
objective2_byl_jsem_si_ji_RkLM
I was certain that William was the murderer. So I took care of him myself. Then I just went to see Katherine, who was satisfied that I caught the killer.
我坚信威廉就是凶手，因此亲手将其了结。之后我与凯瑟琳见了一面，她对我揪出凶手一事非常满意。
objective2_byl_jsem_si_ji_ThvV

I was certain that the bard William was the murderer. So I handed him over to the guards, who took care of him forthwith. Then I just went to see Katherine, who was satisfied that I caught the killer.
我坚信吟游诗人威廉就是凶手，所以便将他交给了警卫处理。之后我与凯瑟琳见了一面，她对我揪出凶手一事非常满意。
objective2_jsem_si_jistej_eDI2
I'm convinced that William is the murderer. So I took care of him myself. Now I just need to go and see Katherine.
我坚信威廉就是凶手，所以亲自收拾了那位吟游诗人。现在我得去见凯瑟琳。
objective2_jsem_si_jistej_KnQR
I'm convinced that William is the murderer. So I handed the bard over to the guards, who took care of him forthwith. Now I just need to go and see Katherine.
我坚信威廉就是凶手，所以将那位吟游诗人交给了警卫处理。现在我得去见凯瑟琳。
objective2_kozina_chce_vy_5g1z
Goatskin wants to get out of the city, and needs some money - pretty desperately. He promised to sell me the information I need from him. We agreed to meet by the well on Vintners' street.
“山羊皮”想离开这座城市，他急需一大笔钱。因此，他答应把我需要的情报都卖给我。我们约好了在酒商街的水井旁见面。
objective2_kozina_chce_vy_FIkD
Goatskin wants to get out of the city, and needs some money - pretty desperately. He promised to sell me the information I need from him. We agreed to meet by the well on Vintners' street.
“山羊皮”想离开这座城市，他急需一大笔钱。因此，他答应把我需要的情报都卖给我。我们约好了在酒商街的水井旁见面。
objective2_podle_dopisu_k_oF1h

According to a letter that Vavak left here, which was originally intended for Christian of Pisek, the key is in an ingenious hiding place. If I'm to get hold of it, I'll have to roll up my sleeves and hold my nose.
瓦万克在此给皮塞克的克里斯蒂安留下了一封信，我从中得知，那把钥匙藏在一个绝妙之地。要想拿到它，不仅得撸起袖子，还得捏住鼻子。
objective2_u_dveri_vavako_5T5W

Two men were standing guard at the door of Vavak's house. However, they were not Ulrich Vavak's men but the men of Christian of Pisek, the steward of the Italian Court. When they realised me and Christian knew each other, they let me in to see him.
两个守卫正把守着瓦万克的家门。谁知他们并非乌尔里希·瓦万克的部下，而是为意大利宫管家，皮塞克的克里斯蒂安效力。在得知我与克里斯蒂安认识彼此后，他们便让我进屋与之相见。
objective2_uz_jsem_delal__IaO0
I got hold of the key. But I'd rather say nothing about what I had to do to get it.
我拿到了钥匙，但我可不想告诉别人到底是怎么拿到的。
objective2_vavak_mozna_pr_0wLh
Vavak might have fled, but it's quite possible he left the key behind. Where could it be, though?
瓦万克似乎已经逃走了，不过他很可能将钥匙留了下来，但它会在什么地方呢？
objective4_kdyz_uz_jsem_s_aPtn

The Mint Master's house is empty, Vavak has disappeared who knows where, and to make matters worse, I ran into Christian of Pisek in Vavak's study. At first, it seemed he wanted to talk things over calmly, but then he decided to take revenge on me for revealing the secret mint, and it soon became clear to me that he wouldn't be any help in getting the key. Unless, of course, he had it on his person...
瓦万克的家空空如也，而他本人也不知所踪。更倒霉的是，我还在瓦万克的书房里遇到了皮塞克的克里斯蒂安。起初，他看似想心平气和地谈判，可随后却因我揭露了秘密铸币厂一事，欲对我进行报复。很快我就意识到，他不会帮我拿到钥匙。当然，除非那把钥匙正好在他身上……
objective4_kdyz_uz_jsem_s_Jd7H

The Mint Master's house is empty, Vavak is God knows where, and I ran into Christian of Pisek in his study. Vavak's disappearance has caused him problems, so at last there was an opportunity to get back at him for concealing the secret mint. He may have refused to help directly, but he promised to try and make sure things went smoothly on the council!
瓦万克的家空空如也，而他本人也不知所踪，我还在书房里遇到了皮塞克的克里斯蒂安。瓦万克的失踪让他陷入了麻烦，看来我终于有机会对他隐瞒秘密铸币厂的行为进行报复。他并未答应要直接出手相助，但是承诺会尽力尝试，确保议会上各种事项顺利进行！
objective4_musim_se_dosta_0WZo
I have to get to Vavak's house. However, the main entrance is guarded. If I don't want to be seen, I have to find another way in.
我得去一趟瓦万克的家，但是他家的大门有人看守。要想不被察觉，我就得想其它办法进去。
objective4_od_kristiana_j_Ck1n
There was one more important piece of information I got from Christian - the commander of the guards at the Court is an Italian. Godwin should watch out for him.
我还从克里斯蒂安那里得知另一项重要信息：意大利宫的警卫队长是一个意大利人。古德温必须对他多加留意。
objective4_opatrit_ji_nov_DkZt
So, which of the local girls will end up wearing the dress?
那么，最后是哪个当地姑娘要穿上这件裙子呢？
objective4_opatrit_ji_nov_NBze
Enneleyn praised the dress. And rightly so, only the wedding dress will be finer than hers.
恩内琳非常中意这件裙子。这也理所当然，毕竟比这更精致的就只有婚纱。
objective4_petr_z_pisku_m_g6gD
Peter of Pisek advised me to get help from Ulrich Vavak. He reckoned the Mint Master wouldn't want any more trouble and he might be of some use to us in the Italian Court if we threatened him a bit.
皮塞克的彼得建议我向乌尔里希·瓦万克寻求帮助。他认为这个铸币官不想招惹更多麻烦，倘若我们对他稍作威胁，或许在意大利宫他对我们能有所帮助。
objective4_po_vkroceni_do_9Hek
Upon entering Vavak's house, I noticed something was off. The house appears to be completely empty. But I really need to talk to the Mint Master…
刚到瓦万克的家里，我就察觉到了不对劲。屋内看似空空如也，那我要怎样才能跟这位铸币官交谈......
oblehanis_jdi_na_hradbu_i6XM

前往栅栏。
oblehanis_jdi_s_bohutou_o_z9kP
Go to the walls with Godwin.
和古德温一起去墙上。
oblehanis_jdi_si_lehnout__KIqt
Go and lie down once you finish doing the rounds of the castle.
巡视完城堡后就躺下休息吧。

Go and see Janosh for food.
去找亚诺什要食物。

征募老朋友。

Recruit Kozliek.
征募科兹⾥克。
oblehanis_naverbuj_lovcih_LYAe

征募猎人多布罗什。
oblehanis_naverbuj_mikese_DRBj

征募米凯什和科兹⾥克。
oblehanis_naverbuj_mikese_z9Do
Recruit Mikesh.
征募米凯什。
oblehanis_naverbuj_rasa_w_iHHH
Recruit knacker Wolfram.
征募屠夫沃尔夫勒姆。
oblehanis_naverbuj_sama_a_Xg8b
Recruit Sam and Kubyenka.
征募塞缪和库宾卡。
oblehanis_navstiv_musu_a__eB07
Visit Musa and Katherine in the infirmary.
去医务室探望穆萨和凯瑟琳。

击倒的梯子：
oblehanis_odraz_nepratels_eFXE

击退布拉格人的进攻！
oblehanis_odraz_nocni_utok_iU9Y
Don't let the enemy get control of the gate!
不能让敌人控制大门！

Repair the swords and give them to Frenzl.
把剑磨好后交给弗伦。
oblehanis_poslechni_si_zi_cHf7
Listen to Zizka's orders.
听杰式卡的命令。

和其他人集合，听取命令。

叫醒门口的守卫。
oblehanis_promluv_si_s_fr_OAdJ
Ask Frenzl about ammunition supplies.
向弗伦询问弹药补给情况。

与卡蓬谈谈。

命令你的人在外堡场集合。

Collect swords to be sharpened.
收集需要磨快的剑。
oblehanis_shod_zebriky_1SKw
Knocked-down ladders:
击倒的梯子：
oblehanis_zabij_utocniky__AxN1
Use stones to stop the attack on the gate!
用石头阻止对大门的攻击！
oblehanis_zabij_zbyvajici_oIeo
Kill the enemies still on the walls.
杀死仍在城墙上的敌人。

Check on the guard at the main gate.
检查大门处的守卫。
oblehanis_zkontroluj_stra_QHB9

检查东面城墙的守卫。
oblehanis_zkontroluj_stra_sa1R

检查外堡场城门的守卫情况。

检查西面栅栏的守卫。
obsluhuj__cervene_je_klas_6K6H
The red is Monastery, the white is Tokaji… I have to be very careful not to forget to serve someone or pour them something other than what they wanted.
“修道院”是红葡萄酒，“托卡伊”则是白葡萄酒…我必须多加留意，别疏忽了对客人的招呼，更别给他们倒错了酒。
obsluhuj__myslel_jsem_ze__O3I7
I knew serving the lords would be a difficult task, but serving the King himself might be even more challenging.
我很清楚服侍贵族将是一项艰巨的任务，但侍奉国王本人则会更具挑战性。
obsluhuj__pani_obsluhoval_inxu
My word! I served the King of Hungary! And I found out that he is planning to attack Raborsch, where all my friends are! I must warn them, and quickly!
天呐！我竟在侍奉匈牙利的国王！而且我发现，他正计划进攻拉博施，也就是我朋友们的所在地！我必须尽快向他们发出提醒！
obsluz_ku_jidlo_pro_kuman_dpAs
The innkeeper wants me to serve a group of Cumans she's afraid of. I talked to them and they just want bread and sausages... I could probably find that somewhere in the inn
酒馆老板很害怕那群库曼人，想让我去招待他们。我跟他们进行了交谈，从而得知他们只是想要点面包和香肠......酒馆里应该就有他们需要的食物。
obsluz_ku_nez_jsem_stacil_0pjr
Before I could serve the Cumans, a fight broke out. Nobody will have any appetite for food now.
我还没来得及招待库曼人，有人突然开始打架，把所有人的胃口都打消了。
obsluz_ku_obslouzil_jsem__QF3u
I served the Cumans like the innkeeper wanted. They seem friendly enough.
我按照旅馆老板的吩咐招待了库曼人，他们看起来很友好。
obsluz_ku_placeholder_mel_80j7
Betty, the innkeeper, wants me to serve the Cumans sitting at a table in front of the tavern. But since she won't talk to them, I have to find out what they want first.
客栈老板贝蒂希望我招待那些库曼人，他们就坐在酒馆前面的桌子旁边。但因为她不想和他们说话，我不得不自己去询问他们有何需要。
obsluz_ku_vzal_jsem_misku_6ELj
I took some food and now I just have to bring it to the Cumans.
我弄到了点食物，现在只需把它们交给那些库曼人即可。
obstarej__kovar_si_ode_mn_mJO5

The blacksmith ordered a set of horseshoes from me for Kabat, the local groom. Once I'd forged them, I went to the blacksmith to show him my work, but he snubbed me and sent me straight to Kabat. The groom isn't the most pleasant fellow in the world but compared to the blacksmith, he's an angel.
铁匠让我为当地的马夫卡巴特打造一套马蹄铁。锻造好之后，我就去找铁匠，想让他看看我的作品，但他冷落了我，让我直接去找卡巴特。马夫不讨人喜欢，但与铁匠相比，他简直是个天使。
obstarej__musim_necim_pom_BeF0
I need to get something to paint Olbram's bull with. Prochek suggested I try and ask Bartoschek the tailor in Troskowitz.
我需要弄点材料对奥尔布拉姆的公牛进行涂鸦，普罗切克建议我去找特罗斯科维茨的裁缝巴托舍克寻求帮助。
obstarej__musim_sehnat_to_9h9q
I have to get a tonic against fever to help Thomas. There was a recipe in the physician's book and he mentioned it here and there. Maybe it can be found somewhere in the castle?
我必须找到一种退烧药来帮助托马斯。大夫的书中有一个配方，他时常提起它。也许它就放在城堡的某个地方？
obstarej__nasel_jsem_hrom_7THr
I found a thunderstone.
我找到了一块雷石。
obstarej__nasel_jsem_hrom_ry5G
I found a thunderstone.
我找到了一块雷石。
obstarej__nebylo_by_od_ve_kywf

It wouldn’t be a bad idea to find another melee weapon and give it to Vauquelin Brabant. To be sure, one never knows what will happen... and having steel in your hand is always better than not having it, even if you won’t be needing it.
给瓦奎林·布拉班特再找一把护身兵器并非什么坏主意。毕竟事态难料......有武器在手总好过赤手空拳，哪怕用不上也无妨。
obstarej__nebylo_by_od_ve_vrvb

It wouldn’t be a bad idea to find another melee weapon and give it to Capon. After all, I’m in charge of his safety and he’ll be safer with a weapon than without one... No matter what fate has in store for us.
给卡蓬再找一把护身兵器并非什么坏主意，毕竟我得保其周全，更何况若有武器在手，无论命运会给我们安排何种戏码......卡蓬都能自保。
obstarej__pochva_popravci_AEpu
The scabbard of the executioner's sword should be wrapped in hare skin. It shouldn't be too difficult to buy one or hunt a hare and skin it myself.
行刑剑的剑鞘应该用野兔皮包裹。买一张，或者猎取一只野兔，自己将皮剥下，应该不会太难。
obstarej__prisel_jsem_o_j_Tc3S
I lost the only way to get to the paint. I'm afraid I can't help Prochek with his game now.
我错失了能拿到颜料的唯一办法，现在恐怕我没办法再协助普罗切克完成他的把戏了。
obstarej__sehnal_jsem_si__MHOr
I've got myself a hare pelt.
我得到了一张野兔皮。
obstarej__stavitel_jan_pa_gYsS
The builder Johann Parler wants to protect the church he's building. I promised to get a thunderstone for him.
建筑商约翰·帕勒想保护他正在建造的教堂。我承诺要找一块雷石给他。
obstarej__stavitel_jan_pa_VnHF
The builder Johann Parler wants to protect the church he's building. I promised to get a thunderstone for him.
建筑商约翰·帕勒想保护他正在建造的教堂。我承诺要找一块雷石给他。
obstarej__tonicum_nebylo__YR5J
It wasn't easy to get hold of the tonic, but I did it in the end. Then all I had to do was get back to Thomas and his sister before time ran out for Hans.
找药并不容易，但我最后还是找到了。然后我所要做的，就是在汉斯的时间耗尽之前，回到托马斯和他妹妹身边。
obstarej__u_krejciho_v_tr_4iJo
Eventually, I got some black pigment from Bartoschek the tailor. It'll really suit that white bull.
我终于从裁缝巴托舍克那儿弄到了一些黑色颜料，这很适合那头白牛。
ochran_ig_prepadeni_musim_9GGS
An ambush? Some yokels surrounded the wagon and they don't seem very friendly. I have to make sure nothing happens to Ignatius.
有埋伏？马车被一些农民包围了，而且他们看起来并非善类。我得确保伊格内修斯免受伤害。
ochran_ig_ze_nas_kvuli_bo_EELL

As I was returning to the wagon, I noticed three men standing around it and acting hostile. It turns out they were looking for Bonnie and Zinek who'd been digging through more than the just the local's styes while searching for nitre. I wasn't in the mood to explain I had nothing to do with it, so I taught them a lesson.
正当我回到马车停留之处时，发现有三个气势汹汹的人正围着马车。原来他们正在搜寻邦妮和齐内克，因为后两者在寻找硝石的途中挖穿了他们的猪圈。而我也没心情做过多的解释，所以给他们好好上了一课。
ochran_ig_ze_nas_kvuli_bo_qoMB

As I was returning to the wagon, I noticed three men standing around it and acting hostile. It turns out they were looking for Bonnie and Zinek who'd been digging through more than the just the local's styes while searching for nitre. Luckily, we managed to resolve the misunderstanding without resorting to violence. After all, we had nothing to do with it.
正当我回到马上停留之处时，发现有三个气势汹汹的人正围着马车。原来他们正在搜寻邦妮和齐内克，因为后两者在寻找硝石的途中挖穿了他们的猪圈。在并未诉诸暴力的前提下，我们所幸成功解除了这场误会，毕竟我们确实与之毫不相干。
odejdi_z__erik_mi_poslal__8k9o
Erik sent Kubyenka to me to present a challenge. Erik wants to fight, man to man. I have accepted his challenge.
埃里克派库宾卡来向我提出挑战。埃里克想进行一场男人间的决斗。我已经接受了他的挑战。
odejdi_z__erik_mi_poslal__HneD

Erik sent Kubyenka to me to present a challenge. He wants to fight, man to man in Sigismund's abandoned camp. Do I want to respond to his knightly challenge? If so, I should tell the castle gate guard to let me out.
埃里克派库宾卡来向我提出挑战。他想在西格斯蒙德废弃的营地里进行一场男人间的决斗。我该接受他的挑战吗？如果是的话，我应该让城堡卫兵放我出去。
odejdi_ze_vypadni_z_ohrad_KreK
My fight is over so there's no reason to stay in the pen anymore. I can still listen to Fridush announcing the winner if I want to, but then I'll have to make room for the other contestants.
我的比武已经结束，所以没必要再继续待在围栏里。不过我仍可以留下聆听弗里杜斯宣布胜者，但之后就得为其他参赛人员腾出空间。
odejdi_z__odejdi_z_ohradky_zvr8
I'm done fighting for now, I should leave the arena so others can have their duels.
我的决斗已经结束，现在得离开围场，给其他选手让出场地。
odemkni_d_chodbu_jsme_ote_b9Pp
God knows how old the lock on the wrought iron door to the secret passageway is, but thankfully, the key still worked.
通往密道的铁门上的锁天知道有多旧了，但好在钥匙依然管用。
odemkni_d_odejdeme_tajnou_Btpo
We have the keys to the secret passageway and there's no time to waste. Someone could raise the alarm at any moment.
我们拿到了密道的钥匙，得马上行动，因为随时可能有人敲响警钟。
odemkni_f_kucharka_fanka__413x

Fanka the cook asked me to open the spice chest for her, since she always has trouble with the lock getting stuck. She needed ginger to make gingerbread for Lord von Bergow, who could show up anytime. Naturally, I helped her and now I don't think anyone will throw me out of the kitchen or even the cellars.
厨师芬卡让我为她打开香料箱，因为她总是打不开锁。她需要生姜来为冯·波尔高大人做姜饼，他随时可能出现。我自然帮了她，现在我想没人会把我从厨房甚至地窖赶出去。
odemkni_f_kucharka_fanka__9Nf7

Fanka the cook asked me to open the spice chest for her, since she always has trouble with the lock getting stuck. She needed ginger to make gingerbread for Lord von Bergow, who could show up anytime. I had other things to do though, and I think Fanka got tired of waiting for my help.
厨师芬卡让我为她打开香料箱，因为她总是打不开锁。她需要生姜来为冯·波尔高大人做姜饼，他随时可能出现。不过我还有其他事情要做，我想芬卡已经等不及了。
odemkni_f_kucharka_fanka__FpqL
Fanka the cook asked me to open the spice chest for her, since she always has trouble with the lock getting stuck. She needs ginger to make gingerbread for Lord von Bergow, who could show up anytime.
厨师芬卡让我为她打开香料箱，因为她总是打不开锁。她需要生姜来为冯·波尔高大人做姜饼，他随时可能出现。
odevzdej__hotovou_savli_u_RkBL

既然现在军刀已经准备就绪，我只需将其交给阿兰卡即可。
odevzdej__jolanda_je_mrtv_mnPf
Aranka is dead, so I can hardly bring her the sabre.
阿兰卡死了，所以我没机会再将军刀交给她。

阿兰卡得到了那把军刀，而我也拿到了报酬，一切就到此为止吧。
odevzdej__podstrcil_jsem__hDaL

我没将真品佩剑交给托马斯，反而给了他一把赝品。

依照请求，我将巴桑的佩剑交给了托马斯。
odevzdej__vsechny_veci_se_1bbt

I managed to get all the items. But when I wanted to give them to Pavel, it turned out he actually wanted them for himself, so he could sell them and use the proceeds to go and become an apprentice in Kuttenberg. When I refused to hand them over, he ran away and reported me to the guards as a thief.
我成功取得了所有物品。但是当我打算将它们交给帕维尔时，才得知他竟想将其占为己有，如此一来他就能换取钱财，好让自己前往库滕堡拜师学艺。 当我拒绝将物品交出时，他跑去向警卫告发了我偷盗的事。
odevzdej__vsechny_veci_se_b5Yi

I managed to get all the items. But when I wanted to give them to Pavel, it turned out he actually wanted them for himself,so he could sell them and use the proceeds to go and train as a journeyman in Kuttenberg. In the end I decided to give them to him anyway and left it up to him, what to do with them.
我成功拿到了所有物品。但是当我打算将它们交给帕维尔时，才得知他竟想将其占为己有并以此来换取钱财，好让他能够到库滕堡支付拜师学艺的费用。 最终，我决定将物品悉数交付，任由帕维尔自主决定它们的去留。
odevzdej__vsechny_veci_se_boEX
I managed to get all the items. Then all I had to do was take them to Pavel. He promised he'd take care of the rest.
我成功取得了所有物件，然后我要做的就是把它们交给帕维尔，他也答应过将会处理后续的事情。
odevzdej__vsechny_veci_se_fvfa
I managed to get all the items. Now I just have to take them to Pavel.
我成功取得了所有物品，现在只需将他们交给帕维尔。
odevzdej__vsechny_veci_se_JWvO

I managed to get all the items. But when I wanted to give them to Pavel, it turned out he actually wanted them for himself, so he could sell them and use the proceeds to go and become an apprentice in Kuttenberg. But I offered to give him some coin myself instead of the stolen items. Pavel gladly accepted and I gave him the coin on the spot.
我成功取得了所有物品。但是当我打算将它们交给帕维尔时，才得知他竟想将其占为己有，如此一来他就能换取钱财，好让自己前往库滕堡拜师学艺。 但是我并没有将那些失窃的物品交给他，而是提出给他一点钱。帕维尔欣然接受，我当场就将钱交给了他。
odevzdej__vsechny_veci_se_WNOF

I managed to get all the items. But when I wanted to give them to Pavel, it turned out he actually wanted them for himself, so he could sell them and use the proceeds to go and become an apprentice in Kuttenberg. But I offered to give him some coin myself instead of the stolen items, even though I didn't have enough at the time. Luckily, Pavel trusted me and will wait till I bring it to him.
我成功取得了所有物品。但是当我打算将它们交给帕维尔时，才得知他竟想将其占为己有，如此一来他就能换取钱财，好让自己前往库滕堡拜师学艺。 但我提出要亲自给他一点钱，虽然当时我身上的钱不多，好在帕维尔愿意等我给他找钱。
odevzdej__vsechny_veci_se_y2dD

I managed to get all the items. But when I wanted to give them to Pavel, it turned out he actually wanted them for himself, so he could sell them and use the proceeds to go and become an apprentice in Kuttenberg. When I refused to hand them over, he threatened to report me to the guards as a thief. But I managed to change his mind on that score.
我成功取得了所有物品。但是当我打算将它们交给帕维尔时，才得知他竟想将其占为己有，如此一来他就能换取钱财，好让自己前往库滕堡拜师学艺。 当我拒绝将物品交出时，他威胁要向警卫告发我的偷盗行径，但最终我成功让他打消了这一念头。
odnes_dop_hornici_zemreli_Q8Wq
The miners... died, and I delivered the letter to Markold, so my troubles were over and I could pay attention to more important things.
矿工们……死了。我把信交给了马尔科。这样我的麻烦就结束了，我可以去关心更重要的事了。
odnes_dop_odevzdal_jsem_d_bnbU

I took the letter I wrote with the miners to Markold of Louny, but he didn't seem too pleased with what it said. Thankfully, I managed to talk my way out of it, so he let me go and also the miners he was holding captive.
我带着和矿工们一起写的信去找洛尼的马尔科，但他似乎对信的内容并不满意。还好我说服了他，他才放我走，也把关押的矿工释放了。
odnes_dop_odevzdal_jsem_d_Tm36

I took the letter I wrote with the miners to Markold of Louny and it all turned out surprisingly well. Markold took the letter, and not only did he let me go, he released the miners he was holding as well.
我带着和矿工们一起写的信去找洛尼的马尔科，结果令人惊喜。马尔科收下信后不仅放了我，还放了他关押的矿工。
odnes_dop_odevzdal_jsem_m_7cJy

I took the letter I wrote with the miners to Markold of Louny, but he didn't seem too pleased with what it said. However hard I tried, I couldn't talk my way out of it. The whole thing was one big cock-up!
我带着和矿工们一起写的信去找洛尼的马尔科，但他似乎对信的内容并不满意。无论我怎么尝试，他都不愿意放我走，这件事真是一团糟！
odnes_dop_odnes_dopis_maj_OM7r

My next task is to go and give the letter to its addressee, a man called Markold of Louny. They say he lives in the Town Hall Quarter, in a big house between two cobbler shops. I should be careful when I talk to him. It seems he's keeping Ranyek and Myslibor's friends captive, and if he finds out I'm involved, I could end up a prisoner myself!
我的下一个任务是把信送到收信人手中，收件者是洛尼的马尔科。他们说他住在下市集的一栋大房子里，隔壁是裁缝铺。我跟他交流时可得当心，据说他囚禁了拉涅克和迈斯利博尔的朋友，如果他发现我参与其中，我也可能是同样的下场！
odnes_dop_pan_markolt_si__TJ6r
Unfortunately, Markold will never read his letter. Never mind.
很不幸，马尔科永远没法读到他的信了。无所谓了。
odnes_dop_pridal_jsem_se__za7N
Kvyetoslav was right when he said I look clever. Except a clever man wouldn't have bothered with some miners and would have made a deal with Markold, the rich man they're in a dispute with.
科维托斯拉夫说我看起来很聪明，他说的没错。但是聪明人可不会和矿工们纠缠，而是会和那个他们有纠纷的富人马尔科做交易。
odnes_dop_ti_co_po_me_cht_lyl8

Myslibor and Ranyek may be dead, but I still have the letter we wrote together. I should take it to Markold. Who knows what will happen? They say he lives in the Town Hall Quarter, in a big house between two cobbler shops.
迈斯利博尔和拉涅克可能已经死了，但我们一起写的信还留着。我应该把它交给马尔科。谁知道会发生什么？他们说他住在下市集的一栋大房子里，隔壁是裁缝铺。
odnes_dop_vydiral_jsem_ma_CLok

I decided to make use of the situation to wangle some silver out of Markold for my silence about the affair with the miners and the letter, but that didn't go down too well. I should be careful. Markold probably won't leave it at that.
我觉得利用这个机会在马尔科身上讨要些银子，换来我对矿工和信的事情保持沉默。但结果并不如我的愿，我得当心点，马尔科可能不会善罢甘休。
odnes_dop_vydiral_jsem_ma_eFIR
I decided to make use of the situation to wangle some silver out of Markold for my silence about the affair with the miners and the letter. Markold was none too pleased, but he paid up in the end.
我觉得利用这个机会在马尔科身上讨要些银子，换来我对矿工和信的事情保持沉默。马尔科很不乐意，但最后还是付了钱。
odnes_dop_zabil_jsem_jak__ZUMS
This intrigue isn't my kind of thing. I like things nice and straight. So I got rid of Markold and the bunch of miners.
阴谋不是我的风格，我向来直来直往。所以我摆脱了马尔科和那帮矿工。
odnes_gle_odevzdal_jsem_g_smiI
I traded Geldstück the writ for a nice pile of groschen. That's the way I like it!
我用那份令状向盖尔斯塔克换取了一份丰厚的报酬，我就喜欢这种办事方式！
odnes_gle_ted_ho_jen_zane_jn86
The writ is mine, now I must quickly bring it to Geldstück!
我拿到了那份令状，现在必须赶快将它带给盖尔斯塔克！
odnes_gle_ten_nemecky_hos_XoJr
Poor Geldstück sold his last beer. Up in heaven there'll be no soldiers troubling him.
再也没人会购买盖尔斯塔克的酒水了，愿天堂没有给他添乱的士兵。
odnes_lac_lacek_lezi_v_se_ecIo
It worked a treat. Latsek is already fast asleep in the hayloft.
效果不错，拉塞克已经躺在废弃的草棚里昏睡了。
odnes_lac_tak_lacka_se_mi_zQFR
Sakra! It's all gone wrong! I hope Anezhka can get by without the coin from that skirt-chaser.
妈的！一切都搞砸了！但愿阿涅兹卡没有那个色鬼的钱也能生活下去。
odnes_lac_ted_ho_musim_od_y8dt
So far everything's going smoothly! Latsek is sleeping like a baby. Now I have to carry him back to Margaret.
目前为止，一切都很顺利！拉塞克睡得像个婴儿。现在我得把他带到玛格丽特那里。
odnes_mec_drsnak_vasko_po_C7nR
Tomcat could tell straightaway that the sword of Damascus steel wasn't made by Radovan, an ordinary village blacksmith, but in the end, he still honoured the wager.
公猫一眼就看出，这把用大马士革钢铸造的剑不是出自拉多万这个普通的乡村铁匠之手，但最后他还是兑现了赌约。
odnes_mec_kat_hynek_mel_a_6NSe
Heinz's luck must have really been bad, because he ended up dead. Well, no lucky sword will help him now...
海尼克的运气一定很差，因为他最终死了。好吧，幸运之剑也帮不了他了…
odnes_mec_kat_hynek_uz_ne_Zlba
Executioner Heinz has been waiting impatiently for his new sword. I should bring it to him, but it will be hard for me to part with such an exquisite weapon.
刽子手海尼克一直在焦急地等待着新剑。我应该把它带给他，但我很难舍弃这样一把精致的武器。
odnes_mec_kovar_lorenc_mi_ImGZ

Radovan the blacksmith told me that Tomcat, a hard man from the nomads' camp, owes him money. The smith bet him at the tavern that he could make a sword so strong, that even he couldn't bend it. If I bring Tomcat the sword, I can keep the money from the wager.
铁匠拉多万告诉我，公猫是来自游牧营地的硬汉，他欠拉多万钱。铁匠在酒馆里跟他打赌，说他能造出一把非常结实的剑，结实到连他也无法折弯。如果我把剑带给公猫，我就可以兑现赌约。
odnes_mec_nemohl_jsem_to__qGan
I just couldn't do it. I couldn't part with such a unique sword. I may have lost the money, but the sword is mine now.
我做不到。我无法舍弃这样一把独特的剑。我可能失去了钱财，但这把剑现在属于我了。
odnes_mec_novy_popravci_m_zire
Heinz was delighted with the new executioner's sword. Even though he tried to cut me with it right away, he paid well.
海尼克对新的行刑剑很满意。尽管他想立刻用它来砍我，但却付出了代价。
odnes_men_menhart_je_mrtv_JX0G
Menhard is dead, that sword would be useless to him now.
门哈德已经死了，现在那把剑对他来说也失去了意义。

I brought Menhard the repaired sword. To my surprise he was ecstatic.
我将修好的剑交给了门哈德。让我惊讶的是，他竟为此欣喜若狂。
odnes_men_ted_kdyz_se_mi__LXH6
Now that I've managed to repair the guild sword, I should bring it to Menhard.
我已成功修好行会剑，该把它交给门哈德了。
odnes_sek_donesl_jsem_par_CiMA
I brought Johann the protective axe I forged for him.
我为约翰带来了我铸造的防护斧。
odnes_sek_parler_je_po_sm_SrWy
Johann is dead, so I reckon he doesn't care whether the axe is in the tower of Saint Barbara's or if I keep it…
约翰死了，所以我想他不在乎这把斧头是在圣芭芭拉教堂的塔楼里还是在我这里…
odnes_sek_ted_kdyz_mam_se_rv8W
Now that the axe is done, I can bring it to Johann for my reward.
现在斧头做好了，我可以拿给约翰换取报酬了。
odnes_zbo_nyni_zbyva_zaji_rppg
Now I just have to go see the trafficker at the Old Kutna Wagoners' Inn, but I don't expect much.
现在我只需要到老库特纳马车夫旅店去见那个走私商，但我并不抱有太多期望。
odnes_zbo_zadny_poklad_ve_6n9R

I didn't find any treasure in the cellar, just a few mute and worthless reminders of the innkeeper's dark past. At least I made a good connection with Helga, a trafficker who runs an inn near Old Kutna.
我并未在地下室里发现任何有价值的东西，只有一些揭示着酒馆老板黑暗过往的物件，并不值钱。至少，我和那个在老库特纳附近开了家酒馆的商人赫尔加建立了不错的关系。
odnos_mrs_jsme_u_druhy_ch_1UpL

We've come to the second stop, a solitary farmhouse on the border of Slatego and Schdiar. Both of the farmers' pigs had died here suddenly, and it's up to me to pack them in sacks and carry them to the wagon.
我们来到了旅途的第二站，这是一个位于斯拉戈和石迪尔交界处的独栋农舍。据说此处的家猪先前突然暴毙，而现在将由我来使用麻袋将它们的尸体装运到马车上。
odnos_mrs_u_druhy_chalupy_Z7Xl

We carried on to the second stop on our rounds, which was a solitary farmhouse on the border of Slatego and Schdiar. The farmers' two pigs had died suddenly, and it was up to me to pack them in sacks and carry them to the wagon. Why do those horses always have to stop so far away?
我们来到了旅途的第二站，此处便是一个位于斯拉戈和石迪尔交界点的独栋农舍。据说农夫家的两头猪此前突然暴毙，我也已将它们悉数装入麻袋之中，可是那两匹马为什么总是要停在那么远的地方呢？
odnos_pyt_soucasti_dluhu__bK6m
Part of the debt to the innkeeper is carrying sacks of chaff from the courtyard to the barn. Unlike cleaning latrines, it's clean, dignified and quite fragrant work. Altough it's still backbreaking…
要还清债务，还得将一袋袋糠从院子搬到谷仓里。但跟清理茅厕不同，这一差事还算干净，而且显得更为体面，也没那么刺鼻，尽管也很辛苦……
odnos_pyt_soucasti_dluhu__c75g
Part of the debt to the innkeeper is carrying sacks of chaff from the courtyard to the barn. Unlike cleaning latrines, it's clean, dignified and quite fragrant work. Altough it's still backbreaking…
要还清债务，还得将一袋袋糠从院子搬到谷仓里。但跟清理茅厕不同，这一差事还算干净，而且显得更为体面，也没那么刺鼻，尽管也很辛苦……
odnos_pyt_soucasti_dluhu__Jmt6
Part of the debt to the innkeeper is carrying sacks of chaff from the courtyard to the barn. Unlike cleaning latrines, it's clean, dignified and quite fragrant work.
要还清债务，还得将一袋袋糠从院子搬到谷仓里。但跟清理茅厕不同，这一差事还算干净，而且显得更为体面，也没那么刺鼻。
odraz_nep_kdyz_prazany_z__D3s5
If we don't clear the ramparts of the Prague forces, they'll take control of the gate and that will be that. We have to stop them at any cost.
要是我们不击溃城墙上的布拉格军队，他们将会控制大门，届时我们将走投无路，所以必须不惜一切代价阻止他们。
odraz_nep_kdyz_prazany_z__Th7u
If we don't wipe out the Prague forces on the ramparts, they'll take control of the gate and that will be that. We have to stop them at any cost.
要是我们不击溃城墙上的布拉格军队，他们将会控制大门，届时我们将走投无路，所以必须不惜一切代价阻止他们。
odraz_nep_prazane_utoci_n_Ci25
We must repel the attacking Praguers by any means necessary.
我们必须不惜一切代价击退布拉格人的进攻。
odraz_nep_prazane_utoci_z_rarX
The Praguers are attacking from all sides! Our goal is to fend off their attack from the ramparts.
布拉格人从四面八方攻来！我们的目标就是抵御他们对城墙的进攻。
odraz_nep_prazane_zautoci_ewnS
The Praguers attacked the walls, and we couldn't fend them off.
布拉格人攻击了城墙，我们抵御不住。
odraz_nep_prazene_se_poku_CJwk
The Praguers tried to attack on the march, but we managed to repel them. But now a siege is beginning…
布拉格人试图攻击我们的行军队伍，但被我们成功击退。但现在围攻开始了……
odraz_nep_prazsky_utok_na_B1be
We managed to repel the Prague forces' attack on the side rampart.
我们成功击退了布拉格人对侧边城墙的进攻。
odraz_nep_prazsky_utok_na_IKpO
We managed to stop the Praguers' attack on the side rampart.
我们成功阻止了布拉格人对侧边城墙的进攻。
odraz_nep_prvni_vlna_utok_ui5N
The first wave of attackers on the ramparts was fended off.
敌人的第一波攻势已被击退。
odraz_noc_prazane_se_pod__GWp9
Under the cloak of night, the Praguers crept up to the base of the palisade, where they managed to place a ladder. Their goal is to open the gate! We must stop them!
乘着夜色，布拉格人悄悄爬到了栅栏底下，并在那架设了梯子。他们的目的是打开大门！我们必须阻止他们！
odraz_noc_prazane_se_pod__okNY
Under the cloak of night, the Praguers crept up to the base of the palisade, where they managed to place a ladder. We were unable to fend them off.
乘着夜色，布拉格人悄悄爬到了栅栏底下，并在那架设了梯子。我们没能阻止他们。
odraz_noc_prazane_se_pod__QOqv
Under the cloak of night, the Praguers crept up to the base of the palisade, where they managed to place a ladder. Fortunately, we repelled their attack.
乘着夜色，布拉格人悄悄爬到了栅栏底下，并在那架设了梯子。幸运的是，我们击退了他们的进攻。
odraz_pta_lepsim_zpusobem_dFaU
A better means of defense is a so-called perfect block. I actively parry Capon's blade aside and prepare for the next movement.
完美格挡是种效果更好的防御。主动格挡卡蓬的剑，为下一步做好准备。
odraz_pta_lepsim_zpusobem_JKKb
A better means of defense is to execute a perfect block. Actively parrying the opponent's blade aside puts me in an advantageous position and isn't so tiring.
完美格挡是种效果更好的防御。主动格挡对手的剑，让自身处于有利位置，且节省体能。
odraz_pta_vyhodne_pozice__lSsd
The advantageous position I acquire after a perfect block can be used to execute a riposte. All I have to do is follow up the perfect block with an attack.
完美格挡使得自身占得先机，此刻补上一剑，发动反击。
odraz_pta_z_vyhodne_pozic_jyIB

After executing a perfect block, I can use my advantageous position to attack with a riposte. My opponent can't fend that off with a simple block. All he can do to parry it is to execute a perfect block of his own.
完美格挡使得自身占得先机，此刻补上一剑，发动反击。对手无法用普通格挡招架这一击，只能同样使出完美格挡来化解。
odraz_uto_hejtman_zizka_z_BAb9
The Praguers conquered the lower castle and Captain Zizka died.
布拉格人占领了下城堡，杰式卡队长不幸阵亡。
odraz_uto_prazane_prorazi_LbWd
The Praguers broke through to the lower fortress. We have to cut off their path and quickly shove their ladders away.
布拉格人攻破了下城堡。我们必须拦住他们的攻势，还要迅速掀翻他们的攻城梯。
odraz_uto_prazane_se_poku_NEsG
The Praguers tried to knock in the gate, but we fended off their heavily-armoured troops.
布拉格人试图撞开大门，但我们击退了他们的重装部队。
odraz_uto_prazane_se_snaz_hV0V
The Praguers are trying to knock in the gate! We must take out their heavily-armoured troops at the gate. There is a murder hole and stones above the gate. I should throw them on the attackers.
布拉格人试图撞开大门！我们必须在门口解决掉他们的重装部队。大门上方有一个落石孔，我应该把石头扔向进攻者。
odraz_uto_zalozni_utok_na_n7zl
The Praguers' contingency attack on the lower castle was repulsed, but only at the price of weakening the defence of the upper castle.
布拉格人对下城堡的奇袭已被击退，但代价是我们削弱了上城堡的防御。
odraz_zeb_celni_utok_jsme_t4c7
We drove back the frontal attack and pushed the enemies away from the walls. The Praguers retreated.
我们击退了敌人的正面进攻，赶走了侵扰城墙的敌人，布拉格军队也随之撤退。
odraz_zeb_celni_utok_pech_jvtr
A frontal attack by the infantry! Their ladders must not reach the walls, and if they succeed, we must drop them on their heads.
敌人步兵团发起了正面进攻！绝不能让他们的攻城梯碰到城墙，万一他们得逞，我们就必须把梯子往他们头上砸。
odraz_zeb_utocnici_se_sna_d00Z
The attackers were trying to scale the walls using ladders. But we managed to fend them off.
袭击者试图利用梯子爬上城墙，但我们已成功将其阻拦。
odraz_zeb_utocnici_se_sna_G5wh
The attackers are trying to scale the walls using ladders. We have to fend them off!
袭击者正试图利用梯子爬上城墙，我们必须挡住他们！
odved_jez_odvedl_jsem_jez_fik5
I took Jezhek's horse to the agreed place.
我把杰泽克的马带到了约定的地方。
odved_jez_ted_kdyz_mam_je_s0aC
And when I have Jezhek's horse, Gringolet, I should stable him at the inn in Pschitoky.
等我得到杰泽克的马格林戈莱，我应该把它拴在普西托克的旅馆里。
odved_kon_hastal_bude_urc_9CAa
Now quickly back to the stud farm!
现在赶紧回到种马场！
odved_kon_tak_konik_je_zp_0xOq

马匹毫发无伤地回到了马列索夫种马场。
ohlas_se__slavnostni_uvit_ULYj

Cardinal Pozzo's welcoming ceremony is fast approaching and with it our only chance to get into the Italian Court. We must persuade the cardinal to cooperate, then pose as his retinue and pray for a miracle.
为红衣主教波佐举办的欢迎仪式很快就要来临了，那也将是我们能够进入意大利宫的唯一机会。我们必须说服红衣主教一同合作，然后假扮成他的随从，祈祷奇迹发生。
ohlas_se__zizka_pro_me_ma_NWsg
I'm sure Zizka has some more tasks in store for me. I should report to him.
杰式卡肯定还给我留着不少任务，我得去跟他汇报情况。
ohledej_c_abych_zjistil_c_4lnp
To find out what poison was used on Chertan, I have to examine his corpse and look for anything unusual that might have been caused by the poison.
要想查明凶手对赫尔坦使用的毒药是何物，我就得检查他的尸体，看看能否发现毒药致使的反常现象。
ohledej_c_ohledal_jsem_ch_dJNH
I examined Chertan's body. He must have died in terrible spasms…
我检查了赫尔坦的尸体，得知他一定死于激烈的痉挛......

死灰复燃

“你再次见到了那个曾在塞米的命运之夜向你约定永远消失的男人。”

From the ashes
