opatri_si_doprdele_mam_je_MKE9

Shit! I'm supposed to go to Nebakov with Capon, but I don't have a horse. I have to get hold of one somewhere. I reckon I should be able to buy one at a studfarm. Or steal one, but then I'd have to find a bent horse trader to make it look like the horse is lawfully mine, otherwise I could end up in the pillory.
妈的！我得跟着卡蓬一起前往内巴科夫，但是现在却连匹马都没有。我得四处找找，没准能在种马场买到一只。要不我就得去偷，但是之后还得找个马贩黑商将偷来的马弄成我的合法所有，不然我会被套上镣铐的。
opatri_si_na_troskach_pro_K2fy
At Trosky they had a horse prepared for me, but the handover, erm, didn't go according to plan. Still, I got hold of a horse elsewhere, so I can finally set off with Capon on our mission.
特罗斯基的人们给我准备好了一匹马，但是，呃，马儿却没能如约交到我的手里。尽管如此，我还是在别处弄到了一匹马，因此终于可以和卡蓬一起出发执行任务了。
opatrne_n_holky_nas_sice__z1kr

Capon and I weren't alone in the pond. A bit further along the shore some laundresses were bathing and Capon had the bright idea of going to spy on them. Although the girls didn’t spot us, we didn’t enjoy their scantily dressed loveliness for long.
光顾这片小湖的，不止我和汉斯少主。沿岸稍远处有几名洗衣女在洗澡。卡蓬起了雅兴，欲要上前窥探。虽然我们未被发现，但也没能欣赏她们的曼妙身姿太久。
opatrne_n_mel_bych_sledov_qHia
I should follow Sir Hans and make sure he doesn't disgrace us before we even get to Trosky.
我得跟紧汉斯少主。眼见着就要抵达特罗斯基，可千万别出洋相。
opatrne_n_nakonec_se_to_u_8Nul
While we were creeping up on them, one of the laundresses spotted us. Let's hope she doesn't alert the others.
一个洗衣女看到了悄悄接近的我们。但愿她嘴上有把门的。
opatrne_n_nakonec_se_to_u_z6fe

Capon and I weren't alone in the pond. A bit further along the shore some laundresses were bathing and Capon had the bright idea of going to spy on them.That turned out to be one damned stupid idea! We just ended up scaring one of the girls.
光顾这片小湖的，不止我和汉斯少主。沿岸稍远处有几名洗衣女在洗澡。卡蓬起了雅兴，欲要上前窥探。真是个馊主意！我们吓到了其中一位姑娘。
opatrne_n_v_rybniku_nejsm_ycT3
Me and Sir Hans aren't alone in the pond. A little further along by the banks there are some girls bathing, and Sir Hans, gentleman that he is, wants to go and spy on them.
光顾这片潭水的，不止我和汉斯少主。沿岸稍远处有群姑娘在洗澡。汉斯少主一展绅士风度，欲要上前窥探。
oplachni__trocha_studeny__47tO
A little cold water will do me good. And I can wash of all the blood and grime so I look like a person again.
冷水让人清醒。还可以洗掉浑身血污，这样就看着有点人样了。
oprav_mec_jestli_chci_v_k_ZV1m
If I went to help in the smithy, I need to sharpen the old swords and give them to Frenzl.
如果我要给铁匠铺帮忙，就需要把旧剑磨锋利，然后交给弗伦。
oprav_mec_vic_prace_uz_v__2Dy0
There's no more work to be done in the smithy. I didn't really help sharpening the swords, so I doubt they'll let me do any other work.
铁匠铺没有要做的工作了，我没有怎么帮他们磨剑，所以我怀疑他们会不会让我做其他工作。
oprav_mec_vic_prace_uz_v__OP1a
There's no more work to be done in the smithy. I helped as much as I could with sharpening the swords.
铁匠铺没有要做的工作了，我尽我所能帮忙磨剑。
osetri_cv_cverka_jsem_neo_sb69
I did not treat the guard Zwerk.
我没有治疗守卫兹维克。
osetri_cv_cverk_byl_ranen_pTt6
Zwerk was injured, he required treatment.
兹维克受伤了，他需要治疗。
osetri_cv_osetril_jsem_cv_PQOD
I treated Zwerk's injuries.
我治疗了兹维克的伤势。
osetri_ko_kozlik_byl_rane_f48n
Kozliek was wounded in battle. I should take a look at him and treat him.
科兹⾥克在战斗中负伤。我得查看他的伤势并对他进行治疗。
osetri_ko_raneneho_kozlik_ly6P
I examined the injured Kozliek and treated him.
我查看了科兹⾥克的伤势并提供了治疗。
osetri_ko_zraneneho_kozli_1tUG
I didn't treat the injured Kozliek.
我没有治疗受伤的科兹⾥克。
osetri_ma_marek_byl_ranen_H7ps
Mark was wounded. I first need to examine him and then treat him.
马克受伤了，我得先查看他的状况然后再进行治疗。
osetri_ma_osetril_jsem_ma_uV22
I treated Mark the best I could.
我尽力为马克提供了治疗。
osetri_ma_strelce_marka_j_4DTT
I didn't treat the archer Mark.
我没有治疗弓箭手马克。
osetri_mi_mikes_byl_ranen_RdR0
Mikesh was wounded in battle. I examined him and did everything in my power.
米凯什在战斗中负伤。我检查了他的伤势，尽我所能对他进行了照料。
osetri_mi_mikes_byl_ranen_t9da
Mikesh was wounded. I need to examine him and treat his wounds.
米凯什受伤了，我得先查看他的状况然后再进行治疗。
osetri_mi_raneneho_mikese_DVcR
I didn't treat the wounded Mikesh.
我没有治疗受伤的米凯什。
osetri_od_mistni_odboj_na_svO3
I don't think I'll be recruiting the local rebels to our side. They're all dead.
我想我无法收编当地的起义军。他们都已经死了。
osetri_od_osetril_jsem_vy_r3EV
I treated Otter's wounds, and thus helped the only surviving rebel.
我治疗了奥特的伤口，帮助了唯一幸存的起义者。
osetri_od_vzpurny_sedlak__etso
The peasant rebel Otter was shot during the attack by Sigismund's men. Unless I treat his wound, he'll certainly die soon.
在西格斯蒙德的手下进攻时，起义农民奥特被射伤。如果我不给他治伤，他肯定会很快死去。
osetri_ot_dukladne_jsem_s_cX2q
I took thorough care of Gotzlin. He didn't exactly start jumping around his chambers, but there is a definite improvement compared to how he looked before.
我详尽地为年迈的哥特林提供医治。尽管他还没能做到活蹦乱跳，但是相比以往，他的气色确实好了不少。
osetri_ot_mandelina_mi_re_2bvO
Mandelina told me about the physicians who tried to cure her husband and didn't succeed, because it's God's punishment and his purgatory here on Earth.
曼德琳娜告诉我，先前尝试过医治她丈夫的医生，无一例外，均未成功。她认为此乃上帝降下的责罚，是他在人间铸造的炼狱。
osetri_ot_neprislo_mi_dul_LAml
I didn't think it was necessary to take care of some old man with one foot in the grave, so I left him to his fate.
救治这种半只脚已经踏进棺材里的老人真是毫无意义，所以还是让他听天由命吧。
osetri_ot_opravdu_dukladn_xexC
I examined Gotzlin very thoroughly. Besides poor digestion and pain he's also suffering mentally. Perhaps if I could somehow take his mind off his condition.
我对哥特林进行了一番详尽地检查。除了正面临着肠胃问题和疼痛之外，他的精神也正遭受折磨。也许我可以将他从对病情的关注中转移开来。
osetri_ot_o_stareho_gocli_Jg5A
I took quite good care of old Gotzlin, he definitely got some relief on account of it.
我对年迈的哥特林施以百般照料，他的健康状况也因此有所好转。
osetri_ot_otec_me_leceni__GKTb
The father didn't survive my treatment and died. That thwarted my inflitration into the home.
我的医治没能从死神手里夺回哥特林，这也因此断送了我进入房子调查的机会。
osetri_ot_poradne_jsem_ho_1U69
I can’t figure out what’s wrong with him, so I reckon I have no choice but to give up on the whole treatment attempt.
我没能力弄清他的病因，所以我想我别无选择，只能放弃治疗的尝试。
osetri_ot_potrebuji_si_pr_IjLo
I need to speak to the woman of the house, Mandelina, about her husband's state of health.
我得跟房屋的女主人曼德琳娜谈谈，以了解其丈夫的健康状况。
osetri_ot_prohlidl_jsem_h_zUzT
I examined him quite thoroughly. Some stomach potion or pain potion might help.
我对他进行了一番详尽的检查，一些胃药或是止痛药或许能起作用。
osetri_ot_staremu_goclino_9sNk
I gave something to old Gotzlin and we'll see what happens. Although I didn't waste too much time on him.
我想方设法医治了年迈的哥特林，后续就静观其变吧，尽管我并没有在他身上花费太多时间。
osetri_zr_nakonec_jsem_tt_TLqO
In the end, I saved that wounded villager from further unnecessary suffering.
最终，我将正在不断陷入痛苦深渊的受伤村民拉了回来。
osetri_zr_zkusil_jsem_tom_3D7h
I tried to help that injured person, but it evidently didn't help much. I did manage to wake him up, but after one question the poor fellow lost consciousness again.
我试图帮助那位受伤的村民，但是显然没有帮上太多帮。他虽成功被我唤醒，但是仅回答了一个问题就又失去了意识。
osetri_zr_zkusil_jsem_tom_5hR5
I tried to help that injured person. I did everything in my power for him. Then I even managed to wake him up and ask him about a few things.
我试图帮助那位受伤的村民，竭尽全力治疗他的伤势。然后我竟将其唤醒，并向他询问了一些事情。
osetri_zr_zkusil_jsem_tom_nau7
I tried to help that injured person. Then I even managed to wake him up, but after a couple of answers he lost consciousness again.
我试图帮助那位受伤的村民，并成功将他唤醒，但是回答了几个问题后他又失去了意识。
osvedc_se_bibrek_byl_luko_0q8v

Bibrek was an archer from the east, who organized shooting competitions in the region. I succeeded in everything he set up for me. It would be surprising if he didn’t take my opinion into account now.

Bibrek was an archer from the east, who organized shooting competitions in the region. I succeeded in everything he set up for me. It would be surprising if he didn’t take my opinion into account now.
osvedc_se_bibrek_je_lukos_KweN
Bibrek is an archer from the east, who organizes shooting competitions in the region. If I succeed in everything he sets up for me, he will surely consider my opinion.
Bibrek is an archer from the east, who organizes shooting competitions in the region. If I succeed in everything he sets up for me, he will surely consider my opinion.
osvedc_se_mikolaj_byl_rom_lMkn
Mikolai was a Romany tracker and horse trader, who organized horse races in the region. I won everything he set up for me. Suddenly, my word had some weight.
Mikolai was a Romany tracker and horse trader, who organized horse races in the region. I won everything he set up for me. Suddenly, my word had some weight.
osvedc_se_mikolaj_je_roms_8ZKT
Mikolai is a Romany tracker and trader, who organizes horse races in the region. If I win everything he prepares for me, he will certainly take my word seriously.
Mikolai is a Romany tracker and trader, who organizes horse races in the region. If I win everything he prepares for me, he will certainly take my word seriously.
osvobod_j_nasel_jsem_tabo_6JQx
I negotiated Hensel's release with Andrew Ramhead. I reckon that lad would have come to harm sooner or later, so at least I did a good deed...
我和公羊头安德鲁谈论了释放亨泽尔的事，我猜这个小伙子迟早要被拷打，所以我也算是做了件好事。
osvobod_j_nasel_jsem_tabo_8InT

I was able to take down Andrew Ramhead's gang with iron. Anyhow, they were Sigismund's mercenaries pillaging the land about here, so they deserved no better. By doing so, of course, I also rescued poor Hensel.
我用武力打败了公羊头安德鲁这一伙人。总的来说，他们受雇于西格斯蒙德，在这里掠夺土地。所以他们不配得到更好的对待。而且我这样做也拯救了可怜的亨泽尔。
osvobod_j_nasel_jsem_tabo_JQL8
I found the military encampment Peter was talking about. Andrew Ramhead and his men really were holding Hensel captive there, but it all ended tragically and Hensel is no more.
我找到了彼得说的那个军营。公羊头安德鲁和他的人真的把亨泽尔关在那，但悲剧已经酿成，亨泽尔已经不在了。
osvobod_j_nasel_jsem_tabo_Lgdk
I slipped into Andrew Ramhead's camp and managed to free Hensel by stealth. I reckon that lad would have come to harm sooner or later, so at least I did a good deed...
我溜进了公羊头安德鲁的营地，悄悄地解救了亨泽尔。我猜这个小伙子迟早要被拷打，所以我也算是做了件好事。
osvobod_j_nasel_jsem_tabo_t0cK

They must be holding that Hensel here somewhere. If I want to find out what happened to the stolen thunderstone, I need to talk to Hensel. I can try talking to their commander for starters. Alternatively, I could try to smuggle him out or resort to weapons...
亨泽尔一定被他们关押在这里的某处。我得和亨泽尔谈谈才能知道雷石发生了什么。我需要先跟他们的指挥官交涉，或者我也能试试帮助亨泽尔越狱，又或者是诉诸武力。
osvobod_p_nastal_cas_osvo_eoT9

We took everyone at the Church Council captive, and Godwin was relieved he could finally stop posing as the legate. Then came the central part of our plan: opening the royal treasury. Brabant's men are carrying the silver to the passageway and all that's left for us to do is free the imprisoned lords. They are guarded by a jailer called Csaba, said to be the strongest man in Hungary. I need to figure out how to get past him.
我们将教会议会上的每个人都抓了起来，无需再继续假扮特使的古德温终于松了口气。接下来，我们的计划也走到了核心一环：打开皇室宝库。布拉班特的同伙将负责把白银搬运至通道里，而我们要处理的事情就是释放那些被囚禁的领主们。据说正看管着他们的人是匈牙利最强悍的人查巴，我得想办法避开他。
osvobod_p_potom_nastal_ca_gNz6

We took everyone at the Church Council captive, and Godwin was relieved he could finally stop posing as the legate. Then came the central part of our plan: opening the royal treasury. Brabant's men were carrying the silver to the passageway and all that was left for us to do was free the imprisoned lords. They were guarded by Csaba, but I managed to get past him.
我们将教会议会上的每个人都抓了起来，无需再继续假扮特使的古德温终于松了口气。接下来，我们的计划也走到了核心一环：打开皇室宝库。布拉班特的同伙将负责把白银搬运至通道里，而我们要处理的事情就是释放那些被囚禁的领主们。查巴正看管着那些领主，好在我成功绕过了他。
osvobod_z_v_lesich_jsem_n_I1RC
Near Raborsch, I came across a military camp in an old mill where they were holding someone prisoner. With God's help, I managed to free him by stealth.
我在拉博施附近的一个旧磨坊里发现了一座军营。里面关押着一个囚犯。在上帝的帮助下，我偷偷把他救了出来。
osvobod_z_v_lesich_jsem_n_iRnD
Near Raborsch, I came across a military camp in an old mill where they were holding someone prisoner. Sadly, he didn't survive what happened next...
我在拉博施附近的一个旧磨坊里发现了一座军营。里面关押着一个囚犯。令人悲伤的是，他没能在后续发生的事情中活下来。
osvobod_z_v_lesich_jsem_n_Oewa
Near Raborsch, I came across a military camp in an old mill where they were holding someone prisoner. In the end I was able to negotiate his release with them.
我在拉博施附近的一个旧磨坊里发现了一座军营。里面关押着一个囚犯。最后我和守卫谈妥了释放他的事。
osvobod_z_v_lesich_jsem_n_Off8
Near Raborsch, I came across a military camp in an old mill where they were holding someone prisoner. I fought them with iron and freed the poor wretch.
我在拉博施附近的一个旧磨坊里发现了一座军营。里面关押着一个囚犯。我战胜了守卫，释放了那个可怜的家伙。
osvobod_z_v_lesich_jsem_n_SOKy

Near Raborsch, I came across a military camp in an old mill where they had a prisoner. Something tells me I should do something and try to free him. Perhaps I can negotiate his release. Or, of course, I can resort to other means.
我在拉博施附近的一个旧磨坊里发现了一座军营。里面关押着一个囚犯。直觉告诉我，我应该试着解救他。也许我可以去协商来释放他，但也可以采取其他手段。
otevri_be_a_je_hotovo_bed_l4cU
Manyeta the cook asked me for a small favour in the kitchen. A little agility, a few clever moves… and the chest opened.
在厨房内，厨师曼伊塔让我帮个小忙。我稍微动一动灵活的手指，施展一些伎俩......箱子就打开了。
otevri_be_kucharka_me_poz_OOXp
Manyeta the cook asked me to open a stuck chest containing herbs. A job for a man, of course… I'm sure it won't be a problem.
厨师曼伊塔让我打开一个卡住的草药箱，当然，这事儿适合让爷们儿来干......我敢肯定那绝对不成问题。
otevri_be_ne_tohle_proste_mPAP
No, with the best will in the world it can't be done! It's stuck, forever! I'd drag the idiot who made that lock over the coals… Sod the herbs!
干！无论如何我都打不开！这个箱子就这样永远卡住了！真想把造了这个锁的蠢货拖进煤堆里......去他妈的草药吧！
otevri_br_s_ptacek_s_brab_KWus
Me, Hans and Brabant grabbed ourselves some horses! We have to quickly open the gate and our way out will be open!
我、汉斯和布拉班特弄到了几匹马！我们必须迅速打开大门，以此找到出路！
otevri_pr_ted_je_na_rade__rU04
Sam and Capon are going to take the drawbridge. My task is to take care of the first gate. I have to get to it unobserved and let our men get into the castle.
塞缪尔和卡蓬将负责处理堡垒吊桥，而我的任务则是打开第一扇城门。我必须悄悄接近城门，随后让同伴们进入城堡。
otevri_pr_vnejsi_branu_se_zGMw
I managed to open the outer gate, but the rest of the plan failed. The defenders lifted the drawbridge leading to the inner castle.
尽管我成功打开了外城门，但是我们的其它计划却落空了。守城者已将通往城堡的吊桥升起。
otevri_sp_obsazeni_veze_z_2MJK
Because the tower is occupied, reinforcements can't come from the courtyard. We should retake the lower floors of the tower as soon as possible and open it up for our allies.
在塔楼被占领的情况下，庭院处的援军无法抵达。我们得尽快夺回塔楼底层，为友军打开进入塔楼的通道。
otevri_sp_ve_vezi_jsme_ot_GX8O
In the tower, we opened the entrance for the reinforcements who the attacking Praguers were holding back.
我们进入了塔楼，为被布拉格挡住的援军打开了通道。
outrolog_p_tak_sem_ho_kul_ew5p

Samuel’s men agreed to take me to Liechtenstein, who is hiding in the cellar of The King Solomon Tavern. Despite his involuntary exile, Liechtenstein was in good spirits (perhaps in part because the tavern’s cellar is, of course, intended for storing wine). We discussed everything that had happened, and I asked him for help in finding Capon. Liechtenstein knew that Capon is being held at some fortress in Maleshov, but getting in seems like it's going to be a tough nut to crack.
塞缪尔的手下同意带我去找列支敦士登，他就躲藏在所罗门王酒馆的地下室里。尽管被迫流亡，他仍表现出一副神采奕奕的模样（或许得多亏了地下室里储存的红酒）。我们对此前发生的事进行了详尽的讨论，同时，我请求他协助我寻找卡蓬领主。我从他口中得知，卡蓬正被囚禁在一座名为马列索夫的堡垒之中，但解救他将会是一项极为棘手的任务。
ovladni_v_musime_s_certem_qXK8
Me and the Devil have to cause confusion in the village. It needs to look like the village suddenly caught fire. Zizka and the mercenaries will cut the people off from the fortress.
我和酒鬼得在村里引起骚乱，制造突然起火的假象，而杰式卡和雇佣兵们将阻断村民与城堡之间的联络。
ovladni_v_nocni_najezd_na_d6QO
The night-time raid on Maleshov was terrible. Anyone who resisted or didn't run to the woods was killed.
对马列索夫的夜间突袭真是惨绝人寰，所有反抗的人或是没有逃进树林里的人都被斩尽杀绝。
ozbroj_jeden_nikdy_nevi_c_Wqmz
You never know what might happen. I'd best have a weapon, just in case. There might be a woodcutting axe around here somewhere at least.
防人之心不可无。我得找把武器，以防万一。这附近怎么说也应该有把砍柴的斧头。
ozbroj_se_jeden_nikdy_nev_gZb7
I've got a weapon. I should keep it under my belt so it's to hand if needed. Who knows what might happen in these parts.
我取得了武器，应该把它别在我的腰带上，确保随手能够拿到。此地极为凶险。
oznam_men_s_menhartem_jse_dFse

Menhard and I had a falling out and it ended pretty tragically for him. So this is the unfortunate end of the story of Master Menhard and the whole affair with King Wenceslas' charter and the Kuttenberg swordfighting brotherhood.
门哈德与我针锋相对，最终他下场惨淡。这则牵扯到了门哈德大师和库滕堡剑术兄弟会，还关乎瓦茨拉夫国王特许状的故事，如今已迎来了它的结局。
oznam_mic_dluh_je_vyrovna_LdK2
The debt is settled without Michael and George having to lift a finger. I should tell them.
债务已经还清，而迈克尔和乔治不需要动半根手指。我得将结果告诉他们。
oznam_mic_michal_s_davide_5yCR
Michael and George are free to go to Kuttenberg to try their luck as musicians. I hope to see them again sometime!
迈克尔和乔治终于可以前往库滕堡，开展他们的乐师生涯，希望我将来还能再见到他们！
oznam_pod_mlynar_chtel_ab_fFC2

The miller wanted me to meet him in The Lair, saying he'd tell me everything. To his surprise, I arrived there in the company of the bailiff and his men, only to find out that I've been involved the whole time in the manufacture of black powder! Good thing we stopped him and his band. I don't dare imagine what he was planning with such a dangerous weapon and how many people might have paid with their lives.
磨坊主想让我在“巢穴”与他碰头，并表示他会将一切告诉我。他没有料到，我竟然带着执行官及其人手一起出现在那里，并且发现我居然一直在参与制造黑火药！幸好我们阻止了他。不敢想象他究竟会拿这种危险的军火做出什么事，又有多少人将因此而丧命。
oznam_pod_taky_si_ale_rik_ZgW1

But I also wonder as a God-fearing man whether I should report everything to Bailiff Thrush at the Rathaus. I'm sure I'd be duly rewarded. God knows what the miller is up to and whether I'll get out of this alive.
但作为一个敬畏上帝的人，我也在犹豫是否应该将这一切报告给市政厅的执行官瑟鲁什。我相信我会得到应有的回报。天晓得磨坊主究竟在做什么，以及我能否全身而退。
oznam_s_p_musim_se_pripoj_u4py
I have to join Capon and tell Lord von Bergow we're back.
我得跟卡蓬会合，并告知冯·波尔高领主我们已经返回。
oznam_s_p_tbd_6LOK

Capon relayed the message at Nebakov and I took a look around, because something smelled fishy. I shared my suspicions with Lord von Bergow, and he grudgingly agreed with me, even promised me a reward. What he does with this information is up to him, but I consider this chapter closed.
卡蓬在内巴科夫传达消息，而我则是四处打探，因为我发现了些可疑之事。在我将疑虑告知冯·波尔高大人后，他勉为其难地接受了我的见解，竟还承诺给我一份奖赏。至于他要如何处置那些事情就取决于他自己了，总之我认为这一篇章已经画上了句号。
oznam_s_p_tbd_MORV
Capon relayed the message at Nebakov and I took a look around. Something seemed off there, but when I told Lord von Bergow about it, he didn't seem too concerned. So I consider this chapter closed.
卡蓬在内巴科夫传达消息，而我则是四处打探。有些事情让我感到很不对劲，但是当我向冯·波尔高大人汇报时，他对此似乎并不在意，所以想必事情也就到此为止了。
oznam_s_p_tbd_vratili_jsm_jPrP

Capon and I returned to Lord von Bergow and told him what's really going on at Nebakov, and that Lord Jaromier is being held prisoner. Lord von Bergow promised to remedy the situation swiftly, and even rewarded me. It seems like he was more than satisfied with our services and wit. We'll see how things evolve and when we'll return to Nebakov sword in hand.
卡蓬和我回到了冯·波尔高领主那里，并将内巴科夫的真实情况告诉了他，他也得知雅罗米尔领主正处于囚禁之中。冯·波尔高领主承诺会迅速处理这一情况，甚至还给了我一份奖赏，看来他对我们的表现和智慧极为满意。至于事态将如何发展，我们又何时能够持剑返回内巴科夫，就拭目以待吧。
p2_donut__za_kontrolu_obj_M5wg

The person responsible for checking the volumes of outgoing ore was ore merchant Hermann, he was the one checking ore quality and determining the price. Unfortunately, I couldn't get more information out of him.
负责检查矿石产出量的人就是矿石商人赫尔曼，他不仅要负责查验矿石质量，还会对其进行定价。不幸的是，我无法从他那里得到信息。
p2_promlu_p2_bez_za_nim_n_LH8S
Christian wants to discuss the matter in private. I should go with him.
克里斯蒂安想与我进行私下讨论，我得跟着他。
p2_promlu_p2_promluv_si_s_htGr
Christian wants to discuss the matter in private. He's waiting for me there.
克里斯蒂安想与我进行私下讨论，他正在那里等着我。
p2_promlu_p_promluv_si_s__HhNO
Christian wants to discuss the matter in private. I must wait until he returns.
克里斯蒂安想与我进行私下讨论，我必须等他回来。
p2_ziskej_kralovsky_mincm_O5HM

With the help of Buresh, the smelter owner, the Royal Mint Master Ulrich Vavak von Neuhaus created a criminal network by means of which he diverted a part of the royal share to a secret mint, where he had new groschen minted using a genuine coin die. That made him very rich. I've got his records clearly proving the entire crime that could get him executed. Because stealing the royal silver warrants a capital punishment.
冶炼厂老板布雷斯助纣为虐，帮皇家铸币师乌尔里希·瓦万克·冯·纽豪斯编织了一张犯罪网络，并利用它将部分皇室财产转移到一处秘密铸币厂里，还在那里使用真币模具铸造全新的格罗申，这也让他变得腰缠万贯。现在我已拿到了他的记录，其中内容清晰证明了整件犯罪事实，他可能会遭受处刑，毕竟偷用皇家白银可是件死罪。
p2_ziskej_kralovsky_mincm_PK1b

The word around Kuttenberg is Mint Master Vavak is getting much richer than his – rather comfortable – office would warrant. Apparently, he even steals royal silver, which is a capital offence. There is no evidence, though. If Ruthard had such evidence, it would solve his problems with Vavak once and for all. So he instructed me to get him the evidence.
在库滕堡，有关铸币官瓦万克的流言不绝于耳，言其财富之丰，远非其闲职所能匹配。显然，他甚至偷用了皇室白银，此乃死罪，不过目前尚缺证据。如果鲁瑟德能查出相关证据，便可一举解决与瓦万克之间的纷争，因此他让我去寻找证据。
papezskyl_bez_se_vyspat_jPuu
Go and get some sleep.
小睡片刻。
papezskyl_doprovod_pani_r_Lv4C
Escort Lady Rosa to Ruthard Palace.
护送罗莎小姐前往鲁瑟德宫。
papezskyl_jed_do_lorece_z_S8Ms
Get ready to go to Loretz.
准备前往洛雷兹。
papezskyl_nauc_se_zaklady_YJB0
Learn basics of Italian from Brabant.
向布拉班特学习基础意大利语。
papezskyl_nenech_kardinal_4tkK
Don't let the Cardinal flee!
别让红衣主教逃走！
papezskyl_objective2_jGr5
Get the key to the royal treasury.
取得皇室宝库的钥匙。
papezskyl_objective4_E6qx
Get Vavak's help with the silver theft.
让瓦万克协助偷盗白银。
papezskyl_ohlas_se_zizkovi_rQKk
Report to Zizka.
向杰式卡汇报。
papezskyl_povez_bohutovi__TLqz
Tell Godwin about the guard commander.
将警卫队长之事告诉古德温。
papezskyl_prenes_rozu_pre_TvCm
Carry Rosa over the flooded section of the passageway.
协助罗莎通过被水淹没的通道。
papezskyl_priprav_se_na_o_nf85
Prepare to leave for the Italian Court.
准备前往意大利宫。
papezskyl_promluv_si_s_pe_6MHv
Ride to Suchdol to join the others.
骑行前往苏赫多尔与其他人会合。
papezskyl_promluv_si_s_zi_Hso8
Talk to Zizka about what's next.
与杰式卡商谈下一步计划。
papezskyl_promluv_si_s_zi_O55P
Talk to Zizka.
与杰式卡交谈。
papezskyl_prozkoumej_se_s_i34P
Explore the underground passage with Samuel.
与塞缪尔一同探索地下通道。
papezskyl_vrat_se_do_ruth_MR8h
Return to Ruthard Palace.
回到鲁瑟德宫。
papezskyl_vrat_se_za_rozou_I91X
Tell Rosa the coast is clear.
告诉罗莎，现在安全了。
papezskyl_vrat_se_za_zizk_Xslw
Go back to Zizka with the key.
带着钥匙回去找杰式卡。
papezskyl_vyptej_se_rozy__NoSD
Ask Rosa about the underground passageways.
向罗莎询问地下通道的事。
papezskyl_vyzvedni_si_od__Xv9a
Pick up Italian clothes from Lady Rosa.
向罗莎小姐取得意大利服饰。
papezskyl_zabij_kristiana_ZSs5
Kill Christian.
杀死克里斯蒂安。
papezskyl_zbav_se_pobudu__k4CM
Get rid of the lowlifes in Ruthard Palace.
解决鲁瑟德宫里的无赖。
papezskyl_zbav_se_vykrada_uXps
Get rid of the looters in the crypt.
解决墓穴里的盗墓者。
pasacek_n_dones_nechutovi_IoqX
Bring Natan a wolf's ear.
将一只狼耳带给纳坦。
pasacek_n_konfrontuj_kuma_3lD9
Explore the vagrant camp
探索流浪汉营地
pasacek_n_nechuta_zemrel_j0Zg
Natan is dead.
纳坦死了。
pasacek_n_vrat_se_za_nech_qBM0
Go back to Natan.
回去找纳坦。
pasacek_n_vystopuj_vlci_s_J5Lg
Track down the werewolf
追踪狼人。
pasacek_s_doved_ztracenou_7L0N
Take the lost ram to the pen
把丢失的羊送回畜栏
pasacek_s_najdi_smolikovi_3dDJ
Find Smoliek's sheep
找到斯莫利克的羊
pasacek_s_najdi_ztracenou_onUL
Find the lost ram
寻找丢失的羊
pasacek_s_rekni_safarikov_ITw2
Tell Stanislav how things turned out
向斯坦尼斯拉夫回报事情的结果
pasacek_s_safarik_zemrel_aUmt
Stanislav is dead.
斯坦尼斯拉夫已死。
pasacek_s_smolik_zemrel_zkD1
Smoliek died.
斯莫利克已死。
pasacek_s_urezej_ovcim_usi_GFAd
Cut off the sheep's ear
切下羊耳朵
pasacek_s_vrat_se_k_ovci_wH8r
Go back to the ram
回到公羊身边
pasacek_s_vrat_se_za_smol_AjX6
Return to Smoliek.
向斯莫利克回报。
pasacek_z_najdi_vlci_smec_MbkI
Find the wolf pack.
找到狼群。
pasacek_z_pobij_vlci_smec_4wRu
Kill the pack of wolves.
歼灭狼群。
pasacek_z_vrat_se_za_zibr_7kF4
Go back to Siegfried.
回去找西格弗里德。
pasacek_z_zibrid_zemrel_g9rY
Siegfried died.
西格弗里德已死。
pastnajana__event_caption_Rvfz
Ambush
伏击
pastnajana__event_descrip_muOQ
A group of Cumans attacked a passing cart. Before you could react, one of them noticed you.
一伙库曼人袭击了一辆路过的马车。你还没来得及做出反应，其中一人就注意到了你。
pastnajana__player_caption_bu77
Ambush
伏击
pastnajana__player_descri_knvd
Not far from you, you can hear the clash of weapons and shouts in different languages - someone has been ambushed by the Cumans.
不远处的兵器碰撞之声传过你的耳边，伴随而来的还有各种不同语言的叫喊声——有人遭到了库曼人的伏击。
pavlenaro_bozena_se_zmini_FDAH
Bozhena mentioned that I could search Pavlena's room upstairs in the cottage. In the end, I didn't search there.
博珍娜说我可以上楼，去帕芙莱娜的房间搜搜看。我没去。
pavlenaro_bozena_se_zmini_mYEL

Bozhena mentioned that I could search Pavlena's room upstairs in the cottage. I found nothing in Pavlena’s room suggesting she wanted to run away or hide for a time. However, I did find a man’s head-cover.
博珍娜说我可以上楼，去帕芙莱娜的房间搜搜看。我在帕芙琳娜的房间里没有发现任何迹象表明她想要逃跑或躲藏一段时间。不过我找到了一个男人的头饰。
pavlenaro_bozena_se_zmini_uvVx
Bozhena mentioned that I could search Pavlena's room upstairs in the cottage. She has a bed and her things there. I might find a clue to her whereabouts.
博珍娜说我可以上楼，去帕芙莱娜的房间搜搜看。她的床和日用品都在那里，我也许能找到一些线索。
peasants__event_caption_vov5
Encounter
偶遇
peasants__event_descripti_hqBZ
You met a plainly dressed wayfarer, a bit dirty - nothing peculiar. He's got a weapon, but who doesn’t these days. He approaches and motions for you to stop.
你遇到了一位衣着朴素的旅者，除了身躯略带污泥外，并无特别之处。他带着武器，但如今谁不带呢。他渐渐靠近，挥手示意要你停下。
peasants__player_caption_kvN8
Encounter
偶遇
peasants__player_descript_QYuM
On the road ahead, you see a slightly shabby man. There's nothing remarkable about him. He’s just standing there alone. He hasn't seen you yet.
就在道路前方，你看到了一个男人，他外表略显落魄，并没有任何特别之处，只是孤零零地站在原地，而他也始终没有注意到你。
perfume_parfem_je_vymenen_zm4D

In return for a dress, the bathhouse wench told me they add some fragrant oil to the councillor's bath. But not on his next visit, they won't. I took the oil, so next time he has a bath he'll only smell his own ar… well, he won't smell anything fragrant.
作为对衣服的回报，那位澡堂姑娘将他们曾在议员洗澡时对他使用了某种香精油这件事告诉了我，但议员如果之后还来，他们不打算再那么做。我已经取走了那瓶香精油，那位议员下次再来的话，他就只能闻闻自己的…总之，他别想再闻到那种香味了。
perfume_pokusil_jsem_se_v_IgqU

In return for the dress the bathhouse wench told me they add some fragrant oil to the councillor's bath, and I'm certain he wouldn't be happy to not have it. So I found it and took it from them, but unfortunately they saw me taking it. That ruined my moment of surprise, when Naaz would be lying in the tub with no oil to pour on him. I hope they can't get him a new one before his next visit.
作为对衣服的回报，那位澡堂姑娘告诉我她们会在议员的浴缸里加一些香精油。我敢肯定，要是议员不能再使用那种香精油，他一定很是不快，因此我找到了香精油并将其拿走了。但遗憾的是他们发现了我的作为，真是扫兴。纳兹本该只能躺在无味的澡盆里的。希望他下次来之前她们来不及弄到新的。
perfume_vymenim_konseluv__v4JL

In return for a dress, the bathhouse wench told me they add some fragrant oil to the councillor's bath. I'm certain he won't be pleased if they don't have any on his next visit. I have to find the bottle. She said it's locked in Adam's chambers somewhere upstairs. I reckon the attic's the place to look.
作为对衣物的回报，那位澡堂女仆说他们在市议员洗浴的过程中加入了一些香精油。我敢肯定，如果下次市议员再来洗浴时没能再用到那种油，他一定会不高兴的，所以我得找到那瓶香精油。澡堂女仆说过它就被锁在楼上亚当的房间里，那间阁楼应该就是我要搜查的地方。
perfume_vymenou_za_saty_m_ybOy

In return for the dress the bathhouse wench told me they add some fragrant oil to the councillor's bath, but I didn't want to indulge him anymore, so I stole it. And it wouldn't have been an ordinary day if something hadn't gone to shit again, as a guard confiscated the oil from me, during a search. I've got to get that bottle back or he'll return it to Adam and it will be all for nothing.
作为对衣服的回报，那位澡堂姑娘告诉我她们会在议员的浴缸里加一些香精油，但我可不想再让他继续享受了，因此偷走了它。可是如果一切顺遂，那就不正常了，果然一名警卫在搜查时没收了香精油，而我得把瓶子拿回来。不然香精油就会回到亚当手里，一切努力就都白费了。
pickuphun_vostatek_bez_mo_AE3S
It's hard to carry an injured person in any other way than over your shoulder. I should pick him up.
面对一个受伤的人，你只能选择将他背回去。我得扶他起来。
pickuphun_vostatek_nemuze_Z7jy
Vostatek can't walk, so he asked me to carry him to his hideout. But that doesn't matter now, because he died.
沃斯塔克不能走路，所以他请求我将他背到自己的藏身之地。但现在已经不重要了，因为他死了。
pij_hoduj_hostina_je_v_pl_pakZ

The banquet is in full flow, and it would be a pity not to have fun. After all, tomorrow we go into battle, and you never know if this goblet of wine or tasty chunk of roast meat won't be your last. It's also an opportunity to have fun with highborn society and maybe make new friends.
宴会正如火如荼地进行着，要是不好好享受一番可就太遗憾了，毕竟明天我们将要踏上战场，谁又知这杯中美酒和手中香肉会不会是我们的最后一餐呢？再说，这也是一次能与贵族人士一同享乐并与之交好的机会呢。
pij_hoduj_hostina_na_tros_rKG1

The Trosky feast went on into the night. After suffering for so long, we could finally put all our worries behind us. Chamberlain Ulrich von Schaumberg has been assigned to lead the attack. He doesn't have any special duties for me and Capon, just that we take part in the attack.
特罗斯基的这场宴会持续到了深夜。在经历了诸多坎坷之后，我们终于可以将顾虑都抛之脑后。管家乌尔里希·冯·沙恩伯格将受命领导此次进攻，他并没有给我和卡蓬安排任何特殊任务，只希望我们能参与到进攻当中。
pij_s_kum_hlava_me_bude_b_PdAB
My head won't stop aching, but I survived an evening with the Cumans. My God, they sure know how to drink!
头一直在痛，但还是坚持和库曼人度过了一晚上。天哪，他们可真能喝！
pij_s_kum_odesel_jsem_z_k_pUqJ
I left the Cumans in the middle of the evening. I'm not sure they'll want to speak to me again.
到了半夜我就离开了，不知道他们还愿不愿意跟我说话。
pij_s_kum_promluvil_jsem__5mNT
I spoke to Vasko, and he invited me to drink with them. I agreed, and it seems like I'm in for an interesting evening.
我跟瓦斯科谈好了，他邀请我留下来一起喝酒。我同意了，看起来晚上会非常有意思。
placehode_lacek_byl_v_hos_l8eC
Latsek was in the tavern, just like Margaret said.
拉塞克就在酒馆里，就像玛格丽特说的那样。
placehode_mel_jsem_jit_do_EyA5
Sakra! It's all gone wrong! I hope Anezhka can get by without the coin from that skirt-chaser.
妈的！一切都搞砸了！但愿阿涅兹卡没有那个色鬼的钱也能生活下去。
placehode_musim_do_hospod_BLbn
I have to go and see someone called Latsek in the tavern. It seems he's the tailor we're going after. Let's hope he agrees to talk to me. We'll see.
我得去酒馆见一个叫拉塞克的人，看来他就是我们要找的裁缝，希望他同意跟我谈谈。我们等着瞧吧。
placehold_mel_bych_se_zas_vKrM
I should visit Vira and discuss the outcome of the fight.
我得去跟威拉谈论决斗的结果。
placehold_nastesti_jsem_p_RrcQ
Fortunately I took care of Eggman and I gave his hat to the inkeeper as evidence.
所幸我已解决掉鸡蛋佬，并将他的帽子作为证据，交给了酒馆老板。
placehold_placeholder_chc_Ezrm
They say Jezhek's armour bears his crest - a black raven on a yellow field.
他们说杰泽克的盔甲上有他的徽章——黄底上一只黑乌鸦。
placehold_placeholder_chc_r0qG
I'll recognise Jezhek's horse, Gringolet, by the yellow caparison with a black raven.
我可以认出杰泽克的马，格林戈莱，它身披黄色马衣，上面有只黑色乌鸦。
placehold_placeholder_dal_boCQ
And Sir Jezhek has his armour back.
杰泽克爵士拿回了自己的盔甲。
placehold_placeholder_doh_fCCf
I managed to join the party headed for Semine...
我成功赶上了前往塞米的部队......
placehold_placeholder_jez_EEcj
Such fine armour would be wasted on Jezhek. I'd rather keep it myself.
这么好的盔甲穿在杰泽克身上真是浪费。我宁愿自己留着。
placehold_placeholder_log_PFKs
I won't be able to talk to the Cumans now, they won't listen to me.
我现在无法和那群库曼人交谈，他们不会听我的。
placehold_placeholder_mus_4pSw
And the same applies to Jezhek's horse, Gringolet.
杰泽克的马，格林戈莱也是一样
placehold_placeholder_mus_KtcT
I lingered and the soldiers left without me. I have to catch up with them!
我耽搁太久，错过了部队启程的时间，现在我必须赶上他们！
placehold_placeholder_mus_pfX0
Now there's nothing left but to steal Jezhek's armour.
现在，除了偷取杰泽克的盔甲之外，没有别的办法了。
placehold_placeholder_muz_3u6f
Now that I've defeated Zavish, I can take back Jezhek's armour. I'll find it in a chest in his tent.
现在我打败了扎维什，可以拿回杰泽克的盔甲。我将在他帐篷里的一个箱子里找到它。
placehold_placeholder_muz_UiVu
I should find the horse, Gringolet, in the stable by the eastern gate of the camp.
我应该能在军营东门边的马厩里找到那匹马，格林戈莱。
placehold_placeholder_nes_THpN
The soldiers rode off without me and I don't know if I'll be able to get to Semine… Probably not.
部队已然抛下了我前往塞米，也不知道我能否抵达那里......或许不能吧。
placehold_placeholder_seb_30Jy
They've seized Jezhek's armour from me! I have to get it back.
他们从我手上夺走了杰泽克的盔甲！我必须把它拿回来。
placehold_placeholder_seb_IQY7
Now I should take this suit armour and give it to Jezhek, but it's rather nice…
现在我应该把这套盔甲拿给杰泽克，但盔甲相当不错…
placehold_placeholder_ses_8wRm
I have to mount Jezhek's horse quickly and take him to Pschitoky.
必须迅速骑上杰泽克的马，把他带到普西托克。
placehold_placeholder_vza_6edy
I stole Jezhek's horse, Gringolet.
我偷了杰泽克的马格林戈莱。
placehold_placeholder_vza_N5I1
I got Jezhek's horse, Gringolet.
我找到了杰泽克的马格林戈莱。
placehold_placeholder_vza_PtoV
I stole Jezhek's armour.
我偷了杰泽克的盔甲。
placehold_placeholder_vza_seyX
I've got my hands on Jezhek's armour.
我拿到了杰泽克的盔甲。
placehold_podekoval_jsem__oXNV
I thanked Vira for the fight.
我感谢威拉与我决斗。
placehold_pukavec_sice_ne_53Jr
While Eggman may still be lurking somewhere, the inkeeper doesn't need to know that. I brought him Eggman's hat and told him that I took care of his problem.
或许此刻鸡蛋佬还潜藏在某个角落，但酒馆老板无需知晓此事。我将鸡蛋佬的帽子交给了酒馆老板，告诉他我已将麻烦彻底解决。
placehold_s_ptackem_jsme__5VZQ
Capon and I relayed the message at Nebakov as von Bergow asked, and then successfully returned to Trosky. Lord von Bergow is satisfied and this chapter is closed.
遵照冯·波尔高的指示，我与卡蓬在内巴科夫传达了消息，随后也成功返回了特罗斯基。冯·波尔高领主对此很是满意，而这一篇章也就此终结。
placehold_vira_me_porazil_GaOv
Vira got the better of me.
威拉战胜了我。
placehold_vyhral_jsem_zap_ueSQ
I won the fight with Vira.
我打败了威拉。
planattac_myslenka_na_boj_47NX
The idea of fighting while being so outnumbered forced me to reassess the situation and leave. I'm not going to help Lord Posy anymore.
在敌多我少的情况下战斗，这种想法迫使我重新评估形势并决定离开。我不打算继续帮助“花骨朵”领主了。
planattac_nepritel_ma_na__ceah
The enemy may have numbers on its side, but we've got courage. Or might it be better to attack with guile? I better speak to Lord Posy.
敌人可能有人数优势，但我们有勇气。或者说，用计谋进攻可能会更好？我最好和“花骨朵”领主谈谈。
planattac_nepritel_ma_na__fZ70
The enemy may have numbers on its side, but we can't allow this to frighten us. It's time to finally do something about these Cumans.
敌人可能有人数优势，但我们不能因此被吓倒。该对这些库曼人采取行动了。
plant_evi_podstrcil_jsem__k33r
Exactly as agreed with Crow, I put some poisonous flowers in Grozav's tent. That should be enough to condemn him.
依照与克劳的约定，我将一些毒花放到了格罗扎夫的帐篷里，那应该足以让他面临指控了。
plant_evi_stepan_mi_dal_p_6v2M
Stephen gave me a couple of poisonous flowers to put in Grozav's tent so I could frame him for the murder. That way I would get rid of the commander of the entire camp…
为了将谋杀栽赃到格罗扎夫头上，斯蒂芬给了我几朵毒花，让我放到格罗扎夫的帐篷里，如此一来就能将整片营地的首领给彻底解决......
plesnivec_dones_cevenakov_D3ob
Bring Gules Canker's mace.
把“溃疡”的狼牙棒带给古勒斯。
plesnivec_najdi_plesnivcu_mfaQ
Find Canker's camp.
找到“溃疡”的营地。
plesnivec_rozbij_plesnivc_FagQ
Break up Canker's gang
解散“溃疡”的团伙。
pobij_las_laszlo_si_mysle_ftr8

László thought he could blackmail and intimidate us and get away with it. He was mistaken. We have avenged Sir Peter of Suchotlesky, may the earth rest lightly on him, and killed László's party to the last man. God's mills indeed grind slowly.
拉斯洛以为他可以勒索和恐吓我们，无需付出任何代价。他错了。我们已经为苏霍茨基的彼得爵士报了仇，愿他最终安息，愿我们将拉斯洛的党羽赶尽杀绝。善恶到头终有报。
pobij_las_planovane_mirov_0YgF

The idea of a peaceful handover was a naive one. If László thinks he can get the coin while his men commit foul deeds, he's gravely mistaken. Even though it means hardly anything to him, a knight's honour must be defended, even at the cost of one's own blood. We'll show them that Peter of Suchotlesky did not die in vain.
和平交接的想法过于天真。如果拉斯洛认为他可以让手下干坏事，自己得到钱币，那他就大错特错。尽管骑士的道义对他来说几乎一文不值，但我们一定要捍卫它，哪怕是以自己的鲜血为代价。我们要让他们知道，苏霍茨基的彼得并没有白白牺牲。
pobij_pra_bitva_o_prst_bo_fAXA
The Battle of the Finger of God is beginning, and my former brothers-in-arms from the camp are now my enemies.
“上帝之指”之战已然打响，营地里先前还是战友的伙伴现在已经成了我的敌人。
pobij_vlc_cas_hledani_sko_K6cs
The search is over. Now I have to kill the wolves and take their ears to Siegfried.
搜查已经结束，现在我得歼灭狼群，并将它们的耳朵带给西格弗里德。
pobij_vlc_pobil_jsem_vlky_eew6
I managed to track down and kill the wolves who were tormenting Siegfried.
我成功找出了那些一直在侵扰西格弗里德的狼群，并将它们斩尽杀绝。
poblahopr_bergov_tu_jeste_1Qhs
Lord von Bergow never turned up in the end, so I can go and congratulate the newlyweds and then leave.
冯·波尔高领主至始至终都未曾现身，既然如此，我现在该向这对新婚夫妇送上祝福，然后离开。
poblahopr_po_obradu_bergo_Dpvn

In the end, Lord von Bergow didn't turn up, so I wanted at least to congratulate the newlyweds, as is right and proper. I couldn't find either of them at first. In the end, all I found was a tearful bride who told me that young Lord Semine had left right after the ceremony. I wanted to comfort her when a drunken Vuytek walked into the room just like before with Lord Capon. This time he wouldn't back down though because he thought I was making passes at the bride. He was about to smash my teeth in, when Lord Capon struck him down. And so began the famous brawl that is still on everyone's lips around Trosky to this day.

婚宴已经结束，冯·波尔高大人却始终不见踪影。出于礼节，我想要为两位新人送上祝福。起初我未能找到他们，而最后也只发现了那位新娘，泪流满面的她告诉我塞米少主在婚礼结束后便立马离开了。在我欲要安抚新娘之际，醉醺醺的维特克像先前一样走进了房间，随行而来的还有卡蓬大人。这一次维特克并未退缩，他以为新娘正遭受我的骚扰，所以差点没将我的牙齿打碎，好在卡蓬大人及时将其撂倒。我们打得不可开交，这场搏斗直到今天依然为特罗斯基的人们津津乐道。
poblahopr_po_obradu_bergo_h54C

In the end, Lord von Bergow didn't turn up, so I wanted at least to congratulate the newlyweds, as is right and proper. I couldn't find either of them at first. In the end, all I found was the tearful bride who told me that young Lord Semine had left right after the ceremony. I wanted to comfort her when drunken Vuytek walked into the room and thought I was making passes at the bride. He was about to smash my teeth in, when Lord Capon struck him down. And so began the infamous brawl that is still on everyone's lips around Trosky to this day.
婚宴已经结束，冯·波尔高大人却始终不见踪影。出于礼节，我想要为两位新人送上祝福。起初我未能找到他们，而最后也只发现了那位新娘，泪流满面的她告诉我塞米少主在婚礼结束后便立马离开了。在我欲要安抚新娘之际，醉醺醺的维特克走进了房间。他以为我正在骚扰新娘，差点没将我的牙齿打碎，好在卡蓬大人及时将其撂倒。我们打得不可开交，这场搏斗直到今天依然为特罗斯基的人们津津乐道。
pocestny___event_caption_X8Ft
Unlucky fellah
悲惨之人
pocestny___event_descript_4ms6
There's a bleeding man lying by the road. It looks like he'll meet his maker if you don't help him fast.
道路旁正躺着一个血迹斑斑的男人。但似乎再不及时救治，他就要去见阎王了。
pocestny___player_caption_NTMM
Unlucky fellah
悲惨之人
pocestny___player_descrip_8jhV
There's a bleeding man lying by the road. It looks like he'll meet his maker if you don't help him fast.
道路旁正躺着一个血迹斑斑的男人。但似乎再不及时救治，他就要去见阎王了。
pocet_zas_zasah_do_jindri_BSvk
Henry is struck
亨利被攻击
pocet_zas_zasah_do_ptacka_owQO
Sir Hans is struck
汉斯少主被攻击
pockej_az_have_fun_at_neb_glu6
Capon is relaying the message and I'm supposed to wait for him to finish, so I have nothing to do. I'll look around for some entertainment.
卡蓬现在正在传达消息，我只能等他把事办完。既然无事可做，那就到附近找点乐子吧。
pockej_az_i_se_mnou_si_ch_jNSN
Hanush wants to talk to me too, but first I have to wait till he's finished with Capon.

pockej_az_je_na_case_aby__BDml

是时候让卡蓬展示一下他的剑术了。

Or drop by Mark, who's on duty at the gate, and practice shooting. And if that's not enough, Zwerk supposedly likes to play dice, so at least I can make some coin and maybe even a badge.
如果等待卡蓬要花去很长一段时间，我可以到马厩那里找佩尔泽尔，通过与内巴科夫的骑兵们赛马来打发时间，至少我可以好好教教他们怎么骑马。或者，我也可以去拜访一下马克，和他练习射箭，他就在大门站岗。如果这还不够的话，据说兹维克很喜欢玩骰子，没准我能从他那里赢到点钱，甚至是一枚徽章。
pockej_az_mlada_mela_ehm__g4ZD
Mlada had an… accident, and she's with the Lord now. Her husband will probably reunite with her soon, but that's not my concern anymore.
姆拉达…咳咳…出事了，她现在与上帝同在了。他们夫妻可能很快就会团聚，但这已经不关我的事了。
pockej_az_musim_uz_jen_po_am29
Now I just have to wait until he takes a drink.
现在我只需要等拉塞克喝下就好。
pockej_az_petrovi_uz_neni_IGwl

Lord Semine ran out of patience, so he went with Gnarly to search for the cart without me. They should have returned to the fortress by now.

Capon's meeting at Nebakov is over, but he had no idea he wasn't talking to Sir Jaromier Nebak but the leader of the bandits who have taken over the fort. We have to get back to Trosky as fast as we can and report this!
卡蓬于内巴科夫的会谈已经结束，但他并不知道那位与他交谈的“雅罗米尔·内巴克爵士”并非本人，而是个早已占领了堡垒的强盗头领。我们必须尽快回到特罗斯基，将此事向众人汇报！
pockej_az_ptacek_dokoncil_Jnbw
Capon finished his meeting at Nebakov that Lord von Bergow entrusted him with, so my free time is over. Time to get back to Trosky.
依照冯·波尔高大人嘱托，卡蓬完成了他在内巴科夫的会谈。我的闲暇时光也到此为止，是时候返回特罗斯基了。
pockej_az_ptacek_me_troch_85xL
During swordplay, Capon rather carelessly whacked me on the head. Fortunately I have a helmet, so it didn't do me much harm.
练剑时，卡蓬不小心打了我的头。幸好我戴着头盔，没什么大碍。
pockej_az_ptacek_mi_poved_W0FD

Capon told me what happened at Semine during my absence... Hashek was blinded by his desire for revenge and had everyone slaughtered on the spot! In the end, he burned to whole tower down as a warning to all those who would betray von Bergow - as young Olda Semine had done.
卡蓬将塞米发生的一切告诉了并未到场的我......当时的哈舍克被报复的欲望冲昏了头脑，竟当场将所有人尽数杀死！最后，他还把整座塔楼焚烧殆尽，以此警告众人，切忌像奥达·塞米那样背叛冯·波尔高大人。
pockej_az_ptacek_stale_je_XIcs

Capon's meeting is still going on, but he doesn't know that the man he's talking to is merely impersonating Sir Jaromier. I have to be really careful not to arouse suspicion and pray that it all works out. I can at least prepare the horses and wait there for Capon, so we can leave as soon as his meeting is over.
卡蓬的会谈仍在进行，但是他根本不知道与他交谈的人不过是假冒的雅罗米尔爵士。我必须得小心谨慎，免得挑起嫌疑，但愿这一切能顺利结束。现在我至少可以将马匹准备好，然后等待卡蓬，如此一来我们就能在他结束会谈后迅速离开。
pockej_az_seminovi_a_suko_V48j

pockej_az_uspal_jsem_byka_tyLH

pockej_az_uspavak_jsem_na_DF10

pockej_az_zatracene_tak_s_TxkM

天空才刚落下黑暗的帷幕，我们便派了一小群人去地穴屋放火，以此制造恐慌将矿工们从矿场中引出。这些公会成员并非残忍之辈，他们不想让自己的双手沾满鲜血！
pockej_na_musis_pockat_ne_1Spp

pockej_na_schuzka_zacne_a_J4O6

pockej_na_uz_te_neceka_za_81Ua

pockej_ne_turnaj_je_dnes__WHlt

比武大会如期而至，我最好赶紧动身，以免错过这一盛会！比武大会也将于上午6到10点之间，在"新门”和马市之间的城墙旁空地上开展。
pockej_pa_celedin_janek_p_dqqs
Stable hand Janek will soon be racing with the horseshoes I made for him. He promised me that if he wins, he’ll give me a few extra groschen.
Stable hand Janek will soon be racing with the horseshoes I made for him. He promised me that if he wins, he’ll give me a few extra groschen.
pockej_pa_celedin_je_mrtv_4SHS
Janek unfortunately died. Now I won’t get any reward for the horseshoes I made for him.
Janek unfortunately died. Now I won’t get any reward for the horseshoes I made for him.
pockej_pa_celedin_pojede__ioCw
I think it’s time I went back to Janek and collected my reward from him.
I think it’s time I went back to Janek and collected my reward from him.
pockej_pa_celedin_vyhral__LcRl
Janek won the race thanks to my horseshoes and shared the prize with me.
Janek won the race thanks to my horseshoes and shared the prize with me.

The horseshoes didn’t help Janek much. He lost the race, and I’m left without a reward.

I helped Menhard and Arne defeat the Kuttenbergers in the duels, even though it was far from easy. Despite Arne's injury we won and the swordfighting hall is now Menhard's. He asked me to wait a few days while he arranges everything and prepares the swordfighting hall. Oh, well, at least I have some time to celebrate my victory.
尽管历经艰辛，我还是帮助门哈德和阿耳涅战胜了库滕堡人。虽然阿耳涅负伤，但并未影响我们夺下决斗的胜利，现在剑术馆已归门哈德所有，他也将做好相关安排与准备，而在此期间，他让我稍作等待。啊，这样也好，至少我能有点闲暇时间来庆祝我的胜利。
pockej_pa_s_menhartem_jse_Yg0b

Menhard and I had a falling out and it ended pretty tragically for him. So this is the unfortunate end of the story of Master Menhard and the whole affair with King Wenceslas' charter and the Kuttenberg swordfighting brotherhood.
门哈德与我针锋相对，最终他下场惨淡。这则牵扯到了门哈德大师和库滕堡剑术兄弟会，还关乎瓦茨拉夫国王特许状的故事，如今已迎来了它的结局。
pockej_si_katerina_rikala_tn4f
I should probably hide in the bathhouse and wait till nightfall. Maybe I'll catch Katherine's unwanted visitor in the act.
我得躲在澡堂里，等到夜幕降临，没准能将那个凯瑟琳提过的不速之客抓个现行。
pockej_si_podarilo_se_mi__h6NZ
I managed to catch a Cuman called Chakan in the bathhouse at night. But I don't know if he's the one I'm looking for. I should follow him for a while and try to find some proof.
夜晚时分，我在澡堂里碰到了一个名为恰坎的库曼人，但却不知他是否就是那个我要找的人。我得尾随他一段路程，尝试找出相关证据。
pockej_si_vypada_to_ze_ch_p6yJ
It seems Chakan would go and watch Katherine while she slept. Yuck...
似乎每到凯瑟琳就寝时恰坎就会去偷窥她，真是让人汗毛直立..
podej_als_je_novy_den_man_5uRQ
Every morning Manka prepares a snack for Alshik, which I can take advantage of and pour Olbram's potion into it.
曼卡每天早上都会给阿尔希克准备食物，我可以借此机会将奥尔布拉姆的药水倒进食物里。
podej_als_manka_pripravil_CIns
Manka prepares Alshik's snack every morning, so now would probably be a good time to pour some of Olbram's potion into it...
曼卡每天早上都会给阿尔希克准备食物，现在或许正是将奥尔布拉姆的药水往食物里倒的好时机......
podej_als_manka_pripravuj_gLVL
Manka prepares a snack for the shepherd Alshik every morning. I might add the Olbram's potion to it before he takes it with him.
曼卡每天早上都会给阿尔希克准备食物，或许我可以趁着他把食物吃光之前将奥尔布拉姆提供的药水加入食物当中。
podej_als_musim_nejak_nen_v2cX
I have to discreetly get Alshik to drink the potion Olbram gave me. If I could somehow add it into the food Manka makes him every morning...
我得在不知不觉中让阿尔希克喝下奥尔布拉姆给我的药水。要是我能把药水渗入曼卡每天早上给他做的餐食里......
podej_als_obohatil_jsem_a_cfik

I enriched Alshik's lunch with the potion that Olbram gave me. Poor Alshik had no idea what was going on when he ran into the bushes to vomit... I guess it was a bit stronger than Olbram thought and instead of causing digestive problems, it must have come out of Alshik right away.
我往阿尔希克的午餐里注满了奥尔布拉姆给我的药水，可怜的阿尔希克啊，跑出去狂吐不止的他对这一切毫不知情......看来药效比奥尔布拉姆预想的要强，还没等引起什么消化问题，便被阿尔希克吐了出来。
podej_als_obohatil_sem_al_jXSt
I've spiked Alshik's lunch, now I just have to wait for the right moment. I reckon it'll happen around noon.
我往阿尔希克的午餐里渗入了药水，现在只需静观其变，大概到了中午时分就有好戏看咯。
podej_als_oou_alsik_si_vy_AciF

podej_als_otravu_alsika_u_oHhj

我现在不必再去操心给阿尔希克下药的事了。

我在公牛的饲料槽里倒入了一些安眠药水。
podej_byk_musim_dat_tomu__TNcy
I have to give the bull something to calm it down. If I pour it into his water trough in the barn during the day, he might not even notice me painting on it at night.
我得用点东西让那只公牛安分下来。如果我白天到谷仓里往它的饲料槽倒点东西，晚上它应该就不会察觉到我在它身上涂鸦了。
podej_ran_museli_jsme_s_p_NjYR

卡蓬与我不得不编造谎言，因为如果冯·波尔高得知我们曾在塞米参与过反抗哈舍克一行人的叛乱，他定会将我们当场处死。
podej_ran_ze_seminske_tvr_5jYA
Semine's fortress is now a ruin... And it will serve as a warning to all who dare to oppose von Bergow.

The cart was found and the bandits punished. Since the blacksmith's hands had nefarious intentions right from the start, I'm sure he doesn't want them back at the forge. I did what I could, cleared up the situation, and the blacksmith is satisfied. In his own peculiar way.
马车已找到，强盗也受到了惩罚。由于铁匠的工人从一开始就动机不良，我敢肯定他不希望他们回到铁匠铺。我尽我所能解决了问题，铁匠很满意。从他独特的角度来说。

我感谢亨泽尔与我决斗。

podivej_s_od_kubenky_jsem_b4J1

From Kubyenka, I finally got some advice on where I could look for Janosh. I should check in Miskowitz to see if he's there. Lo and behold, it worked. I went to the inn and discovered that Janosh could be found at the pillory.
通过与库宾卡交流，我最终得到了与亚诺什下落有关的线索。我该到米斯科维茨进行调查，看看能否找到他。不出所料，他果然就在那里。我去了一趟当地的旅店，进而得知亚诺什应该就在示众台那里。
podivej_s_od_kubenky_jsem_s4Af

From Kubyenka, I finally got some advice on where I could look for Janosh. I should check in Miskowitz to see if he's there. The best thing to do is to ask at the inn. I'm not going to search the whole village.
通过与库宾卡交流，我最终得到了与亚诺什下落有关的线索。我该到米斯科维茨进行调查，看看他是否就在那里。我可不能搜查整座村庄，所以最好的办法就是到旅店里打探一番。
podivej_s_tak_hanse_jsem__zYt2
So I eventually found Janosh in Miskowitz. In the pillory. It doesn't even surprise me.
我最终在米斯科维茨找到了亚诺什，他身着木枷，而我对此并不惊讶。
podivej_s_u_latryn_me_nap_jDaF

When I was by the latrines, it occurred to me that perhaps Ranyek was trying to escape. If the dice players were watching him, the only way he could run away was by crawling through the latrines. I'll take a look at the other side.
抵达茅厕之时，我忽然察觉到拉涅克似乎曾尝试过逃离。既然那些赌客们都在盯着他，那唯一能逃脱的办法就只有爬过茅厕。我得到茅厕另一边看看。
podivej_s_u_latryn_me_nap_pEp2

When I was by the latrines, it occurred to me that perhaps Ranyek was trying to escape. If the dice players were watching him, the only way he could run away was by crawling through the latrines. But there's just a big pile of shit on the other side. If he was trying to crawl out that way, he could have easily drowned in it.
抵达茅厕之时，我忽然察觉到拉涅克似乎曾尝试过逃离。既然那些赌客们都在盯着他，那唯一能逃脱的办法就只有爬过茅厕。可是茅厕另一边竟堆着一大摊粪便，要是他真的试图从此路爬出，他可能早已经溺死在其中了。
podkovy_j_marta_me_jeste__z0xV
Martha also asked me to bring the horseshoes to Victoria, a local girl who lives near the smithy.
玛尔塔还请求我将马蹄铁交给本地一个叫维多利亚的姑娘，她就住在铁匠铺附近。
podkovy_j_prisel_jsem_k_v_VzHv
I came to Victoria's house, but it was empty. She was supposed to be at home. It's strange.
我来到了维多利亚的家里，但却发现这里空无一人。她应该在家才对，真是奇怪。
pogrom_jdi_kliknout_na_dv_p76o
Wait for Samuel outside the inn.
在酒馆外等待塞缪尔。
pogrom_jdi_za_samem_99dq
Follow Samuel.
跟着塞缪尔。
pogrom_jdi_za_samem_k_mat_ZnG0
Go to Samuel's mother.
去找塞缪尔的母亲。
pogrom_nasleduj_lichta_ch_6o1Z
Get to the city.
前往城中。
pogrom_probij_se_domem_oc0R
Fight your way through the house!
穿过房屋，杀出条血路！
pogrom_rozluc_se_se_sarou_iuJK
Talk to Sara about Martin the blacksmith.
与萨拉讨论铁匠马丁。
pogrom_sedni_si_na_vuz_UXLu
Get on a wagon to Kuttenberg!
登上前往库滕堡的马车！
pogrom_utec_zadem_2M4k
Escape through the backyards!
从后院逃离！
pogrom_vycisti_hospodu_od_Ixn4
Search the inn.
搜查酒馆。
pogrom_vydrz_napor_pred_s_Xfj6
Withstand the onslaught outside the synagogue!
抵挡犹太教堂外的猛攻！
pogrom_zabij_vsech_na_hra_4Vfb
Kill the shooters on the ramparts!
杀死城墙上的弓箭手！
pohlidej__hajny_po_mne_ch_iioo
Vostatek wanted me to keep an eye on him. He said I was supposed to keep him away from drinking. Well, I failed.
沃斯塔克想让我对他稍加留意，别让他碰半滴酒，但是，我失败了。
pohlidej__hajny_po_mne_ch_lnbT
Vostatek wanted me to keep an eye on him. He said I was supposed to keep him away from drinking. I managed to keep him sober.
沃斯塔克想让我对他稍加留意，别让他碰半滴酒，而我也成功地让他保持清醒。
pohlidej__hajny_po_mne_ch_mEe5
Vostatek wanted me to keep an eye on him. He said I was supposed to keep him away from drinking. I checked on him and he was still holding up.
沃斯塔克想让我对他稍加留意，别让他碰半滴酒。我查看了他的状况，也得知他滴酒未沾。
pohlidej__hajny_po_mne_ch_vqwy
Vostatek wanted me to keep an eye on him. He said I was supposed to keep him away from drinking. I haven't seen him in a while, so I should go and check on him.
沃斯塔克想让我对他稍加留意，别让他碰半滴酒。我已经有段时间没见着他了，所以我得去看看他的状况。
pohlidej__kdyz_jsem_potka_GN43
When I met Vostatek, he asked me to keep an eye on him. He said he's afraid he'll start drinking again. He's fine for now, but later I should go and check on him every now and then.
当我遇到沃斯塔克时，担忧酒瘾再度发作的他让我对他稍加留意。现在的他状态尚可，但之后我得偶尔去查看他一下。
pohlidej__kdyz_jsem_potka_S9Iz

When I met Vostatek, he was already tipsy. He said he couldn't help himself. And he asked me to keep an eye on him. He's still fine for now, but I've got to check on him later. Now that he's already had a drink, things could get out of hand quickly.
当我遇到沃斯塔克时，他已经略显醉态，没能控制住自己的他希望我能对他稍加留意。他现在状态尚可，但稍后我仍需再来查看他的状态。既然他已经喝过了酒，说不定事态很快就会变得一发不可收拾。
pohrbi_ko_kozlik_uz_je_na_jr36
Kozliek's departed from this world, but if I leave him in Bozhena's yard, it could cause trouble. I should bury the body so it's hidden.
科兹里克已死，但把他留在博珍娜的院子里会引起麻烦。我应该把尸体埋藏起来。
pohrbi_ko_ubityho_kozlika_vuEi
The dead body of Kozlik is safely hidden in the ground and can't cause any more trouble. My work's done, and Bozhena and the gravedigger will take care of the rest later.
科兹里克的尸体被埋在一个隐蔽的地方，这下便高枕无忧了。我的工作完成了，博珍娜晚些会和掘墓人一起善后。
pohrbi_mi_k_bozene_nas_pr_tVfr
Mikesh the cut-throat came looking for us at Bozhena's, but that's the last thing he'll ever do. Bozhena asked me to bury him by the stream so he doesn't haunt her.
杀手米凯什到博珍娜家来找我们麻烦，他也因此丧命。博珍娜让我把他埋在小溪边，以免他阴魂不散。
pohrbi_mi_mrtvyho_mikese__FswF
I've put Mikesh's body in the ground. That's good enough for now. Bozhena will take care of the rest later with the gravedigger.
我把米凯什的尸体埋了。目前这样就够了。博珍娜晚些会和掘墓人一起善后……
pohrbi_mr_mrtvyho_chlapa__gDMN
I've buried the dead man who followed us last night, just like Bozhena asked. I hope he doesn't haunt anyone before the gravedigger comes and does the job properly.
我按博珍娜的要求，把追杀者的尸首埋了。希望他能在掘墓人把他安葬好之前，老老实实躺在里面不出来作祟。
pohrbi_mr_pred_chalupu_le_TbYt

The man who followed us and was killed by Sir Hans in the night is lying outside the cottage. Bozhena wants the body buried somewhere. She's right, having a dead body lying around won't do anyone any good.
昨晚追杀我们的人，被汉斯大人反杀，就躺在屋外。博珍娜希望掩埋尸体。她说得对，光天化日下躺着一具尸首，对任何人都没有好处。
pohrbi_ra_sice_jsem_ho_ne_FFIP
I didn’t know him, but Ranyek deserved to be buried. I had him laid to rest in the nearest cemetery just outside Kuttenberg.
虽然我不认识拉涅克，但他应该被埋葬。所以我把他安葬在了库滕堡外最近的墓地。
pohrbi_ra_sice_jsem_ho_ne_UOqq
I didn’t know him, but Ranyek deserves a proper burial. I can't just leave him lying here.
虽然我不认识拉涅克，但他应该得到妥善的安葬。我不能把他就这样留在这里。
poklad_najdi_sekeru_z_pov_t86v
Find the axe from the story.
寻找故事里的银斧。
poklad_rekni_zdenkovi_o_s_MneX
Tell Zdenyek about the axe.
将斧头一事告知兹登耶克。
poklad_zkuj_novou_stribrn_ap42
Repair the axe from the tale.
修复传说中的银斧。
pokracuj__chvala_panu_vuz_GwQT

Thank God! I made it to the wagon and Katherine's other allies. After waiting a few hours for von Bergow's soldiers to call off the search, we got Zizka onto the cart and set off for the Kuttenberg region.
谢天谢地！我终于找到了那辆马车和凯瑟琳的其他伙伴。我们等了几个小时，终于等到冯·波尔高的手下结束了搜捕，随后帮杰士卡上了马车，便朝着库滕堡地区行进。
pokracuj__po_kratke_pauze_eOqB
After a short break, we're continuing on our way to Troskowitz.
短暂休息过后，我们骑马前往特罗斯科维茨。
pokracuj__po_kratke_pauze_X9ph
Eventually we succesfully made it to Troskowitz, which is the largest village in the area. The working theory was that if the cart set out from Tachov, it had to pass through Troskowitz.
最终我们成功到达了特罗斯科维茨，这片地区最大的村庄。目前理论上来说，如果马车从塔霍夫出发，它就必须要经过特罗斯科维茨。
pokracuj__ted_uz_je_to_ro_5WSB
Now it's straight on till I reach the edge of Apollonia. But I can't drop my guard!
现在我得一直走到阿波罗尼亚的边界。不能放松警惕！
pokus_se__a_tady_to_vsech_Gn0N
This is the end. I couldn't stand to listen to another word out of that disgusting old man, so I sent him to the deepest circle of Hell.
这就是结局。我再也不想听那个令人厌恶的老头多说一个字，所以我将他送上了西天。
poloz_pyt_hodim_pytel_na__IBQT
I'll toss the sack on the pile with the others and I'll be done. This could be some easy money.
我把麻袋扔到麻袋堆上，就算大功告成。这钱赚得很轻松。
poloz_pyt_ten_pytel_musim_ojQy
I wanted to help Karel, but nothing came of it. What can you do.
我本想帮助卡雷尔，但是却无功而返。真是爱莫能助。
poloz_pyt_zatim_to_vypada_sqPu
So far so good. The sack is in its place and the bandits aren't paying much attention to me.
目前为止一切顺利。麻袋已经搬到，匪徒们也没怎么留意到我。
pomaluj_o_namisto_malovan_Od8G
Instead of painting on his bull, I told Olbram about the whole thing.
我没有在奥尔布拉姆的公牛身上涂鸦，而是将整件事情都告诉了他。
pomaluj_o_pomaluj_olbramo_aqLL
Everything's ready, now just to go to the bull and figure out what I'm going to paint on it.
万事俱备，现在只需去找那只公牛即可，看看我该在它身上画点什么吧。
pomaluj_o_pote_co_jsem_by_BxZO
I managed to put the bull to sleep, but I didn't get to him in time. Oh well, I suppose I'll have to do it again. Maybe it'll work out this time.
我成功让那只公牛睡了过去，但我没能及时到它那里。好吧，看来我得再让它沉睡一次，这次应该不会有差错了吧。
pomaluj_o_procek_me_nachy_znzD
Prochek found out I joined forces with Olbram against him. He doesn't want anything to do with me now.
普罗切克发现我和奥尔布拉姆已经联手对付他，现在的他也不想跟我有任何瓜葛。
pomaluj_o_zadne_malovani__UZBV
No more painting, the bull died. I don't think Prochek will be happy to hear that.
涂鸦计划泡汤，因为那只牛死了。估计普罗切克会为此感到失望的。
pomaluj_o_zjistil_jsem_ze_dgrj
I found out Olbram has somebody guarding the bull at night. I should be careful.
我得知奥尔布拉姆会每当夜晚时分，都会派人看守着那只公牛，所以我还是小心为妙。
pomer_se__cas_nakopat_mic_jl9H
It's time to kick Michael's arse and defend my lord's honour.
该给迈克尔点颜色瞧瞧了，我将捍卫汉斯爵士的荣耀。
pomer_se__pobocnik_michal_BPDB
Michael the adjutant challenged me to a duel of honour in the names of our lords. I didn't let Sir Hans down, I defeated Michael. Audentes Fortuna Iuvat!
副官迈克尔以我们的领主之名，向我发起了荣誉决斗的挑战。我没有让汉斯爵士失望，在决斗中击败了迈克尔。Audentes Fortuna Iuvat（天助勇者）！
pomer_se__pobocnik_michal_jgqE

Michael the adjutant challenged me to a duel of honour in the name of our lords. I refused. But I don't want to disgrace Lord Capon's name - there's still time to put it right and tell Michael I'm no coward.
副官迈克尔以我们的领主之名，向我发起了荣誉决斗的挑战，但当时我却拒绝了。不过我不想让卡蓬的领主之名蒙羞，现在我仍然有机会扭转境况，告诉迈克尔我不是孬种。
pomer_se__pobocnik_michal_RYND
Michael the adjutant challenged me to a duel of honour in the name of our lords. Not wanting to let Sir Hans down, I accepted. When I'm ready to fight, I'll let Michael know and we'll go for it.
副官迈克尔以我们的领主之名，向我发起了荣誉决斗的挑战。为了不让汉斯爵士失望，我也接下了挑战。待我做好了准备，就该告知迈克尔，然后我们就可以开始决斗了。
pomer_se__pobocnik_michal_vXoC

Michael the adjutant challenged me to a duel of honour in the name of our lords. Not wanting to let Sir Hans down, I accepted. I may not have won, but I fought as hard as I could. I don't think I disgraced Sir Hans.
副官迈克尔以我们的领主之名，向我发起了荣誉决斗的挑战。为了不让汉斯爵士失望，我也接下了挑战。或许我没能赢得决斗，但至少已拼尽全力，我也不认为自己让汉斯爵士蒙羞。
pomoc_vyd_mrtva_tela_a_kr_2CmX
All the dead bodies and blood attracted a pack of wolves from the forest. Otter and I managed to drive them off.
这些死尸和血迹引来了森林中的一群狼。我和奥特设法赶走了它们。
pomoc_vyd_mrtva_tela_a_kr_fiVl
All the dead bodies and blood attracted a pack of wolves from the forest, which attacked us. Otter died during the fight.
这些死尸和血迹引来了森林中的一群狼，它们攻击了我们。奥特在对抗中死亡。
pomoc_vyd_mrtva_tela_a_kr_skYd
All the dead bodies and blood must have attracted a pack of wolves from the forest. I have to drive them off so that Otter can get to safety!
一定是死尸和血迹引来了森林中的一群狼。我必须把它们赶走，这样奥特才会安全。
pomodli_s_dozvedel_jsem_s_j0rE
I heard some tragic news. The besiegers caught and hanged my stepbrother Samuel. I prayed for him and prepared his body for burial. We'll take his body to his family in Kolin.
我得知了一些不幸的消息。据说那些围城的敌人曾抓住了我的继兄塞缪尔并将他绞死，我已为他祈祷并找到了他的尸体，而我们将要把他护送回他的家乡科林。
pomodli_s_dozvedel_jsem_s_tfmZ
I heard some tragic news. The besiegers caught and hanged my stepbrother Samuel. I should pray for him and prepare his body for a Jewish burial.
我得知了一些不幸的消息。据说那些围城的敌人曾抓住了我的继兄塞缪尔并将他绞死，我得为他祈祷并准备好尸体举行葬礼。
pomodli_s_farar_antonin_z_9NlX

Father Antonin from Wysoka sent me on a pilgrimage to the grave of Father Bulava at the Sedletz Cemetery. He was a good man and a great teacher. I was supposed to pray for him, but before I had the chance to do so, Father Antonin joined Bulava in heaven. I must atone for my sins in some other way.
维索卡的安东宁神父让我去塞德莱茨公墓的布拉瓦神父墓前朝圣。他是一位好人，也是很好的老师。我本该这么做，但是我还没来得及祈祷，安东宁神父就和布拉瓦神父一同升入了天堂。我必须寻求其他赎罪的方式。
pomodli_s_farar_antonin_z_CupL

Father Antonin from Wysoka sent me on a pilgrimage to the grave of Father Bulava at the Sedletz Cemetery. He was a good man and a great teacher. If I pray for him, it will definitely help me in the eyes of God.
维索卡的安东宁神父让我去塞德莱茨公墓的布拉瓦神父墓前朝圣。他是一位好人，也是很好的老师。如果我为他祈祷的话，或许他能在上帝前为我美言几句。
pomodli_s_farar_antonin_z_XjbP

Father Antonin from Wysoka sent me on a pilgrimage to the grave of Father Bulava at the Sedletz Cemetery. He was a good man and a great teacher. When I prayed for him, I felt as if the weight of my sins had been lifted from me.
维索卡的安东宁神父让我去塞德莱茨公墓的布拉瓦神父墓前朝圣。他是一位好人，也是很好的老师。当我为他祈祷时，感觉身上的罪孽减轻了几分。
pomodli_s_farar_detrich_z_2zmF

Father Dietrich of Suchdol, sent me on a pilgrimage to the wayside shrine on the way to Vyshatov quarry. It was built by a miller whose daughter was murdered there by stonemason Grusha. I should pray for her soul and the soul of the murderer condemned to eternal damnation.
在前往维沙托夫采石场的路上有一处路边神龛，苏赫多尔的神父迪特里希指派我前往那里完成我的朝圣之旅。一位磨坊主的女儿曾于神龛附近惨遭石匠格鲁沙杀害，神龛也因此由磨坊主建造而成。我得为受害者的灵魂祈祷，并恳求将加害者的灵魂贬入无尽地狱。
pomodli_s_farar_detrich_z_jMBF

Father Dietrich of Suchdol, sent me on a pilgrimage to the wayside shrine on the way to Vyshatov quarry. It was built by a miller whose daughter was murdered there by stonemason Grusha. I was supposed to pray for her soul, and the soul of the murderer condemned to eternal damnation, but Dietrich has since gone to a better place. I must find another way to redeem my soul.
在前往维沙托夫采石场的路上有一处路边神龛，苏赫多尔的神父迪特里希指派我前往那里完成我的朝圣之旅。一位磨坊主的女儿曾于附近惨遭石匠格鲁沙杀害，神龛也因此由磨坊主建造而成。而我本该前往那里为受害者的灵魂祈祷，恳求让加害者遭受无尽的责罚，可是迪特里希却在此期间前往了极乐世界，我因此得寻求其它为自身灵魂赎罪的办法。
pomodli_s_farar_detrich_z_Zslr

Father Dietrich of Suchdol, sent me on a pilgrimage to the wayside shrine on the way to Vyshatov quarry. It was built by a miller whose daughter was murdered there by stonemason Grusha. I prayed for her soul and for the soul of the murderer who's now burning in hell.
在前往维沙托夫采石场的路上有一处路边神龛，苏赫多尔的神父迪特里希指派我前往那里完成我的朝圣之旅。一位磨坊主的女儿曾于神龛附近惨遭石匠格鲁沙杀害，神龛也因此由磨坊主建造而成。我已为受害者的灵魂祈祷，而加害者的灵魂耶已然身处地狱，正经受烈火的拷打。
pomodli_s_farar_havel_z_g_E3nJ

Father Havel of Grund sent me on a penitential pilgrimage to the cross under the ruins of the Zimburg family fortress. Some bandits massacred tanner Mashek's family there, not sparing even his little children. I was supposed to pray in their memory and ask God to condemn the thugs to eternal damnation in Hell, but Father Havel has since died, and so I'm still a sinner.
齐姆博格家族堡垒的遗迹之下有一尊十字架，那里便是皮匠马舍克一家的葬身之地，他们曾遭到一群强盗的屠杀，连家中的孩童也未得幸免。格兰德的神父哈维尔指派我前往那里完成我的朝圣之旅，而我也本该为受害者们进行祈祷与缅怀，并恳求上帝将施暴者打入地狱，可是神父哈维尔却在此期间与世长辞，我也因此将继续背负着我的罪孽。
pomodli_s_farar_havel_z_g_KROT

Father Havel of Grund sent me on a penitential pilgrimage to the cross under the ruins of the Zimburg family fortress. Some bandits massacred tanner Mashek's family there, not sparing even his little children. I'm supposed to pray in their memory and ask God to condemn the cutthroats to Hell. Then I will be cleansed of sin.

pomodli_s_farar_havel_z_g_mRyT

Father Havel of Grund sent me on a penitential pilgrimage to the cross under the ruins of the Zimburg family fortress. Some bandits massacred tanner Mashek's family there, not sparing even his little children. I prayed in their memory, asked God for eternal damnation for the cutthroats, and was cleansed of sin.
齐姆博格家族堡垒的遗迹之下有一尊十字架，那里便是皮匠马舍克一家的葬身之地，他们曾遭到一群强盗的屠杀，连家中的孩童也未得幸免。格兰德的神父哈维尔指派我前往那里完成我的朝圣之旅，我已为受害者们进行祈祷与缅怀，并恳求上帝将施暴者打入地狱，我的罪孽也已得到净化。
pomodli_s_farar_havel_z_g_OEcd

Father Havel of Grund sent me on a pilgrimage to the conciliation cross by the road between Miskowitz and Horschan. It was built by Franta, a peasant who repented for tormenting a stable boy to death, but his conscience drove him mad as God's punishment for his sins. I prayed for the souls of the two wretches and atoned for my sins.
格兰德的神父哈维尔指派我前往连通米斯科维茨与霍斯昌的道路边的和解十字架进行朝圣。据说那个十字架由农民弗兰塔树立，以此忏悔他将一位马童折磨致死的罪孽，但上帝的责罚最终还是降临到了他的头上，良心的谴责让他日渐疯癫。我已为这两位苦命之人进行祈祷，洗清了我的罪孽。
pomodli_s_farar_havel_z_g_xk06

It was built by Franta, a peasant who repented for tormenting a stable boy to death, but his conscience drove him mad as God's punishment for his sins. I am to pray for the souls of the two wretches and atone for my sins.

Father Havel from Grund sent me on a pilgrimage to the conciliation cross by the road between Miskowitz and Horschan. It was built by Franta, a peasant who repented for tormenting his stable boy. His conscience drove him mad, a punishment cast on him by God. I was supposed to pray for the souls of the two wretches, but the priest had since perished, and so I couldn't atone for my sins.
格兰德的神父哈维尔指派我前往连通米斯科维茨与霍斯昌的道路边的和解十字架进行朝圣。据说那个十字架由农民弗兰塔树立，以此忏悔他将一位马童折磨致死的罪孽，但上帝的责罚最终还是降临到了他的头上，良心的谴责让他日渐疯癫。我本该为这两位苦命之人进行祈祷，但神父却在此期间与世长辞，我也因此没能洗清罪孽。
pomodli_s_farar_nikodem_m_5klC
Chaplain Nicodemus sent me on a penitential pilgrimage to the chapel between Troskowitz, Zhelejov and Semine. I prayed there, much like local beggars, and atoned for my sins.
牧师尼可丹姆斯指派我前往特罗斯科维茨、哲勒约夫和塞米之间的教堂，完成我的朝圣之旅。像当地的乞丐那样，我在那里进行了祈祷，净化了我的罪孽。
pomodli_s_farar_nikodem_m_BSc7

Chaplain Nicodemus sent me on a penitential pilgrimage to the conciliation cross outside Slatego. A wrongfully convicted man was hanged there. I'm supposed to pray for his soul and the souls of his executioners.
牧师尼可丹姆斯指派我前往斯拉戈外的一处和解十字架，完成我的朝圣之旅。据说曾有一位蒙受冤屈之人被绞死在那里，而我将要到那里去为受害者与行刑者的灵魂进行祈祷。
pomodli_s_farar_nikodem_m_hLRk

Chaplain Nicodemus sent me on a penitential pilgrimage to the chapel between Troskowitz, Zhelejov and Semine. I was supposed to pray there for my redemption, just like the local beggars do, but the chaplain has since passed away, so I remain a sinner.
牧师尼可丹姆斯指派我前往特罗斯科维茨、哲勒约夫和塞米之间的教堂，完成我的朝圣之旅。我本该像当地的乞丐一样，在那里祈祷、寻求救赎，但是在此期间那位牧师却撒手人寰，而我只能继续背负着罪孽。
pomodli_s_farar_nikodem_m_lhgF

牧师尼可丹姆斯指派我前往特罗斯科维茨、哲勒约夫和塞米之间的教堂，完成我的朝圣之旅。我必须得在那里寻求救赎，像当地的乞丐一样去那里祈祷。
pomodli_s_farar_nikodem_m_lJcx

Chaplain Nicodemus sent me on a penitential pilgrimage to the conciliation cross in the clearing near the stream. Poacher Barton killed gamekeeper Vatzek there and erected the cross when he turned back to Jesus after the murder. I'm supposed to pray there and repent like him.
牧师尼可丹姆斯指派我前往溪流旁空地上的和解十字架处，完成我的朝圣之旅。偷猎者布瑞兹纳曾在那里杀死了猎场看守瓦特泽克，而在谋杀之后，他向上帝忏悔，还立起了那个十字架。我得到那里去祈祷，像他一样进行忏悔。
pomodli_s_farar_nikodem_m_TXcr

pomodli_s_kaplan_nikodem__0TmO

Chaplain Nicodemus sent me on a penitential pilgrimage to the conciliation cross above the rock near Troskowitz. They say a suicide's body was found underneath. It wasn't suicide, but it makes no difference. The chaplain has since died, and I have still not atoned for my sins.
牧师尼可丹姆斯指派我前往特罗斯科维茨附近山岩上的和解十字架，完成我的朝圣之旅。据说人们曾在那里发现了一具自杀者的尸体，但我知道那并非自杀，不过这已无关紧要。那位牧师在此期间与世长辞，我的罪孽仍未得到救赎。
pomodli_s_kaplan_nikodem__xtVb

牧师尼可丹姆斯指派我前往特罗斯科维茨附近山岩上的和解十字架，完成我的朝圣之旅。据说人们曾在那里发现了一具自杀者的尸体，我知道那并非自杀，最终也在那里进行了祈祷，为亡者的灵魂祈求解脱。
pomodli_s_knez_me_poslal__0AaH
Father sent me on a pilgrimage to Perun's spring, as the locals call it. By praying, I confronted heathenism and atoned for my sins.
神父让我前往一处人们称之为“佩伦之泉”的泉水处进行朝圣。通过祷告，我直面心魔，为自身罪孽完成了救赎。
pomodli_s_knez_me_poslal__16JY
The priest sent me on a pilgrimage to the chapel of Saint John the Baptist, which stands under the Wysoka Hill. I prayed to the saint and renounced my sins.
神父指派我前往在维索卡山下的施洗者圣约翰小教堂进行朝圣。我已向圣人祈祷，得以洗清了罪名。
pomodli_s_knez_me_poslal__17a4

The priest sent me on a penitential pilgrimage to the conciliation cross by the stream in Old Lhota. Two knights died there in a duel for the hand of a fair lady. I was supposed to pray for their souls and get rid of my sins, but the priest has since died, so my sins have not been redeemed yet.
老洛塔的一处溪流旁有尊和解十字架，据说曾有两名骑士在那里为争夺一位佳人而大打出手，也因此双双殒命。神父指派我前往那里完成我的朝圣之旅，我也本该为他们的灵魂进行祈祷，以此摆脱背负的罪孽，但是在此期间神父却撒手人寰，所以我的罪孽依然不得宽恕。
pomodli_s_knez_me_poslal__APGm

Father sent me on a pilgrimage to the conciliation cross by the road above Bohunowitz. It is said to mark the end of a bloody feud between two lordly families. I was supposed to pray there to find reconciliation, but the priest has since died, so I remain a sinner.
神父让我去通往博胡诺维茨路上的和解十字架处朝圣。据说它标志着两个贵族家族血腥世仇的结束。我本该在那为和解而祈祷，但神父已经去世了，所以我仍然是个罪人。
pomodli_s_knez_me_poslal__CJ68

The priest sent me on a penitential pilgrimage to the conciliation cross between Suchdol and Raborsch built as a reminder of a land dispute between two bailiffs that was resolved without having to spill a single drop of blood. Not every dispute has to end in bloodshed. I remembered that when I prayed there and repented of my sins.
人们在苏赫多尔和拉博施之间立起了一尊和解十字架，以此纪念两名存在土地纠纷的执行官在不动手伤人的前提下解决了矛盾，而神父也将我派往那里以完成我的朝圣之旅。并非所有的争端都需要流血才得以解决，我在祈祷的过程中将此信念铭记于心，以此洗清了我的罪孽。
pomodli_s_knez_me_poslal__cwAO

Father sent me on a pilgrimage to a cross called Stone Hag. Legend says it commemorates a stingy old hag who wanted to enrich herself at the expense of the Holy Church. I was supposed to pray there for my salvation, but since the priest has gone to heaven in the meantime, I remain a sinner.
神父让我去一个名为“石头巫婆”的十字架处朝圣。据说这是为了纪念一个吝啬的老妖婆，她挪用教会的财产来中饱私囊。我本该在那为得到救赎而祈祷，但神父已经上天堂了，所以我仍然是个罪人。
