神父让我去一个名为“石头巫婆”的十字架处朝圣。据说这是为了纪念一个吝啬的老妖婆，她挪用教会的财产来中饱私囊。我在“石头巫婆”前祈祷我的救赎。
pomodli_s_knez_me_poslal__SsRu

Father sent me on a pilgrimage to Perun's spring, as the locals call it. I was supposed to fight heathenism through prayer and atone for my sins, but the priest died, and so my sins remain unredeemed.
神父让我前往一处被人们称之为“佩伦之泉”的泉水处进行朝圣。我本该通过祷告直面心魔，为自身的罪孽完成救赎，但神父却猝然长逝，留得我继续背负罪孽。
pomodli_s_knez_me_poslal__unSA

Priest sent me on a pilgrimage to the wooden cross outside Grund. It was erected in memory of a rich Kuttenberg merchant's daughter, who was killed by lightning in the surrounding fields. I was supposed to pray for her and sincerely repent, but the priest has since gone to the Lord, and so I remain a sinner.
人们在格兰德外部设立了一只木制十字架，以此纪念一位库滕堡富商那在周围田地里遭雷击身亡的女儿。神父指派我前往那里完成我的朝圣之旅，我本该到那里为亡者进行祈祷，深刻地忏悔自身罪孽，但神父却去见了上帝，我也因此将继续着背负罪孽。
pomodli_s_knez_me_poslal__yC7E
Father sent me on a pilgrimage to the conciliation cross by the road above Bohunowitz. It is said to mark the end of a bloody feud between two lordly families. I prayed there and found redemption.
神父让我去通往博胡诺维茨路上的和解十字架处朝圣。据说它标志着两个贵族家族血腥世仇的结束。我在那儿祈祷并寻求救赎。
pomodli_s_knez_prokop_z_k_AgWa
Father Prokop of Kuttenberg sent me on a penitential pilgrimage to the shrine of the Virgin Mary in Bohunowitz. I prayed to the Virgin and repented of my sins.
库滕堡的普罗科普神⽗指派我前往博胡诺维茨的圣母玛利亚教堂进行朝圣。我已向圣母祈祷，为我的罪孽进行了忏悔。
pomodli_s_knez_prokop_z_k_cpsm
Father Prokop of Kuttenberg sent me on a penitential pilgrimage to the shrine of the Virgin Mary in Bohunowitz. I am to pray at the chapel and repent of my sins.
库滕堡的普罗科普神⽗指派我前往博胡诺维茨的圣母玛利亚教堂进行朝圣，我得到那里去进行祈祷，为我的罪孽进行忏悔。
pomodli_s_knez_prokop_z_k_ddIv

Father Prokop of Kuttenberg sent me on a penitential pilgrimage to the shrine of the Virgin Mary in Bohunowitz. I was supposed to pray to her and repent of my sins, but Father Procop has since died. I must seek redemption elsewhere.
库滕堡的普罗科普神⽗指派我前往博胡诺维茨的圣母玛利亚教堂进行朝圣。而我本该向圣母祈祷，祈求洗清我的罪孽，然而神父普罗科普却在此期间与世长辞，如今我必须得到别处寻找赎罪之法。
pomodli_s_neco_jsem_vsak__ATvx

Before we parted ways, Bohuta asked if I wanted to say a prayer for the Devil's soul with him. Apparently, he didn't completely give up on him, so I agreed. I was hoping I would be able to persuade him after all, but I was terribly mistaken. I was being too pushy, so Bohuta got angry and wanted to beat me up. There is no way he's getting back together with the Devil.
在分别之前，博尔祖特问我是否愿意与他一同为“酒鬼”的灵魂祷告。很显然，他并没有完全对其置之不顾，因此我答应了此提议。我本以为自己能够说服博尔祖特，可谁知竟大错特错。我过于毛躁的举止惹怒了博尔祖特，他因此欲要对我拳脚相向。看来，他不可能再跟“酒鬼”重归于好了。
pomodli_s_pomodlili_jsme__tWLH

Before we parted ways, Bohuta asked if I wanted to say a prayer for the Devil's soul with him. Apparently, he didn't completely give up on him, so I agreed. I was hoping I would be able to persuade him after all, but I was mistaken. We said a prayer and I came back empty-handed.
在分别之前，博尔祖特问我是否愿意与他一同为“酒鬼”的灵魂祷告。很显然，他并没有完全对其置之不顾，因此我答应了此提议。我本以为自己能够说服博尔祖特，可谁知竟大错特错，尽管我们进行了祷告，但我最终还是空手而归。
pomodli_s_pomodlim_se_s_n_Olyv
Before we parted ways, Bohuta asked if I wanted to say a prayer for the Devil's soul with him. Apparently, he didn't completely give up on him, so I agreed. Maybe I'll still be able to persuade him.
在分别之前，博尔祖特问我是否愿意与他一同为“酒鬼”的灵魂祷告。很显然，他并没有完全对其置之不顾，因此我答应了此提议。或许我仍有机会将他说服。
pomodli_s_ratborsky_farar_fqyx

Hroznata, the priest of Raborsch, sent me on a pilgrimage to the mysterious conciliation cross on the Sukov hill. Only God knows what terrible things have happened there. I was filled with terror at the cross, but I overcame my fear and through prayer, I was able to dispel any impure thoughts.
拉博施的神父赫罗兹纳塔指派我前往苏科夫山丘上的一处神秘和解十字架完成我的忏悔之旅，而只有上帝知道那里曾经发生了什么骇人听闻的惨事。起初我胆颤心惊地面对着十字架，但最终还是克服了那种恐惧，通过祈祷成功驱散了一切污浊的念头。
pomodli_s_ratborsky_farar_I9b1

Hroznata, the priest of Raborsch, sent me on a pilgrimage to the mysterious conciliation cross on the Sukov hill. Only God knows what terrible things have happened there. I must overcome my fear and through prayer, keep impure thoughts at bay.
拉博施的神父赫罗兹纳塔指派我前往苏科夫山丘上的一处神秘和解十字架完成我的朝圣之旅，而只有上帝知道那里曾经发生了什么骇人听闻的惨事。我必须克服恐惧，通过祈祷将一切污浊的念头抛之身外。
pomodli_s_ratborsky_farar_YWsv

Hroznata, the priest of Raborsch, sent me on a pilgrimage to the mysterious conciliation cross on the Sukov hill. Only God knows what terrible things have happened there. I was supposed to overcome my fear and pray at the cross, but Father Hroznata has since gone to meet his ancestors. I remain a sinner.
拉博施的神父赫罗兹纳塔指派我前往苏科夫山丘上的一处神秘和解十字架完成我的朝圣之旅，而只有上帝知道那里曾经发生了什么骇人听闻的惨事。我本该克服恐惧，并在十字架前进行祈祷的，但神父赫罗兹纳塔却猝然长逝，见他祖先去了，而我也仍是个负罪者。
pomodli_s_vykonal_jsem_ka_8D5R
Chaplain Nicodemus sent me on a penitential pilgrimage to the conciliation cross outside Slatego. A wrongfully convicted man was hanged there. I prayed for his soul and the souls of his executioners.
牧师尼可丹姆斯指派我前往斯拉戈外的一处和解十字架，完成我的朝圣之旅。据说曾有一位蒙受冤屈之人被绞死在那里，我已为受害者和行刑者的灵魂进行了祈祷。
pomoz_bej_bejk_je_vazoun__fMn8
Bull asked me to help him fix the weapons. There is a total of one long sword, a short sword, and one good axe to hand over to him.
布尔请求我协助他修理一些武器，我最终要给他一把长剑，一把短剑和一把质量不错的斧头。
pomoz_bej_bejk_je_vazoun__ZYMm

Bull is all muscle, but he's as out of place in a forge as a child. It's necessary to repair some armaments before leaving, but Bull certainly isn't even capable of bending a horseshoe. I can help him repair the broken iron junk tossed in the barrel.
布尔肌肉发达，但是身处铁匠铺的他却像个孩子一样与周遭格格不入。离开之前有一些武器需要修理，但是布尔甚至连马蹄铁都不会锻造。我可以帮助他修理那些被遗弃在桶里的断钢废铁。
pomoz_bej_myslim_ze_jsem__1rx4
I think I got the mighty Bull on my side when I helped him repair the weapons.
在帮助布尔修理武器之后，我想我已获得了他的支持。
pomoz_bej_nepodarilo_se_m_Ub8U
I couldn't repair the iron junk for Bull.
我没能帮助布尔修理那些破铜烂铁。
pomoz_bet_lazebnice_beta__SclU
Betty the bathkeeper doesn't want to speak to me anymore. My work for her is done.
澡堂老板贝蒂不想再跟我搭话了，我为她所做的事已经结束了。
pomoz_bet_pomohl_jsem_laz_hkp4
I helped Betty open her new business, The Kingfisher bathhouse.
我帮助贝蒂开了一家新店，也就是翠鸟澡堂。
pomoz_boh_bohuta_pronesl__AxSA
After a while, we managed to dig the grave and place those poor fallen wretches in it. May God let them rest in peace.
没过多久，我们挖好了坟墓，将那些不幸之人埋了进去。愿上帝给予他们永世安宁。
pomoz_boh_po_krvavych_uda_5y9A
After a bloody battle, the last sad duty remained. I must help Godwin and bury the dead who died in the fight in the ravine.
在经历了一场血流成河的战斗后，仍有件让人痛心的任务需要我们完成。我必须帮助古德温埋葬那些在峡谷战死的士兵。
pomoz_haj_aby_se_hajny_ps_KaXs
To get back on his feet, Vostatek only needed a strong beef broth. Fortunately, they had some at the wedding. He got on his feet after a while and was able to walk to his wife without help.
为了让沃斯塔克站起来，只需要给他一份牛肉浓汤，所幸婚宴上有所供应。没过一会儿他便站了起来，无需任何协助便独自走到了他妻子那里。
pomoz_haj_aby_se_hajny_ps_KeI4
If I want Vostatek on his feet, I have to give him something that will sober him up. He asked me for a strong beef broth. I hope he knows what he's doing.
要想让沃斯塔克站起来，我就得给他弄点醒酒之物。他竟然向我索要一份牛肉浓汤，希望他知道自己到底在干什么。
pomoz_haj_i_kdyz_jsem_haj_10Rm
I promised Vostatek I would help him, but I also told his wife just to make sure.
我答应过沃斯塔克会向他提供帮助，但为了确保万无一失，也告诉了他的妻子。
pomoz_jin_na_cirkevni_rad_57Ed

At the Church Council, it will be possible to help Henry and the others who are tasked with quietly taking over the Court. I just have to figure out how. Maybe someone can give me some advice... Janosh?
在教会议会这里，或许有什么机会能帮助亨利和其他人悄悄夺下宫殿，我得想想办法。说不定有人能给我提供点建议......亚诺什怎么样？
pomoz_jin_na_cirkevni_rad_AzqI
At the Church Council, Godwin tried to help us with our task, which was to quietly take over the Court.
在教会议会上的古德温设法协助我们悄悄夺取意大利宫。
pomoz_kol_seznamil_jsem_s_gBJ9

I met some fellah called Kolda, who's working on building the gallows for Capon. Naturally, I wasn't too keen on helping him, but one never knows what a good deed might lead to. Kolda had really shitty tools and he asked me to sharpen his axe for him.
我遇到了一个叫科尔达的人，他正在为卡蓬建造绞架。自然，我并不热衷于帮助他，但谁也不知道做好事会带来什么回报。科尔达的工具十分差劲，他让我帮他把斧头磨利。
pomoz_kom_nevim_co_se_pre_fzcU
I have no idea what exactly happened. Those infernal demons must have taken over my mind and I committed a senseless murder. I can't help anybody here.
我也不知道到底发生了什么，一定是那些该死的魔鬼控制了我的神智，才让我犯下了无谓的杀戮之举。我在此处帮不了任何人。
pomoz_kom_se_samotnym_luc_3Kzh
I was told the Trosky castle is plagued by devils. I'm supposed to ask three scared people where exactly I can find those damn demons. I wonder how this thing will turn out.
据说特罗斯基城堡遭到了魔鬼的侵扰，我得向三个受惊的人询问那些扰人魔鬼的具体下落，不知道这件事的结果会是如何。
pomoz_kom_trosky_jsou_pry_h5rU

Trosky chamberlain, the right hand of Otto von Bergow, claims that the castle is infested with devils and that this is nothing out of the ordinary. He asked me to help him exorcise the devils. I am supposed to ask three scared people where the devils are coming from and then sprinkle those places with holy water or some tincture I can get from the apothecary. I am curious to see what happens.
特罗斯基的管家，同时也是奥托·冯·波尔高的得力助手，声称城堡内游荡着诸多魔鬼，而且如此现象并非新奇之事。他请求我协助他将那些魔鬼驱除，我得向三位受惊的人询问那些魔鬼的出没之地，并向那些地方洒上圣水或是一些能从草药师那里取得的药酒。至于事态会如何进展，拭目以待吧。
pomoz_kut_prozradil_jsem__4IXJ

I told Emmeram the butcher, Menhard is trying to set them up and we agreed I'd help them end the dispute with the Germans. According to Emmeram's plan, I continued helping Menhard and then I lost my duels on purpose, thus assuring the Kuttenbergers won in front of everyone, rightfully and without any doubt.
我将门哈德正企图陷害他们一事告诉了屠夫艾默拉姆，我们也达成约定，将由我协助他们终结与那些德国人之间的争端。依照艾默拉姆的计划，我得继续向门哈德提供帮助，随后在决斗中故意落败，从而确保库滕堡人在众人注视之下光明正大地取得胜利。
pomoz_kut_prozradil_jsem__A3rD

I revealed Menhard's plan to Emmeram and we agreed I'd help them end the dispute with the Germans. I'm sure I'll get some reward for it, and Emmeram promised I'd be allowed to train swordfighting at the hall. All Emmeram wants is for me to help Menhard's plan along but help the Kuttenbergers in the ensuing duel.
我向艾默拉姆揭发了门哈德的计划，我们还达成了共识，即由我帮助他们终结与那些德国人之间的争端，而我也会为此收到报酬，同时艾默拉姆还承诺，将允许我在剑术馆中进行训练。艾默拉姆希望我能够遵照门哈德的计划行事，但要在即将到来的决斗中给库滕堡人提供协助。
pomoz_kut_prozradil_jsem__DEZW

I told Emmeram the butcher, Menhard is trying to set them up and we agreed I'd help them end the dispute with the Germans. According to Emmeram's plan, I continued helping Menhard but when it came to the duels, I decided to help Menhard and beat the Kuttenbergers. Emmeram is going to be pissed as hell.
我将门哈德正企图陷害他们一事告诉了屠夫艾默拉姆，我们也达成约定，将由我协助他们终结与那些德国人之间的争端。依照艾默拉姆的计划，我假装继续给门哈德提供帮助，但决斗来临之际，我最终还是选择了帮助门哈德，并打败了库滕堡人，艾默拉姆定会为此暴跳如雷的。
pomoz_kut_tak_je_to_tady__lLEb

Here we go, the duels between the Germans and the Kuttenbergers which will decide who gets the town's swordfighting hall will finally take place. I reached an agreement with Emmeram to lose my duels on purpose, but in a way that is not too obvious, they'll take care of the rest.
来吧，德国人与库滕堡人之间的决斗即将打响，双方将为剑术馆的所有权进行角逐。艾默拉姆与我达成了约定，我将在决斗中故意输掉，但不能输得过于明显，而剩下的事宜就交由他们处理。
pomoz_mar_potkal_jsem_mla_Nnua

I met a young girl. Her name is Margaret and according to what she told me, life hasn't been very kind to her. Poor girl. I decided to help her, and in doing so we would punish a scoundrel. It is said that there is a burgher living in Kuttenberg who poisoned his wife so that he could marry another. Appropriately rich, of course, and that's not done.
Margaret has a plan. She'll put on a show that she is expecting a child with him and he, to avoid trouble at home, will pay her off. I'll help her and maybe make some coin from it. It's worth it.

我遇到了一个名叫玛格丽特的年轻女孩，据她所说，她的生活很艰难。我决定帮助这个可怜的女孩，去惩罚一个恶棍。据说，有个库滕堡市民毒死了自己的妻子，只为迎娶一位更富有的女子，这可有损道德风范。
玛格丽特计划假装怀上那个男人的孩子，而那人为了避免家中矛盾滋生，就会花钱消灾。我决定帮助玛格丽特，没准还能从中赚到点钱，总之值得一试。
pomoz_muz_mohl_bych_vyuzi_J6ui
Some miner by the name of Kvyetoslav needs my help. I should talk to him.
有个叫科维托斯拉夫的矿工需要我的帮助，我该跟他谈谈。
pomoz_muz_nejaky_kreten_p_6fnH
I decided not to help Kvyetoslav. It's hard to help someone when they're dead.
我决定不帮助科维托斯拉夫。因为很难帮一个死人的忙。
pomoz_muz_precetl_jsem_do_iW4P
Kvyetoslav the miner asked me if I could help him write a letter to someone of importance he's got some business dispute with.
矿工科维托斯拉夫问我能不能替他向一个重要的人写一封信，他和那人有生意纠纷。
pomoz_na__nepritel_se_ses_QGUK
The enemy have lined up in the outer bailey and charged at the gate. We poured boiling oil on them and thus held the gate. The question is for how long.
敌人已在外堡场集结并朝着堡垒大门发起了猛攻。我们朝敌人泼洒了煮沸的热油才守住了城门，也不知这能让我们坚持多久。
pomoz_na__nepritel_se_ses_TIOE
The enemy have formed up in the outer bailey and are storming the gate. We poured burning oil on them, which let us hold the gate. The question is for how long.
敌人已在外堡场集结并朝着堡垒大门发起了猛攻。我们朝敌人泼洒了煮沸的热油才得以守住城门，也不知这能让我们坚持多久。
pomoz_na__nepritel_se_sna_hsXU
Enemy troops in heavy armour have made it to the gate and are trying to smash the portcullis. I have to join the defenders in the courtyard and stop them!
全副武装的敌军部队已兵临城下，正试图冲破堡垒闸门。我得加入城堡庭院的护城者们，一同击溃敌人的进攻！
pomoz_na__nepritel_se_sna_W9L9
The enemy's heavy infantry have got inside the passage to the gate and are trying to smash the portcullis. I have to join the defenders in the courtyard and stop them.
敌军的重装步兵已兵临城下，正试图冲破堡垒闸门。我得加入城堡庭院的护城者们，一同击溃敌人的进攻！
pomoz_olb_jedinej_zpusob__RzJx
The only way to get to the pasture where the dispute between Tachov and Zhelejov will be discussed is to go and see old Olbram and help him with his plan.
只有去找老奥尔布拉姆，帮助他完成计划，才能到达塔霍夫和哲勒约夫之前的争端牧场。
pomoz_olb_s_olbramem_jsme_rRRr
Olbram and I played a practical joke on the Tachovites.
奥尔布拉姆和我捉弄了塔霍夫人一把。
pomoz_pro_pokud_se_budu_c_wSaK
If I want to participate in the annual brawl between Tachov and Zhelejov, I should first go and see Prochek and do what he wants me to.
如果我想加入塔霍夫和哲勒约夫之间的年度争斗，我应该先去找普罗切克，按他的意思行事。
pomoz_pro_pomohl_jsem_pro_NgFs
I helped Prochek play a practical joke on the Zhelejovites.
我帮助普罗切克，捉弄了哲勒约夫人一把。
pomoz_roz_dokoncenou_knih_dp6P
The book may be finished, but I didn't have time to tell Rosa what I thought about it. The next time I see her I'll surely tell her everything.
那本书籍似乎已撰写完毕，但是我再无时间向罗莎表达我对书本的看法。等到下次我们再相见，我一定会全盘托出。
pomoz_roz_konecne_jsem_si_66MV

After some time I was able to talk to Rosa about the story we were working on together. Rosa is a truly interesting young lady, and I think I have much to learn from her. I hope we'll meet again soon.
片刻后我与罗莎谈论起了我们一同撰写的那则故事。罗莎真是个惹人喜爱的年轻女士，我从她身上学到很多，但愿我们很快还会相见。
pomoz_roz_malesov_je_doby_LwrL
Maleshov is conquered and Lady Rosa is safe and sound. I'd better hurry to the council at Suchdol now, after that I'll probably have a chance to talk to her.
马列索夫已被占领，而罗莎女士也平安无事。我现在得赶快前往苏赫多尔的市议会寻找罗莎女士并与之交谈。
pomoz_roz_mam_se_zastavit_nyMs
I have to stop by and see Lady Rosa. I should go to her room sometime during the day when there's still enough light for writing.
我得去找罗莎女士，应该等到白天光线充足的时候去找她进行书籍的撰写。
pomoz_roz_pani_rozu_by__N8Q7
I read the story that we wrote together and I think we did a pretty good job.
我阅读了那则我们一同撰写的故事，为此感到欣喜不已。
pomoz_roz_po_dokonceni_kn_lowv

Lady Rosa and I collaborated to write a story in the book and add a small illustration. Rosa is a truly interesting young lady, and I think I have much to learn from her. I hope we'll meet again soon.
我与罗莎女士一同协作，在书中写下了一则故事并添加了图示。罗莎真是个惹人喜爱的年轻女士，我从她身上学到很多，但愿我们很快还会相见。
pomoz_roz_rozu_ruthardovo_FG32
Rosa Ruthard is apparently being held in Maleshov by Otto von Bergow. If we storm the fortress, Rosa must not be put in danger.
罗莎·鲁瑟德显然已被奥托·冯·波尔高囚禁在了马列索夫。如果我们想要突袭那座堡垒，就绝不能将罗莎置于危险之中。
pomoz_roz_rozu_ruthardovo_QZo1
Kunzlin Ruthard ended up in captivity. I have no news yet of Rosa, but I hope she's safe.
昆兹林·鲁瑟德终于还是被关押了起来。而我还没有关于罗莎的消息，但愿她能平安无事。
pomoz_roz_slibil_jsem_roz_qwh9
I promised to help Rosa finish her book, but I didn't keep my word. I'm sure she'll be able to finish the book without my help.
我答应过罗莎协助她完成书籍的撰写，但是我却没能信守承诺。相信即便是没了我的帮助，她也能完成撰写。
pomoz_roz_spolecna_prace__mH44
The work together with Lady Rosa paid off and the book is finished. Now I can read the fruit of our labours.
我与罗莎女士的共同努力得偿所愿，书籍已撰写完成。现在我可以阅读这份劳动成果了。
pomoz_rut_hned_po_mem_pri_g2u2

In the palace courtyard, I witnessed an argument between Kunzlin Ruthard and Ulrich Vavak von Neuhaus, the pro-Sigismund royal minter. He insisted that Ruthard hand over his mining rights, he basically blackmailed him. Ruthard's daughter Rosa didn't like that and interrupted the argument with a very accurate crossbow shot. A fight broke out. I stood by Ruthard's side and drove the attackers off. After the fight, Ruthard listened to my plea, but because of his difficult situation with Vavak, he was reluctant to help me rescue Lord Capon just like that. He demanded something in return, as expected.

在宫殿庭院里，我目睹了昆兹林·鲁瑟德和乌尔里希·瓦万克·冯·纽豪斯之间的争吵，后者是西格斯蒙德的皇家铸币厂厂长，他执意要求鲁瑟德交出他的开采权，这简直就是在敲诈。鲁瑟德的女儿罗莎对此很是不快，凭借着一记精准的弩箭打断了争吵，而一场战斗也呼之欲出。在战斗中我与鲁瑟德一家协同作战，将袭击者一一赶走。事后，我向鲁瑟德提出了诉求，但是考虑到他与瓦万克之间的矛盾，他并不愿意就这样协助我营救卡蓬领主。不出预料，他希望自己能有所回报。
pomoz_rut_hned_po_mem_pri_LoFD

In the palace courtyard, I witnessed an argument between Kunzlin Ruthard and Ulrich Vavak von Neuhaus, the pro-Sigismund royal minter. He insisted that Ruthard hand over his mining rights, he basically blackmailed him. Ruthard's daughter didn't like that and interrupted the argument with a very accurate crossbow shot. A fight broke out and I decided to run away.
在宫殿庭院里，我目睹了昆兹林·鲁瑟德和乌尔里希·瓦万克·冯·纽豪斯之间的争吵，后者是西格斯蒙德的皇家铸币厂厂长，他执意要求鲁瑟德交出他的开采权，这简直就是在敲诈。鲁瑟德的女儿对此很是不快，凭借着一记精准的弩箭打断了争吵，而一场战斗也呼之欲出，而我最终决定逃跑。
pomoz_rut_muzi_kralovskeh_DGdf

In the palace courtyard, I witnessed an argument between Kunzlin Ruthard and Ulrich Vavak von Neuhaus, the pro-Sigismund royal minter. A fight broke out. I should help the Ruthards!
在宫殿庭院里，我目睹了昆兹林·鲁瑟德和乌尔里希·瓦万克·冯·纽豪斯之间的争吵，后者是西格斯蒙德的皇家铸币厂厂长，他执意要求鲁瑟德交出他的开采权，这简直就是在敲诈。鲁瑟德的女儿对此很是不快，凭借着一记精准的弩箭打断了争吵，而一场战斗也呼之欲出，我得帮助鲁瑟德一家！
pomoz_str_venku_pred_dole_9Wmq
Guards were waiting for us outside the mine. It seems like the days of rebellion without bloodshed are over. It's time to pick a side; I'll fight on the side of the law.
警卫早已在矿洞之外等候多时。看来，在这次反抗行动中，杀戮终究不可避免。是时候选择阵营了，而我将捍卫法律的尊严。
pomoz_str_venku_pred_dole_Wif2

Guards were waiting for us outside the mine. They'd have come sooner, but they got distracted by the burning dugout, so didn't get to the mine until it was all over. The guildsmen refused to surrender and I didn't want to end up on the gallows, so I chose the side of the law and helped the guards.
警卫早已在矿洞之外等候多时。他们本该早点赶来，但却因为失火的地穴屋而耽搁，一切结束了之后他们才进入了矿洞。那些公会成员并不想低头认罪，而我则不想让自己站上绞刑架，所以我选择了捍卫法律，为警卫们提供帮助。
pomoz_tov_venku_pred_dole_tpy8
Guards were waiting for us outside the mine. It seems like the days of rebellion without bloodshed are over. It's time to pick a side; I'll fight on the side of the guild.
警卫早已在矿洞之外等候多时。看来，在这次反抗行动中，杀戮终究不可避免。是时候选择阵营了，而我将为公会而战。
pomoz_tov_venku_pred_dole_xdFJ

Guards were waiting for us outside the mine. They'd have come sooner, but they got distracted by the burning dugout, so didn't get to the mine until it was all over. We had no choice but to fight for our lives.
警卫早已在矿洞之外等候多时。他们本该早点赶来，但却因为失火的地穴屋而耽搁，一切结束了之后他们才进入了矿洞。别无选择的我们只能为了活命拔刀相向。
pomoz_tov_vykaslal_jsem_s_q3I2
I turned my back on the guildsmen...
我背弃了那些公会成员......
pomoz_zaj_ceka_nas_dalsi__EWrH
There's more dirty work in store for us, this time at Maleshov. We can only hope to take the fortress by deception and capture Otto von Bergow.
如今有更多脏活累活等待着我们，而这次将会是在马列索夫。我们只能企盼通过诡计夺取堡垒并捉拿奥托·冯·波尔高。
pomoz_zaj_po_vsem_co_se_n_T8Bp

Despite all the things that went wrong that bloody night, Maleshov fortress still fell, Otto van Bergow was captured, and Lady Rosa Ruthard was rescued. Fortune finally smiled upon us, and we literally had the royal chamberlain in the palm of our hand.
即使在那个腥风血雨的夜晚发生了很多意外，随着马列索夫堡垒的最终沦陷，奥托·冯·波尔高落入了我们手里，同时罗莎·鲁瑟德夫人也就此得救。幸运女神终于朝我们微笑了，而我们也确实将那位皇室总管掌握在了手中。
pomoz_ziz_na_nadvori_se_s_KrqN

While Godwin was trying to climb the steps from the cellar with a full jug of wine, the fortress came under attack. In the courtyard, Žižka and Capon put up a ferocious defence against the attackers, side by side with our new allies. It would be shameful not to rush to their aid.
当古德温带着满满一壶酒从地窖爬上来时，要塞遭到了袭击。卡蓬和杰式卡与我们的新盟友在庭院里并肩作战。不赶紧去帮助他们是可耻的。
pomoz_ziz_uvnitr_uz_bylo__1UsC
While Godwin was trying to climb the steps from the cellar with a full jug of wine, the fortress came under attack. The battle proved the strength of the new alliance. All fought the enemy together.
当古德温带着满满一壶酒从地窖爬上来时，要塞遭到了袭击。这场战斗证明了新联盟的力量。所有人都在与敌人作战。

一位名叫安娜的澡堂女仆请求我在即将到来的比武中，把酒馆雇工波胡内克暴打一顿。安娜说那个雇工曾对她上下其手，甚至还拳打脚踢。
pomsti_se_anne_uz_bretisl_NgOK
Bohunek won't be hurting Anna any longer. Or anyone else for that matter.

pomsti_se_bretislav_dosta_AlLv
Bohunek got taught a lesson, just like Anna wanted. So there's a happy ending for someone at least.
正如安娜所希望的那样，波胡内克得到了教训，至少对有些人来说这是个美好结局。
pomsti_se_bretislav_uz_na_VmBG
Bohunek won't be groping Anna anymore. She promised to reward me, so I should go and see her soon.
波胡内克将不会再骚扰安娜。安娜也承诺过会给我一份报酬，所以我得尽快去找她。
pomsti_se_hotovo_spodky_v_FpF0
I hung braies up from the gable of the All Saints Inn so it could be seen from the street.
我将内裤挂在了圣徒酒馆的山墙上，只要站在大街上便能一眼看到。
pomsti_se_placeholder_tex_ZGF8
Though I helped Anna with her problem, there was a bit of a misunderstanding between us.
尽管我帮助安娜解决了她的麻烦，但是我们之间却产生了一些嫌隙。
pomsti_se_zatracene_neco__A0kD
Damn, something went wrong. I was supposed to only hang braies up at the inn, not kill someone! That shouldn't have happened.
该死，我竟然出了岔子。我要做的是将内裤挂到酒馆之上，而不是杀人！这种事本不应该发生的。
ponechej__hromovy_kamen_j_mdwt
I eventually found the thunderstone and decided to keep it. I found it, so it's mine, simple as that.
我最终找到了雷石，并且觉得留着它。我找到的就是我的，就这么简单。
ponechej__kvuli_tomu_kame_mfRa

It took a lot of effort to get that rock, and it might come in handy, mightn't it? After all, it was me who found it, so now it's mine. If I want to keep it, all I have to do is tell Kona or Thomlin this is what I want.
我花了很多工夫才找到这块石头，不是吗？既然是我找到的，那它就该归我了。如果我想留着他，我必须告诉柯娜或者托姆林这就是我想要的。

警报响起！出事了！快到城墙去！
poplach_j_tvrz_je_v_oblez_U3Ly
The Nebakov fortress was under siege in the early morning mist. The Prague colours waved in the bailey and the troops under the command of the damned Sir Markvart von Aulitz were lining up.
清晨薄雾环绕，而内巴科夫堡垒却已然陷入了包围之中。布拉格军队的旗帜在堡场飘扬，由马科瓦尔·冯·奥利茨爵士领导的军队正在列队。
popovidej_balsan_a_samhna_NjOt

Jan Posy and Miroslav Tugbone asked me to help with the Cumans who stole a chest of theirs, but I don't have time to chase after treasure. They're capable fellows and will surely manage without my help. After all, there are two of them.
扬·“花骨朵”和“扯骨”米洛斯拉夫请求我帮助他们从库曼人那里夺回失窃的箱子，但是我没有时间去完成此事。他们都是些能干的人，而且即便是没有我的帮助也定能夺回箱子，谁让他们是两个人呢。
popovidej_balsan_si_oddec_xEFX
Jan Posy was relieved that the Cumans are finally dead. He got the revenge he wanted so much. But our work isn't done yet.
库曼人的死让扬·“花骨朵”终于送了口气，他也完成了他那朝思暮想的复仇，但是我们的任务还仍未结束。
popovidej_ted_kdyz_jsme_s_nasN
Now that we've gotten rid of the Cumans, I should probably talk to Jan Posy…
既然已经解决掉了那些库曼人，或许我该去向扬·“花骨朵”汇报情况了…

营地中已经无人可问，所有的商人都已死亡，他们的下场与那个士兵布莱克如出一辙。要是我把此事告知维多利亚，她会不高兴的。
poptej_se_hrobnik_ignac_m_Qu8j
Ignatius the gravedigger has the closest cottage, so I'd be surprised if he didn't know what's going on round there.
掘墓人伊格内修斯的家距离目的地最近，所以要是他对此地的近况一无所知的话，我会非常惊讶的。
poptej_se_mozna_by_ale_ne_2w0x
Maybe Kreyzl's hired hands in The Lair will know something. I'd be surprised if they hadn't noticed anything.
或许“巢穴”里克雷泽的雇工们应该知道点什么，要是他们毫不知情，那才让人惊讶呢。
poptej_se_mozna_by_ale_ne_kPe4

没准克雷泽知道点什么，毕竟他的磨坊离目的地最近。
poptej_se_nevim_koho_bych_28Qc
I don't know who to ask in the military camp about Victoria. I reckon there's nothing I can do but look for someone and hope I am lucky.
我也不知道在这个军营里该向谁打探维多利亚的下落，估计我也没什么能做的，只能随便找个人，然后祈求自己能走点运。
poptej_se_od_jednoho_z_ku_Fwjf

The blacksmith told me Victoria regularly met with a soldier from the provisioning unit. As if I hadn't had enough bad luck already, I learned the soldier is dead. He won't be telling me anything. The blacksmith also said the two lovebirds used to meet in the forest behind the camp. I could at least go and have a look at that spot.
我从铁匠那里得知，维多利亚总会定期跟一个补给部队的士兵见面。没想到那个士兵已经离世，我也无法再从他那里了解到任何消息，我可真是倒霉透顶。不过据铁匠说，那两位鸳鸯伴侣还曾在营地后的树林里见过面，至少我还可以到那里去看看。
poptej_se_od_kupce_jsem_s_3sBT
The blacksmith told me Victoria regularly met with a soldier they called Black. And that there was something between them. Right now Black is lying in the infirmary, so it won't be hard to find him.
我从铁匠那里得知，维多利亚总会定期跟一位名叫布莱克的士兵见面，想必他们之间有些关系。现在布莱克就躺在医务室里，要想找到他并非难事。
poptej_se_poptal_jsem_se__0fl0

士兵的营地已经搬离，至于他们随同西格斯蒙德去了哪里，只有上帝知道！我得想出别的办法寻找维多利亚。

维多利亚先前为西格斯蒙德营地里那些来自米斯科维茨的人带去了一些物资，我得到营地里打探她的下落，里边的人一定见过她。在营地入口处，我可以告诉他们，我身上带着铁匠铺的东西，他们应该会让我进去。

就在事情即将收尾之际，我们的计划竟意想不到地出了岔子！叛徒布拉班特杀死了阿德尔，还要将白银偷走。在我们打败了他的同伙后，他无奈逃离，而我们也成功坐上马车离开了库滕堡。
poraz_bre_jako_druheho_ma_4SUl
The hired hand Bohunek is the second person I have to defeat.
雇工波胡内克将是我要打败的第二个对手。
poraz_bre_porazil_jsem_pa_1ZOh
I beat the hired hand Bohunek.
我打败了雇工波胡内克。
poraz_bre_prohral_jsem_za_8eVs
I lost the fight with the hired hand Bohunek.
我没能打败雇工波胡内克。
poraz_cer_nesouhlasil_jse_e72N
I didn't agree with the Devil, but I was unable to thwart his plan.
我并不赞成酒鬼，但也没能阻止他的计划。
poraz_cer_nesouhlasim_se__v9w5
I don't agree with killing innocent villagers. If duelling with the Devil is the only way to stop it, I'll have to beat him.
对于要杀死无辜村民一事，我并不赞成。如果与酒鬼决斗是阻止这一计划的唯一办法，我就必须要把他打败。
poraz_cer_suchy_cert_prec_e61s
The Dry Devil overestimated himself. I defeated him in a duel and perhaps saved the lives of those poor villagers.
酒鬼高估了自己的实力，在与我的决斗中落败，或许我也因此救下了那些可怜村民的性命。
poraz_dam_damian_me_poraz_ld7A
Damian defeated me.
达米安打败了我。
poraz_dam_jako_prvniho_ma_oLGD
The first one I should defeat is dirty Damian.
脏兮兮的达米安将是我第一个要打败的对手。
poraz_dam_porazil_jsem_da_QArn
I defeated Damian.
我打败了达米安。
poraz_dam_po_zapasu_s_dam_1j3z
After my fight with Damian, I woke up outside on a manure pile. Brr. It looks like I lost.
与达米安的搏斗过后，我在外边的粪堆上醒来。呃，看来是我输了。
poraz_dam_vyhral_jsem_zap_XcnO
I won the fight with Damian.
我打败了达米安。
poraz_fia_jako_tretiho_ma_ixuN
The barber Fiala is the third person I have to defeat.
理发师菲亚拉将是我要打败的第三个对手。
poraz_fia_porazil_jsem_br_GTQy
I beat the barber Fiala.
我打败了理发师菲亚拉。
poraz_fia_prohral_jsem_za_fEp2
I lost the fight with the barber Fiala.
我没能打败理发师菲亚拉。
poraz_has_hasek_mel_podez_Pd3g
Hashek suspected that I might betray him. And he was right. And now I'll have to kill him, or he'll kill me.
哈舍克怀疑我已经背叛了他，事实也确实如此。而现在，我得杀了他，不然就得死在他手里。
poraz_has_porazil_jsem_v__RUif
I defeated Hashek in self defense. Now to deal with the rest of the soldiers.
我在自卫中击败了哈舍克，接下来该解决其他士兵了。
poraz_her_dohodl_jsem_si__tmnl
I arranged a race against Hertel, the best rider of the Nebakov gang. I hope luck will be on my side, I wouldn't want to disgrace myself or sir Capon.
我与赫特尔，这位内巴科夫帮最出色的骑手，定下了一场比试。但愿好运与我同在，我可不想让自己或者卡蓬爵士蒙羞。
poraz_hor_bojuju_22Ca
It all happened pretty fast. One moment we're writing a letter, the next they're trying to kill me.
事情发生得太快了。上一刻我们还在写信，下一刻他们就想杀了我。
poraz_hor_prohral_jsem_fniS
My employers realised they made a mistake in hiring me and decided to kill me. Luckily, I managed to flee and I decided to just forget about the whole affair.
我的雇主意识到雇佣我是个错误，所以他们决定杀了我。还好我成功逃脱了，我打算把这件事抛在脑后。
poraz_hor_zvitezil_jsem_gNvu
My employers realised they made a mistake in hiring me, so they decided to kill me. Thankfully, as well as writing I can fight a lot better than them.
我的雇主意识到雇佣我是个错误，所以他们决定杀了我。还好我除了会写作之外，还比他们更能打。
poraz_jen_jenik_me_porazi_nmZ2
Hensel got the better of me.
约翰尼战胜了我。
poraz_jen_jenik_mi_dal_co_gtMr
Hensel gave me a beating.
亨泽尔把我痛揍了一顿。
poraz_jen_mym_prvnim_prot_3oUp
My first opponent will be the youngest hand Hensel.
我的第一个对手将是资历最浅的手下亨泽尔。
poraz_jen_porazil_jsem_je_904E
I defeated Hensel.
我打败了亨泽尔。
poraz_jen_vyhral_jsem_zap_Mtev
I won the fight with Hensel.
我打败了亨泽尔。
poraz_joh_jako_prvniho_ma_M9QY
First I have to defeat the musician Hannes.
首先，我得打败乐师汉尼斯。
poraz_joh_porazil_jsem_su_t0Bc
I defeated the musician Hannes.
我打败了乐师汉尼斯。
poraz_joh_prohral_jsem_za_5ldy
I lost the fight with Hannes.
我没能打败汉尼斯。
poraz_koc_mistr_kocour_uz_KJtn
Master Tomcat won't teach me anything anymore because he's dead. I'll have to find someone else to learn the master strike from.
公猫大师已死，没办法从他那里学到大师之击了。我得另求高明。
poraz_lap_naucim_ty_budiz_9GtQ
I'll teach the bandits who attacked Erik and me to remember their manners. They'll think twice next time!
我要好好教训那些袭击埃里克和我的强盗，让他们守规矩些，以后千万要三思而后行！
poraz_lap_s_erikem_jsme_o_Jros
Erik and I repelled an attack by bandits. Maybe he'll finally tell me more about Henry and Capon.
埃里克和我击退了强盗的袭击，或许他也该向我透露更多与亨利和卡蓬有关的事了。
poraz_mal_malik_me_porazi_lfPC
Malik got the better of me.
马利克战胜了我。
poraz_mal_malik_mi_dal_co_wdH9
Malik gave me a beating.
马利克把我痛揍了一顿。
poraz_mal_mym_druhym_prot_dxjS
My second opponent will be the hand Malik.
我的第二个对手将是手下马利克。
poraz_mal_porazil_jsem_ma_g2Vl
I defeated Malik.
我打败了马利克。
poraz_mal_vyhral_jsem_zap_E3Ke
I won the fight with Malik.
我打败了马利克。
poraz_mar_jako_tretiho_mu_zJmz
The third one I have to beat is Marcus.
我的第三个对手将是马库斯。
poraz_mar_porazil_jsem_i__ztj1
I also beat Marcus.
我还打败了马库斯。
poraz_mar_prohral_jsem_za_PYXz
I lost the fight with Marcus.
我没能打败马库斯。
poraz_nep_je_nacase_poraz_gpyY
It's time to defeat the remaining enemy forces in the courtyard.
是时候打败堡垒庭院内剩余的敌人了。
poraz_nep_plan_se_zvrtnul_t4HB

The plan went awry and now our lives are in danger. But pulling back would be foolish. We still have the cannon in reserve. We have to hold on and clear all the enemy troops from the outer bailey. Then we'll see…
计划出了岔子，当下的我们身处险境，可是撤退绝非明智之举。我们还有备用的火炮，现在必须坚持住并扫清外堡场的敌人。之后便得见机行事了......
poraz_nep_predhradi_jsme__Gulg
We took the outer bailey, but there's a moat and raised drawbridge stopping us getting into the inner bailey.
我们占领了外堡场，但升起的吊桥阻断了我们进入内堡场的路。
poraz_nep_prorazili_jsme__JBWv
We broke through the Praguers' defensive line and took the outer bailey of Suchdol fortress.
我们突破了布拉格人的防线，并夺回了苏赫多尔堡垒的外堡场。
poraz_nep_prorazili_jsme__ruJu
We broke through the Praguers' defensive line and are fighting to take the outer bailey of Suchdol fortress.
我们突破了布拉格人的防线，正为夺下苏赫多尔堡垒的外堡场而浴血奋战。
poraz_nep_zbyli_nepratele_vTuY

The remaining enemy fighters were defeated and Suchdol liberated. We greeted Zizka and other friends. Lord Hanush came, congratulated everyone on the great victory and brought much-needed supplies. He was in a hurry to get back to Rattay, but first he called Capon aside for a confidential talk.
敌人的剩余兵力已被歼灭，苏赫多尔因此得以解放。我们均与杰式卡等众多盟友打了招呼，瀚纳什领主也上前为这场伟大的胜利表达了祝贺，并奉上了盟友们急需的物资，但他却急着返回拉泰，而在那之前他将卡蓬拉至一旁进行了一番私人谈话。
poraz_old_bij_se_A7Ek
Fight!
开打！
poraz_old_kdyz_jsem_chtel_JoYB

Just when I was about to tell Sir Kunzlin what I know about Vavak's crimes, the Mint Master himself barged into Lord Ruthard's home. When his crimes were revealed, the Mint Master and his men pounced on us, but we fought them off. Once we defeated him, we 'persuaded' Vavak to promise to leave Kunzlin alone, as well as bringing us information about Sigismund.
正当我准备把自己所知的瓦万克的罪行告诉昆斯林爵士时，这名铸币官本人闯进了鲁瑟德大人的家。当罪行被揭露后，铸币官和他手下向我们扑来，但我们击败了他们。我们打败瓦万克之后，'说服'他放过昆兹林，同时为我们提供关于西格斯蒙德的情报。
poraz_pre_jako_druheho_ma_reZ3
The second one I'm supposed to beat is the blacksmiths' Paskal.
铁匠帕斯卡尔将会是我的第二个对手。
poraz_pre_porazil_jsem_ko_aAkT
I beat the blacksmiths' Paskal
我打败了铁匠帕斯卡尔
poraz_pre_prohral_jsem_za_9mXh
I lost the fight with Paskal.
我没能打败帕斯卡尔。
poraz_pta_ptacek_byl_vzdy_ojWq
Sir Hans was always a better archer than a swordsman. I beat him in our training duel.
汉斯少主的剑术无法和他的箭术相提并论。在训练决斗中，我打败了他。
poraz_pta_ptacek_se_v_ser_HUCq
Sir Hans apparently improved as a swordsman. It was only a bit of swordplay, but he kicked my arse.
汉斯少主的剑术进步很快。不过几回合下来，他就把我打得落花流水。
poraz_pta_trenink_je_za_n_d1n7
Our training session is over. Now it's time to show Sir Hans what I can really do.
训练结束。现在该让汉斯少主看看我的真本事了。
poraz_rad_buh_stal_na_me__iCfH
God was on my side, I was able to defeat Radmil!
上帝站在了我这边，我成功击败了拉德米尔！
poraz_rad_prohral_jsem_ge_d3d1
I lost! Gerda won't be happy…
我输掉了决斗！格尔达会很失望的…
poraz_rad_ted_uz_nema_smy_wpfA
There's no point in dealing with a duel right now.
现在没必要进行决斗了。
poraz_rad_zacal_duel_a_ab_NP3k
The duel has begun, and to keep my word to Gerda, I must defeat Radmil.
决斗开始，为了完成对格尔达的承诺，我必须击败拉德米尔。
poraz_sta_jako_tretiho_mu_m03h
The third person I have to beat is Stanley.
我的第三个对手将会是斯坦利。
poraz_sta_porazil_jsem_i__B2HK
I also beat Stanley.
我还打败了斯坦利。
poraz_sta_prohral_jsem_za_BAU1
I lost the fight with the hired hand Stanley.
我没能打败雇工斯坦利。
porazte_n_jindra_sesedl_z_pTSv
The battle isn't won yet. Fighting is still raging in the courtyard.
战斗还未结束，庭院中仍然在激烈厮杀。
porazte_u_dorazil_jsem_na_ViPe
When I arrived, the battle was still raging in the courtyard and in front of the stronghold. I had to go and join the fighting right away.
当我抵达时，庭院和堡垒前的战斗还在激烈进行。我必须立即加入战斗。
poraz_tho_kona_mi_povedel_MKT8
Kona told me what Thomlin's thunderstone looks like. Smooth and a comfortable fit in the hand, it is pointed on one side and has a hole punched in the middle by a lightning bolt.
柯娜告诉我托姆林的雷石长啥样。它手感光滑，中间有一个被雷击的洞，而且一头是尖的。
poraz_tho_rikala_ze_jedne_jp0N

She said that Thomlin Bruthans from Horschan had one and that he'd wager it in a fight. If I defeat him, the stone is mine and I can help Kona. The Bruthans have a large farmstead with an orchard in Horschan, with wayside shrines in front of the entrance.
她说霍斯昌的托姆林·布鲁桑斯有一块雷石。他曾经打赌，谁能打败他谁就能拿走雷石。这是我帮助柯娜的一个机会。布鲁桑斯在霍斯昌有一个带果园的大庄园，在庄园的入口旁有神龛。
poraz_tho_thomlin_se_mnou_sG6f

Thomlin doesn't want to fight me and I haven't been able to persuade him yet. I'll have to try again. Or perhaps if I beat all the brawlers in Horschan, Thomlin will take the fight. Or I'll have to think up another way, because when all's said and done I need the stone, and I don't necessarily need to fight to get it...
托姆林不想和我打，我没能说服他。我得再试试别的办法，也许我打败了霍斯昌的所有打手，托姆林就会跟我打了。或者我可以另想办法，因为我最终的目的是得到雷石，但我不一定非要战斗才能得到它。
poraz_tho_thomlin_se_vzpo_abli

Despite Thomlin's reluctance, I finally managed to persuade him to fight me. Now I just need to beat him. Ha ha. He'll be waiting for me by the pen behind the barn. I am to come unarmed. Actually it'll be better to remove all my outer garments, and I shall need a goodly sum of groschen with me to wager against his stone.
尽管托姆林并不情愿，但我最终还是说服了让他和我打一场，现在我只要打赢他就行了，哈哈。 他会在谷仓后面的围场等我。我不能携带武器，实际上我最好连衣服也不穿。而且我还得带一大笔钱作为雷石的赌注。
poraz_tho_zapasil_jsem_s__vaXF

I fought Thomlin, and he gave me a thrashing and a half. I have to challenge him again, under the same conditions as before, so no armour and a purseful of groschen. I know his moves now, so this time I'm bound to come out on top...
我和托姆林打过一场了，他把我打了个半死。我得再挑战他一起，还是和以前一样，不穿盔甲，只带一袋子格罗申。我现在已经知道他的招数了，所以这次，我一定会赢……
poraz_tob_jako_prvniho_ma_hTpQ
First, I have to defeat Tobias.
首先，我得打败托比亚斯。
poraz_tob_porazil_jsem_pa_Afdt
I beat the hired hand Tobias.
我打败了雇工托比亚斯。
poraz_tob_prohral_jsem_za_hFVI
I lost the fight with the hired hand Tobias.
我没能打败雇工托比亚斯。
poraz_tumu_jako_druheho_m_E9JO
The farmer Tuma is the second one I have to defeat.
农夫图马将是我的第二个对手。
poraz_tumu_porazil_jsem_i_jbVu
I also defeated the farmer Tuma.
我还打败了农夫图马。
poraz_tumu_prohral_jsem_z_18Zm
I lost the fight with Tuma.
我没能打败图马。
poraz_ura_ted_musim_vutjk_KHWU
Now I have to beat Vuytek.
现在我得打败维特克。
poraz_ura_vujtka_jsem_v_d_tRYO
I defeated Vuytek in the duel, but Myshka left in the meantime. Gnarly said we're both morons and that Myshka isn't interested.
我在决斗中打败了维特克，但米什卡却在此期间离开了。格纳利认为我俩糗态百出，使得米什卡兴味索然。
poraz_ura_vujtka_me_v_due_3l3z
Vuytek defeated me in the duel, but Myshka left in the meantime. Gnarly said we're both morons and that Myshka isn't interested.
维特克在决斗中打败了我，但米什卡却在此期间离开了。格纳利认为我俩糗态百出，使得米什卡兴味索然。
poraz_vas_vasko_slibil_ze_DcW4
Tomcat promised he'll teach me the master strike if I defeat him in a duel, showing him I've got what it takes. I managed to do that, so the lesson can now begin.
公猫承诺过会教我大师之击，但前提是我必须在决斗中打败他，向他证明我有这个能力。我做到了，可以开始上课了。
poraz_vas_vasko_slibil_ze_EZdD
Tomcat promised he'll teach me the master strike if I defeat him in a duel, showing him I've got what it takes.
公猫承诺过会教我大师之击，但前提是我必须在决斗中打败他，向他证明我有这个能力。
poraz_vaz_jako_tretiho_ma_mB1n
Goliath is the third person I have to defeat.
我的第三个对手将是歌利亚。
poraz_vaz_porazil_jsem_ne_2J85
I defeated the undefeated! Goliath's days of glory are over.
谁说无敌之人永无败绩！歌利亚的传奇该结束了。
poraz_vaz_vazoun_me_poraz_n7se
Goliath defeated me.
歌利亚打败了我。
poraz_vaz_vazoun_me_tak_z_DTEH
Goliath roughed me up so bad I woke up outside on a manure heap. What a disgrace...
歌利亚狠狠地揍了我一顿，被打昏头的我竟在外面的一堆粪肥上醒来，真是丢脸...
poraz_vaz_vyhral_jsem_zap_dwAX
I won the fight with Goliath.
我打败了歌利亚。
poraz_vel_frantisek_mi_po_sqtb
Frantishek gave me a right proper beating. A few more punches and he could bury me here and now to rest in peace. He did agree, however, that I could try again. Maybe I'll be lucky next time.
弗兰蒂谢克把我打得上气不接下气，要是再多来几拳，估计他能让我就此倒地不起，然后将我埋在此地。而即便如此，他还是同意了让我再试一次，但愿下次我能走运些。
poraz_vel_jindra_prohral_JtNw
I reckon I overestimated myself. A fight with a grandmaster is not a fight in the tavern... I got a royal beating and can forget about winning the title.
或许我高估了自己的实力。与格斗大师的比试，岂是寻常酒馆斗殴能比拟的......我被狠狠地教训了一顿，所以还是别再惦记赢取那个大师头衔了。
poraz_vel_jindra_vyhral_wD8S
I don't even know how I did it, but I reckon I'm the local grandmaster now... Hopefully that won't change for a while.
我甚至不知道自己到底是怎么做到的，但似乎我现在已经成为了此地的格斗大师......但愿这一头衔不会太快变成别人的。
poraz_vel_velmistr_je_por_hgDw
The grandmaster has been defeated, long live the new grandmaster! I now truly am the best fighter in the region.
旧王惨败，新王当立！现在我就是这片区域最强的搏击手。
poraz_ven_jako_prvniho_ma_Yb10
The first one I'm supposed to beat is the hired hand Ventza.
我第一个要打败的人就是雇工文扎。
poraz_ven_porazil_jsem_pa_S4Yu
I beat the hired hand Ventza.
我打败了雇工文扎。
poraz_ven_prohral_jsem_za_eWV4
I lost the fight to Ventza.
我没能打败文扎。
poraz_viru_mym_druhym_pro_tcqk
My second opponent will be the hand Vira.
我的第二个对手将是手下威拉。
poraz_viru_porazil_jsem_i_reT9
I beat even Vira.
我甚至击败了威拉。
poraz_viru_vira_ze_me_mal_4lUs
Vira beat the shit out of me.
威拉把我痛揍了一顿。
poraz_vyd_pobili_jsme_vse_EJat
We killed all the miners, leaving me as the only witness to their crime.
我们把所有的矿工都杀死了，只剩下我独自见证他们的罪行。
poraz_vyd_zadny_z_haviru__Xyhq
None of the miners must survive!
一个矿工的活口都不要留！
poraz_vzb_nez_jsme_stihli_nvuS

Before we had time to negotiate the release of those two, a rebellion broke out! We managed to kill all the men who wanted to seize control of the fort. Let's hope the negotiations about the prisoners will be easier now.
我们还没来得及商讨释放那两个小子的事，一场叛乱便在内巴科夫爆发！但我们成功击杀了所有企图夺取堡垒控制权的叛军，现在只希望关于囚犯的商讨能够更为轻松顺意。
poraz_vzb_nez_jsme_stihli_O9m2
Before we had time to negotiate the release of those two, a rebellion broke out at Nebakov! If I want to see Henry and Capon, I have to help put it down!
我们还没来得及商讨释放那两个小子的事，一场叛乱便在内巴科夫爆发！如果我想见到亨利和卡蓬，就必须协助镇压叛乱！
poraz_zav_asi_to_nebyl_ne_aMBk
Maybe it wasn't the greatest idea to think I could just beat Zavish. It didn't go well at all. If I want to get Jezhek's things, I'll have to find another way.
也许我不该认为可以击败扎维什。事情没我想的那么顺利。如果我想拿回杰泽克的东西，就得另想办法。
poraz_zav_jako_druheho_ma_ihLF

poraz_zav_rozhodl_jsem_se_ANQy

我打败了扎维什。

扎维什打败了我。
poraz_zav_zavis_s_damiane_RFry

扎维什和达米安狠狠地揍了我一顿。

Markold of Louny and his warriors followed me! I have to get rid of them.
洛尼的马尔科和他的战士跟着我！我必须摆脱他们。
poraz_zlo_myslibor_je_mrt_Z5Sv

迈斯利博尔死了，没人能跟我讨论报酬了。
poraz_zlo_podarilo_se_nam_7azu

马尔科已经死了。我们终于可以高枕无忧了。
porozhled_z_kulny_u_mlyna_5ePL

I heard a cry for help coming from a shed at the mill. Inside was the miller's young wife, who said she had been locked in there by her tyrannical husband, and the poor girl was terrified that he would kill her. But I won't allow that! When I find him, I'll show him how to treat a woman.
磨坊里的一个棚子内传出一声呼救，其内关着的竟是磨坊主的娇妻。这位可怜的姑娘声称她那生性残暴的丈夫将她锁在了棚里，并十分畏惧会惨遭丈夫的毒手。我不能让那种事情发生！等我找到那个男人，要让他学会如何善待妇女。
porozhled_z_kulny_u_mlyna_aUgT

I heard a cry for help coming from a shed at the mill. Inside was the miller's young wife, who said she had been locked in there by her husband. She wanted help with some family problem, but it has nothing to do with me.
磨坊里的一个棚子内传出一声呼救，里面关着的竟是磨坊主的娇妻，这位可怜的姑娘声称她的丈夫将她锁在了棚里。她希望我能解决他们的家庭矛盾，但是此事与我无关。
porozhled_z_kulny_u_mlyna_cMVm

I heard a cry for help coming from a shed at the mill. Inside was the miller's young wife, who said she had been locked in there by her tyrannical husband, and the poor girl was terrified that he would kill her.

porus_doh_sice_jsme_se_s__e6NR
Even though I agreed to let Radmil win… my honour is still in the balance. I can still change my mind and show him what a Skalitz blacksmith can do.
尽管我先前同意故意输给拉德米尔…但我的良心最终占据了上风。我仍然可以反悔，并向他展示一名斯卡利茨铁匠的真本事。
porus_doh_vykaslal_jsme_s_40Sh
I blew off the original agreement with Radmil and thrashed him. He'll probably be angry with me but my reputation comes first and foremost.
我打破了先前与拉德米尔达成的约定并击败了他。即便他可能会因此恼怒，但相对来说我的名誉更为重要。
posad_se__cert_na_me_vola_lNQY
The Devil called me to make a toast to our victory with them, but I didn't make it in time. Considering the state Hynek ended up in I don't think we'll be making any toasts.
酒鬼叫我和他们一起为我们的胜利干杯，但我没能及时赶到。考虑到海尼克最后的下场，我想我们不会再有干杯的机会。
posad_se__cert_na_me_vola_WZ25
Dry Devil is calling me to sit with him and toast to victory. I definitely could do that.
酒鬼召唤我和他坐在一起，为胜利干杯。我很乐意。
posad_se__s_certem_kateri_KTbg
I sat with the Devil, Katherine, Sam and Lord Pisek to drink beer. Raising our tankards of the bitter brew, we toasted our bitter victory.
我与酒鬼、凯瑟琳、塞缪尔和皮塞克领主坐在一起喝啤酒。我们举起装着苦涩啤酒的酒杯，为我们苦涩的胜利干杯。
posbirej__tak_jsem_misto__et5i

I asked Tuma, the guard by the gate, about the beggars. He said that giving them some alms, like kitchen scraps, would help. But it wasn't that simple. The scraps were kept in the pantry under the cook's watchful eye. That's why I decided to collect the food for the poor off the tables instead. The guard didn't mind all that much, as long as the beggars were gone.
我向大门口的守卫图马询问了应付那些乞丐的办法，他说给他们些施舍或许能够奏效，比如给些残羹剩饭。但是事情并没有那么简单，毕竟眼尖的厨师正紧盯着储藏室里的食物。因此我决定替那些可怜人取走一些餐桌上的食物。既然能把那些乞丐打发走，守卫也就并未过多在意。
posbirej__taky_bych_mohl__zOtS
I can also collect some food from the tables. I've got enough now, time to bring it to the guard.
我还可以从餐桌上取走食物。现在拿得也够多了，该拿去给守卫了。
posbirej__taky_muzu_jidlo_wzau
I can also collect some food from the tables, but I'll need more.
我还可以从餐桌上取走食物，不过得多拿一些。
poskladej_dokoncil_jsem_p_CRUQ

我用完整的颅骨搭建了一座骨堆。

我用大腿骨搭建了一座骨堆。
poskladej_dokoncil_jsem_p_y54n

我用破碎的颅骨搭建了一座骨堆。

People from Tachov were drying their laundry on the meadow, I made a proper mess of it. They really weren't happy about it, but Olbram probably will be.
塔霍夫人将他们的衣服留在草原上晾晒，而我让那些衣服遭了殃。塔霍夫人为此哭丧着脸，至于奥尔布拉姆，估计要笑掉大牙。
poslapej__tachovsti_ted_p_dJcH
People from Tachov leave their laundry to dry in the meadow during the day. Olbram wants me to dirty it somehow. Maybe if I chase the sheep through there…
塔霍夫人会在白天将衣服留在草原上晾晒，奥尔布拉姆想让我想办法弄脏它们，要是我能把羊群往那里驱赶的话......
poslechni_co_mi_stulec_ch_iXXi
I'll never find out what Knuckles wanted to tell me. He's pushing up daisies.
巧指曾打算将何事告知于我，我将永远无从知晓，毕竟他的坟头都已经长草了。
poslechni_jak_se_dalo_cek_F2In
As was expected, Knuckles sees things differently. He wants to get rid of Chenyek once and for all.
不出所料，巧指看待事物的角度非同寻常，他想要彻底解决掉程叶科。
poslechni_prohlidka_s_boh_MZAk
Zizka has orders for me. I should listen to what he expects of me.
杰式卡对我发布了命令。我应该听他说了什么。

Knuckles wants to tell me something. I reckon it'll be another one of his "better offers".
巧指有事要跟我说，估计他又要给我安排一项“绝妙任务”。
poslechni_zizka_mi_sveril_VhPL

杰式卡让我指挥自己的连队。

保卫城堡前垛！

postarej__ignac_po_me_chc_Jk27

We arrived at the last stop, the Veisar the greengrocer's cottage. Curiously enough, I'm not supposed to haul carcasses here, but actually make one! Ignatius wants me to secretly poison the greengrocer's dog that's been terrorising the neighbourhood. I couldn't find the dog anywhere for the life of me. You know why? Because Bonnie freed him and wants to leave with him. Should I let her or finish my task?
我们抵达了途中的最后一站，也就是菜农维萨的农舍。奇怪的是，我无需再在此地搬运动物尸体，反而是要杀死一只动物！伊格内修斯想让我偷偷毒死菜农家的恶犬，好让邻里居民不再因其而提心吊胆。我这辈子都不可能找到那只狗了，知道为什么吗？因为邦妮把它释放了，想跟他一同离开，现在我该继续完成任务还是坐视不管呢？
postarej__nakonec_jsem_se_8ghf
In the end, I decided to end Vostatek's life and with it all this pointless running around the woods.
最后，我决定结束沃斯塔克的生命，同时为那些毫无意义的林间奔波画上句点。
postarej__nakonec_jsme_se_NuXs
We finally agreed that the murderer must be William, and he needs to be stopped! I’ll either have to ambush him in some dark alley or try to report him to the bailiff.
我们最后一致认为，杀人凶手一定就是威廉，他的罪行必须被终结！我可以到某处暗巷埋伏他，或者去向执行官举报他的罪行。
postarej__na_mlyne_danema_x2I4
A band of brutes has occupied Danemark and killed the miller's son Vashek. Unfortunately, I wasn't able to deal with them.
一伙强盗抢占了丹恩麦磨坊，并杀害了磨坊主的儿子瓦谢克。很不幸，我没能解决掉他们。
postarej__na_posledni_zas_D175

At the last stop, Veisar the greengrocer's cottage, I wasn't supposed to haul any carcasses, but actually make one. Ignatius wanted me to poison the greengrocer's dog who'd been terrorising the neighbourhood. Only in the meantime, Bonnie freed the dog. She pleaded for me to let them go, saying she'd take good care of him and would train him. I thought about what Kreyzl would say if I let that beast run free in Lower Semine, so I decided to finish the job the gravedigger gave me. I don't think Bonnie will forgive me any time soon.
我们抵达了途中的最后一站，也就是菜农维萨的农舍。奇怪的是，我无需再在此地搬运动物尸体，反而是要杀死一只动物！伊格内修斯想让我偷偷毒死菜农家的恶犬，好让邻里居民不再因其而提心吊胆。可是与此同时，邦妮释放了那只恶犬，还乞求我将他们放走。我很清楚如果我让那只畜生在下塞米横行霸道，克雷泽将会作何反应，我也因此最终决定履行那位掘墓人交给我的任务，想必邦妮短时间内是不会再待见我的。
postarej__na_posledni_zas_DMiz

I avenged the death of the miller's son Vashek. The black souls of those miserable wretches who took over Danemark are already knocking on the gates of Hell.
我替被害的磨坊主儿子瓦谢克报仇了。那些抢占了丹恩麦磨坊还给他人招致苦难的肮脏灵魂，现在的他们肯定在敲响地狱的大门。

Vidlak Pond and the forest northwest of it have become another hotbed of poachers. The gamekeeper wants me to comb the forest and find the culprit responsible for the decline in game. 维德拉克池塘以及它西北方向的树林也变成了偷猎者犯罪的温床。猎场看守人让我仔细搜查那片树林，找出导致猎物数量衰减的罪人。按照渔夫妻子的说法，当地的皮匠与那些偷猎行为扯上了干系，如果不是他，那就是其他居住在树林深处、躲藏在某些异教神像之后的人。

postarej__rybnik_vidlak_a_Dxhw
Vidlak Pond and the forest northwest of it have become another hotbed of poachers. I combed the forest, found the culprit and finished him off. I'm not going to go easy on vermin like him.
维德拉克池塘以及它西北方向的树林也变成了偷猎者犯罪的温床。我仔细搜索树林，找到了那个罪犯并亲手将其了结。对待他那种害群之马，我可不会手下留情。
postarej__rybnik_vidlak_a_L6CC

Vidlak Pond and the forest northwest of it have become another hotbed of poachers. I combed the forest and tracked down the poacher. But he wouldn't listen to reason, so I had to kill him. Damn this job!
维德拉克池塘以及它西北方向的树林也变成了偷猎者犯罪的温床。我仔细搜索树林，追查到了那个偷猎者，但好言无法相劝，所以我不得不把他杀死，这差事真是操蛋！
postarej__rybnik_vidlak_a_s8B4

Vidlak Pond and the forest northwest of it became another poachers' breeding ground. I combed through the woods and found the culprit. I spoke to him from the heart and drove him out of the region. It was clear that he was really scared
维德拉克池塘以及它西北方向的树林也变成了偷猎者犯罪的温床。我仔细搜索树林，找到了那个罪犯。经历了一番发自肺腑的交谈，我将他驱离了这片区域，很明显，他被吓着了。
postarej__rybnik_vidlak_a_ugvd

Vidlak Pond and the forest northwest of it have become another hotbed of poachers. That benefits the local tanner - he and the poacher have a secret stash in the forest where the poacher puts the skins. The stash is northwest of the tanner's cottage. A stream runs past an abandoned resting place and they have their stash just above that. If I head uphill from the stash along the nearby path, I might come across the poacher's camp. Apparently I just have to stick to the path.
维德拉克池塘以及它西北方向的树林也变成了偷猎者犯罪的温床，而本地的皮匠得以从中获利，因为他和偷猎者在树林里设立了一个藏匿处，偷猎者就把猎物毛皮放在那里。那个藏匿处就在皮匠小屋的西北方向，在一处靠近小溪的废弃歇脚点上方。如果我从藏匿处沿着附近的道路爬上山，应该会遇到偷猎者的营地。很显然，我只需要沿着道路走即可。
postarej__shodli_jsme_se__x7Z3
We agreed that William was the murderer and that he had to be stopped in any way possible, which is what happened!
我们认为杀人凶手就是威廉，也同意用尽一切手段阻止他的罪行，最终我们确实做到了！
postarej__sice_jsme_se_sh_zqWI
While we agreed that William the bard must be the murderer, I couldn't bring myself to kill him. Let someone else have that on their conscience!
尽管我们都认为威廉必定就是杀人凶手，但是我还是无法忍心将他杀死。如此糟蹋良心之事，还是让别人来做吧！
postarej__slibil_jsem_mly_Kzw7
I promised the miller to take care of the band that took over his mill and killed his son Vashek.
我答应了磨坊主，我会解决掉那些夺走他磨坊还杀死了他儿子瓦谢克的强盗。
postarej__stejne_jsem_ho__a3Mw

Vidlak Pond and the forest northwest of it became another breeding ground for poachers. I combed through the woods and found the culprit. I spoke to him from the heart, urging him to stop poaching, but as soon as he started to run away, I mercilessly murdered him
维德拉克池塘以及它西北方向的树林也变成了偷猎者犯罪的温床。我仔细搜索树林，找到了那个罪犯。我发自肺腑地与他进行了一番交谈，督促他停止偷猎行为，但正当他要逃离之时，我毫不仁慈地终结了他的性命。
potkej_se_na_osvobozene_h_Ie25
I couldn't be arsed to wait for the freed miners at the Hloushetz Gate. Why should I waste time on them?
我可不想到赫卢舍茨城门去等那些获释的矿工，我为什么要在他们的身上浪费时间？
potkej_se_po_psani_dopisu_BkTU

After writing the letter and arguing with Markold, I'd had enough and let my weapon do the talking. Now I won't know how the whole thing with miners might have turned out, but I don't mind much anyway.
在写完这封信，并与马尔科争论了一番后，忍无可忍的我决定用武器说话。现在，我也不知道矿工们的事情会如何发展，但总之和我没什么关系了。
potkej_se_setkal_jsem_se__RaCs
I met the freed miners at the Hloushetz Gate. They had a couple of questions for me. Then they decided to go back to their camp near Grund.
我在赫卢舍茨城门遇到了获释的矿工们。他们向我问了几个问题后，便决定返回他们在格兰德附近的营地。
potkej_se_s_osvobozenymi__zAWS

The freed miners are now definitely heading to their camp near Grund. I'm supposed to meet them at the city's Hloushetz Gate. From there we can go on together. I don't know where Markold was holding them and how long it will take them to get to the gate, but let's hope I won't have to wait long. I'm certain they won't wait for me as well.
得救的矿工们将会返回他们在格兰德附近的营地，我得到城中的赫卢舍茨城门跟他们见面，然后一同启程。我不知马尔科先前将他们囚禁于何处，也不知他们抵达城门要花上多长时间，只希望我不用等候过久。我觉得他们也不会等我太久。

povez_boh_bohuta_sice_neb_bzY2

I told Godwin the commander of the Italian Court garrison was looking forward to the papal legate's visit, since he was himself a native Italian, so Godwin was going to have to try damned hard to convince him. He wasn't thrilled, but he agreed to try to work on polishing his command of the language.
我告诉古德温，意大利宫的警卫队长是个土生土长的意大利人，他一直都期盼着教皇特使的探访，因此古德温就必须竭尽全力让他信服。古德温闻言面露难色，但还是同意会努力打磨自己的意大利语。
povez_boh_bohutovi_jsem_z_bQ6p
I forgot to tell Godwin that as a legate, he is to meet a native Italian at the Italian Court.
古德温将以特使的身份，会见意大利宫里的一位意大利人，我却忘记了将此事告诉他。
povez_boh_kristian_mi_pro_iyra
Christian told me the Italian Court guards are led by a native Italian. If our plan is to succeed, Godwin should know about it.
克里斯蒂安告诉我，意大利宫里的警卫队长是个土生土长的意大利人。为确保计划顺利实施，古德温应当知晓此事。
povez_olb_nezbyva_nez_vyr_XNpJ
Now I have to tell Olbram the Tachov sheep are enjoying an unexpected adventure in nearby woods.
塔霍夫人的羊群正在附近的树林里享受着一场意想不到的冒险呢，我得将此事告诉奥尔布拉姆。
povez_olb_olbram_byl_nads_NM8z
Olbram rewarded me for chasing off the cattle.
奥尔布拉姆因为我赶走了羊群给了我奖励。
povez_olb_to_nedopadlo_mo_v3Ug
That didn't end well. I reckon nobody will be in the mood for practical jokes now.
事情的结局并不理想，现在也没人有心思再去耍把戏了。
povez_pro_namisto_pomalov_NM9w
Instead of painting it, I somehow managed to kill the bull. I'm probably not too good at this kind of thing. To be safe, I didn't tell Prochek the whole story.
我没能在那只公牛身上涂鸦，但却不小心杀死了它。也许我并不擅长处理这样事情吧，为了安全起见，我隐瞒了此事，没有告知普罗切克。
povez_pro_procek_po_me_ch_agcN
Prochek wanted me to paint on Olbram of Zhelejov's trophy bull. It wasn't easy, but managed to do exactly that. Prochek was glad we played a trick on the Zhelejovites.
普罗切克想让我在奥尔布拉姆的公牛上涂鸦，尽管略有棘手，可我还是成功完成了任务。普罗切克对于能在哲勒约夫人头上撒泼一事很是得意。
povez_pro_procek_po_me_ch_gzrq

Prochek wanted me to paint on Olbram of Zhelejov's trophy bull. It wasn't easy, but I did manage to do exactly that. Prochek was glad we managed to play a trick on the Zhelejov gang, making up for my previous mischief.
普罗切克想让我在奥尔布拉姆的公牛上涂鸦，尽管略有棘手，可我还是成功完成了任务。普罗切克对于能捉弄哲勒约夫人一事很是得意，决定对我既往不咎。
povez_pro_procek_po_me_ch_QPoz
Prochek wanted me to paint on Olbram's bull, but it didn't quite work out. I should tell him.
普罗切克想让我在奥尔布拉姆的公牛上涂鸦，但事情不太顺利。我得告诉他才行。
povez_pro_snazil_jsem_se__Etan

I tried to paint the bull, but the Zhelejov chaps caught me. I lied to them and managed to avoid implicating Prochek. He wasn't happy that I didn't manage to finish the task, but he was glad I didn't rat him out.
我本想在那只公牛身上涂鸦，但却被那些哲勒约夫青年逮了个正着。我向他们撒了谎，也没有牵扯到普罗切克。因为我没能完成任务，普罗切克感到失落，但他很高兴我没有出卖他。
povez_pro_snazil_jsem_se__Slbs
I tried to paint the bull, but the Zhelejov chaps caught me, and I had to tell them who sent me. Prochek wasn't too happy about it.
我本想在那只公牛身上涂鸦，但却被那些哲勒约夫青年逮了个正着，我也不得不将此事的主谋告诉了他们，普罗切克对此很是失望。
povez_pro_zmaloval_jsem_o_uy6E
I should go back to Prochek and tell him how it went.
我得回到普罗切克那里，向他汇报事情的进展。
povez_roz_co_ja_vim_jak_s_qFwv
I unfortunately had to get out of Maleshov before I could find the book Lady Rosa asked me for.
很遗憾，即便没能找到那本罗莎女士所求的书籍，我也必须离开马列索夫。
povez_roz_na_malesove_jse_q1vX
In Maleshov I found a book that matches Lady Rosa's description exactly.
我在马列索夫找到了一本与罗莎女士的描述极为相符的书。
povez_roz_pani_roza_urcit_RCJ6
Rosa said the book is in Maleshov… But I must get there first.
罗莎说过那本书就在马列索夫…总之我得先到那里去。
povez_roz_pani_roza_urcit_U1wc
Since I'm already in Maleshov, I should take the chance to find Rosa's book. She said it's bound in red leather and inlaid with gold.
我已抵达马列索夫。我得想办法找到罗莎所求的那本书，据说它由红色皮革装订，表皮还嵌着金子。
pozabijej_klidnej_rozhovo_HDS2

A quiet discussion rapidly turned into a brutal battle! Burgrave Hashek behaved like a madman and I decided I'd rather defend the innocent townsfolk than kill them. None of the soldiers must get away and betray me to von Bergow!
原本平和的商讨很快演变成了一场残忍的战斗！哈舍克城伯举止疯狂，而我决定保护那些无辜市民，而非将他们杀死。在场的士兵都别想离开，更别想向冯·波尔高揭发我的行径！
pozabijej_klidnej_rozhovo_ttyz

A quiet discussion rapidly turned into a brutal battle! We have to defend ourselves and bring order to the fortress, otherwise we'll never get out of here alive! But... these are just ordinary folk...
原本平和的商讨很快演变成了一场残忍的战斗！我们必须保护自己，并恢复堡垒的秩序，不然我们永远都无法活着离开此地！可是......他们不过是些普通的平民百姓......
pozabijej_nemohl_jsem_nec_m1cm
I couldn't stand by and watch the massacre of the Semine people, so I turned on von Bergow's soldiers. He'd mustn't find out about that.
我无法对塞米人民遭受的屠杀坐视不管，因此将矛头指向了冯·波尔高的手下，千万不能让他发现此事。
pozabijej_po_prijezdu_na__2wNl

Upon our arrival at Semine, we tried at first to deal with the situation peacefully, but the burgrave soon started making threats. Before we could do anything to stop it, a tough and messy skirmish broke out! When I saw what was happening, I was more inclined to take the side of the innocent Semine townsfolk, otherwise it would have ended in them being massacred.
抵达塞米后，我们本想以和平的方式处理事态，但城伯很快便开始制造威胁。我们还没来得及制止，一场棘手的混战随即爆发！当我回过神来之时，我选择站在无辜的塞米民众那边，否则他们会在那场冲突中被屠杀而亡。
pozabijej_po_pzrijezdu_na_V0Iv

Upon our arrival at Semine, we tried at first to deal with the situation peacefully, but the burgrave soon started making threats. Before we could do anything to stop it, a tough and messy skirmish broke out! Von Bergow's men behaved quite brutally towards the townsfolk... but we are at war... I suppose.
抵达塞米后，我们本想以和平的方式处理事态，但城伯很快便开始制造威胁。我们还没来得及制止，一场棘手的混战随即爆发！冯·波尔高的手下残暴地杀害了平民......但我想......这就是战争。
pozadej_o_kdyz_projevi_le_n8cP
If the legate shows interest in Kuttenberg wine, Jerome Naaz will surely send some guards to the town to fetch it.
如果特使想要库滕堡红酒，杰罗姆·纳兹定会派出守卫到镇上取得。
pozadej_o_projevil_zajem__vUHT
Godwin expressed his interest in the wine and Naaz immediately sent two guards to fetch more.
古德温想要些红酒，纳兹立即派了两名守卫将更多的红酒取了回来。
pozehnej__pecha_chce_abyc_KyzQ
Pasha wants me to shoot the arrow into his head. These bandits really believe the story! What am I supposed to do now? Why do I always get myself into these insane situations? Oh dear…!
帕夏要我把箭射进他的脑袋。这些强盗真的相信这个故事！ 我现在该怎么做？为什么我总会陷入这种疯狂的状况？哦天哪……!
pozehnej__pecha_chtel_aby_I8ud

Pasha wanted me to bless him with the magic arrow - the mad bastard wanted me to shoot him in the head with it! So I did what he wanted. I shot the magic arrow into his head and, surprise, surprise, he kind of dropped dead on the spot. Now it looks like I just decided to kill the the poor sod. Damned superstitions!
帕夏要我用魔箭祝福他——这个疯狂的混蛋让我把魔箭射进他的脑袋！我照做了。我把魔箭射进他的脑袋，然后，真想不到啊，真想不到，他当场就没命了。现在看来像是我决定杀死这个可怜的家伙。该死的迷信！
pozehnej__pecha_chtel_aby_JC33

Pasha wanted me to bless him with the magic arrow - he wanted me to shoot him in the head with it. I decided I would never do that, that would be suicide. I wanted to bless him by letting him live, he can do great things in life even without the magic arrow. Unfortunately Pasha and the other bandits didn't see things the same way and tried to kill me. These superstitions are truly evil.
帕夏要我用魔箭祝福他——他让我把魔箭射进他的脑袋！这简直就是自杀，我绝不会做这么疯狂的事。我认为，让他活着便是祝福。即使没有魔箭，他仍然可以做伟大的事情。不幸的是，帕夏和其他强盗并不这么认为，还试图杀了我。这些迷信真是邪恶。
pozehnej__pecha_chtel_aby_kEsN

Pasha wanted me to bless him with the magic arrow - he wanted me to shoot him in the head with it. But I don't believe the stories and turned him down. What I didn't expect was that this would make everyone mad and that they'd try to kill me.
帕夏要我用魔箭祝福他——他让我把魔箭射进他的脑袋！但我不相信这些故事，于是拒绝了他。没有想到，这激怒了所有人，他们想杀了我。
pozehnej__pecha_chtel_aby_V3fi
Pasha wanted me to shoot the arrow into his head, but I managed to persuade him, that it's not the best idea. These bandits are really a weird bunch.
帕夏想让我朝他的头部射箭，但是我成功将其说服，这可不是什么好念头。这帮强盗可真是性格古怪。
pozehnej__pecha_chtel_aby_wFai

Pasha wanted me to bless him with the magic arrow - he wanted me to shoot him in the head with it. I decided I would never do that, that would be suicide. I wanted to bless him by letting him live, he can do great things in life even without the magic arrow. Unfortunately Pasha and the other bandits didn't see things the same way and tried to kill me. These superstitions are truly evil.
帕夏要我用魔箭祝福他——他让我把魔箭射进他的脑袋！这简直就是自杀，我绝不会听他的话。我想祝福他，让他活着。即使没有魔箭，他仍然可以做伟大的事情。可惜帕夏和其他强盗并不这么认为，并试图杀了我。这些迷信真是邪恶。
prace_na__today_is_too_la_Poyi
I was hired as a labourer at the vineyard. It's a bit late today, so I should start work tomorrow.
我受雇去葡萄园做工，但今天有些晚了，我该到明天再去工作。
pracenavi_dojdi_si_pro_mz_VSQV
Go and collect your wage.
去领你的工钱。
pracenavi_prace_na_klaste_HEok
Work in the monastery vineyard.
在修道院的葡萄园工作。
pracenavi_promluv_si_se_s_3KHZ
Talk to Jerome the caretaker.
和看守人杰罗姆聊天。
prace_na__you_are_fired_Wcsu
Unfortunately, I didn't work hard enough and had to leave the vineyard. Hard labour isn't my thing anyway!
不幸的是，我工作不够努力，不得不离开葡萄园。但反正我也不愿意做苦力！
prace_na__you_are_hired_g_nDki

For today I'm a hired hand at the vineyard. My day should be spent fighting weeds, and any sacks I see need to be taken to the dungheap. Neither should be much of a problem. My work ends when the city bells ring.
我今天受雇在葡萄园做工。我今天应该去除杂草，并把看到的所有麻袋都送去粪堆。这都不是什么问题，当城市的钟声敲响时我的工作就结束了。
prace_na__you_did_good_job_gX4I
I did an honest day's work today. The bell has brought our work to an end and I can go and pick up my wage and get some rest. And blimey, don't I need it!
我今天扎实地干了一整天活。当钟声响起，我们的工作就结束了，我可以去领工钱并休息一下了。天呐，我太需要休息了！
pracharna_dojdi_do_brlohu_kdm4
Go to the Lair.
去往“巢穴”。
pracharna_dones_enneleyn__qXZY

把酒带给恩内琳。
pracharna_dones_mlynarovi_Qq4Q
Bring the book to the miller.
把书带给磨坊主。
pracharna_doved_kurtyzanu_b6wP
Go over Kreyzl's plan with Enneleyn.
和恩内琳复习一遍克雷泽的计划。
pracharna_najdi_devce_pro_KraN
Find Enneleyn in the nomads' camp.
在游牧民营地里找到恩内琳。
pracharna_najdi_pro_mlyna_zkXD
Find the book for the miller.
给磨坊主找到那本书。
pracharna_objective4_qasc
Take the dress to the companion.
把裙子拿给女伴。
pracharna_objective5_sYKB
Find a companion at the Zhelejov bathhouse.
在哲勒约夫澡堂找个伴。
pracharna_oznam_podezrelo_Dcg0
Report suspicious activity to the bailiff.
向执行官告发可疑动向。
pracharna_pockej_nez_krej_PQSG
Wait for the tailor to restock the dress.
等待裁缝重新做好裙子。
pracharna_pokus_se_nezabi_Ou4n
Try not to kill the miller.
尽量不要杀死磨坊主。
pracharna_promluv_s_mlyna_Bs10
Talk to the miller about what to do next.
和磨坊主谈谈下一步该怎么做。
pracharna_sezen_pro_ennel_JEVT
Get some Mintha perfume for the companion.
为女伴找来些薄荷香的香水。
pracharna_sezen_pro_ennel_JGE5
Get some wine for Enneleyn.
给恩内琳拿去些红酒。
pracharna_sezen_pro_ennel_jMlo
Find a dress for the companion.
为女伴找件裙子。
pracharna_sezen_vonavku_p_vjpY
Bring the perfume to the companion.
把香水带去给女伴。
pracharna_ukradni_vonavku_9e6i
Steal the perfume from Betty the innkeeper.
从旅馆老板贝蒂那里偷走香水。
pracharna_vrat_se_za_mlyn_bXt9
Return to the miller.
回到磨坊主那里。
pracharna_zjisti_od_pacho_1GcZ
Find out what the stableboy knows about Nikvard
询问马夫对尼克瓦德有什么了解。
pracharna_zjisti_voditka__FWfC
Find out what the maid knows about Nikvard.
询问女仆对尼克瓦德有什么了解。
pracharna_zjisti_voditka__Nuze
Check with the scribe for clues about the book.
向抄写员询问有关这本书的线索。
pracharna_zjisti_voditka__vhbW
Find Nikvard.
找到尼克瓦德。
pracharna_zjisti_voditka__Wn2z
Ask the cook what she knows about Nikvard.
询问厨娘对尼克瓦德有什么了解。
preber_si_cim_tezsi_zapas_u3yF
The tougher the fight, the sweeter the reward. The groschen are mine.
打得越卖力，奖赏就越诱人，这些钱是我的咯。
preber_si_damian_mi_jeste_eRYv
Damian still owes me money from the bets.
达米安还欠我赌资。
preber_si_grose_jsou_moje_4paa
The groschen are mine and Zavish will have a dry mouth for a while at least.
这些钱现在属于我了，扎维什至少要过上一段没酒喝的日子咯。
preber_si_ozrala_s_zebrak_0RSN
The drunkard and the beggar still owe me money for the win.
那个醉鬼，还有那个乞丐，尚未将他们输掉的赌资交给我。
preber_si_shrabnul_jsem_v_U2mS
I grabbed my winnings, hopefully I won't have to get close to that stinker ever again.
我拿走了赢得的赌资，希望今后我再也不用靠近那个臭虫。
preber_si_ten_ochmelka_za_S4TW
That drunkard Zavish still owes me money from the bets.
那个醉鬼扎维什还欠我赌资。
preber_si_tri_vyhry_tri_h_yzWv
Three wins, three piles of groschen for me. That's what I like to see.
我赢下了三场比武，所以拿到了三份奖金，真是不亦乐乎。
preber_si_vazoun_mi_jeste_IvP8
Goliath still owes me money from the bets.
歌利亚尚未将赌资交给我。
precti_si_abych_mohl_ukon_Zb11
To sort out the conflict between Tachov and Zhelejov over the pasture, I'd have to find out where the border lies. Maybe there's something written about it in the Troskowitz chronicle.
要理清塔霍夫和哲勒约夫有关牧场的冲突，我得先找出边界在哪里。也许《特罗斯科维茨编年史》里有关于它的记载。
precti_si_kdyz_je_ted_dro_VUJ0
Now that Thrush is dead, there's no point to search for anything in the Troskowitz chronicle.
既然瑟鲁什已经死了，阅读《特罗斯科维茨编年史》已经没有意义了。
precti_si_na_papiru_je_na_zoQd
I have to read the parchment I found on Hynek.
我必须阅读从海尼克身上发现的羊皮纸。
precti_si_papir_jsem_si_p_aQwk
I read the parchment, but I can't make sense of it. What could it mean?
我读了那张羊皮纸，但我无法理解其中的意思。它究竟是什么意思？
precti_si_precetl_jsem_si_Qmoe
I read the Troskowitz chronicle.
我阅读了《特罗斯科维茨编年史》。
precti_si_vsechny_informa_QuZJ
I should find all the information about poisons in Musa's book of poisons.
我得从穆萨那本记载了毒药知识的书籍中寻找必要信息。
precti_si_vsechny_informa_wyDD
I should find all the information about poisons in the book of poisons Musa has in a chest in the hospital.
穆萨有本记载毒药知识的书籍就存放在他医所的一个箱子里，我得从中寻找与毒药相关的必要信息。
precti_si_zapisnik_je_nap_CX1Z
The diary is written in Czech, with bits in Latin here and there. I'll try to read at least some of it.
日记是用捷克语写的，夹杂着一些拉丁语。我会试着读一点。
precti_si_zapisnik_je_nap_tTpx
The diary is written in our language, with bits in Latin here and there. I'll try to read at least some of it.
日记由我们的语言撰写而成，其中还夹带了些拉丁语。我会试着读一点。
precti_si_zapisnik_patri__BGlO

The diary of Konrad of Prague, a Knight of the Cross with the Red Star. An investigator from the Order evidently discovered the inquisition's foul schemes against them, and learnt the truth about the murder of Olbram III of Shkvoretz, Archbishop of Prague. But Zdenyek, Grand Master of the Order, was mixed up in the case, and decided to get rid of Konrad, the only witness. Late at night, Konrad sought help from his friend, the old hermit Ambrose, former seneschal of the order.
红星十字勋章骑士布拉格的康拉德的日记。骑士团的一名调查员发现了宗教法庭针对他们的肮脏阴谋，并得知了布拉格大主教什科雷茨的奥尔布拉姆三世被谋杀的真相。但骑士团的大团长兹登耶克被卷入此案，他决定除掉康拉德这个唯一的证人。深夜，康拉德向友人老隐士安布洛斯，即骑士团的前执事，寻求帮助。
precti_si_zapisnik_patril_BIMO

The diary of Konrad of Prague, a Knight of the Cross with the Red Star. An investigator from the Order evidently discovered the inquisitions foul schemes against them, and learnt the truth about the murder of Olbram III of Shkvoretz, Archbishop of Prague. But Zdenyek, Grand Master of the Order, was mixed up in the case, and decided to get rid of Konrad, the only witness. Late at night, Konrad sought help from his friend, the old hermit Ambrose, former seneschal of the order.
红星十字勋章骑士布拉格的康拉德的日记。骑士团的一名调查员发现了宗教法庭针对他们的肮脏阴谋，并得知了布拉格大主教什科雷茨的奥尔布拉姆三世被谋杀的真相。但骑士团的大团长兹登耶克被卷入此案，他决定除掉康拉德这个唯一的证人。深夜，康拉德向友人老隐士安布洛斯，即骑士团的前执事，寻求帮助。
predej_ko_kosti_jsem_opat_7WZg
In the end I didn't give the abbot the bones. They can be put to better use somewhere else.
我最后还是没把那些骨头交出，想必它们在未来会有更好的用途。
predej_ko_kosti_mam_u_seb_lfQa
I have the bones the abbot still wants. Should I hand them over to him?
修道院院长苦苦追寻的那些骨头就在我身上，我该交给他吗？
predej_ko_nakonec_sem_si__6qsM

In the end I changed my mind and gave the abbot the bones. I didn't want to get into trouble for deceiving the Holy Church. I don't suppose I'll ever find out what happened to the bones after that, though.
我最终还是改变了主意，将那些骨头交给了修道院院长。我可不想因欺骗圣教会而惹上麻烦，至于那些骨头此后会怎样，我也将无从得知。
predej_pa_parler_je_po_sm_6VZ0
Johann is dead. Unfortunately, he will never see the church completed...
约翰死了。很遗憾，他将永远无法看到教堂竣工……
predej_pa_predal_jsem_par_CYKi
I gave Johann the thunderstone.
我将雷石交给了约翰。
predej_pa_stavitel_jan_pa_LAmH
Johann wants me to bring him a thunderstone to protect his church from fire and hail.
约翰希望我给他找一块雷石，以便保护教堂免受火灾和冰雹的侵害。
prednes_o_kdyz_jsem_chtel_uOpg

Just when I wanted to tell Sir Kunzlin what I know about Vavak's crimes, the Mint Master himself barged into Lord Ruthard's home. But I managed to turn the entire situation to our advantage. If we promised not to make his crimes public, Vavak promised to leave Kunzlin alone, plus he is going to give us intelligence on Sigismund.
我正要向昆兹林爵士揭露瓦万克所犯下的罪行，这位铸币官却亲自闯进了鲁瑟德领主的家，不过好在我成功将局势掌握在手中。瓦万克承诺，倘若我们能对他的罪行守口如瓶，他不仅会放过昆兹林，还会透露关于西格斯蒙德的情报。
pred_span_cesta_byla_naro_dvNW

The journey was hard, and I should probably have a bath before going to bed. Lord Pisek told his servant girl Zuzana to prepare a bath for me, it seems. I'll find it in the little cottage in the courtyard.
这趟旅途很是艰辛，我也该趁着入梦前好好清洗一番。皮塞克领主好像已经让他的女仆祖扎娜为我准备好了浴盆，我得到庭院的小屋里找找。
prekupnik__event_caption_E1NA
Camp.
营地。
prekupnik__event_descript_WWBo
There's a wayfarer sitting in a small camp beside the road. He's an ordinary man in plain clothes. He glances at you and gives a slightly forced smile.
路旁有个小小的营地，有个旅者就坐在其中。他衣着朴素，一看就是个平凡之人。他瞥了你一眼，勉强挤出了一丝微笑。
prekupnik__player_caption_EM3k
Camp.
营地。
prekupnik__player_descrip_4CqD
There's a wayfarer sitting in a small camp beside the road. He's an ordinary man in plain clothes. He glances at you and gives a slightly forced smile.
路旁有个小小的营地，有个旅者就坐在其中。他衣着朴素，一看就是个平凡之人。他瞥了你一眼，勉强挤出了一丝微笑。
prelez_hr_malesov_byla_ma_VOYt

Maleshov was a small but well-fortified fortress perched upon a steep rock. The only quiet way to get in led through the outer bailey's palisade. It was our job to ensure the rest of our men, led by Zizka, could freely make their way to the tower. We wanted to capture Otto von Bergow quickly and quietly.
马列索夫坐落在陡峭的山岩上，其规模虽小，但却是个固若金汤的堡垒。能够悄然潜入其中的唯一办法就是越过外堡场的栅栏。我们的任务是确保由杰式卡带领的其他同伴能够顺利进入塔楼。我们都想在不打草惊蛇的前提下，迅速捉拿奥托·冯·波尔高。
prelez_hr_malesov_je_mala_Zjpb

Maleshov is a small but well-fortified fortress perched upon a steep rock. The way to the inner castle is protected by two gates. There is also a drawbridge across a moat. We have to get over the walls of the outer bailey and take both gates so the rest of our men can get inside. If we do everything quietly, we might capture von Bergow before he even realises what's going on.
马列索夫坐落在陡峭的山岩上，其规模虽小，但却是个固若金汤的堡垒。堡垒由两扇城门守护着，护城河上还挂着一座吊桥。我们必须越过外堡场的城墙，控制住两扇城门，这样就能让其他同伴进入堡垒。只要做到悄无声息，或许不等冯·波尔高有所察觉，我们便能将其抓获。
prelez_hr_nyni_je_pred_na_Ar7n
Now the most difficult part of our plan awaits us.
我们正面临计划中最艰难的一环。
premek_um_bez_premka_zapa_BNhd
The fights can't continue without Paskal.
帕斯卡尔不在，搏斗将无法进行。
prenes_ro_pani_roza_se_na_3QUv
Rosa eventually reached the other side without getting her feet wet, while I was up to my arse in ice-cold water. Capon would have pissed himself laughing if he'd seen me.
在没有弄湿双脚的情况下，罗莎终于抵达了道路的另一侧，而冰冷的水却浸湿了我。要是卡蓬看到这一幕，他可要笑掉大牙了。
prenes_ro_pani_roze_se_ne_Z2hg
Lady Rosa didn't want to wade through the water and demanded that I carry her. I did as she asked, but the young lady still got a little wet.
罗莎小姐并不愿意淌着水继续前进，因此要求我帮她越过这片水域。我遵照她的要求行事，但她还是稍稍弄湿了自己。
prenes_ro_uprostred_tajne_dwqh

In the middle of the secret passageway leading to Ruthard Palace, we came across a flooded section. Lady Rosa was not really keen on wading through the water, so I had no choice but to carry her to the other side.
在通往鲁瑟德宫的密道中央，我们眼前的道路已被水淹没。罗莎小姐并不愿意淌着水继续前进，所以我不得不帮她越过这片水域。
prenes_ro_uprostred_tajne_N16H

In the middle of the secret passageway leading to Ruthard Palace we came across a flooded section. Lady Rosa is not very keen on wading through the water, she told me I should carry her to the other side.
在通往鲁瑟德宫的密道中央，我们眼前的道路已被水淹没。罗莎小姐并不愿意淌着水继续前进，所以让我帮她越过这片水域。

格挡。
