Check on Brabant.
查看布拉班特。
prepadeni_zneskodni_straz_VIBq
Take out the guards.
对付守卫。
presun_hr_kdybych_chtel_m_7DtE
If I wanted to, I reckon I could pull the border nail out of the tree and put it somewhere else, giving either Tachov or Zhelejov a bigger piece of the land.
如果我想，我可以把界钉从树上拔下，另外放置，让塔霍夫或哲勒约夫分到更大的一块土地。
presun_hr_neresunul_jsem__c3om
I didn't move the nail.
我没有移动界钉。
presun_hr_presunul_jsem_h_H6aR
I moved the nail to a different spot. I hope no one notices.
我移动了界钉。我希望没有人发现。
presun_hr_presunul_jsem_h_ZsW6
I moved the nail to a different spot. I hope no one notices.
我移动了界钉。我希望没有人发现。
prezij_basan_prisel_na_to_Oj9f
Basan discovered I was messing with his sword and attacked me. I have to kill him or run away.
在发现我糟蹋了他的宝剑以后，巴桑向我发起了攻击。我要么把他杀死，要么转身逃跑。
prezij_lapkove_nas_dostih_u3lu
The bandits caught up with us. Capon jumped down from the rocks, but one of the pursuers caught me. I have to face him.
还是被强盗追上了。卡蓬径直跳下岩壁，我却被一个追兵抓住。我必须和他正面交锋了。
prezij_podarilo_se_mi_vyv_IAXs
I was able to escape the fight with Basan in one piece.
我安然无恙地逃出了与巴桑的战斗。
prezij_s_ptackem_se_nam_p_EV31
Me and Hans managed to flee through the rocks. In the end, one of those cutthroats caught up with me, but fortunately Mutt saved my life. But I don't know what happened to my faithful dog after...
我和汉斯穿过岩谷逃跑。最后，我被一个匪徒擒住。危急关头，呆呆救了我一命。不知道我的忠犬下场如何……
pribliz_s_musime_se_dosta_JmKE
We have to get closer!
我们得靠近点！
pridej_se_musim_se_pridat_JF8G
Everything has been agreed with Menhard. Now he's waiting for me to get ready so we can take on the Kuttenbergers.
我已与门哈德就相关事宜达成共识，现在他将等待我做好与库滕堡人较量的准备。
pridej_se_musim_se_pridat_Z1AX

Everything has been settled with Menhard, he's none the wiser and now he's waiting for me to get ready so the duels can start. I'll pretend to join him but I'll help the Kuttenbergers to win the duels, as agreed with Emmeram the butcher.
我已与门哈德就相关事宜达成共识，他对事态的真相也毫不知情，正等待着我做好开始决斗的准备。届时，我将假意与他们一同战斗，但在决斗中我会暗中协助库滕堡人赢得胜利，这便是我与屠夫艾默拉姆之间的约定。
prihlas_s_dostal_jsem_svy_EnT9
I got my thirty pieces of silver for helping to uncover a criminal conspiracy and then helping to eliminate it. I may have helped my enemy Sigmund, but I got money out of it, so what of it...
因揭开一场犯罪阴谋，并协助将其扼杀在摇篮里，我得到了30枚银币。或许我帮到了我的敌人西格斯蒙德，但既然能从中获利，那又何妨......
prihlas_s__pomohl_jsem_od_V8hK

I helped uncover a criminal conspiracy and then helped with eliminating it. But I didn't get any reward for it though, because I also eliminated the person that was supposed to give it to me. I'll kill whoever I want, mwahahaha!
我揭开了一场犯罪阴谋，并协助将其扼杀在摇篮里。但事后我并没有得到任何回报，因为那个本该给我提供报酬的人也栽在了我手里。我爱杀谁就杀谁，哈哈哈哈！
prihlas_s_za_odhaleni_zlo_H4Ib
I am to be rewarded for uncovering a criminal conspiracy and helping to eliminate it! I should stop by and get it.
因揭开一场犯罪阴谋，并协助将其扼杀在摇篮里，我将受到嘉奖！我得前去领取那份报酬。
prijd_na__na_vecerni_pora_4CGZ
At our meeting this evening, Zizka will tell us more about his plan.
杰式卡会在今晚的会议中向我们透露更多与计划相关的细节。
prijd_na__pozdeji_na_vece_yrPi
In the evening, Zizka assigned us tasks. If our attack is to work, there can't be an actual attack! We have to sneak into the castle. The cannon will be ready in case something goes wrong.
杰式卡在夜晚的会议中给我们安排了任务。要想让我们的计划奏效，便不可正面进攻！我们得悄悄潜入城堡，若有变故，那台火炮会派上用场。
prijd_ran_zapomnel_jsem_n_YUFH
I didn’t finish the miners’ procession and forever forgot about the Striped Tonies and their traditions.
我没有看完矿工的游行仪式，也将“条纹托尼”和他们的传统活动忘得一干二净。
prijd_zit_kdyz_jsem_rano__s7QU

The miners' tradition of consecrating a ceremonial standard always precedes the annual shooting competition. I promised foreman Vlach to help the miners with their traditional procession. Early in the morning I was supposed to meet my friends the Striped Tonies at the Church of St. John the Baptist in Hoprink.
每当年度射击竞赛来临之前，矿工们总会为仪式旗杆进行祝圣，这历来也是他们的传统，而我也答应了领班弗拉赫将会在他们的传统游行中提供帮助。我本该在清晨时分前往霍普林克的施洗者圣约翰教堂，与那些“条纹托尼”的兄弟们见面。
prijd_zit_mam_prijit_hned_WTjd

The miners' tradition of consecrating a ceremonial standard always precedes the annual shooting competition. I promised foreman Vlach to help the miners with their traditional procession. I'm to come tomorrow morning to the Church of St. John the Baptist in Hoprink and talk to Anton and Franzi.
每当年度射击竞赛来临之前，矿工们总会为一面仪式性旗帜进行祝圣，这历来也是他们的传统。我答应了领班弗拉赫将会在他们的传统游行中提供帮助，所以得在明天早晨前往霍普林克的施洗者圣约翰教堂，与安东和弗兰齐见面。
prijezdna_bez_na_audienci_o6pe
Go to the banquet hall for the audience.
去宴会厅觐见侯爵。
prijezdna_jdi_se_navecere_dzzV
Talk to Lord Pisek in the banquet hall.
在宴会厅与皮塞克领主交谈。
prijezdna_jdi_si_odpocino_ulWQ
Go and get some sleep.
去小睡片刻。
prijezdna_najdi_zizku_EzOH
Find Zizka.
找到杰式卡。
prijezdna_nasleduj_zizku__VB18
Follow Zizka and Katherine.
跟随杰式卡和凯瑟琳。
prijezdna_pred_spanim_se__8IAn
Have a bath before going to bed.
睡前洗浴。
prijezdna_promluv_si_s_ka_gMQz
Talk to Katherine about the duel.
和凯瑟琳谈谈决斗的事。
prijezdna_utkej_se_s_hejt_SzLJ
Duel with the guard.
与警卫决斗。
prijmi_vy_souhlasil_jsem__Byld
I've accepted Zavish's challenge. If I beat him, I'll win back Jezhek's horse and kit.
我接受了扎维什的挑战。如果打败了他，我就能赢回杰泽克的马和装备。
prijmi_vy_zavis_by_mi_dal_25XE
He offered to let me win them back from him in knightly combat though. A duel like that is nothing to take lightly. I should really be sure before I accept Zavish's challenge.
但他提出让我通过骑士战斗从他手里赢回它们。这样的决斗不能轻视。在接受扎维什的挑战之前，我必须胸有成竹。
prijmi_vy_zavis_z_garbowa_W5Rd
Zavish of Garbow is dead, and the chance of a duel has died with him.
加博的扎维什死了，决斗的机会不复存在。
prines_ce_neprinesl_jsem__JRgu
I didn’t bring the bouquet in time, and the Striped Tonies finished their procession without me. They probably thought I’d given up on helping them.
我没能及时带来花束，条纹托尼他们在没有我帮助的情况下完成了游行。可能他们以为我放弃帮他们的忙了。
prines_ko_jo_tak_ne_kovar_LJ5q
The blacksmith ordered one horseshoe from me for Kabat, the local groom, telling me to show him my work first so I don't disgrace him.
铁匠让我为当地的马夫卡巴特打造一套马蹄铁，还要我锻造完毕后先向他展示成品，免得让他难堪失望。
prines_ko_kovaruv_napad_n_c9vA

The blacksmith's plan for replenishing our ammunition involves collecting all the unneeded iron in the fortress and reforging it. I need to find all the nails, old horseshoes, and other scrap metal no one needs. Of course, we don't want to melt down weapons or armour.
铁匠计划把堡垒里所有不需要的铁收集起来，然后重新熔炼出弹药。我需要找到所有钉子，旧马蹄铁和所有没人要的废铁。当然，我们不能把武器和盔甲熔掉。
prines_ko_kovaruv_napad_n_VfMn
The blacksmith's plan for replenishing our ammunition supplies involves reforging old iron into arrows and balls. I collected loads of scrap metal, so now we have plenty of ammunition.
铁匠计划把废铁重新熔炼成箭头和弹药。我收集了大量废铁，现在弹药充足了。
prines_ko_prines_podkovy__VX14

The blacksmith ordered a horseshoe from me for Kabat, the local groom. Once I've forged it, I have to take it to him and show him. Everything I need should be in the chest in the forge. It's clear he doesn't have much faith in my smithing skills.
铁匠让我为当地的马夫卡巴特打造一套马蹄铁，待锻造完毕后，我还得拿给他看看。我所需要的一切材料就在铁匠铺的箱子里。显然，他对我的锻造技艺并不放心。
prines_kr_krysa_by_rada_z_VPob

Rat would like to get the seal of dead mine owner Hanuman Rot. The rich mine owner died without an heir so his property was divided up between the church, the city and King Sigismund. A cleverly forged contract with a genuine seal could, however, change a lot in favour of the Guild.
家财万贯的矿主哈奴曼·罗特因后继无人，去世以后他的财产便被教会、市议会以及国王西格斯蒙德一一瓜分，而他生前拥有的一枚印章也成了“耗子”觊觎已久的物件，毕竟将其贴在一份巧妙伪造的合约上将会使公会大获裨益。
prines_kr_ziskal_jsem_pro_yAjh
Mine owner Rot's tomb has been looted. Someone beat me to it! The signs point to the gravedigger, since those jugs of brandy could hardly have been left here by anyone else.
矿主罗特的坟墓已被洗劫一空，有人赶在我之前来过了这里！但一切迹象都指向了那位掘墓人，不然还会有谁把那些白兰地酒壶留在这种地方呢？
prines_lo_donesl_jsem_lou_Vdl6

I brought the would-be bards the lute, but disaster struck when it was broken almost immediately by a drunkard... A couple of scratches wouldn't matter, but what's worse is that all the strings snapped.
我将鲁特琴交给两位准吟游诗人，但不幸的是，一个醉鬼几乎当场将它打坏了…留下几处划痕并不要紧，但糟糕的是所有琴弦都断了。
prines_lo_mam_loutnu_mich_BfMj
George and Michael are sure to be thrilled with the lute. I should take it to them.
乔治和迈克尔一定会为这把鲁特琴激动不已。我应该将它交给他们。
prines_lo_todo_EpRM
I brought the lute to the aspiring minstrels, only for it to be broken almost immediately by some drunken lout. The few scratches on the wood don't matter much, but all the strings have been snapped!
我把鲁特琴带给了那些踌躇满志的吟游诗人，结果几乎在刹那间，一个醉汉就将其损坏。琴身上多出的几道划痕虽无伤大雅，但所有琴弦却已尽数断毁！
prines_ma_donaset_nejake__T2tg
Bringing the horseshoes to Martha is pointless now.
现在已没必要再将马蹄铁交给玛尔塔。
prines_ma_marta_zena_misk_Q9XU

Martha, the wife of the Miskowitz blacksmith, needs help because they can't manage on their own. I agreed to give them a hand. After all, I'm the stepson of a blacksmith! I have to bring her two sets of horseshoes. I can make them in their smithy.
米斯科维茨的铁匠之妻玛尔塔需要帮助，他们面临着无法亲手搞定的麻烦，而我同意向他们施以援手，毕竟我可是一名铁匠的继子！他们需要两套马蹄铁，我可以在他们的铁匠铺里进行打造。
prines_ma_marta_zena_misk_U60T

Martha, the wife of the Miskowitz blacksmith, needs some help because they can't manage on their own. As a blacksmith's stepson, I agreed, and I have to bring her two sets of horseshoes. I happen to have some with me. I can offer them to her, or alternatively, make new ones
米斯科维茨的铁匠之妻玛尔塔需要帮助，他们面临着无法亲手搞定的麻烦。作为一名铁匠的继子，我同意给他们提供两套马蹄铁。现在我身上正好就有，我可以直接交给他们，或是为他们打造全新的马蹄铁。
prines_ma_musim_pro_martu_Z3gj
I have to get two sets of horseshoes somewhere for Martha.
我得到别处去给玛尔塔弄到两套马蹄铁。
prines_ma_podkovy_jsem_ma_n0mg
I handed the horseshoes to Martha, and that was the end of it. Originally, she wanted them for a local girl, Victoria, but unfortunately, she recently passed away.
我将马蹄铁交给了玛尔塔，一切便也到此为止。起初，她是在替当地一个叫维多利亚的姑娘寻找马蹄铁，但遗憾的是，那个姑娘最近刚刚离世。
prines_ma_podkovy_ktere_p_CMDq
I already have horseshoes so I can just give them to Martha.
我已经弄到了马蹄铁，所以可以把它们交给玛尔塔了。
prines_ma_prinesl_jsem_ma_gIDQ
I brought the horseshoes to the wife of the Miskowitz blacksmith, as she requested.
按照米斯科维茨的铁匠之妻的要求，我将马蹄铁交给了她。
prines_mi_loutna_kterou_j_8gf2
I've got the lute strings, now I just have to deliver them!
我拿到了鲁特琴弦，现在只需要把它们带过去即可！
prines_mi_sehnal_jsem_str_pMLV
I got the strings, the lute is whole again.
我弄到了琴弦，如今鲁特琴也已完好如初。
prines_ps_suchy_cert_se_z_lpuc
The Dry Devil mentioned the meat would be best used to cook soup, so that everyone gets some. I can bring him the meat, and he can cook the soup.
酒鬼海尼克说过狗肉最好用来炖汤，这样大家人人有份。我得把狗肉带给他炖汤。
prines_ps_z_psiho_masa_js_PWMH
Me and the Dry Devil made soup out of the dog meat. Everyone will get a little. I got a ration for myself and Capon.
我和酒鬼海尼克将弄到的狗肉炖成了汤，大家人人有份，而我也为卡蓬和自己留了一点。
prines_va_neni_to_sice_pr_LztG
It's not actually the sword that once belonged to Valentine, but I think the young knight will be pleased with the replica I forged. I should bring it to him.
尽管这并非那把真正属于瓦伦丁爵士的佩剑，但是我相信那个年轻骑士也会喜欢上这把由我锻造而出的佩剑赝品的。我得将这把仿制剑交给他。
prines_va_odnesl_jsem_kop_FgV2
I took a replica of Valentine's sword to the young knight, but everything was not as it seemed. A devious trafficker tried to dupe me.
我将那把仿制剑交给了那个年轻骑士，但是事情并非我所预想的那样。竟有个狡诈的黑心商人试图欺诈我。
prines_zd_kovar_zdimir_te_jZMI
Now Zdimir the blacksmith must take my and Matthias' swords and decide which of them is better and who won the competition. I hope he rules fairly.
现在，铁匠兹迪米尔必须拿上我和马蒂亚斯的剑，评判哪把剑更好，谁赢得了比赛。我希望他能公平裁决。
prines_zd_zdimir_si_prohl_SY53
Zdimir inspected both swords and chose the better of the two.
兹迪米尔审视两把剑，选择出更好的那把。
prines_zl_kdysi_krasny_ce_RnrK
The once beautiful guild sword is in two pieces. I should tell Menhard.
这把昔日精美的行会剑已然一分为二，我得将此事告诉门哈德。
prines_zl_menhart_je_mrtv_aZhh
Menhard is dead, that sword would be useless to him now.
门哈德已经死了，现在那把剑对他来说也失去了意义。
prines_zl_prinesl_jsem_me_N4RN
I brought Menhard the broken sword.
我将断剑交给了门哈德。
priprav_s_abych_se_mohl_s_PJVK

He offered to let me win them back from him in knightly combat. To clash with him, I'll have to prepare a polearm, a long sword, a shield and a one-handed weapon to go with it. I have to put down a nice pile of groschen as a deposit too, and it certainly wouldn't hurt to have some proper armour.
但他提出，我可以通过骑士战斗，从他手中赢回它们。为了和他作战，我得准备一把长柄武器、一把长剑、一面盾牌和一把单手武器。我还得准备一大笔格罗申作为押金，当然还需要合适的盔甲。
priprav_s_do_tabora_doraz_GrOL
Sigismund's executioner, Stibor of Stiborzitz, has arrived at the camp to investigate Chertan's murder. I have to gather evidence fast and tell Katz what I've found.
为调查牵涉赫尔坦的谋杀案件，西格斯蒙德手下的侩子手，斯蒂博尔齐茨的斯蒂博尔已经抵达了营地。我得尽快搜集证据，并将自己的发现向卡茨汇报。
priprav_s_hejtman_zizka_m_toir

The first part of our plan to capture Sir Otto von Bergow is already complete. The Finger of God was hidden in The Devil's Den. Zizka wanted to reveal to us the second part of our plan, involving how to get into Maleshov castle, right before the attack.
我们捉拿奥托·冯·波尔高计划中的第一环已经完成，如今也已将“上帝之指”藏到了“魔窟”之中。在进攻马列索夫城堡之前，杰式卡想要向我们公布接下来的计划，其中也涉及攻入城堡的方法。
priprav_s_je_nejvyssi_cas_wgut
It's high time to set off. I should report to Dry Devil.
是时候出发了，我得向“酒鬼”汇报。
priprav_s_k_souboji_na_dr_6wwd
Maybe I should get fixed up at the local bathhouse before the next fight.
也许我应该在下次战斗前去当地浴场修整一下自己。
priprav_s_musim_se_co_nej_Iu9d
I need to prepare as quickly as possible to defend Musa in court. Time is running out, and Sigismund’s executioner will be here soon. He’ll definitely be here within two days of Chertan’s death!
我需要尽快做好准备，以在法庭上为穆萨辩护。时间不多了，西格斯蒙德的刽子手很快就会来到这里。他肯定会在赫尔坦死后没两天就赶来！
priprav_s_nakonec_jsem_je_STe6
In the end, I solved Jezhek's problem without a fight.
最后，我不用决斗就解决了杰泽克的问题。
priprav_s_nekdo_vypacil_d_xBE0
Someone pried open the door to the camp's black powder storage. And on the very same night that Chertan was stabbed? I’d bet my life that it’s connected.
就在赫尔坦遇害当晚，有人曾撬开营地黑火药库的门？我敢打赌这其中必有关联。
priprav_s_o_grozavovi_se__7CV6
It’s common knowledge that Grozav hated Chertan. Maybe enough for to kill him?
众所周知，格罗扎夫对赫尔坦怀恨在心，或许这种恨意足以成为谋杀的动机？
priprav_s_pred_utokem_na__lKqb

We've already completed the first stage of our plan to capture Sir Otto von Bergow. We'll hide the Finger of God in The Devil's Den. It'll come in handy. Now, we must get ready to attack Maleshov Castle and then report to Zizka.
我们已经完成了捉拿奥托·冯·波尔高计划中的第一环，也将要把“上帝之指”藏到“魔窟”里，届时它会派上用场。而现在，我们必须做好进攻马列索夫城堡的准备，事后再向杰式卡进行汇报。
priprav_s_sehnal_jsem_vse_1Jcn
I've got all my gear together and enough money. I can tell Zavish I'm ready to fight.
我已经准备好了所有装备和大量的钱。我可以告诉扎维什我已经做好战斗准备。
priprav_s_slavnostni_uvit_0rHQ
We need to prepare well. For me, that means dressing up in the clothes of a member of the legate's retinue and learning the basics of Italian.
我们得做足准备。我的任务就是穿上特使随从的衣物，并学习一些基础意大利语。
priprav_s_slavnostni_uvit_HfKp
As soon as I'm ready to leave, I'm to report to Godwin.
做好准备以后，我就得告诉古德温。
priprav_s_soud_s_musou_za_7wPq
Musa's trial is starting. It's now or never!
针对穆萨的审判已经开始，万万不可错过时机！
priprav_s_stepan_vrana_se_JEqB
Stephen Crow may look innocent, but something doesn’t add up in his testimony.
斯蒂芬·克劳似乎是无辜的，但他的证词似乎难以站住脚跟。
priprav_s_stepan_vrana_u__BZXs
Stephen Crow didn’t have any poison on him, but his tent is full of things from which a poison could be brewed...
斯蒂芬·克劳身上没有毒药，但他的帐篷里却遍地都是可以制作毒药的材料……
priprav_s_v_cherthanove_s_5Lt7
In Chertan’s tent, I found a debt note showing that Grozav owed Chertan a lot of money. Could he have killed him to avoid paying the debt?
我在赫尔坦的帐篷里找到了一张借条，其上表明格罗扎夫欠了赫尔坦大笔钱财。格罗扎夫是否会为了逃避债务而杀害赫尔坦？
priprav_s_velitel_tabora__R7yk
The camp leader, Grozav of Borumlaca, is a passionate dice player. He’s already lost over half of his estates. But is that enough to make him start stealing and murdering?
营地的头领，博鲁姆拉卡的格罗扎夫，是个狂热的骰子玩家，他已经赌光了自己一半的资产。这会是让他开始偷盗和谋杀的理由吗？
priprav_s_v_grozavove_sta_TKuo
In Grozav’s tent, there are a lot of herbs from which a poison could easily be brewed.
格罗扎夫的帐篷里有许多可用于制作某种毒药的草药。
priprav_s_v_kapse_stepana_Wxx4
In Stephen Crow’s pocket, I found a very strange note. It talks about a house with pepper and expendable people. Normal people don’t carry things like that!
我在斯蒂芬·克劳的口袋里发现了一张十分古怪的纸条，字条上谈及了“胡椒屋”和“可牺牲的人”。正常人谁会带着这种东西呢！
priprav_s_v_truhle_stepan_csEK
In Stephen Crow’s chest, I found a fortune! Where could he have got so much money? Something’s not right here...
我在斯蒂芬·克劳的箱子里发现了一大笔钱财！他从哪儿弄来那么多钱的？其中必有蹊跷……
priprav_s_vypadam_jako_vl_7uPm
I looked like an Italian, I talked (almost) like an Italian. Now just to go to the Italian Court.
我看起来就像意大利人，说着（还算）标准的意大利语。现在，该去一趟意大利宫了。
priprav_s_zavis_je_po_smr_x22s
Zavish is dead. Our duel won't happen.
扎维什已经死了。我们不用决斗了。
priprav_s_zrovna_ve_chvil_qqHp
Just when I found the bloodied dagger, I noticed that Stephen Crow had lost his own dagger. What a coincidence...
我才刚找到那把带血的匕首，就发现斯蒂芬·克劳弄丢了自己的匕首。真是太巧了……
prisoner___event_caption_CK5F
Beggar
乞丐
prisoner___event_caption_gLoy
Nobleman
贵族
prisoner___event_descript_hqOM
On the road ahead you see a man in fine clothes riding a horse. He has a small retinue with him. You get the feeling you've seen him before somewhere.
就在前方的道路上，一个穿着得体之人正骑着马前行，身旁还围绕着一小队随从，而你却对他有种似曾相识的感觉。
prisoner___event_descript_jqAr
You see a sparsely dressed man on the road ahead. At first sight he looks tired, but he has a determined expression on his face.
就在道路前方，一个衣衫褴褛之人映入你的眼帘。你一眼便看出了他的疲惫，但他脸上的神情却尤为坚毅。

Nobleman
贵族
prisoner___player_caption_iFYE
Beggar
乞丐
prisoner___player_descrip_MKYd
On the road ahead you see a man in fine clothes riding a horse. He has a small retinue with him. You get the feeling you've seen him before somewhere.
就在前方的道路上，一个穿着得体之人正骑着马前行，身旁还围绕着一小队随从，而你却对他有种似曾相识的感觉。
prisoner___player_descrip_sXfu
You see a sparsely dressed man on the road ahead. At first sight he looks tired, but he has a determined expression on his face.
就在道路前方，一个衣衫褴褛之人映入你的眼帘。你一眼便看出了他的疲惫，但他脸上的神情却尤为坚毅。
privolej__na_radu_muze_pr_kYIa
More guards from the Court could come to the Council. Godwin just needs to ask Jerome Naaz for more security.
应该还能让更多守卫从意大利宫前往议会处，古德温只需让杰罗姆·纳兹加强安保。
privolej__pozadal_o_posil_tUv2
Godwin asked for more security and just like that, there were two less men at the Court.
古德温提出了加强安保的要求，正因如此，宫殿内又少了两个守卫。
prober_s__katerina_byla_s_slF7
Katherine was satisfied with how the entire investigation went.
凯瑟琳对调查的结果很是满意。
prober_s__katerina_nebyla_yshw
Katherine was not satisfied with how the entire investigation went.
凯瑟琳对调查的结果很不满意。
prober_s__musim_si_s_kate_cjZu
I have to talk to Katherine about the entire case and wrap it up.
我得跟凯瑟琳谈论整个案件经过并以此结案。
prober_s__probral_jsem_vs_WjyO
I discussed everything I learned in the mines with Christian. It was clear the trail of stolen silver leads to the smelter.
我与克里斯蒂安讨论了一切我在矿场里发现的事。可以肯定的是，与被盗白银有关的踪迹就指向冶炼厂。
prober_s__vypada_to_ze_z__gXkQ
Looks like there's a trail of stolen silver leading from the mines to the smelter. I should discuss it with Christian.
似乎有条与被盗白银相关的踪迹从矿产内引向冶炼厂，我应该与克里斯蒂安好好商讨此事。
probij_se_musime_skrz_DgTn
Now let's quickly get to the synagogue and out of town!
现在赶快前往犹太教堂，然后离开城镇！
probij_se_posledni_zastav_cCps
We're only one house away from the synagogue. I must fight my way through!
距离犹太教堂仅有一户之遥，我必须杀过去！
probud_st_strazny_na_bran_bT63
The guard at the gate is sleeping so deeply, I think the only thing that might wake him is a slap in the face.
门口的守卫睡死过去了，我想唯有一记耳光能唤醒他。
probud_st_strazny_na_bran_vWqD
The guard at the gate fell asleep so I had to wake him.
门口的守卫睡着了，我只好叫醒他。
procvis_s_nejdriv_me_vask_nKBd
First, Tomcat showed me an easy trick, and when he saw I had no trouble with it, he taught me a real technique as well.
公猫首先向我展示了一个简单的招式，在发现我能够熟练驾驭之后，他又教了我一个实用的招式。
procvis_s_vasko_na_me_poc_UCXe
Tomcat will wait for me in the local arena, where we can practice swordfighting.
公猫会在本地竞技场等我，我们会在那里练习剑术。
prohledej_cesta_pratelske_PGzh
The path of friendly conversation has failed. Havel has an office in the tavern, I could go have a look around.
友好交谈以失败告终。哈维尔在酒馆里有一间工作间，我可以去看一看。
prohledej_jelikoz_cesta_p_U8Dg
Because the path of friendly conversation had failed, I set out to do some exploration of my own. My first target was Havel's ledger, which could tell me what the monastery secret is all about.
由于友好交谈以失败告终，我打算自行探索一番。我的第一个目标是哈维尔的账本，里面应该记述着修道院的秘方。
prohledej_mel_bych_vokrak_1bWt
I should search Volkmar to see if he had any evidence on him.
我得对沃尔克马尔进行搜身，看看他身上是否有什么证据。
prohledej_musa_nejspis_ch_VUfj
Musa most likely didn't kill Chertan, but I should search his tent even so to see if there's any poison there.
穆萨不太可能是杀害赫尔坦的凶手，不过我还是得搜查他的营地，看看里面是否存放着什么毒药。
prohledej_musim_prohledat_bSaX
I have to search the inner part of the fortress and find Olda Semine.
我必须搜索堡垒内部，找到奥达·塞米。
prohledej_musim_prohledat_Yz5B
I have to search Hynek's body and find the parchment he showed Hog before he died.
我必须搜索海尼克的尸体，找到他死前给霍格看的羊皮纸。
prohledej_myslim_ze_uz_to_Ac3k
I think that's all I'll find here. I should go back and report to Katz.
估计能找到的就这么多了，我也该回去向卡茨汇报了。
prohledej_nahlasil_jsem_k_bsTT
I reported what I found to Katz.
我将我的发现都告诉了卡茨。
prohledej_nasel_jsem_mist_kDic
I found a place where bandits recently ambushed someone. It's in Matthew's band's turf, so it may have been them. I found some clues, maybe they will lead me to them.
我在马修一伙人的地盘上发现了一处埋伏点，近期就有强盗于此伏击路人，或许马修就是罪魁祸首。我发现了一些线索，没准能指引我找到他们。
prohledej_nasel_jsem_mist_tH82
I found a place where bandits recently ambushed someone. It's in Matthew's band's turf, so it may have been them. Maybe I can find something that will lead me to them.
我在马修一伙人的地盘上发现了一处埋伏点，近期就有强盗于此伏击路人，或许马修就是罪魁祸首，说不定我还能发现与他们下落有关的线索。
prohledej_nepovedlo_se_mi_LEMX
I didn't manage to examine young Hendl's room, so we remained without any evidence.
我没能搜查小亨德尔的房间，因此还是没能找到任何证据。
prohledej_oldricha_jsem_z_hpBj
I decided to hand Olda over to Hashek who decided to punish him like all the other traitors, with death.
我决定将奥达交给哈舍克，后者决意要像惩罚其他叛徒那样处死奥达。
prohledej_p_nasel_jsem_v__CTjd
I found Marika's scarf in her tent. If I have at least some idea where she could be, Mutt could help me search for her.
我在玛丽卡的帐篷里找到了她的围巾。要是我多少能知道点她的位置，狗子应该能帮我找到她。
prohledej_prohledal_jsem__bbeP
I searched the tent of Adalbert and Radovan. They don’t seem to have anything to do with Chertan's death.
我搜查了阿达尔贝特和拉多万的帐篷，看来他们与赫尔坦的死亡毫不相干。
prohledej_prohledal_jsem__RQfA
I searched Musa's tent. As expected, I didn't find anything that might link him to the murder.
我搜查了穆萨的帐篷。与预想如出一辙，我没有发现任何能证明他是凶手的证据。
prohledej_proledal_jsem_v_WpjQ
I searched the tower and I really did find Olda Semine. He was hiding at the top. He begged me to spare him, so his life is now in my hands.
我搜查了塔楼，果真找到了奥达·塞米。就躲在塔楼顶部的他恳求我手下留情，既然如此，那他的性命就掌握在我的手中。
prohledej_p_vajda_mi_rekl_YykT
I should search Marika's tent. Maybe I'll find something useful.
我得搜查玛丽卡的帐篷，说不定能找到些有用的东西。
prohledej_rozhodl_jsem_se_HAPX
I decided to spare Olda.
我决定放过奥达。
prohledej_s_lipoldem_a_ka_DUVq
Me, Katherine and Lumir agreed that young von Grolle is the most suspicious. But suspicion is not enough. We also needed some proof, which I found in his room - various locks of brown hair.
凯瑟琳、卢米尔和我都一致认为小冯·格罗尔是最大嫌疑人，但是仅凭猜测是不够的。为了寻找证据，我们在他的房间里发现了几撮棕色头发。
prohledej_s_lipoldem_a_ka_j1qG
Me, Katherine and Lumir agreed that young von Grolle is the most suspicious. But suspicion isn't enough. We need proof. We need to get into his house and examine his things. But how to get inside?
凯瑟琳、卢米尔和我都一致认为小冯·格罗尔是最大嫌疑人，但是仅凭猜测是不够的，所以还需要证据。我们得进入他的家里调查他的物件，但是该怎么进去呢？
prohledej_u_hynka_jsem_na_aEFH
I found some crumpled document on Hynek.
我在海尼克身上发现了一些皱巴巴的文件。
prohledej_vojtech_a_radov_T5gx
Adalbert and Radovan - the two guards who found the stabbed Chertan - are still suspected of murdering him. I should take a look in their tent to see if there's any poison there.
阿达尔贝特和拉多万，这两位发现赫尔坦被刺伤的守卫也涉嫌谋害了赫尔坦。我得搜查他们的帐篷，看看能否在里边找到毒药。
prohledej_vokrak_mel_u_se_Ulaj
Volkmar was carrying a map showing the location of a secret mint in the mined-out shaft near Old Kutna. It was obvious the trail of the stolen silver led from the smelter to there.
从沃尔克马尔身上取得的地图标明了一处秘密铸币厂的位置，此地就坐落在老库特纳附近早已绝矿的矿井里，那些与被盗白银有关的踪迹很明显就从冶炼厂通向那里。
prohledej_zatimco_jsme_se_8Aat
While I was talking to Katz and Musa, someone stabbed Chertan, the Cumans' commander. I was tasked with searching the area where it happened.
正当我与卡茨和穆萨交谈时，有人刺伤了库曼人的指挥官赫尔坦，而我受命前去搜查事故的发生点。
prohledni_mlada_mela_ehm__0Z2d
Mlada had an… accident, and she's with the Lord now. Her husband will probably reunite with her soon, but that's not my concern anymore.
姆拉达…咳咳…出事了，她现在与上帝同在了。他们夫妻可能很快就会团聚，但这已经不关我的事了。
prohledni_nabidl_jsem_ze__1gHJ

I examined Peter really closely and found that he was suffering from melancholy. The cause? The presence of Sigismund's army and the fear of death. His treatment is clear. A chamomile decoction to improve his sleep, and a bag of dried chamomile to soothe the mind. Peter needs to change his diet, I'll help him with that. I should also think of some words to give him hope. Naturally, I should not forget about a prayer. When I get everything ready and give it some thought, I'll go back to Peter.
我仔细检查了彼得的身体，发现他患有忧郁症。病因是什么？是他对波希米亚国王西格斯蒙德的军队和对死亡的恐惧。他的治疗方案显而易见。服用甘菊煎剂以改善他的睡眠，并用一袋干甘菊熬制剂。彼得需要改变饮食习惯，我会帮助他做到这一点。我还得想一些鼓舞人心的话语来开导他。当然，我不能忘记祈祷。待我准备好一切并认真思考之后，我就会回到彼得那里。
prohledni_nabidl_jsem_ze__2Mkh
He suddenly stopped eating and just lay in bed. I tried to examine him, but the illness confounded me and I didn't learn anything. I at least tried to not make it worse.
他突然停止进食并终日卧床。我试图为他做检查，但这种病让我十分困惑，我最终一无所获。我至少尝试了没有帮倒忙。
prohledni_nabidl_jsem_ze__IZ3o
He suddenly stopped eating and just lay in bed, which was caused by melancholy and a fear of the war. I tried to cure Peter's illness, and I hope the little I did helped.
他突然停止进食并成天卧床，这些都是忧郁症和对战争的恐惧引起的。我尝试医治彼得，希望为他尽一份绵薄之力。
prohledni_nabidl_jsem_ze__UpKH
He suddenly stopped eating and just lay in bed, which was caused by melancholy and a fear of the war. I tried to cure Peter's illness, but I'm afraid it might not have worked.
他突然停止进食并成天卧床，这些都是忧郁症和对战争的恐惧引起的。我尝试医治彼得，但恐怕收效甚微。
prohledni_nabidl_jsem_ze__yho9
He suddenly stopped eating and just lay in bed, which was caused by melancholy and a fear of the war. I tried to cure Peter's illness as best I could, and I have a feeling it might have worked.
他突然停止进食并成天卧床，这些都是忧郁症和对战争的恐惧引起的。我尽自己最大的努力医治彼得，我感觉可能会有效果。
prohledni_nabidl_jsem_ze__ztiZ

I examined Peter, but I didn't learn much. He suffers from an unnatural anxiety. As a treatment, I suggest a chamomile decoction to help him fall asleep, a change in diet, prayer, and it wouldn't hurt if I could think of some encouraging words to help him overcome his fears. As soon as I get everything ready, I'll return to Peter.
我给彼得做了检查，但并没有什么收获。他因为一种不正常的焦虑而备受折磨。为了治疗，我建议他服用甘菊熬制剂来助眠，改变饮食习惯并做祷告。如果我能想出一些鼓励的话来帮助他克服恐惧，那就更好了。待我准备好这一切，我就会回到彼得那里。
prohledni_nejdriv_ze_vseh_6wzg

I need to examine Peter first. That will certainly be easier if I ask the people who live with him about his illness, and carefully look for anything suspicious in the room where he's lying. There must be a reason why he suddenly stopped eating and lies in bed all day.
我得先检查一下彼得的身体。向与他同住之人询问其病情，并仔细检查他的房间是否存在可疑之处，那肯定会对治疗更有帮助。他突然停止进食并整天躺在床上一定是有原因的。
prohledni_petrovi_uz_neni_QrCV
There's no helping Peter now, for he's met his maker. May his soul rest in peace.
现在已经救不了彼得了，因为他已经归西了。愿他的灵魂安息。
prohledni_uz_je_to_nejaka_XgZ0
I offered to try and heal Peter, the husband of the farmer Mlada from Suchdol. Alas, I delayed the examination for too long, and in the end I didn't help Peter.
我主动提出帮助彼得，他是苏赫多尔农妇姆拉达的丈夫。可惜，我拖延了检查的时间，最终没能帮助彼得。
prohlidni_v_jedne_chalupe_0Vvs

In one of the cottages I found a wounded villager who was writhing in pain and delirious. I tried to talk to him, but he didn't even know I was there. So I examined him and found he had deep and infected wounds from a sword. I can clean them with some spirits. I can definitely dress them, so I'll need some bandages, then I can give him something for the pain, a drink or a potion. Then there's a chance I'll get something out of him.
我在村里的某户人家里发现了一位受伤的村民，疼痛不仅让他翻来覆去，也已让他变得神志不清。我试图跟他交流，可他甚至没有意识到我就在身边。我因此查看了他的伤势，发现他受了些很深的剑伤，且伤口已经感染。我可以是些烈酒清洗他的伤口，然后再为他包扎，但是得先找到些绷带，然后在给他弄来些止痛的东西，比如酒水或药剂。总之简单治疗过后才有可能跟他打探消息。
prohlidni_v_jedne_chalupe_5X1y

In one of the cottages I found a wounded villager who was writhing in pain and delirious. I tried to talk to him, but he didn't even know I was there. So I examined him, but I didn't find anything that could help him.
我在村里的某户人家里发现了一位受伤的村民，疼痛不仅让他翻来覆去，也已让他变得神志不清。我试图跟他交流，可他甚至没有意识到我就在身边。我查看了他的伤势，但是却无能为力。
prohlidni_v_jedne_chalupe_ikJO

In one of the cottages I found a wounded villager who was writhing in pain and delirious. I tried to talk to him, but he didn't even know I was there. So I examined him and found he had deep wounds from a sword. I can dress them, but I'll need some bandages, then I can give him something for the pain, a drink or a potion. Then maybe he'll come to for a moment and I can get something out of him.
我在村里的某户人家里发现了一位受伤的村民，疼痛不仅让他翻来覆去，也已让他变得神志不清。我试图跟他交流，可他甚至没有意识到我就在身边。我因此查看了他的伤势，发现他受了些很深的剑伤。我可以为他包扎，但是得先找到些绷带，然后在给他弄来些止痛的东西，比如酒水或药剂。简单治疗过后他或许能清醒一阵子，届时我才可以跟他打探消息。
prohlidni_v_jedne_chalupe_q6IJ

In one of the cottages I found a wounded villager who was writhing in pain and delirious. I tried to talk to him, but he didn't even know I was there. If I want to talk to him, I'll have to first examine him to see if I can help him.
我在村里的某户人家里发现了一位受伤的村民，疼痛不仅让他翻来覆去，也已让他变得神志不清。我试图跟他交流，可他甚至没有意识到我就在身边。如果想要跟他交谈，我得先检查他的伤势，看看是否能够帮到他。
prohlidni_v_jedne_chalupe_S5kz

格兰德冶炼厂的老板正是布雷斯，我得去跟他谈一谈。克里斯蒂安写了一封介绍信，信中将我塑造成了一名对冶炼工艺颇有兴致的贵族。届时，布雷斯应该就会允许我进入本该是禁区的地方。但我既然是个“贵族”，倘若打扮不够得体，布雷斯是不会跟我交谈的。
promluv_s_hute_v_grunte_v_Fujh
The Grund smelter is owned by Buresh. I put on some suitably fine clothes and introduced myself to him as a nobleman interested in smelting operations. He let me take a look round his works.
格兰德冶炼厂的老板正是布雷斯，穿上得体衣裳的我向他介绍了自己“贵族”的身份，还表达了自身对冶炼工艺的浓厚兴趣，他也同意了让我参观他的工厂。
promluv_s_i_se_mnou_chce__Clbc

After his conversation with Capon, Hanush wanted a word with me as well. He told me he intended to marry Capon to Jitka of Kunstadt and charged me with taking care of it when the time comes. Lord Capon didn't look too happy.
瀚纳什在与卡蓬结束交谈后也跟我谈了一会儿。他说他打算让卡蓬与库斯塔特的吉特卡结婚，并希望我能看准时机促成这门婚事，但是卡蓬大人似乎并不乐意。
promluv_s_jakmile_jsme_do_SV3C

Once we finished the fight, we conferred on what to do next. We unanimously agreed that the bandits we'd eliminated were most likely an advance patrol. After all, the goods still hadn't been found, so we continued on.
战斗一结束，我们就开始商讨下一步怎么做。我们一致认为我们消灭的强盗很可能是先遣巡逻队。不管怎么说，货物还没有找到，所以我们继续前进。
promluv_s_janek_a_jarosla_yRAd
Janek and Jaroslav are on guard duty in the inner courtyard. If I want to choose one of them for the raid, I'll probably find them by the gate.
雅内克和雅罗斯洛夫正在内庭院站岗，若想选择他们中的一人参加突袭，去大门那里就能找到他们。
promluv_s_janek_ze_skalic_I9l6
Janek of Skalitz joined the Devil to attack the Praguers.

雅罗斯洛夫是斯卡里茨的一名守卫，也是拉德季·科比拉最忠诚的手下。我应该派他去突袭吗？
promluv_s_jeden_z_tech_kd_Xk8h

The man responsible for checking the volumes of outgoing ore is ore merchant Hermann, he's the one checking ore quality and determining the price. I should pressure him into revealing who's behind the fraud.
负责检查矿石产出量的人就是矿石商人赫尔曼，他不仅要负责查验矿石质量，还会对其进行定价。我得说服他揭露那起欺诈事件的背后真凶。
promluv_s_jenik_mi_prozra_ASQp
Hensel told me, Andrew had taken the thunderstone from him and sold it to a woman named Mlada down Suchdol way.

promluv_s_je_po_boji_mel__49yv

Emmeram was thrilled with the way we outsmarted Menhard and rewarded me accordingly. As promised, Emmeram also arranged for me to be allowed to train swordfighting in the hall and Master Nicholas agreed to take me on as his student.
对于我们成功智取门哈德一事，艾默拉姆尤为兴奋，并给了我一份相应的报酬。按照约定，艾默拉姆还允许我在剑术馆内练习，而尼古拉斯大师也已同意收我为徒。

When I asked where I could find Adder now, the innkeeper sent me to the butcher's wife. He said she lives in the last cottage on the edge of Pschitoky, heading north from the village square. I reckon Adder was sticking his prick where it didn't belong.
就在我打探阿德尔下落的过程中，旅店老板让我去找屠夫的妻子。此妇人住在普西托克边上的最后一间屋子里，从村庄广场往北走就能找到。我猜，阿德尔大概是上错了别人的床。
promluv_s_kdyz_jsem_si_pr_f585

When I talked to Jurko, he said that a sober Moravian is far worse than a drunk Moravian. He makes a good point. There's plenty of drink, but it's not to their taste. They'd prefer the booze they brought along with them, but Lord Semine ordered it to be stored in the cellar and put under guard. I'll try to get my hands on it. I just hope I'm not making a mistake.
我和朱尔科交谈时，他说清醒的摩拉维亚人可比喝醉了的摩拉维亚人难对付多了。他说得很有道理。宴会上酒水多得是，但都不合他们的口味。他们更想喝自己带来的酒，但塞米大人早已下令将那些酒安置于地窖中并严加看管。我得想办法弄到它们，但愿此举不会招致祸端。
promluv_s_kdyz_jsem_si_pr_PuWA

When I talked to Jurko, he said that a sober Moravian is far worse than a drunk Moravian. He makes a good point. There's plenty of drink, but it's not to their taste. They'd prefer the booze they brought along with them, but Lord Semine ordered it to be stored in the cellar and put under guard. As fortune had it, I had their booze with me, so we had a drink and that was that.
我和朱尔科交谈时，他说清醒的摩拉维亚人可比喝醉了的摩拉维亚人难对付多了。他说得很有道理。宴会上酒水多得是，但都不合他们的口味。他们更想喝自己带来的酒，但塞米大人早已下令将那些酒安置于地窖中并严加看管。幸运的是，我取得了那些酒水，还与他们开怀畅饮了起来。

promluv_s_kdyz_rychtar_us_rsW1

promluv_s_konecne_je_cas__Up69
It's finally time to speak to the hermit. I'd like to know what actually happened here and, above all, where that bloody sword is.
终于可以与隐士谈话了。我想知道这里究竟发生了什么，最重要的是，那把该死的剑在哪里。
promluv_s_konrad_mi_popsa_CBD0

I've got caught up in a strange case. Ambrose the old hermit died shortly after Konrad the knight turned up. He buried his friend and then pretended to be him because he needed time to fulfil his last wish, and what's more, needed to give his murderers the slip. That's because Konrad, an investigator from the Knights of the Cross with the Red Star, had uncovered scheming by the Inquisition, who had Olbram III of Shkvoretz, the Archbishop of Prague, murdered a year ago. Konrad confided in his Grand Master Zdenyek, who was also involved in the case. The Grand Master decided to get rid of the troublesome witness, and sent some brethren from the order to silence Konrad for good.

我被卷入了一个奇怪的案件。骑士康拉德出现后不久，老隐士安布洛斯就死了。他埋葬了自己的朋友，然后假装成他的样子，因为他需要时间来实现他朋友的遗愿，更重要的是，他需要躲过杀手们的追踪。因为康拉德是红星十字骑士团的调查员，他发现了宗教法庭的阴谋，他们在一年前谋杀了布拉格大主教什科雷茨的奥尔布拉姆三世。康拉德向他的大团长兹登耶克倾诉，兹登耶克也参与了此案。大团长决定除掉这个麻烦的证人，并从教会中派出几个教友，去暗杀康拉德。
promluv_s_konrad_uz_mi_ni_82tr
The dead hermit can't tell me anything more. I'll have to investigate another lead to find out where the broken sword is.
死去的隐士已经没有办法开口。我必须调查另一条线索，找出断剑的下落。
promluv_s_kozlik_byl_vybr_Rbr9
Kozliek was chosen for the raid. I could send Mikesh with him.
我选择派科兹⾥克参加突袭，也也可以派米凯什和他一起去。
promluv_s_kozlik_se_rad_v_NIIc
Kozliek is a betting man, but should I be betting his life on today's raid?
科兹⾥克是个赌徒，但我要拿他的命作今天突袭的赌注吗？
promluv_s_kratce_jsem_si__jiwD

我和格纳利简单聊了两句。毕竟，在猪圈里和贵族搏斗没那么简单，我也不想打破任何潜规则。
promluv_s_krejzl_mi_za_vy_kfZ9
Kreyzl gave me a reward for beating his hands, and revealed that there might be another opponent in the forests around Kopanina.
克雷泽奖励我打败了他的手下，并向我透露，在科帕尼那附近的森林里，可能还有一个对手。
promluv_s_krejzl_ziral_ze_y3jB
Kreyzl didn't expect me to beat the living daylights out of his hands, but in the end he was glad, because now he can send me to fight in his name in Zhelejov tavern.
克雷泽没想到我把他的手下打得落花流水，但最后他很高兴，因为现在他能够以他的名义派我去哲勒约夫酒馆参加搏斗。
promluv_s_kristian_si_cht_zt2x

Christian wanted to discuss the matter in private so we don't draw attention. He promised me his full support and presented me with a plan of investigation. Under the pretext of visiting the mines, I was to find out from the members of the three miner shifts how many corves of ore they had extracted on a certain day, the feast of St. Petronilla. That's the best way to know if the actual volume of the ore mined corresponds to what is written in the mine book.
为防止隔墙有耳，克里斯蒂安想与我进行私下讨论。他承诺会向我提供绝对的支持，还向我介绍了一项调查计划。依仗参观矿场的借口，我得从三个班次的矿工口中打探出他们在圣佩特罗尼拉纪念日那天开采了多少车矿石，这也是了解矿石实际开采量与矿场记录中的信息是否一致的最好办法。
promluv_s_kubenka_ma_z_mo_fiC6
Kubyenka is probably the most experienced man in my company. But do I want to risk sending someone like him on the raid?
库宾卡可能是连队里最有经验的人。但我敢派他这样的人去参加突袭吗？
promluv_s_kubenka_me_posl_B4Z2
Kubyenka sent me to Miskowitz to ask about Matthew, but before I could do that, the bailiff died.

promluv_s_kubenka_zije_ja_P0XI

Kunzlin Ruthard wasn't happy about me cowardly running away from the skirmish with Vavak's men, but he heard my plea. However, because of his difficult situation, he was reluctant to help me free Lord Capon just like that. He demanded something in return, as expected.
因为我在与瓦万克之间的冲突中临阵逃脱，昆兹林·鲁瑟德对我很是不满，但他仍然听取了我的诉求。只是，因为考虑到他当前的窘境，他不愿意就这样协助我营救卡蓬领主。如我所料，他希望自己能有所回报。
promluv_s_kunzlin_ruthard_IO1o
Rosa Ruthard recommended I seek the help of her family's friend Hashtal, the custodian of the Maleshov stud farm. But it didn't work out. I'll have to get by without his help.
罗莎·鲁瑟德提议让我向他们家族的朋友哈斯塔尔寻求帮助，他是马列索夫种马场的管事。可惜我未能如愿，不过，即使缺少他的帮助，我也得设法解决问题。
promluv_s_kunzlin_ruthard_mA8m

promluv_s_kunzlin_ruthard_PZlM
I'll need horses for Capon, so we can quickly escape once I free him.
我得为卡蓬准备马匹，如此一来，待我将其救出，我们便能立即逃离。

As a reward, Sir Kunzlin Ruthard told me about a secret passageway that leads to Maleshov. His daughter Rosa discovered it years ago and she'll also tell me how to find it. Then I'll use it to free Sir Hans!
作为奖励，昆兹林·鲁瑟德爵士告诉了我一条通往马列索夫的秘密通道。他的女儿罗莎几年前发现了它，她也会告诉我如何找到它。然后我将利用它来解救汉斯爵士！
promluv_s_kunzlin_ruthard_sKLZ
As a reward, Sir Kunzlin told me about a secret passageway that leads to Maleshov. I'll use it to free Sir Hans!
作为回报，昆兹林爵士告诉了我一条通往马列索夫的秘密通道。我将利用它来解救汉斯爵士！

I have to announce to the guard in front of Ruthard's palace that I'm bringing a message for the Lord of the manor. When Sir Kunzlin receives me, I'll tell him about Vavak's fraud and give him the book that confirms everything. Then he'll certainly help me to liberate Sir Hans Capon from the Maleshov fortress, as he promised.
我得向鲁瑟德宫殿前的卫兵宣布，我为庄园主人带了个信。当昆兹林爵士接待我时，我会告诉他瓦万克的欺诈行为，并把书作为证据交给他。然后他一定会履行自己的承诺，帮我把汉斯·卡蓬爵士从马列索夫堡垒中解救出来。
promluv_s_lichtenstejn_bo_av23
Liechtenstein explained to Godwin his plans for amending Jobst's proposal. However, it was necessary to secure the support of the influential lords present to make this happen.

promluv_s_lichtenstejn_ch_5XO7
Liechtenstein wanted Godwin to secure the support of three influential persons – Anna of Waldstein, Botschek of Kunstadt and Haman Alder. He'd surely like to hear that he succeeded.

Lumir was not satisfied with how we investigated those murders and it's true that I understood his displeasure…

promluv_s_mame_odbojovano_uu5P
The fight's over. Now it's time to talk to Michael about the outcome.

Jaroslav of Skalitz will go on the raid. After all, he's seen his fair share of combat.
斯卡里茨的雅罗斯洛夫将参加突袭，他毕竟身经百战。
promluv_s_na_zbytecne_kec_ieFQ
It appears this problem will not be solved by talking. But another way can certainly be found.
看来光靠嘴皮子是解决不了这个问题的，只能试试其它手段了。
promluv_s_na_zebraky_jsem_qHcL

I asked Tuma, the guard by the gate, about the beggars. He said that giving them some alms would help, maybe some kitchen scraps. Only the hawk-eyed cook was watching those. But I already had the scraps on me, so I gave them to him right away. Tuma threw them to the beggars behind the gate and then we had a drink.
我向大门口的守卫图马询问了应付那些乞丐的办法，他说给他们些施舍或许能够奏效，比如给些残羹剩饭。只是眼尖的厨师正盯着它们呢。不过正巧我身上就带着一些剩饭，所以当即将它们给了图马。图马将残羹剩饭抛给大门外的乞丐后，我俩一起喝了一杯。
promluv_s_na_zebraky_jsem_WRxW

I asked Tuma, the guard by the gate, about the beggars. He said giving them something to quiet their growing stomachs would help. I just happened to have some food on me, so I gave it to him. Tuma threw it to the beggars behind the gate and then we had a drink.
我向大门口的守卫图马询问了应付那些乞丐的办法，他说给他们一些吃的充饥或许可行。而我身上碰巧就带有些食物，便把它们给了图马。在他将食物抛给大门外的乞丐后，我俩一起喝了一杯。
promluv_s_na_zebraky_se_m_fcH8
I was told to ask the guard at the gate about the beggars as he had repeatedly tried to drive them off. Maybe he'll know what to do.
我受命向大门口的守卫打探乞丐之事，毕竟他已多次试图将他们驱离。或许他知道该做些什么。
promluv_s_nebezpeci_se_mi_Xic7

I managed to avert the danger by giving Hanka Svatava's inheritance, which I had already found, in exchange for Vendula's life. Svatava wasn't happy her inheritance ended up in the wrong hands, but in the end she was grateful I saved her daughter.
为了化解危机，我将找来的遗产交给了汉卡，以此换取芙恩德拉的性命。尽管斯瓦塔娅对于遗产落入贼人之手很是不甘，但她最终还是感激我救下了她的女儿。
promluv_s_nejak_jsem_se_s_MVEf
We had a falling out and it ended tragically for them.
我们之间产生了嫌隙，最终他们下场惨淡。
promluv_s_nejdriv_jsem_by_PklN
First I was sent to see Jerome, the vineyard caretaker. He told me what was expected of me, how much I'll get paid, and where I can sleep. Aside from that, he's a very peculiar fellow.
我首先被派去见葡萄园看守人杰罗姆。他告诉我我的工作要求，工钱多少以及在哪睡觉。除此之外，他是个奇怪的人。
promluv_s_nekdo_bude_neco_pvXB
The apparition of the devil is the talk of the village. I'm bound to be able to find some eyewitnesses.
村里人都在谈论魔鬼出没。我一定能找到一些目击者。
promluv_s_nemce_nevyhnali_Kq8q

I met master swordsman Menhard of Frankfurt and got involved in a sharp exchange between him and the Kuttenbergers, which ended with the Germans being expelled from the town. During the day, I should stop by to see Menhard at the Oak wagoner's inn outside the city walls. There, I might learn more about what I've gotten myself into.
我遇到了法兰克福的剑士门哈德，还卷入了他与库滕堡人的激烈纠纷之中，而这场纠纷却最终以德国人被赶出城镇而结束。我得去见门哈德一面，他就在城墙外橡树旁的那家酒馆里，届时，我或许也能对自己所卷入的事端更为了解。
promluv_s_nemohl_by_neco__RL2X
Might the tanner know something? About the collection of antlers in his attic, for instance?
或许皮匠知道点什么？比如那些收藏在他阁楼里的鹿角是怎么回事？
promluv_s_neni_divu_ze_o__gBSd
No wonder even the castle blacksmith heard about the devils. I will ask him about them.
怪不得连城堡的铁匠都听说了魔鬼的事，我得跟他了解一番。
promluv_s_neni_treba_se_t_uDwz
There's no need to hang around here. I'll tell Ignatius we can carry on.
现已经毫无在此逗留的必要，我得告知伊格内修斯是时候继续前行了。
promluv_s_nepovedlo_se_mi_wViA
I didn't manage to provide relief to old Gotzlin. I have to tell his wife Mandelina what to expect.
我没能缓解老哥特林的病痛，得将可能发生之事告知他的妻子曼德琳娜。
promluv_s_nepromluvil_jse_8ug4
I didn't speak to that minstrel William about the murdered girls, but if he had anything to do with it, then he is rightly burning in hell.
我没有去跟那位吟游诗人威廉谈论遇害女孩的事情，但是假如他的确与凶杀案有关，那他就真该下地狱去了。
promluv_s_nepromluvil_jse_kf1Q
I didn't speak with Katherine.
我没有和凯瑟琳交谈。
promluv_s_nikdy_jsem_vdov_NqcL
I never told the widow what happened to the remains of her admirer Jan.
我从未告诉这位寡妇她的仰慕者杨的遗体发生了什么。
promluv_s_no_tak_si_proml_Zhll
Well, I suppose we'll talk then. I'm curious what's on his mind.
好吧，我想我们应该谈谈。我很好奇他在想什么。
promluv_s_odchazime_z_hra_hxiG
As soon as we had everything, me and Godwin headed back into the cellars. I hope I never have to come back here again.
所有东西一到手，我和古德温就返回地窖。希望今后我再也不必回到此地。
promluv_s_odevzdal_jsem_s_cOPr

When the threat named Hanka was taken care of, I gave Svatava her inheritance, which I had already found in Mesoles. She was happiest about her ancestor figurine, a symbol of better times for her family. I hope it brings her luck.
在解决掉那个汉卡带来的麻烦以后，我把在梅索莱斯找到的家族遗产交给了斯瓦塔娅。对于能拿回家族世代相传的雕像，她感到惊喜万分，毕竟那个雕像承载了他们家族历来的美好时光，但愿它能够带来好运。
promluv_s_od_hospodskyho__2hdI

The innkeeper in Bylany told me that he used to play dice with the locals. So I went to see them, and they told me Ranyek was dead. That idiot tried to escape through the latrines after losing too much money again. But he never made it out.
比兰尼的旅店老板告诉我，拉涅克先前就与当地人一起玩过骰子，因此我去见了他们，也从而得知了拉涅克已死的消息。据说那个蠢货在输掉大笔钱以后，想从茅厕逃走，只不过他再也没有出来。
promluv_s_od_hospodskyho__FGue
The innkeeper in Bylany told me that he used to play dice with the locals. So I went to see them.
比兰尼的旅店老板告诉我，拉涅克先前就与当地人一起玩过骰子，因此我去见了他们。
promluv_s_od_hospodskyho__oYZx
The innkeeper in Bylany told me that he used to play dice with the locals. They should tell me more. But they won't because they're dead.
比兰尼的旅店老板告诉我，拉涅克先前就与当地人一起玩过骰子，他们应该能告诉我更多信息。但是计划最终泡汤，因为他们全都死了。
promluv_s_od_hospodskyho__qxSY
The innkeeper in Bylany told me that he used to play dice with the locals. They should tell me more. Every day, they play dice at the same table in the inn's yard.
比兰尼的旅店老板告诉我，拉涅克先前就与当地人一起玩过骰子，他们应该能告诉我更多信息。旅店院子里有一张桌子，那里便是他们每日不变的游戏场地。
promluv_s_od_hrobnika_jse_k8Zh
I didn't learn anything from the gravedigger, because he died. He was probably surprised it could happen to him, too. Or maybe he expected it. I don't know, I didn't get a chance to ask him…
掘墓人的死亡中断了我寻找线索的进程。他也许会讶异于自己也成了谋杀的对象，也或许他早有预见。总而言之，我连跟他说句话的机会都没有…
promluv_s_od_korenarky_js_mtM5

I found out from the herbalist what the herbs I found at Victoria's house are for. She said girls who are pregnant with an unwanted child use them to make a decoction. Maybe that explains what happened to Victoria.
我从草药师那里了解到了那些在维多利亚屋内发现的草药的用途。据说那些怀有身孕的姑娘如果不想生下肚中婴儿，她们就会用那些草药来制作一种药剂，也许这便可解释发生在维多利亚身上的事情。
promluv_s_od_miskovickyho_NYtQ
The Miskowitz Bailiff told me that Matthew was robbing people on the roads between Miskowitz, Suchdol and Wysoka. There is even a bounty on him.
米斯科维茨的执行官告诉我，马修就在米斯科维茨、苏赫多尔和维索卡之间的道路上抢劫行人，甚至因此背负了悬赏。
promluv_s_od_purkrabiho_j_tU53
I got a new task from Hashek. I have to search the tower and see if young Semine is hiding there.
我从哈舍克那里领了项新任务。现在我得搜查塔楼，看看塞米少主是否身藏其中。
promluv_s_olbram_je_v_pan_oo8Y
Olbram is dead, I don't reckon I'll be getting a reward now.
奥尔布拉姆死了，我估计得不到奖赏了。
promluv_s_olbram_mi_rekl__bk4X
Olbram said the conflict with the Tachovites is over for now. At least until everyone's bruises have healed…
奥尔布拉姆说，与塔霍夫人的冲突目前告一段落。至少要先等大家的伤痕痊愈…
promluv_s_oznamil_jsem_sv_Hrvy

When the threat named Hanka was taken care of, I informed Svatava I had already found her buried inheritance in Mesoles and that I would be keeping it. She wasn't happy, but what could she do? After all it's finders, keepers, isn't it? I'd done more than enough for her family after all.
在处理掉汉卡这个威胁之后，我也将在梅索莱斯找到遗产一事告知了斯瓦塔娅，并告诉她我打算将遗产留下。尽管她很不情愿，但对此也无能为力，毕竟见者有份天经地义，更何况我为了他们一家已付出了许多。
promluv_s_p2_vokraka_sem__Lkkj
I won the fight and Volkmar surrendered to me. I searched him and found a map to the secret mint among his things!
我在战斗中胜出，沃尔克马尔也向我举手投降。我对他进行了一番搜查，在他的私人物品中发现一张指向秘密铸币厂的地图。
promluv_s_pak_jsem_jen_za_cRRA
Then I went to see Svatya and tell him all about my amorous adventure.
后来我找到了斯瓦蒂亚，将我经历的那场风流韵事告诉了他。
promluv_s_pak_jsem_zasel__nOEA

I visited Lord Semine to see what was troubling him and ask whether I could be of any help. He asked me to keep an eye on his Moravian relatives and make sure they didn't get too inebriated and also get rid of the beggars by the gate.
我与塞米大人见了一面，看看他是否需要我帮他排忧解难。而后，他请求我看紧他那些摩拉维亚的亲戚，省得他们喝得酩酊大醉，同时他还希望我能处理门外的那些乞丐。
promluv_s_paneboze_co_ted_exbK
Oh my God, what now!? All the soldiers are dead! I must talk to Semine.
我的天呐，士兵都死光了！现在怎么办？！我必须跟塞米谈谈。
promluv_s_pan_semin_se_ro_ucKa
Lord Semine decided he wants to test my fighting skills. Gnarly wants to say a few words about it first.
塞米大人决定考验一下我的搏斗技能。格纳利想先说几句。
promluv_s_p_jdi_rict_vajd_mgOb
The contest is finished. Now I'd better get back to the Voivode and talk to him about our wager.
比赛已经结束。现在我该回去找司令官，跟他谈谈赌局的事。
promluv_s_placeholder_dob_zq3Q
We finished the fight in the cliff camp. I should consult with Lord Semine and Gnarly about what to do next.
我们在悬崖营地结束了战斗。我应该与塞米大人和格纳利商量下一步怎么做。
promluv_s_placeholder_dos_41Vr
Excellent, we were finally given a proper reception at Trosky. I got somewhere to lay my head, my gear, a gift from Lord von Bergow, as well as a horse named Herring, plus tack.
我们终于在特罗斯基受到了体面的接待，真是皆大欢喜。我有了歇脚之地，能借此存放我的装备。我还收到了来自冯·波尔高领主的礼物和一匹名叫“鲱鱼”的马，还有与之匹配的马具。
promluv_s_placeholder_dos_lC7R

Excellent, we were finally given a proper reception at Trosky. I got a place to lay my head, my gear, and a gift from Lord von Bergow. They offered me a horse, but I already have one, so they gave me a splendid set of tack.
我们终于在特罗斯基受到了体面的接待，真是皆大欢喜。我有了歇脚之地，能借此存放我的装备，我还收到了来自冯·波尔高领主的礼物。人们还想赠与我一匹马，但看到我已经有了坐骑，便送给我一套精致的马具。
promluv_s_placeholder_kum_K3Ms
I didn't find the Cumans in their camp. I should wait for them here.
库曼人营地里空无一人，我得在这里等等他们。
promluv_s_placeholder_mam_cKbP
I'm supposed to check out a horse named Herring and tell the stablehand if I want him.
我得查看一匹名叫“鲱鱼”的马匹，如果想把它带走，就得跟马夫说一声。
promluv_s_placeholder_mam_duvK
Capon and I are almost ready to set out to Nebakov, all that's left is to get a horse. I was told they have one ready for me at the stables.
卡蓬与我已做好了启程前往内巴科夫的一切准备，最后要做的事就是找来一匹马。我得知人们已在马厩为我准备好了一匹马。
promluv_s_podarilo_se_mi__4s3i
I managed to convince Victoria to go with me to the Devil's Den.
我说服了维多利亚跟我一起前往“魔窟”。
promluv_s_podarilo_se_nam_dklC

We managed to stop the rampage of von Bergow's men - but at what cost? So many dead... Bergow must never find out what truly happened here, or he'll execute us all. The safest option will be to evacuate the people from the fortress and set fire to the entire place. At least that way, we'll cover our tracks.
我们成功阻止了冯·波尔高部下的横行，可又付出了怎样的代价呢？如今此地遍地横尸......绝对不能让波尔高知晓此处发生之事，否则我们就要被他处死。最保险的办法就是将堡垒内的人们疏散，然后再放火将此地焚毁殆尽，至少以这种方式就能毁尸灭迹。
promluv_s_podarilo_se_nam_GjTP
We managed to bring order to the fortress, but young Semine is nowhere to be seen. What now? I should have a word with Hashek.
我们设法恢复了堡垒的秩序，但是此刻塞米少主也不见了踪影，所以现在该怎么办呢？我得跟哈舍克谈谈。
promluv_s_podle_kecu_to_v_NnCg
I'll go over and teach him some manners.
我要去找他并教会他如何礼貌待人。
promluv_s_podle_kunzlinov_8DZD
Following Rosa's advice, I sought the help of the Ruthard's family friend Hashtal, the custodian of the Maleshov stud farm. He agreed to ready horses for Sir Hans Capon.
我按照罗莎的建议，向鲁瑟德一家的朋友哈斯塔尔寻求帮助，他是马列索夫种马场的管事。后来，他同意为汉斯·卡蓬爵士准备马匹。
promluv_s_podle_kunzlinov_CCML
Following Rosa's advice, I sought the help of the Ruthard's family friend Hashtal, the custodian of the Maleshov stud farm. He agreed to ready horses for Sir Hans Capon.
我按照罗莎的建议，向鲁瑟德一家的朋友哈斯塔尔寻求帮助，他是马列索夫种马场的管事。后来，他同意为汉斯·卡蓬爵士准备马匹。
promluv_s_podle_pana_semi_jCm7
Lord Semine said I'd probably get along with Bailiff Thrush's son. Lord von Bergow hasn't arrived yet, so I thought I'd try to find him. His name is Svatya and he turned out to be quite a handful.
塞米大人认为我或许会跟执行官瑟鲁什之子打成一片。既然冯·波尔高大人还未到场，我想我也该找找这位瑟鲁什之子，但没想到这个名叫斯瓦蒂亚的家伙并不好相处。
promluv_s_podle_pana_semi_yQHC

Lord Semine said I'd get along with Bailiff Thrush's son. I'm already here, so I might as well go and talk to him. Maybe we'll have a drink together since we're at a wedding. Lord von Bergow isn't here yet anyway, so I've got nothing better to do.
塞米大人说，我没准会跟执行官瑟鲁什之子打成一片。来都来了，或许我该去跟他聊聊。既然是在婚宴上，那我们说不定能一起喝一杯。至于冯·波尔高大人，他尚未现身，所以我也没有其它要事可做。

I met master swordsman Menhard of Frankfurt and got involved in a sharp exchange between him and the Kuttenbergers. They wanted to drive Menhard out of town, but I stepped in. I learned from Menhard that King Wenceslas himself invited them to the town to establish a swordfighting brotherhood, but the burghers had established one themselves in the meantime and do not want to recognise Menhard's claim, for which he has a charter. Menhard's honour had suffered and he demands a duel, but the Kuttenbergers are making excuses.
我遇到了法兰克福的剑士门哈德，还卷入了他与库滕堡人的激烈纠纷之中，正当他们要将门哈德赶出城镇之时，我却插手进来。我也从门哈德那里得知，是瓦茨拉夫亲自邀请他们在城内创立剑术兄弟会，但在此期间库滕堡的市民却早已擅自创办了兄弟会，并且对门哈德的诉求视而不见，即便他有特许状作为担保。荣耀遭到践踏的门哈德发起了决斗挑战，但是那些库滕堡人一直在编造借口。

I met master swordsman Menhard of Frankfurt and got involved in a sharp exchange between him and the Kuttenbergers, which ended with the Germans being expelled from the town. I learned from Menhard that King Wenceslas himself invited them to the town to establish a swordfighting brotherhood, but the burghers had established one themselves in the meantime and do not want to recognise Menhard's claim, for which he has a charter. Menhard's honour had suffered and he demands a duel, but the Kuttenbergers are making excuses.
我遇到了法兰克福的剑士门哈德，还卷入了他与库滕堡人的激烈纠纷之中，而这场纠纷却最终以德国人被赶出城镇而结束。我也从门哈德那里得知，是瓦茨拉夫亲自邀请他们在城内创立剑术兄弟会，但在此期间库滕堡的市民却早已擅自创办了兄弟会，并且对门哈德的诉求视而不见，即便他有特许状作为担保。荣耀遭到践踏的门哈德发起了决斗挑战，但是那些库滕堡人一直在编造借口。
promluv_s_potkal_jsme_ser_ep6c

I met master swordsman Menhard of Frankfurt and got involved in a sharp exchange between him and the Kuttenbergers. But somehow the whole thing didn't really work out and I'll never know what it was all about. Well, sometimes it's better not to know.
我遇到了法兰克福的剑士门哈德，还卷入了他与库滕堡人的激烈纠纷之中。但却不知为何，整件事并未得到妥善解决，而我至始至终都不知道这场纠纷到底何起何落。总之啊，有时候还是不明真相更好。
promluv_s_potkal_jsme_ser_gVNS

I met master swordsman Menhard of Frankfurt and got mixed up in a heated exchange between him and the Kuttenbergers. They wanted to drive Menhard out of town, but I stepped in to stop that. As a result, he wasn't banished from the city and is still staying at the Emperor Charles inn. I subsequently learnt from Menhard that they were invited to the city by King Wenceslas himself to found the city's swordfighting brotherhood, but in the meantime the Kuttenbergers founded the brotherhood themselves. Now they refuse to accept Menhard's claim, even though he has a charter that proves it. Menhard's honour has been defiled and he is demanding a duel, but the Kuttenbergs won't accept. Menhard's apprentice Arne has come up with plan to force the Kuttenbergers to fight a duel, and they asked for my help. I was supposed to steal the brotherhood sword, but I refused. Even so, Menhard pressed me to reconsider...

我遇到了法兰克福的剑士门哈德，还卷入了他与库滕堡人的激烈纠纷之中，他们想赶他出城，但被我制止了。结果，他仍能待在查理皇帝的酒馆里。后来我从门哈德那里得知，是瓦茨拉夫国王亲自邀请他们在城内创立剑术兄弟会，但在此期间库滕堡人却早已擅自创办了兄弟会。而现在，他们拒绝接受门哈德的诉求，哪怕他有特许状为证也无济于事。荣耀遭到践踏的门哈德要求与那些库滕堡人决一胜负，但他们并未理会。门哈德的徒弟阿耳涅随即想出了能迫使库滕堡人接受挑战的办法，并向我寻求帮助。他们希望我能偷走行会的剑，但我拒绝了，不过门哈德还是逼我重新考虑……
promluv_s_potkal_jsme_ser_pGeT

I met master swordsman Menhard of Frankfurt and got mixed up in a heated exchange between him and the Kuttenbergers, which ended with the Germans being expelled from the town. They're now staying outside the city walls at the Inn by the Oak, which is where I went to meet them. I subsequently learnt from Menhard that they were invited to the city by King Wenceslas himself to found the city's swordfighting brotherhood, but in the meantime the Kuttenbergers founded the guild themselves. Now they refuse to accept Menhard's claim, even though he has a charter that proves it. Menhard's honour has been defiled and he is demanding a duel, but the Kuttenbergs won't accept. Menhard's apprentice Arne has come up with a plan to force the Kuttenbergers to fight a duel, and they asked for my help. I was supposed to steal the guild sword, but I refused. Even so, Menhard pressed me to reconsider...

汉卡想要米库什如实交代家族遗产在梅索莱斯的埋藏点，结果才发现埋藏那些遗产的并非米库什而是斯瓦塔娅。汉卡随后也对米库什进行了严刑拷打，只为逼问斯瓦塔娅的下落，而后便带着一组强盗前往了他们的小屋。

Capon told me that Lord Otto von Bergow has invited us to a banquet this evening, to be held in honour of his vassals who will set out to attack Nebakov castle in the morning. It's become clear that the group that attacked us by the pond and has been marauding in the region has occupied this rock castle and are holding Sir Jaromier captive.
我从卡蓬那里得知，奥托·冯·波尔高领主邀请我们于今晚出席一场为他的封臣们举办的宴会，而那些封臣将在早晨出发进攻内巴科夫城堡。如今事态已变得明朗，那群在池塘边袭击我们的强盗早就在这片区域肆意抢夺，他们已经占领了内巴科夫城堡，并且还囚禁了雅罗米尔爵士。

promluv_s_rytir_jezek_pry_61Vn

The easiest way to get Jezhek's things is to find his former commander - Zavish of Garbow, who defeated Jezhek in a duel. It seems he has a tent in Sigismund's camp, near the kitchen. I'll recognize him by his coat of arms with a black eagle on a yellow field and three white stones on a red field.
要想找回杰泽克的东西，最简单的方法是找到他的前指挥官——加博的扎维什，也就是在决斗中打败了杰泽克的人。他的帐篷似乎在西格斯蒙德军营厨房的附近。我能通过他的纹章找到他——黄底上的黑鹰，以及红底上的三颗宝石。
promluv_s_sakra_marketa_m_iQVS

With the information provided by von Bergow, a plan was devised to deprive Sigismund of the means to fund his army. A papal legate from Rome is about to arrive in Kuttenberg. And we, disguised as the legate's entourage, will get into the Italian Court and rob the royal treasury!
根据冯·波尔高提供的消息，我们制定了新的计划，以切断西格斯蒙德为手下军队提供资助的途径。罗马的教皇特使即将光临库滕堡，而我们将会假扮成特使随从，与之共赴意大利宫，并夺走那里的皇室财宝！

The captive's name is Hensel. He told me that he stole a thunderstone from Thomlin, but was then captured after trying to ambush a military patrol that was harrassing his village. Their commander, Andrew Ramhead, took the thunderstone from him and sold it to a woman named Mlada from the village of Suchdol.
这个囚犯名叫亨泽尔。他告诉我他偷了托姆林的雷石，然后在试图伏击一支一直在骚扰他村子的军队时被抓住了。军队的指挥官公羊头安德鲁从他手中抢走了雷石，然后卖给了苏赫多尔村子里一个叫姆拉达的女人。

I won the fight and Volkmar surrendered to me. He confessed Buresh was behind the whole fraud and that he was forced to co-operate by threats and bribes. Buresh dragged him so far into the fraud that he even put him in charge of the contacts in the mines, it was he who paid Fett. But the main information was that the undeclared silver, now in pure form, goes to a secret mint hidden in a mined-out shaft near Old Kutna.
我赢得了战斗，沃尔克马尔也向我举手投降。他向我坦白布雷斯正是整个欺诈事件的幕后主使，而他自己因受到威胁和接受贿赂被迫与之合作。是布雷斯将沃尔克马尔扯入了这场罪行当中，甚至还让他来负责掌管矿场中的联络事宜，也正是他对费特进行了贿赂。但最重要的是，那些未申报的银矿石，现已精炼成了白银，被运往了藏在老库特纳附近废弃矿井中的秘密铸币厂里。
promluv_s_vdova_marketa_k_d5o4

寡妇玛格丽特终于赎了罪，因为她没有杀死她的仰慕者杨，只是掩盖了他死亡的真相。
promluv_s_vdova_marketa_m_VWra

The widow Margaret told me her secret: an innocent man died because of her. What makes her sin even worse is that the soul of the hermit's brother Jan is not at peace. Margaret never told anyone that her lover killed his rival, Jan, in a duel, and together they covered his tracks. When the young man was found dead with a broken skull at the bottom of a cliff, it was assumed he'd killed himself out of unrequited love. Jan's body was buried outside the graveyard because suicides cannot enter the Kingdom of Heaven.
寡妇玛格丽特将她的秘密告诉了我：一个无辜的男人因她而死。隐士的弟弟杨的灵魂不得安宁，这令她的罪孽更加深重。玛格丽特从未告诉过任何人，她的情人在决斗中杀死了对手杨，然后他们一起掩盖了他的踪迹。当这个年轻人的尸体在悬崖下被发现时，头骨已经破碎，人们认为他是因为爱而不得才寻短见。杨的尸体被埋在墓地外，因为自杀者不能进入天国。
promluv_s_velitel_nedbal__BLH1
The commander of the soldiers didn't heed my warning and sicked his men on me.
指挥官对我的警告视而不见，并指使部下向我发起攻击。
promluv_s_vepr_mi_rekl_co_LDUR
Hog told me what happened, and that he killed Hynek in a fit of rage. Before he died, Hynek offered him a parchment, I could take a look at it.
霍格将经过告诉我，说自己一怒之下杀了海尼克。海尼克死之前，给了他一张羊皮纸，我可以看一看。
promluv_s_vepr_mi_uz_tezk_ot9w
I won't get anything out of Hog now.
我现在不能从霍格那里获得任何东西。
promluv_s_vesnice_je_v_pl_gFcY
The village is on fire. Now we have to quickly agree with Zizka how exactly to spring our trap on the enemy.
村庄正在受到火焰的侵蚀。现在我们得赶快与杰式卡商量该如何精确无误地让敌人掉入我们的陷阱当中。
promluv_s_vesnice_malesov_tSqx
The village was in flames and its inhabitants either fled into the forest or were killed. The trap for our enemy had been laid.
熊熊烈火已然侵蚀了村庄，而那里的村民，要么逃往树林，要么命丧黄泉。我们为敌人设立的陷阱，正在等待着“猎物”上钩。
promluv_s_viktorka_chtela_uulq
Victoria wanted me to bring her soldier to her. I don't think she was expecting me to literally carry him to her. But I'm curious how she'll act face to face with her sweetheart.
维多利亚想让我将她心心念念的士兵找来。但我不认为她想让我直接把士兵抬过来，不过我的确很好奇，她与心上人面对面时会作何反应。
promluv_s_viktorka_je_sic_JGpm

Victoria is of course sad, but I convinced her to be reasonable and forget about the soldier. He's a coward, and being with him would bring her nothing good. Now, she has to find the strength in herself to take care of herself and her child. I am certain she will.
维多利亚果然很难过，但我成功说服了她，让她保持理智，并与那个士兵从此相忘于江湖，毕竟他就是个懦夫，跟着他也不会有什么好果子吃。如今的维多利亚得抓住心底的力量，照顾好自己和肚中孩童，我相信她一定能做到。
promluv_s_viktorka_nebyla_oBrZ

One of the local peasants, some Kuba, was trying to court Victoria. Maybe I should talk to him and find out if he had anything to do with her disappearance. They say I can’t miss him - he’s wearing a red coat and a feathered cap.
当地一位名叫库巴的农夫曾试图向维多利亚献殷勤。也许我该跟他谈谈，看看他是否跟那位姑娘的失踪有关。人们说他穿着一件红色外套，戴着一顶羽帽，因此很好辨认。
promluv_s_vim_info_od_ger_4oZ7

Not long after sunset a few days ago, Gerda saw an apparition by the conciliatory cross. The apparition literally leapt up at her out of the ground. She said she also heard a strange clanking sound of metal on stone, then immediately ran away.
几天前，太阳落山后不久，格尔达在和解十字架旁看到一个幽灵。那个幽灵从地上跳起来向她走来。她说她还听到了一种奇怪的金属撞击石头的叮当声，然后立刻跑开了。
promluv_s_vim_o_gerte_JMfe
I discovered that Gerda, the wife of the apothecary with a shop on the village square, witnessed the apparition near the conciliatory cross.
我发现，药剂师之妻格尔达在和解十字架附近目睹了幽灵的出现，他们的药房开在村庄的广场上。
promluv_s_v_jidelne_jsem__4KUY
In the courtyard, I chose Sam for the raid. I could also choose Kubyenka to join him.
在庭院，我选择派塞缪尔参加突袭，也可以让库宾卡和他一起去。
promluv_s_v_jidelne_jsem__ef6V
In the courtyard, I chose Kubyenka for the raid. I could also choose Sam to join him.
在庭院，我选择派库宾卡参加突袭，也可以让塞缪尔和他一起去。
promluv_s_v_kocovnickem_t_z9JF

V kočovnickém táboře jsem potkal dva jezdce, jejichž neshoda ohledně toho jaký koňský závod je nejlepší, vypadala neřešitelně. To bych ale nebyl já, abych se do toho nezapletl a nepokusil se je rozsoudit. Nejdřív ale bylo potřeba se u nich osvědčit, aby mě vůbec brali jako rovného koňáka.
promluv_s_v_kutne_hore_js_yZkf

I met master swordsman Menhard of Frankfurt and got involved in a sharp exchange between him and the Kuttenbergers. They wanted to drive Menhard out of town, but I stepped in. Now it would be a good idea to talk to Menhard and find out what I actually got myself into. I can visit Menhard, during the day, in the Emperor Charles tavern.
我遇到了法兰克福的剑士门哈德，还卷入了他与库滕堡人的激烈纠纷之中。正当库滕堡人要将门哈德赶出城镇之时，我却插手进来。门哈德应该就在“查理皇帝”酒馆里，现在我最好去跟他谈谈，将我当前的处境弄清楚。
promluv_s_vsechno_mame_mu_MEc7
It seems we have all we need and there's no need to stay here a moment longer. We need to get out of here quickly, before anyone notices what's happened.
看来该拿的东西都到手了，不必再呆在这里了。趁着还没被发现，我们得尽快离开。
promluv_s_vsechno_uz_je_k_GdIc
It's all been sorted out at last. The murderer is dead and the Prague regiment will soon leave for Sedletz, taking the Finger of God with them.
凶手已经死亡，一切也终于得以了结，而布拉格军队很快将会带着“上帝之指”前往塞德莱茨。
promluv_s_vsechny_jsem_na_ICha
I found them all. But not everyone will get back together with the Devil. I should talk to him about what to do next.
我找到了所有成员，但并非每个人都打算回到“酒鬼”身边。我得跟他谈谈，了解下一步举措。
promluv_s_vsechny_jsem_na_xzcl
I found them all. Not everyone will get back together with the Devil. But he already knows that.
我找到了所有成员，但并非每个人都打算回到“酒鬼”身边，不过他对此早有预料。
promluv_s_v_tabore_vzbour_gbzQ
In the rebellious peasants' camp, I only found traces of a massacre and one wounded man. Sigismund's men found them before I did.
在农民起义军的营地，我只发现了屠杀痕迹和一个伤者。西格斯蒙德的人先我一步发现了他们。
promluv_s_v_tabore_vzbour_x3bY
In the rebellious peasants' camp, I only found traces of a massacre and one wounded man. I should talk to him.
在农民起义军的营地，我只发现了屠杀痕迹和一个伤者。我应该和他谈谈。
promluv_s_v_troskovicke_h_aUJy
A woman we saw just before we were ambushed by bandits suddenly appeared in the Troskowitz tavern. She could confirm who we are. I have to talk to her!
我们遭遇强盗伏击前见过一个女人，现在她竟然出现在了特罗斯科维茨酒馆里。她应该能证明我们的身份，我必须跟她谈谈！
promluv_s_v_troskovicke_h_jIOV

A woman we saw just before we were ambushed by bandits suddenly appeared in the Troskowitz tavern. At first she denied being by the pond and claimed not to know us, which was strange. In the end, though, she revealed that Lord von Bergow is about to leave the castle and our best chance of meeting him is at the Semine wedding.
我们遭遇强盗伏击前见过一个女人，现在她竟然出现在了特罗斯科维茨酒馆里。令人讶异的是，起初她否认了在池塘边现身的事实，还声称与我们素不相识。但最终，她向我们透露冯·波尔高领主即将离开城堡，并告知我们前往塞米的婚礼是与之相见的最佳时机。
promluv_s_vybral_jsem_na__ChY3
I chose Kozliek for the raid. I hope it's the right choice.
我选择了科兹⾥克去突袭。希望这是正确的选择。
promluv_s_vyhral_jsem_je__gEO0
I won! The duel is done and now I can get my reward from Gerda!
我赢了！决斗已经结束，现在我可以向格尔达索要报酬了！
promluv_s_vykaslal_jsem_s_RsCa
I didn't bother discussing things with Capon. Instead, I went straight at the soldiers in the camp!
我没有与卡蓬商量对策，反而直接走到了那些士兵面前！
promluv_s_vypada_to_ze_tr_RYeu
It looks like the Troskowitz Bailiff Thrush could help me sort out the conflict between Tachov and Zhelejov once and for all. I should go and talk to him.
看来，特罗斯科维茨的执行官瑟鲁什可以帮我彻底解决塔霍夫和哲勒约夫之间的冲突。我应该去和他谈谈。
promluv_s_vypada_to_ze_vz_qcta
That was quite enough excitement. I won't go hunting with Capon today.
真是惊心动魄的一天呢，我不打算再与卡蓬一同打猎了。
promluv_s_vypada_to_ze_za_sxGh
We defeated the rebels at Nebakov, and it looks like it was all instigated by Erik! But why?
我们打败了内巴科夫的叛军，似乎这一切都是由埃里克策动的！到底怎么回事？
promluv_s_vyslouzila_kuch_AnUm
The old cook Bertha certainly knows everything about the devils. She should be in the palace under the Crone.
老厨师伯莎对魔鬼的事情一定了如指掌。她应该就在老妪塔之下的宫殿里。
promluv_s_wolframa_a_dobr_V0II
I saw Wolfram and Dobrosh in the infirmary. Should I send them for the raid? I can find them there and discuss it with them.
我看到沃尔夫拉姆和多布罗什在医护所，我应该派他们去突袭吗？我能在那里找到他们，和他们讨论这件事。
promluv_s_za_alenkou_chod_E3Qo
One of Alice's friends comes to grieve over her body, maybe I'll learn something more from her.
艾莉丝的一位朋友前来吊唁，或许我能从她那里了解到什么。
promluv_s_zajic_nechtel_a_EZHa

Hare didn't want me to bring the arrow back to the encampment. He's worried that the power of the arrow will drive Pasha mad, and he'll start engaging in suicidal robberies. He wanted it for himself and I thought giving it to him would be a good idea, but it was a mistake. So I took it back. It belongs to Pasha, and unlike Hare, he'll pay me for it.
哈尔不想让我把箭带回营地。他担心箭的威力会把帕夏逼疯，会开始搞自杀式抢劫。哈尔想要箭，我最初以为把箭给他是一个好主意。但我给了他之后又觉得那是个错误的决定，所以我又把箭拿了回来。这箭属于帕夏，而且帕夏不会像哈尔一样不给我报酬。
promluv_s_zajic_nechtel_a_lVjz

Hare didn't want me to bring the arrow back to the encampment. He's worried that the power of the arrow will drive Pasha mad, and he'll start engaging in suicidal robberies. I gave the arrow to Hare. He didn't pay me for it, but I saved a few good men from certain death.
哈尔不想让我把箭带回营地。他担心箭的威力会把帕夏逼疯，会开始搞自杀式抢劫。我把箭给了哈尔。他没有付我赏金，但我让几个好人免于一死。
promluv_s_za_nejaky_cas_s_ajLq

I'm to stop by Capon this evening. Lord von Bergow has given him some special mission, but this time I'm sure we won't be on our own. Something big is being planned, because von Bergow has invited his noble vassals to the castle along with their men-at-arms.
今晚我得与卡蓬见一面。冯·波尔高领主给了卡蓬一项特殊的任务，但这次我敢肯定我们不会再孤军奋战。当前，一场大事正在筹划之中，冯·波尔高已邀请他的贵族封臣们随同军队来到城堡。
promluv_s_zastavili_jsme__8BBL
We've stopped just outside the camp, which is not abandoned at all! Sigismund's soldiers are there, and they seem to have killed someone! I have to talk to Capon about what we'll do.
我们在营地外停了下来，发现此处也并非完全被遗弃！西格斯蒙德手下的士兵居然就在这里，而且他们似乎刚杀了人！我得跟卡蓬商量对策！
promluv_s_zatimco_spolu_h_Pvj4

I spoke to my brothers-in-arms. The last days of the siege were hard, and they were delighted it ended well. Zizka even offered me a role as his right-hand man. It's a great honour. I'm still bound to serve Capon, but we'll see what the future brings.
在与战友们交谈过后得知，被围困的最后几天他们过得很是艰难，因此十分庆幸如今得以解脱。杰式卡甚至还希望我担任他的左膀右臂，这是份无上的荣耀，但我仍需效忠于卡蓬，不过未来会怎样，我们拭目以待。
promluv_s_zatracene_o_co__Z8W3
What the hell is our plan for the village?
我们到底要对那座村庄做什么？
promluv_s_zavis_z_garbowa_elDR
Zavish of Garbow wouldn't return Sir Jezhek's things to me.
加博的扎维什不肯把杰泽克爵士的东西还给我。
promluv_s_zavod_jsem_doje_PhMV
Závod jsem dojel. Čas zjistit od Mikolaje výsledky.
promluv_s_z_cikanu_inform_l7Mm
I tried to find out from Mikolai what kind of horseshoes he uses, but he didn’t say a word. I’ll have to find out some other way.
I tried to find out from Mikolai what kind of horseshoes he uses, but he didn’t say a word. I’ll have to find out some other way.
promluv_s_ze_svych_muzu_j_fwUq
From my company, I chose Dobrosh for the raid.
我从部下中选择了多布罗什去参加突袭。
promluv_s_ze_svych_muzu_j_WY7K
From my company, I chose Wolfram for the raid.
我从部下中选择了沃尔夫拉姆去参加突袭。
promluv_s_ziskali_jsme_vs_VLah
Godwin and Liechtenstein gained all the allies, their influence and resources for their plan. Now there was nothing to prevent him and Jobst from putting the plan into motion.
古德温和列支敦士登召集了所有的盟友，并将利用他们的影响力和资源完成计划，如今让他们和约布斯特将计划投入实践已是板上钉钉之事。
promluv_s_zizka_me_pozada_Q2pD
Zizka then asked me to keep watch on the walls until everything was done and the loot was safe in Ruthard Palace.
杰式卡让我在城墙上望风，等待一切计划落实完毕，确保战利品安然无恙地运回鲁瑟德宫。
promluv_s_zizka_na_miste__FRWk
I'm sure Zizka is waiting for the hand cannons he sent us to find.
想必杰式卡一定在等着他派我们前去寻找的手炮。
promluv_s_zizka_naridil_p_DfZI
Zizka ordered that the cannon be moved to The Devil's Den. It won't stay there for long - soon we'll be using it to bang on von Bergow's gate.
杰式卡下令将火炮搬到“魔窟”，而它也不会在那里待太久，因为很快我们就要用它来轰烂冯·波尔高的城门。
promluv_s_zizka_nas_po_bi_USqF

After the battle at Nebakov, they threw us in jail! Before he could decide what to do with us, Istvan - that bastard! - appeared behind him! We managed to persuade Zizka not to trust Istvan, and it turned out he already had his suspicions! He locked Istvan in the cell next to ours, but at that moment someone arrived at the castle gates who was looking for us! Zizka left, and me and Istvan started cursing and threatening each other. Shortly after, Erik appeared in the doorway, looking frightened! He released Istvan and Lord Nebak and they all fled... A moment later Zizka appeared - with Godwin! He'd come all the way from Uzhitz for us! It turned out they're all on the side of the king and all the events were just misunderstandings and accidents! Godwin tended to Zizka's eye (for which I apologised) and we had to get out of Nebakov fast, before von Bergow came for us. No doubt Erik and Istvan were telling him everything right then...

内巴科夫的战斗结束后，我们被丢进了牢房里！杰式卡尚未决定好要如何处置我们，突然，混蛋伊斯特万出现在了他的身后！我们说服了杰式卡别轻易相信伊斯特万，谁曾想他早已有了疑虑！随后，他将伊斯特万关在了我们旁边的牢房里。就在这时，有人来到城门前，似乎是在寻找我们！杰式卡随即离开，而我和伊斯特万便开始咒骂、威胁彼此。没过多久，埃里克出现在了门口，神情惊慌！他释放了伊斯特万和内巴克领主，并与他们一同逃离......片刻后，杰式卡回来了，还带来了古德温！这家伙居然为了我们从乌兹茨一路赶来！原来，他们都是国王的拥护者，过去发生的一切不过是些误解与意外！古德温为杰式卡的双眼疗伤，我也向杰式卡表达了歉意。而后，我们不得不在冯·波尔高寻来前尽快逃出内巴科夫。毕竟，埃里克和伊斯特万肯定已经把发生的一切告诉了冯·波尔高......
promluv_s_zizkas_certem_m_j58V
Zizka and Dry Devil explained to me what will happen next.
杰式卡和“酒鬼”向我说明了下一步计划。
promluv_s_zjistil_jsem_vy_KgCK
Zjistil jsem výsledky.
promluv_s_zjistil_jsem_ze_UdP3
I spoke with Kuba and even though he doesn't have anything nice to say about Victoria, he doesn't seem to be involved in her disappearance.
我与库巴进行了一番交流，虽然他对维多利亚评价不高，但他看起来似乎跟维多利亚的失踪毫无关系。
promluv_s_zkusil_jsem_vik_VcGL
I tried to convince Victoria that the soldier would soon come to see her, but she didn't believe me. At least I got her to go back home to Miskowitz.
我试图让维多利亚相信那个士兵很快就会来见她，但我的话未能得到她的信任。不过至少我让她迈出了返回米斯科维茨的步伐。
promluv_s_z_marketina_pla_qLON
Margaret's plan to rob some burgher won't come to anything.
玛格丽特的抢劫计划不会成功的。
promluvte_dostali_jsme_z__qDKz
Latsek was scared shitless and couldn't pay up quick enough! Serves him right!
拉塞克还来不及付钱就被吓得屁滚尿流！他活该！
promluvte_mel_jsem_pomoct_iUWH
I was supposed to give the bastard a hiding till he coughed up for Margaret, but sod it. The whole plan seemed fishy right from the start.
我本该抓住这个杂碎，直到他向玛格丽特认罪，但还是算了吧。这个计划从一开始就很可疑。
promluvte_pro_toho_hazjzl_T4nC
He'll pay and thank us for it! Beating a woman! I'm going to teach him a lesson!
他会付出代价的！敢打女人！我要给他一个教训！
promluvte_ta_svine_nas_po_W2uT
Fuck! Margaret double-crossed us both! Poor Latsek didn't do anything wrong, she just wanted to rob him! How come I never saw it?! Shit! You can't trust anyone here!
可恶！玛格丽特耍了我们！可怜的拉塞克没做错任何事，她只是想抢劫他！我为什么没早点发现？！该死！这里的任何人都不可信！
promuv_si_jedna_ze_stop_v_YTeW
Chief Foreman Fett is responsible for the false mining records. I should talk to him and get him to co-operate with my investigation.
首席领班费特是导致采矿记录出错的罪魁祸首，我得跟他谈谈，让他同意与我合作进行调查。
promuv_si_predak_maslo_mi_X5mn
Chief Foreman Fett was responsible for the false mining records. He confessed he had received money from an unknown person at the smelter for forging the numbers and covering up the whole fraud.
首席领班费特是导致采矿记录出错的罪魁祸首。他承认在冶炼厂收取了某位不知名人士的贿赂，进而伪造编号并彻底掩盖了那起欺诈行为。
promuv_si_predak_maslo_uz_0j2P
Chief Foreman Fett was responsible for the false mining records. Unfortunately, I couldn't question him.
首席领班费特是捏造虚假采矿记录的罪魁祸首，可惜的是，他还没能与我交谈就死了。
prones_rec_legat_bohuta_p_tMF7
In the end, Godwin managed to give his closing speech. Then it was our turn.
古德温最终顺利地发表了他的总结词，然后就轮到我们了。
prones_rec_nastal_cas_pro_050R
The time has come to give the closing speech. The most important thing is to stay in the character. I should see Janosh and have him give me a proper introduction.
现在正是发表总结词的时候，最重要的事就是保证自己不要出戏。我得与亚诺什见一面，让他对我进行一番体面的介绍。
prostuduj_mam_udelat_doje_ZoDF

As I don't know much about wine, Casper will be happy to lend me some reading matter. The problem is that he lent the book to a certain Adleta Mannlicher. Another problem is that he had a different kind of relationship with Adleta and her family found out. So the sweet Adleta is shut up in the house or the gardens behind the Italianate Court and she's strictly forbidden to have any contact with men.
由于我对葡萄酒了解不多，卡斯帕很乐意借给我一些阅读材料。问题是，他把这本书借给了一个名叫阿德莱塔·曼尼希尔的人。另一个问题是，他和阿德莱塔有着不同寻常的关系，并且被她的家人发现了。所以可爱的阿德莱塔被锁在意大利宫后面的房子或花园里，严禁接触任何男子。
prostuduj_vzhledem_k_tomu_THk5

Since I prefer drinking wine to studying it, I needed a little training in how to impress a wine expert. Casper told me about some writings by Bushek of Velhartice. The problem was that he'd lent the book to a certain Adleta Mannlicher. Another problem is that his relationship with Adleta was not limited to sharing books, and her family found out. So the sweet Adleta is confined to the house or to the gardens behind the Italianate Court and she's strictly forbidden to have any contact with men. What can I say other than I certainly made her break that rule. But I have Bushek's book, and that's what's important.

由于我更喜欢喝葡萄酒而不是研究葡萄酒，我需要接受一点关于如何打动葡萄酒专家的训练。卡斯帕让我去看维尔哈蒂采的布谢克写的一些文章。问题是，他把这本书借给了一个名叫阿德莱塔·曼尼希尔的人。另一个问题是，他和阿德莱塔的关系不仅限于分享书籍，并且被她的家人发现了。所以可爱的阿德莱塔被锁在意大利宫后面的房子或花园里，严禁接触任何男子。我的确是让她打破了这个规矩，我还能说什么呢。但至少我拿到了布谢克的书，这才是最重要的。
proved_in_intrika_s_prste_BQ7G
The trick with the ring went exactly as Hermann planned. Florian's secret admirer recognised the ring and left him in no doubt as to what she thought of him.
与赫尔曼计划的一样，用那枚戒指整出的把戏奏效了。弗洛里安的神秘爱慕者认出了戒指，还让弗洛里安明确地知晓了她对他的看法。
proved_in_intrika_s_prste_sTQl
The trick with the ring didn't work out. I misjudged Florian and his lady.
利用戒指玩弄的把戏没有奏效，我错判了弗洛里安和他的爱慕者。
proved_in_rekl_jsem_heram_jFoZ
I told Littlehead I'd play the trick with the ring instead of him. I wanted to see what would happen.
我告诉“长柄斧”，我会替他玩这个戒指的把戏。我想看看会有什么结果。
proved_lu_musim_vyvesit_t_BgRZ
I have to hang braies up in place of the coloured banner in front of the All Saint's Inn.
我得将圣徒酒馆前的彩旗取下，再将内裤挂上。
proved_lu_videli_me_pri_l_elPN
Damn, they saw me. I was supposed to hang braies up at the inn, but I was discovered. Fortunately nothing happened to anyone.
完蛋，被逮着了。我本该将内裤挂到酒馆之上，但是却被人们逮了个正着，好在后来无事发生。
proved_lu_vykaslal_jsem_s_PXH2
I blew off the whole hanging braies nonsense at the All Saints Inn.
在圣徒酒馆挂内裤这种事真是无稽之谈，还是让它见鬼去吧。
proveyour_kovar_by_vypomo_mwOH
Radovan the blacksmith could use my help, but first he wants to test me, to see if I know what I'm doing.
铁匠拉多万需要我的帮助，但首先他想测试我一下，看我是否能胜任
proveyour_kovar_lorenc_si_SCsz
Radovan the blacksmith wants to test me, I should return to the forge and take the test.
铁匠拉多万想测试我，我应该回到铁匠铺，接受测试。
proveyour_kovar_prijal_vy_COhX

I may not have stood at the forge for some time, but thankfully there are some things you don't forget. I passed the test and Radovan took me on as his hand. He's even letting me sleep in a chamber by the woodshed.
我虽然已经有一段时间没有进入铁匠铺了，但幸好有些事情是不会忘记的。我通过了测试，拉多万收下了我。他甚至允许我睡在柴房旁边的一个房间里。
prozkouje_mam_zjistit_jse_sxRU
I have to find out if the path leads through the rocks and tell Sir Hans.
我得为汉斯少主查清这条唯一的道路能否走出岩谷。
prozkouje_vim_kudy_uz_to__vKHe
It can't be helped - we have to keep going through the fissures in the rocks. I have to tell Sir Hans.
没办法了，我们必须穿过岩石间的裂缝。我得赶快告知汉斯少主。
prozkoume_bynek_se_mi_pri_ifvF
Bynyek confessed to hiding something in one of the plague graves, which I can find among the trees behind that abandoned house. It's the one on the left when coming to them from the village.
拜涅克已向我坦白，他在位于树林内废弃房屋后的一座病死者坟墓里藏了东西。从村庄出发，抵达后正对着的左侧坟墓就是我要找的那座。
prozkoume_co_k_tomu_rict__lqhA
What can I say? We believed we were hunting down our killer, but alas... End of case.
我还能说什么呢？本以为我们是在追捕凶手，可是，唉......案件结束了。
prozkoume_dalsi_krizovatk_25g2

Another crossroads. It looked like it would only be possible to continue straight with a wagon, but Gnarly had a hunch and wanted to search the area, and his instinct proved right. Near the crossroads the captain came across the camouflaged wagon. The goods were gone, but it was obvious the hands had hauled them off somewhere into the rocks.
又一个十字路口。这里看上去乘马车只能直行前进，但格纳利有预感，想去搜索这片区域。他的预感是对的。队长在十字路口附近发现了被藏起来的马车。货物已经不见了，但很明显，是工人把它们拖去了岩石中某个地方。
prozkoume_dalsi_krizovatk_pOSj
Another crossroads. It looks like it would only be possible to continue straight with a wagon, but Gnarly has a hunch and wants us to search the area.
又一个十字路口。这里看上去乘马车只能直行前进，但格纳利有预感，希望我们能搜索这片区域。
prozkoume_dalsi_krizovatk_zcYI

Another crossroads. It looked like it would only be possible to continue straight with a wagon, but Gnarly had a hunch and wanted us to search the area, and his instinct proved right. Near the crossroads we came across the camouflaged wagon. The goods were gone, but it was obvious the hands had hauled them off somewhere into the rocks.
又一个十字路口。这里看上去乘马车只能直行前进，但格纳利有预感，希望我们能搜索这片区域。他的预感是对的。我们在十字路口附近发现了被藏起来的马车。货物已经不见了，但很明显，是工人把它们拖去了岩石中某个地方。
prozkoume_dorazili_jsem_n_LV2q
We've reached a crossroads, I should take a look around. Maybe I'll find something that will tell us where they were headed.
我们已抵达十字路口，我应该四处看看。也许我能找到有关他们去了哪里的线索。
prozkoume_dorazili_jsme_n_M0mD

We've reached a crossroads near a cemetery. Because it wasn't clear which way the wagon was headed, I started searching the area. I didn't find anything, but Gnarly managed to find a spilled sack of charcoal on the northern side road, which must have fallen from the wagon we're searching for. It seems the hands headed north.
我们已抵达公墓附近的十字路口。由于不清楚马车的行进方向，我开始搜索这片区域。我什么都没找到，但格纳利在北边路上发现了一袋散落的木炭，这一定是从我们要找的马车上掉下来的。看起来，工人是向北走的。
prozkoume_dorazili_jsme_n_sISJ

After a while I found a spilled sack of charcoal on the northern side road, which must have fallen from the wagon we're searching for. So it seems the hands headed north.
我们已抵达公墓附近的十字路口。由于不清楚马车的行进方向，我开始搜索这片区域。没过多久，我在北边路上发现了一袋散落的木炭，这一定是从我们要找的马车上掉下来的。看起来，工人是向北走的。

格尔达在和解十字架旁看到一个幽灵。去看看也无妨。我会在岩石旁找到石质十字架，它就位于通往塔霍夫的道路下面的草地边上。附近有一棵枯萎的大树。

格尔达在和解十字架旁看到一个幽灵。去看看也无妨。我会在岩石旁找到石质十字架，它就位于通往塔霍夫的道路下面的草地边上。附近有一棵枯萎的大树。

prozkoume_jasak_mi_poradi_h89l

prozkoume_katerina_zminil_1JWp
Katherine mentioned that Alice's body is lying in the local morgue. Perhaps I'll learn something if I examine it.
凯瑟琳提到艾莉丝的尸体就安置在附近的停尸房，我得去查看那具尸体，或许能找到些线索。
prozkoume_klara_RLAw
I pressed Klara and she admitted someone is locked up in the fortress. I have to find them and find out what's really going on here!
我向克拉拉施压，她最终也向我坦白了堡垒中有人遭受囚禁的事实。我得把他们找出来，并查明真相。
prozkoume_kozlikmikes_B27L
I met two suspicious men at Nebakov Fortress and I'd swear on my life they were the guys looking for us at the herbwoman Bozhena's cottage. It's very strange!
我在内巴科夫堡垒遇到了两个古怪的人，而且我敢用生命担保，他们正是在草药师博珍娜家中寻找我们的两人，真是奇怪！
prozkoume_mel_bych_prozko_8DVc
I should investigate the smelting operations in Grund and find out from the workers if there's anything dodgy going on.
我在格兰德得调查冶炼流程，并从向厂里的工人查清是否存在见不得光的勾当。
prozkoume_mel_bych_se_por_BRqD
I should take a look around for more tracks from sheep or werewolves.
我得四处看看，寻找更多与羊羔和狼人有关的线索。
prozkoume_mozna_neuskodi__G0oH
It can't hurt to investigate this fresh murder. Perhaps we'll find some link to the previous ones.
前去调查最新一起凶杀案并没有任何坏处，或许我们还能从中发现其与其他案件的关联。
prozkoume_najdi_vranika_kjgp
I should take a look around Apollonia, even though I doubt I'll find any traces of the black rider in that rocky labyrinth. Maybe I'll get lucky, though.
我应该去阿波罗尼亚附近看一看，虽然在那个岩石迷宫里，可能找不到黑骑士的任何痕迹。不过，也许我会走运呢。
prozkoume_na_nebakove_jse_o6A6
I met a strange man at Nebakov Fortress and I'd swear on my life that he was one of the fellahs looking for us at the herbwoman Bozhena's cottage. It's very strange.
我在内巴科夫堡垒遇到了个古怪的人，而且我敢用生命担保，就是他和他的同伙在草药师博珍娜家中寻找我们，真是奇怪。
prozkoume_nasel_jsem_perg_OJlD
I found a parchment with all sorts of symbols and sayings. They should be related to the meanings of the symbols.
我发现了一张羊皮纸，上面有各种符号和谚语。它们应该与符号的含义有关。
prozkoume_nasel_jsem_veci_TPL1

I found an old hiding place beneath the conciliatory cross. Someone had recently been digging there and took something away, but they weren't interested in money or old documents, because the old papers with Ambrose's name on them lay untouched in the ground. Besides that, a black cloak with the emblem of the Knights of the Cross with the Red Star had been hidden there only recently. The unknown visitor tried to cover up his tracks, but left the stone cross at an angle by mistake.
我在和解十字架下面发现了一个旧的藏身之处。有人最近曾去那里挖掘，拿走了一些东西，但他们对钱或旧文书不感兴趣，因为写有安布洛斯名字的旧文书躺在地下，没有被动过。除此之外，一件带有红星十字骑士团徽章的黑色斗篷最近才被藏在那里。这位不知名的来访者试图掩盖自己的踪迹，但却不小心撞歪了石质十字架。
prozkoume_nasel_jsem_vran_6IHD

I found a black horse and a saddle in an old sheep pen. That could only mean one of two things. Either the black rider was still hiding somewhere nearby, or someone killed him and kept his horse. But one thing was certain in any case: it was no devil!
我在一个旧羊圈里发现了一匹黑马和一个马鞍。这只可能意味着两件事。要么是黑骑士仍然躲在附近，要么是有人杀了他并留下了他的马。但无论如何，有一件事是肯定的：没有什么魔鬼！
prozkoume_na_tvrzi_v_hlav_n1Hd
There are prisoners in the fort's main tower. But Michael the adjutant and Hertel the guard told different stories about them. It might be a good idea to find a way to talk to them.
堡垒的主塔上囚禁着一些犯人，但副官迈克尔和守卫赫特尔对那些人的说法大相径庭，也许想办法跟他们谈谈会是个好主意。
prozkoume_neco_jsem_nasel_CDg6
I found something, I should go back and report it.
我发现了点东西，应该回去报告。
prozkoume_neco_jsem_nasel_NxnH
I found something, I should go back and report it.
我发现了点东西，应该回去报告。
