prozkoume_nekde_v_tom_ukr_swCn
There has to be some information about the thieves' symbols in the hideout. I should search it thoroughly.
藏身处一定有关于盗贼符号的信息。我应该彻底搜查。
prozkoume_od_hutniku_jsem_ienj
I learned from the workers that if there is any fraud going on in the smelter, it must be connected to Foreman Volkmar.
我向厂里工人了解到，冶炼厂内如有欺诈事件，一定与领班沃尔克马尔有关。
prozkoume_od_kuratka_jsem_zCjg

I learned from Fowl I could find something in the plague graves among the trees behind the abandoned house. I just don't know which one to look in, so I could also dig up some pour soul who was struck down by the plague, which could be deadly.
我从福尔口中得知，树林里有座废弃房屋，屋后有些死于瘟疫之人的坟墓，我可以在坟墓里找到些有用的东西。但我也不知道具体是哪座坟墓，所以我就得刨开一些无辜者的安息之地，尽管这样会有些伤天害理。
prozkoume_od_vrby_jsem_se_Rs9z

I learned from Willow I could find something in the plague graves among the trees behind the abandoned house. I just don't know which one to look in, so I could also dig up some pour soul who was struck down by the plague, which could be deadly.

我从拜涅克那里了解到，他在位于树林内废弃房屋后的一座病死者坟墓里藏了东西。且按照他的说辞，左侧的坟墓才是我该留意的，我也因此成功找到了那些藏起来的东西。
prozkoume_pani_roza_nelha_bWph
Lady Rosa wasn't lying, the entrance to the underground passageway is a damn slippery and smelly affair. Fortunately, we safely made it and we can continue on, under St. James' Church.

prozkoume_p_bez_za_simou_6ALj

I've come to Victoria's house, but she's nowhere to be found. I should take a look around for her.
我已经来到了维多利亚的家，但是却没有发现她的踪影。我得四处找找，看看能否找到她。

我检查了艾莉丝的尸体，发现她被开膛破肚且劈得七零八碎，尸体残破到其中的血液已流得一干二净。
prozkoume_p_sima_si_se_mn_k0wD
Shima wants to talk to me somewhere away from the works. He clearly knows about the skulduggery in Grund. I should follow him.

In the lower part of the castle I found some strange metal objects. I've never seen anything like them before.
在城堡下方，我发现了一些奇怪的金属物件，先前我从未见过这样的东西。

Brabant wasn't keen on going into the underground tunnel, so in the end I'll be going with Samuel. He seems a bit bored here anyway.

prozkoume_ryba_smrdi_od_h_a3OZ
Something's seriously not right at Nebakov Fortress. There are too many suspicious things going on. I have to keep looking and figure it out. A fish stinks from the head as they say!
内巴科夫堡垒中似乎暗流涌动，空气中正弥漫着诸多可疑气息。我得继续调查，探明真相。毕竟俗话说得好，上梁不正下梁歪！
prozkoume_s_instrukcemi_o_QCZk

接到罗莎和杰式卡的指示后，我们终于可以进入地下通道了。通道的入口似乎就在厨房，那里还被用作堆放垃圾的坑道。真是值得期待......
prozkoume_sipy_pKqM
Nebakov Fortress is very well stocked with gunpowder. Almost as if they were expecting an attack.
内巴科夫堡垒火药储备尤为充足，仿佛他们早已预料到会有一场袭击。
prozkoume_stit_xRJl
I found a shield at Nebakov with the crest of Leipa on it. The same one as our escort from Rattay had. Strange…
我在内巴科夫找到了一把盾牌，还在上边发现了莱佩的纹章，我们来自拉泰的护卫队也有一样的，真是奇怪......
prozkoume_ted_si_musim_ta_6FjD
Are they really poachers? I have to find some proof so I don't go back to the gamekeeper empty-handed. Maybe I'll manage it unobserved and unscathed.
他们真的就是偷猎者吗？我得找出些证据来，这样就不必空着手回到沃斯塔克那里了。或许我可以悄无声息、毫发无损地完成此事。
prozkoume_tohle_nevypadal_5Zxf
This didn't look like the work of our killer. The dead girl didn't look like the other victims and the murderer was said to be her beau. This didn't help us in our investigation.
这起凶杀案的凶手看来并非我们要找的那位，而这位遇害女孩的死状也不像其他受害者那般，且据说，凶手不过是受害者的情夫。这起凶杀案最终没能帮到我们。
prozkoume_ve_sklepe_je_za_720k

I learned the truth about Nebakov Fortress! The fort is taken over by bandits, and the real lord of the fort, Jaromier of Nebakov, is locked up. Lord von Bergow and Hans Capon need to know about this!
我查清了发生在内巴科夫堡垒的事情！当前堡垒已遭到一伙强盗的占领，真正的堡垒领主雅罗米尔已被囚禁。我必须向冯·波尔高领主和汉斯·卡蓬汇报此事！
prozkoume_vesnicanhodne_j2ci

I spoke to a villager outside the fortress and he told me some strange things. It seems the man that introduced himself as Lord Jaromier is someone else entirely. I have to search the fortress, maybe I'll find out what's really going on!
在与堡垒之外的一位村民交谈后，我知晓了一些古怪之事，似乎那个自称雅罗米尔领主的家伙并非领主本人。我得搜查堡垒，说不定能够查到真相！
prozkoume_vesnican_NbpQ

I spoke to a villager outside the fortress and he told me some strange things. He hasn't seen Lord Jaromier for a while, and apparently a large group of armed men arrived at the fortress. It wouldn't be a bad idea to take a good look around and search the fortress thoroughly.
我在堡垒之外与一位村民进行了交谈，从他那里得知了一些诡异的事情。这位村民已经有一段时间没有见过雅罗米尔领主了，而且很显然，先前曾有一大群武装分子抵达过堡垒。我最好在附近探查一番并对堡垒进行仔细搜查。
prozkoume_vic_by_o_tom_me_laM4
Gerda, the apothecary's wife, should know more about it.
药剂师之妻格尔达应该知道更多情况。
prozkoume_viktroka_zmizel_8w9E
Victoria has disappeared! Even worse, it looks as if something terrible happened here. I found a puddle of fresh blood in the hearth room…
维多利亚失踪了！更糟的是，我在壁炉间发现了一滩新鲜的血迹，这里似乎发生了了某种惨案......
prozkoume_v_jednom_z_moro_O2jW
I found buried supplies in one of the plague graves.
我在其中一座病死者坟墓内找到了被埋藏的物资。
prozkoume_v_podzemi_koste_GLJb

There are indeed various things hidden in the underground of St. James' Church. Finding it wasn't easy, but eventually, thanks to Rosa's directions, we managed to find the place where the wall adjoins with the old mine gallery. Now all that's left to do is go back above ground.
圣雅各布教堂的地下属实暗藏诸多玄机，要寻得目的点也并非易事。但是多亏了罗莎提供的指引，我们最终找到了那堵与旧矿井巷道毗邻的墙。现在只需返回地上即可。
prozkoume_v_tabore_bylo_m_NDSC
They really were poachers. I searched the camp and found dead deer, pelts and everything else that comes with poaching.
他们确实就是偷猎者。搜查了营地后，我发现了死鹿、毛皮以及其他与偷猎有关的物品。
prozkoume_v_tabore_jsem_n_bGra
I found a dead sheep in the camp, so not werewolves, but bandits.
我在营地里找到了一只死去的羊羔，所以此事并非狼人所为，而是强盗。
prozkoume_zbrojekovar_tbdc
The Nebakov blacksmith Steer said he has some trouble down by the fortifications and up in the tower, but then backtracked suspiciously quickly. Maybe I should take a look.
内巴科夫的铁匠沃尔伊克说他在防御工事处以及塔楼之中均遇到了麻烦，但很快就形迹可疑地原路折返，或许我该去打探一番。
prozkoume_zbroje_w6b0
I found a lot of gear at the fortress, a suspicious amount for a fortress so small and a lord that isn't particularly wealthy. And there are more than enough men here too.
我在堡垒里找到了很多装备，如此数量与这一弹丸之地形成了鲜明对比，更何况此处的领主并不富裕，因此显得很是可疑。而且，这里的人也多得可疑。
prvni_kemp_musim_najit_py_J73g
Vidlak Pond and the forest northwest of it have become another hotbed of poachers. The gamekeeper wants me to comb the forest and find the person responsible for the decline in stocks of game.
维德拉克池塘以及它西北方向的树林也变成了偷猎者犯罪的温床。猎场看守人让我仔细搜查那片树林，找出导致猎物数量衰减的罪人。
pujc_si_t_gearmastr_mi_ur_WkKu
I need to have the right gear. A sword and a shield. The tournament quartermaster will give me what I need.
我需要准备一把剑和一副盾牌，比武军需官那里应该就有我需要的东西。
pujc_si_t_jestli_chci_pok_bais
If I want to continue, I need the right gear. A longsword. The tournament quartermaster will give me what I need.
要想继续参加其它项目，我就得准备一把长剑。比武军需官那里应该就有我需要的东西。
pujc_si_t_mam_pujcenej_eq_hyGc
I borrowed tournament gear including a longsword. I shouldn't forget to return it once the tournament's over.
我借来了一把长剑，用作我的比武装备。待到比武结束后，我得将它物归原主。
pujc_si_t_mam_pujcenou_vy_cAat
I borrowed tournament gear including a sword and a shield. I shouldn't forget to return it once the tournament's over.
我借来了一把剑和一副盾牌，用作我的比武装备。待到比武结束后，我得将它们如数归还。
putdownhu_konecne_muzu_vo_mNAC
The next stop is the huntsman's camp itself. It's a short way to the north from the marked tree. There should be a well-trodden path from the stream.
他的下一站就是自己的猎人营地。从那棵标记的树往北走还有一小段路程，那里应该有一条从小溪旁往上的常走小路。
putdownhu_polozil_jsem_vo_ilFj
In the camp, Vostatek laid down, saying he can't go on. His foot isn't doing well.
沃斯塔克在营地里躺下来，说他走不动了。他的脚伤不是太妙。
putdownhu_vostatkuv_tabor_qpXD
Vostatek's camp was within reach, but so was death. It'll come for all of us one day.
沃斯塔克的营地就在附近，但死亡也同样近在咫尺。终有一天，死亡会光顾我们所有人。
pytlakpta_camp2_iL4W
Deal with the poacher in the forest near Rocktower Pond.
处理掉石塔池塘附近树林里的偷猎者。
pytlakpta_druhy_lovci_aPdm
Ask Varel the gamekeeper about work.
向猎场看守人瓦雷尔询问任务的事。
pytlakpta_hajny_mi_chce_d_c4o5
Visit Vostatek the gamekeeper when he feels better.
待猎场看守人沃斯塔克恢复后前去拜访他。
pytlakpta_najdi_pytlaka_v_5Ftv
Find out the truth about the poacher in the Slatego forests.
调查斯拉戈树林里偷猎者的真相。
pytlakpta_poptej_se_hrobn_8Lg2
Ask the gravedigger about poachers.
向掘墓人打听偷猎者的事。
pytlakpta_poptej_se_mlyna_rc0r
Ask Miller Kreyzl about poachers.
向磨坊主克雷泽打听偷猎者的事。
pytlakpta_poptej_se_v_brl_5xdC
Ask around in The Lair about poachers.
在“巢穴”内打探偷猎者相关的事。
pytlakpta_promluv_si_s_ko_V7Sg
Talk to the tanner about the poacher.
与皮匠谈论偷猎者有关的事。
pytlakpta_promluv_si_s_ry_t7wc
Talk to the fisherman's wife about poachers.
与渔夫妻子谈论与偷猎者相关的事。
pytlakpta_prozkoumej_tabo_YH3a
Find evidence of poaching in the camp.
在营地里找出偷猎的证据。
pytlakpta_prvni_kemp_MZ5e
Deal with the poacher in the forest near Vidlak Pond.
处理掉维德拉克池塘附近树林里的偷猎者。
pytlakpta_pytlak_ptacek_Zf2g
Find out about poaching in the Kopanina forests .
在科帕尼那树林里寻找偷猎的痕迹。
pytlakpta_stopovacka_camp4_J4SM
Find the poacher in the Lower Semine forests.
在下塞米树林中找到偷猎者。
pytlakpta_temp_bez_to_nah_f0ty
Tell Varel about the poacher from Slatego.
将斯拉戈的偷猎者一事告知瓦雷尔。
pytlakpta_temp_hlaseni_lo_KNIF
Report the Lower Semine camp to the Gamekeeper.
将下塞米营地一事告知猎场看守人。
pytlakpta_temp_hlaseni_lo_Vbxc
Tell Varel about the Kopanina poacher.
将科帕尼那的偷猎者一事告知瓦雷尔。
pytlakpta_temp_nahlas_vse_QVVI
Tell Vostatek about the poacher from Vidlak Pond.
将维德拉克池塘偷猎者的情况告知沃斯塔克。
pytlakpta_temp_podej_hlas_CDi3
Tell Vostatek about the poacher from Rocktower Pond.
将石塔池塘偷猎者的情况告知沃斯塔克。
pytlakpta_vyrid_lapky_cam_jq9h
Wipe out the poaching bandits.
消灭偷猎的强盗。
pytlak_pt_dalsi_pytlak_kt_aMDa

To the north of Trosky castle lies the forest known as Kopanina. It's on the border between Varel's and Vostatek's patches. Somewhere in the rocks there's a poacher operating, knowing that the gamekeepers can't agree whose responsibility it is. In the end it's my job to track him down.
特罗斯基的北边就坐落着那片人称“科帕尼那”的树林，它就在瓦雷尔和沃斯塔克看管地区的交界处。山岩中的某处正有个偷猎者在肆意妄为，他也知道那片区域让两位猎场看守很难划清彼此的责任界限。事到如今，将由我把那个偷猎者揪出来。
pytlak_pt_nasel_jsem_pytl_6D36

To the north of Trosky castle lies the forest known as Kopanina. It's on the border between Varel's and Vostatek's patches. Somewhere in the rocks there's a poacher operating, knowing that the gamekeepers can't agree whose responsibility it is. In the end I went looking for his camp, and found it. But where's the poacher?
特罗斯基的北边就坐落着那片人称“科帕尼那”的树林，它就在瓦雷尔和沃斯塔克看管地区的交界处。山岩中的某处正有个偷猎者在肆意妄为，他也知道那片区域让两位猎场看守很难划清彼此的责任界限。最终，我出发寻找偷猎者的营地，并成功找到，可是却不见偷猎者本人的身影。
pytlak_pt_vyreseno_uff_do_TmsG

To the north of Trosky castle lies the forest known as Kopanina. It's on the border between Varel's and Vostatek's patches. Somewhere in the rocks there's a poacher operating. And the bloody poacher was none other than Hans Capon.
特罗斯基的北边就坐落着那片人称“科帕尼那”的树林，它就在瓦雷尔和沃斯塔克看管地区的交界处。山岩中的某处正有个偷猎者在肆意妄为，而那个该死的偷猎者不是别人，正是汉斯·卡蓬。
p_ziskej__p_hracovi_zabav_uCuA
Damn it! The map is gone. If I want that treasure I have to get it back.
该死！地图居然丢了。如果想拿到那份宝藏，我就得找回地图。
qdesc_arsdimicatoria_HiPK

In Kuttenberg, I met a master swordsman and engaged in a friendly duel with him. It turned out, it's not that easy in Kuttenberg to practice the art of swordsmanship, or Schwertkunst, also known by the scholarly name of Ars Dimicatoria.
我在库滕堡遇到了一位剑术大师，我们与武会友，进行了一场决斗。事实证明，要想在库滕堡练习剑术可没那么简单。而所谓剑术，即Schwertkunst（德语：剑术），同样以其学名Ars Dimicatoria著称。
qdesc_asidovezi_4fPy

Builder Johann Parler is working on the Church of Saint Barbara, and he wants to protect the building from fire and lightning with a bit of magic. He couldn't get his hands on a magical talisman or thunderstone anywhere, so he wants me to steal three protective talismans from Kuttenberg burghers, to melt them down, and forge a protective axe out of them to get rid of any evidence.
建筑商约翰·帕勒正在修建圣芭芭拉教堂，他想要利用一些魔法来保护教堂免受火灾和雷电的侵害。他无法找到有魔力的护身符或雷石，所以他想让我从库滕堡的市民那里偷取三枚护身符，将它们熔化，然后锻造成一把防护斧，以此销毁偷窃的证据。
qdesc_azzahrob_GbwV
Rat needs to get the seal of a dead mine owner from his grave in Sedletz for the Guild.
“耗子”想要替公会取得已故矿主的印章，而那枚印章就在塞德莱茨的矿主坟墓里。
qdesc_bohutovavlozka_g2ma
It's been quite some time since Radzig and Hanush last heard from Henry and Capon… Let's hope that has nothing to do with the big battle that just took place in the region.
拉德季和瀚纳什已经有很长一段时间没有收到亨利和卡蓬的消息了……但愿刚在区域内发生的那场大战与这一境况无关。
qdesc_bratrizcimburka_ldpJ

Knights Sir Jan 'Posy' and Sir Miroslav 'Tugbone' of Zimburg were attacked along with their company while travelling to the monastery in Sedletz. Miroslav was captured, and Jan is preparing to save him.
齐姆博格的骑士扬·“花骨朵”及“扯骨”米洛斯拉夫爵士带人前往塞德莱茨的修道院时，遭到了袭击。米洛斯拉夫被俘，扬正准备去救他。
qdesc_budovanilazni_Q2BZ
Betty, the owner of the baths in Kuttenberg, asked me to help her get the bankrupt business up and running again.
贝蒂——库滕堡的澡堂老板让我帮她重振破败的生意，让澡堂重新开张。
qdesc_certinatroskach_0vax

Trosky chamberlain, the right hand of Otto von Bergow, claims that the castle is infested with devils and that this is nothing out of the ordinary. He asked me to help him exorcise the devils. I am supposed to ask three scared people where the devils are coming from and then sprinkle those places with water. I am curious to see what happens.
特罗斯基的管家，同时也是奥托·冯·波尔高的得力助手，声称城堡内游荡着诸多魔鬼，而且如此现象并非新奇之事。他请求我协助他将那些魔鬼驱除，我得向三位受惊的人询问那些魔鬼的出没之地，并向那些地方泼洒圣水。至于事态会如何进展，拭目以待吧。
qdesc_cikanskacest_w337
The nomads' Voivode wants to find his lost daughter Marika.
游民司令官想要找回他失踪的女儿玛丽卡。
qdesc_crosscountrytrosecko_ZIjz
Mikolajovy závody po Troseckých lesích a polích.
qdesc_damavnesnazich_9XSa
I met a vagrant named Margaret, who had it in for some bastard in Kuttenberg. I'll try to help her and maybe I'll get something out of it.
我遇到一个叫玛格丽特的乞丐，她对库滕堡的一个混蛋怀恨在心。我会试着帮助她，也许可以从中得到些什么。
qdesc_dlc_bruncvikova_zbr_aFxA
It is said that somewhere in Trosky is hidden, the armour of Prince Brunswick himself, famed for adding the lion to our country's coat of arms.
据说在特罗斯基的某个地方藏着布伦瑞克王子本人的护甲。那位因给我们国家的盾徽添上了狮子纹章而闻名。
qdesc_drak_xczF
Rumours have started spreading about a mythical creature in the Kuttenberg region. Is there any truth to them?
库滕堡一时间流言四起，关于某种神秘生物的讨论开始传开，也不知如此传闻是否有依据。
qdesc_dvojityagent_27AM
Jan of Suchotlesky has sent me in his name to negotiate the release of his brother, a knight who is held captive in Sigismund's camp.
苏霍茨基的杨派我以他之名去谈判，要求释放他的哥哥，后者被囚禁在西格斯蒙德营地。
qdesc_erik_xfjE
Sigismund has pulled out of the country and is heading back to Hungary. The theft of the silver from the Italian Court turned out to be the last straw. This is a victory worth celebrating!
西格斯蒙德已经撤离这个国家，正在返回匈牙利。意大利宫廷的银器盗窃成为压垮他的最后一根稻草。这是一场值得庆祝的胜利！
qdesc_falesnaposadka_5m6U

Kuttenberg innkeeper Geldstück is having problems with a group of Sigismund's soldiers who have ensconsed themselves on the road between Kuttenberg and Grund, collecting tolls from merchants. He asked me if I could do something about it.
库滕堡的酒馆老板盖尔斯塔克遇到了麻烦。据说一伙西格斯蒙德的部下在库滕堡和格兰德之间的道路上扎了营，并向过往的路人收取过路费，因此酒馆老板希望我能处理此事。
qdesc_fightclubhorany_pSJj
Thomlin Bruthans founded a fight club in Horschan. If I manage to beat the local goons, I could get a nice reward.
托姆林·布鲁桑斯在霍斯昌成立了一家搏击俱乐部。倘若我能击败当地的打手们，就能得到一笔丰厚的奖赏。
qdesc_fightclubkutnahora_HpGl
In the worst dive in Kuttenberg, they host fighting matches. It's not exactly high-quality entertainment, but I could earn some extra money there
就在库滕堡一处满目疮痍的酒馆里，人们办起了搏击比赛。尽管那不过是种难登大雅之堂的娱乐方式，但或许能让我赚到点零用钱。
qdesc_fightclubmiskovice_L4yB
The lads from Miskowitz are training in fistfights after the incident with the Praguers. Maybe I could learn something too.
在经历了一场与布拉格人之间的冲突后，来自米斯科维茨年轻人们纷纷开始了战斗训练，或许我也能从中学到点东西。
qdesc_fightclubpodsemin_rQzQ
In Lower Semine Mill, the hired hands pass the time with fistfights. I could try my hand against them too.
在下塞米磨坊，工人们会用拳斗来打发时间。我也可以去和他们比试比试。
qdesc_fightclubvelmistrku_hHY7
At the cemetery in Kuttenberg, I could meet the strongest fighter around. Maybe it's a superstition, maybe I'm going to fight for the title of grandmaster
据说库滕堡的墓园里能遇到一位此地最强的搏击手。也许那不过是种装神弄鬼的说辞，但也许我还是得为了最强的名号而尝试一番。
qdesc_fightclubvelmistrtr_wt4n
There's supposedly a grandmaster fighter living in Kopanina. If I challenge him to a fight I might win his title.
据说科帕尼那居住着一位格斗大师，倘若我向他发起挑战，或许会有机会赢走他的头衔。
qdesc_fightclubzelejov_o4R7
There's a fighting competition in a Zhelejov inn. I could join too.
哲勒约夫的酒馆里有场比武，我也可以参加。
qdesc_finale_xdvR

I'm going back to Suchdol at the head of Jobst's army, by the side of my father Radzig Kobyla and Hanush of Leipa. The time has come to break the siege, liberate my friends and deal with the treacherous Praguers once and for all!
我将在父亲拉德季·科比拉和莱佩的瀚纳什爵士的陪同下，率领约布斯特的军队返回苏赫多尔。击溃围攻的时机已到，是时候解救我的朋友并将那些阴险狡诈的布拉格军团赶尽杀绝了！
qdesc_hadkakonaru_JAIP

In the nomad camp, I met two riders whose disagreement about which horse race is the best seemed unsolvable. But that wouldn't be me if I didn't get involved and try to settle it. First, however, it was necessary to prove myself to them so that they would even consider me an equal horseman.

In the nomad camp, I met two riders whose disagreement about which horse race is the best seemed unsolvable. But that wouldn't be me if I didn't get involved and try to settle it. First, however, it was necessary to prove myself to them so that they would even consider me an equal horseman.
qdesc_havirskyturnaj_cV2D

Every mine shaft in Kuttenberg has been getting ready for the miners' annual popinjay competition. Foreman Vlach invited me to come watch their champion Anton Kaspar win. The competition takes place in the morning at the shooting range in Hoprink.
库滕堡的每一个矿队都在为年度矿工射鸟竞赛摩拳擦掌。领班弗拉赫邀请我前去观看他们冠军选手安东·卡斯帕的比赛，而这场竞赛将于早晨在霍普林克的射击场举行。
qdesc_hezounkarlik_7m8L
After Canker, Handsome Charlie is up next.
“溃疡”之后，下一个就是英俊查理。
qdesc_hledanilichtenstejna_tfuM

It was obvious it wouldn't be easy to find Sir Hans. There was someone here who could help me, though: John of Liechtenstein, who's spying for Jobst in Kuttenberg. But there was no sign of him, and unfortunately I knew why. If anyone could have told me what happened to Sir Hans, it was Liechtenstein. But how can I find him? Kuttenberg isn't only big, it's pretty dangerous by all accounts.
要想找到汉斯爵士很显然并非易事，但此地尚有一人，也就是约翰·列支敦士登，可以向我提供帮助。此人正在为库滕堡的约布斯特执行间谍任务，但如今四处都打探不到他的踪迹，可惜的是我对此也毫无头绪。要想知晓汉斯爵士的遭遇，列支敦士登就是个不错的人选，可是库滕堡这座城市不仅占地广阔，而且据说危机四伏，所以我要怎样才能找到他呢？
qdesc_hledanipsa_eIuu
I should find out what happened to my loyal friend Mutt and take care of him.
我得查明呆呆的境况，并好好照顾我这位忠实的伙伴。
qdesc_hledanispravedlnosti_NYtb
Captain Frenzl is looking for the thief from Wysoka. And since I was the one who helped Pavel with the theft, I decided to help him.
弗伦队长正在搜捕来自维索卡的小偷。由于我曾帮助帕维尔实施盗窃，我决定帮助他。
qdesc_hostinaprochude_JgZ1
When I was looking for John of Liechtenstein, I needed to speak to Goatskin and my search led me to a tavern called the Hole. There I talked to the local gaffer, Chenyek, who offered me a job.
在寻找列支敦士登的约翰的过程中，我得与山羊皮进行交流，也因调查需要来到了一家名为“墙洞”的酒馆。我在酒馆中与领班程叶科进行了一番交谈，而他也向我委托了一项任务。
qdesc_hromovykamen_DSi8
Kona, who lives over in Grund, needs a thunderstone so she can draw on its magical power to help her with her troubles. She asked me to help her get one.
格兰德的柯娜需要借助一块雷石的魔力帮她解决麻烦。她让我帮她找一块。
qdesc_jantlama_0ckk
Handsome Charlie won't rob anyone ever again. Next in line is Johnny the Gob, Gules' right hand man.
英俊查理不会再出来抢劫了。下一个是大嘴约翰尼，他是古勒斯的左右手。
qdesc_jizdnilukostrelbatr_ZsPe
Bibrek zkouší moje jezdecké a lukostřelecké umění.
qdesc_kajicna_pout__kutno_XkJr
Henry seeks salvation in the Kuttenberg region and the priests send him on a pilgrimage.
亨利在库滕堡地区寻求救赎，牧师们送他去朝圣。
qdesc_kajicna_pout__trose_pZPC
Henry seeks salvation in the Trosky region and the priest sends him on a pilgrimage.
亨利在特罗斯基地区寻求救赎，牧师派他前去进行朝圣。
qdesc_karelnesepytel_XjEA
I met a man on a forest path with an arrow stuck in his head. His name is Karel, and he promised me a reward if I help him carry some sacks to his camp.
我在一条林间小路上遇到一个头上插着一支箭的人。他叫卡雷尔，他许诺说，如果我帮忙把麻袋搬到他的营地，会给我报酬。
qdesc_kaspar_Xkap
The last thing that needs to be dealt with is Casper, whom even Gules respects.
最后我们要解决卡斯帕，但就连古勒斯本人都对他的本领肃然起敬。
qdesc_katuvsleh_Ams6

Heinz, Kuttenberg's executioner, has been down on his luck lately, and wants to break the curse by having a new executioner's sword made using various lucky charms. Naturally, I am to find them all and then forge the blade.
库滕堡的刽子手海尼克最近运气不佳，他想使用各种幸运符制作一把全新的行刑剑，以此来打破诅咒。当然，我得找到所有幸运符，然后锻造这把剑。
qdesc_kejkliri_5g3N
Two lads from Zhelejov dream of being bards extolled throughout the land. But they need a helping hand...
两个来自哲勒约夫的小伙子梦想成为全国闻名的吟游诗人，但是他们需要帮助…
qdesc_klasternitajemstvi_qN0Q

Kuttenberg burgher Casper Rudolf decided on a risky undertaking. Hoping to capitalise on the wine-growing revival under Charles IV, he bought some land on the hillside below St Barbara's Cathedral and planted a vineyard there. It soon became clear, though, that his wine couldn't compete with the wine made by the Sedletz Monastery. Casper suspects that the monks' wine-making process has some secret, and my task is to find out what it is.
库滕堡市民卡斯帕·鲁道夫决定进行一项冒险的尝试。他想抓住查理四世时期的葡萄酒业复苏的机遇，购买了圣芭芭拉大教堂的山坡下的一片土地，并在那里打造了一个葡萄园。但他很快就发现，他的葡萄酒无法与塞德莱茨修道院酿造的葡萄酒相媲美。卡斯帕怀疑修道院的酿酒工艺可能有什么秘方，我的任务就是找到这个秘方。
qdesc_koneczabomysichvalek_LsWW

Every year, disputes over the pasture between Tachov and Zhelejov culminate in the men from both villages getting together, arguing, and punching each other in the mouth. But this year, they'll have a guest from Skalitz to share in the glory.
每年，塔霍夫和哲勒约夫之间关于牧场的纠纷都会升级，两个村子的男人聚在一起，争吵不休，互相打斗。但今年，一位来自斯卡利茨的客人将与他们分享荣耀。
qdesc_kopie_tP4P

Sigismund's soldiers are not exactly loving each other. One of them, Thomas of Kolin, would like to discreetly get his hands on a sword belonging to a cuman called Basan, and I'm supposed to help him.
西格斯蒙德手下的士兵们实际上互有嫌隙，其中一位来自科林且名为托马斯的士兵就想将其魔爪悄悄伸向一把宝剑，而那把剑的主人便是库曼人巴桑，而我也将给托马斯提供帮助。
qdesc_korenarkazachrana_HRFY
Pavlena, the daughter of Bozhena the herb woman, did not return from her errands in Troskowitz. I promised to help Bozhena because, after all, Lord Capon and I are in their debt.
采药女博珍娜的女儿帕芙莱娜去特罗斯科维茨干活之后，就再也没回来。我答应帮博珍娜找到她女儿，毕竟我和卡蓬大人还欠她们人情呢。
qdesc_kovar_6Jg5
The Tachov blacksmith could use the help of an experienced hand. This kind of work would certainly pay off.
塔霍夫铁匠需要一个有经验的帮手，这份差事一定会有所回报。
qdesc_kovarskasoutez_iKaI

If you ask me, Zdimir the blacksmith boasts about the skills of his apprentice, Matthias, a bit too much. He even suggested we make a bet on who can forge the best hunting sword. The winner gets both weapons and a nice pile of groschen on top.
要我说，铁匠兹迪米尔吹嘘了徒弟马蒂亚斯的技能。他甚至建议我们打一个赌，赌谁能锻造出最好的猎剑。赢家可以得到这两把武器和一大笔钱。
qdesc_kralovskestribro_KdKN
Who better to help free Capon than the former owner of the fortress where Capon is being held prisoner? But maybe he'll want something in return…
卡蓬被关押在那座堡垒中，它的上一任主人肯定是能帮忙解救卡蓬的好人选。但是说不定他会要些回报……
qdesc_kubaparalu_OtM1
Katherine needs help with a murder investigation. She's afraid her cover has been blown and someone has started killing her contacts.
凯瑟琳需要找人协助她调查一起凶杀案，而她担心自己早已暴露，并有人已经开始杀死她的接头人。
qdesc_kumani_uidY
The people of Troskowitz have a clear opinion on the Cumans. But are all the Cumans really that bad?
特罗斯科维茨人对库曼人态度显而易见，但库曼人真的都那么坏吗？
qdesc_kutnohorskyturnaj_XiCx

The Kuttenberg swordsman's brotherhood decided to hold a tournament, which the town council approved as a tournament is sure to contribute to their town's greater glory. For me, it's a great opportunity to improve my swordsmanship and perhaps win a valuable prize and a bit of fame.
库滕堡的剑客兄弟会决定承办一场比武大赛，而市议会也批准了比武的举办，认为这次比武必将给城镇带来无上的荣光。对于我而言，这也将是一次提升剑术的绝佳机会，而且说不定能赢到颇具价值的奖赏，还能让自己小获名声。
qdesc_lecenipecky_1w7V
I offered to try to help Peter, the husband of the farmer Mlada from Suchdol.
我主动提出帮助彼得，他是苏赫多尔农妇姆拉达的丈夫。
qdesc_listovnitajemstvi_uAIW
Knowing how to read and write is the privilege of priests and lords. But who should a commoner turn to when he needs to write a letter? To me, for instance!
只有牧师与贵族才有资格学习读写，但假如像我这样的凡夫俗子想要写封信的话该向谁求助呢？！
qdesc_lovnabanditu_SuAl
A hefty reward has been offered for Matthew the "Collector"… Should I bring him to justice or leave him be?
有人以一份丰厚的报酬悬赏捉拿“税吏”马修…我该将他绳之以法吗？还是认其招摇过市呢？
qdesc_lov_s_ptackem_AdbO
Lord Capon wants to go hunting.
卡蓬领主想去打猎。
qdesc_m48b__rutina_a_vypad_q60a
Suchdol is besieged by the Prague army. If we want to survive, we must prevent the enemy from advancing.
苏赫多尔正在被布拉格军队围攻。要想生存下来，我们就必须阻止敌人的进犯。
qdesc_m48c__hlad_a_zmar_bZpP
Losses and a lack of food are taking their toll on the defenders of Suchdol. Everyone is hungry, and with each passing day, the Praguers are getting closer to the walls.
苏赫多尔的守卫正面临着惨重的损失和食物短缺，大家都饥肠辘辘，而每一天，布拉格人都离城墙越来越近。
qdesc_magickysip_rc6h

I met some bandits at the Devil's Den tavern. They need some help with obtaining a magic arrow, which, unfortunately, is stuck in their leader's head, and he's dead and buried. Looks like a pretty dirty job.
我在魔窟酒馆遇到了一群强盗。他们希望有人帮忙取回一支魔箭，但不幸的是，这支箭插在他们首领的头上，而首领已死且已经入土。似乎是个相当肮脏的差事。
qdesc_mapakpokladu_pr3x
In Pschitoky I was able to get a treasure map from a hired hand named Krizhan. Perhaps it will lead me to riches.
我从普西托克的一位名为克里赞的雇工手中得到了一份藏宝图，或许它会指引我走向暴富之路。
qdesc_masterstrike_tutori_d5Ch
Dry Devil offered to teach me the ultimate swordsmanship technique, the master strike.
“酒鬼”打算向我传授剑术的终极奥义——大师一击。
qdesc_masterstrike_tutori_voZ1
Now that I've refreshed my memory on combos, I could learn the master strike from Master Tomcat.
我已经复习了之前学到的连击技巧，现在该向公猫大师讨教大师之击了。
qdesc_mlynaruvucen_ZlM9
I got a tip at the Troskowitz tavern the Lower Semine miller, Kreyzl, might have some work for me. The bloke refused to tell me much until I got some work done, as is customary around these parts.
我在特罗斯科维茨酒馆打听得知，下塞米磨坊主克雷泽有差事要人完成。可根据当地的规矩，我得先帮他完成一些任务，才能更深入了解情况。
qdesc_mysi1_cPla

The disputes between Tachov and Zhelejov have been going on for years, and now I've got myself involved too. The innkeeper Prochek would love to see the Zhelejov landowner Olbram's bull with some paint on its hide.
塔霍夫与哲勒约夫间的纠纷已持续了多年，而如今我却也卷入了他们之间的恩怨中。酒馆老板普罗切克非常想见到哲勒约夫地主奥尔布拉姆的公牛身上被涂鸦。
qdesc_nahlasenitovarystva_UZwB
To follow the law, or break it?
要遵守规矩吗？还是打破规矩呢？
qdesc_nakovarne_gai0
A group of Mesoles bandits has threatened to kill me if I don't do some blacksmithing for them.
梅索莱斯的一伙强盗威胁要把我杀死，除非我帮他们干点铁匠活。
qdesc_natroskach_sReO

Me and Sir Hans finally got to Trosky, but it certainly didn’t turn out the way we expected. Capon was accused of poaching and is facing the gallows. Luckily, Captain Thomas is in the castle - he saw our letter and knows we're messengers from Rattay and not just some vagabonds. But Thomas is lying wounded and feverish in the chapel in the Maiden Tower.
汉斯爵士和我终于进入了特罗斯基，但结果显然不像我们预想的那般。卡蓬受到了偷猎的指控，正面临着绞刑的审判。万幸的是，托马斯队长就在城堡之中，看过我们信件的他也清楚我们正是来自拉泰的特使而非流浪之人。只不过身负重伤、浑身发烫的他正躺在少女塔内的小教堂里。
qdesc_nebakovobrana_5Txk

Following an exhausting day full of twists and new alliances, a peaceful evening has arisen. Zizka is recovering from his injuries and his band is about to leave the estate of Sir Otto von Bergow in the morning.
跌宕起伏的一天让我们精疲力竭，好在我们结识了很多新盟友，之后我们度过了一个平静的夜晚。杰式卡的伤势正在恢复，而他的队伍也将在早晨离开奥托·冯·波尔高的地盘。
qdesc_nebakovpruzkum_b5rG

We finally met with Lord von Bergow, but unfortunately this is not the time for political negotiations. The region is plagued by a group of bandits, and von Bergow is gathering troops to strike against them. He has, therefore, sent us to Nebakov to take the call to arms to the lord there.
我们终于见到了冯·波尔高大人，但遗憾的是，现在似乎并非商讨政事的时候。当前，这片区域正遭受一伙强盗的侵扰，而冯·波尔高正召集军队对强盗进行围剿，因此他派我们前往内巴科夫，向那里的领主发出征战号召。
qdesc_nemcuvpoklad_BTW2
The Guild wants to show it has long arms, long enough to reach Kuttenberg innkeeper Beikovetz, who supports King Sigismund.
公会想要展现自己广阔的势力范围，显示他们甚至能接触到支持西格斯蒙德国王的库滕堡酒馆老板，贝科维茨。
qdesc_oblehanisuchdole_Hi3O
The Prague army has marched on Suchdol to retreive the silver stolen from the Italian Court.
布拉格的军队为了夺回在意大利宫被偷走的银子而向苏赫多尔进军。
qdesc_papezskylegat_gQW6
Zizka's men took the captive Otto von Bergow from the conquered Maleshov back to Suchdol, where he'll be interrogated. Then we'll decide what to do next.
杰式卡的部下将被俘的奥托·冯·波尔高从被占领的马列索夫带回了苏赫多尔，他将在那里接受审讯。审讯结束后，我们会制定下一步计划。
qdesc_pasacek_nechuta_bwDt
The shepherd boy Natan thinks a werewolf is stealing his sheep. I'll see where these tracks lead me.
牧童纳坦认为有只狼人在正在偷猎他的羊羔。我得看看这些踪迹会把我带去哪里。
qdesc_pasacek_safarik_Kxj8
Stanislav the shepherd bought a new ram, but the ram ran away from him into the forest and he's afraid to go in there because of wolves.
牧羊人斯坦尼斯拉夫新买了一只公羊，但它逃进了森林。森林里有狼，斯坦尼斯拉夫不敢进去。
qdesc_pasacek_smolik_3qvo

The wolves scattered the shepherd Smoliek's sheep and one ran into the forest. The wolves have probably gotten their teeth into her long ago, but it would help Smoliek to have her ear as proof he didn't sell her.
狼群冲散了牧羊人斯莫利克的羊群，有一只羊跑到了森林里。她可能已经被狼群吃掉了，但如果斯莫利克能找到她的耳朵，就能证明他没有把她卖掉。
qdesc_pasacek_zibrid_UkbA
Herdsboy Siegfried is having trouble with wolves.
牧童西格弗里德正受到狼群的侵扰。
qdesc_plesnivec_RnDK
Lord Semine might have had mercy on Gules, but he won't be so kind to his former entourage. Now it's up to me to get rid of the remnants of the band, starting with Canker.
塞米大人可能会对古勒斯手下留情，但对他之前的跟班就没有那么仁慈了。现在由我来剿灭这个团伙的余党，先从”溃疡“入手。
qdesc_pogrom_0Pe5
Sigismund has decided to finish the Jews of Kuttenberg for helping Liechtenstein. We have to stop him and save as many people as we can.
为帮助列支敦士登，西格斯蒙德决意屠杀库滕堡的犹太人。我们必须阻止他，尽可能救下更多人。
qdesc_poklad_dqcl
Zdenyek the Mouth, a farmhand from Tachov, told me a story of two brothers and a silver axe which was buried alongside one of them in this region.
来自塔霍夫的农场工“大嘴”兹登耶克向我诉说了两兄弟与银斧的故事，这把斧头和兄弟中的一人一起埋葬在这片地区。
qdesc_po_pytlacke_stezce_sSoi
A rare white roebuck was felled by a poacher. Such a thing cannot be left unpunished.
一只罕见的白獐落入了偷猎者手中。偷猎者必须为此受到惩罚。
qdesc_poslednipomazani_AuHg
Suchdol is besieged by the Praguers.
苏赫多尔正陷于布拉格军队的围攻当中。
qdesc_poustevnik_a_vdova_b8WK
An old hermit has a strange wish: to pass on a message of forgiveness to the widow Margaret from Troskowitz. "Ambrose forgives you, woman, provided his brother gets what he deserves."
一位老隐士有一个奇怪的愿望：把宽恕的口信传递给特罗斯科维茨的寡妇玛格丽特。“女人，只要他的弟弟得到应得的东西，安布洛斯就会原谅你。”
qdesc_poustevnik_VsIZ

The Tachov blacksmith, Radovan, has one bad character trait… Well, two actually: bragging and boozing. This time, though, his drunken bragging has put him in a tight spot. He has to forge a superb sword out of Damascus steel. Luckily, the blacksmith has a clear plan.
塔霍夫铁匠拉多万有一个性格缺陷…嗯，实际上是两个：吹牛和酗酒。不过这一次，他的酒后吹嘘让他陷入了麻烦。他必须用大马士革钢锻造出一把宝剑。幸运的是，铁匠有一个明确的计划。
qdesc_pracenavinici_oG0V

Work in the vineyard is hard and grueling, mostly taking place in the scorching summer and for meager pay. Not for the faint-hearted. But it gives me the opportunity to clear my mind and explore the places where the drink of kings is born.
葡萄园里的工作尤为艰辛，且不说得在灼阳烈日之下埋头苦干，更何况赚到的薪水不过一星半点，如此差事真不适合意志薄弱之人。但如此工作也给了我理清思绪以及探索这个红酒之王发源地的机会。
qdesc_pracharna_fjj5

I stole a document from the Rathaus for Kreyzl and after tasting nitre, I had the feeling regular food would never taste the same. What's next? The miller wanted to get his hands on some kind of alchemy book from Prague which, as chance would have it, has found its way to Trosky Castle.
我从市政厅那里偷来了一份要交给克雷泽的文件，而尝过硝石后，我感觉那些寻常食物的味道从此便与众不同。接下来要做什么呢？磨坊主想从布拉格弄到一本炼金术的书，而这本书恰巧被送到了特罗斯基城堡。
qdesc_prepadeni_L1vu

Me, Sir Hans Capon and our armed escort are on our way to Trosky Castle to deliver a message to the lord there, Sir Otto von Bergow. Von Bergow is the most influential man in the League of Lords, and our task is to try and enlist his support in the resistance against King Sigismund and rescuing King Wenceslas from captivity. Everyone is counting on us: Sir Hanush of Leipa, Margrave Jobst of Moravia and my father, Sir Radzig Kobyla.
我和汉斯·卡蓬少主在卫兵的护送下，赶往特罗斯基城堡，传信给当地领主奥托·冯·波尔高大人。冯·波尔高在领主联盟中德高望重，我们此行任务就是说服他，共同抗击西格斯蒙德国王，解救瓦茨拉夫国王。莱佩的瀚纳什大人、摩拉维亚的约布斯特侯爵，还有我的父亲，拉德季·科比拉大人，诸公尽寄希望于我辈。
qdesc_prepadenivlasskehod_vmdt
We are going to steal royal silver from the Italian Court.
我们计划要从意大利宫中偷走属于皇室的白银。
qdesc_prijezdnasuchdol_j0zX

When fleeing from Trosky we managed to discover that Bergow was headed with Sir Hans Capon to somewhere around Kuttenberg. Fortunately, a certain Hynek of Kunstadt, known as Dry Devil, is holed up in the Kuttenberg region. He could help us rescue Sir Hans. His base is Suchdol Fortress, which belongs to Lord Peter of Pisek, and that's where we have headed...
在逃离特罗斯基时，我们发现冯·波尔高正和卡蓬爵士一起前往库滕堡附近的地区。而幸运的是，有这么一名库斯塔特的海尼克，人称“酒鬼”，正在库滕堡地区暗中行动，他可以帮助我们救出汉斯爵士。他的基地位处苏赫多尔要塞，从属于皮塞克的彼得领主，而那里就是我们要去的地方……
qdesc_pro_mistra_zavet_Y2Lc
An old widow is looking for someone to stand for her in a duel.
一位老寡妇正在寻找一个能够代替她参加决斗的人。
qdesc_pytlakptacek_ockl
Exterminate the local vermin who are killing poor animals.
将当地滥杀无辜动物的偷猎者斩草除根。
qdesc_rasuvucen_1n5P

Life is anything but boring with Kreyzl. As soon as I finished one task, I got another striaght away. This time I'm supposed to find a saltpetre pit somewhere Trosky region. The miller wants to use it bring life to a golem made of flour.
跟克雷泽相处的时光真是无聊至极。每当我完成一项任务，就会马上接到另一项。而这一次，我受命前往特罗斯基周边寻找一处硝石坑。那位磨坊主想要借助它来给一个面粉做的泥人儿赋予生命。
qdesc_relikviarprocimburky_uBFi
Jan Posy and Miroslav Tugbone need help with the Cumans, who have stolen their chest. I have no idea what's in it but Posy really wants it. The Cumans probably still have it.
库曼人夺走了扬·“花骨朵”和“扯骨”米洛斯拉夫的箱子，他们现在需要帮助。或许箱子还在库曼人手里，但我并不知道里边都有些什么，只知道波西很想将它夺回。
qdesc_relikvie_aCv7

Not far from the Sedletz graveyard I met a knight who told me about his role model, Sir Valentine, who is said to have once made a pilgrimage to Jerusalem and brought back soil from a holy field. They say Valentine is buried in the church graveyard, and the knight asked me if I could bring him his sword.
就在离塞德莱茨墓园不远处，我遇到了一位骑士，他跟我谈起了他所仰慕之人——瓦伦丁爵士。据说这位爵士曾踏上了前往耶路撒冷的朝圣之旅，并从一片圣土内取回了一些土壤。人们都说瓦伦丁就被埋葬在那座教堂的墓园里，而那位骑士想让我替他带回瓦伦丁的佩剑。
qdesc_rozinakniha_N958
During my trip to Maleshov, Rosa Ruthard also asked me to get a book she desires greatly. I probably won't get there again, so I shouldn't forget.
在前往马列索夫的途中，我也正好收到了罗莎·鲁瑟德的请求，她希望我能拿到一本她渴望许久的书籍。也许将来我不会再造访马列索夫，所以不能忘记此事。
qdesc_sabotazlazni_1SQi

The city council is going to vote soon to choose which baths in Kuttenberg to elevate to City Bathhouse status, which means it won't have to pay high taxes. As might be expected, Betty's Kingfisher bathhouse doesn't have much chance because Adam, her biggest rival, is bribing councillor Jerome Naaz to award him the title.
市议会即将为选出库滕堡的市立澡堂举行投票，这也意味着荣登市级地位的澡堂将免除高额的税费。不出预料的话，贝蒂的翠鸟澡堂将很难在此次竞争中胜出，因为她最大的对手亚当正在贿赂议员杰罗姆·纳兹，好让他将头衔让给亚当。
qdesc_sedmstatecnych2_VIB0
We freed the Dry Devil. Now he needs me to get his old band back together.
我们救出了酒鬼，现在他想让我找回他的老部下。
qdesc_sedmstatecnych_CbNS
Zizka and I set out to find the Dry Devil, who is hiding somewhere around Kuttenberg and sabotaging Sigismund's efforts.
杰式卡与我已出发寻找酒鬼，据说他正藏在库滕堡的某处，企图让西格斯蒙德的努力化为泡影。
qdesc_semin_YV8j
Who are all the people involved in the ambush of von Bergow and where are the bandits hiding out?
那些参与伏击冯·波尔高的人都是谁？那些强盗又躲在哪里？
qdesc_sesivanitonici_nwSr

The Striped Tonies invited me to a traditional procession with a ceremonial miner's standard. The consecration of the miners' banners always precedes the famous shooting competition of the Kuttenberg miners. A nice leisurely stroll. What could happen?
“条纹托尼”邀请我参加一场传统的矿工旗帜游行。每当万众瞩目的库滕堡矿工射击竞赛开办之前，人们总会对矿工旗帜进行祝圣。这将会是一次令人舒心的悠闲漫步。会发生什么事呢？
qdesc_setkanivratbori1_DC4q

No sooner had I reunited with Capon than another friendly encounter awaited us. However, right after that we had to split up again and go about our important tasks. I'll go to Kuttenberg to attend the City Council with King Sigismund, the others to Raborsch for a meeting of King Wenceslas' supporters.
刚与卡蓬重聚没多久的我，不得不再次等待我们的下次相聚。此次重逢过后，我们又得再次分别，彼此为了各自肩上的重任奔赴而去。我将要前往库滕堡，参加西格斯蒙德国王召集的市议会。而其他人则要前往拉博施，与瓦茨拉夫国王的支持者进行会面。
qdesc_setkanivratbori2_slOi

After difficult but successful negotiations, Jobst and the Rattay lords left Raborsch. Those who remained in the stronghold began to celebrate the new alliance and the hope of a better future without Sigismund.
谈判经过艰难，但最终成功，约布斯特和拉泰领主离开了拉博施。那些留在要塞里的人开始庆祝新联盟的组成，期盼一个没有西格斯蒙德的美好未来。
qdesc_smlynarinejsouzerty_GhSF
The old miller locked his wife in a shed and apparently went to fetch an axe. It's time to teach him a lesson in manners!
有位年老的磨坊主将他的妻子锁在了一个棚子里，而且显然正在拿取斧头的路上，我得让他明白何为绅士！
qdesc_socky_eeZ4

Me and Capon finally reached Trosky, but since we look like beggars, the gate guards didn't believe we were messengers and wouldn’t let us in to see von Bergow. We ended up in a tavern in Troskowitz. Now we have to rack our brains and figure out what to do next.
卡蓬和我终于抵达了特罗斯基，但因我俩衣衫褴褛，守卫对我们信使的身份心存疑虑，并拒绝了我们参见冯·波尔高的请求。最终，我们只能到特罗斯基的一处酒馆内歇脚。现在我们得尽力缕清思绪，思考下一步怎么做。
qdesc_spizovacioddil_UgnC
Once I managed to get inside Sigismund's camp, I had to make it look like I belonged there. And that meant working, such as rustling up supplies from a nearby village. But should I help them?
既然我已身处西格斯蒙德的营地内，我就得把自己伪装成他们的一员，这也就意味着我得学着他们做事，比如从附近的村庄抢夺物资。可我真的要那么做吗？
qdesc_spravedlnost_gb4j
To have a chance with his beloved, Pavel needs help with a local farmer's son. I offered to help ruin the fellow's reputation.
为了得到与挚爱相处的机会，帕维尔需要有人来帮他对付当地农夫的儿子。我提出会协助捣毁他的名誉。
qdesc_starekosti_7UX5
Morticius, an old and blind caretaker of the Sedletz ossuary, asked me to tidy up the long-neglected local chapel.
塞德莱茨骸骨堂的看守人莫提修斯向我发来请求，这位双目失明的老者希望我能将此地一间遭人忽视已久的小教堂打扫清理一番。
qdesc_starymistr_hB7v
There are some thieves' symbols on the houses in Kuttenberg. It would be great to learn what they mean!
库滕堡的房屋上有一些盗贼标记。如果能知道它们的意思就好了！
qdesc_stealthmisezajindru_LF4o
The situation at the fortress is unbearable, so Sam and I have to go to Jobst for help.
当前堡垒的境况极为不堪，所以塞缪尔和我不得不外出寻求约布斯特的帮助。
qdesc_svatba_YmZV

A grand wedding between Olda, son of Lord Semine, and Agnes, daughter of the Troskowitz Bailiff, is going to take place at Semine. This could be the perfect opportunity to meet Lord von Bergow. I need to gain entrance into the wedding party no matter what.
塞米大人之子奥达与特罗斯科维茨执行官之女阿格尼丝喜结连理，他们的盛大婚礼即将在塞米如期举办。这或许是接近冯·波尔高大人的绝佳时机，因此无论如何我都得参加这场婚礼。
qdesc_svatyantonin_Dml6
A few days before the renowned shooting competition, the miners from the St. Anthony pit lost their standard. The clues surrounding the theft lead to their competitors from the All Saints pit.
在著名射击比赛举办前几天，圣安东尼矿场的矿工们丢失了旗杆。关于这起盗窃，有关线索指向他们的圣徒矿场对手。
qdesc_symbolsermirny_kheg
Menhard would finally like to lead the Kuttenberg swordfighting brotherhood as he should, but to do so he needs to get the guild sword back.
门哈德最终决定履行领导库滕堡击剑公会的职责，但前提是得先取回行会剑。
qdesc_taborcertovka_Nx3c
Innkeeper Grosch from Grund has trouble with a gang that comes to his inn and makes a mess. They're led by a man called Eggman, and the innkeeper has it in for him.
格兰德的酒馆老板格罗什遭受了一伙无赖的侵扰，他们常将酒馆弄得混乱不堪。据说那伙人的领头叫“鸡蛋佬”，酒馆老板对他怀恨在心。
qdesc_tabor_odboje_Eza0
The peasants from around Miskowitz are resisting the oppression of Sigismund's army, and they need all the help they can get.
米斯科维茨一带的农民正在抵抗西格斯蒙德军队的压迫，他们急需帮助。
qdesc_tarasmura_spJA
Something very strange is afoot in the abandoned mines near Old Kutna.
老库特纳附近的废弃矿山发生了一些异常奇怪的事情。
qdesc_tragedienadanemarku_nMsH
The Danemark Mill was occupied by a band of cutthroats. They slaughtered the hired hands and took miller Hermann's family captive.
一伙强盗抢占了丹恩麦磨坊，他们还屠杀了那里的工人，并将磨坊主赫尔曼的家人俘虏了。
qdesc_traskave_poselstvi_iEaH
The Guild is planning its greatest diversion mission yet, I can't miss it.
为转移注意，公会正企划着他们迄今为止最为庞大的阴谋，我可不能错过。
qdesc_u33__andel_strazny_bddN
A scholar named Johann Schindel was apparently robbed by Goatskin. If I get back his possessions, he's sure to reward me.
一位名叫约翰·辛德尔的学者被山羊皮抢了。如果我拿回他的东西，他一定会奖励我的。
qdesc_utoknamalesov_KlCt
After lengthy preparations, the time has come to show Otto von Bergow that he's not untouchable, even behind the walls of his Maleshov Castle.
经过了漫长的准备，是时候让奥托·冯·波尔高明白，即便是躲在马列索夫城堡的高墙之后，他也并非无法撼动。
qdesc_utoknanebakov_vHSU

The time has finally come to deal with the bastards that ambushed us by the pond and killed our friends. It won't be long till we attack their lair and make sure none of those whoresons escape justice!
终于，是时候了结那帮在池塘边偷袭我们、还杀害了我们的伙伴的混蛋了。要不了多久，我们就会进攻他们的窝点，定让那群贱种在正义面前无处遁逃！
qdesc_vajdovakletba_Hgav

Aranka found out that someone had cursed her husband. With my help as a blacksmith, she wants to lift the evil spell from him and transfer it to a sabre, with which the Voivode would strike down his enemies.
阿兰卡发现他的丈夫中了某人的诅咒。她想要借助我的铁匠本领，将她丈夫身上的邪恶咒术逼出，并转移到一把军刀上，那把军刀也可成为司令官斩杀敌人的利器。
qdesc_vezninatroskach_qotN
I'm back at Trosky and back in the dungeon. But this time without Sir Hans, who's been taken God knows where by von Bergow. We have to escape, but first we have to find out what von Bergow is up to.
我回到了特罗斯基的地牢。但这次汉斯少主没在，天知道他被冯·波尔高带去了何处！我们得逃离这里，但是要先弄清冯·波尔高在策划什么。
qdesc_viktorka_lk9g
The wife of the Miskowitz blacksmith, Martha, is looking for horseshoes. But is there more than meets the eye here?
米斯科维茨的铁匠之妻玛尔塔正在找寻马铁蹄，可是此事背后是否还另有隐情？
qdesc_zaby_tbD1

As the Tachov gang is constantly playing tricks on the Zhelejov chaps and causing them trouble, the Zhelejov chaps have decided they will not let it slide. Old Olbram has some ideas on how to one up the Tachov lot and I decided to help him because it sounds like a lot of fun.
塔霍夫人一直以来频繁捉弄哲勒约夫人，不断地制造麻烦，因此哲勒约夫人决定不能就这样算了。老奥尔布拉姆想到了能打压塔霍夫人风头的办法，他的计划听起来乐趣十足，我也因此决定向他提供帮助。
qdesc_zachrana_IRWe

Me and Hans Capon managed to flee from the raiders who attacked us at the pond. We found refuge that night with Bozhena, an old herb woman living nearby. She took care of me, but Sir Hans got worse during the night. Now I have to get my strength back and then help Bozhena care for Sir Hans, if at all possible.
我和汉斯·卡蓬成功从湖畔的偷袭脱身，当晚在附近的老采药女博珍娜家中避难。她对我悉心照料，但汉斯大人的伤情在夜间加重。现在我必须尽可能恢复体力，帮助博珍娜护理汉斯大人。
qdesc_zachranaptacka_8GoZ

I've managed to uncover the crimes of Mint Master Vavak, fulfilling my side of the agreement with Sir Kunzlin Ruthard. For that he promised to help me get to Maleshov, where Sir Hans Capon is imprisoned.
我成功地揭露了铸币官瓦万克的罪行，履行了我与昆兹林·鲁瑟德爵士的协议。为此，他答应把我送到马列索夫，汉斯·卡蓬爵士就被关在那里。
qdesc_zakopanyzitrek_FMPL

In a forest near Bylany, there's a family of refugees who escaped the destruction of Mesoles living in an abandoned hut. The head of the household, a tailor named Mikush, never returned from Bylany where he works. Henry sets out to find him.
就在比兰尼附近的一片树林里，一间废弃小屋内住着从梅索莱斯逃难而出的一家人。裁缝米库什，作为这个家庭的顶梁柱，前往比兰尼工作后至今都未曾归家，亨利也将要为了寻找他而踏上旅途。
qdesc_zatimcotuspis_oqpv

It seems Katherine has caught the eye of one of the Cumans in Sigismund's camp. At night she hears him whispering by her tent - he even stole one of her shoes. I should find him and make him leave her alone.
凯瑟琳似乎被西格斯蒙德营地里的某个库曼人看上了。她常在夜晚听到那人就在帐篷旁窃窃私语，甚至还偷走了她的一只鞋。我得找出那个库曼人，让他远离凯瑟琳。
qdesc_zavodnipodkovy_Iu46

Janek, the Semine blacksmith's hired hand, is preparing for a big race, and he's heard about magical horseshoes, thanks to which a horse never slips and runs as fast as the wind. If I could forge him such horseshoes, he would pay me well.

Janek, the Semine blacksmith's hired hand, is preparing for a big race, and he's heard about magical horseshoes, thanks to which a horse never slips and runs as fast as the wind. If I could forge him such horseshoes, he would pay me well.
qdesc_zbranepanasemina_GTDX

Blacksmith Radovan's cart, that was headed to Semine with a load of equipment, has gone missing. Besides the cart, it's crew has gone missing too - the hands Ventza and Franzi - and I'm supposed to find them. That is, especially the cart and its cargo. Those two fellows are less important.
铁匠拉多万载满装备前往塞米的马车失踪了。失踪的除了马车，还有车夫文扎和弗兰齐。我得找到他们。准确来说，尤其是马车和它载的货物。那两个家伙没那么重要。
qdesc_zikmunduvtabor_75Vh
Sigismund and his henchmen have thwarted our plans. We have to prepare to strike back.
西格斯蒙德和他的党羽们挫败了我们的计划，我们必须准备反击。
qdesc_zoufalaobranazabohu_zap6
Godwin and the other defenders of Suchdol have to hold out until Henry and Samuel bring reinforcements.
古德温以及其他守护苏赫多尔的盟友必须坚守堡垒，等待亨利和塞缪尔将援军带回。
qdesc_zranenylovci_ueXa
The Troskowitz gamekeeper, Vostatek, has got all sorts of problems. And not just with his drinking.
特罗斯科维茨的猎人——沃斯塔克遇到了各种麻烦，不仅仅是和酗酒有关的问题。
qdesc_ztracenacest_MiZF
I met an old knight, Jezhek of Holohlavy, who had lost his horse and armour in a duel. I promised I'd try to get them back for him.
我遇到了一个老骑士，霍洛拉维的杰泽克，他在一次决斗中失去了马和盔甲。我答应会设法为他找回来。
qname_a08_fight_club_pods_zfs2
Melee at the Mill
磨坊缠斗
qname_a08_fight_club_velm_cxBu
The Best for Last
好戏压轴登场
qname_a08_fight_club_zele_6zwX
Wine, Women and Blood
红酒，女人和鲜血
qname_asidovezi_bC0k
Warding Off Evil
驱邪避灾

Beyond the Grave
坟土之外

Last Rites
临终圣礼

Divine Messenger
神之使者
qname_bratrizcimburka_Urle
Bellatores
战斗到底

狮子纹章
qname_budovanilazni_cbSW
A Good Scrub
好好擦洗
qname_certinatroskach_6Ylf
Demons of Trosky
特罗斯基的恶魔
qname_cikanskacest_lflt
Miri Fajta
爱、自由与荣耀

Combat Training I
战斗训练I
qname_crosscountrytrosecko_7ve9
Dostihy na koních
qname_damavnesnazich_kcQn
Victimised
落难女子
qname_drak_Q0pa
Dragon's Lair
龙穴
qname_dvojityagent_UgvG
Ransom
赎金
qname_erik_7Lat
Civitas Pragensis
布拉格市民
qname_falesnaposadka_YafN
High Toll
高昂代价
qname_fight_club_horany_Eyi6
Fight Dirty
不讲武德
qname_fight_club_kutna_ho_iSkA
More Teeth in a Bag
包裹里的牙齿
qname_fight_club_kutna_ho_xNZH
Teeth in the Bag
包裹里的牙齿
qname_fight_club_miskovice_cf88
Enough!
够了！
qname_fight_club_podsemin_BHFc
More Melee at the Mill
更多的磨坊缠斗
qname_fight_club_velmistr_ohqS
Nail in the Coffin
棺材里的钉子
qname_finale_es8n
Judgement Day
审判降临
qname_hadkakonaru_ZNx4
Quarrel of the horse dealers
马贩之间的争吵
qname_havirskyturnaj_I8cZ
Popinjay Shoot
射鸟竞赛
qname_hezounkarlik_k5K0
Handsome Charlie
英俊查理
qname_hledanilichtenstejna_hKxZ
Into the Underworld
深入地下
qname_hledanipsa_e1do
Mutt
呆呆
qname_hledanispravedlnosti_0pH4
Seeking Justice
探寻正义
qname_hostinaprochude_9szy
Feast for the Poor
穷人的宴会
qname_hromovykamen_KXD6
The Thunderstone
雷石
qname_jantlama_3l7B
Johnny the Gob
大嘴约翰尼
qname_jizdnilukostrelbatr_eahd
Jízdní lukostřelba
qname_kajicna_pout__kutno_P4aw
Pilgrimage
朝圣之旅
qname_kajicna_pout__trose_l3Eq
Pilgrimage
朝圣之旅
qname_karelnaceste_r9IS
Karel on the road
路上的卡雷尔
qname_karelnesepytel_XF99
Arrow-head
箭头
qname_kaspar_gOBd
Casper
卡斯帕
qname_katuvsleh_ARuP
The Executioner's Pride
刽子手的尊严
qname_kejkliri_wt8J
Troubadours
游吟诗人
qname_klasternitajemstvi_V2oF
In Vino Veritas

quest_can_doba_pokrocila__cIJ1

Time was getting on, and I needed to concentrate on my main mission, which was fighting Sigismund and liberating the land. There was simply no time for the petty distractions and concerns of the folk here…
时间在流逝，我需要集中精力先完成我最重要的任务，那就是与西格斯蒙德战斗并解放这片土地。我现在没时间花费在关心当地人身上……
quest_can_od_nepovoleneho_gGNk

Some time has passed since the unpermitted hunting of the white roebuck and more serious things have begun to happen in the region, so the folks have other things to worry about and no one is offering a reward for the poachers anymore.
自非法偷猎白獐事件以来已经过去了一段时间，而该地区开始发生更严重的问题。人们又多了些需要操心的事，也没人再悬赏追捕偷猎者了。
questendi_p_dal_jsem_vajd_kVCo
I gave the Voivode the letter out of the goodness of my heart. Their family affairs are none of my business.
出于好意，我将通行函交给了司令官。他们的家庭矛盾跟我无关。
questendi_p_donesl_jsem_a_glXl
I brought the amulet to Marika, but she wasn't exactly happy about me killing her father.
尽管我将护身符交给了玛丽卡，但因为杀死了她的父亲，她很是难过。
questendi_p_prohral_sem_s_3aHF
I lost the bet, but Aranka saved Bohush. But Marika will not be coming back to the camp with him.
尽管我输掉了赌局，但是阿兰卡还是救下了博胡什，而玛丽卡并不打算带着博胡什返回营地。
questendi_p_projel_sem_sa_wzO6
I lost the wager and Marika wasn't very happy about it. She said she and Bohush will move somewhere else and start a new life.
我输掉了赌局，玛丽卡因此十分难过。她说她将要和博胡什一起搬到别处去开始新的生活。
questendi_p_slohnul_jsem__j3bJ
I stole the amulet for Marika, but she didn't appreciate it much. Theft made it lose its power.
我为玛丽卡偷走了护符，但是她并不乐意如此，因为偷走护符反而让其失去了魔力。
questendi_p_vajda_xq5N
The Voivode gave the amulet to Marika and she and Bohush returned to the nomads' camp.
司令官将护身符交给了玛丽卡，而后者也和博胡什返回了游民营地。
questfail_jan_ze_suchotle_rqWv
Jan of Suchotlesky died before we managed to put an end to this matter. I'll pray for him this evening at least.
苏霍茨基的杨在我们了结这件事之前就死了。至少今晚我会为他祈祷。
questfail_p_laszlo_mel_ne_ZreA
László is dead. Therefore, no negotiations took place.
拉斯洛已死。因此，没有进行谈判。
questionh_bozeny_se_uz_na_pORR
I don't think I'll be able to ask Bozhena about Marika anymore.
看来我无法再向博珍娜询问玛丽卡的情况了。
questionh_mariku_vajdovu__OiWM
Marika, the Voivode's daughter, was last seen with Bozhena the herbalist. I should go and ask her what she knows about all this.
司令官的女儿玛丽卡最后一次露面时正与草药师博珍娜待在一块儿，我得去找博珍娜询问相关情况。
questionh_p_dostal_sem_do_lalZ
I asked Bozhena the herbalist if she could tell me where to look for Marika. I was lucky and she told me where to go.
我向草药师博珍娜打听了玛丽卡的踪迹，很幸运地得知了玛丽卡的下落。
questionh_p_prej_mi_moc_n_hUpf
I asked Bozhena the herbalist if she could tell me where to look for Marika, but she didn't tell me anything useful.
我已询问草药师博珍娜，想知道她能否告知我玛丽卡的去向，但是她并没有提供任何有用的信息。
questionm_p_mari_mi_rekla_1hda

I overheard that Goatskin is friends with someone called Lousy Mary. At first, she didn't want to get her beloved into trouble, but in the end I persuaded her to tell me where Goatskin was hiding. Behind the bathhouse there's a yard that leads to a lane. At the end of this lane there's a barn behind a wall. The barn has a hole in its gable. And that's where Goatskin is hiding.
我无意间了解到山羊皮与某位被称为“讨厌的玛丽”的人交好。起初，她并不想让自己的爱人卷入麻烦之中，但最终我还是说服她将山羊皮的藏身点告诉了我。澡堂的后方有一个院子连通着一条道路，道路尽头的一堵墙后有间谷仓，而谷仓的山墙上有个洞，里边便是山羊皮的藏身之处。
questionm_p_zjisti_co_o_k_eRG5
I found out that Goatskin is friends with a bathhouse wench called Mary. Maybe she can lead me to him.
我发现山羊皮与某位澡堂女仆私下交好，或许那个姑娘能带我去见他。
questionm_p_z_mari_jsem_o_UFGE
I overheard that Goatskin is friends with a certain Lousy Mary. She didn't want to tell me anything, but it was pretty suspicious how she tried to wriggle out of talking to me.
我无意中得知山羊皮正与一位被称为“讨厌的玛丽”的人交好。她不想向我透露任何事情，但她如此抗拒与我交流反而显得更为可疑。
questionm_zjistil_jsem_ze_gHPh
I found out that Goatskin has a sweetheart among the bathhouse wenches. Maybe she can lead me to him.
我发现山羊皮的情人就是澡堂女仆中的一员，或许那个姑娘能带我去见他。
randomshe_nazen_ovce_jako_1cbr
The best spot for catching the wolves is up on the hill below the shepherd's hut by the last birch. That's where I should leave the bait.
山坡上、牧羊人小屋下方的最后一棵桦树边，就是捕获狼群的绝佳地点，我得将诱饵放在那里。
randomshe_skopove_bylo_na_fMKP
I placed the bait where Siegfried told me to. Then it was time to hide.
我按照西格弗里德的指示，将诱饵放在了指定位置，随即便赶紧藏了起来。

rasuvucen_krejzl_umrel_lw4T

rasuvucen_najdi_mrsinu_v__7KwE

在废弃农场内寻找动物尸体。
rasuvucen_najdi_sanytrovo_vEdw

找到那处硝石坑，并通过味道判断其中是否蕴藏硝石。
rasuvucen_najdi_zdroj_nak_3csz

寻找传染病的来源。

跟随伊格内修斯前往马车处。

拜访掘墓人。

保护伊格内修斯不受农场工人伤害。

清理农舍内的动物尸体。

Take care of the greengrocer's dog.
处理菜农的恶犬。
rasuvucen_postarej_se_o_z_oILs

A trip with the gravedigger.
一场与掘墓人同行的旅程。

与邦妮交谈。

rasuvucen_promluv_s_ignac_J690

ratbor_so__event_caption_TWs9
Pawn without a banner
孤立无援
ratbor_so__event_descript_5IAF
A lone soldier stumbles along the road. He looks tired and downcast.
一个孤独的士兵蹒跚地走在路上。他看起来疲惫不堪，情绪低落。
ratbor_so__player_caption_SKMN
Pawn without a banner
孤立无援
ratbor_so__player_descrip_FaRw
A lone soldier stumbles along the road. He looks tired and downcast.
一个孤独的士兵蹒跚地走在路上。他看起来疲惫不堪，情绪低落。
reinforce_arne_mi_rad_pom_3GRO
Arne will be glad to help me. We'll meet at the handover site.
阿耳涅会很乐意帮助我。我们会在交接地点碰头。
reinforce_benes_a_jeho_ba_U7j5
Benesh and his band want to be paid for their help, but I can count on them.
贝内什和他的手下想拿钱办事，但我可以指望他们。
reinforce_bratri_z_cimbur_AxuY
The Zimburg brothers could help out against the Cumans.
齐姆博格兄弟可以帮助对付库曼人。
reinforce_jimram_mi_rad_p_4Haw
Emmeram will gladly help me, and he will bring the cobbler Linhart along.
艾默拉姆将很乐意帮助我，而且会把鞋匠林哈特也捎上。
reinforce_kobenka_a_komar_ZtUE
Kubyenka and Adder will gladly help me.
库宾卡和阿德尔会乐意帮助我。
reinforce_menhart_ma_v_za_n8uP
Menhard certainly has a few men who are handy with a sword.
门哈德手下肯定有几个擅长剑术的手下。
reinforce_menhart_me_posl_I9Gr
Menhard sent me to see Arne. He might help me.
门哈德派我去见阿耳涅，他或许能帮我。
reinforce_menhart_muze_po_WVyS
Menhard can only send Arne, but if a fight breaks out, we'll be glad to have him on our side.
门哈德只能派出阿耳涅，但如果发生战斗，我们会很乐意有他在身边。
reinforce_mikes_s_kozlike_TyTD
Mikesh and Kozliek from Zizka's band could come in handy.
杰式卡的米凯什和科兹⾥克可以派上用场。
reinforce_mohl_bych_popro_TiMP
I could ask Kubyenka and Adder for help.
我可以向库宾卡和阿德尔寻求帮助。
reinforce_mozna_ze_by_mi__ABB4
Perhaps those mercenaries form Mesoles would help.
也许，那些梅索莱斯雇佣兵会帮忙...
reinforce_mozna_ze_by_mi__sQ0a
Maybe Emmeram the butcher and Linhart the cobbler could help me.
或许屠夫艾默拉姆和鞋匠林哈特可以帮我。
reinforce_na_balsana_a_sa_8DdJ
Tugbone and Posy didn't bat an eye. We'll meet at the handover place.
“扯骨”和“花骨朵”毫不意外。我们会在交接地点碰头。
reinforce_na_zizkovy_chla_3OJh
Zizka's men are always reliable. Now, we have two more men.
杰式卡的人总是很可靠。现在，我们又多了两个人。
reinforce_s_vazounem_a_ve_c5qc
I'll feel better with Goliath and Hog by my side.
有歌利亚和霍格在我身边，我感觉更安心。
reinforce_vazoun_by_se_la_9ODB
Goliath and Hog certainly won't be afraid of László. I'll try asking them.
歌利亚和霍格当然不会害怕拉斯洛。我会问问他们。
rekni_dro_drozd_je_mrtvy_H1li
Bailiff Thrush is dead, and the hopes of Tachov and Zhelejov making up died with him.
瑟鲁什执行官死了，塔霍夫和哲勒约夫和解无望了。
rekni_dro_drozd_mel_rados_C26u
Thrush was happy to hear that the Tachov-Zhelejov conflict will finally be settled. He said that as soon as they meet in the pasture, he'll ride over and sort it out.
瑟鲁什很高兴得知塔霍夫-哲勒约夫冲突终于将得到解决。他说，只要他们在牧场相遇，他就会骑马过去解决。
rekni_dro_sice_jsem_nasel_1jHH
I found the Tachov-Zhelejov border, but it's no use. Without Thrush, nobody will believe me. All we can do is settle it with our fists.
我找到了塔霍夫-哲勒约夫的边界，但这没有用。没有瑟鲁什，没有人会相信我。我们能做的就是用拳头解决这个问题。
rekni_dro_ted_kdyz_konecn_QWx7
Now that I finally know where the Tachov-Zhelejov border on the pasture is, I should tell Thrush about it.
现在我终于知道塔霍夫-哲勒约夫的牧场边界位置了，我应该告诉瑟鲁什。
rekni_jez_oznamil_jsem_je_WYHJ
I told Jezhek how I made out.
我告诉了杰泽克我的做法。
rekni_jez_vsechno_je_zari_m1ow
It's all sorted. I should tell Jezhek what happened to his horse and gear.
事情都已解决。我应该告诉杰泽克他的马和装备的去向。
rekni_kat_katerina_uz_o_v_bWLf
Katherine knows everything now and is hurrying to The Devil's Den to see Zizka. The trap for the Praguers is laid.
得知一切情况的凯瑟琳赶往“魔窟”与杰式卡见了一面，为布拉格人设下的陷阱已经布置好了。
rekni_kat_mel_bych_kateri_YVME
I should tell Katherine how things turned out with Chakan…
我该将恰坎的事告知凯瑟琳。
rekni_kat_musim_rychle_za_t0Vd
I have to hurry to Katherine and tell her everything. If she doesn't tell Zizka in time to prepare the ambush, it'll be bad.
我必须尽快向凯瑟琳汇报情况。要是她没能及时让杰式卡准备伏击，事态将难以收拾。
rekni_kat_rekl_jsem_kater_0bmq
I told Katherine I managed to solve her problem. She should be safe now.
我转告了凯瑟琳问题已经解决，现在她应该安全了。
rekni_kat_rekl_jsem_kater_qS6X
I told Katherine I failed to solve her problem. She wasn't best pleased…
我转告了凯瑟琳问题没被解决，她很是不悦…
rekni_kov_kovarka_marta_z_E45v
The blacksmith’s wife, Martha, has died. She’ll never learn the truth about Victoria now.
铁匠妻子玛尔塔已死，她将永远无法知晓维多利亚失踪的真相。
rekni_kov_musim_rict_mart_FhD4
I must tell Martha about the blood in the hearth room and that Victoria is missing.
我得将壁炉间发现的血迹告知玛尔塔，并告诉她维多利亚失踪之事。
rekni_kov_rekl_jsem_marte_zQnf
I told Martha that Victoria is gone and that there's blood on the hearth room floor. It scared her and she asked me to search for Victoria.
我将维多利亚失踪的事告诉了玛尔塔，她还得知我在壁炉间的地板上发现了血迹，因此惊慌失措的她请求我找到维多利亚。
rekni_kub_rekni_kubenkovi_iNgu
Tell Kubyenka you're ready to go.
告知库宾卡你已做好准备。
rekni_kub_vyrazili_jsme_s_IWiJ
We set off to meet Zizka and hoped we didn't take too long.
我们已出发去见杰式卡，希望能尽快找到他。
rekni_mar_marika_mi_byla__F9An
Marika was grateful for my help. I hope the beasts don't show up here again.
玛丽卡对我的帮助很是感激，但愿那群野兽不会再次出现。
rekni_mar_s_vlky_jsem_si__k4tK
I've dealt with the wolves. I should go back to the hideout and tell Marika.
我已把进犯的狼群解决，是时候回到藏身处跟玛丽卡交差了。
rekni_pas_mel_bych_pasack_SF5u
I should tell Siegfried how things went with the wolves. He might know where else I might ask about Mutt.
我得将狼群的下场告知西格弗里德，他或许知道其他可能见过呆呆的人。
rekni_pas_pasackovi_jsem__dl9C
I told the shepherd I got rid of his furry problem.
我告诉了牧羊人，那些狼群已被尽数解决。
rekni_pas_pasackovi_jsem__N17H
I told the shepherd I was unable to get rid of the pack of wolves. He wasn't happy to hear that.
那位牧羊人得知我没能解决掉那支狼群后感到闷闷不乐。
rekni_pta_co_jsme_mohli_n_Lcfb
We've prepared as much as we could for the start of the raid.
突袭准备就绪。
rekni_pta_jakmile_budu_pr_zJvl
Once I'm ready for the start of the raid, I should tell Capon to give the order.
准备好突袭，提醒卡蓬发令。
rekni_pta_nemame_na_utrat_ZOk0
We don't have the coin to pay our tavern bill. The innkeeper is a reasonable woman, though, and suggested we carry sacks of flour to the pantry to pay off our debt. I should tell Sir Hans.
身无分文的我们无法支付在酒馆内的消费，但好在酒馆老板娘是个通情达理之人，她提议我们将面粉搬至储藏室，以此偿付欠款。我得将此事告知汉斯少主。
rekni_pta_protoze_jsme_ne_NZQK
As we couldn't pay our bill, the innkeeper suggested we help her carry sacks of flour to the pantry. But Capon refused outright, saying nobles don't work. So it's up to me to carry the sacks.
因无法支付酒馆内的消费，酒馆老板提议要我们帮她将面粉搬至储藏室内，但卡蓬直接拒绝了，还坚称贵族从不干粗活，所以得由我来搬运那些面粉。
rekni_saf_mel_bych_safari_MOqa
I should tell Stanislav how everything turned out
我应该告诉斯坦尼斯拉夫事情的结果。
rekni_ume_mel_bych_milym__cwXr
I should gently break it to the bards that their only hope of restoring the lute strings is dead.
我得委婉地告诉那两位诗人，他们修理鲁特琴的唯一希望已经破灭。
rekni_ume_rekl_jsem_umelc_VhCX
I told the musicians that the huntsman was dead. They weren't exactly pleased, but there's still a chance of buying strings somewhere.
我将猎人的死讯告诉了那两位吟游诗人，他们因此很是失落，但仍有机会在别处买到琴弦。
rekni_vla_mel_bych_povede_yvAl
I should tell Vlasta about how her friends ended up.
我应该告诉弗拉斯塔她朋友们的结局。
rekni_vla_povedel_jsem_vl_8pUi
I told Vlasta what happened to the rebels.
我将起义军的结局告诉了弗拉斯塔。
rekni_vla_vlaste_uz_nepov_XcnT
I won't be able to tell Vlasta what happened to the rebels. She's dead.
我无法将起义军的结局告诉弗拉斯塔。她已经死了。
rekni_zde_rekl_jsem_zdenk_zJ0p
I told Zdenyek I found the axe from his story, but he didn't seem to believe me.
我将找到故事中的斧头一事告诉了兹登耶克，但是他却不以为然。
rekni_zde_ukazal_jsem_zde_Ld08
I showed Zdenyek the axe I had found. He couldn't believe his eyes because he thought the story of the two brothers was fictional.
我向兹登耶克展示了找到的那把斧头，他为此大吃一惊，因为他一直以为那两兄弟的故事是虚构的。
rekni_zde_zdenek_bohuzel__0vf5
Zdenyek is dead and he will never know that his story was actually true.
兹登耶克已经死了，他永远无法知道他的故事其实是真人真事。
rekni_zde_zdenka_bude_urc_gbqh
Zdenyek would surely like to know that I found the axe from his story. I should stop by and see him.
我找到了兹登耶克的故事里提到的那把斧头，他一定会乐意知晓此事的，我得去见他一面。
rekni_ziz_az_budu_priprav_R45r
It would be for the best to leave the scene of the ambush as quickly as possible. I should probably tell Zizka.
现在最好赶紧离开伏击现场，我得向杰式卡进行汇报。
rekni_ziz_podarilo_se_nam_uMQp
We left the scene of the ambush and rode back to the Devil's Den with the rescued Dry Devil.
我们离开了伏击现场，骑着马带着酒鬼返回了”魔窟“。
relikviar_najdi_ukradenou_FnZV
Find the stolen chest
寻找失窃的箱子。
relikviar_objective1_8w1K
Return the chest to Posy.
将箱子交还“花骨朵”。
relikviar_popovidej_si_s__xzde
Talk to Jan Posy.
与扬·“花骨朵”交谈。
relikviar_zbav_se_kumanu_7mN1
Get rid of the Cumans.
解决库曼人。
relikvie_dostan_se_do_chr_cUmp
Get into the temple crypt.
进入教堂墓穴。
relikvie_najdi_mec_rytire_Fuse
Find the sword of Sir Valentine.
寻找瓦伦丁爵士的佩剑。
relikvie_prines_valentinu_9RmW
Bring Sir Valentine's sword to the knight.
将瓦伦丁的佩剑交给骑士。
relikvie_promluv_si_s_bra_6Xw0
Talk to Brother Morticius.
与莫提修斯修士交谈。
relikvie_vykovej_kopii_me_wPVb
Forge a replica of Sir Valentine's sword.
仿造瓦伦丁爵士的佩剑。
report_to_placeholder_jse_1oTy
Zizka is bound to have a clear idea what we're going to do with the cannon now. We should discuss it together at The Devil's Den.
至于该如何发挥火炮的作用，想必杰式卡定会了然于心。我们得在“魔窟”一起讨论此事。
reporttot_chtel_jsem_nahl_77FZ
I wanted to report the band of thieves known as the Guild to the guards, but they sent me to bailiff Andreas Plumel. They said I should go to City Hall and tell him everything directly.
我本想向警卫举报以“公会”著称的盗贼团伙，但是那些警卫却让我去找执行官安德烈亚斯·普卢梅尔，他们认为我就应该直接到市政厅去向执行官汇报情况。
rescuepav_nasel_jsem_pavl_5r1Z
I found the place where Pavlena was being held by Ota the farmhand. Pavlena died in the fight and I fled from Ota. it wasn't my finest hour.
我找到了农场工奥塔挟持帕芙莱娜去的地方。帕芙莱娜在打斗中死了，而我则从奥塔手中逃了。现在状态不好，保命要紧。
rescuepav_nasel_jsem_pavl_hKL0
I found the place where Pavlena was being held by Ota the farmhand. Ota is dead, but Pavlena is safe.
我找到了农场工奥塔挟持帕芙莱娜去的地方。奥塔死了，不过帕芙莱娜安然无恙。
rescuepav_nasel_jsem_pavl_irSP
I found the place where Pavlena was being held by Ota the farmhand. I killed Ota, but I left Pavlena tied up. She should be able to free herself...
我找到了农场工奥塔挟持帕芙莱娜去的地方。我杀了奥塔，但没有解开帕芙莱娜身上的绳子。她应该自己能挣脱…
rescuepav_nasel_jsem_pavl_mwD5
I found the place where Pavlena was being held by Ota the farmhand. Both Pavlena and Ota died in the struggle.
我找到了农场工奥塔挟持帕芙莱娜去的地方。帕芙莱娜和奥塔在争斗中同归于尽了。
rescuepav_nasel_jsem_pavl_T6Ya
I found the place where Pavlena is being held by Ota the farmhand. I have to save her somehow!
我找到了农场工奥塔挟持帕芙莱娜去的地方。我得想个办法救她！
rescuingt_od_lidi_ze_semi_hjEP
I found out from people in Semine that Tibor was being held at the saddler's somewhere.
我从塞米的村民口中得知提波被鞍匠囚禁在某个地方。
rescuingt_p_najdi_tibora_cBQi
The Voivode's son, Tibor, was taken captive by the Semine villagers. I must find him and rescue him.
游民司令官的儿子提波被塞米的村民俘虏了，我必须找到并解救他。
rescuingt_p_osvobod_tibora_UaW4
I found the Voivode's son, Tibor, who had been captured by the villagers. He was tied up in a barn. I must free him.
我找到了司令官那被村民俘虏的儿子提波。他被捆绑于一间谷仓内，我必须释放他。
rescuingt_p_povedlo_se_mi_7Hti
I managed to find the Voivode's son, Tibor, who had been taken captive by villagers, tied up in a barn on the outskirts of Semine. I untied him and helped him escape from the village.
我成功找到了司令官那被村民俘虏的儿子提波，他被捆绑于塞米外围的一间谷仓内。我将其松绑后协助他逃离了村庄。
rescuingt_p_zajateho_vajd_2HmA
I didn't save the Voivode's captured son, Tibor.
我没能救下司令官被俘虏的儿子提波。
rescuingt_zjistil_jsem_ze_Bnti
I found out that Tibor was being held in a barn on the saddler's farm.
我发现提波被关押在鞍匠的农场中的一间谷仓里。
resolve_t_konsel_si_prose_6BI7
The alderman was shown around the bathhouse by Betty and was satisfied. He even mentioned that the inspection was Adam's idea. No doubt he wanted to get rid of the competition, but he didn't succeed.
市议员在贝蒂的带领下，在澡堂四处转了一圈，看起来很满意 。他甚至提到了此番检查是亚当的意思。亚当无疑想借此除掉自己的竞争对手，但他没有得逞。
resolve_t_konsel_si_prose_fr2X

The alderman inspected Betty's bathhouse and couldn't believe his eyes. The place was in a terrible state, so he went straight off to get it closed down. Betty won't talk to me anymore. Her bathhouse didn't succeed, and someone else will buy it sooner or later.
在视察了贝蒂澡堂后的议员大为震惊，发现翠鸟澡堂条件恶劣的他随即勒令将其关停。贝蒂不会再跟我说话了，而她对澡堂的不善经营也迟早让这份资产遭他人买走。
resolve_t_konsel_uz_lazne_KROU
The alderman has inspected the bathhouse. I have to find out what he thought about it.
市议员检查了澡堂。我得弄清楚他的想法。
resolve_t_muz_ktery_se_vy_4v99
The man pretending to be Ambrose the hermit is dead.
那个假扮成隐士安布洛斯的人已经死了。
resolve_t_pomohl_jsem_muz_zoQ7
I helped the man who was pretending to be Ambrose the hermit.
我帮助了那个假扮成隐士安布洛斯的人。
resolve_t_poustevnik_je_m_qis2
The hermit may be the only person who can help me find that bloody broken sword. I have to decide whether to help him, or let him face the punishment he deserves.
隐士可能是唯一能帮我找到那把断剑的人。我必须决定是帮助他，还是让他面对应得的惩罚。
retrieveg_nekdo_mi_po_pad_1a9l
Someone stole all of my things after the fall. If I want them back, I'll have to find them.
有人在我坠落之后将我身上的东西尽数偷走，要想把它们取回，我就得找到那些人。
retrieveg_po_padu_v_dolec_K4ph
I lost all of my belongings after the fall in the mine, but then managed to find them and get them back.
坠落矿井后，我失去了所有的物品，但后来设法找到并拿回了它们。
returntob_bozenina_pomsta_067Y
I did all I could to help Bozhena and Pavlena. It's out of my hands now.
我已经尽我所能去帮助博珍娜和帕芙莱娜了，现在就听天命吧。
returntob_bozenina_pomsta_BB4k
I should go back to Bozhena's cottage and tell her what happened with Jakesh.
我应该回到博珍娜家那里，告诉她我和贾克西发生了什么。
returntob_bozenina_pomsta_Yu7B
The feud between Jakesh and Bozhena has been settled, but I can't tell Bozhena now.
贾克西和博珍娜之间的恩怨已经了结，但我已无法再将此事向博珍娜传达。
returntob_nepratelstvi_me_6CRC
The chain of vengeance is finally broken. Jakesh and Bozhena have made peace. I hope it lasts.
两家恩怨终于解开。贾克西和博珍娜和解了，希望以后都相安无事。
returntob_situace_v_jesky_bBln
The situation in the gorge has been resolved. Now all I need to do is go back to Bozhena and tell her what happened.
峡谷事件都已解决妥当。现在我只要回去找博珍娜，告诉她来龙去脉。
returntob_situaci_v_jesky_BqIP
The situation in the gorge has been resolved and Bozhena knows what happened.
峡谷事件都已解决妥当，博珍娜也知道了来龙去脉。
returntob_situaci_v_jesky_Vbek
I dealt with the situation in the gorge, but Bozhena never learnt what happened.
峡谷事件都已解决妥当，但博珍娜永远都不会知道发生了什么。
returntob_smir_s_jakesem__tW07
I did manage to persuade Jakesh to make peace, but it doesn't matter anymore.
尽管我说服了贾克西既往不咎，但是现在已经不重要了。
returntob_smiru_s_jakesem_icYS
I should return to Bozhena and tell her everything Jakesh said and make sure she also agrees to make peace.
我应该回去找博珍娜，向她转告贾克西的话，并确保她也愿意和解。
returntob_smiru_s_jakesem_Nqxm
Bozhena should know that I failed to persuade Jakesh to make peace.
博珍娜应该要知道我没能说服贾克西和解。
returntob_smiru_s_jakesem_WfRT
The bad blood remains, but I hope I prevented at least one death and that Bozhena won't seek other ways to take revenge.
恩怨还在，但是我至少保住了一条人命。希望博珍娜不会用别的方式继续报仇。
returntob_smiru_s_jakesem_wlcc
In the end, I couldn't bring about a reconciliation with Jakesh, but that doesn't matter anymore.
最终我没能化解贾克西的恩怨，但是那已经不重要了。
returntoc_rekl_jsem_cenko_ia3D
I told Chenyek how his planned feast for the poor turned out. He was satisfied with my work and immediately offered me another task.
我告知了程叶科穷人宴会的筹备情况，他很满意，并给了我另一份委托。
returntoc_splnil_jsem_co__2cBi
I did what Chenyek asked me to do. I should tell him it's done and maybe get another job.
我已经完成了程叶科委托的任务，现在得向其汇报事情的结果，或许此后还会领到另一项任务。
returntoc_vybrana_jidla_p_qw79
I didn't deliver the fancy delicacies to the poor. It would be foolish to feed such fine food to beggars!
我没有将偷来的美食交给那些穷人。把那么可口的食物送给那群流浪汉简直愚蠢至极！
returntod_duska_romanova__OVZP
Dushko wasn't surprised that Roman wasn't in the house. He told me where I could try and look for him.
杜什科对罗曼不在家这件事一点都不惊讶，他告诉了我接下来找寻的方向。
returntod_mel_bych_rict_d_iWaA
I should tell Dushko what I found in Roman's house. Maybe he can tell me where I should look for them.
我应该告诉杜什科我在罗曼家发现的东西。或许他能告诉我接下来的调查方向。
returntod_mel_jsem_se_vra_3X3T
I should have returned to Dushko and told him what I found in Roman's house, but I didn't.
我本来应该回去找杜什科，告诉他我的发现，但是我没有。
rewardfro_p_bitka_u_preda_wfyw
László made his bed and now sleeps in it. I think that Jan will recognise me for my aid and that I deserve a reward.
拉斯洛自作自受。我想，杨会感激我的援助，并认为我值得奖赏。
rewardfro_p_jana_sme_kras_H19N
Jan paid for his gullibility and is now with his brother Peter. I hope that László Farkas recognises my help and rewards me as promised.
杨为他的轻信付出了代价，现在跟哥哥彼得在黄泉相聚了。我希望拉斯洛·法卡斯能赏识我的帮助，并按承诺给我奖励。
rewardfro_p_jan_umrel_nez_qQtV
Jan didn't manage to thank me before he died.
杨还没来得及感谢我就去世了。
rewardfro_p_jsem_sice_vsi_5bX6
Jan acted honourably and courageously, but still lost in the end. And I profited from it.
杨的行为体面而勇敢，但最后还是输了。而我却从中获利。
rewardfro_p_laszlo_umrel__Lqis
László died before I managed to claim my reward…
在我获取奖赏之前，拉斯洛就死了......
rewardfro_p_s_janem_jsme__AnIW
I probably won't get any reward from Jan now.
看来现在我无法再向杨获取报酬了。
rewardfro_p_vsechno_krasn_GjyV
Jan was devastated by the loss of his brother but admitted that without my help, things would have ended much worse.
杨为失去哥哥而感到悲痛，但他承认，如果没有我的帮助，事情的结局会更糟糕。
riddler__event_caption_quQO
Riddler
谜语人
riddler__event_description_yFvU
You've spotted a strange man on the road. He looks like a pleasant fellah.
你在路上遇到了一个古怪的男人，不过他看起来挺友好的。
riddler__player_caption_xVwk
Riddler
谜语人
riddler__player_descripti_lu8A
You've spotted a strange man on the road. He looks like a pleasant fellah.
你在路上遇到了一个古怪的男人，不过他看起来挺友好的。
robbed_me__event_caption_01kU
Bedraggled man
泥泞之人
robbed_me__event_descript_Hf7I
Ahead of you there's a bound man sitting on the ground in the tattered remains of clothes. He's injured. Who knows what happened to the poor fellah.
你的跟前正有一个被捆绑的男人，坐倒在地的他受了伤，身上的衣物也已破败不堪，也不知这个可怜人到底经历了什么。
robbed_me__player_caption_qyIh
Bedraggled man
泥泞之人
robbed_me__player_descrip_Tahf
Ahead of you there's a bound man sitting on the ground in the tattered remains of clothes. He's injured. Who knows what happened to the poor fellah.
你的跟前正有一个被捆绑的男人，坐倒在地的他受了伤，身上的衣物也已破败不堪，也不知这个可怜人到底经历了什么。
romanhous_pavlena_ma_v_tr_cKjm

Pavlena has a sweetheart named Roman in Troskowitz. As I learnt from his friend Dushko, Roman has also disappeared. When I searched Roman's house, I found out that Pavlena had indeed been there with Roman quite recently. Pavlena had left the baskets she was selling in Troskowitz in Roman's house, and there was fresh food on the table.
帕芙莱娜在特罗斯科维茨有个爱人叫罗曼。他的朋友杜什科告诉我，罗曼也失踪了。我去搜他家，发现帕芙莱娜近日确实和罗曼待在这里，家里有她在特罗斯科维茨卖的篮子，桌子上的饭菜也都新鲜。
romanhous_pavlena_ma_v_tr_DzVd
I learnt that Pavlena has a sweetheart in Troskowitz named Roman. According to Dushko, the leader of the woodcutters, Roman has also disappeared. Dushko suggested to search Roman's house.
我得知帕芙莱娜在特罗斯科维茨有个爱人叫罗曼。樵夫的头儿杜什科说，他也失踪了。他建议我去他家搜搜看。
romanhous_pavlena_ma_v_tr_gOnt
Pavlena has a sweetheart named Roman in Troskowitz. As I learnt from his friend Dushko, Roman has also disappeared. Dushko suggested that I search Roman's house, but I didn't end up doing it.
帕芙莱娜在特罗斯科维茨有个爱人叫罗曼。他的朋友杜什科告诉我，罗曼也失踪了。杜什科建议我去他家搜搜看，但我没去。
rozbij_ba_nakonec_to_ale__qiAV
However, it didn't end well. Gules died, and the whole thing fell apart.
不过，结局并不如人所愿。古勒斯死了，事情都搞砸了。
rozbij_ba_tlamu_jse_nedop_pBvt
I didn't catch the Gob.
我没有抓住“大嘴”。
rozbij_ba_tlamu_poslal_ce_j89Y

Gules sent the Gob to the place by the pond where we camped when we were ambushed. He was supposed to check if there was anything valuable left behind. In the end, Gules asked me not to kill the Gob. He seemed to really care about the guy. I wouldn't have thought that of him.
我们被伏击的营地旁有一个池塘，古勒斯派了“大嘴”过去检查是否还有遗漏的贵重品，但他反水了。不过，古勒斯还是请求我不要杀死他，看来他真的很在乎这个人，真是出人意料。
rozbij_ba_tlamu_poslal_ce_jt5k

Gules sent the Gob to the place by the pond where we camped when we were ambushed. He was supposed to check if anything valuable was left behind. Gules did ask me to spare the Gob, but I didn't let him go.
我们被伏击的营地旁有一个池塘，古勒斯派了“大嘴”过去检查是否还有遗漏的贵重品，但他反水了。尽管古勒斯请求我饶了“大嘴”，但我没有放他离开。
rozbij_ba_tlamu_poslal_ce_RFBb

Gules sent the Gob to the place by the pond where we camped when we were ambushed. He was supposed to check if anything valuable was left behind. In the end, Gules asked me not to kill the Gob. He seemed to really care about the guy. I wouldn't have thought that of him. Maybe that's why I spared the Gob in the end.
我们被伏击的营地旁有一个池塘，古勒斯派了“大嘴”过去检查是否还有遗漏的贵重品，但他反水了。不过，古勒斯还是请求我不要杀死他，看来他真的很在乎这个人，真是出人意料。或许也正因如此，我最终也放过了“大嘴”。
rozbij_ka_kasparuv_tabor__lO8G
Casper's camp is in Apollonia. It was the biggest camp I've come across. Maybe that's why I ended up leaving Casper alone.
卡斯帕的营地在阿波罗尼亚，我还从未与如此大的营地有过瓜葛。我没法对付他们，所以最后也没去招惹卡斯帕。
rozbij_ka_kasparuv_tabor__Ollv
Casper's camp was in Apollonia. It was the biggest camp I've had to deal with so far. It wasn't easy at all, but Casper's plundering is over.
卡斯帕的营地在阿波罗尼亚，我还从未与如此大的营地有过瓜葛。攻破这里并不容易，但我还是结束了卡斯帕的掠夺之举。
rozbij_ka_kasparuv_tabor__OZ6D
Casper's camp is in Apollonia. It's the biggest camp I've had to deal with so far. If I want to survive, I need to prepare well.
卡斯帕的营地在阿波罗尼亚，我还从未与如此大的营地有过瓜葛。如果我想活下来，就得做好充足的准备。
rozbij_ka_nakonec_to_ale__Gz8l

rozbij_ta_pekne_jsme_tem__79VJ

rozbij_ta_utekl_jsem_TgSV

我没什么打架的本事，但逃跑可是一把好手。所以当牧场爆发斗殴时，我便撒腿就跑。估计现在已可返回，或者，再等等。
rozbij_ze_dali_jsme_tem_z_tIx2

rozdej_sv_rota_se_shromaz_JbLY

连队在外堡场集合，我在那下达第一条命令。

巴桑拿到了他的那份报酬，一切也已尘埃落定。
rozdel_se_chytre_jsem_se__woJj

I made a clever deal with Basan at the expense of Tomas. I didn't have to steal anything, but I won't make as much money. Unless I tell Basan he's not getting anything. I don't think he'd be happy about that.
我以托马斯为筹码，巧妙地与巴桑达成了一次交易。我虽无需再偷盗任何东西，但也赚不到太多的钱，除非我告诉巴桑他什么也别想拿到，不过要真是那样，他估计也不会给我好脸色看的。
rozezen_d_namisto_rozhena_hjTe
Instead of scattering the sheep, like Olbram of Zhelejov wanted, I told everything to Prochek of Tachov.
我没有按照奥尔布拉姆的要求驱赶羊群，反而将一切都告知了塔霍夫的普罗切克。
rozezen_d_olbram_chce_aby_709o
Olbram wants me to drive the Tachov sheep into the woods below their pasture. That shouldn't be a problem, I just need to get rid of the shepherd guarding them.
奥尔布拉姆想让我将塔霍夫人的羊群赶进他们牧场下方的树林里。这项任务不成问题，我只需要将看管羊群的牧羊人支开即可。
rozezen_d_olbram_me_nachy_pxKc
Olbram blames me for painting on his bull. He got pretty mad and doesn't want anything to do with me anymore.
关于我在他公牛身上涂鸦一事，奥尔布拉姆对我百般责备，怒不可遏的他不想再与我有任何瓜葛。
rozezen_d_rozehnal_jsem_t_7ZLN
I scattered the Tachov sheep just like Olbram wanted.
如奥尔布拉姆所愿，我驱散了那些塔霍夫人的羊。
rozezen_d_tachovskejm_jse_HjJG
I just killed the Tachov sheep. That probably wasn't a good deed.
我杀死了塔霍夫人的羊，这或许不是什么好事。
rozinakni_pomoz_roze_doko_9kck
Help Lady Rosa finish her book.
协助罗莎女士完成书籍撰写。
rozinakni_povez_roze_jak__QZ8N

取得罗莎女士所要书籍。
rozinakni_ziskej_knihu_o__202Q

将马列索夫的经历告知罗莎女士。
rozlouskn_cenek_mi_rekl_z_cXb8

Chenyek told me that somewhere in Kuttenberg is the hideout of a former gang of thieves. There should be something in there that could help the Guild to solve the mystery of the symbols that are on a lot of houses in Kuttenberg. Unfortunately, I don't have any more clues, so I have no choice but to look carefully and search.
程叶科告诉我，库滕堡某地有一个前盗贼团伙的藏身处。那里应该有一些东西可以帮助公会解开库滕堡房屋上的符号之谜。不幸的是，我没有更多线索，所以只能仔细观察和寻找。
rozlouskn_nasel_jsem_list_o1AD
I found a parchment with the symbols from the houses in Kuttenberg, along with sayings that explain what they mean.
我找到了一张羊皮纸，上面有库滕堡房屋上的符号，还有解释这些符号含义的谚语。
rozluc_se_mel_bych_si_pro_iXA5
I should talk to Sara about Martin the blacksmith, my Pa. If I don't do it now, I won't get another chance.
我得与萨拉讨论铁匠马丁，也就是我的父亲。要是现在不这么做，以后就没有机会了。
rozluc_se_nez_nastane_vec_qNii
Before night falls and I leave the fortress, I should say goodbye to Katherine. It might be the last time we see each other.
趁着天色尚早，我得在离开堡垒前跟凯瑟琳道别，这也许是我们最后一次见面。
rozluc_se_nez_odejdu_mel__GmDJ
Before I leave, I should say goodbye to Capon. It might be the last opportunity we have to speak to each other, and I don't want there to be anything left unsaid between us.
在离开之前我得跟卡蓬道个别。这可能是我们最后一次交谈了，不希望我们之间留有遗憾。
rozluc_se_promluvil_jsem__Pa5C

As soon as I made sure Sara was alright, the conversation turned towards my father Martin. It seemed to me that she still had considerable affection for him, and their story reassured me that human existence is full of tragedies, Then I spoke to the survivors. They said they would try to get to Kolin, where they could hide. Samuel will travel with them, as will Liechtenstein, so hopefully nothing will happen to them on the way. It was just me and Kubyenka left, who slowly headed back to the Devil's Den.
确认萨拉没事后，话题转向了我的父亲马丁。我觉得她对我父亲依然怀有相当的感情。人生之中总是充满着这样大大小小的悲剧，但人总会重新振作起来，用更多的美好尽量抚平这些伤痕。 后来我跟幸存者们进行了交谈，他们打算前往科林以寻求安宁，而塞缪尔和列支敦士登也将与他们同行，希望途中不会发生什么意外。最后只剩下我和库宾卡，我们一起返回了“魔窟”。
rozluc_se_rozloucil_jsem__3qYr
I said goodbye to Capon.
我跟卡蓬道了别。
rozluc_se_rozloucil_jsem__v931
I said goodbye to Katherine. I hope we see each other again.
我跟凯瑟琳道了别，希望我们还会再见。
rozluc_se_sara_mi_povedel_Xs2U

As soon as I made sure Sara was alright, the conversation turned towards my father Martin. It seemed to me that she still had considerable affection for him, and their story reassured me that human existence is full of tragedies, big and small, to be survived and hopefully at least partially offset by plenty of joyful moments.
确认萨拉没事后，话题转向了我的父亲马丁。我觉得她对我父亲依然怀有相当的感情。人生之中总是充满着这样大大小小的悲剧，但人总会重新振作起来，用更多的美好尽量抚平这些伤痕。
rozluc_se_zachraneni_patr_h1cc
The rescued noblemen and Kuttenberg burghers are in the outer bailey preparing to leave. I took my leave of them and reminded them of the message they must relay to Jobst.
获救贵族和库滕堡市民正在外堡场，准备离开。我告别他们，同时提醒他们必须向约布斯特转达的信息。
rozluc_se_zachraneni_patr_oyDI
The rescued noblemen and Kuttenberg burghers are in the outer bailey preparing to leave. I should take my leave of them and also remind them of the message they must relay to Jobst.
获救贵族和库滕堡市民正在外堡场，准备离开。我应该告别他们，同时提醒他们必须向约布斯特转达的信息。
rozluc_se_zachraneni_patr_tuQb

获救贵族和库滕堡市民正在外堡场，准备离开。罗莎与我吻别。
rozluc_se_zachraneni_patr_ycZB
The rescued noblemen and Kuttenberg burghers are in the outer bailey preparing to leave. I should remind them of the message they must relay to Jobst and see them off, especially Rosa.
获救贵族和库滕堡市民正在外堡场，准备离开。我应该提醒他们必须向约布斯特转达的信息，并跟他们告别，特别是跟罗莎。
rozraz_dv_vez_byla_obsaze_0VL2

塔楼被敌人占领了，我们破门而入。
rozraz_dv_vez_je_obsazena_OmYH
The tower has been occupied by the enemy! I have to break down the door while Capon and the others provide cover.
塔楼已被敌人占领！我必须破门而入，卡蓬和其他同伴给会给我掩护。
rozsoudi__kdyz_mam_ted_ob_Zbtj

Now that I've ridden both races, I should talk with the horsemen and finally settle their dispute. After all, I know everything there is to know about them. Or do I? What are their horses' names, anyway?

Now that I've ridden both races, I should talk with the horsemen and finally settle their dispute. After all, I know everything there is to know about them. Or do I? What are their horses' names, anyway?
rozsoudi__nez_jsem_stihl__CbAj
Before I could judge the riders, everything went wrong.
Before I could judge the riders, everything went wrong.
rozsoudi__s_obema_jezdci__d9YM
I talked with both riders. As always, it was intense, but in the end, I had to admit that archery was the best.
I talked with both riders. As always, it was intense, but in the end, I had to admit that archery was the best.
rozsoudi__s_obema_jezdci__VzbO
I talked with both riders. As always, it was intense, but in the end, I had to admit that racing was the best.
I talked with both riders. As always, it was intense, but in the end, I had to admit that racing was the best.
rozsoudi__s_obema_jezdci__WfhL
I talked with both riders. As always, it was intense, but I managed to reconcile them without taking sides.
I talked with both riders. As always, it was intense, but I managed to reconcile them without taking sides.
rozsoudi__s_obema_jezdci__xjOx
I talked with both riders. As always, it was intense. I wanted to reconcile them without taking sides, but my trick didn’t work.
I talked with both riders. As always, it was intense. I wanted to reconcile them without taking sides, but my trick didn’t work.
rozvaprom_jakmile_jsem_ho_9Nlv

I untied Sam, who just collapsed on the floor like a sack of apples. Damn! He's taken a terrible beating! He can't even stand up, let alone walk!
He said he wanted to take revenge on von Bergow for the pogrom, so he went ahead by himself! Damn it, Sam! You just had to say the word and I'd have come with you! Now I don't know what to do. Sam's in no state to ride, and if we both go on the same horse, we won't reach Jobst before winter, and the fortress will fall. But I can't leave him here either because he'll die for sure.
我给塞缪松了绑，刚受了一顿毒打的他毫无生气地瘫倒在地上，该死！此刻的他脚跟都无法站稳，更别说要他行走了！他说他要让冯·波尔高为那场大屠杀付出代价，所以才独自与之对峙！真是白痴塞缪！但凡跟我提一嘴，我也愿随他赴汤蹈火！而现在的我也没了头绪，此刻的塞缪没法骑马，如果我们骑上同一只马，就无法赶在冬天之前赴会约布斯特，届时堡垒将会失守。可我也不能把他留在此处，任由他等待自己的死亡。
rozvaprom_musim_mu_pomoct_4XBH
He doesn't look good. I could tell at first glance the soldiers beat him quite badly.
他的状况看起来并不乐观，第一眼就看得出来那些士兵下手不轻。
rozvaz_ko_hned_jak_budu_m_IhiY
I should untie Adder's ropes as soon as I can.
我得尽快给阿德尔松绑。
rozvaz_ko_pouta_jsem_koma_Ieeo
All I needed to do was to cut Adder's ropes and he was free.
我割断了阿德尔身上的绳子，他也因此得救。
rozvaz_ko_snad_si_komar_p_U9ov
I left Adder lying on the ground tied up. I hope he managed without my help.
我将身受捆绑的阿德尔留在了原地，但愿没了我的帮助，他也能设法脱困。
rozvaz_sv_miku_jsem_nasel_AVYS
I found Mika, but the soldiers found him first! I have to help him fast!
我找到了米卡，但是士兵早我一步找到了他！我要尽快帮他脱离困境！
rozvaz_sv_miku_jsem_nasel_y8SE

I found Mika, but that's not the end of our troubles! The soldiers have closed the road, so the wagon and the other allies stopped on the edge of Apollonia. If I don't reach them by dawn and tell them what's happened, they'll leave!
我找到了米卡，但麻烦可远没结束！士兵封锁了道路，马车和其他同伴被迫在阿波罗尼亚边境停了下来。要是我没能在黎明前赶去告诉他们来龙去脉，他们就会离开！
rutinaavy_dej_hlaseni_ziz_ZRIv
Give a report to Zizka.
向杰式卡报告。
rutinaavy_najdi_predmety__YwtV
Find small pieces of scrap metal in the fortress that can be used to make ammunition.
在堡垒中寻找零碎金属，用以制造弹药。
rutinaavy_promluv_se_svym_oCcj
Speak to your men at the infirmary.
去医务室和你的部下谈谈。
rutinaavy_promluv_si_dobr_OwsM
Speak with Dobrosh
与多布罗什谈谈。
rutinaavy_promluv_si_se_s_MwEF
Speak with Sam
与塞缪尔谈谈。
rutinaavy_promluv_si_s_ja_221s
Speak with Jaroslav

safarik_z_ted_uz_se_safar_TBqB
Now Stanislav doesn't need worry about the lost ram anymore.
现在斯坦尼斯拉夫再也不用操心那只遗失的公羊了。
sanceprob_nech_se_porazit_DgN0

解决达令的麻烦。
sanceprob_promluv_si_s_be_3MVl

与达令交谈。
sanceprob_stanik_je_po_sm_Vtx0
