斯塔尼克死了。
sanceprob_umrel_beruska_d2fl
Darling is dead.
达令死了。
savehunter_s_vlky_co_ohro_3BDK
I took care of the wolves that were endangering the huntsman. We didn't have beasts like those around Rattay…
我解决掉了危及猎人性命的狼群。我们拉泰附近见不到这种野兽…
savehunter_tohle_opravdu__kqRu
I don't have time for this right now. I'm not going to fight a pack of wolves just because of some huntsman. He can deal with them himself, he's a huntsman after all. Right? Right!
现在我可管不了这件事。我不会因为什么猎人而单挑一群狼。他可以自己对付它们，毕竟他是个猎人。对吗？对！
savehunter_v_lese_jsem_na_vzZ2
In the woods, I ran into the huntsman in an unpleasant situation. He's barely holding on to a tree branch while a pack of wolves is swarming beneath him. I should do something!
在森林里，我遇到了情况不太妙的猎人。他勉强抓住一根树枝，树下有一群狼正对他虎视眈眈。我得做点什么！
savehunter_zlatina_predtu_BBZs
To help the huntsman, I have to get rid of the wolves beneath the tree somehow.
为了帮助猎人，我得想法除掉树下的狼群。
savehunte_vostatka_jsem_h_DCmx
I threw Vostatek over my shoulder and brought him to the nearest building. Why should I have to carry him who knows where? Someone else can take care of him, at least he's out of the woods.
我扛起沃斯塔克，将他带到了最近的房屋。我为什么要将他送到我都不知道在哪里的地方？让别人照顾他就好了，至少他已经走出了树林。
savehunte_vostatka_jsem_s_UHSS

I threw Vostatek over my shoulder and brought him home. It was a long walk, but I didn't see the point of dragging him around the forest. I've got a mind of my own. And an aching shoulder for that matter, but the first thing is more important.
我扛起沃斯塔克，将他带回家。这是一段漫长的路程，但我认为没有必要将他在树林里拖来拖去。我有自己的想法。我的肩膀为此十分酸痛，但最重要的是带他回家。
sbal_holku_spolecne_s_vit_I5Kh

Svatya and Vitek, the gamekeeper's son, talked me into trying to pick up a girl they call Myshka. However, I have to contend with the dreaded Vuytek, Svatya's friend, who is trying to do the same. Without much success though.
斯瓦蒂亚和猎场看守人之子维特克，想让我试着结识一位名叫米什卡的女孩。然而，斯瓦蒂亚之友，可怕的维特克也想获得女孩的芳心，不过还未见成效。看来，我不得不与之一较高下。
sbal_holku_svata_s_vitkem_O2aM

Svatya and Vitek, the gamekeeper's son, talked me into trying to pick up a girl they call Myshka. I had a rival, the dreaded Vuytek, Svatya's friend who was also trying to impress her. In the end, it went nowhere. I made a fool of myself in front of both Vuytek and Myshka.
斯瓦蒂亚和猎场看守人之子维特克，想让我试着结识一位名叫米什卡的女孩。而斯瓦蒂亚之友维特克成为了我的竞争对手，因为这个可怕的家伙也想取得那位女孩的芳心。结果我未能如愿，甚至还在维特克和米什卡眼前尽显丑态。
sbal_holku_svata_s_vitkem_Oye2

Svatya and Vitek, the gamekeeper's son, talked me into trying to pick up a girl they call Myshka. I had a rival, the dreaded Vuytek. Svatya's friend who was also trying to impress her. I humiliated him in front of Myshka so much he challenged me to a duel. I'm not dumb enough to accept. But even so, I didn't really impress Myshka. She probably thought us both oafs.
斯瓦蒂亚和猎场看守人之子维特克，想让我试着结识一位名叫米什卡的女孩。而斯瓦蒂亚之友维特克成为了我的竞争对手，因为这个可怕的家伙也想取得那位女孩的芳心。当着米什卡的面，我让维特克颜面尽失，他也因此向我发起决斗挑战，可机智如我，又怎么会接受如此挑衅。不过即便如此，我还是没能打动米什卡，或许在她眼里，我们俩都是白痴。
sbal_holku_svata_s_vitkem_T9lQ

Svatya and Vitek, the gamekeeper's son, talked me into trying to pick up a girl they call Myshka. I had a rival, the dreaded Vuytek. Svatya's friend who was also trying to impress her. As soon as I saw Myshka, it was clear to me she was fed up with Vuytek's attempts to woo her. So I suggested to him we just leave her alone. That impressed her so much she told me to meet her somewhere private.
斯瓦蒂亚和猎场看守人之子维特克，想让我试着结识一位名叫米什卡的女孩。而斯瓦蒂亚之友维特克成为了我的竞争对手，因为这个可怕的家伙也想取得那位女孩的芳心。见到米什卡的那一刻，我便一眼看出她早已厌倦了维特克的撩拨，因此我建议维特克别再烦扰那位姑娘，而如此举动竟让米什卡尤为心动，她便要求与我私下会面。
sbal_holku_svata_s_vitkem_vMWa

Svatya and Vitek, the gamekeeper's son, talked me into trying to pick up a girl they call Myshka. I had a rival, the dreaded Vuytek, Svatya's friend who was also trying to impress her. I humiliated him in front of Myshka so much he challenged me to a duel. Naturally, I couldn't refuse.
斯瓦蒂亚和猎场看守人之子维特克，想让我试着结识一位名叫米什卡的女孩。而斯瓦蒂亚之友维特克成为了我的竞争对手，因为这个可怕的家伙也想取得那位女孩的芳心。当着米什卡的面，我让维特克颜面尽失，他也因此向我发起决斗挑战，而我自然不会拒绝。
scufflewi_p_dostan_se_z_t_nGaq
The evening meeting took place, but things weren't what they seemed. We have to get out alive!
会面如期进行，但事情没有想象得那么简单，我们得逃出去！
scufflewi_p_schuzka_se_sa_Hus3

The evening meeting in the abandoned yard did take place, but not in the way I'd imagined. Instead of a secret group whipping up anti-Jewish sentiment, there was Samuel and his people. The whole thing was a trap. Luckily I dealt with it and gave his henchmen a beating they won't forget. But it turned out to be a big misunderstanding.
那场在废弃庭院中的会面如期进行了，但情况和想象中大相径庭。当时到场的人并非所谓煽动反犹太情绪的秘密组织，而是塞缪尔和他的手下，这一切安排就是个陷阱。万幸的是，我将局势掌握在手中，给他的手下奉上了一顿终身难忘的毒打。但实际上，整件事都是个大误会。
scufflewi_p_schuzka_se_sa_Jh3F

The evening meeting in the abandoned yard did take place, but not in the way I'd imagined. Instead of a secret group whipping up anti-Jewish sentiment, there was Samuel and his people. The whole thing was a trap. I took a beating, and it was only dumb luck that saved me from certain death. It turns out the whole thing was a big misunderstanding.
那场在废弃庭院中的会面如期进行了，但情况和想象中大相径庭。当时到场的人并非所谓煽动反犹太情绪的秘密组织，而是塞缪尔和他的手下，这一切安排就是个陷阱。我也被打得鼻青脸肿，纯粹靠着运气才捡回一条命。但实际上，整件事都是个大误会。
sdel_berg_podarilo_se_nam_Ve3Q

We managed to convince Lord von Burgow that Olda Semine is innocent of the attack on his group and perhaps we thus prevented bloodletting. Now the plan is to attack the bandits based in Nebakov, the details of which Lord von Bergow will tell us at the evening feast.
我们成功让冯·波尔高大人相信奥达·塞米与袭击他部队的团伙并无瓜葛，也因此避免了更多流血事件。当前，我们的计划是要进攻盘踞在内巴科夫的强盗，至于计划的具体细节，冯·波尔高大人将会在晚宴时详细解释。
sdel_vysl_mam_jiste_vodit_uY8P
I have a suspicion of what the monastery secret might be. I should tell Casper about it.
我对修道院的秘方有了一番猜想。我应该告诉卡斯帕。
sdel_vysl_sdelil_jsem_vys_hBu1
I shared my findings with Casper. The monastery secret is definitely the strange foul-smelling ingredient that the monks have delivered to the vineyard from time to time.
我与卡斯帕分享了我的发现。修士们时不时会把难闻的奇特材料送往葡萄园，这肯定就是修道院的秘方。
searchfor_hledej_ve_spelu_E3XK
I need to find Goatskin. I know he goes to a certain dodgy tavern called the Hole in the Wall.
我需要找到山羊皮。我知道他去了一家叫“墙洞”的可疑酒馆。
searchfor_hledej_v_laznich_7qqN
Goatskin's trail leads to the lanes between the Horse Market and Hradek quarter. It's said he robs drunks there at night. I should take a look and ask around.
山羊皮的足迹通向了马市和赫拉德克区之间的道路，据说他会趁着夜色在那里抢劫醉酒之人，我前去得去打探一番。
searchfor_od_cenka_jsem_t_jyuQ

I also learnt from Chenyek that there are two interesting places in Goatskin's area: a miners' tavern called The Black Horse and some city bathhouse for wealthy customers. It won't do any harm to ask questions there.
我从程叶科口中得知，山羊皮的地盘上就有两个有趣的地方：矿工聚集的黑马酒馆，以及一间专为达官贵人服务的澡堂。总之到这些地方去打探消息也不会有任何损失。
searchfor_p_nasel_sem_koz_6WKi

Once I had caught up to Goatskin, it was easy. The poor fellah was so scared of a beating that he didn't even resist. He said he really worked for some nobleman, but he doesn't know which one. The job was indirectly given to him by a Jew named Samuel, who's connected with the King Solomon Tavern in the Jewish Quarter. Goatskin heard the name Liechtenstein a few times when this Samuel was talking with his cronies. But it's hard to say what that means. They could have been talking about Liechtenstein for any number of reasons.
抓到山羊皮之后，就很容易了。这个混蛋害怕挨打，他甚至没有反抗。他说他真的为某个贵族工作，但不知道是哪一个。这份工作是一个叫塞缪尔的犹太人间接派给他的，塞缪尔和犹太区的所罗门王酒馆有关联。在塞缪尔与亲信交谈时，山羊皮听到过几次列支敦士登这个名字。但很难说是什么意思。他们谈论列支敦士登的原因可能有很多。
searchfor_ted_vim_kde_se__Dlmq
I found out where Goatskin is holed up. Maybe I'll be lucky and find him in his hideaway.
我发现了山羊皮的藏身处，足够走运的话，没准我就能在里边找到他。
searching_hynek_nelhal_ry_Sdmq
The captured knight, Hynek wasn't lying. Sir Peter of Suchotlesky is dead, yet László still wants to get his hands on Jan's money. I could threaten to reveal the truth. Or go straight to Jan…
那个被俘的骑士海尼克并没有说谎。苏霍茨基的彼得爵士已经死了，然而拉斯洛仍然想得到杨的钱。我可以威胁说要揭露真相。或者直接去找杨…
searching_jan_me_posila_s_gRBP
Jan has sent me to negotiate on his behalf with László Farkas. Jan told me nothing more about him, so I'll have to find him myself in Sigismund's camp.
杨派我代表他与拉斯洛·法卡斯进行谈判。杨没有告诉我更多关于他的信息，所以我必须亲自到西格斯蒙德营地去找他。
searching_jan_me_poslal_d_4KqX
Jan has sent me to Sigismund's camp to negotiate with László Farkas. After asking around a bit, I found out I should look somewhere below the smithy. I hope that doesn't mean half the camp.
杨派我去西格斯蒙德的营地找拉斯洛·法卡斯进行谈判。四处打听了一下，线索指向铁匠铺下面的某个地方，希望能好找一点。
searching_mam_v_tabore_vy_p6NV
I am to negotiate with László Farkas in the camp. Unfortunately, I don't know what he looks like. If I understood the Cuman soldier correctly, Farkas is wearing black and red.
我要去营地和拉斯洛·法卡斯谈判。可惜，我不知道他长什么样子。如果我没理解错那个库曼士兵的话，法卡斯应该身穿黑色和红色的衣服。
searching_mel_bych_se_pre_GTMe
I should find out whether Peter of Suchotlesky is actually being held in the camp.
我应该弄清楚苏霍茨基的彼得是否真的被关押在营地里。
searching_moje_podezreni__sxLD

I immediately had the feeling something was off. My suspicions were warranted. Sir Peter of Suchotlesky has already met his maker, and here László Farkas is prattling on about a prisoner exchange. I could tell him I know the truth. After all, if Jan finds out what has happened, he won't let it go.
一股不祥的预感瞬间生起。我怀疑得没错。苏霍茨基的彼得爵士已经去见了上帝，而拉斯洛·法卡斯却在这里喋喋不休地谈论交换囚犯的事情。我可以告诉他我知道真相。毕竟，如果杨知道了这件事，他不会善罢甘休。
searching_p_mel_jsem_s_la_gJht
My task was to negotiate Peter's release with László Farkas, but given the circumstances surrounding the knight, I decided for a faster, less traditional solution…
我的任务是与拉斯洛·法卡斯谈判，要求他释放彼得，但考虑到这位骑士的情况，我决定采用一个更快速、更出其不意的解决办法......
searching_po_trose_hledan_OpOx
After looking for a bit, I found László Farkas.
不一会儿，我就找到了拉斯洛·法卡斯。
searching_p_s_laszlem_jse_jjXT
I negotiated the terms of the captive's release and went to inform Jan. I didn't see Peter in the camp. László says he'll take him to the agreed-upon place for the handover.
我谈好了释放俘虏的条件，然后去通知杨。 我在营地里没有看到彼得。拉斯洛说他会带他到约定的地点进行交接。
searching_p_ve_stanu_byl__ECxL

Although I did find a captive in the tent, it wasn't Knight Peter… But he says he saw the knight here and promised to tell me more if I bring him some food. Otherwise, I'll have to look for him myself.
虽然我在帐篷里找到了一个俘虏，但却不是彼得骑士......但他说在这里看到过骑士，并答应说如果我带食物给他，他会告诉我更多。否则，我就得自己去找骑士。
searching_p_zajaty_rytir__4jLz

Sir Hynek of Hobza, as the captive introduced himself to me, says he's waiting here for one of his relatives to pay his ransom. He claims that Peter of Suchotlesky was here, but died of a horrible illness several days ago. He also heard the body was going to be taken away soon. If this is true, I'm in a jam!
这个俘虏称自己是来自霍布扎的海尼克爵士，他说自己在这里等着一个亲戚来付赎金。他声称，苏霍茨基的彼得之前来过这里，但几天前死于一场可怕的疾病。他还听说，尸体很快就要被运走。如果这是真的，那我就麻烦了！
searching_slysel_jsem_ze__D6k4
I heard the prisoners in the camp are under constant guard. If I see guards by a tent, Sir Peter might be inside.
我听说营地的囚犯受全天候看守。如果看到有守卫的帐篷，彼得爵士大概就在里面。
searching_v_tabore_jsem_n_QyCQ
I found several carefully guarded tents in the camp. The guards told me nothing. They just tried to get fob me off.
我在营地里发现了几个严加看守的帐篷。守卫们什么也没告诉我。他们只想敷衍我。
searchsta_zlata_zena_tros_a6xr

Zlata, the Troskowitz gamekeeper's wife, is worried about her husband. He went to the forest, but hasn't returned for some time. Zlata has a bad feeling about it, so I promised to go and find him. I'm supposed to go towards the forest from the Vidlak Pond. That's where Vostatek was heading.
特罗斯科维茨猎人的妻子兹拉塔很担心丈夫的情况。他去了树林，但有一段时间没有回来了。兹拉塔有一种不好的预感，所以我答应她去找他。我应该从维德拉克池塘那边走向树林，沃斯塔克当时就是要去那里。
searchsta_zlata_zena_tros_cWm6
Zlata, the Troskowitz huntsman's wife, was worried about her husband. He went to the forest, but hadn't returned for some time. He was hiding in a tree from a hungry pack of wolves.
特罗斯科维茨猎人的妻子兹拉塔很担心丈夫的情况。他去了树林，但有一段时间没有回来了。他藏在一棵树上躲避一群饿狼。
searchsta_zlata_zena_tros_etkc

Zlata, the Troskowitz huntsman's wife, was worried about her husband who went to the forest to check his traps, but hadn't returned for a some time. Unfortunately, I never managed to find him, and now I'll never find out what happened to him.
特罗斯科维茨猎人的妻子兹拉塔很担心丈夫的情况。他去树林查看自己设下的捕猎陷阱，但有一段时间没有回来了。遗憾的是，我根本找不到他，现在我就没法知道他发生了什么事。
searchsta_zlata_zena_tros_kAbW
Zlata, the Troskowitz huntsman's wife, is worried about her husband. He went to the forest, but hasn't returned for some time. Zlata has a bad feeling about it, so I promised to go and find him.
特罗斯科维茨猎人的妻子兹拉塔很担心丈夫的情况。他去了树林，但有一段时间没有回来了。兹拉塔有一种不好的预感，我答应她去找他。
searchthe_vzadu_za_smilov_a3Yp
I found a cellar behind Smil's house. The door was locked, but I managed to get inside. I found barrels of beer in there, which would definitely interest the commander.
我在史麦尔的房屋后发现了一处地窖。尽管地窖的门已上了锁，但我还是成功进入了其中。现在就来看看这里都有些什么吧。
searchthe_vzadu_za_smilov_K8mR
I found a cellar behind Smil's house. The door was locked, but I managed to get inside. Now I just have to see what's there.
我在史麦尔的房屋后发现了一处地窖。尽管地窖的门已上了锁，但我还是成功进入其中，现在就来看看这里都有些什么吧。
searchthe_vzadu_za_smilov_R6Q5
I found a cellar behind Smil's house. The door is locked and I'm curious to see what I'll find inside.
我在史麦尔的房屋后发现了一处地窖，且地窖的门已经上了锁，我很好奇里边都有些什么。
searchtro_pavlena_dcera_k_EW8e
Pavlena went to Troskowitz, so I wanted to look for her there, but there's no point now.
帕芙莱娜去特罗斯科维茨卖篮子了，我想去那里找她，但现在没意义了。
searchtro_pavlena_dcera_k_kChb
Pavlena went to Troskowitz to sell baskets. I learned everything I could in the village.
帕芙莱娜去特罗斯科维茨卖篮子了。我在那村子里掌握了一切能掌握的线索。
searchtro_pavlena_dcera_k_lUt7
Pavlena was last seen heading to Troskowitz to sell baskets. I should start looking for her there.
人们最后一次看到帕芙莱娜，她正要去特罗斯科维茨卖篮子，我应该去那里找找。
seber_mec_pri_priprave_ob_KHq8
The help of every blacksmith is needed to get ready for the siege. There are a few old swords by the smithy. If they are sharpened, they can still be of use.
守城需要每个铁匠出力。铁匠铺旁还有几把旧剑，要是能把它们磨锋利，也能派上用场。
seber_mec_pri_priprave_ob_ZpkD
The help of every blacksmith is needed to get ready for the siege. There were a few old swords by the smithy. If they are sharpened, they can still be of use.

seber_obe_ukradene_veci_j_107S

The stolen items are in Goatskin's underground hideout. Some clever bloke drew a map to it, but Goatskin doesn't have it. Apparently it's sewn onto the coat of some fellah called Angel, who I hope is strung up on the gallows outside the city.
偷来的东西都放在了山羊皮的地下藏身处，有个聪明的人画了一张地图，但山羊皮没能拿到。那张地图应该是缝在一个叫安琪儿的人的外套上，希望这家伙已经被抓住吊死在城外了。
seber_obe_ukradene_veci_j_SHfJ

The stolen items are in Goatskin's underground hideout. Some clever bloke drew a map to it, but Goatskin didn't have it. He pointed me towards the gallows outside the city, where his "friend" and final owner of the map, a fellah called Angel, was hanging. Fortunately he was still there and had the map sewn onto his coat, just like Goatskin said.
偷来的物品在山羊皮的地下藏身处。有个聪明人画了一张地图，但山羊皮没有拿到。他说可以去城外的绞刑架，他的一个“朋友”，叫安琪儿，同时是最后一个拿到地图的人，被吊死在了那里。幸运的是，他的尸体还在，地图也正如山羊皮所说，缝在了他的衣服上。
seber_pyt_souhlasil_jsme__8d8q
I agreed to help Karel carry some heavy sacks to his camp, but I had to put it down for a while and take a break. It's bloody heavy. As soon as I catch my breath, we'll carry on.
我同意帮助卡雷尔将沉重的袋装物搬回他的营地，但是那袋东西实在是太重了，我不得不在路上将其放下以稍作休息，多喘口气后我们再继续上路。
seber_pyt_souhlasil_jsme__jJEI
I agreed to help Karel carry some heavy sacks to his camp. I can't blame him for asking for help, I don't know about his, but mine was bloody heavy.
我同意帮助卡雷尔将沉重的袋装物搬回他的营地。不知道他的那袋如何，总之我身上的这袋简直重得要死，但我总不能怪他给我添麻烦吧。
seber_pyt_souhlasil_jsme__oKsZ
I agreed to help Karel carry some heavy sacks to his camp, but I changed my mind. I'm not going to any camp.
我同意帮卡雷尔把沉重的麻袋搬回营地。但我改变了主意。我才不会去什么营地。
seber_pyt_souhlasil_jsme__uT6W
I agreed to help Karel carry some heavy sacks to his camp. Nothing left to do than to throw it over my shoulder and get going.
我同意帮助卡雷尔将沉重的袋装物搬回他的营地，现在只需将麻袋往肩上一扛即可出发。

Defend Raborsch!
保卫拉博施！
setkanivr_porazte_neprate_60Ed
Defeat the attackers!
抵御来犯者！
setkanivr_promluv_si_lich_J8ZV
Talk to Liechtenstein about the arranged support.
与列支敦士登谈论已安排的援助。
setkanivr_promluv_si_s_kr_lOmT
Talk to Christopher.
与克里斯托弗交谈。
setkanivr_promluv_si_s_li_Gdhf
Talk to Liechtenstein.
与列支敦士登交谈。
setkanivr_promluv_si_s_li_tQyr
Talk to Liechtenstein.
和列支敦士登交谈。

Find a jug of wine.
找一壶葡萄酒。
setkanivr_sezen_podporu_u_DI3N
Get support from Haman Alder.
获取哈曼·阿尔德的支持。
setkanivr_sezen_podporu_u_M5bV
Get support from Botschek of Kunstadt.
向库斯塔特的博舌克请求援助。
setkanivr_sezen_podporu_u_u4FB
Get support from Anna of Waldstein.
获取瓦尔德斯坦的安娜的支持。
setkanivr_seznam_se_s_bra_xQm8
Meet Brabant.
与布拉班特会面。
setkanivr_seznam_se_se_sa_1cDD
Get to know the rabbi and his escort.
了解拉比和他的护卫。
setkanivr_utkej_se_s_krys_el4U
Take on Christopher in a duel.
与克里斯托弗决斗。
setkanivr_vymen_balicky_v_ugky
Swap out the documents in the saddlebags.
将鞍袋中的文件换走。
setkanivr_zachran_bratra_aXNc
Protect your brother.
保护你的兄弟。
setkanivr_zajdi_do_sklepa_ulfW
Get a quality wine for Liechtenstein.
为列支敦士登找来更好的酒。
setkanivr_zjisti_co_se_od_pbda
Tell Sam and Liechtenstein about the threat to the Jews in Kuttenberg.
告诉塞缪和列支敦士登，库滕堡的犹太人受到了威胁。
setkanivr_zjisti_co_se_st_S9hP
Find out what happened.
了解现场的情况。
setkanivr_zjisti_od_stolb_nh2o
Get to Alder's documents.
取得阿尔德的文件。
setkej_se_ciwe_potak_odje_Iane
I have to rejoin Capon at Trosky or on the way, if I can catch up with him.
我得在特罗斯基跟卡蓬碰面，要不就在途中与之会合，前提是我能赶上他。
setkej_se_hotovson_iQsJ
In the end I met up with Capon at Trosky again. Next time I should listen to my lord, stick close to him when he asks me to, and stay out of trouble.
我最终在特罗斯基与卡蓬成功会合。下次我最好听从上级的指令，只要他开口，就得跟他形影不离，免得陷入麻烦。
setkej_se_jdi_za_ptakem_c_PhDG
I have to meet with Hans Capon to set out for Nebakov, as Lord von Bergow instructed us.
依照冯·波尔高领主的指示，我必须与汉斯·卡蓬碰面，然后启程前往内巴科夫。
setkej_se_na_nebakove_jse_SqBZ
I got into a fight at Nebakov and Capon had to flee. I should rejoin him at Trosky or on the way, if I can catch up with him.
我在内巴科夫卷入了一场打斗，卡蓬不得不逃离。我得在特罗斯基跟卡蓬碰面，要不就在途中与之会合，前提是我能赶上他。
setkej_se_na_nebakove_jse_whZ6
I got up to no good at Nebakov and was duly punished. While I was being held by the catchpoles, Capon left for Trosky without me. I should rejoin him as soon as I can.
我在内巴科夫惹事了，也受到了相应的惩罚。正当我困于治安官之手时，卡蓬丢下我独自返回了特罗斯基。我必须得尽快跟他会合。
setkej_se_pan_semin_a_jeh_g5AM
Lord Semine and his captain, Gnarly, will wait for me in the courtyard first thing in the morning. Then we'll go and search for the hands together.
塞米大人和格纳利队长明天一大早就会在院子里等我。之后我们会一起出发搜寻工人。
setkej_se_pan_semin_a_jeh_gxHd
Lord Semine and his captain, Gnarly, are waiting for me in the courtyard. We're going to ride out together to look for the cart.
塞米大人和格纳利队长正在院子里等我。我们将一起出发寻找马车。
setkej_se_racek_se_vydal__JoUs
Radzig and his unit set off after the fleeing Praguers. I should go and find him.
拉德季已率领他的部队前去追击那些逃亡的布拉格士兵，我得找到他。
setkej_se_racek_se_vydal__Kzo8

Radzig and his unit set off after the fleeing Praguers. While I was waiting for him beneath a tree outside the village, sleep overcame me. I dreamt that I met my dead parents again, perhaps for the last time. After I woke up, Radzig found me. He praised me for my deeds and made me feel that in him I have a true father who can be proud of me.
拉德季已率领他的部队前去追击那些逃亡的布拉格士兵。在村外一棵树下等待他的过程中，一股睡意向我席卷而来。而在睡梦中我再次遇到了已故的父母亲，或许这将是我们的最后一次见面。醒来后，拉德季找到了我，并对我的功绩表达了他的赞誉，那让我真切感受到了一种宛如父亲的骄傲认同。
setkej_se_vsichni_tri_jsm_IC8u
All three of us met in the courtyard of the Semine fortress and together we set out towards Trosky to find the missing cart.
我们三人在塞米堡垒的院子里碰面，一起出发前往特罗斯基，寻找丢失的马车。
sezen_bez_bezoar_uz_mam_eht9
I have the bezoar.
我拿到了毛粪石。
sezen_bez_v_zaludku_zvira_PK6n

One can sometimes find stones in the stomachs of deer and similar animals. These bezoars are said to have magical powers, and are indispensable to healers. I have to find one and put it in the pommel of the executioner's sword.
鹿及类似动物的肚子里有时能发现石头。据说这些毛粪石具有神奇的力量，是治疗师不可或缺的一种物质。我必须要找到一个，用来当作行刑剑的配重球。
sezen_byl_dohodl_jsem_si__NKPd
During our walk, Klara asked me for help with collecting herbs, but I couldn't be bothered.
散步途中，克拉拉请求我帮她采集一些草药，但我才懒得帮忙。
sezen_byl_pri_nasi_vychaz_D76P
During our walk, Klara asked me for help with collecting herbs. They should all grow in a large glade she took me to. One of them is marigold.
散步途中，克拉拉请求我帮她采集一些草药。它们应该就生长在她带我去的那片林间草地上，其中一种是金盏花。
sezen_dal_jedna_ze_sluzeb_jr3e
One of the maids told Godwin where the wine for the most distinguished guests was kept.
一位女仆告诉古德温，哪里能找到为最尊贵的客人准备的酒。
sezen_dam_krejzl_neprekva_0XVu

Unsurprisingly, Kreyzl came up with a complicated plan. We'll find an ordinary wench from the Zhelejov baths, the miller will give her some fine clothes and perfume and take her to the Semine wedding. There we'll dangle her in front of Ulrich, the Trosky chamberlain. If he takes the bait, the wench, posing as a lady, will be invited to his chambers at Trosky and I, as her bodyguard, will have time to myself in the castle, ideally to spend looking for the book. But above all, this plan will finally get me to von Bergow. Now I just have to talk to Dorothy from the bathhouse and find out which of the wenches will be keen to attend the biggest celebration in the region.

不出所料，克雷泽想出了一个复杂的计划。我们要在哲勒约夫澡堂找一位普通的女人，磨坊主会给她一些漂亮衣服和香水，然后带她去塞米的婚礼。然后我们就把她留在特罗斯基的总管，也就是乌尔里希眼前。如果他上钩了，这位冒充淑女的女人，就会被邀请前去他在特罗斯基的房间。而我，身为她的保镖，就可以在城堡里自由行动，最好是把时间用在找那本书上。但最重要的是，这个计划最终会让我找到冯·波尔高那里。现在，我只需要和澡堂的多萝西聊聊，然后看看哪个女人愿意参加这个地区最盛大的庆典。
sezen_dam_krejzl_neprekva_oNWE

Unsurprisingly, Kreyzl came up with a complicated plan. We'd have to find an ordinary wench from the Zhelejov baths, the miller would give her some fine clothes and perfume and take her to the Semine wedding. There he'd parade her in front of Ulrich, the Trosky chamberlain. If he took the bait, the wench, posing as a lady, would be invited to his chambers at Trosky and I, as her bodyguard, would have time to myself in the castle, ideally to spend looking for the book. But above all, this plan would finally get me to von Bergow. I talked to Dorothy from the bathhouse and found out that the wenches have had bad experiences with the chamberlain and don't want anything to do with him. Luckily, I was recommended a woman called Enneleyn of Wintherthur, who isn't afraid of the deviant chamberlain.

不出所料，克雷泽想出了一个复杂的计划。我们要在哲勒约夫澡堂找一位普通的女人，磨坊主会给她一些漂亮衣服和香水，然后带她去塞米的婚礼。然后他就把她留在特罗斯基的总管，也就是乌尔里希眼前。如果他上钩了，这位冒充淑女的女人，就会被邀请前去他在特罗斯基的房间。而我，身为她的保镖，就可以在城堡里自由行动，最好是把时间用在找那本书上。但最重要的是，这个计划最终会让我找到冯·波尔高那里。我和澡堂的多萝西聊过了，发现那些女人和总管有过不愉快的过往，因此不想和他有任何瓜葛。幸运的是，有人向我推荐了一位女士——温特图尔的恩内琳，她不怕那位变态总管。
sezen_duk_doplnit_situaci_ZVeo
Eggman's hat looks interesting. I could give it to innkeeper Grosch as proof that I've been here.
鸡蛋佬的帽子看起来不错，我可以把它交给酒馆老板格罗什，作为我处理了鸡蛋佬的证据。
sezen_duk_hospodksy_chce__9UAl
Eggman didn't have that much on him, but I did find a fairly memorable hat. That should be proof enough.
鸡蛋佬身上没有太多东西，但我还是找到了一顶值得留念的帽子，这足以当作他的死亡证明。
sezen_duk_musim_ale_sehna_20VA
But I should bring some proof that I really finished that stinker off. I'll try to search him.
不过我得获取一些能够证明我已解决掉这只臭虫的证明，我要对他进行一番搜身。
sezen_dzb_bohuta_si_vzal__aswY
Godwin took a jug of wine from his father's, or rather the family, cellars.
古德温从他父亲的酒窖，或者说是自家的酒窖里拿出了一壶酒。
sezen_dzb_bohutovi_nezbyl_Odwk
Godwin had no choice but to start searching for jugs of his father's best wine.
古德温别无选择，只得开始寻找他父亲留下的最好的酒。
sezen_dzb_jedna_ze_sluzeb_V9os
One of the maids told Godwin where the wine for the most distinguished guests was kept.
一位女仆告诉古德温，哪里能找到为最尊贵的客人准备的酒。
sezen_dzb_kdyz_pani_matyl_YVXf
When Lady Matylda saw Godwin's interest in her young companions, she immediately sent him for something to drink.
玛蒂尔达女士看到古德温对她的年轻同伴们很感兴趣，立刻让他找点喝的来。
sezen_dzb_podle_lichtenst_YXM0
According to Liechtenstein, Martin Oderin keeps jugs of wine somewhere in the fortress for himself and his closest friends.
列支敦士登声称马丁·奥德林在堡垒的某个地方为他自己和好友藏了几壶美酒。
sezen_hez_musim_markete_s_QlKe
Margaret has to look like a virtuous townswoman, but that's not possible in the tattered rags she's wearing. I have to bring her some nice clothes. Otherwise we might as well forget about the plan.
玛格丽特必须看起来像个体面的女市民，但现在她穿着一件破烂的衣服。我必须给她找件好点的衣服。否则，我们就得直接放弃这个计划。
sezen_hez_saty_jsem_sehnal_hGPQ
Margaret needs to look like a wealthy burher, so I found her a dress that looks great on her.
玛格丽特必须看起来像个体面的市民，所以我给她找了件更好看的衣服。
sezen_jid_na_zebraky_jsem_1XtF

I asked Tuma, the guard by the gate, about the beggars. He said that giving them some alms, like kitchen scraps, would help. But it wasn't that simple. The scraps were kept in the pantry under the cook's watchful eye. Eventually, I managed to get into the pantry and take some of the scraps. I immediately took them to the guard, who threw them to the beggars outside the gate and then we had a drink.
我向大门口的守卫图马询问了应付那些乞丐的办法，他说给他们些施舍或许能够奏效，比如给些残羹剩饭。但是事情并没有那么简单，毕竟眼尖的厨师正紧盯着储藏室里的食物。好在最终我还是成功进入储藏室取走了一些剩饭，随后便立即带给了守卫。等他将食物抛给那些乞丐后，我俩一起喝了一杯。
sezen_jid_na_zebraky_jsem_G6SO

I asked Tuma, the guard by the gate, about the beggars. He said that giving them some alms, like kitchen scraps, would help. But it's not that easy. The hawk-eyed cook is watching the scraps in the pantry. I can either talk to her about it or try to get in the pantry behind her back. But the cook watches it closely. I can also collect some food from the tables, but the guard wouldn't be too happy about that.
我向大门口的守卫图马询问了应付那些乞丐的办法，他说给他们些施舍或许能够奏效，比如给些残羹剩饭。但是事情并没有那么简单，毕竟眼尖的厨师正盯着储藏室里的剩饭呢，我要么跟她好好谈谈，要么就背着她闯进储藏室里，可她一直紧盯着。我还可以从宴会桌上取走一些食物，只是如果被守卫看到就该不乐意了。
sezen_jid_na_zebraky_jsem_Kbcm

I asked Tuma, the guard by the gate, about the beggars. He said that giving them some alms, like kitchen scraps, would help. But it wasn't that simple. The hawk-eyed cook was watching the scraps in the pantry closely. Eventually, I managed to get into the pantry and take some of the scraps. Now I simply have to take them to the guard.
我向大门口的守卫图马询问了应付那些乞丐的办法，他说给他们些施舍或许能够奏效，比如给些残羹剩饭。但是事情并没有那么简单，毕竟眼尖的厨师正紧盯着储藏室里的食物。好在最终我还是成功进入储藏室取走了一些剩饭，现在我只需将它们带给守卫即可。
sezen_kab_na_nadvori_se_m_5m2b

I wanted to get my hands on some tools so I could get around the castle a bit easier. Kabat the groom has some, but in return he wants me to get back his rosary, which he lost to Father Nicodemus in a dice game.
我想弄到一些工具，这样我在城堡里活动起来就更容易。马夫卡巴特有一些工具，但作为交换，他想让我拿回他的念珠，他在一次骰子游戏中把它输给了神父尼可丹姆斯。
sezen_kab_na_nadvori_se_m_eGPB

I wanted to get my hands on some tools so I could get around the castle a bit easier. Kabat the groom had something for me, but in return he wanted me to get back his rosary, which he lost to Father Nicodemus in a dice game. I got hold of the rosary and Kabat kept his word. Now I have the means to get around Trosky more easily.
我想弄到一些工具，这样我在城堡里活动起来就更容易。马夫卡巴特有一些工具，但作为交换，他想让我拿回他的念珠，他在一次骰子游戏中把它输给了神父尼可丹姆斯。我拿到了念珠，卡巴特遵守了他的承诺。现在我可以在特罗斯基更容易地进行活动。
sezen_kab_placeholder_a_t_OP50

I wanted to get my hands on some tools so I get could around the castle a bit easier. Kabat the groom promised to help me out if in I get back his rosary, which he lost to the local priest in a dice game. I got hold of the rosary and now I just have to give it to Kabat.
我想弄到一些工具，这样我在城堡里活动起来就更容易。马夫卡巴特答应帮忙，但作为交换，他想让我拿回他的念珠，他在一次骰子游戏中把它输给了尼科德摩斯神父。我拿到了念珠，现在我只需要把它交给卡巴特。
sezen_lou_dva_nadani_umel_R3KV
George and Michael, two aspiring minstrels, are on the lookout for a lute to give their performances that extra oomph. One is said to be hanging on the wall of a carpenter's workshop in Troskowitz...
乔治和迈克尔是两位心怀抱负的吟游诗人，他们正在寻找一把鲁特琴以便为表演助兴。据说有把鲁特琴就挂在特罗斯科维茨的一个木匠作坊的墙上…
sezen_lou_nekde_jsem_muse_pDf3
I had got my hands on a lute for the two musicians, but then the guards took it away from me. I need to get it back.
我曾经为这两位乐师弄到了一把鲁特琴，但是后来警卫将它拿走了。我得将它拿回来。
sezen_lou_sehnal_jsem_pro_W1P0
I found a lute for the budding bards.
我为崭露头角的吟游诗人找到了一把鲁特琴。
sezen_mar_mel_jsem_market_AHwt
I was supposed to bring Margaret a new dress, but now there's no point.
我本来要为玛格丽特带件新衣服，但现在已经不需要了。
sezen_mas_hynek_suchy_cer_mnnQ
Hynek, the Dry Devil, mentioned we have a stray dog at the fortress who no one has a use for. If I find and kill it, we can use its meat.
酒鬼海尼克提到过堡垒里有一只没人管的流浪狗，把它捉来宰了，就有肉吃了。
sezen_mas_nasel_jsem_na_t_3SGT
I found a stray dog at the fortress and killed it. We should be able to cook something with its meat.
我在堡垒里找到并宰杀了那只流浪狗，我们现在有肉吃了。
sezen_nec_potrebuju_toho__rkXx
I should give the bull a sleeping potion before I start painting. I'd better get three, considering how big he is.
进行涂鸦前，我得先给那只公牛喝点安眠药水。考虑到他的庞大体型，大概三瓶才够。
sezen_nec_sehnal_jsem_si__j182
I got three sleeping potions. That should be enough for Olbram's bull.
我拿到了三瓶安眠药水，应该足够应付奥尔布拉姆的公牛了。
sezen_ovc_driv_nez_jsem_o_cwWG
Before I could get the strings from the huntsman, he died a tragic death.
我还没能从猎人那里弄到琴弦，他就死于非命。
sezen_ovc_lovci_vostatek__T817

Vostatek the gamekeeper said he'd make strings for the lute, but he'd need sheep gut. And gutting an animal is no easy matter. One has to hunt and butcher dozens of animals to learn how to get the trophies you need. It might a lot easier just to buy the guts from a butcher.
猎人沃斯塔克同意制作鲁特琴用的琴弦，但是他需要一些羊肠。将一只动物开膛破肚可不是件易事，一个人必须通过不断狩猎和屠宰才能学会如何弄到所需的动物内脏。或许到屠夫那里直接购买反而会简单许多。
sezen_ovc_sehnal_jsem_lov_pfyg
I found the huntsman some sheep gut. I should give him a bit of time to make the lute strings.
我为那位猎人弄到了一些羊肠。我得稍作等候，好让他制作鲁特琴弦。
sezen_pan_v_kuchyni_jsem__caSb

I met the chamberlain of the castle in the kitchen. Clearly he wasn't not well. I talked to him and found out that he suffers from stomach ulcers. I recommended him a soothing stomach remedy and also got it for him. Now I have to bring it to him.
我在厨房里遇到了城堡的管家。显然，他的身体状况并不顺意。在和他交谈后，我得知他的胃出了问题，因此向他推荐了一种疏通肠胃的药剂，同时我还得帮助他弄到那种药剂，现在我得把药拿给他。
sezen_pan_v_kuchyni_jsem__G1wj

I met the chamberlain of the castle in the kitchen. Clearly he's not well. I talked to him and found out that he suffers from stomach ulcers. I recommended him a soothing stomach remedy, and I'm supposed to get it for him too. For that purpose, he allowed me access to the surgeon's chambers.
我在厨房里遇到了城堡的管家。显然，他的身体状况并不顺意。在和他交谈后，我得知他的胃出了问题，因此向他推荐了一种疏通肠胃的药剂，同时我还得帮助他弄到那种药剂。为此，他允许我进入大夫的房间。
sezen_pan_v_kuchyni_jsem__LMaR

I met the chamberlain of the castle in the kitchen. Clearly he wasn't well. I talked to him and found out that he had trouble with his stomach. I recommended him a soothing potion, which I should also get for him. For that purpose, he allowed me access to the surgeon's chambers.
我在厨房里遇到了城堡的管家。很明显，他身体不好。我和他交谈，发现他的胃有问题。我向他推荐了一种缓解药水，并提出帮他也去拿这种药。为此，他允许我进入大夫的房间。
sezen_pan_v_kuchyni_jsem__vyou

I met the chamberlain of the castle in the kitchen. Clearly he wasn't well. I talked to him and found out that he suffers from stomach ulcers. I recommended him a soothing stomach remedy and also got it for him right away. He wasn't exactly generous with his reward, but it will certainly be no harm to have him on my side in the current situation.
我在厨房里遇到了城堡的管家。显然，他的身体状况并不顺意。在和他交谈后，我得知他的胃出了问题，因此向他推荐了一种疏通肠胃的药剂并立马就将药剂给了他。尽管事后他并未提供多少报酬，但就当前的局势来看，有他这样的人站在我这边也并无坏处。
sezen_pan_v_kuchyni_jsem__YNWO

I met the chamberlain of the castle in the kitchen. Clearly he wasn't well. I talked to him and found out that he had trouble with his stomach. I recommended him a soothing decoction, which I got for him right away. I don't know how much help it will be, but it surely won't do him any harm.
我在厨房里遇到了城堡的管家。很明显，他身体不好。我和他交谈，发现他的胃有问题。我向他推荐了一种缓解药剂，并提出立刻帮他也去拿这种药。我不知道这有多大帮助，但肯定不会对他造成任何伤害。
sezen_pit_nejdriv_jsem_po_3MHG

First, I had to deal with the cellar guard. Fortunately, I managed to get rid of him. Turns out he's just as parched as them. I managed to find the booze in the cellar, now I just have to bring it to Jurko.
我要做的第一件事就是应付地窖守卫，所幸我成功搞定了他，谁曾想到他竟然和那帮摩拉维亚人一样欲求解渴。我已在地窖中找到那些酒水，当前只需带给朱尔科即可。
sezen_pit_nejdriv_jsem_po_gDQi
First, I had to deal with the cellar guard. Fortunately, I managed to get rid of him. Turns out he's just as parched as them. Now I have to find the booze in the cellar.
我要做的第一件事就是应付地窖守卫，所幸我成功搞定了他，谁曾想到他竟然和那帮摩拉维亚人一样欲求解渴。现在我得到地窖里找出那些酒水。
sezen_pit_nejdriv_jsem_po_YHMv

First, I had to deal with the cellar guard. Fortunately, I managed to get rid of him. Turns out he's just as parched as them. I found the booze in the cellar, so I brought it to Jurko as quickly as I could before their thirst would make them do something foolish. Of course, we had to raise a glass or two to my success.
我要做的第一件事就是应付地窖守卫，所幸我成功搞定了他，谁曾想到他竟然和那帮摩拉维亚人一样欲求解渴。我已在地窖中找到那些酒水，趁那帮饥渴难耐的酒棍干出蠢事之前，我将酒水带给了朱尔科。当然了，为了庆祝我的成功，我和他们一起喝了一两杯。
sezen_pit_nejdriv_musim_p_W5wt
First, I have to deal with the cellar guard. They say I'm supposed to get rid of him, but how? I'll try talking to him. I hope he'll be reasonable.
依照摩拉维亚人的说辞，我首先要做的就是应付地窖守卫，可是该怎么办呢？要不试着跟他谈谈吧，但愿他是个明事理之人。
sezen_pod_anna_z_valdstej_OmLm
Anna of Waldstein was no doubt impatient to learn how Godwin's attempt to get hold of the damaging papers worked out.
很显然，瓦尔德斯坦的安娜已经等不及要知晓古德温是否已经取得那些受损的文件了。
sezen_pod_bocek_z_kunstat_hP9C

Botschek of Kunstadt promised to support Jobst's amended plan, under one condition: his niece would marry Lord Capon. Godwin had no choice but to go and tell Hanush and hope he wouldn't wring his neck there and then…
库斯塔特的博舌克同意支持约布斯特的修订计划，但是有个条件：他的侄女必须跟卡蓬领主成亲。别无选择的古德温只能前去向瀚纳什汇报情况，但愿他不会把古德温的脖子拧断…
sezen_pod_bocek_z_kunstat_JP2C
Botschek of Kunstadt was pleased the negotiations went smoothly and promised Godwin his support.
谈判尤为顺利，库斯塔特的博舌克为此很是欣喜，并向古德温承诺会提供他的援助。
sezen_pod_cenny_spojenec__cASH

Haman Alder would also be a valuable ally. While he is a Kuttenberg councillor, he came to Raborsch even at a time when King Sigismund himself was holding a meeting in the city. That certainly says something about his loyalty to the crown.
哈曼·阿尔德对我们来说也将会是为举足轻重的盟友。尽管他是一名库滕堡议员，但曾在西格斯蒙德国王亲自在城内召开一次会议时就来到了拉博施，这便足以证明他对王权的忠心。
sezen_pod_hanus_bohutovi__ItMM

Surprisingly, Hanush not only didn't touch a hair on Godwin's head (not that there's much to touch), he even praised him for finding a powerful ally and a rich bride for Lord Capon. All that remained was to give Botschek the happy news.
令人惊奇的是，瀚纳什不仅没有碰古德温的半根头发（并不是因为古德温的头发所剩无几），而且他还称赞古德温带来了一位强大的盟友，甚至也给卡蓬领主找到了一位富裕的姑娘作为结婚对象。剩下该做的就是将这些好消息告知博舌克。
sezen_pod_pani_anna_z_vla_HrR6
Lady Anna of Waldstein promised Godwin her support.
瓦尔德斯坦的安娜夫人向古德温许诺她将会提供支持。
sezen_pod_s_hamanem_jsem__86Mg
Godwin didn't even get a chance to talk to Haman because of his father's nagging.
因其父一直在喋喋不休，古德温甚至没能跟哈曼搭上半句话。
sezen_pod_spojenectvi_rod_kiYp
The alliance with the House of Kunstadt, headed by Sir Botschek, could bring many benefits. He is a respected and wealthy man whose word carries great weight among other lords.
若能与由博舌克爵士领衔的库斯塔特豪门结盟，我们将受益无穷。博舌克爵士作为一名备受尊敬的富裕贵族，他的话语在其他领主之间颇具分量。
sezen_pod_velmi_dulezita__8hbH

Very important for Liechtenstein was the support of Lady Anna of Waldstein. Despite all the gossip about her husband's untimely death, she maintains a reputation of a clever woman in her own right, as well as a savvy deal maker. Her skill could be as useful to the allies as, if not more than, her money.
瓦尔德斯坦的安娜夫人提供的支持对列支敦士登来说意义非凡。尽管人们对她丈夫的猝然长逝而议论纷纷，但她仍能凭借自身才华维护着其作为知性女士、精明夫人的名声。对于我们的盟友来说，她的才华或许就像她坐拥的财富一样，大有裨益。
sezen_pro_dobry_skutek_ne_Pzzk
A good deed never offends and at least I got into Peltzel's good books.
种善因，结善果，至少我给佩茨尔留下了好印象。
sezen_pro_krejzl_nechtel__MCg4
Not wanting to leave anything to chance, Kreyzl knows exactly the kind of dress he wants to turn the chamberlain's head. I got hold of a red cotehardie of Tyrolean brocade, of course.
克雷泽希望事情万无一失，他很清楚要弄来什么样的衣服才能让总管眼前一亮。当然，我弄来了一件蒂罗尔锦缎制成的贴身红裙。
sezen_pro_opatrit_ji_nove_IktC

I need to find a fine dress for the companion. Kreyzl has something specific in mind: a red cotehardie of Tyrolean brocade. He claims this outfit will have an almost magical effect. If he's right, it's not going to come cheap, so I should count on having to steal it.
我需要为女伴找来一件上好的裙子。克雷泽想到的东西很具体：一件蒂罗尔锦缎制成的贴身红裙。他说这身穿搭将起到近乎能化腐朽为神奇的效果。如果他的想法是正确的，这件衣服就不会便宜，所以我只能指望去偷来一件了。
sezen_pro_pelcl_ma_staros_LFtv
Peltzel is worried about the departure. He needs to shoe three remaining horses with new horseshoes. It would help if I brought the horseshoes for them.
佩茨尔对启程一事稍有担忧。他现在需要给剩余的三只马换上新的马蹄铁，如果我能够弄到马蹄铁，就能帮到他们。
sezen_pro_podkovy_pro_pel_9Qg5
I didn't get the horseshoes for Peltzel, so I'm not in his good books.
我没有为佩茨尔取得马蹄铁，所以他不看好我。
sezen_pro_prinest_vino_vl_bsRq

Enneleyn doesn't want anything left to chance, so she'll mix a sleeping potion into some wine for the chamberlain. As she's using her own supplies of the potion for our plan, maybe I could bring her some wine as a gift. Maybe she could use it to boost her courage before the wedding.
恩内琳希望事情万无一失，所以她会在给总管的酒里加入安眠药水。既然她要用自己的东西完成我们的计划，或许我可以给她带些酒做礼物，这样她可以在婚礼前喝点来壮胆。
sezen_pro_sehnat_vonavku__x7wx

I need to find some Mintha perfume. The miller doesn't want his companion to arrive at the wedding smelling of horse manure and pine needles. That's understandable, but where am I supposed to find the perfume? Ale isn't the only reason Betty's tavern is always full - I could have a look around for the perfume there. The other option is to brew the perfume myself - the Troskowitz apothecary should have the recipe.
我需要找来些薄荷香的香水。磨坊主不希望他的女伴带着马粪和松针的味道前去婚礼。这可以理解，但我要去哪找香水呢？贝蒂的酒馆常年客满，原因可不只是那里的麦酒——我可以去那里找找香水。另一个办法是自己酿造——特罗斯科维茨的草药师那里应该有配方。
sezen_pro_vonavku_minthu__SfW0
The miller didn't want his companion to arrive at the wedding smelling of horse manure and pine needles, so I got hold of some Mintha perfume for the girl we chose.
磨坊主不希望他的女伴带着马粪和松针的味道前去婚礼，所以我给我们选中的姑娘弄来了些薄荷香的香水。
sezen_pro_vorech_ma_hlad__37al
Mutt is hungry. Oats is the one who's in charge of supplies, so I should go and ask him if he can give me something for Mutt.
呆呆很饿。奥兹负责管理物资，我应该问问他能不能给呆呆些吃的。
sezen_pro_vorech_mel_hlad_OT6M
Mutt was hungry, but I had no time to go looking for food for him. Hopefully he can hunt down something himself.
呆呆很饿，但我没空给它找吃的。但愿它能自己觅食。
sezen_pro_vorech_mel_hlad_ZUHQ
Mutt was hungry, so I got a sausage for him from Oats. He likes roe deer ones the best.
呆呆很饿。我从奥兹那拿了根香肠给它。它最喜欢小鹿肉做的香肠了。
sezen_rec_hostinska_by_po_WfPK

The innkeeper wants me to get her the recipe that the Nebakov miller is carefully guarding. She says I should try to get myself invited as an honoured guest. If I get invited to dinner, then he'll let me taste the recipe, and then I'll know just how delicious his famous meal really is. But maybe there's also another way to get the recipe.
旅店老板希望我把内巴科夫磨坊主谨慎守护的食谱拿给她。她说我应该设法让自己成为受邀的尊贵客人。如果我被邀请参加晚宴，那么他就会让我品尝配方，然后我就会知道他的著名晚宴到底有多美味。但也许还有得到食谱的另一种方法。
sezen_rec_tak_se_mi_nakon_UPXg
In the end, I managed to get the recipe for the innkeeper. Hopefully, she'll forgive me for wrecking the inn.
最后，我设法为旅店老板找到了食谱。希望她能原谅我毁坏客栈的行为。
sezen_sal_pak_taky_jeste__iCBY
And some sage as well.
当然还要找些鼠尾草。
sezen_si__bez_potrebnych__5wCH
I can't start forging without the necessary raw materials. I should get them somewhere.
在缺少必要原材料的情况下我是无法进行锻造的，得到别处去收集材料。
sezen_si__musim_si_sehnat_4ooi
I must get a saber.
我得弄把军刀来。
sezen_si__musim_si_sehnat_I7Ni
I must get an axe.
我得弄把斧来。
sezen_si__musim_si_sehnat_UI9T
I must get a sword.
我得弄把剑来。
sezen_si__musim_si_sehnat_v7l4

我得弄把猎刀来。
sezen_si__ted_uz_mam_na_d_LB1c
Now I have the right weapon for the duel.
我已为决斗找来了称手的武器。
sezen_si__ted_uz_nema_smy_cGSc
There will be no duel, so I don't need the weapon.
决斗不会进行，所以我也不需要武器了。
sezen_usp_lektvar_mam_NixH
To convince the burgher that he spent a night with Margaret, I need to get hold of a sleeping potion. Once he nods off, we can arrange things to look the way we need.
为了让那个市民相信，他曾与玛格丽特共度良宵，我必须弄到一瓶安眠药剂。待他安然睡去，我们便可将事态掌握于股掌之间。
sezen_usp_mel_jsem_sehnat_CdpC
I was supposed to find a sleeping potion for Margaret, but nothing will come of the plan. So it doesn't matter.
我本来要为玛格丽特找安眠药水，但这个计划行不通。所以现在已经无关紧要。
sezen_usp_potrebuju_sehna_kVsF
To convince the burgher that he spent a night with Margaret, I need to get hold of a sleeping potion. Once he nods off, we can arrange things to look the way we need.
为了让那个市民相信，他曾与玛格丽特共度良宵，我必须弄到一瓶安眠药剂。待他安然睡去，我们便可将事态掌握于股掌之间。
sezen_vlc_dalsi_bylina_co_5dKe
Poppies are another herb Klara needs.
克拉拉需要的草药还有罂粟。
sezen_von_krome_holky_se__SjoQ
Enneleyn was pleased with the scent, and rightly so.
恩内琳对它的味道很满意，但也理应如此。
sezen_von_krome_holky_se__XKR6
I must deliver the perfume to Enneleyn.
我必须把香水送到恩内琳那里。
seznam_se_bohuta_se_na_ra_p0vp
At Raborsch, Godwin met the somewhat eccentric Baron Brabant, who had travelled extensively and knows important people. He seemed clever, but he'd talk a man to death.
古德温在拉博施遇到了略显怪异的布拉班特男爵，此人曾广泛游历，结识了不少位高权重之人，而且他看起来很聪明，但是会把人聊到死。
seznam_se_na_ratbor_doraz_yWXJ
Representatives of the town's Jewish community, among others, arrived at Raborsch. As if their presence wasn't surprising enough, during the conversation, Godwin learned something that stunned him.
城里犹太社群的代表带着同行抵达了拉博施。似乎他们的出席还不足以让人们膛目结舌，但在会谈期间，古德温得知了令人更为惊讶的事情。
seznam_se_pobocnik_michal_QRQm
Adjutant Michael is curious about news from the region, and it would probably be polite to exchange a few words with him when we are guests and especially when we're coming to his lord with demands.
副官迈克尔对此地发生的事情很是好奇，而且，既然我们在招待客人，跟他交流几句或许显得更为礼貌，更何况我们对他的领主还有事相求。
seznam_se_pobocnik_michal_RhsA
Adjutant Michael seems like a lively guy and offered to guide me through the castle. It would probably be appropriate to accept the offer to make a good impression and not embarrass Sir Hans' name
副官迈克尔似乎是个讨人喜欢的家伙，他还提出要领我参观这座城堡。或许我该接受这一善意之举，不仅是出于礼节，更是为了留下好印象，免得让汉斯爵士失了颜面。
seznam_se_pohovoril_jsem__Ud4U
I spoke with Adjutant Michael, the Nebakov commander of the garrison, and I think the courtesies were observed.
我与内巴科夫的驻军指挥官迈克尔进行了一番交谈，礼节得到了遵守。
seznam_se_po_prijezdu_na__XkAA
After arriving at Raborsch, Godwin finally had the opportunity to meet Baron Brabant, who until recently was Lord Capon's fellow prisoner at Maleshov.
抵达拉博施后的古德温终于有了与布拉班特男爵见面的机会，而此人过去以来一直都是卡蓬领主在马列索夫的狱友。
seznam_se_ptacek_bohutovi_V4SL

Capon suggested to Godwin that he try and welcome representatives of the Kuttenberg's Jewish community to the Raborsch meeting. The old and respected rabbi arrived accompanied by a young man who seemed not at all comfortable with being among the nobility.
听从卡蓬的建议，古德温邀请了库滕堡犹太社群的代表参加拉博施会议，而后那位备受尊敬的老者拉比也在一位青年的陪同下抵达了会议现场，只不过那个小伙子在贵族之中显得有些手足无措。
shod_zebr_jestli_chceme_n_S7Yd
If we want to stop the Praguers' onslaught, we have to fend off all the siege ladders!
要想抵挡布拉格军队的猛攻，我们就得掀翻所有攻城梯！
shod_zebr_jestli_chceme_n_yvZX
We have to fend off all the siege ladders if we want to stop the Praguers' attack!
要想抵挡布拉格军队的猛攻，我们就得掀翻所有攻城梯！
shod_zebr_musime_odrazit__r3ub
We must repel the attack on the lower castle.
我们必须击退下城堡敌人的攻击。
shod_zebr_podarilo_se_nam_josA
We managed to knock down all the siege ladders and thus took the sting out of the Praguers' attack.
我们成功掀翻了所有攻城梯，也因此化解了布拉格人攻势。
shod_zebr_podarilo_se_nam_Qu6c
We managed to knock down all the siege ladders and thus took the sting out of the Praguers' attack.
我们成功掀翻了所有攻城梯，也因此化解了布拉格人攻势。
shod_zebr_pokud_se_prazan_sLLo
If the Praguers manage to place a ladder on the walls, it must be knocked down. We can't be overrun and outnumbered.
一旦布拉格人设法在城墙上架设梯子，必须将其推倒，我们不能腹背受敌。
shod_zebr_prazane_k_vystu_0ZBG
The Praguers are using siege ladders to scale the walls. To stop their reinforcements we have to knock them down and destroy them.
布拉格人正用攻城梯攀爬城墙。要阻止他们的攻势，我们就得推倒并摧毁攻城梯。
shod_zebr_prazane_pokraco_ccaz
The Praguers continued their attack on the rear wall. We threw down their ladders and fended off their attack.
布拉格人还在攻击通向村庄的后方城墙，我们已将他们的攻城梯推倒并抵挡了这波攻击。
shod_zebr_prazane_pokracu_S1Cl
The Praguers are continuing their attack on the rear wall in the direction towards the village. We have to knock down their ladders and fend off the attack.
布拉格人还在攻击通向村庄的后方城墙，我们必须推倒攻城梯并抵挡这波攻击。
shod_zebr_prazsky_utok_na_ldCk
The Praguers' assault with ladders failed. We knocked them all down.
布拉格人用梯子攻击的尝试失败了，我们把它们全都推倒了。
shod_zebr_prazsky_utok_na_lwCg
The Praguers' assault with ladders succeeded. The siege ended before it even began.
布拉格人用梯子攻击的尝试成功了，围攻还没开始就结束了。
shod_zebr_zebriky_musely__WaSf
The siege ladders ended up at the bottom of the ravine.
攻城梯最终倒在了峡谷底部。
shod_zebr_zebriky_na_bocn_GVk7
The ladders on the ramparts were destroyed.
城墙上的攻城梯已被摧毁。
sitdown_v_musim_najit_jan_RoO5
Sir Hans seems healthy and in good spirits, and Bozhena's daughter Pavlena called me for breakfast. I'd better not miss that. It seems like things are looking up…
汉斯大人看起来很健康，精神也很好，博珍娜的女儿帕芙莱娜叫我去吃早餐。我可不想错过。看来事情正在好转……
sleduj_st_nasel_jsem_stop_ghNz
The tracks lead into the forest. I should see where it takes me.
足迹一路通向了树林，就来看看它会把我引到何处吧。
sleduj_st_sledoval_jsem_s_PuIW
The tracks led from the crossroads to a bandit camp.
路口处发现的踪迹通向了一处强盗营地。
sleduj_st_stopu_z_mista_p_BsgK
Unfortunately, Svatava died, so there was no point in continuing my search.
斯瓦塔娅已不幸殒命，因此再继续我的调查已然没了意义。
sleduj_st_vendula_ale_boh_5kPe
Unfortunately, Vendula died, so there was no point in continuing my search.
芙恩德拉已不幸殒命，因此再继续我的调查已然没了意义。
sloz_zkou_a_bruncvikova_h_M11U
And Brunswick's helmet can now rest on my head!
布伦瑞克的头盔现在可以在我头上静静待着了！
sloz_zkou_bruncvikovy_pla_J3HE
I need not search for Brunswick's plate cuisses, I was able to stumble upon them by chance.
我已无需寻找布伦瑞克的护腿，误打误撞的我碰巧找到了它们。
sloz_zkou_bruncvikovy_pla_MA2n
Brunswick's plate pauldrons now call me master!
布伦瑞克的肩甲现在得叫我主人了！
sloz_zkou_bruncvikovy_pla_sskg
I found Brunswick's plate pauldrons without any help at all. That's what I call luck.
没有依靠任何帮助的我找到了布伦瑞克的肩甲，真是走运。
sloz_zkou_bruncvikuv_kyry_voiB
Brunswick's cuirass emblazoned with a lion is mine!
纹饰狮子图案的布伦瑞克胸甲现在是我的了！
sloz_zkou_dalsi_kus_brunc_IZlI
The map to the next piece of Brunswick's armour leads to a stone cairn. It's possible that I will meet some other people in a place like that, I should prepare accordingly.
这张地图记录了一件布伦瑞克护甲的藏匿点，它指向了一处石标。我很可能还会在那种地方遇到其他人，我得做些相应的准备。
sloz_zkou_dalsi_rytirska__LHUE
The next chivalry test is taking me up a hill to a big tree, under which lies a skeleton. Hopefully the next piece of armour won't be so zealously guarded.
下一则骑士考验将会把我领到一处山坡上的大树下，那里躺着一具骨骸。但愿下一件护甲不要被严加看管着。
sloz_zkou_hadanka_pisare__VHyU
Scribe Gaibl's riddle led me all the way to Sir Brunswick's plated gauntlets.
抄写员盖布尔提到的谜语一路指引着我，让我找到了布伦瑞克爵士的金属护手。
sloz_zkou_krome_prosivani_yNKv
In addition to the plated gauntlets, I also found two maps that will probably lead me to other parts of the armour.
除了那件金属护手，我还找到了两份地图，或许它们将协助我找到其它部位的护甲。
sloz_zkou_mel_jsem_stesti_d486
I was lucky and found Brunswick's cuirass by sheer coincidence!
我十分幸运地找到了布伦瑞克的胸甲，这纯粹就是个偶然！
sloz_zkou_najit_prvni_cas_iRHN

Finding the first part of Brunswick's armour certainly won't be easy, but if I give it some thought, I'll manage. Scribe Gaibl told me a riddle that should lead me to my goal. It went something like this: Take your leave of crone and maiden, standing tall behind the gates, boldly go towards true midnight, in caverns cold your prize awaits. Pass through the hall of forest kings, hidden deep from hunters' gaze, standing tall two guards of stone, behind whom yearned-for treasure lays. Between them stands a mighty rock, a subtle niche yet deeper still, a place to give one’s heart to God, behold my armour gleaming still.

寻找布伦瑞克的第一件护甲并非易事，但是稍微动动脑筋，我就能做到。抄写员盖布尔告诉了我一则谜语，会协助我达成目标，而谜语的具体内容如下： 老妪和少女，离开她们吧，就在大门之后，勇敢地踏上午夜之旅，那处冰冷的岩洞中，你的宝藏已然安睡。 深藏在猎人眼眸里的麋鹿之森，耸立着两尊巨石守卫，正守护着身后躺着的，那万人觊觎的宝藏。 守卫间那伫立的巨石，身下的壁龛深不见底，十字架是上帝的传信鸽，凝视着那坚不可摧的盔甲。
sloz_zkou_podle_mapy_se_d_a4Bi
According to the map one part of Brunswick's armour is hidden somewhere near a wolf's den and two trees.
通过那张地图可以看出，布伦瑞克护甲中的一件就被藏在一处狼穴和两棵树附近。
sloz_zkou_sama_prozreteln_QsAq
Providence itself must have led me to the camp of the treasure hunters, where I found Brunswick's helmet.
定是命运之神将我领到了寻宝猎人的营地，才让我在那里找到了布伦瑞克的头盔。
sloz_zkou_shodou_stastnyc_HpDc
By lucky coincidence, I managed to find Brunswick's plated gauntlets without any help.
受到好运的眷顾，虽然缺乏帮助，我还是碰巧找到了布伦瑞克的金属护手。
sloz_zkou_treti_cast_brun_rJnD
Another piece of Brunswick's armour is said to be hidden somewhere on the cliff with a cross. Hopefully I won't break a leg or pull a ligament on the way there.
据说布伦瑞克的另一件护甲就藏在悬崖上的某个地方，而且周边还立着一个十字架。希望在去那里的路上我不会把腿弄断或是拉伤韧带。
sloz_zkou_v_bruncvikove_z_zdQR
Hidden in Brunswick's iron pauldron was another map. I wonder what it shows?
布伦瑞克的铁肩甲里又藏了一份地图，上面到底会有什么呢？
sloz_zkou_v_jednom_ze_sab_NnCp
I found another map in one of the sabatons. I should look at it.
我在一只护靴中又发现了一份地图，我得浏览一番。
sloz_zkou_zbavil_jsem_se__821U
I got rid of the wolves and my reward is Prince Brunswick's plate cuisses.
我处理掉了那些狼，布伦瑞克的护腿便成了我的战利品。
smlynarin_porozhledni_se__VvHv
Look around the woodshed for the miller.
在木棚周围寻找磨坊主。
smlynarin_promluv_si_s_ml_Wa3A
Talk to the miller.
与磨坊主交谈。
smlynarin_vrat_se_radsi_k_NvpT
Go back to the miller's wife.
回去找磨坊主的妻子。
smolik_ze_ted_uz_smolik_t_Rpyc
Now Smoliek won't need that ear anymore.
现在斯莫利克已不再需要那只耳朵了。
socky_bran_ptacka_gpyl
Defend Capon!
保护卡蓬！
socky_nos_pytle__05_cQkk
Carry the sacks to the pantry.
将面粉搬至储藏室。
socky_promluv_si_s_zenou__zNZc
Talk to the woman from the pond.
与池塘边的那个女人交谈。
socky_rekni_ptackovi_o_pr_ebpz
Tell Capon about getting work.
将找差事的计划告知卡蓬。
socky_umyj_se_u_kade_nwAq
Wash at the trough.
到水槽处梳洗。
socky_vrat_se_za_ptackem_tMUM
Go back to Capon.
回去找卡蓬。
socky_zjisti_jak_se_dosta_DM3k
Find out how to get to von Bergow.
想办法接近冯·波尔高。
socky_zjisti_vic_o_semino_9kOO
Find out more about the Semine wedding.
找出更多关于塞米婚礼的消息。
solo_band__event_caption_JAhU
Accident
意外
solo_band__event_descript_NA1o
You see dead bodies on the road ahead and a person robbing them. It's obvious he was behind it. Then he notices you.
你在路上发现了几个已死之人，以及一个正在搜刮尸体的人，很明显他就是这一切的罪魁祸首，而后此人也注意到了你。
solo_band__player_caption_iIU0
Accident
意外
solo_band__player_descrip_Ocx7
You see corpses on the road ahead and a person robbing them. It's obvious he was behind it. He is yet to notice you and keeps rummaging through their pockets.
你在路上发现了几个已死之人，以及一个正在搜刮尸体的人，很明显他就是这一切的罪魁祸首。那个男人还在搜刮着死者们的包裹，未曾察觉到你的出现。
souper_fajti_rnu0
Fight!
开打！
speakwith_dosel_jsem_za_h_gYKs
I visited the innkeeper to tell her about the miller's recipe.
我拜访了旅店老板，将磨坊主的食谱告诉她。
speakwith_hajny_zminil_ze_AK0h
After I saved him, the gamekeeper directed me to Semine were there's another large pack on the prowl. It's not far from the place where I first looked for Mutt.
救下猎场看守人之后，他让我前往塞米，此地距离我寻找呆呆的起始点并不远，而且据说那里还有另一大支正四处捕猎的狼群。
speakwith_hospodsky_jeste_Uhty
The tavernkeeper didn't know anything about a runaway dog. But he did tell me that a shepherd on Kopanina was having trouble with wolves.
酒馆老板没有听说过走失的小狗。但我却从他那里得知科帕尼那有个牧羊人正在遭受狼群的侵扰。
speakwith_hospodsky_mohl__tNTE
Perhaps the local tavernkeeper might know something about Mutt.
或许附近的酒馆老板那里有呆呆的消息。
speakwith_hostinska_mi_po_q75L
The innkeeper suggested trying to find the miller's recipe. Maybe he'll have it somewhere on his person.
旅店老板建议去找磨坊主的食谱。也许在他身上。
speakwith_jestli_nekdo_vi_HFB4
Someone else who might know if my dog is wandering around here is the gamekeeper.
猎场看守人那里或许有呆呆的消息。
speakwith_kdo_by_mi_urcit_o3Ju
The one who can surely help me is the miller's housemaid, Anna. She's certain to know something about the recipe.
能够帮助我的人是磨坊主的女佣，安娜。她肯定知道一些食谱的事情。
speakwith_kdyz_bylo_po_bo_37y6
When the battle was over, I was supposed to talk to Puta. But I was held up, and the commander returned to the camp in the meantime.
我本该在战斗结束后和普塔交谈的，但是我却耽搁了。而与此同时，指挥官普塔已经返回了营地。
speakwith_kdyz_bylo_po_vs_cxYu
When everything was finished, I spoke to Puta.
在完成所有任务后我跟普塔交谈了一番。
speakwith_kdyz_bylo_po_vs_FD10
When everything was finished, I was supposed to talk to Puta, but he died before I got the chance.
我本该在完成任务后与普塔交谈的，但在那之前他却死了。
speakwith_kdyz_jsem_dosel_3IUT
When I went to visit the miller, we shared a few pleasantries before he took me on a tour of his mill.
当我拜访磨坊主时，我们先寒暄了几句，然后他带我参观了磨坊。
speakwith_kdyz_jsem_si_pa_M4Qe
Then, when I then spoke to someone from the village later, he told me they'd dragged the cart and the soldiers' bodies into the forest and left them lying there to make it look like an ambush.
随后，在我与一位幸存村民交谈时得知，他们已将士兵的尸体和马车拖出了村庄，并将他们抛尸荒野以营造遭受埋伏的假象。
speakwith_kdyz_jsem_si_pa_w2q5
Then, when I then spoke to the village elder later, he told me they had dragged the soldiers' bodies and the cart away from the village and left them lying there to make it look like an ambush.
随后，在我与村中长老交谈时得知，他们已将士兵的尸体和马车拖出了村庄，并将他们抛尸荒野以营造遭受埋伏的假象。
speakwith_korenarka_zmini_tPxr
On my search for Mutt, I went to see the herbwoman. She didn't know anything about him, but she said I could ask the fisherman and the tavernkeeper. They would have noticed a stray dog!
在寻找呆呆的过程中，我拜访了一位女草药师，奈何她对呆呆的下落一无所知。但是她建议我向渔夫和酒馆老板询问线索，没准他们见过一只迷途小犬呢！
speakwith_mel_bych_dojit__G6o9
I should visit the miller and make a good impression so that he invites me over for dinner.
我应该去拜访磨坊主，给他留下一个好印象，这样他就会邀请我去吃晚饭。
speakwith_mel_by_se_na_re_JavE
I should also ask the gamekeeper about the recipe.
我还应该问问猎物看守人食谱的事。
speakwith_mel_by_se_na_re_ZcRq
I should ask Kuba about the recipe as well…
我也应该问问库巴食谱的事......
speakwith_misto_abych_si__4OQd
Instead of speaking to someone from the village, I attacked the villagers.
我没有与任何村民交谈，而是直接攻击了他们。
speakwith_misto_abych_si__sjUw
What would I talk to those yokels about? I just went with my sword!
跟那群乡巴佬有什么好谈的呢？让他们跟我的剑谈一谈就好！
speakwith_mlynar_uz_na_me_FkkP
The miller is already waiting for me at the next place he wants to show me.
磨坊主已经在下一个想带我参观的地方等我了。
speakwith_myslim_ze_uz_ma_viu7
I believe I've got the right ingredients. Now I just need to visit the innkeeper.
我相信我已经得到了正确的原料。现在我只需要去拜访旅店老板。
speakwith_na_kopanine_je__2cDR

On Kopanina, the name of the plain to the West of Trosky, is a shepherd named Siegfried. I hear lately he's been having trouble with wolves. It might be worth finding out if there isn't a dog amongst the pack.
在特罗斯基西边的科帕尼那平原上，住着牧羊人西格弗里德。据说他近期正受到狼群的侵扰，也不知道狼群中是否混进了一只狗，或许值得前去调查一番。
speakwith_naposledy_jsem__PmK5
He didn't fall far from the herbwoman. Maybe I can go and ask her if she saw Mutt run by.
呆呆的坠落地点距离女草药师并不远，或许我可以向她打探一下呆呆的去向。
speakwith_nevim_co_dal_tr_PMEq
I don't know what to do now. Maybe the innkeeper can help.
我不知道现在该怎么做。也许旅店老板可以帮忙。
speakwith_od_korenarky_js_YJQk
I didn't find anything out from the herbwoman. I'll have to find Mutt some other way.
我没能从女草药师那里打探到任何消息，看来得想别的办法寻找呆呆了。
speakwith_p_hajny_uz_niko_UhrI
The gamekeeper was unable to help me find Mutt.
猎场看守人没能帮助我找到呆呆。
speakwith_podarilo_se_mi__4aTR
I managed to rescue the gamekeeper, so I can finally ask him if he saw Mutt somewhere.
我成功救下了猎场看守人，现在终于可以跟他打探呆呆的下落了。
speakwith_prelozil_jsem_r_dP44
I translated the recipe. Now I just need to visit the innkeeper.
我翻译了食谱。现在我只需要去拜访旅馆老板。
speakwith_promluvil_jsem__lRgZ
I talked to the village elder and advised him to drag the soldiers' bodies and the cart into the forest and leave them lying there to make it look like an ambush.
我在与村中长老交谈的同时，我向他提出了将死亡士兵及马车拖进森林里的建议，让他们躺在树林里以营造遭受埋伏的假象。
speakwith_promluvil_jsem__NFsC
I talked to a survivor from the village and advised him to drag the cart and the soldiers' bodies into the forest and leave them lying there to make it look like an ambush.
我在与一位幸存村民交谈的同时，提出了将死亡士兵及马车拖进森林里的建议，就让他们躺在树林里以营造遭受埋伏的假象。
speakwith_promluvil_jsem__v8xa
I met the shepherd Siegfried at Kopanina. He says there certainly could be a dog mixed in with the wolves going after his sheep.
我在科帕尼那遇到了牧羊人西格弗里德，也从他那里得知，似乎有一只狗混进了一支正捕猎着他羊羔的狼群里
speakwith_rybar_je_taky_j_EUxS
One of the people who might've noticed Mutt is the fisherman.
渔夫没准也碰到过呆呆。
speakwith_rybar_zminil_ze_m3On
The fisherman doesn't know anything about a lost dog. He did mention though he heard wolves howling on the southern end of Rocktower Pond.
渔夫没有听说过走失的小狗，但他也提到了石塔池塘南端附近曾有狼群的嚎叫。
speakwith_s_ancou_jsem_si_bWDL
I spoke with Anna.
我与安娜交谈。
speakwith_s_kubou_jsem_ml_ghQ5
I spoke to Kuba.
我与库巴交谈。
speakwith_s_nikym_z_vesni_d0nR
I didn't talk to anyone from the village after that. Instead, I went to the camp, where I gave an account of everything that had happened. Soldiers then burned the village to the ground.
冲突之后我并未与任何人交谈，而是立即返回了营地，并将村里发生的一切告知了众人，营地里的士兵们随即便将那座村庄夷为平地。
speakwith_s_nikym_z_vesni_Eu66
I didn't talk to anyone from the village after that. Instead, I went to the camp, where I gave an account of everything that'd happened. Soldiers then burned the village to the ground.
冲突之后我并未与任何人交谈，而是立即返回了营地，并将村里发生的一切告知了众人，营地里的士兵们随即便将那座村庄夷为平地。
speakwith_tak_kdyz_jsem_o_YHX4
But when I went to speak to the gamekeeper, bandits appeared around us and the whole situation grew quite complicated.
但当我去找猎物看守人的时候，我们周围出现了强盗，整个情况变得相当复杂。
speakwith_ted_bych_si_mel_GMt7
Now I should speak to someone from the village about what'll happen next.
现在我得跟幸存村民商讨下一步举措。
speakwith_ted_bych_si_mel_zIhY
Now I should speak to the village elder about what'll happen next.
现在我得与村里的长老交谈，以了解下一举措。
speakwith_ted_kdyz_je_po__xw0c
Now everything is finished, I have to talk to Puta to see what's next.
现在所有任务已经完成，我得跟普塔谈谈，以了解下一步计划。
speakwith_velitel_sarvatk_Fla7

The commander didn't survive the battle with the villagers. Without him, the cumans fled at their first opportunity. I had to return to the camp and tell someone about it. But the superior in the camp didn't care, he was just interested in the supplies. He said he would send someone to the village for them so they wouldn't go to waste.
指挥官没能在与村民的冲突中活下来。他死后，那些库曼人也随即逃之夭夭。我返回营地报告了此事，但是营地里的长官对此并不在意，他只在意物资。为了不浪费，他打算派人去村里取回那些物资。
speakwith_velitel_sarvatk_vbUZ
The commander didn't survive the battle with the villagers. Without him, all the cumans are gone too. I have to return to the camp and tell someone about it.
指挥官没能在与村民的冲突中活下来。他死后，库曼人也借机逃跑了。我必须返回营地报告此事。
speakwith_zibrid_pasacek__vxw2
The shepherd Siegfried couldn't tell me anything about my lost dog, Mutt.
对于我那只走失的小狗呆呆，牧羊人西格弗里德一无所知。

保护好自己！

Take the coin to Pavel.
将钱交给帕维尔。

Fails
失败
spravedln_najdi_ztraceny__sRYY
Find the older Vejmola's lost medal.
寻找老维约莫拉遗失的奖章。
spravedln_odevzdej_kraden_WsMU
Hand over the stolen items to Pavel.
将失窃之物交给帕维尔。

偷走鞋匠维约莫拉的鞋。
spravedln_ukradni_knihu_8glk

从神父安东尼那里偷走书本。

srovnej_k_stary_slepy_spr_osnM
The piles of bones are neatly arranged, the ossuary looks a lot better than it did before.
骨头精致地堆放着，骸骨堂看起来比以前好多了。
srovnej_k_stary_slepy_spr_YNCH

What else should better represent the majesty of death than neat edifices made entirely of human bones? I'm supposed to build three large piles. One of pristine skulls, one of cracked skulls, and one of thigh bones, or femurs as they're called.
还有什么能比整齐堆砌的人骨堆更能体现死亡的庄严呢？我应该搭建三座骨堆，一座用完整的颅骨，一座用破碎的颅骨，还有一座用常被称作“大腿骨”的股骨。
srovnej_k_zadne_kosti_uz__WaNi
Brother Morticius met a tragic end, so I don't have to arrange any bones anymore. What remains to be said? Memento mori.
莫提修斯修士的结局是场悲剧，所以我也不用再整理任何骨头了。我还能说什么呢？Memento mori（勿忘你终有一死）。
stand_off_i_kdyz_prvni_bo_vgNh
Even though the first fight wasn't decisive and nobody wanted to die, we still couldn't come to an agreement. Nobody could see any option other than fighting over them.
即便已进行了一场不分胜负且无人伤亡的战斗，我们还是没能达成共识。但是要想得到那些骨头，战斗却是我们唯一的选择。
stand_off_kosti_jsem_nase_Jh6c

I found the bones, but Leopold and a commander of some soldiers also arrived, all of them armed. They all wanted the bones for themselves, and after a lot of threats and arguing a fight almost broke out. But in the end I calmed everyone down and we divided up the bones between us. There's no point dying for some rotten old remains.
在找到骨头的同时，我也遇到了抵达此地的利奥波德以及一位带队的指挥官。全副武装的他们都想将龙骨占为己有，并相互间发出无数威胁，冲突一触即发。但是最终，我成功安抚了各方情绪，并将骨头分成几份，也分给了他们，毕竟为了这种腐烂的老破遗骸而死是不值得的。
standoff__musim_porazit_l_1NcL
I have to defeat Leopold and his bruisers.
我必须打败利奥波德和他的护卫。
standoff__musim_porazit_v_M2dC
I have to defeat the commander and his soldiers.
我必须打败指挥官和他的部下。
standoff__nasel_jsem_kost_1s2W

I found the bones, but Leopold was there with his bodyguards. He was angry I'd crossed his path again and commanded his men to kill me. But in the end I beat them despite being outnumbered, and Leopold won't be a nuisance to me anymore.
我找到了那些骨头，但同时也遇到了利奥波德和他的护卫。他对我的再次妨碍感到愤怒，因此命令他的护卫杀掉我。而最终我以己敌众，战胜了他们，现在利奥波德对我来说已不再是个麻烦。
standoff__nasel_jsem_kost_2dBh

I found the bones, but the commander and his unit were there. He refused to discuss anything with me. He commanded his men to kill me. But in the end I defeated them despite being outnumbered, and now I've got the commander off my back.
我找到了那些骨头，但那个指挥官也随同他的部下来到了此地。他不仅拒绝跟我进行任何谈判，还下令让他的部下杀死我。好在即便是以一敌众，我最终还是打败了他们，现在也已将那个指挥官抛之脑后。
stand_off_nasel_jsem_kost_l5iz

I found the bones, but so did Leopold, who I met at the priest's, and the commander of a unit of soldiers. Everyone wanted the bones for himself and wouldn't settle for anything less. In the end I dropped my claim and let them do what they wanted with the bones. I'd rather live than fight over some rotten old junk.
找到骨头的人不只有我，还有那位先前我与斯拉瓦一同遇到的利奥波德，以及一位带队的指挥官。我们三人都想将它们占为己有，除此之外别无他求。最终我选择退让并让他们取走了骨头，毕竟我宁愿活着，也不愿为了一堆腐烂的老破遗骸送死。
stand_off_nedokazali_jsme_CgO1
We couldn't come to an agreement and the situation descended into a fight to the death. I came out of it victorious, so I took the bones.
我们没能达成共识，局势最终演变成了一场你死我活的战斗。而我也在这场打斗中胜出，并得到了那些骨头。
stand_off_nedokazali_jsme_YewQ
We couldn't come to an agreement. Now I have to survive.
我们没能达成共识，现在我必须活下来。
stand_off_nehodlal_jsem_b_1X1P
I'm not going to fight when I'm outnumbered. I preferred to run away and let the fools fight each other for the stupid bones.
与其被群殴，不如拔腿跑。就让那两个笨蛋为那些臭骨头自相残杀吧。
stand_off_situace_se_dost_EqCt
It's all about to boil over. Now I have to survive.
矛盾激化到了极点，现在我必须活下来。
stand_off_ted_musim_prezit_vVpj
Now I have to survive.
现在我必须活下来。
standoff__utekl_jsem_pred_mUY6
Outnumbered by Leopold and his bodyguards, I ran away. They can keep the bloody bones, I'm not going to get myself killed for them.
孤身一人的我无法战胜利奥波德和他的守卫，因此我拔腿就跑。就让他们拿走那些该死的骨头吧，我才不想为了它们搭上性命。
standoff__utekl_jsem_pred_Q4gk
Outnumbered by the commander and his soldiers, I ran away. They can keep the bloody bones, I'm not going to get myself killed for them.
孤身一人的我无法战胜利指挥官和他的部下，因此我拔腿就跑。就让他们拿走那些该死的骨头吧，我才不想为了它们搭上性命。
stanik_je_trapic_stanik_u_s2qg
The bully Stanley is already with the Lord. At least Darling can breathe a sigh of relief that no one will bother him anymore.
恶霸斯坦利已经奔赴天堂。至少“达令”可以松一口气，再也没人会欺负他了。
stanik_um_bez_stanika_zap_v0nN
The fights are over without Stanley.
斯坦利不在，搏击将无法进行。
stan_se_c_celou_zalezitos_0v9z

The duel was complicated by the Kuttenbergers, who demanded there must be three swordfighters on each side. Menhard and Arne are only two, which the Kuttenbergers knew very well, so I had no choice but to join as the third. Given that I defeated Menhard in a duel when we first met, nothing prevented me from taking an oath and being accepted into their swordfighting brotherhood. By doing so, I fulfilled all legal requisites.
库滕堡人要求各方应派出三名剑士，这也让决斗变得复杂了起来。门哈德和阿耳涅是仅有的两名人选，库滕堡人对此也心知肚明，因此我迫不得己，将作为与赛的第三人加入他们。考虑到初次相见时，我便在一场决斗中战胜了门哈德，也因此顺利得到了向他宣誓并加入剑术兄弟会的机会。走完这一切流程，我也正式成为了他们的一份子。
stan_se_c_celou_zalezitos_6MAo

The duel was complicated by the Kuttenbergers, who demanded there must be three swordfighters on each side. Menhard and Arne are only two, which the Kuttenbergers knew very well, so I had no choice but to join as the third. Menhard wanted me to take an oath and join their swordfighting brotherhood, but I managed to convince him that wouldn't be necessary.
库滕堡人要求各方应派出三名剑士，这也让决斗变得复杂了起来。门哈德和阿耳涅是仅有的两名人选，库滕堡人对此也心知肚明，因此我迫不得己，将作为与赛的第三人加入他们。门哈德想让我进行宣誓，加入他们的剑术兄弟会，但是我最终说服他放弃这些不必要的事项。
stan_se_c_celou_zalezitos_8jro

The duel was complicated by the Kuttenbergers, who demanded there must be three swordfighters on each side. Menhard and Arne are only two, which the Kuttenbergers knew very well, so I had no choice but to join as the third. I have proven myself in a duel with Arne, so now I have no choice but to swear an oath to Menhard and join their swordfighting brotherhood. Then I will be able to take part in the duel against the Kuttenbergers.
库滕堡人要求各方应派出三名剑士，这也让决斗变得复杂了起来。门哈德和阿耳涅是仅有的两名人选，库滕堡人对此也心知肚明，因此我迫不得己，将作为与赛的第三人加入他们。我在与阿耳涅的决斗中证明了自己，而现在，别无选择的我将向门哈德宣誓并加入他们的剑术兄弟会，之后便可与库滕堡人展开决斗。
stan_se_c_celou_zalezitos_iTqa

Menhard and Arne are only two, which the Kuttenbergers knew very well, so I had no choice but to join as the third. I did well in a practice duel with Arne so nothing prevented me from taking an oath and being accepted by Menhard into their swordfighting brotherhood. By doing so, I fulfilled all legal requisites.
库滕堡人要求各方应派出三名剑士，这也让决斗变得复杂了起来。门哈德和阿耳涅是仅有的两名人选，库滕堡人对此也心知肚明，因此我迫不得己，将作为与赛的第三人加入他们。在与阿耳涅的决斗中，我大放异彩，也因此顺利得到了向门哈德宣誓并加入剑术兄弟会的机会。走完这一切流程，我也正式成为了他们的一份子。

The duel was complicated by the Kuttenbergers, who demanded there must be three swordfighters on each side. Menhard and Arne are only two, which the Kuttenbergers knew very well, so I had no choice but to join as the third. But first, Menhard wants to test my mettle in a practice duel.
库滕堡人要求各方应派出三名剑士，这也让决斗变得复杂了起来。门哈德和阿耳涅是仅有的两名人选，库滕堡人对此也心知肚明，因此我迫不得己，将作为与赛的第三人加入他们。但在那之前，门哈德想以一场决斗练习来考验我的实力。
stan_se_c_celou_zalezitos_W2Kv

The duel was complicated by the Kuttenbergers, who demanded there must be three swordfighters on each side. Menhard and Arne are only two, which the Kuttenbergers knew very well, so I had no choice but to join as the third. But first, Menhard wanted to test my mettle in a practice duel. I wasn't good enough. I'll have to try again, hopefully I'll have better luck now.
库滕堡人要求各方应派出三名剑士，这也让决斗变得复杂了起来。门哈德和阿耳涅是仅有的两名人选，库滕堡人对此也心知肚明，因此我迫不得己，将作为与赛的第三人加入他们。但在那之前，门哈德想以一场决斗练习来考验我的实力，可谁知我还稍欠火候，因此不得不重新尝试，但愿这次我能更加走运。
stan_se_c_s_menhartem_jse_brYi

Menhard and I had a falling out and it ended pretty tragically for him. So this is the unfortunate end of the story of Master Menhard and the whole affair with King Wenceslas' charter and the Kuttenberg swordfighting brotherhood.
门哈德与我针锋相对，最终他下场惨淡。这则牵扯到了门哈德大师和库滕堡剑术兄弟会，还关乎瓦茨拉夫国王特许状的故事，如今已迎来了它的结局。

Let Knuckles copy the symbols.
让巧指誊写这些符号。

找到老盗贼们的藏身处。

前往海尼克的家中。

阅读带有谜语的羊皮纸。

搜索海尼克的尸体。

向霍格了解情况。

stav_se_v_cenek_pro_me_me_GraK
Chenyek had a job for me, but as I had previously killed his right hand man, Goliath, it was called off.
程叶科先前给我安排了一项任务，但因为后来我杀死了他的得力助手歌利亚，这项任务也随之化为泡影。
stav_se_v_chudak_cenek_bo_UrqL
Poor Chenyek died before he could tell me what to do.
尚未将具体事项告知于我，可怜的程叶科便一命呜呼。
stav_se_v_mel_bych_pomoct_J0KH
Chenyek told me his plan for me to help the Guild blow up Sigismund's silver mine! I didn't feel like getting involved in such a big plan now, but if I ever change my mind, I should come back.
程叶科竟想让我帮助公会炸毁西格斯蒙德名下的银矿场！而我并不打算卷入如此棘手的计划当中，但倘若我后续改变了主意，依然可以回去找他。
stav_se_v_potkal_jsem_pos_ipvk
I met a messenger who told me Chenyek is looking for me. I should go and see him in the Hole to find out what he wants.
我遇到了一位信使，从他那里得知程叶科正想见我。我得到“墙洞”见他一面，看他到底有何贵干。
stav_se_v_tovarysstvo_sto_4Uhc

The Guild is faced with its biggest challenge yet: disrupting Sigismund's flow of silver by collapsing his mine. They want me to get the black powder and bring it to the mine, where the others will be waiting.
公会正面临着迄今为止最大的挑战：毁掉西格斯蒙德的银矿场，以此阻断银矿产出。他们想让我弄到黑火药，并带到银矿场，届时会有其他人在那里等候。
stealjewe_anca_me_poprosi_eeqC
Anna asked me to steal a piece of jewellery from the miller that was an heirloom from her mother.
安娜让我去偷磨坊主的一件珠宝，那是她母亲的传家宝。
stealjewe_praskl_jsem_anc_YTK9
I snitched on Anna to the miller.
我向磨坊主告发了安娜。
stealjewe_u_anci_jsem_nas_m8Ky
I found that Anna had the items stolen from the miller.
我发现安娜把物品从磨坊主那里偷了出来。
stealjewe_ukradl_jsem_pro_lcRm
I stole the jewellery for Anna, even though it never belonged to her.
我为安娜偷了珠宝，尽管它从来不属于她。
stealjewe_ukradl_jsem_pro_OhF6
I stole Anna's mother's jewellery for her, and she can finally leave the miller.
我帮安娜偷了她母亲的珠宝，她终于可以离开磨坊主了。
stealjewe_vydiral_jsem_an_x8O9
I blackmailed Anna by saying I'd tell everyone she's actually a thief.
我勒索安娜，威胁我要告诉大家她其实是个小偷。

Find Sam in the camp.
在营地内寻找塞缪尔

stolenamu_po_tom_co_jsem__oQzL
After what I did to the Voivode, it probably doesn't make sense for me to keep dealing with his problems. Besides, Marika wanted him to give her the amulet of his own free will.
在我对司令官做了那些事之后，继续插手这个烂摊子已经毫无意义。而且，玛丽卡也希望他能自愿把护身符交给她。
stolenamu_p_podarilo_se_m_xkGJ
I managed to get the amulet from the Voivode, but I didn't give it to Marika.
我成功取得了司令官的护符，但是没有将其交给玛丽卡。
stolenamu_p_seber_amulet__c4Kg
Unfortunately there was no peaceful way to get the job done. I'll search the Voivode's body; he should have the amulet on him.
可惜我们没能以和平的手段来解决问题。我得搜查司令官的尸体，也许护符就在他身上。
stolenamu_p_zanes_amulet__t3It
I took the amulet from the Voivode, now I should bring it to Marika.
我从司令官那里取得了护符，现在该将其交给玛丽卡。
stopovack_i_v_podseminsky_26pa

There's a poacher at large in the Lower Semine forests as well, it seems. It'll take a long time to search the whole area. So I asked Miller Kreyzl, who's close to the forest, if he knows anything. He told me that if anyone is poaching there, it has to be deep in the forest above his storehouse on the south side of the pond.
似乎下塞米的树林里也出现了一名偷猎者，而要想搜查那一整片区域将会花上很长时间，所以我向树林附近的磨坊主克雷泽进行了一番询问。我也从他那里得知，要是有人在附近偷猎的话，一定是在池塘南边他仓库上方的树林深处中。
stopovack_i_v_podseminsky_Scp7
There's a poacher at large in the Lower Semine forests as well, it seems. It took a while, but after I climbed a hill above the pond I found some kind of camp.
似乎下塞米的树林里也出现了一名偷猎者。我搜查了一段时间，后来，我爬上了池塘上方的山丘，在那里发现了一处类似营地的地方。
stopovack_nakonec_jsem_se_GAhU
In the end, I decided to end Varel's life and with it all this pointless running around the woods.
最后，我决定结束瓦雷尔的生命，同时为那些毫无意义的林间奔波画上句点。
stopovack_nasel_jsem_stop_N7y7
There's a poacher at large in the Lower Semine forests as well, it seems. It'll take a long time to search the whole area.
似乎下塞米的树林里也出现了一名偷猎者，而要想搜查那一整片区域将会花上很长时间。
stopovack_stopy_vedly_kol_2z7t

There's a poacher at large in the Lower Semine forests as well, it seems. It'll take a long time to search the whole area. So I asked if anyone in The Lair knew anything. And someone did - there are some men deeper in the woods, south of the storehouse.
似乎下塞米的树林里也出现了一名偷猎者，而要想搜查那一整片区域将会花上很长时间，所以我在“巢穴”里四处打探了消息，也从某人口中得知，在仓库南边的树林深处中有些不明人士出没。
stopuj_uk_ted_se_musime_v_jWPs
Now we must track down the wagon. I have to stay alert so I don't miss anything, and stay close to Lord Semine and his captain.
追踪马车是我们当前的必行之事。我必须保持警觉，以免有所错失，同时还得跟紧塞米大人和格纳利队长。
svatba_bran_se_Pk1m

swapfood_cenek_z_tovaryss_64pp
I was to break into a warehouse by the river Bach, where fancy delicacies were stored for Sigismund. I found there a chest full of sausages and I took them all. I left it completely empty.
我闯入了巴赫河一旁的仓库里，在其中发现了不少为西格斯蒙德保存的可口佳肴。我还在其中发现了一个满是香肠的箱子，并将它一扫而空。
swapfood_cenek_z_tovaryss_dKtW

I was to break into a warehouse by the river Bach, where fancy delicacies were stored for Sigismund. I found there a chest full of sausages and I took them all. I left cabbage inside as a message, so that the Emperor sees what the locals have to eat every day.
我闯入了巴赫河一旁的仓库里，在其中发现了不少为西格斯蒙德保存的可口佳肴。我还发现了一个满是香肠的箱子，将香肠拿走的同时，我还在里边留下了卷心菜，以此作为一则暗示，让那个国王好好看看当地的百姓们平时都在吃些什么。
swapfood_cenek_z_tovaryss_oAhh

I'm to break into a warehouse by the river Bach, where they keep fancy delicacies brought directly for Sigismund’s table. Inside, I am to find the best sausages and steal them. And it would be even richer if I left a head of cabbage for Sigismund as a message.
我的任务就是闯入巴赫河一旁的一间仓库，里面储存的都是可口佳肴，全都会被直接搬上西格斯蒙德的餐桌上。进入仓库后，我还得找到品质最优的香肠，并把它们偷走。而且，我要是能给西格斯蒙德留下一颗卷心菜作为某种暗示，那可就更有意义了呢。
swapfood_mel_bych_v_bedne_Jtw4
I should leave cabbage in the chest.
我得在箱子里放点卷心菜。
