告诉弗拉斯塔发生了什么。
takecimbu_i_kdyz_jsou_kum_j3Lp
Even though the Cumans outnumber us, Posy and I decided to storm them in their camp. Charge!
尽管库曼人胜在人多，但我和“花骨朵”决定在他们的营地里猛攻。冲锋！
takecimbu_kdyz_to_potichu_Aimm
What can't be done quietly can only be done by force! Posy and I must defeat the band of Cumans and then locate Miroslav.
暗地里做不成的事只能靠武力解决！“花骨朵”和我必须打败库曼人的队伍，然后找到米洛斯拉夫。
takecimbu_o_bitve_kdy_jin_cLwT

Songs could be sung about the battle where Henry of Skalitz and Posy of Zimburg fought to regain his ancient ancestral home from much greater numbers. At least, they would be if I hadn't run off like a coward.
有关斯卡里茨的亨利和齐姆博格的“花骨朵”从更强大的势力手中夺回古老祖宅的歌谣，理应被万古传颂。至少，如果我没有像个懦夫一样跑掉的话，事情原本会这样。
takecimbu_o_bitve_kdy_jin_m73o

One day they'll sing odes about the battle in which Henry of Skalitz and Posy of Zimburg took back his ancestral home of old from a much bigger force. I myself would sing of it if I only knew how to rhyme…
有关斯卡里茨的亨利和齐姆博格的“花骨朵”从更强大的势力手中夺回古老祖宅的赞歌，有一天会传颂开来。如果我知道如何押韵，我也会传颂......
talktobal_jakmile_jsem_ba_w97d
After I told Lord Posy everything I'd learned about the dead priest, we could continue in our tracking.
我先告诉“花骨朵”领主我所了解的有关死去神父的事情，之后我们可以继续追踪。
talktobal_konflikt_s_mist_EXgR
Conflict with the local riffraff was averted. Now I need to decide with Jan on how to move forward.
与当地暴徒的冲突得以避免。现在我需要和杨一起决定后续行动。
talktobal_po_zazehnani_ko_czCr
Having averted the conflict with the looters, Jan and I decided on our next move. Tracking the band of Cumans won't be difficult.
在避免了与劫掠者的冲突之后，杨和我决定了我们的下一步行动。追踪库曼人的队伍并不困难。
talktobal_po_zazehnani_ko_GUVB
Having averted the conflict with the looters, Jan and I have yet to discuss our next move. That's because I went away, bringing our quest to an unsuccessful finish.
在避免了与劫掠者的冲突之后，杨和我还没有讨论我们的下一步行动。因为我离开了，我们的探险以失败告终。
talktobal_ukol_kterym_te__357A
I finished the task entrusted to me by Lord Posy at the scene of the battle but wasn't interested in continuing. So, I simply left, ending our journey together.
我在战斗现场完成了“花骨朵”领主委托给我的任务，但不想继续下去。所以，我就那样离开了，结束了我们的同行旅程。
talktobal_ukol_kterym_te__i3pp
I finished the task entrusted to me by Lord Posy at the scene of the battle, I should go and tell him.
我在战斗现场完成了“花骨朵”领主委托给我的任务，我应该去告诉他。
talktocen_kdyz_jsem_se_te_gvsY
The fellow runs a group called the Guild. Its members are several Bible-thumping outcasts fighting against Sigismund. I haven't decided yet if I want to have anything to do with them.
这家伙正掌管着一个名为“公会”的组织，里边的成员都是些热衷传道的浪人，他们要反抗西格斯蒙德。目前为止我仍未决定是否要跟他们扯上干系。
talktocen_promluvil_jsem__oA6m
Chenyek turned out to be a rebel, a Wycliffite and a leader of a group called the Guild. After an interrogation of almost biblical proportions, the group gave me my first mission.
没想到程叶科竟是个反叛者，也是个威克里夫追随者，同时还是“公会”组织的领导者。经历了一场近乎刨根问底的盘问后，我从这个组织手中接到了第一项任务。
talktocen_vazoun_rikal_ze_BXZN
Either he likes me or he just sees me as a useful idiot. I'll find out when I talk to him again.
他到底是真的重视我，还是只想把我当作白痴来利用，待我再跟他交流的时候，一切即可见分晓。
talktofou_drevorubec_vase_Rja6
Vashek the woodcutter described how to get to the bones. His description may have been a bit vague, but that's something I'll have to deal with.
伐木工瓦谢克向我解释了他是如何得到那些骨头的。尽管他的描述略显含糊，但依然有值得参考之处。
talktofou_musim_rychle_na_bw1B
I have to find Vashek fast and get him to tell me where he found the bones.
我得尽快找到瓦谢克，并向他打探那些骨头的来源。
talktofou_vasek_je_mrtvy__3EfP
Vashek is dead and I have to find the way to the bones by myself.
瓦谢克死了，我也因此不得不独自寻找那些骨头。
talktohun_lovci_vostatek__KqUd
Vostatek the gamekeeper died, so he doesn't need help finding his horse anymore.
猎人沃斯塔克死了，所以他再也不需要找到那匹马了。
talktohun_lovci_vostatek__oWoq
Vostatek the gamekeeper is lying in his hideout in the forest and needs help finding his horse. I told him I couldn't help him right now, but that I would come back to him soon.
猎人沃斯塔克躺在森林里的藏身之所，需要有人帮忙找到他的马。我告诉他，现在我帮不了他，但我很快就会回来找他。
talktohun_lovcuv_skok_ze__7KiQ
The huntsman jumped down from the tree he was hiding in from the wolves, but he landed badly. I reckon you could hear the crunch all the way at Trosky.
猎人从他躲避狼群的那棵树上跳下来，但是摔伤了。我想你甚至在特罗斯基都能听到那声脆响。
talktohun_lovcuv_skok_ze__EXl8

The huntsman's leap down from the tree didn't go very well. They must have heard that crunch all the way at Trosky. Serves him right. Was I supposed to drag him all the way home? I don't have time for that.
猎人从树下跳下来时不太顺利。人们肯定在特罗斯基那边都能听到这声脆响。这是他自找的。我是不是应该将他拖回家？我可没那个功夫。
talktohun_lovcuv_skok_ze__Kpag
I should make sure the huntsman is alright and ask him what happened.
我得确保猎人安然无恙，并向他了解这是怎么回事。他从树上摔下来，
talktohun_meli_bychom_se__8DQl
I should discuss with the huntsman what to do next.
我得和猎人谈谈接下来该怎么办。
talktohun_meli_bychom_se__jrQs
I should discuss with the huntsman what to do next.
我得和猎人谈谈接下来该怎么办。
talktohun_pepika_jsem_sic_oFr4
I managed to save Pepik, but Vostatek died. What am I going to do with Pepik now?
我想法救下了佩皮克，但是沃斯塔克死了。现在我该拿佩皮克怎么办？
talktohun_pepik_je_zpatky_QhPY
Pepik is back, I should go and tell Vostatek.
佩皮克回来了，我得去告诉沃斯塔克。
talktohun_promluvil_jsem__jqZv
I spoke to Vostatek at his house and talked everything out. It seems we're friends now, and Vostatek invited me to come over for an ale sometime.
我在沃斯塔克家与他谈过，把一切都谈妥了。我们现在似乎成了朋友，沃斯塔克邀请我改天再来喝酒。
talktohun_promluvil_jsem__KPZ6
I spoke to Vostatek at his house and talked everything out. It seems we're friends now, and Vostatek invited me to come over for an ale sometime.
我在沃斯塔克家与他谈过，把一切都谈妥了。我们现在似乎成了朋友，沃斯塔克邀请我改天再来喝酒。
talktohun_slibil_jsem_lov_8pOz
I promised the huntsman I'd help track down his horse.
我答应猎人帮他寻找那匹马的下落。
talktohun_vostatek_byl_na_oksl
Vostatek was on his way home and wanted to meet with me later. But that will never happen now.
沃斯塔克原本已经上路，并且希望日后与我再相见。但现在这一切都不会发生了。
talktohun_vostatek_byl_po_6peO
Vostatek got thirsty on the way. He handed me his empty waterskin for me to fill up. But instead of relief in clean spring water, he found death.
沃斯塔克在路上口渴了。他将自己的空水袋递给我，让我去装水。但清泉水并没有给他带来慰藉，他还是死了。
talktohun_vostatek_byl_po_rN6Y
We didn't find Vostatek's horse in the camp. We'll have to do something about it.
我们在营地发现沃斯塔克的马不见了。我们得解决这个问题。
talktohun_vostatek_byl_pr_ewkZ
Vostatek was on his doorstep and wanted to meet with me later. But that will never happen now, because he died.
沃斯塔克到他家门口了，他希望以后还能再见到我。但这件事再也不会发生了，因为他死了。
talktohun_vostatek_je_na__FNDA
Vostatek is on his way home, and I agreed to stop by to see him once he arrives. He'll have a reward for me.
沃斯塔克上路回家了，我同意在他到家后上门拜访。他要酬谢我。
talktohun_vostatek_mel_ra_zIri
Vostatek was glad to see I brought his horse back in one piece.
沃斯塔克很高兴看到我将它的马完好无损地带回来了。
talktohun_vostatka_jsem_d_k7MU
I brought Vostatek home, but I should stop by to see him later. He'll have a reward for me.
我将沃斯塔克带回家了，但我改天会再来看他。届时他会酬谢我。
talktokat_p_katerina_me_p_2e73

Katherine was in Kuttenberg to find out what had happened to Liechtenstein. We don't have many leads. The best she could find out was that a certain beggar called Goatskin was bragging in one notorious tavern that he was a spy for an unnamed lord.
凯瑟琳在库滕堡是为了查明列支敦士登的情况。我们没有多少线索。她最多只能打听到某个叫山羊皮的乞丐在一个声名狼藉的酒馆里吹嘘自己是某领主的眼线。
talktokat_zjisti_od_kater_rvXg

Katherine is in Kuttenberg asking around about Liechtenstein. It's about time I visit her there and figure out what's going on. They say she found work as an alemaid in the Hangman's Halter tavern in Tarmark.
凯瑟琳现在正在库滕堡打探列支敦士登的下落，我也是时候该去探望她并向她了解事情的进展了，据说她还在塔马克的绞索酒馆找到了一份女招待的工作呢。
talktoopat_musim_dorucit__Gelu
I have to deliver a message to the abbot, who's visiting a little church near Kuttenberg.
我得将此消息带给一位修道院院长，此人正在造访库滕堡附近的一间小教堂。
talktoopat_opat_zemrel_bo_GB6z
The abbot died, so I won't be able to deliver the message to him.
修道院院长死了，我也因此无法再将消息传达给他。
talktoopat_stekal_jsem_se_0Tzq
I met the abbot and a man called Gerhard. They have different views on the bones. Gerhard would like to put them to use, but the abbot ordered them to be destroyed.
我见到了修道院院长，同时还遇到了一个叫格哈德的人。他们对那些神秘骨头持有不同态度：格哈德想要物尽其用，而院长则下令将其损毁。
talktopig_nalezna_mrtvola_ACN2
The corpse had been gnawed by the pigs grazing nearby. I should find the pig herder and question him to find out whether he saw something.
尸体被附近吃草的猪啃过了，我应该找到猪倌，问问他有没有看到什么。
talktopig_nalezna_mrtvola_KLXt
The corpse had been gnawed by the pigs grazing nearby. I couldn't find their owner, though.
尸体被附近吃草的猪啃过了，但是我找不到猪倌。
talktopig_pasak_prasta_s__zbIc
The pig herder had nothing to do with the murder, but he told me who might have.
猪倌和这起凶杀案无关，但是他提到了一个可疑的人。
talktopri_farar_uz_o_nale_Z5fk
I showed the bones to a monk called Slava, who had stopped in Bylany. It turned out he'd heard of them. He said he had a job for me, something to do with the bones.
我向正好停留在比兰尼的修士斯拉瓦展示了那些骨头，没想到他居然对此有所耳闻。他因此向我委派了一项差事，而且与那些骨头有关。
talktopri_farar_zemrel_ty_MHPr
The monk died and in the meantime the mysterious bones disappeared. Hmm… I'm not going to bother with it.
那个修士死了，与此同时那些神秘骨头也不翼而飞。嗯…我已不必再为此事操心。
talktopri_nasel_jsem_divn_PSZ8
I found some strange bones. They're like nothing I've ever seen. I’ll tell someone in Bylany.
我发现了一些似乎从未见过的怪异骨头。我要到比兰尼去把此事告知他人。
talktopri_vlastne_tak_doc_I6o2
Actually, they didn't quite disappear... I kept them because I'm sure I'll find a better use for them.
其实那些骨头并非消失...我将它们保留了下来，因为我相信它们会另有用途。
talktosam_p_samuel_se_se__eBth

Nothing left but to speak to this Samuel. A bit of a strange fellah, but that was to be expected. Unfortunately, he didn't tell me much, but he said he'd tried to obtain some information for me. Whether he's serious or just leading me by the nose, I'll find out when I arrive to our agreed upon meeting.
现在只能去跟塞缪尔谈话。他这个人有点奇怪，但这可以预料。不幸的是，他没有告诉我多少东西，但他说他已努力为我获取一些信息。他究竟是认真的，还是在牵着我的鼻子走，等我到了约定地点就会知道。
talktosam_zjisti_co_vi_sa_U3Bm
Nothing left but to speak to this Samuel fellah. During the day he's in the synagogue, where his people go to see him. At night, he's at the King Solomon Tavern.
现在只能去跟塞缪尔谈话。白天，他在犹太教堂，他的人去那里找他。晚上，他在所罗门王酒馆。
talktosla_moc_dlouho_jsem_mZ8l
I took too long and someone else found the bones in the meantime.
我浪费了太多时间，而期间那些骨头已被其他人找到。
talktosla_opat_naridil_me_TUcb
The abbot ordered me and Slava to get rid of the bones. I have to tell him.
修道院院长要求我和斯拉瓦将那些骨头处理掉。我得把这件事告诉斯拉瓦。
talktosla_slava_se_moji_z_EVtL
Slava didn't live to hear my message and someone else found and took the bones in the meantime. There's nothing more for me to do here.
斯拉瓦没能活着等到我的消息，在此期间那些骨头已被别人找到并带走，此处与我也再无瓜葛。
talktosla_vsechno_jsem_fa_R925
I told Slava everything. But a man with two bodyguards interrupted us. He wanted to find out what Slava knew about the bones.
我已将先前的经历告知斯拉瓦，但是我们却被一个带着两名护卫的人拦了下来，此人欲向斯拉瓦打探神秘骨头之事。
talktostu_stulec_mi_dopor_TQte
I also had the honour of talking to Knuckles, a member of the Guild, who wasn't too excited about Chenyek's convictions.
我很荣幸得到了与公会成员巧指交谈的机会，他对程叶科的信念不怎么感兴趣。
talktostu_stulec_na_me_ne_xFxj
Chenyek's partner Knuckles was shouting something at me. What does he want?
程叶科的搭档巧指正在朝着我叫喊，他到底想干什么？
talktostu_stulec_uz_mi_ni_aXDg
Knuckles won't tell me anything anymore. He died.
巧指已死，我无法再从他那里打探消息。
talktovit_vitek_mi_s_malo_RkhA
Vitek reluctantly told me where his father was heading. The lad's not too fond of his old man.
维泰克不情不愿地将他父亲的去向告诉了我。这孩子不太喜欢他爸爸。
talktovit_zlata_se_zminil_bCyo
Zlata mentioned her son Vitek might know where the huntsman was headed.
兹拉塔提到她的儿子维泰克可能知道猎人去了哪里。
talktovit_zlata_se_zminil_Fevf
Zlata mentioned her son Vitek might now where the huntsman was headed, but in the end there was no need to speak to him.
兹拉塔提到她的儿子维泰克可能知道猎人去了哪里，但最后却发现我并不需要和他交谈。
talktoziz_promluvil_jsem__RHVx
I spoke to Zizka, who is already drawing up a new plan.
我已跟杰式卡交谈，而他也已经开始制定新计划。
talktoziz_situace_pro_nas_gAVG
The situation doesn't look good for us at all. I should go and tell Zizka what happened in the city. We have to come up with a course of action.
似乎目前的局势对我们而言有些不利，我得将城里发生的事情告诉杰式卡。我们必须想出对策。
talkwithm_mariku_nejaka_s_WWGt
Marika won't be interested in any wager now.
玛丽卡将不会再对任何赌局报以兴趣。
talkwithm_p_rekni_marice__o1oN
I lost the wager with the Voivode and any chance of getting the amulet from the Voivode peacefully. Marika won't be too happy about it...
我输掉了与司令官的赌约，也失去了以和平方式从司令官那里拿到护身符的机会。玛丽卡对此可能会不太高兴…
talkwithm_rekl_jsem_maric_pltm
I told Marika that I lost the bet with the Voivode. She wasn't exactly happy.
我将输掉赌局的事实告诉了玛丽卡，她不出所料地很是难过。
talkwithv_mluvil_jsem_o_v_EpX2
I talked to the Voivode about the outcome of the wager.
我已跟司令官谈论了赌局的结果。
talkwithv_s_vajdou_uz_mlu_RAqe
I don't think I'll be talking to the Voivode about the wager again…
我想我不会再和司令官谈论赌局的事了…
tara__event_caption_fqjt
Massacre
大屠杀
tara__event_description_pXOU
Villagers are arguing with a priest by some butchered cows. What happened here?
村民们正与一位站在被宰杀牛群旁的牧师争吵，发生什么事了？
taraskill_pomateny_rytir__BOVB
The deranged knight, that was on my heels in the mines, turned out to the protector of the local pit of hell. I managed to reason with him.
那位在矿场里尾随着我的疯骑士，竟然是当地地狱之坑的看守者。我设法和他进行了交流，并说服了他。
taraskill_pomateny_rytir__NSQe
The deranged knight, that was on my heels in the mines, was neutralised. He's unconscious.
那位在矿场里尾随着我的疯骑士已经被制服，现在正不省人事。
taraskill_pomateny_rytir__zmRY
The deranged knight, that was on my heels in the mines, won't bother anyone anymore. He's dead.
那位在矿场里尾随着我的疯骑士从此不再会侵扰任何人了，因为他已经死了。
taraskill_toho_pomateneho_bGPe
I can't confront that deranged knight who was at my heels in the mines anymore.
我不能再与那位尾随我的疯骑士继续对峙。
taraskill_v_dolech_jsem_n_XObr
I ran into some deranged knight in the mines. Why is he hiding here? If I want to get out of here alive, I should either avoid him or arm myself and prepare for a fight.
我在矿场碰上了个举止疯狂的骑士，为什么他会躲在这种地方？如果我想活着离开此地，要么就避开他，要么就只能拔剑出鞘，准备应战。
tarasmura_escapemines_nqsw
Get out of the mine!
离开矿井！
tarasmura_finaltalktaras_ugTj
Talk to Taras.
和塔拉斯交谈。
taras_mura_finaltalkvilla_92Ug
Talk to Father Marian.
和神⽗⻢⾥安交谈。
taras_mura_helptaras_kcqA
Help Taras!
帮助塔拉斯！
taras_mura_helpvillagers_hL8e
Help the villagers!
帮助村民！
taras_mura_poloz_obet_pre_PZut
Prepare an offering for hell in the mine.
在矿井中准备地狱供品。
taras_mura_retrievegear_3Srq
Get your items back.
拿回你的物品。
tarasmura_taraskill_ZZKp
Confront the mysterious knight.
与神秘骑士对峙。
tastewines_kuba_sice_nevi_4sGp
Even though Kuba doesn't know which wine the recipe calls for, he does know all of the wines in the miller's cellar. Now it's up to me to discern which wine goes in the recipe by its flavour.
尽管库巴不知道食谱上用的是哪种酒，但他确实知道磨坊主酒窖里的所有酒。现在就需要我根据酒的味道来辨别食谱中的酒。
tastewines_podle_chuti_js_3y0C
I recognised the correct wine by its flavour. All that's left is to help Kuba so he tells me what kind of wine it is.
我根据味道辨别出了正确的酒。剩下的就是帮助库巴，让他告诉我这是哪种酒。
tastewines_podle_chuti_js_UN79
I recognised the correct wine by its flavour. Kuba told me it's WINE.
我根据味道辨别出了正确的酒。库巴告诉我这是葡萄酒。
telljanla_jana_mrzelo_ze__cFTY
Jan regretted not getting his brother's body back, but he was glad that László got what he deserved…
没有拿回哥哥的尸体，杨感到遗憾，但他很高兴拉斯洛得到了报应......
telljanla_mel_bych_zajit__gBT3
I should go to Jan and tell him about László.
我应该去找杨，将拉斯洛的事告诉他。
telljanwh_jan_hodla_pro_s_m8x0
Jan is willing to risk his life for his brother Peter. But I serve the Lords of Leipa... The Lords of Suchotlesky will have to manage without me.
杨甘愿为了他的兄弟彼得赌上性命。但我在为莱佩的领主效力……苏霍茨基的领主们只能自己想办法处理问题了。
telljanwh_kdyz_jsem_rekl__9gl8
When I told Jan about his brother's death, he cursed László and his whole damned family. He has now sworn himself to avenging Peter. But we need more men for that…
当我告诉杨他哥哥的死讯时，他诅咒了拉斯洛和他整个该死的家族。他现在发誓要为彼得报仇。但要复仇，我们需要更多的人......
telljanwh_kdyz_se_jan_dov_yj68

When Jan heard about his brother's death, he was devastated. The news about the impending attack was the final drop. Taking to heart the adage 'the best defence is a good offense', he told me to get ready for combat and find a few experienced warriors to accompany us to the handover site.
当听说自己哥哥的死讯时，杨大受打击。最后的一击，是即将发生的袭击。他牢记“最佳防御是一种良好的进攻”这句格言，让我做好战斗准备，找几个有经验的战士陪同我们去交接地点。
telljanwh_misto_predani_a_42OF

Jan was surprised by where the handover was to take place and the ransom amount, but he says the blood of kin can't be counted in coin. He also regretted that I hadn't seen Peter, but understood that in our situation I couldn't be giving orders. I should prepare for departure.
杨对交接地点和赎金数额感到惊讶，但他说亲人不能用钱币衡量。我没有见到彼得，他对此感到遗憾，但他明白，鉴于我们的情况，当时的我不可能发号施令。我应该准备出发了。
telljanwh_p_mrtvy_petr_na_mPRO
Jan, informed of Peter's death, still sent me back to the camp to negotiate the handover of the captive.
杨在得知彼得的死讯后，仍然派我回到营地，商谈俘虏的交接......
telljanwh_povedel_jsem_ja_DGAF
I told Jan everything about the conditions of the handover, but kept the truth about Peter to myself, instead assuring him that everything would go smoothly. Now we must go to the handover location.
我把交接条件全部告诉了杨，但隐瞒了有关彼得的真相，向他保证一切会顺利进行。现在我们必须去交接地点。
telljanwh_p_sice_jsem_jan_mNxt

At first, I lied a bit to Jan, but then it began to gnaw on me. In the end, I admitted everything and told him the truth about Peter. Jan, understanding the situation, decided to exact revenge upon Farkas.
起初，我对杨撒了谎，但后来我于心不忍。最后，我承认了一切，将有关彼得的真相告诉了他。杨了解情况后，决定对法卡斯进行报复......
telljanwh_p_vzhledem_k_ok_A7Kj
Given the circumstances, there's no use in talking over the outcomes of the negotiations with Jan.
鉴于这种情况，跟杨谈论谈判的结果没有意义。
telljanwh_vyjednal_jsem_v_KY0b
I've negotiated everything I need to in the camp. I must now return to Jan and prepare for the handover.
我已经在营地里进行了所有必要的谈判。我现在必须回到杨身边，为交接做准备。
temp_bez__nakonec_jsem_se_eF4Z
In the end, I decided to end Varel's life and with it all this pointless running around the woods.
最后，我决定结束瓦雷尔的生命，同时为那些毫无意义的林间奔波画上句点。
temp_bez__vim_co_se_stalo_vqsn
I'll go back to Varel and tell him the Slatego poacher is long dead. He may want some proof.
我要回到瓦雷尔那里，将斯拉戈的偷猎者与世长辞的事实告诉他，或许他会需要点证据。
temp_bez__vyresil_jsem_tr_GO0X
I went back to Varel and told him the Slatego poacher is long dead. There was no time for mourning, because there was more work to do nearby.
我回到了瓦雷尔那里，告诉他斯拉戈的偷猎者早就一命呜呼了。我们无暇为其哀悼，因为附近还有很多事情要完成。
temp_hlas_musim_se_vratit_LvIv
I'll go back to the gamekeeper and tell him what I've found out.
我要回到猎场看守人那里，将我的所见所得告诉他。
temp_hlas_nakonec_jsem_se_59eB
In the end, I decided to end all the pointless running around the woods my own way.
最后，我决定结束瓦雷尔的生命，同时为那些毫无意义的林间奔波画上句点。
temp_hlas_nakonec_jsem_se_AGEN
In the end, I decided to end Varel's life and with it all this pointless running around the woods.
最后，我决定结束瓦雷尔的生命，同时为那些毫无意义的林间奔波画上句点。
temp_hlas_skvele_jenze_co_PDpT
What now? I have to report the poacher to Varel, otherwise I would look suspicious. What can I say, though? That it's Capon, or should I come up with some other lie?
现在该如何是好？我必须向瓦雷尔揭发那位偷猎者，否则我反而会引起怀疑，可是我该如何交代呢？告诉他就是卡蓬干的吗？还是应该编个其它谎言呢？
temp_hlas_tabor_v_podsemi_97az
I went back to the gamekeeper and told him everything. He had another job waiting for me. This will be the last one.
我回到了猎场看守那里，将所经历之事都告诉了他。而他的另一项任务已在等待着我，这也将是最后一个需要处理的偷猎者。
temp_hlas_vratil_jsem_se__Jf5N
I went back to the gamekeeper and told him everything. That was the end of my adventure with poaching in the Trosky district.
我回到了猎场看守那里，将发生的一切都告诉了他。我在特罗斯基地区与偷猎行为斗智斗勇的冒险也该结束了。
temp_hlas_vyreseno_uff_do_xAIs

I had to report the poacher to Varel, otherwise I'd look suspicious. It wasn't pleasant, so I hope I can avoid similar situations in future. One way or another, my time exploring the Trosky forests is at an end.
我必须向瓦雷尔揭发偷猎者，否则我就会显得很可疑，这令人很是不快，所以希望我将来能够避免如此境况。不管怎样，探索特罗斯基树林的时光也该结束了。
temp_nahl_musim_hajnemu_r_QcRp
I'll go back to Vostatek and tell him what happened with the Vidlak poacher.
我要回去把维德拉克偷猎者的下场告知沃斯塔克。
temp_nahl_nakonec_jsem_se_DhDe
In the end, I decided to end Vostatek's life and with it all this pointless running around the woods.
最后，我决定结束沃斯塔克的生命，同时为那些毫无意义的林间奔波画上句点。
temp_nahl_prvniho_pytlaka_Lp9G

I went back to Vostatek and told him what happened with the Vidlak poacher. Vostatek seemed more interested in having another drink than talking about poaching. In any case, he didn’t have any more work for me.
我回到了沃斯塔克那里，把维德拉克偷猎者的下场告诉了他。但似乎沃斯塔克更想再喝杯酒，而不是讨论偷猎之事。总之，他已经没有其它任务给我了。
temp_pode_hned_potom_jsem_PIWZ
I went straight back to Vostatek and told him how I dealt with the first poacher. On the strength of that he told me about another one.
我直接回到了沃斯塔克那里，将第一个偷猎者的下场告诉了他。有了如此铺垫，他随即向我提供了另一位偷猎者的线索。
temp_pode_nakonec_jsem_se_HjyD
In the end, I decided to end Vostatek's life and with it all this pointless running around the woods.
最后，我决定结束沃斯塔克的生命，同时为那些毫无意义的林间奔波画上句点。
temp_pode_reknu_hajnemu_c_mglO
I'll go back to Vostatek and tell him how I dealt with the first poacher.
我要回去将第一个偷猎者的下场告知沃斯塔克。

Carry Anton away.
将安东带走。
test_sesi_prijd_zitra_ran_LUQF
Go to the Hoprink Church tomorrow morning.
于明日早晨前往霍普林克教堂。

Hang up the braies.
将内裤挂起。
thomlin_u_bez_thomlina_za_bvYD
Without Thomlin, the fights in Horschan cannot continue.
托姆林不在，霍斯昌的搏击将无法继续进行。
tidyup_zabava_v_laznich_b_mlos

The party in the bathhouse was pretty wild. So wild that I felt like shit the next morning. And when an alderman turned up for a surprise inspection, I had clean the place up sharpish, hangover or no hangover, so he wouldn't close the place down.
澡堂的开张庆典相当热闹，以至于第二天早上我感觉自己累得不想动弹了。当一名市议员前来突击检查时，不管有没有宿醉，我都得迅速将这个地方收拾好，以免他关闭这家澡堂。
tidyup_zatracene_musim_to_K1xd
Christ, what a night! I have to clean the place up fast. Mainly the vomit, tankards and sleeping drunks.
天啊，这一夜真是太疯狂了！我得赶快清理这个地方。主要是打扫呕吐物、整理酒杯和处理睡着的醉汉。
tmp_poraz_abych_byl_konec_PPEB
In order to finally be recognised as the winner of the blacksmithing competition, I have to defeat Matthias in a duel with the hunting sword I forged.
为了最终在锻造比赛中获胜，我必须在决斗中用自己锻造的猎剑击败马蒂亚斯。
tmp_poraz_bohuzel_jsem_v__PiTj
Unfortunately, I lost the duel with Matthias. There's nothing to be done about it.
不幸的是，在与马蒂亚斯的决斗中，我输了。我对此无能为力。
tmp_poraz_podarilo_se_mi__qfq3
I managed to beat Matthias in a duel. Victory is mine!
我在决斗中成功击败马蒂亚斯。胜利属于我！
tmp_poraz_tmp_v_souboji_j_t56f
I cheated in my duel with Matthias. There's no chance he'll recognise me as the winner now.
在与马蒂亚斯的决斗中，我作弊了。他现在不会承认我是赢家。
tmp_setke_mam_jit_do_tabo_RVPP

They must have noticed we're gone, because the forest is swarming with soldiers looking for us! It seems Katherine's ally Mika is waiting for us with a wagon in some abandoned camp south of here, but Zizka's in a really bad way! I’ll go and find him and tell him what happened. But I have to be careful no soldiers see me. That would be the end.
我们逃跑的事情一定是败露了，因为树林里到处都是搜捕我们的士兵！凯瑟琳的朋友米卡，似乎就在南边某个废弃的营地，备好了马车等着我们，可是现在杰士卡的处境很糟糕！我得找到他，并告诉他发生了什么。但是我得小心，不能让士兵们发现我，万一被逮到就全完了。
tmp_setke_stretl_jsem_bor_VoJ8

Our absence must have been discovered, because the forest is swarming with soldiers looking for us! It seems Katherine's ally Mika is waiting for us with a wagon in some abandoned camp south of here, but Zizka's in a really bad way! I’ll go and find him and tell him what happened.
我们逃跑的事情一定是败露了，因为树林里到处都是搜捕我们的士兵！凯瑟琳的朋友米卡，似乎就在南边某个废弃的营地，备好了马车等着我们，可是现在杰士卡的处境很糟糕！我得找到他，并告诉他发生了什么。
tmp_treti_ted_mezi_skalam_DkqZ
Now I have to go uphill between the rocks.
现在我要在岩石间穿行并往山上走。
tohle_sma_s_basanem_jsem__4nex
I handled Basan in my own way, I don't plan on sharing the money with him.
我并不打算跟巴桑分享那笔钱，所以用自己的方式把他解决掉了。
tomas_umr_tomas_od_kolina_Xwgc
Thomas of Kolin is dead. Now he'll need a very different absolution than I could give him.
科林的托马斯已经死去。他现在需要一种截然不同的赦免，而我也无法给予。
touraroun_mlynar_mi_chce__fBe2
The miller wants to show me the entire mill, I should follow him.
磨坊主想带我参观整个磨坊，我应该跟着他。
touraroun_mlynar_mi_ukaza_0bhi
The miller showed me the mill, now he wants to show me his wine cellar.
磨坊主带我参观了磨坊，现在他想带我看看酒窖。
touraroun_mlynar_mi_z_dal_hEfH
The miller showed me the hunting lodge from afar. Unfortunately, he didn't invite me for dinner when we finished.
磨坊主带我从远处参观了狩猎小屋。可惜的是，结束后，他没有邀请我吃晚饭。
touraroun_mlynar_mi_z_dal_qPOb
The miller showed me the hunting lodge from afar. When we finished, he invited me for dinner.
磨坊主带我从远处参观了狩猎小屋。结束后，他邀请我吃晚饭。
touraroun_potom_co_mi_uka_SxY1
After showing me his wine cellar, he took me to see his oven as well.
带我参观完酒窖后，他又带我去看烤炉。
touraroun_tak_dlouho_jsem_3d1m
I put the tour off so long that the miller got tired of waiting.
我延误了太久，磨坊主等得不耐烦了。
touraroun_u_pece_jsme_pot_Eef9
While at the oven, we met his housemaid, who caught a proper tongue lashing from him. Then we went to the stables.
在烤炉旁，我们见到了他的女佣，他把女仆狠狠地训了一顿。然后我们去了马厩。
touraroun_u_pece_si_poste_h4pY
While at the oven, he complained about his housemaid Anna. Now he wants to show me his stables.
在烤炉旁，他抱怨了女仆安娜。现在他想带我看马厩。
touraroun_u_staji_mi_pysn_mtYE
At the stables, he proudly showed me his horses. Then all that was left was the hunting lodge.
在马厩里，他自豪地向我展示了他的马匹。然后就剩下狩猎小屋了。
touraroun_ze_staji_vyhnal_97GX
He chased the stableboy, Kuba, out of the stables, because his dog had bitten the horse the miller is so proud of. Then all that was left was the hunting lodge.
他把马夫库巴赶出了马厩，因为他的狗咬了磨坊主引以为豪的马。然后就剩下狩猎小屋了。
trackhorse_hlavni_duvod_p_0oby
I found more hoofprints in the mud. They lead towards the cliffs in the east. That must be where the thieves are hiding.
我在泥土上发现了一些通往东边山崖的蹄印，那些盗贼肯定就藏在那边。
trackhorse_hlavni_duvod_p_a4PU
It doesn't seem like the poachers tried to cover their tracks, they just followed the path. I found hoofprints in the mud, I should follow them.
那些偷猎者沿着小路离开，似乎也并不打算掩盖踪迹。我在泥土中发现了一些蹄印，我得跟着它们走。
trackhorse_hlavni_duvod_p_h0Hc
I came to a crossroads. Judging by the fresh horsepile, the poachers must've taken Pepik to the south-east.
我来到了一处路口，通过湿润的马粪可以看出，那些偷猎者一定将佩皮克带往了东南方向。
trackhorse_hlavni_duvod_p_Ji61
The poachers untied the huntsman's horse, Pepik, from the tree and took him deeper into the woods.
偷猎者们解开了猎人捆绑在树上的缰绳，将他的马儿佩皮克带进了树林深处。
trackhorse_hlavni_duvod_p_MjrM
Pepik, the huntsman's horse, was taken from the camp by poachers. I managed to track them to their camp.
猎人的马——佩皮克在营地中被偷猎者盗走了。我追踪到了他们的营地。
trackhorse_hlavni_duvod_p_mkii
Pepik, the gamekeeper's horse, was taken from the camp by poachers. I was supposed to track them down, but the task turned out to be too hard, and Vostatek will never know how it turned out.
猎人的马——佩皮克在营地中被偷猎者盗走了。我本该去追踪他们的下落，但这个任务太难了，而沃斯塔克永远不会知道结果如何了。
trackhorse_hlavni_duvod_p_sBqS
The poachers took the horse deeper into the woods. I found a hunting horn on the ground, it must have fallen from the saddle.
那些偷猎者将马匹带到了树林深处，而我也在地上发现了一只狩猎号角，它必定是从马鞍上落下的。
trackhorse_hlavni_duvod_p_XQRj
Pepik, the huntsman's horse, was most likely stolen by poachers. I have to track them down.
猎人的马——佩皮克很可能被偷猎者盗走了。我得去追踪他们的下落。
trackhorse_todo_a_zkontro_dn4r
The poachers must've been digging through Vostatek's belongings along the way. I found an empty saddlebag and more tracks heading south. They can't be far now.
偷猎者们在路上一定翻找过沃斯塔克的物件。我发现了一只鞍囊，还有不少朝南行进的足迹，他们应该就在不远处。
tragedien_postarej_se_o_l_NeZ6
Take care of the bandits at Danemark.
解决丹恩麦的强盗。
tragedien_vrat_se_za_mlyn_vxNM
Return to the miller for a reward.
回去找磨坊主领取报酬。
translate_a_ted_jeste_jed_njsG
And now, once again, back to the second.
现在，再一次回到第二个人那里。
translate_nasel_jsem_rece_nc07
I found the recipe but can't understand it. I'll have to find someone to translate it for me.
我找到了食谱，但看不懂。我得找人帮我翻译一下。
translate_ocividne_jsem_s_ExOB
Of course, I had it translated incorrectly. I'll have to go back to that first fellow.
当然，翻译错了。我得回去找第一个人。
translate_prej_v_cikanske_9qd3
I was told they could help me at the nomads' camp.
有人告诉我，游牧民营地的人会帮助我。
translate_snad_uz_to_mam__BHBf
It better be translated correctly this time.
这次最好翻译正确。
translate_tak_jsem_s_nim__3KVk
I spoke with him. He translated the recipe for me but not into my language. He says there is someone here who could hopefully help me.
我与他交谈。他为我翻译了食谱，但没有翻译成我的语言。他说希望这里的一个人能够帮助我。
translate_tak_mi_to_ten_d_nqjJ
This other person translated it for me. I hope I didn't make a mistake somewhere.
这个人帮助我进行了翻译。希望我没有在什么地方犯错。
translate_v_cikanske_tabo_8O06
Apparently, there's a man at the nomads' camp who will help me.
显然，游牧民营地的一个人会帮助我。
traskave__dokonci_co_jsi__v3zy
Find Chenyek and kill him.
找到程叶科并把他杀死。
traskave__objective1_pVr6
Tell the folks at the Hole in the Wall, what happened.
向“墙洞”内的众人诉说所发生之事。
traskave__promluv_si_s_ry_aw2u
Talk to the bailiff.
与执行官交谈。
traskave__ziskej_dokument_3xo0
Get back the document.
将文件取回。
traskave__ziskej_soudek_z_PTNx
Get the barrel back.
将火药桶取回。

tuma_umrel_bez_tumy_se_v__SaXK
Without Tuma, there'll be no fighting in Horschan.
缺少了图马将无法在霍斯昌继续进行搏击。
u33__ande_najdi_ukradene__KvIe
Talk to Goatskin.
和山羊皮谈谈。
u33__ande_seber_obesenemu_NJb8
Take the map of the underground from the hanging thief.
从吊死的小偷身上取走地下地图。
u33__ande_vrat_ukradene_v_Aqtu
Return the stolen items to Master Schindel.
将失窃之物还给辛德尔大师。
u44__kopie_pockej_na_vysl_SGYb
Wait for the outcome of the duel.
等待决斗结果。
u44__kopie_prezij_JYDi
Survive!
活下来！
u66__ande_najdi_ukradene__l5a9
Find the stolen items in the underground hideout.
在地下藏身处找到被偷的物品。
ubran_tvrz_musime_ubranit_dezO
We must defend the walls and repel the frontal assault on the fortress. If we can cool our enemies' heads down, I'm certain we'll be able to parley. Now we have to withstand the attack at all costs!
我们必须守住城墙，击退针对堡垒的正面袭击。如果我们能让敌人冷静下来，想必我们就有了谈判的余地，但是现在我们必须不惜一切代价抵挡他们的进攻。
ubran_tvrz_prazane_nakone_WMWx

The Praguers eventually penetrated the fortress. We saved ourselves in a stone dungeon and hoped there would be negotiations. But we didn't know what a fiendish ace Sir Otto von Bergow would pull out his sleeve. The castle tower was hit by a shot from a gigantic cannon. An awful crash, noise and the rattling of stones ended our desperate defence of the fortress.
布拉格人最终还是攻破了堡垒，躲藏于石制地牢里的我们得以幸存，同时还期盼着能够进行谈判。但是像奥托·冯·波尔高这种心狠手辣的人，我们也无法预料他会使出什么手段。后来，城堡塔楼受到一门大炮的重创，一瞬间，地动山摇，碎石滚落，打断了我们对堡垒的拼死防卫。
udej_horn_rchtar_nechal_s_pxB3
The bailiff dealt with Markold and the miners and I got my deserved reward.
执行官处理了马尔科和矿工们，我得到了应有的奖励。
udelej_do_clovek_mini_a_b_cKBF
Man plans and God laughs. I wanted speak to innkeeper Havel, but the reaper came for him before I got the chance.
人算不如天算。我本想去找旅馆老板哈维尔谈谈，但还没来得及，死神就已将他带走。
udelej_do_nejprve_jsem_me_KAvF

First I was supposed to go to The Emperor Charles tavern and speak to Havel, the owner of the establishment. According to Casper, he knows something about the monastery secret. Unfortunately, I didn't make good enough company for Havel, and he didn't tell me anything.
首先，我要去查理皇帝酒馆，与酒馆老板哈维尔交谈。据卡斯帕说，他知道一些关于修道院的秘密。不幸的是，哈维尔不喜欢跟我聊天，没有告诉我任何事情。
udelej_do_nejprve_mam_zaj_gLyI

First, I'm to go to The Emperor Charles tavern and speak to Havel, the owner of the establishment. He's related to the vineyard custodian and also likes to brag about his wine knowledge, so he might let something slip. I should dress well for such an occasion.
首先，我要去查理皇帝酒馆，与酒馆老板哈维尔交谈。他与葡萄园管理员是亲戚，也喜欢吹嘘自己的葡萄酒知识，所以他可能会说漏嘴。我应该为这样的场合好好打扮一下。
udelej_do_zasel_jsem_do_s_gY8E

I went to The Emperor Charles tavern to try and make an impression on Havel. After having a few cups of wine, he shared a lot with me. I found out he brings supplies to the vineyard from time to time. Among other things, he brings sealed crates that smell strange.
我去了查理皇帝酒馆，试图给哈维尔留下印象。几杯酒下肚之后，他跟我分享了很多。我发现他时不时地给葡萄园带来补给。除了其他补给，他还带来了气味奇怪的密封箱子。

Weaponsmith

ukaz_se_b_diky_bozene_mi__mmML
Thanks to Bozhena I feel a lot better and I'm back on my feet. Sir Hans is going to need a remedy for his fever, so I have to get hold of some fresh herbs.
多亏了博珍娜，我感觉好多了，身体恢复好转。汉斯大人需要退烧药，我得去采摘一些新鲜草药。
ukaz_se_b_postaral_jsem_s_QrVN
I took care of myself the way Bozhena wanted. I have to ask her how Sir Hans is coming along.
我按照博珍娜的要求安顿好了自己。得问问她汉斯大人的情况。
ukonci_za_domluvil_jsem_p_nE7L
I told the hired hands to find some other form of entertainment. These are troubled times and they might provoke someone. I should tell the bailiff he doesn't need to worry about it any longer.
我让那些雇工们更换其它的娱乐方式，毕竟如今世态险恶，没准他们哪天就惹到了别人。而现在我也该将事情的结果告诉执行官，他也无需再为此操心。
ukonci_za_miskovickemu_ry_7jCy

The Miskowitz bailiff is upset, the local men have set up a fight club. He thinks it'll only attract problems, or worse. He didn't ask me to intervene directly, but he didn't explicitly forbid it either.
据说附近的人们开办了一个搏击俱乐部，米斯科维茨执行官为此尤为烦恼，因为他认为如此活动只会招致麻烦，甚至引发祸乱。他虽没有开口要求我介入此事，但也没有明令禁止。
ukonci_za_miskovickemu_ry_d1dF

The Miskowitz bailiff is upset, the local men have set up a fight club. He thinks it'll only attract problems, or worse. He doesn't want to explicitly punish the hired hands, but he asked me to talk to them.
据说附近的人们开办了一个搏击俱乐部，米斯科维茨执行官为此尤为烦恼，因为他认为如此活动只会招致麻烦，甚至引发祸乱。他并不想将那些涉事的雇工捉拿归案，但希望我能去跟他们谈谈。
ukonci_za_miskovicky_rych_rfMO
The Miskowitz bailiff thanked me for solving his problem with fights. Hopefully he'll be able to handle the rest of the problems himself.
米斯科维茨执行官很感激我协助他处理有关搏击的问题，但愿他今后能够在办案过程中一帆风顺。
ukovej_sa_jolanda_je_mrtv_R7U5
Alas, since Aranka is dead now, I don't have to forge the sabre.
唉，既然阿兰卡已经身亡，我也不必再锻造军刀了。
ukovej_sa_proklivava_savl_YAed
I forged a sabre for the Voivode and quenched it in the cursed water.
我为司令官打造了一把军刀，并把它放在诅咒之水中进行了淬炼。
ukovej_sa_pry_mam_vyrobit_K7LP

Aranka from the nomads' camp told me that the Voivode had been cursed. She gave me soot water in which I am supposed to quench the sabre so that I can transfer the curse that has been dissolved in the water since the Voivode washed in it.
我从游民营地的阿兰卡那里得知，司令官遭到了诅咒。她给了我一些煤灰水，司令官曾在这水中沐浴，而我将用这些水淬炼军刀，如此一来便可把溶于水中的诅咒转移到军刀上。
ukradenyk_hastal_zemrel_t9m2
Hashtal died.
哈斯塔尔死了。
ukradenyk_najdi_tabor_a_k_yGfs
Find the thieves' camp.
寻找盗贼营地。
ukradenyk_nasedni_na_kone_CubZ
Mount the horse.
骑上马。
ukradenyk_odved_kone_na_m_1EfE
Take the horse to the Maleshov stud farm.
将马带到马列索夫种马场。
ukradenyk_rekni_hastalovi_315s
Talk to Hashtal.
与哈斯塔尔交谈。
ukradni_b_podle_pavla_byc_QVPT
Pavel said I should steal the new shoes from Vejmola the cobbler. He even gave me a key to the house so I could get inside.
帕维尔让我从鞋匠维约莫拉那里偷走新鞋。他甚至还把他们家的钥匙给了我，这样我就可以进去了。
ukradni_b_podle_pavla_jse_2NRa
Pavel said I should steal the new shoes from Vejmola the cobbler. He even gave me a key to the house so I could get inside. Now that I've got the shoes, I have to take them to Pavel.
帕维尔让我从鞋匠维约莫拉那里偷走新鞋。他甚至还把他们家的钥匙给了我，这样我就可以进去了。现在我已取得那双新鞋，该把它们带给帕维尔了。
ukradni_b_tomas_od_kolina_zUxz
The plan is clear. To the left below the tournament enclosure cuman Basan has a white tent with green trim along the top. I'm supposed to sneak in there and steal a sword called The Absolver.
库曼人巴桑的营地就在比武场地下方的左侧，他的帐篷显白色，顶部装点着绿色配饰。计划很明了，我得潜入帐篷里，偷走一把名为“赦免者”的剑。
ukradni_b_zmocnil_jsem_se_6N5Q
I've stolen Basan's sword The Absolver.
我偷走了巴桑的佩剑“赦免者”。
ukradni_h_hrebik_mam_ZtYF
I managed to steal the sacred nail.
我成功偷到了神圣的钉子。
ukradni_h_v_krovech_nejak_h5IY
There's supposed to be a sacred nail hidden in the rafters of a house in the Czech Quarter. But it won't be there for long if I can help it.
有传言称捷克区里有一座房屋的椽子上藏着一枚神圣的钉子。但如果我能做到的话，那枚钉子不久就会消失了。
ukradni_k_mistni_farar_an_FuYR
Father Anthony, the parish priest, has been copying out a book for ages. If I can steal it, Pivetz would find himself on the receiving end of the Holy Church's wrath.
教区的一位牧师，也就是神父安东尼，多年来一直在抄写一本书。如果我把书偷走，维茨将会感受到来自神圣教会的怒火。
ukradni_k_mistnimu_farari_IqJ6
I stole the book Father Anthony's been working on for ages. When it turns out that Pivetz took it, the wrath of the Holy Church will come down on him.
我偷走了神父安东尼多年来含辛茹苦抄写的书籍。要是人们发现它落入了维茨的囊中，圣教会的怒火将会降临到他的头上。
ukradni_l_listina_je_jina_7gbJ
The document is at the Rathaus in Troskowitz, which is where I should get it from.
文件在特罗斯科维茨的市政厅，我得去那里才能拿到。
ukradni_l_listina_je_jina_UMsR

The document is at the Rathaus in Troskowitz, which is where I should get it from. I should look for it in a chest of stolen items in the Rathaus basement. Zinek himself had one of the keys to it, but it fell under a bed in the room next door. I can also pinch one from any of the guards in Troskowitz.
文件在特罗斯科维茨的市政厅，我得去那里才能拿到。我应该去市政厅地下室的一个赃物箱寻找。齐内克本人有一把钥匙，但它掉在隔壁房间的床底下了。我也可以从特罗斯科维茨的随便哪个守卫身上偷一把。
ukradni_l_listinu_jsem_v__QY6t
I found the document at the Troskowitz Rathaus.
我在特罗斯科维茨市政厅找到了那份文件。
ukradni_l_listinu_mi_stra_qCWy
The guards took the document from me. At least I know I can find it in the chest of stolen items.
警卫们从我这里拿走了文件。至少我知道我可以在赃物箱里找到它。
ukradni_l_nakonec_jsem_kr_WorK
In the end I happily gave Kreyzl what he deserved. Justice.
最后我愉快地向克雷泽回敬他应得的东西，正义。
ukradni_m_menhartuv_stude_0460

Menhard's student and companion Arne devised an ingenious plan to get back at the Kuttenbergers. We'll use their brotherhood sword to make it look like the Kuttenbergers themselves have issued a challenge to the Germans, the Germans will accept and Menhard will get his satisfaction. However, this plan required my help. I accepted and managed to acquire the sword of the Kuttenberg swordfighting brotherhood.
门哈德的徒弟阿耳涅想到了一个能够报复库滕堡人的妙招。我们将借助库滕堡兄弟会的剑制造假象，让人们认为是他们亲自向这两位德国人发起了挑战，而德国人也会接受挑战，门哈德的意愿也将得到满足。然而，如此计划却需要我的协助，我也答应了他们的请求，最终也取得了那把库滕堡剑术兄弟会的剑。
ukradni_m_menhartuv_stude_4bzj

Menhard's student and companion Arne devised an ingenious plan to get back at the Kuttenbergers. We'll use their brotherhood sword to make it look like the Kuttenbergers themselves have issued a challenge to the Germans, the Germans will accept and Menhard will get his satisfaction. But somehow, and unfortunately in no small part thanks to me, the whole thing went horribly wrong, the plan was doomed to failure and Menhard won't be able to defend his claim anymore.
门哈德的徒弟阿耳涅想到了一个能够报复库滕堡人的妙招。我们将借助库滕堡兄弟会的剑制造假象，让人们认为是他们亲自向这两位德国人发起了挑战，而德国人也会接受挑战，门哈德的意愿也将得到满足。但不知怎的，整件事情陷入了无法挽回的境地，而这一切很大程度上得“归功”于我。这场计划注定难逃失败的命运，门哈德将再也无法捍卫他的诉求。
ukradni_m_menhartuv_stude_NVeD

Menhard's student and companion Arne devised an ingenious plan to get back at the Kuttenbergers. We'll use their ceremonial brotherhood sword to make it look like the Kuttenbergers themselves have issued a challenge to the Germans, the Germans will accept and Menhard will get his satisfaction. But in order to do that, they need a little help from me to inconspicuously get the sword from the Kuttenberg Fechthalle in Hradek district. I expect it'll be displayed on the wall in some place of honour.
门哈德的徒弟阿耳涅想到了一个能够报复库滕堡人的妙招。我们将借助库滕堡兄弟会的仪式剑制造假象，让人们认为是他们亲自向这两位德国人发起了挑战，而德国人也会接受挑战，门哈德的意愿也将得到满足。但为了达成以上目的，他们需要我到赫拉德克区的库滕堡剑术馆内将那把剑取走，希望它能挂在一个显眼的地方。
ukradni_m_menhartuv_stude_SCCe

Menhard's student and companion Arne devised an ingenious plan to get back at the Kuttenbergers. We'll use their brotherhood sword to make it look like the Kuttenbergers themselves have issued a challenge to the Germans, the Germans will accept and Menhard will get his satisfaction. It must have been my fate, because I had already visited the swordfighting hall and, umm, borrowed the sword. Must have been a divine providence.
门哈德的徒弟阿耳涅想到了一个能够报复库滕堡人的妙招。我们将借助库滕堡兄弟会的剑制造假象，让人们认为是他们亲自向这两位德国人发起了挑战，而德国人也会接受挑战，门哈德的意愿也将得到满足。我的命运定当如此，毕竟我早已走访过那家剑术馆，然后还，呃，“借”走了那把剑，这简直就是上帝神圣的旨意。
ukradni_m_menhartuv_stude_UcTH

Menhard's student and companion Arne devised an ingenious plan to get back at the Kuttenbergers. We'll use their brotherhood sword to make it look like the Kuttenbergers themselves have issued a challenge to the Germans, the Germans will accept and Menhard will get his satisfaction. I got the sword, but I got caught and the sword was confiscated by the guard. I have to get the sword back from them.
门哈德的徒弟阿耳涅想到了一个能够报复库滕堡人的妙招。我们将借助库滕堡兄弟会的剑制造假象，让人们认为是他们亲自向这两位德国人发起了挑战，而德国人也会接受挑战，门哈德的意愿也将得到满足。我拿到了那把剑，但却被逮住了，警卫们也已把剑收走。我必须从他们那里把剑弄回来。
ukradni_m_pametni_mince_j_yyRw
The coin is already jingling in my pocket.
这枚硬币已经被我收入囊中了。
ukradni_m_pri_stavbe_bara_TODy
In the tavern opposite the Town Hall, there's supposed to be a commemorative coin hidden in the building's foundation. I have to find it and take it without being noticed.
在市政厅对面的酒馆里，据说有一枚纪念硬币藏在其地基之中。我得找到它，并在不被察觉的情况下拿走它。
ukradni_p_nade_dverma_nej_xYQI
I heard the tailor at the Horse Market has a horseshoe hanging over his door for good luck. It would be a shame if someone stole it.
我听说马市边的裁缝在门上方悬挂了一只马蹄铁以求好运。如果有人偷走了它，那就太可惜了…
ukradni_p_podkovu_mam_vneA
I stole the horseshoe right from the tailor's wall.
我从裁缝家的墙上偷走了马蹄铁。
ukradni_p_podle_pavla_byc_9NsI
According to Pavel, it wouldn't be hard to steal old Bohushka's ring. He said the old woman's a bit barmy and spends all day making pies. It's likely she takes the ring off while she's working.
帕维尔认为，欲要偷走老博胡斯卡的戒指并非难事。据说这位老妇人略有痴呆，整日都在埋头制作馅饼，所以她很可能会在工作时将戒指取下。
ukradni_p_podle_pavla_jse_w4Kq

According to Pavel, I was supposed to steal old Bohushka's ring. He said it would be easy as the old woman's a bit barmy. Barmy's too weak a word. She put her ring in one of the pies by mistake and it's a miracle I didn't lose a tooth.
依照帕维尔的要求，我得偷走老博胡斯卡的戒指。据说这位老妇人有些糊涂，所以要想偷走戒指并不困难。而现在看来糊涂远不足以形容她的痴呆，谁曾想到她无意间竟将戒指落在了馅饼里，没把我的牙齿吃坏简直就是个奇迹。
ukradni_r_dalsi__co_bych__iTzy
Another thing I could steal is Ursula's ma's rosary. It seems she keeps it on all the time except at night.
我要偷的另一件东西就是乌苏拉妈妈的念珠。她好像一整天都把念珠带在身上，除了晚上。
ukradni_r_dalsi_co_jsem_m_Iy4R
Another thing I was supposed to steal was Ursula's ma's rosary. And steal it I did.
我要偷的另一件东西就是乌苏拉妈妈的念珠，我也已经将其偷走。
ukradni_t_majku_jsem_odri_t70x
I cut down the maypole, but I didn't manage to pick it up. It was probably taken by one of the Tachov fellahs. I couldn't get it.
我砍倒了那根五朔节花柱，但是没能把它取走。估计是某位塔霍夫人拿走了它，所以我才没能拿到。
ukradni_t_olbram_chce_aby_2IeP

Olbram wants me to steal the maypole from the Tachov gang, but they probably keep a good eye on it. I need to come up with a plan - asking around in Tachov might help. I could try asking that Prochek fellah, as Olbram said.
奥尔布拉姆想让我从塔霍夫人那里偷走五朔节花柱，但那东西估计正被他们严加看管着。我得想想办法，到塔霍夫四处打探一番或许会有帮助。奥尔布拉姆也说过让我问问那个普罗切克。
ukradni_t_olbram_me_nachy_WVvx
Olbram blames me for painting on his bull. He got pretty mad and doesn't want anything to do with me anymore.
关于我在他公牛身上涂鸦一事，奥尔布拉姆对我百般责备，怒不可遏的他不想再与我有任何瓜葛。
ukradni_t_olbramovi_uz_bu_6nSr
Olbram won't care about any maypole anymore.
奥尔布拉姆不会再操心任何五朔节花柱的事情了。
ukradni_t_olbram_zelejovs_oHAl
Olbram of Zhelejov wanted me to steal Tachov's maypole. I told the Tachov chaps everything instead.
哲勒约夫的奥尔布拉姆想让我偷走塔霍夫人的五朔节花柱，而我却将此事告诉了那些塔霍夫人。
ukradni_t_promluvil_jsem__TANe
I talked to Prochek about the maypole - the pride of the whole village. Now I just have to steal it at some unguarded moment.
我和普罗切克聊了聊五朔节花柱，那是整个村子的骄傲。但现在我要趁无人看守的时候把它偷走。
ukradni_t_sebral_jsem_tac_tKsN
I took the maypole from the Tachov lot, even though they were guarding it well.
尽管塔霍夫人对五朔节花柱严加看管，但我还是拿走了它。
ukradni_t_tachovaci_si_me_JBk0
The Tachov gang noticed me and wanted to beat me up. There was nothing I could do - I took to my heels and let the maypole be.
那帮塔霍夫人发现了我，还想把我暴打一顿。别无选择的我只能拔腿就跑，不管那根五朔节花柱了。
ukradni_t_tachovaci_si_me_WO3a
I was spotted and caught by the Tachov gang. I can forget about the maypole now.
我被那些塔霍夫人抓了个现行，现在就不用惦记那根五朔节花柱了。
ukradni_t_to_nedopadlo_mo_WU5L
It was supposed to be just a bit of fun, but somebody died. Now nobody will be in the mood for practical jokes.
本来只是小小的恶作剧，最终却闹出了人命，现在也没人有心思再去耍把戏了。
ukradni_t_urizl_jsem_tach_zvaG
I cut down Tachov's maypole, but the piece I need fell. I have to grab it quickly.
我砍倒了塔霍夫的五朔节花柱，但是我需要的那部分掉了，我得赶紧拿到它。
ukradni_v_hospodska_beta__Yoj5

Betty the innkeeper confirmed she's the proud owner of the last two bottles of Mintha in the region. I suppose she wouldn't be too upset if she lost one of them, would she? I reckon she carries one of them around with her, and perhaps the other is in her chest?
旅馆老板贝蒂证实，她很自豪地拥有当地最后两瓶薄荷香水。我想，如果她丢了其中一瓶也不会太难过吧？我估计她会随身带着一瓶，另一瓶可能在她的柜子里？
ukradni_z_stulec_moc_neve_6vsB

Knuckles believed in a full purse rather than Wycliffe's teachings. He said I could earn a few groschen by stealing an expensive bottle of wine from the Sigismund's warehouse for him. I found the bottle, but it is up to me whether I sell it to Knuckles or to someone else. Or perhaps I could enjoy the fine Italian wine myself.
与威克里夫的说教相比，巧指始终相信鼓鼓的钱包更得人心。他让我从西格斯蒙德的仓库里帮他偷走一瓶昂贵的红酒，还说我能赚到点钱。我已经找到了那瓶红酒，但是现在是要把它卖给巧指还是其他人，将由我做主，或者我还可以独自享受这瓶意大利美酒。
ukradni_z_stulec_moc_neve_EcUE

Knuckles believes in a full purse rather than Wycliffe's teachings. He said I could earn a few groschen by stealing an expensive bottle of wine from the Sigismund's warehouse for him. All I have to do is find it.
与威克里夫的说教相比，巧指始终相信鼓鼓的钱包更得人心。他让我从西格斯蒙德的仓库里帮他偷走一瓶昂贵的红酒，还说我能赚到点钱。现在我要做的事情就是找到那瓶红酒。
umisti_so_mel_jsem_umisti_t1ce

I should have placed the powder keg down in the adit, but instead I ran off into the night and left the guildsmen to their fate. The operation was called off, and I can be proud for saving Sigismund's source of silver. I shouldn't show my face around the Hole in the Wall for a while, I think the guildsmen wouldn't be too happy to see me.
我本该将火药桶放置在矿洞里，但最后却选择了逃跑，一头扎进了夜色之中，任由那些公会成员自生自灭。先前的行动就此终结，而我保住了西格斯蒙德的银矿来源，理应感到骄傲自豪。往后的一段时间里我也不该再在“墙洞”中露面，要是让那些公会成员再看到我，他们没准会气不打一处来。
umisti_so_musim_polozit_s_qAUs

Everything is ready and the mine is empty, because everyone has run off to extinguish the fire that the guildsmen have lit to divert attention. Now it's up to me to carry the powder keg down to the adits and place it at the backbone shaft. The best place is said to be deeper in the mine, at one of the shafts - I should look for a beam marked with a red scarf.
一切准备就绪，矿洞也已清空，因为所有人都跑去扑灭公会成员为了调虎离山而生起的火焰了。现在，由我负责将火药桶带到矿洞之中，将其放置在主矿井里。据说最佳引爆点就在矿洞深处的一个矿井内，而我得找到一根由红色围巾标记的横梁。
umisti_so_umistil_jsem_so_rtgy
I placed the barrel in the main shaft and prepared the fire.
我将火药桶放置在了主矿井当中，并做好了点火准备。
umrel_ber_chudak_beruska__7UUZ
Poor Darling's already in God's hall. At least he'll finally get some holy respite from Stanley and others like him.
可怜的达令最终还是踏进了上帝的圣堂里，至少他终于逃离了斯塔尼克等人的欺凌，得到了喘息的机会。
umrel_bre_bez_bretislava__AbyC
There'll be no more fights without Bohunek.
没有波胡内克，将无法再进行搏斗。
umrel_fia_bez_fialy_uz_za_qMx5
There'll be no more fights without Fiala.
没有菲亚拉，将无法再进行搏斗。
umrel_hos_bez_skviry_uz_s_7UHO
There'll be no more fights without Mole.
摩尔不在，搏击无法进行。
umrel_jen_jenik_je_v_panu_MbnM
Hensel has kicked the bucket, so no more fights in the mill for me
亨泽尔已死，我不用继续在磨坊搏斗
umrel_joh_bez_johana_uz_z_0COn
There'll be no more fights without Hannes.
没有汉尼斯，将无法再进行搏斗。
umrel_kre_mlynar_krejzl_j_XmRF
Miller Kreyzl has kicked the bucket, so no more fights for me.
磨坊主克雷泽已死，我不用继续搏斗。
umrel_mal_malik_je_v_panu_rSqU
Malik has kicked the bucket, so no more fights in the mill for me.
马利克已死，我不用继续在磨坊搏斗。
umrel_opi_bez_zavise_uz_s_chFW
There'll be no more fights without Zavish.
缺少扎维什就无法再进行搏击。
umrel_vav_bez_vavrince_uz_eDpN
There'll be no more fights without Lawrence.
没有劳伦斯，将无法再进行搏斗。
umrel_vaz_vazoun_umrel_je_d4yb
Goliath died before I could challenge him to a fight. Maybe Mole will tell me what to do next.
我还没能向歌利亚发起挑战他就死了，还是去问问摩尔接下来我该做什么吧。
umrel_vira_vira_je_v_panu_ySCD
Vira has kicked the bucket, so no more fights in the mill for me.
威拉已死，我不用继续在磨坊搏斗。
umrel_zeb_bez_damiana_uz__TVcO
There'll be no more fights without Damian.
达米安不在，搏击将无法进行。
umyj_se_u_aby_se_se_mnou__Vj1G
If I want anyone to talk to me, I'll have to wash the filth off myself at the trough.
我必须到水槽那边将身上冲洗干净，不然谁会愿意跟我交谈呢。
umyj_se_u_jsem_spinavy_a__6rfx
I'm dirty and smelly. I should wash at the trough.
现在的我浑身又脏又臭，得到水槽那里梳洗一番。
unfriendly__event_caption_9cDC
Camp.
营地。
unfriendly__event_descrip_pLe6
You come to a small camp at the wayside. There's a group of men sitting there. They don't look too friendly.
你来到了路边的一处小营地，里边正坐着一群人，但他们看起来并不友好。
unfriendly__player_caption_nb6z
Camp.
营地。
unfriendly__player_descri_kiRj
You come to a small camp at the wayside. There's a group of men sitting there. They don't look too friendly.
你来到了路边的一处小营地，里边正坐着一群人，但他们看起来并不友好。
uprchi_s__cely_se_to_ale__A895

Things got a bit complicated because Hans Capon refuses to flee through the secret passageway. I had to change the plan. We ultimately managed to get through the fortress and grab some horses without being seen. We escaped through the main gate and left the Maleshov Fortress far behind us.
事情变得有点复杂。汉斯·卡蓬拒绝从秘密通道逃跑。我不得不改变计划。我们最终穿过了堡垒，弄到了马匹，且没被察觉。我们从正门逃出，把马列索夫堡垒远远甩在身后。
uprchi_s__cely_se_to_ale__YlAs

Things took a complicated turn because Hans refused to flee through the secret passageway. I had to change the plan. In the end, we managed to seize some horses. But our disappearance had already been noticed in the fortress. Nevertheless, we escaped through the main gate and left Maleshov Fortress far behind us.
事情变得有点复杂。汉斯爵士拒绝从秘密通道逃跑。我不得不改变计划。最终，我们弄到了一些马。但堡垒的人发现了我们的失踪。尽管如此，我们还是从正门逃出，把马列索夫堡垒远远甩在身后。
uprchi_s__cely_se_to_pone_n9A9
Things got a bit complicated. Sir Hans refuses to flee through the passageway, so we will have to find another way to escape from Maleshov.
事情变得有点复杂。汉斯爵士拒绝从暗道逃跑，所以我们必须找到另一种方法来逃离马列索夫。
uprchi_s__ptacek_si_odmit_0paR

Capon refused to escape through the passageway, so I tricked him into it... Actually, to be more precise, I knocked him out and with Chevalier Brabant's help I got him out of the fortress through the secret passageway. We escaped on Hashtal's horses and left Maleshov Fortress far behind us.
卡蓬拒绝从暗道逃跑，所以我把他骗了过去…实际上，更准确地说，我把他打晕了，在布拉班特骑士的帮助下，把他从秘密通道带出了堡垒。我们骑着哈斯塔尔的马逃走，把马列索夫堡垒远远甩在身后。
urezej_ov_uz_vim_kam_se_o_SbFu
I know where the sheep went and I just need to cut her ear off.
我知道羊到哪去了，我只需要把她的耳朵切下来。
urezej_ov_ziskal_jsem_usi_QchH
I got the ear.
我拿到耳朵了。
uselambas_misto_cele_ovce_mQkq
To lure the wolves, it'll be enough to lay the meat next to the jagged birch trees on the slope.
要想引出那些狼，在山坡上那些树枝繁密的桦树旁放置肉块足矣。
uselambas_nastrazil_jsem__4dS9
I decided to use meat as bait instead of a whole sheep.
我决定使用肉块作为诱饵，而不是一整只羊。
uspi_lacka_lacek_spinka_d_XMDT
I did it! I poured the sleeping potion into Latsek's tankard unobserved!
我做到了！我神不知鬼不觉地把安眠药倒进了拉塞克的酒杯里。
uspi_lacka_sakra_tak_uspa_urJ3
I was supposed to pour the sleeping potion into Latsek's tankard, but I failed! Damn it! What now?
我本该把安眠药水倒进拉塞克的酒杯，但我失败了！妈的！现在怎么办？
uspi_lacka_ted_toho_troub_14g3
When the time is right, I have to pour the sleeping potion into Latsek's tankard. Above all, he can't see me doing it!
时机成熟时，我得把安眠药水倒进拉塞克的酒杯。最重要的是，不能让他看到我的小动作。
utec_nebo_mozna_jsem_se_n_djMN

I may have gotten a bit carried away in the heat of battle, but then again, they're the ones that attacked me! I don't expect to be greeted with open arms in Tachov or Zhelejov after what I pulled though.
在激烈的战斗中，我可能有点忘乎所以，但话说回来，是他们攻击了我！在此之后，我不指望在塔霍夫或哲勒约夫会受到热情迎接。
utec_nebo_tachovaci_a_zel_s7L0
The Tachovites and Zhelejovites ganged up on me! They figured out I was working for both sides, and now they want to beat me up.
塔霍夫人和哲勒约夫人联合起来对付我！他们发现我是两面派，现在想揍我一顿。
utec_nebo_tachovaci_i_zel_pR2F
The Tachovites and Zhelejovites calmed down and they'll leave me alone, but I should be more careful to not fall for a trap like that again.
塔霍夫人和哲勒约夫人冷静下来，他们会放过我，但我应该更加小心，不要再上这样的当。
utec_nebo_utekl_jsem_OxQT

When it comes to fistfights, I can't exactly hold my own, but I sure know how to run away from them. Especially when half the region gangs up against me… I suppose I could go back to the pasture, or I could just wait it out.
我没什么打架的本事，但逃跑可是一把好手。尤其是半个镇子的人都打算揍我一顿的时候......估计现在已可返回，或者，再等等。
utec_nebo_v_cestnem_pestn_s9Yc
I ain't the best fistfighter in the world, especially when half the brawlers in the country are up against me. So I didn't end up too well.
在拳脚功夫方面我并不在行，更何况半个地区的人都合起伙来对付我。所以我的下场不是太好。
utecte_pr_cely_nas_uprk_b_5nYD
The escape was hellish. Ramparts full of murderers shooting us like rabbits, looters robbing houses and murdering people in their yards…
真是场暗无天日的逃难。城墙之上挤满恶徒，将我们视作猎物，无情射杀。掠夺者们洗劫民居，还在庭院中滥杀无辜......
utecte_pr_jedina_jeste_be_wurH
Samuel will try to hold off the enemies, but his mother and I have to escape to the synagogue through the backyards.
塞缪尔将留下断后，而我和他的母亲则必须穿过后院逃到犹太教堂。
utec_ven__no_tak_jsem_to__N2dj
Well... I didn't make it...
好吧......我没把事办成......
utec_ven__utec_ven_GCbj
The fuse started to burn very quickly and there isn't much time left before the explosion! I have to get out quickly!
引线正快速地燃烧着，引爆前留给我逃跑的时间可不多！我必须赶快逃出去！
utec_ven__utikat_spletity_NAaM
Running through a twisting labyrinth of tunnels before a barrel of black powder explodes is something I'd be very happy to avoid in my future life. I nearly got stuck in that shaft for good.
在黑火药爆炸前从一条错乱崎岖的坑道中逃生，像这样的经历我这辈子都不想再体验第二次。我差点就葬身于那条矿井之中了。
utikej_s__ptacek_se_ujmul_XQ2J
I have to stick close to Sir Hans.
我必须跟紧汉斯少主。
utkej_se__coz_se_ji_nakon_lkn3
I managed to win! Despite the state I was in, I made short work of the guard. It's one thing to practise fighting and another to have real experience, which the local garrison here clearly lacks.
我居然赢了！尽管我状态不佳，但还是轻松地搞定了那个守卫。平时练习打斗是一回事，真刀真枪干架又是另一回事，而这儿的驻军明显缺少实战经验。
utkej_se__katerinu_jsem_n_M0Uv
I tried my best, but I'm not in top form. The Suchdol guard trounced me… But it would have turned out differently if I'd been in better shape!
我已竭尽全力，但奈何身体状况并非最佳。苏赫多尔的守卫击溃了我......要是状态更好一些，我又怎么会落得此番下场！
utkej_se__musim_zvitezit__kTAq
I must win a duel against a local guard. My honour is at stake!
我必须在决斗中战胜当地警卫，不然我的荣誉岌岌可危！
utkej_se__sleduj_ho_zejS

The younger brother challenged Godwin to a duel because he'd insulted their father while trying to lure Alder away for a private chat. It seems Martin Oderin taught his younger son from an early age that his older brother was a drunkard and a layabout.
在试图将阿尔德引开以进行一次私人谈话的过程中，古德温冒犯了兄弟俩的父亲，因此弟弟便向古德温发起了决斗挑战。看来马丁·奥德林在他小儿子年幼时期就告诉过他，他的哥哥不过是个醉鬼和懒汉而已。
utkej_se__souboj_sice_pro_xRXc
The younger brother challenged Godwin to a duel for insulting their father. Martin Oderin didn't even bother to watch the fight.
古德温冒犯了兄弟俩的父亲，因此弟弟便向古德温发起了决斗挑战。马丁·奥德林连观看的兴趣都没有。
utkej_se__ztraceni_pachol_auv0

The lost hands were supposed to drive a cart to Semine, so I started my search there. I didn't expect a welcome from anyone, and even less so one of Lord Semine's jolly relatives wanting to start a fight. Nevertheless, I showed him what for and as soon as I did, the Semine captain of the guard showed up and put a stop to our fight.
失踪的工人当时应该正驾马车前往塞米，所以我从那里开始了搜寻。我没想过会受到什么人的欢迎，更没想到塞米大人一个开朗的亲戚想挑起一场搏斗。尽管如此，我还是给了他好看。而当我占得上风时，塞米警卫队长出面制止了我们的搏斗。
utkej_se__ztraceni_pachol_yYJh

The lost hands were supposed to drive a cart to Semine, so I started my search there. I didn't expect a welcome from anyone, and even less so one of Lord Semine's jolly relatives wanting to start a fight. Because of that, I got my arse kicked. Thankfully, the Semine captain of the guard showed up and put a stop to our fight.
失踪的工人当时应该正驾马车前往塞米，所以我从那里开始了搜寻。我没想过会受到什么人的欢迎，更没想到塞米大人一个开朗的亲戚想挑起一场搏斗。就因为这个，我被胖揍了一顿。幸好塞米警卫队长出面制止了我们的搏斗。

获得“小脑袋”的报酬。

utok_vesnice_horela_a_my__PctG

There was a large garrison at Maleshov that we managed to draw out of the fortress to extinguish the fire we'd set. Von Bergow's mercenaries assumed that a horrible fire had broken out in the village and didn't expect an enemy raid on the royal chamberlain's seat. The village was burning, and we gained the upper hand.
我们成功引出了马列索夫的大批守卫，让他们前去扑火。冯·波尔高的士兵们皆以为那不过是村庄意外失火，也未曾料到他们的敌人将突袭皇室总管的领地。烈火之下，我们占据了上风。
uvar_pole_musa_mi_poradi__B19R
Musa will give me advice about the best way to cook the shoes. I should bring them to him. I hope he wasn't joking around…
穆萨知道煲鞋子汤的诀窍，他能给我提供建议。我得把皮鞋拿给他，希望他不是在开玩笑…
uvar_pole_musa_nam_poradi_MQtL

Musa gave us advice about how to best cook soup out of the shoes, so we did it. Funny, he didn't eat it with us, but I think the soup will fill our stomachs for a while. If only it didn't taste like a shoe sole…
穆萨向我介绍了用皮鞋煲汤的诀窍，鞋子汤做成了。搞笑的是，他并没有跟我们一起享用。不管怎样这份汤都能让我们饱腹一阵子，只可惜它尝起来一股子鞋臭味…
uzavrete__s_vavakovymi_za_DXyt
With Vavak's records from the secret mint in my possession, I should return to Christian and conclude the investigation.
我已在秘密铸币厂内将瓦万克的记录弄到手，该回去找克里斯蒂安一同整理调查结论了。
uzavrete__s_vavakovymi_za_O3lF

I returned to Christian with Vavak's records from the secret mint. We concluded our investigation with the understanding that we finally held evidence of the fraud and could use it to blackmail Vavak.
我带着从秘密铸币厂中弄到的瓦万克的记录回到了克里斯蒂安那里。我们在整理调查结论时，一致认为我们终于有了欺诈事件的证据，或可借此证据要挟瓦万克。
vajdovakl_odevzdej_savli__8PMZ
Give the sabre to Aranka.
将军刀交给阿兰卡。
vajdovakl_ukovej_savli_5EWM
Forge the sabre.
锻造军刀。
vajdovakl_zabij_savli_psa_H4Mm
Kill a dog with the sabre.
使用军刀杀死一只狗。
varianta_1__player_caption_zquj
Sleeping man
沉睡的人
varianta_1__player_descri_dtFY
There's a man lying on the ground beside the road, and it looks like he's sleeping.
路边有一个人躺在地上，似乎正呼呼大睡。
vazoun_ze_vazoun_uz_ma_od_pbNL
Goliath has peace and quiet from fighting now.
歌利亚从搏斗中得到了安宁祥和。
vem_si_z__kovat_se_neda_j_op6f
I can't forge from thin air. I could run from pillar to post looking for iron, but luckily Radovan has a chest in his forge where I should find all I need.
我不能空手锻造。我本来要到处去寻找铁，但幸运的是，拉多万的铁匠铺里有一个箱子，里面应该有我所需要的一切。
venca_umr_bez_vency_zapas_znPt
Without Ventza, the fights can't begin.
文扎不在，搏击无法进行。
vezmi_kom_komori_ulrich_p_o5qk
Chamberlain Ulrich needs our help. He can't walk and Capon is going to try to save him. I have to cover them!
管家乌尔里希急需帮助。现在的他无法行走，卡蓬将尝试解救他，而我必须掩护他们！
vezmi_kom_ulrich_von_scha_7rgT
The last time I saw Chamberlain Ulrich, he was lying beneath a fallen horse with a broken leg. A shot from a handgun finished him off before I could do anything.
我最后一次见到管家乌尔里希时，他正躺在一只倒着的马匹下，一条腿已经骨折。当时的我还没来得及做出反应，一发手炮就结束了他的生命。
vezmi_si__tbd_ZdpK
Great, I got my own bed at Trosky, and all my gear was returned - I'll find it in my chest. I'm sure it will come in handy, and what's more, there's a gift from Lord von Bergow waiting for me.
一切尽如人意，我在特罗斯基有了歇脚的地方，而且所有的装备已经交还至我的手里——在我的箱子里就能找到。我相信那会派上用场的，此外，还有件来自冯·波尔高大人的礼物正等着我呢。
vezninatr_dojdi_ke_konim__Bndq
Continue south until the edge of Apollonia.
一路向南，行至阿波罗尼亚边界。
vezninatr_dojdi_na_konec__qO96
Accompany Zizka, Katherine and Godwin to the end of the passageway.
陪杰士卡、凯瑟琳、古德温一起走出密道。
vezninatr_najdi_klice_od__r88S
Find the castle keys.
找出城堡钥匙。

搜查冯·波尔高在少女塔内的房间，寻找西格斯蒙德国王的密令。
vezninatr_najdi_svoje_vec_SXHA
Get back your confiscated items.
取回被没收的物品。
vezninatr_najdi_zikmundov_A9xO

搜查伊斯特万的房间，寻找密令。

跟随古德温进入密道。

打开通往秘密通道的门。

搜查抄写员的房间，寻找密令。

Talk to Godwin about leaving.
和古德温谈谈离开的事。

Untie Mika.
给米卡松绑。

往南边走，前往裂成两半的岩石和破损马车处。
vezninatr_tmp_neco_v_campe_tsyy
Meet Mika in the abandoned camp.
到废弃营地内与米卡见面。

在岩石间穿行，往山上走。

杀死伊斯特万。

查明维多利亚所经历的事。

vrat_havi_nasel_jsem_zast_sNSo

vrat_se_d_neohlasena_audi_NKS5

The unannounced audience ended as badly as it could, and Cardinal Pozzo and his entire retinue are dead. However, the welcoming ceremony is fast approaching and with it our only chance to get to the Italian Court. We must pretend to be the legate's retinue and hope for a miracle. Godwin is taking the place of the legate. I hope his Latin is better than his Italian. We have to quickly arrange everything we need and return to Ruthard Palace to see Zizka.
我等未经通报便擅自与红衣主教会面，而结果极为糟糕，红衣主教波佐和他的所有随从都已命丧黄泉。然而，那场欢迎仪式已迫在眉睫，那也是我们能进入意大利宫的唯一机会。我们必须假扮成特使随从，祈祷奇迹的发生。古德温也将顶替身份，假扮特使，但愿他的拉丁语说得比意大利语更好。我们必须尽快做好一切准备，回到鲁瑟德宫与杰式卡见面。
vrat_se_d_pozdeji_jsem_se_aXjr

随后，我返回了鲁瑟德宫。
vrat_se_k_jimram_se_me_po_3qZu

vrat_se_k_markoltova_smrt_oSpj

vrat_se_k_markoltova_smrt_rLIR

vrat_se_k_menhart_je_mrtv_26C8

事情做完了！现在我只需要回到矿工营地，为我出色的工作领取奖励。他们应该在营地里，营地应该在格兰德附近，一个叫苏科夫的山上的树林里。
vrat_se_k_prilis_jsem_se__crIY

我离公羊太远了，我应该回去。

我到了矿工营地，但事情开始变得复杂。

我来得太晚了，营地里所有人都被杀了。
vrat_se_k_s_panem_bergove_ncvD
We discussed all the information we acquired with Lord von Bergow and it's been decided. Me, Capon, Burgrave Hashek and some of his men are supposed to set out for Semine.
冯·波尔高大人与我们就获得的信息进行了商讨，最终做出了决定。我、卡蓬、哈舍克城伯以及他的部下将一同前往塞米。
vrat_se_k_trochu_se_to_se_otQ2

It didn't work out ideally with Markold, but he's no threat to us anymore. What's worse is that I didn't manage to free the captive miners. I should go back to Myslibor and the others and discuss what to do next. Most likely I'll find them in their camp, which is supposed to be somewhere near Grund, in a wood on a hill called Sukov.
马尔科那边的事处理得并不理想，但他已经对我们毫无威胁了。然而更糟糕的是，我没能解救被俘的矿工。我得回去找迈斯利博尔和其他人，商讨下一步计划。我应该能在他们的营地里找到他们，营地应该在格兰德附近，一个叫苏科夫的山上的树林里。
vrat_se_k_vratil_jsem_se__U5Yd

vrat_se_n_pan_bergovovi_j_f5iS

vrat_se_n_tvrz_v_dalce_ho_bUy7

vrat_se_r_kdo_vi_kde_ten__QnKr

这些家庭矛盾简直就像一场噩梦！无非就是什么张三找李四，好言相劝然后平息矛盾......我才不干。

vrat_se_r_sakra_snad_jsem_nADb

即便我找遍了磨坊，也没有看到磨坊主的身影。说不定我们正好绕过了彼此，或许他也因此碰巧避开了我，现在正在谋害那位可怜姑娘。我得赶快回去找她。

很遗憾，芙恩德拉在此期间不幸遇难，斯瓦塔娅也拒绝跟我谈话，那份遗产也因此无人认领。
vrat_se_s_donesl_jsem_hro_w86p

vrat_se_s_hura_uz_zase_ma_EgG8

vrat_se_s_mel_bych_donest_VsT4
Vasko is surely waiting for me to bring him a fresh bottle. I shouldn't dawdle. I certainly don't want to be in the forest for longer than necessary.

去他妈的钱。我够忙了。

我和玛格丽特要回草棚，我们要在那里分钱。

我回到了喝醉的安东那里。

vrat_se_z_byla_dost_rozru_7GLP

在经历了先前的一切后，她仍然感到忐忑不安，但愿她如今已经缓过了神来，我得去探望探望她。
vrat_se_z_byla_dost_rozru_iIIg
She was quite upset after everything that had happened, so I let her rest and came back to see her some time later.
在经历了先前的一切后，她仍然感到忐忑不安，所以我在她稍作休息后回来探望了她。
vrat_se_z_byla_dost_rozru_numK

She was quite upset after everything that had happened and asked me to come back to see her the following day, after she rested. But in the meantime, she died, putting an unexpected end to this story.
在经历了先前的一切后，她仍然感到忐忑不安，并请求我在她休息过后的第二天前来探望。但是在此期间，她却一命呜呼，这场闹剧出人预料地就此迎来了它的结局。
vrat_se_z_byla_dost_rozru_XiJU
She was quite upset after everything that had happened and asked me to come back to see her the following day, after she rested.
在经历了先前的一切后，依旧忐忑不安的她请求我让她休息，并于次日前去探望她。

It was hard work, but Lady Rosa finally returned home safe and sound.
尽管一路上困难重重，但罗莎小姐最终还是平安无事地回到了家。
vrat_se_z_cele_se_to_ale__vJQL
Somehow, and unfortunately in no small part thanks to me, the whole thing went horribly wrong. The plan was doomed to failure and Menhard won't be able to defend his claim anymore.
不知怎的，整件事情陷入了无法挽回的境地，而这一切很大程度上得“归功”于我。这场计划注定难逃失败的命运，门哈德将再也无法捍卫他的诉求。
vrat_se_z_cele_to_behani__4BWO
All that running around town was for naught and on top of all that, Lumir dropped dead. Without him we never got any further and the murderer remained unpunished.
在城内打探消息的努力全都白费了，更重要的是，卢米尔已经死亡。缺少了他的帮助，我们将无法再进行深入调查，而凶手仍在逍遥法外。
vrat_se_z_cele_to_behani__v91c

All that running around town was for naught. Our murderer was still somewhere in the city. We went back to the table we had left so quickly and finished our discussion. Our next plan was to get into the place we suspected we'd find the killer. To the house of the von Grolles.
在城内打探消息的努力全都白费了，我们要追查的凶手仍然在城中逍遥法外。先前匆匆离去的我们，又重新聚到了桌前进行了一番商讨。而我们的下一步计划则是要进入一处疑似凶手所在的民宅，也就是冯·格罗尔一家的宅邸。
vrat_se_z_cenek_si_ode_me_38QK
Chenyek copied the symbols from the parchment.
程叶科从羊皮纸上誊写下符号。
vrat_se_z_delam_ze_sebe_a_1QRn
I'm making a fool of myself. I'll give the blacksmith a piece of my mind!
我简直就像个傻子。我要把那个铁匠臭骂一顿！
vrat_se_z_delam_ze_sebe_a_TQNf
I'm just making a fool of myself. Enough of this.
我就像个傻子一样，真是受够了。
vrat_se_z_dostal_jsem_se__EIAW
I got myself into a dead end. There was nobody left alive to tell me anything. I had to go back to Christian, who put me on the right track.
我陷入了死胡同之中，能给我透露消息的人都已不复存在。我不得不回到克里斯蒂安那里，是他让我回到正轨。
vrat_se_z_falesny_poplach_2CIQ
False alarm. He was a murderer, but not the one we were looking for! All I can do now is return to Lumir and continue our interrupted conversation.
真是虚惊一场。此人确是个杀人凶手，但并非我们要找的那个！现在我就得回到卢米尔那里，重启我们之前的讨论。
vrat_se_z_francek_na_me_c_Lfs8
Franzi waited for me on the street in front of the tavern.
弗兰齐在酒馆前的街道上等着我。
vrat_se_z_hospodsky_zdesl_RSgC
The innkeeper Zdeslav gave me a nice reward and told me that they have similar fun in Horschan and even in the infamous dive The Hole in the Wall in Kuttenberg.
酒馆老板兹德斯拉夫给了我一份不错的报酬，还告诉我他们在霍斯昌和库滕堡一处被称为“墙洞”且臭名昭著的酒馆里发现了类似的消遣。
vrat_se_z_hospodsky_zemre_jydR
Unfortunately, Michael and George didn't care for the way I dealt with the innkeeper, so they swore at me and sent me packing. Bleeding hearts...
很遗憾，迈克尔和乔治对我处置酒馆老板的手段很是不满，所以他们咒骂着让我离开。可真是好心肠……
vrat_se_z_kdyz_jsem_komor_adzP
When I told the Chamberlain that Kvyeta would not return, he was furious, but he did not kick me out of the wedding. Apparently, he had enough on his plate as it was.
我将克维塔不打算归来一事告知管家后，他勃然大怒，但好在他没把我踢出婚宴。显然，他已经无暇再操劳此事。
vrat_se_z_kdyz_jsem_se_vr_qVTl
I should go back to Sir Hans. I discovered he got into a quarrel with some regulars.
汉斯少主与一些酒馆常客起了争执，我得回去找他。
vrat_se_z_krejzl_nic_z_to_gyB1
Kreyzl didn't need to know any of this. I mercifully lifted the weight of duty from him.
克雷泽不需要知道这些。我仁慈地解除了他身上的重担。
vrat_se_z_mel_bych_jit_zp_tdWW
I should go back to Svatava's hut and tell her the bad news.
我得回到斯瓦塔娅的家里，将这此噩耗告诉她。
vrat_se_z_mel_bych_nechut_NPeC
I should tell Natan what I managed to discover.
我得将我的见闻告知纳坦。
vrat_se_z_mel_bych_o_post_Uu3G
I got everything I could from the miners. I should report back to Christian.
我已向矿工打探到了需要的信息，得回去向克里斯蒂安进行汇报。
vrat_se_z_mel_bych_rict_m_K3N3
I should tell miller Hermann that I've rid Danemark of a dangerous gang of bandits.
我得告诉磨坊主赫尔曼，我已让丹恩麦磨坊摆脱了一群凶恶强盗的控制。
vrat_se_z_mel_bych_se_bet_CFXH
I should ask Betty if the council has met yet. Maybe she's got some news.
贝蒂那里或许有新消息，我得询问她是否已经遇到了议员。
vrat_se_z_mel_bych_se_vra_Bvx1
I should go back to Musa and tell him what I found in that book of his.
我得回到穆萨那里，将我在他书中的发现告诉他。
vrat_se_z_mel_bych_se_vra_jRw2
I should return for Anton and help him to the church.
我得回去找安东，并把他带到教堂。
vrat_se_z_mel_bych_se_vra_Stjs
I should get back to Franzi down on the street.
我得回到街上去找弗兰齐。
vrat_se_z_mel_bych_se_vra_t22g
I should return to Chenyek and let him copy the symbols.
我应该回到程叶科那里，让他誊写这些符号。
vrat_se_z_mel_bych_se_vra_v8N8
Nothing left to do but to return to Vasko and continue drinking.
现在就只能回到瓦斯科那里，继续喝酒。
vrat_se_z_mel_bych_se_vra_xJS7
I should go back to Sir Hans.
我得回到汉斯少主那里去。
vrat_se_z_mel_bych_slavov_t9Vb
I should tell Slava I don't have the bones.
我得告诉斯拉瓦我没拿到那些骨头。
vrat_se_z_mel_bych_svatav_sVq3
I should return to Svatava and give her what I found.
我得回到斯瓦塔娅那里，并将寻得之物交给她。
vrat_se_z_mel_bych_zpravi_NCtm
During the day, I should inform Menhard that everything is ready.
我应该在白天告诉门哈德，一切已准备就绪。
vrat_se_z_mel_jsem_se_zas_AGjB
I should have stopped by to see Betty, but it doesn't matter anymore. Nothing will come of the plan now.
我本该顺路去见见贝蒂，但是已经不重要了。这场计划如今毫无成果。
vrat_se_z_mlynar_bohuzel__7F5V
Unfortunately, the miller died before he could reveal the reason for his actions.
只可惜，磨坊主还没来得及展示他的最终成果就去世了。
vrat_se_z_mlynar_herman_n_mnJK
Miller Hermann never got his mill in Danemark back.
磨坊主赫尔曼没能夺回他在丹恩麦的磨坊。
vrat_se_z_mlynar_herman_z_Ql8C
Miller Hermann got his mill back, but nobody will ever return the life of his son.
磨坊主赫尔曼夺回了他的磨坊，但是他儿子的性命却再也回不来了。
vrat_se_z_mlynar_mi_slibi_CHZ9
The miller promised to finally tell what he'd been working on this whole time. When I'm ready, I should go and see him.
磨坊主终于答应告诉我他一直以来都在干什么了。等我准备好了，我就会去见他。
vrat_se_z_mohlo_me_napadn_iFGz

I should have realised it wouldn't be great to come at night. I'm should visit Menhard during the day, we'll go to the town hall and hear what the people of Kuttenberg have to say about it. I'm should act surprised, ha ha.
我早该意识到自己不应该晚上来。我应该白天再去与门哈德见面，我们也将前往市政厅，听取库滕堡市民们对此事的看法，到时我还得装出一副惊讶的模样呢，哈哈哈。
vrat_se_z_musim_se_vratit_lUfE
I have to return to Lord Semine and tell him what I saw.
我得回到塞米大人那，把我看到的告诉他。
vrat_se_z_musim_se_vratit_Vb5Z
I have to go back to Lord Semine and report to him what I saw.
我得回去找塞米大人，把我看到的报告给他。
vrat_se_z_nasledne_jsme_s_KMIg

Menhard, Arne and I then went to the town hall to hear what the Kuttenbergers had to say about it. They were really surprised, but the reaction of town Councillor Fridusch Kumel was the real crowning glory. He took Menhard's charter from the king into consideration and declared that whoever won the duel between the Germans and the Kuttenbergers and thus proved his mastery in the art of swordsmanship would also get the right to run the local swordfighting hall!
门哈德，阿耳涅和我一起前往市政厅，在那里听取了库滕堡市民们对此事的看法。在场的每一个人都很惊讶，但城镇议员弗里杜斯·库梅尔的反应才是最具价值的。议员考虑到了门哈德手中国王赋予的特许状，并宣称，无论是德国人还是库滕堡人，只要能证明自己剑术卓越，并在决斗中取胜，便可得到掌管此地剑术馆的资格！
vrat_se_z_nezbyva_nez_se__izcd
There's nothing for it but to go back to Peter.
现在我只能回去找彼得了。
vrat_se_z_obesel_jsem_ran_Yt1u
I visited the wounded men and gave them first aid. Now I should go back to Klara and tell her about it.
我查看了那些伤员，并及时医治了他们。现在我也该回到克拉拉那里汇报情况了。
vrat_se_z_obesel_jsem_vse_yhHM

I visited all the wounded men and gave them medication conscientiously. When I went back to see Klara, I wasn't nearly as covered in blood as she was. I had to admire her determination to help people. She was a veritable angel of mercy for the wounded men.
我查看了所有伤员，并认真治疗了他们。当我回去找克拉拉时，才发现她身上沾染的伤员血迹远远比我要多，我不得不称赞她救死扶伤的决意。对那些负伤的人们来说，她就是一个降临人间的天使。
vrat_se_z_odesel_jsem_z_h_9hbS
I dropped out of the procession and left drunken Anton to his fate.
我退出了游行队伍，让喝醉的安东自生自灭。
vrat_se_z_odevzdal_jsem_s_O8xI

I returned to Svatava and gave her what I found. Surprisingly, it wasn't so much about the money as the statuette of an ancestor, which symbolises her forebears as well the path towards a better tomorrow. I hope it brings her luck.
我回到了斯瓦塔娅那里，并将找到的东西交给了她。令人惊奇的是，他们的遗产无关钱财，反而是个祖上传下的小雕像。小小雕像象征着他们家族的祖上荣光以及一条通往美好未来的康庄大道，但愿它能给她带来好运。
vrat_se_z_osetrovani_rane_1G8e
I left the treatment of the wounded to someone more qualified.
我最终还是将伤员的救治工作留给了专业人士来办。
vrat_se_z_pani_roza_je_na_A2Wo
Fortunately, Lady Rosa is alright, just a bit shaken by the state of this place.
万幸的是，罗莎小姐安然无恙，只不过宫殿的状况让她稍感惊吓。
vrat_se_z_pani_roza_me_va_9Ail

Lady Rosa never ceases to amaze me. She can climb like a squirrel, and if you put a crossbow in her hands, she can be more dangerous than Kubyenka… and that's just to start with. It's a good thing the rest of our people won't be arriving until tomorrow morning.
罗莎小姐总是能让我惊掉下巴。她攀爬的身姿灵活得就像只松鼠；倘若弩箭在手，她简直比库宾卡还要令人胆寒......而这些仅仅是冰山一角。好消息是，我们的其他同伴明天早上就会抵达。
vrat_se_z_pasacku_smoliko_lDrm
I brought the shepherd Smoliek the ear from his lost sheep. He cried over his dead sheep, but he was glad I saved him from a beating.
我给斯莫利克带回了那只丢失的羊的耳朵。他为羊的死去而哭泣，但又为能免于惩罚而高兴。
vrat_se_z_p_kdyz_jsem_se__kSyC
When I got back to the hut there was nobody to be found. Who knows what happened to Svatava and her daughter…?
当我抵达木屋时，并未看到任何人的踪影，也不知斯瓦塔娅和她的女儿到底发生了什么…
vrat_se_z_p_kdyz_jsem_se__xAqD
When I got back to the hut, Svatava and Vendula were dead and the area was being combed by bandits… Why would anyone do such a terrible thing?
当我抵达木屋时，才发现斯瓦塔娅和芙恩德拉早已死去，周围也被强盗翻得一干二净…到底是什么人会做出如此残忍之事？
vrat_se_z_platner_me_posl_BTBD
The blacksmith sent me to a toilet instead of the devils and said he made a mistake. It was starting to look like he was just making fun of me, so I gave up on him.
铁匠把我派去了厕所而非魔鬼的出没地，还说是他搞混了。我开始怀疑他就是在玩弄我，所以便放弃了从他口中获得线索。
vrat_se_z_podarilo_se_mi__HC3i
I managed to help Siegfried and got rid of his flea-ridden blood-thirsty tormentors. He was delighted.
我成功帮助西格弗里德摆脱了那些满身跳蚤、嗜血成性的烦人精，他为此很是欣喜。
vrat_se_z_podkoni_mi_za_m_ChEa
The groom promised to reward me for my efforts. I hope It'll be something to eat.
那位马夫承诺过会给我提供酬劳，但愿他能给我点吃的。
vrat_se_z_podkoni_mi_za_m_qbDC
I told the groom how I fared with the untameable Boudica.
我尝试驯服桀骜不驯的波提卡，并将最终结果告诉了马夫。
vrat_se_z_porazil_jsem_vs_B76W
I defeated all the Horschan fighters. Thomlin claimed he would have some reward for the winner.
我击败了所有霍斯昌的搏击手，而托姆林也说过问鼎者将会得到奖赏。
vrat_se_z_porazil_jsem_vs_Oico
I beat all the local fighters and I can pick up my reward from the innkeeper.
我击败了此地的所有搏击手，是时候向酒馆老板获取我的报酬了。
vrat_se_z_porazil_jsem_vs_RGh2

I beat all the fighters in the area! The innkeeper Zdeslav gave me a nice reward and mentioned I could find someone I could persuade to fight in the cemetery in Kuttenberg. I don't know if he was joking or corpses rise from their graves at night, but I should definitely go and take a look there sometime.
方圆几里内再无对手！酒馆老板兹德斯拉夫给了我一笔丰厚的奖赏，还提到在库滕堡的墓园里我或许还能找到一个对手。也不知他到底是在开玩笑，还是说那个墓园晚上真的会闹鬼，总之我确实得找个时间到那里去瞧一瞧。
vrat_se_z_porazil_jsem_vs_rne5
I beat all the local fighters, Mole's going to be surprised.
我打败了此地所有的搏击手，摩尔要惊掉下巴咯。
vrat_se_z_promluvil_jsem__6FzT
I spoke to Vasko and told him how the interpreting went. He laughed and offered me another round.
我跟瓦斯科说了说翻译的事，他听完大笑，又请我喝了一杯。
vrat_se_z_ptacek_na_me_ce_QjLp
I left Sir Hans by the path out of the fissures. He got away from his pursuers at the last moment, but like me, he got lost.
我将汉斯少主留在了岩缝边的道路旁。千钧一发之际，他成功摆脱了追兵，只是随后也像我一样迷了路。
vrat_se_z_rekl_jsem_gerde_jTwz
I told Gerda about the terms Radmil and I agreed upon. Once I'm ready we can be off.
我已将与拉德米尔敲定的格斗事项告知格尔达，准备好后我们就可以出发了。
vrat_se_z_rekl_jsem_nechu_9n03
I told Natan it was bandits.
我告诉了纳坦这一切皆强盗所为。
vrat_se_z_rekl_jsem_nechu_l2hp
I told Natan it was wolves, but he didn't look convinced.
我告诉纳坦这一切皆是野狼所为，但是他看起来却满腹狐疑。
vrat_se_z_rodinne_dedictv_XByk
I returned to Svatava with her family inheritance, but I decided to keep it. I had already done enough for her, and I deserved a proper reward.
带着那些家族遗产，我回到了斯瓦塔娅那里，并且决定将遗产占为己有。毕竟我为了她已竭尽心力，配得上一份应有的报酬。
vrat_se_z_se_samotnym_luc_BHd6
I didn't have to wrestle with Lucifer himself, but I still had a hard time finding all the monsters. Hopefully, the devils will leave them alone for a while.
我没必要跟路西法较量，但还是很难找到那些魔鬼，但愿它们能稍微消停一会儿。
vrat_se_z_se_svatavou_si__dvLv
I won't be talking to Svatava now, so I reckon this story will stay without an ending.
我无法再与斯瓦塔娅交谈，看来这场闹剧将永远都见不到它的结局。
vrat_se_z_skvira_mi_dal_z_FxwW
Mole gave me a strange set of dice as a reward and told me that I could find an opponent that is my equal in the cemetery. I'd be interested to know who he meant.
摩尔给了我一组奇怪的骰子作为奖赏，还告诉我墓园里有一个能与我并驾齐驱的对手。至于他说的是人是鬼，我倒是很感兴趣。
vrat_se_z_skvira_mi_dal_z_zC6C
Mole gave me a strange set of dice as a reward and told me where to find other fight clubs.
摩尔给了我一组奇怪的骰子作为奖赏，还告诉哪里能找到其它的搏击俱乐部。
vrat_se_z_slava_je_mrtvy__2eHI

Slava is dead and I don't have the bones. Maybe I'll come across them when I least expect it, but there's no point looking for them right now. I should also keep away from the Sedletz abbot. He's bound to find out about Slava sooner or later, and that could mean trouble for me. And on top of all that, folks aren't likely to just forget about the dragon. This was a strange affair...
斯拉瓦死了，我也没能拿到那些骨头，或许将来它们会在我意想不到的时刻出现在我眼前呢，总之现在已经没有必要再去寻找它们了。此外，我也得远离塞德莱茨的修道院院长，毕竟他迟早会查出发生在斯拉瓦身上的事，到时候我就要有麻烦了。而且最重要的是，人们似乎十分惦记传闻中的那只龙，真是些奇闻怪事...
vrat_se_z_slavovi_jsem_po_Hwtv

I told Slava someone got to the bones before me. Who knows where they are now. Maybe I'll come across them by chance. Slava wasn't too pleased. He had to head off to Sedletz to smooth things out with the abbot, who set him the task in the first place. I hope he doesn't end up in trouble. This whole business was a complete mess.
我告诉斯拉瓦，已有人捷足先登取走了那些骨头，也没人知道他们去了何处，或许将来还有机会偶然碰上呢。总之斯拉瓦为此闷闷不乐，先前从修道院院长接过这项差事的他，不得不前往塞德莱茨与院长汇报情况，但愿他最终能够安然无事。如今看来这一整件事真是一团乱麻。
vrat_se_z_splnil_jsem_to__eHXX
I did everything I had to. I'm sure the chamberlain will be glad to hear that the fiend situation isn't so serious after all.
我做了力所能及的事，无论如何魔鬼侵扰之事终于得到了缓解，想必管家一定会为此欣喜的。
vrat_se_z_spolecne_s_muso_968F
Musa and I agreed that poison was used to kill Chertan.
穆萨和我一致认为赫尔坦是被毒死的。
vrat_se_z_spravil_jsem_kr_MkIr

I talked to Christian about the outcome of my investigation among the miners. While the miners reported that they mined a total of one hundred corves on the feast of St. Petronilla, only ninety were recorded in the books. That means ten corves left for the smelter without any records of them. Lower input and output numbers were deliberately entered in the mine books.
我把向矿工们打探出的调查结果与克里斯蒂安进行了讨论。通过矿工们的反馈得知，圣佩特罗尼拉纪念日那天，他们总共开采了一百车矿石，可是记录里却只登记了九十车，这就意味着有十车矿石在未经申报的情况下运往了冶炼厂。登记在矿场记录里的投入产出数与实际相比更低，肯定是他人有意为之。
vrat_se_z_s_radmilem_jsme_6Nm3
Radmil and I are agreed, now I can return to Gerda and tell her everything.

I need a tournament longsword. As for armour, I have to wear a tournament gambeson. No cuirass or hauberk and no helmet. So I should be careful. I also can't wear any metallic leg armour, but padded chausses are allowed if I choose to wear them. I can wear any kind of gauntlets. I was also given a tournament waffenrock and I'm expected to wear it during my duels but I reckon I could also wear a different one.
我需要一把比武用长剑。 至于护甲，我得穿上一件比武用软甲，但不可穿戴任何铁甲、锁甲以及头盔。因此，我得格外小心。 如果我愿意，还可以穿戴衬垫护腿，但不能穿戴任何金属类护腿。 任何类型的护手均可穿戴。 我还得到了一套比武专用的军服，估计得穿上它进行比武，但或许也可以穿着其它服装。
vybav_se__musim_si_vzit_s_GLxi

For the longsword discipline, I need a tournament longsword. As for armour, I have to wear a tournament gambeson, tournament padded coif and a tournament helmet. No cuirass or hauberk. I also can't wear any metallic leg armour, but padded hose are allowed if I choose to wear them. I can wear any kind of gauntlets. I was also given a tournament waffenrock and I'm expected to wear it during my duels but I reckon I could also wear a different one.
要想参与长剑项目，我就得准备一把比武长剑。 至于护甲，我得穿上一件比武用软甲，一只比武用衬垫头巾以及一顶比武用头盔，但不可穿戴任何铁甲或锁甲。 如果我愿意，还可以穿戴衬垫打底裤，但不能穿戴任何金属类护腿。 任何类型的护手均可穿戴。 我还得到了一套比武专用的军服，估计得穿上它进行比武，但或许也可以穿着其它服装。
vybav_se__musim_si_vzit_s_NsS4

要想参与剑盾项目，我就得准备一把剑和一副盾牌。 至于护甲，我得穿上一件比武用软甲，一只比武用衬垫头巾以及一顶比武用头盔，但不可穿戴任何铁甲或锁甲。 如果我愿意，还可以穿戴衬垫打底裤，但不能穿戴任何金属类护腿。 任何类型的护手均可穿戴。 我还得到了一套比武专用的军服，估计得穿上它进行比武，但或许也可以穿着其它服装。

The outer bailey has turned into a dangerous trap, but we still had yet to use the Finger of God. The cannon roared and a ball smashed into the gate's arch! An avalanche of stone buried the drawbridge and iron counterweights and chains. The way into the castle was finally free.
外堡场已经变成了一处危机四伏的猎场，但我们还未发挥“上帝之指”的作用。而后，伴随震耳欲聋的火炮声，一枚炮弹粉碎了城门！雪崩般的坠石掩埋了吊桥、配重铁和锁链，通往城堡的道路终于敞亮了起来。
vyckej_na_jsme_pod_palbou_1bEu
The outer bailey has turned into a dangerous trap. We still have that cannon but can only pray that Kubyenka and Brabant are having a good day and manage to hit that damned gate.

vyckej_na_muj_predcasny_u_FOvf

vyckej_na_z_tvrze_prisla__W93a

vydej_se__hejtman_suk_me__7gmC

Captain Gnarly tasked me with scouting. There's a good view from above into the gorge, where we expected to find foes. And indeed there were - I saw three bandits. I don't know what the blacksmith's hands look like, but I'm pretty sure these fellahs aren't them.
格纳利队长将侦察任务交给我。从上方观察峡谷视野很好，我们预感会在那发现敌人。而且确实发现了——我看到了三个强盗。我不知道铁匠的工人长什么样子，但我很确定这些家伙不是他们。
vydrz_do__posily_uz_jsou__Do0L

杰式卡协同其他同伴，杀进了堡场内，却在那里又遇到了新的麻烦。要想拿下内部城墙，就得付出很大代价。
vydrz_nap_meli_jsme_stest_TXIy

We were lucky Kubyenka joined us, because he and a couple of armed men managed to hold back the bloodthirsty crowd until we reached the entrance to the synagogue. We set up a last line of defence in front of the synagogue so everyone would have time to escape from the city through the corridor. The crowd hesitated for a while, but then that whoreson Erik managed to get them going again and we had to fight desperately for every single moment. We were at a breaking point, but suddenly the pressure eased and we could finally pull back.
十分幸运，库宾卡与我们并肩作战，他带着手下，挥舞利器，成功抵挡住了那群嗜血癫狂的暴民，我们也才因此能够抵达教堂的入口。我们在教堂前方设立起最后防线，好让平民们从教堂通道逃离城镇。而正当暴民们犹豫之际，那个畜生埃里克再次煽动起了他们的情绪，我们不得不全力迎战。就在濒临溃败之际，危机却突然化解，我们最终也成功撤离。
vydrz_nap_vsechny_je_pobi_5fT8
No one must get to the synagogue, or all is lost!
任何敌人都不能接近教堂，不然就全完了！

vyhledej__jindra_si_v_dia_eUut

奥兹说他玩骰子把戒指输给了坦卡德。我跟坦卡德赌了一把，将戒指赢了回来。
