Oats mentioned that he lost his ring to Tankard in a dice game. If I can get it back, I'll be in Oats' good books. And knowing Tankard, he can't resist a bet.
奥兹说他玩骰子把戒指输给了坦卡德。要是能把它赢回来，奥兹会对我感恩戴德。而据我所知，坦卡德嗜赌如命，定不会拒绝这场赌局。
vyhraj_so_souboj_s_velite_HjHP

We reached Nebakov mill. We thought we were saved, but they surrounded us. Capon took a heavy blow to the head - it's amazing he didn't pass out. I was the last man standing. The commander of the bandits who ambushed us challenged me to a duel. I won, and my opponent had to admit defeat.
我们抵达了内巴科夫磨坊，本以为得救的我们被他们包围了起来。卡蓬的头挨了一记重击，令人惊奇的是，他竟然没有晕过去。我坚持到了最后一刻。曾偷袭我们的强盗首领向我发起了决斗挑战。我最终在决斗中胜出，而对手则不得不接受败局。
vyhraj_so_tezko_rict_co_c_Z9kr

It's hard to know what to expect from the madman who took on Otto von Bergow himself. But he gave me a chance to survive and I don't intend to squander it! One of us will die today, and the other may survive.
很难想象这种敢亲自与奥托·冯·波尔高较量的疯子会做出什么事来，但他给了我一个生还的机会，我一定要好好把握住！今天，不是他死，就是我亡。
vyhraj_st_po_nestastnem_u_3u2V

After his unfortunate accident, the champion of the Striped Tonies was unable to enter the competition. Foreman Vlach asked me to shoot in place of Anton, even though I am not a miner. I accepted his request but regrettably failed to win first prize.
在不幸经历了一场事故以后，“条纹托尼”的参赛选手无法再继续参加本次竞赛。即便我并非一名矿工，领班弗拉赫也希望我能代替安东参加本次比赛。我虽然接受了他的请求，但我却遗憾地错失了冠军头衔。
vyhraj_st_po_nestastnem_u_WPgC

After his unfortunate accident, the champion of the Striped Tonies was unable to enter the competition. Foreman Vlach asked me to shoot in place of Anton, even though I am not a miner. I turned him down as it would not have been honourable.
在不幸经历了一场事故以后，“条纹托尼”的参赛选手已无法再继续参加本次竞赛。即便我并非一名矿工，领班弗拉赫也希望我能代替安东参加本次比赛。但考虑到此种行为并不光彩，我拒绝了他的请求。
vyhraj_st_prihlasil_jsem__QBys
I've entered the miners' popinjay competition as the champion of the Striped Tonies.
我代表“条纹托尼”参加了本次矿工射鸟竞赛。
vyhraj_st_vyhral_jsem_hav_E6Kj
I won the popinjay competition and became the new champion of the St. Anthony mineshaft.
我赢得了射鸟竞赛，并成为圣安东尼矿队的新任冠军。
vyhraj_tu_ale_ne_nikdo_mi_mLfE

The time for the clash Menhard wanted with the Kuttenberg brotherhood finally arrived. But during the duels I committed some heinous crimes, and because I was a member of Menhard's band the disgrace is on him as well. And as a man is only as good as his associates, Menhard's honour was lost, and with it his legal claim. That meant there was no point continuing the duels, because the entire dispute was settled in the Kuttenbergers favour.
门哈德与库滕堡兄弟会之间的较量终于搬上了擂台，但我却在决斗期间犯下了不可饶恕的罪孽，又因为我是门哈德一方的成员，我的行为也让他蒙羞。俗话说，欲知其人品性，先观其友品行，门哈德的名声也就此落寞，随之而去的还有他的合法诉求，这便意味着决斗已然失去了意义。如今争端得以解决，库滕堡人最终胜出。
vyhraj_tu_place_holder_ce_KedC

The time for the clash Menhard wanted with the Kuttenberg brotherhood has come. I think Menhard's cause is just, so I'm going to fight as best I can on the Germans' side against the Kuttenbergers. I have to remember all my swordfighting skills, because it's not going to be easy. And above all remember: Audentes Fortuna Iuvat!
门哈德与库滕堡兄弟会之间的决斗一触即发。我将门哈德视作正义的一方，因此决定尽己所能，与德国人一同对抗那些库滕堡人。这场较量非同小可，所以我必须记起在剑术上的毕生所学，更重要的是，千万记得：Audentes Fortuna Iuvat（天助勇者）！
vyhraj_tu_place_holder_sl_K6XX

The time for the clash Menhard wanted with the Kuttenberg brotherhood has come. I weighed up the situation and came to the conclusion that if anyone is in the right it's the Kuttenbergers and not the Germans. So I agreed with Emmeram that, even though I'll be on Menhard's side, I'll deliberately lose my duels to help them settle the matter once and for all. I shouldn't forget this promise. On the other hand, Menhard has no idea about this, so if I do want to help the Germans this is my last chance to change sides. But if I do that, Emmeram will be furious, and rightly so.

门哈德与库滕堡兄弟会之间的决斗一触即发。我对局势进行了一番权衡，最终认为，与那些德国人相比，库滕堡人才是正确的一方。我也因此与艾默拉姆达成共识，届时我将作为门哈德的队友，在较量中故意输掉决斗，以此来帮助艾默拉姆一伙人彻底解决这一问题，因此我得将这一约定牢记于心。从另一角度看，门哈德当前对此事还一无所知，所以如果想帮助德国人，这也是我转换阵营的最后时机。但是假如我那么做的话，艾默拉姆定会暴跳如雷，这也是理所应当的。
vyhraj_zl_nakonec_jsem_ho_Icyz
I got the gold badge in the end. At first, Betty didn't want to, but she eventually agreed to play for the badge, and I was able to win it.
我终于赢得了那枚金质徽章。 贝蒂起初并不乐意接受挑战，但最终还是同意以徽章为赌注进行比赛，而我最终在比赛中胜出。
vyhraj_zl_takz_jestli_o_t_xDxa
If I really want that badge, I have to beat Betty.
要想得到那枚徽章，我必须打败贝蒂。
vykopej_h_hrob__WDOX
Maybe it was sacrilege, but I'm sure it was the right thing to do. The poor wretch's remains were finally laid to rest in consecrated ground.
也许这是一种亵渎，但我确信这是正确的做法。那个可怜人的遗体终于在圣地安息了。
vykopej_h_pokud_chci_vdov_FpIK
If I'm going to help the widow, I have to dig a grave in consecrated ground and lay Jan's remains to rest here.
如果我要帮助这个寡妇，我必须在圣土上挖一个坟墓，将杨的遗体安葬在这里。
vykopej_h_vykopat_kosti_t_aecP
Digging up that poor wretch's bones and secretly burying them in the graveyard would be sacrilege.
挖出那个可怜人的遗骨，偷偷把它们埋在墓地，是一种亵渎行为。
vykopej_l_michal_s_davide_rQ59

Michael and George promised the innkeeper they'd empty his latrine if he gave them a drink on credit. But now they don't want to keep their end of the bargain, so it's up to me to sort out their shit for them... Literally...
迈克尔和乔治曾向酒馆老板承诺，如果他们能赊账喝酒，就愿意清理他的茅厕。但是现在他们却不想遵守约定，所以就得由我来替他们处理那些屎......真的是屎......
vykopej_l_vykopal_jsem_mi_GJLJ
I emptied the overflowing latrine for Michael and George. It's the nastiest job I've ever done, but someone has to suffer for art...
我替迈克尔和乔治清理掉了那些溢满茅厕的粪便，这可真是我做过最肮脏的工作，但是总得有人为了艺术受苦......
vykopej_n_jimram_pry_ve_v_VtqV

Emmeram is said to have thrown the sword away in a rage at the Kuttenberg rubbish heap, which I hear is somewhere outside the city gate, next to Ruthard's. I should go there and find it, supposedly under a bush.
据说艾默拉姆一怒之下便将那把剑扔进了库滕堡的一处垃圾堆里，那个垃圾堆就在靠近鲁瑟德宫的城门之外。我得到那里去找找，应该就在一处灌木下。
vykopej_n_menhart_je_mrtv_Wzwp
Menhard is dead, now I don't have to worry about the guild sword.
门哈德已死亡，现在我已无需再操心那把行会剑。
vykopej_n_prekopal_jsem_c_6xiF
I dug through the entire rubbish heap, but the sword wasn't there.
我把垃圾堆翻得一干二净也没有发现那把剑。
vykovej_k_myslim_ze_bych__00N0
I think I could forge a replica of the sword I saw on Sir Valentine's sarcophagus.
或许我可以仿造从瓦伦丁爵士的石棺上看到的那把剑。
vykovej_k_podarilo_se_mi__sKdh
I was able to forge a sword exactly like the one worn by Sir Valentine.
我成功锻造出了一把剑，它与瓦伦丁爵士的佩剑别无二致。
vykovej_m_kovar_byl_spoko_leFu
The blacksmith is satisfied with my smithing skills, and decided to entrust me with forging the new sword.
铁匠对我的铁匠技艺很满意，决定委托我锻造新剑。
vykovej_p_kat_hynek_je_mr_Ooll
Heinz's luck must have really been bad, because he ended up dead. Well, no lucky sword will help him now...
海尼克的运气一定很差，因为他最终死了。好吧，幸运之剑也帮不了他了…
vykovej_p_mec_je_hotovy_5zlu
The lucky executioner's sword is finally finished.
带来好运的行刑剑终于制作完成。
vykovej_p_ted_uz_mam_vsec_7Agz
Now I have everything I need to make Heinz a new executioner's sword. I'm curious to see how it turns out myself.
一切已就绪，我现在可以为海尼克制作一把新的行刑剑。我自己也很好奇，想看看结果如何。
vykovej_s_abych_mateje_po_lNAu
To beat Matthias, I have to forge a better hunting sword than him.
要打败马蒂亚斯，我必须锻造一把胜过他的猎剑。
vykovej_s_donesl_jsem_kut_0YiC
I forged an axe for Johann Parler.
我为约翰·帕勒铸造了一把斧头。
vykovej_s_stavitel_je_mrt_uudi
Johann is dead, so I reckon he doesn't care whether the axe is in the tower of Saint Barbara's or if I keep it…
约翰死了，所以我想他不在乎这把斧头是在圣芭芭拉教堂的塔楼里还是在我这里…
vykovej_s_tesak_jsem_vyko_LqhE
I forged a hunting sword, now I have to hope it will be better than Matthias'.
我锻造了一把猎剑，只希望它能胜过马蒂亚斯锻造的猎剑。
vykovej_s_ze_tri_udajne_k_cRNf
I'm supposed to forge an axe out of the three supposedly magical talismans Johann had me steal, so that nobody knows we took them.
我得用约翰让我偷的那三枚据说具有魔力的护身符铸造一把斧头，这样就没有人知道它们被我们偷走了。
vylakej_r_hospodsky_mi_od_41KM

The innkeeper refuses to tell me the details of the local fight club as long as the bailiff is sitting in the tavern with his ears perked. He won't believe me a second time, but hopefully he won't sit here all day.
只要执行官还坐在酒馆里偷听消息，那酒馆老板就绝对不会向我透露任何有关搏击俱乐部的细节。想必执行官也不会再给我第二次忽悠他的机会，只能指望他不要在此地待上一整天。
vylakej_r_hospodsky_mi_od_6Aeh

The innkeeper refuses to tell me the details of the local fight club as long as the bailiff is sitting in the tavern with his ears perked. Maybe I can tell him something that'll cause him to leave for a while...
只要执行官还坐在酒馆里偷听消息，那酒馆老板就绝对不会向我透露任何有关搏击俱乐部的细节。或许我可以跟他聊聊，试着让他离开一会儿...
vylakej_r_snazil_jsem_se__w4Vj
I tried hard as hard as I could, but I couldn't get the bailiff out of the tavern. I'll have to try it from another angle or wait for him to leave by himself.
即便我费尽心思，也没能让执行官离开酒馆。我得想想别的办法，要不就等他自行离去。
vylakej_r_s_vyuzitim_vesk_UHws
Using all my acting talent, I convinced the bailiff he had things to resolve at his office. Now the innkeeper can tell me everything.
我使出浑身解数，成功说服了执行官让他回到办公室里好好工作，现在终于可以向酒馆老板打探消息了。
vylec_cer_asi_jsem_vojako_TVQo
It seems I've done more harm than good to the soldier. I don't think he'll be telling me anything...
好像我在给那个士兵帮倒忙，估计他不会跟我透露任何事情了......
vylec_cer_cernej_vojak_um_PNNa
Black died. Victoria won't be happy. That is, if I tell her.
布莱克已死。要是我把此事告知维多利亚，她会不高兴的。
vylec_cer_dal_jsem_vojako_fYvj
I gave the soldier something to take away the pain. Now, I just have to wait until it starts working.
我给士兵服用了一些驱除病痛的药物，现在只需等待药物生效即可。
vylec_cer_mluvil_jsem_s_m_nxJa
I spoke with Musa, the local healer. He told me to give the soldier something for food poisoning.
我跟当地的医师穆萨进行了交谈，他让我给那个士兵服用一些能够治疗食物中毒的药物。
vylec_cer_nasel_jsem_toho_BVfn
I found the soldier, but I have to nurse him back to health before he can talk to me. First, I'll have to find out what's wrong with him.
我找到了那个士兵，但要想让他开口说话，就得帮他恢复健康，所以我得先查看他的身体状况。
vylec_cer_podarilo_se_mi__GXD4
I managed to heal Black. Fortunately, it was nothing serious.
我成功救治了布莱克，好在他的状况也并非什么严重问题。
vylec_cer_prohlidl_jsem_v_8MWb
I examined the soldier. It doesn't look like anything serious.
我检查了士兵的身体状况，看起来并非是什么严重问题。
vylec_cer_tabor_s_vojakam_KxRy
The king's soldiers' camp is already gone. They withdrew with Sigismund to God-knows-where! I’ll have to find Victoria some other way.
士兵的营地已经搬离，至于他们随同西格斯蒙德去了哪里，只有上帝知道！我得想出别的办法寻找维多利亚。
vylec_cer_ten_vojak_se_pr_pPmj
The soldier ate some poisonous mushrooms. I think I just need to bring him Digestive Potion or something like that, and he'll be feeling better.
这个士兵先前误食了一些毒蘑菇，看来我得给他用点消化药剂之类的药物，这样他应该就能好受些。
vylec_loj_jestli_chci_aby_8LVG

If I want the bailiff to let Janosh go, I have to treat the villager he injured. I looked at his injuries and found that when Janosh cut him, he also broke his ribs besides giving him the nasty wound. The wound must be dressed. But most importantly I have to bring him Buck's Blood to help him breathe more easily. That'll make him feel better and he'll recover more quickly.
要想让执行官把亚诺什放走，我就得医治被他弄伤的村民。我查看了村民的伤势，找到了亚诺什留下的伤痕，除了那血肉模糊的伤口之外，亚诺什还打断了他的肋骨。现在伤口急需包扎，但更为重要的是，我得给他弄点雄鹿之血药剂，好让他呼吸顺畅。治疗能让他有所好转，更快地痊愈。
vylec_loj_jestli_chci_aby_HJaU

If I want the bailiff to let Janosh go, I have to treat the villager he injured. I looked at his condition and found the big wound Janosh inflicted on him. I'll have to bandage it up and try to give him some healing potion. That's the best plan I have right now.
要想让执行官把亚诺什放走，我就得医治被他弄伤的村民。我查看了村民的伤势，找到了亚诺什留下的严重伤口。我必须给他包扎，并提供一些治疗药水，这是当前最优的办法。
vylec_loj_jestli_chci_aby_JC3Y
If I want the bailiff to let Janosh go, I have to treat the villager he injured. Apparently, he's the blacksmith's hand, so that's where I'll find him. I should examine his injuries first.
要想让执行官放走亚诺什，我就必须医治被亚诺什所伤的村民。伤者正是铁匠的助手，我要到铁匠铺去找他，届时也得先检查他的伤势。
vylec_loj_rad_bych_vesnic_J7IR

I would like to treat the villager so the bailiff will let Janosh go. But when I looked at his wounds, I didn't know what to make of them. I can't help him, so I have to find another way to get Janosh out.
我打算医治村民，好让执行官放走亚诺什。但是在查看伤势后，我也不知该如何是好。无能为力的我也只能另寻他法来帮助亚诺什离开。
vylec_loj_vesnicana_jsem__2hnp
I treated the villager carefully, so I believe he'll let Janosh go.
我给村民提供了详尽的治疗，相信他会让亚诺什离开的。
vylec_loj_vesnicana_jsem__DhWI
I may have treated the villager, but I doubt I saved him. I have to find another way to get Janosh out.
虽然我对村民进行了治疗，但也不知能否保其性命。我必须另寻他法，帮助亚诺什离开。
vylec_loj_vesnicana_jsem__r1KA
I treated the villager so that the bailiff would let Janosh go.
我治疗了受伤村民，如此一来执行官便会允许亚诺什离开。
vylec_loj_vesnican_umrel__RzJw
The villager died before I could treat him.
我还没能医治村民，他就死了。
vymen_bal_kulnu_s_ulozeny_soGz
The shed with the stored papers was guarded by the Raborsch groom. If Godwin was to get in, he'd either have to somehow convince the groom to let him in, or sneak in without being noticed.
马夫拉博施看守着那间存放着文件的棚屋。古德温要想进入其中，要么就说服马夫让行，要么就独自悄悄潜入。
vymen_bal_listiny_jsem_vy_T970
Godwin switched the papers so that Anna would no longer have to worry about her reputation.
古德温换走了那些文件，如此一来安娜将无需再为她的名誉担忧。
vymen_bal_pani_anna_z_vla_9KHK

Lady Anna of Waldstein asked for a favour in exchange for her support – to switch a bunch of papers brought by Haman Alder for a package she herself had given to Godwin. The question was, how to get to Alder's things…?
瓦尔德斯坦的安娜夫人提出，要想换取她的支持就得先完成一项差事——将哈曼·阿尔德带来的文件换成她亲自交给古德温的包裹。可问题是，要怎样才能接近阿尔德的私人物品呢…？
vypadej_c_jo_myslim_ze_vy_aJPy
That stuck-up merchant apparently won't speak to anyone he considers beneath him, but I look so spruce he'll be eating out of my hand.
那个自命不凡的商人显然不会和他认为低他一等的人说话。但我看起来很有气质，他一定会吃我这一套。
vypadej_c_musim_vypadat_j_E83S
That stuck-up merchant apparently won't speak to anyone he considers beneath him. I have to make certain I look like a charismatic gent. That could be a bit of a tough nut to crack.
那个自命不凡的商人显然不会和他认为低他一等的人说话。我必须确保我看起来像个富有的绅士。这可能有点难办。
vypadej_c_ten_nafrneny_ob_s5QT
Apparently that stuck-up merchant won't talk to anyone who doesn't look noble enough. But now the plan's off, so at least I don't have to dress up.
那个趾高气昂的商人显然不屑于和穿着不像贵族的人交谈。不过现在计划已取消，至少我无需进行任何打扮。
vypatrej__dle_otce_prokop_rXWA
According to Father Prokop, Jarka was a kind girl who served the local von Grolle family. Father Prokop feels responsible, but mainly blames a wandering minstrel named William.
通过与普罗科普神⽗了解得知，贾卡生前是个好姑娘，还曾服侍过冯·格罗尔一家。尽管心怀愧疚，但神父普罗科普还是将贾卡的死怪罪到了一位叫威廉的吟游诗人头上。
vypatrej__hospodska_me_va_Bn23

The innkeeper told me that the old hermit had sold his soul to the devil. But later I found evidence that this had nothing to do with the devil. There was money and old documents in a hiding place beneath the roadside cross, as well as a new cloak of the Order. It must have been hidden there by the mysterious rider. Why he'd been digging there and what he took is anyone's guess, though. In any case, his horse is still in Apollonia, so the stranger hasn't left yet. Unless he's dead, of course. But maybe he was threatening to kill the hermit, or could he have alread killed him?
旅店老板告诉我，这个老隐士已经把灵魂卖给了魔鬼。但后来我发现了证据，表明这与魔鬼无关。在路边十字架下面的藏身之处有钱和旧文书，还有一件新的骑士团斗篷。一定是那个神秘的骑手藏在那里的。不过，他为什么要在那里挖掘，他拿了什么东西，谁也说不准。无论如何，既然马还在阿波罗尼亚，那说明这个陌生人还没有离开。当然，除非他已经死了。但也许他威胁要杀了那个隐士，或者他可能已经杀了？
vypatrej__hospodska_me_va_FMzA

The innkeeper warned me that the hermit had sold his soul to the devil. I should find out if there's any truth in that, and question the witnesses before going to see him. It could help me get his sword.
旅馆老板警告我，说那个隐士已经把灵魂卖给了魔鬼。在去会见并询问这个证人之前，我应该弄清楚事情的真伪。这可以帮助我得到他的剑。
vypatrej__jarka_nejstarsi_c3Oh

Jarka, the oldest victim of the mad murderer, was the ward of a local priest, Father Prokop. It shouldn't be too hard to track him down and talk to him about Jarka and her condition before the murder.
贾卡是头几位惨遭疯狂杀手谋害的姑娘，同时也是当地牧师普罗科普神⽗的养女。要想找到这位神父并与他谈论贾卡及其生前境况并非难事。
vypatrej__nasel_jsem_duka_lLwb
I think I'm on the trail of the devilish apparition, but I still don't know what this is all about, and what the hermit has to do with it.
我想我已经找到了幽灵的线索，但我仍然不知道这是怎么回事，也不知道那个隐士与此有什么关系。
vypatrej__nasel_jsem_tajn_JbYy

I questioned the witnesses and found an old hiding place beneath the cross. Someone had been digging there recently, but it could hardly have been the hermit, who was gravely ill. It wasn't a thief either, because the money and precious books weren't taken. The black horse I found in Apollonia is proof that some stranger came to see the hermit and hasn't left yet. He can't be far away, and the hermit's life may be in danger, if the stranger hasn't already killed him.
我询问了目击者，在十字架下面发现了一个旧的藏身之处。有人最近曾去那里挖掘，但应该不可能是那个隐士，他病得很重。也不是小偷，因为钱和珍贵的书籍没有被拿走。我在阿波罗尼亚发现的那匹黑马证明，有陌生人来找过隐士，而且还没有离开。他应该就在附近，隐士的性命岌岌可危，如果那个陌生人还没下手的话。
vypatrej__nepodarilo_se_m_KLSW
I didn't manage to learn anything more from Father Prokop about the life and death of his ward Jarka, and so the investigation has hit a dead end. Just like Father Prokop.
我没能向普罗科普神⽗打探到任何与其养女贾卡生死相关的信息。正如一命呜呼的神父，案件调查的进展也因此被中断。
vypatrej__podarilo_se_mi__3ykB
I managed to glean from Father Prokop that Jarka was pregnant, so it was a double murder. Perhaps the father of the child wanted to silence the mother before she disgraced him?
通过向普罗科普神⽗了解得知，当时的贾卡已经怀有身孕，因此那凶手实际上害死了两条人命。难道是孩子父亲担忧名誉扫地，才杀害了贾卡？
vypatrej__vyslechl_jsem_j_2jt6
I questioned one of the witnesses who saw the devilish apparition, but there's one other witness. I need solid proof that it really was the devil they saw.
我询问了其中一个看到幽灵的证人，但还有一个证人。我需要确凿的证据，证明他们看到的真的是魔鬼。
vypatrej__vyslechl_jsem_o_ds0b
I questioned both the witnesses. I should look for some other traces of the devilish apparition in the places where it was seen.
我询问了两个证人。我应该去人们见到幽灵的地方寻找其他线索。
vypatrej__ztratil_jsem_i__PpMO
I've lost my last lead. My only option now is to try to speak to the ill-tempered old hermit.
我失去了最后的线索。我现在只能试着去跟那个坏脾气的老隐士谈谈。
vyptej_se_asi_bych_se_mel_nZL9
I should probably ask Vuytek about the Cumans who were sitting in the tavern.
我可能应该问问维特克关于酒馆里的那些库曼人的情况。
vyptej_se_kazdy_tu_ma_sve_wpDk
Everyone here is tasked with something, me and Sam are to explore the underground route to the Italian Court. Before we go, I should ask Rosa for details.
当下大家各司其职，我和塞缪尔将负责探索通往意大利宫的地下通道。在此之前，我得向罗莎询问相关细节。
vyptej_se_kdyz_jsem_se_v__gYkZ
When I was asking about Adder in Pschitoky, I happened to learn that Ranyek had been there too. Apparently, he left with some men from Bylany. I should ask at the Bylany inn, then.
在普西托克寻找阿德尔期间，我无意间了解到拉涅克也曾到过那里，而且后来他随一些来自比兰尼的人离开了。看来，我还得到比兰尼旅店打探一番。
vyptej_se_kubenka_mi_vypr_rBgt

Kubyenka told me about their gang, or at least what was left of it. I have to find Matthew, Bohuta, Ranyek, Janosh and Adder. The only thing he knows about Matthew is that he's robbing people somewhere outside Miskowitz. Bohuta has taken to an honest life. He now lives with the priest in Grund. Ranyek has always liked to play dice, but he was never very good at it. He was the best shot in the whole bunch. He was especially proud of his bow. Maybe because it was the only thing he had ever won at dice. Janosh is from Hungary, but he can be understood when he speaks. Rumour has it he's a real drunkard. He and Adder are an inseparable duo. The latter is Polish for a change, only Janosh can really understand what he says. Kubyenka says if I find one, I'll find them both.

我向库宾卡了解了与他们团队有关的信息，更确切地说，是了解到了团队仅剩的几位成员。我现在必须找到马修、博尔祖特、拉涅克、亚诺什以及阿德尔。 关于马修的唯一线索是，他正在米斯科维茨外的某个地方抢劫路人。 博尔祖特如今生活磊落坦荡，与一位牧师住在格兰德。 拉涅克一如既往地热爱玩骰子，只不过水平堪忧。他也是团队里射术最好的人，手里的弓箭总让他容光焕发，或许是因为那是他玩骰子唯一赢过的东西。 亚诺什来自匈牙利，但要与之沟通并无障碍。据说他是个不折不扣的酒鬼，还与阿德尔是对形影不离的搭档，而后者是个波兰人，唯有亚诺什能真正听懂他的话。库宾卡说，只要我能找到他们之中的一人，也就能找到另一个。
vyptej_se_lidi_na_semine__lxAc
The people in Semine told me to ask Gnarly or one of the Lords of Semine.
塞米人让我去问格纳利或者塞米的某位领主。
vyptej_se_mam_najit_kuman_BjkG
I need to find the Cumans, but I don't know where to start. I should ask around about them in Semine.
我需要找到库曼人，但是不知道从哪开始。我应该在塞米打听打听。
vyptej_se_nezbyva_nez_se__4QsD
There's nothing for it but to go to Suchdol, find Mlada, and ask what's up with this stone.
我现在只能去苏赫多尔问姆拉达这块石头的事。
vyptej_se_od_seminskych_j_EGcE
The folks in Semine told me where I should continue my search for the Cumans.
塞米的居民告诉我应该去哪里继续寻找库曼人。
vyptej_se_promluvil_jsem__DxA1
I spoke to Vuytek. He wants to get rid of the Cumans - permanently.
我和维特克谈话。他想永久除掉那些库曼人。
vyptej_se_ranek_byl_napos_3jNd
Ranyek most recently visited the Bylany inn, as confirmed by the local innkeeper.
正如当地旅店老板所言，拉涅克近期的确来到过比兰尼旅店。
vyptej_se_roza_mi_vysvetl_Vdag

Rosa explained to me how and why the labyrinth of tunnels between the Italian Court and Ruthard Palace came to be. The end of the path is walled up. We'll have to dig through the last section ourselves. Samuel and I need to find the furthest point and mark where to dig. She even told us how to find the place.
罗莎向我解释了意大利宫和鲁瑟德宫之间的复杂地道的由来。通道的尽头已立起高墙，我们得亲自挖穿这最后一段路。塞缪尔和我需要抵达通道的尽头，并对挖掘点进行标记，而罗莎甚至还告诉了我们寻找那处地点的办法。
vyptej_se_vod_boruta_jsem_6k7A
Bohuta told me that Ranyek came to him for some groschen. Apparently, he had arranged a game of dice in Pschitoky. Perhaps I should ask for him in the Pschitoky inn.
博尔祖特告诉我，拉涅克曾来向他索要钱财。很显然，他打算在普西托克玩场骰子游戏，看来我得到普西托克旅店打探他的消息。
vyptej_se_vod_boruta_jsem_TNk3

Bohuta told me that Ranyek came to him for some groschen. Apparently, he had arranged a game of dice in Pschitoky, so I went there. The local innkeeper told me that he had left with some men from Bylany. I should ask at the Bylany inn, then.
博尔祖特告诉我，拉涅克曾来向他索要钱财。很显然，他打算在普西托克玩场骰子游戏，因此我便去了那里。后来旅店的老板告诉我，拉涅克和一些来自比兰尼的人离开了，稍后我得前往比兰尼旅店打探一番。
vyptej_se_vod_hanse_jsem__B5GV
I found out that Adder might be drinking in some village near Miskowitz. So I went to Bylany, and there I heard Ranyek had been talking about him. It seems they met in Pschitoky.
阿德尔现在可能正在米斯科维茨附近的某个村庄喝酒。我去了一趟比兰尼，在那里我听到拉涅克一直谈到阿德尔的事。据说他们曾在普西托克相遇过。
vyptej_se_vod_hanse_jsem__k7gD
I found out that Adder might be drinking in some village near Miskowitz. That means either Bylany or Pschitoky.
阿德尔现在可能正在米斯科维茨附近的某个村庄喝酒。他应该就在比兰尼或者普西托克。
vyptej_se_vod_pritockyho__Xslo
The Pschitoky innkeeper told me that he and Adder had been drinking the night before.
普西托克的旅店老板告诉我，他昨晚曾与阿德尔一同畅饮。
vyptej_se_ze_vseho_nejdri_Lqx5
First of all, I have to ask Kubyenka about who it is I'm looking for.
首先，我得询问库宾卡该寻找何人。
vypujc_si_kdyz_je_krize_h_9Kq4

In times of crisis, there's all kinds of ways to satisfy hunger. For example, by eating shoe soup. But you can't make it out of any old shoe. The best would be some delicate ones made of lambskin. And Captain Frenzl's wife has a pair of such shoes in her chamber.
即便是在危急时刻，我们也有千百种方式来解决饥饿问题，比如，喝点鞋子煲的汤。但是可不能用破旧的鞋来充当食材，最好的材料还得是那些用羊皮制的精品鞋。而据悉，弗伦队长妻子的箱子里就躺着一双那样的鞋子。
vypujc_si_kdyz_je_krize_h_iRWI
In times of crisis, there's all kinds of ways to satisfy hunger. For example, by eating shoe soup. Preferably made from the kind of shoes I took from the chest of the captain's wife.
即便是在危急时刻，我们也有千百种方式来解决饥饿问题，比如，喝点鞋子煲的汤，而且最好是用我从弗伦队长妻子那里弄来的羊皮鞋来充当食材。
vyraz_s_h_budu_se_muset_s_qnLB

Luckily, he promised to take me there. But it seems there's a long and difficult path to the saltpetre pit, full knacker's work, and I'll have to help out whether I like it or not. I wonder what's in store for me. Ignatius says he leaves at dawn, so I have time to get things ready until then.
还算走运，掘墓人答应将我带去硝石坑。但似乎前往那里的路途遥远且艰辛，完全就是一趟让人掏空气力的旅程。无论乐意与否，我都得帮上忙，也不知前路会有什么在等着我。伊格内修斯说我们将在黎明时分启程，所以在那之前我仍有时间做足准备。
vyraz_s_h_musel_jsem_se_s_RJBJ

Luckily, he promised to take me there. The path to the saltpetre pit was long, arduous, and full of work for a knacker, which I had to help out with whether I wanted to or not. We headed out at dawn, and I was curious to see what was in store for me.
还算走运，掘墓人答应带我去硝石坑。这趟旅途不仅漫长艰辛，还费人心力，而无论乐意与否，我都得帮上忙。我们在黎明时刻便踏上了旅程，我也很好奇前路会发生什么。
vyres_ber_nechal_jsem_ber_5VUY
I left Darling waiting and he must have run out of patience. Oh well, no bother.
我让达令独自等待，想必他早已失去了耐心吧。算了，管他呢。
vyres_ber_potom_co_jsem_v_syfW

After I won all the bouts, Tobias, who everyone calls Darling, asked me to have one more bout with him, which I would lose on purpose, in hopes of Stanley leaving him alone. I didn't want to cheat though and Darling will have to deal with it himself.
未尝一败的我完成了所有搏斗，而这位人称“达令”的托比亚斯却还想向我发起挑战，并希望我故意输掉对局，好让他不再受到斯坦利的烦扰。但我并不想作弊，就让这个“达令”好自为之吧。
vyrid_fra_asi_bych_se_mel_yQmo
I should return to Vuytek in Troskowitz and tell him the Cumans have been taken care of.
我该回特罗斯科维茨去找维特克了，告诉他库曼人已经被解决掉了。
vyrid_fra_hotovo_zaridil__sb8x
Done. I did what Vuytek wanted me to and I can guarantee nobody will see those Cumans ever again.
完成了。我按照维特克的要求做了，我可以保证再也没有人会看到那些库曼人了。
vyrid_lap_dorazil_jsem_do_rfY2
A group of armed bandits has settled in the forest. Unlike the other poachers, this lot definitely won't want to talk to me. All I can do is get rid of them.
一伙全副武装的强盗就驻扎在树林里。跟其他偷猎者不同，这帮家伙绝对不打算跟我好生交谈，而我要做的就是把他们尽数解决。
vyrid_lap_tabor_jsem_zbav_1lez
A group of armed bandits has settled in the forest. Unlike the other poachers, this lot definitely won't want to talk to me. All I could do was get rid of them.
一伙全副武装的强盗就驻扎在树林里。跟其他偷猎者不同，这帮家伙绝对不打算跟我好生交谈，而我所能做的就是把他们尽数解决。
vyrob_kop_kopie_basanova__Mh1i
The replica of Basan's sword The Absolver is finished.
巴桑佩剑“赦免者”的仿制品已经锻造完成。
vyrob_kop_musim_rychle_vy_0w83
Now I should go to the smithy as soon as I can and forge a replica.
我现在得尽快到铁匠铺去锻造一个仿制品。
vyrob_pod_celedin_je_mrtv_9ev6
Stable hand Janek is dead; now the horseshoes will be of no use to him...
Stable hand Janek is dead; now the horseshoes will be of no use to him...
vyrob_pod_ted_kdyz_vim_ja_3qUM
Now that I know how, I can forge Janek his own set of spiked horseshoes.
Now that I know how, I can forge Janek his own set of spiked horseshoes.
vyrob_pod_vyrobil_jsem_ce_eEz6
I forged spiked horseshoes for Janek.
I forged spiked horseshoes for Janek.
vysetri_v_jeden_z_taborov_09tl
One of the camp commanders - Grozav of Borumlaca - had the materials necessary for making the poison. It's clear he's the murderer.
营地指挥官之一是博鲁姆拉卡的格罗扎夫，他拥有用于制作那种毒药的必要材料，显然他就是凶手。
vysetri_v_k_ranenemu_cher_BbSI

Someone got to the wounded Chertan and poisoned him. Musa the physician is a suspect, but I find it hard to believe he did it. Unfortunately, that's exactly what camp commander Grozav believes, so he sent for the royal executioner to get rid of Musa. My "commander" Katz isn't going to stand for this, so he ordered me to find the real murderer. Until I do, neither he nor the cannon I need will leave the camp.
有人接近并毒害了负伤的赫尔坦，医生穆萨成了犯罪嫌疑人，尽管我很难相信此事由他所为。但可惜的是，营地指挥官格罗扎夫却对此深信不疑，所以他派出了皇家侩子手前去处置穆萨，而我的“长官”卡茨不想让此事发生，因此下令要我找出真正的凶手。在我完成任务之前，他和那台我要找的火炮都不会离开营地。
vysetri_v_myslim_ze_uz_vi_bGF4
I think I now know what Chertan was poisoned with. The rest will be easy. The person I find with the poison must be the murderer.
现在我已弄清凶手是用何物毒害了赫尔坦，剩下的调查简单明了，拥有此毒药的人就必定是凶手。
vysetri_v_nasel_jsem_u_st_Patb
I found the materials necessary for making the poison in Stephen's tent. It's clear he's the murderer.
我在斯蒂芬的帐篷里找到了制作那种毒药的必要材料，他一定就是凶手。
vysetri_v_nasel_jsem_u_st_teyI
The murder investigation is finally over.
谋杀案的调查终于结束了。
vysetri_v_podarilo_se_mi__TVCp
I managed to identify the signs of Chertan's poisoning. Let's hope that Musa will now advise me what poison could have caused them.
我成功辨识出了赫尔坦中毒的症状，但愿穆萨能告诉我这些症状是何种毒药所致。
vyslechni_asi_se_mu_ale_n_Seo7
He probably won't like it that his captive did not survive the interrogation.
俘虏没能在审讯中存活下来，估计此事会令他不满。
vyslechni_na_tvrzi_byl_ch_vHqT
A Prague scout has been caught in the fortress, and Hynek the Dry Devil is getting ready to interrogate him. I should help him get as much information out of the Praguer as we can.
一个布拉格斥候在堡垒里就擒，酒鬼海尼克正准备审问他，我应该帮他尽可能的从布拉格人嘴里问出更多消息。
vyslechni_na_tvrzi_byl_ch_YGPq
A Prague scout was caught in the fortress, and me and the Devil got as much information out of him as we could.
一个布拉格斥候在堡垒里就擒，我和酒鬼从他嘴里问出了尽可能多的消息。
vyslechni_nechal_jsem_vil_Zm8e
I let William be.
我让威廉离开了。
vyslechni_od_zajatce_v_mu_H5cB
We managed to get some information from the captive that could be of interest to von Bergow. We'll see what he says.
我们成功从那位俘虏口中问出了一些或许能让冯·波尔高提起兴趣的消息，就来看看他会作何反应吧。
vyslechni_placeholder_cap_F6CX
I didn't want to go into the torture chamber right away and Capon gave up waiting for me. But I have to find him and arrange to go in there together.
我没有当即进入刑讯室，而卡蓬也没有再继续等我。但是现在我得找到他，一同进入刑讯室。
vyslechni_placeholder_ent_CFeT
Nothing left to do but enter the torture chamber…
现在仅需进入刑讯室即可......
vyslechni_po_dlouhem_doha_6IFG
After a long deliberation I was convinced that William didn't kill anybody.
深思熟虑后，我确信那个威廉没有杀害任何人。
vyslechni_po_dlouhem_vykr_f6aN
After all his wriggling, I'm still convinced William killed at least some of the girls, if not all.
尽管他极力争辩，我还是坚信有部分遇害女孩就是死于威廉之手，哪怕不是全部。
vyslechni_sidlo_lapku_je__RLmB
The bandits' den is in Nebakov. They managed to overpower and capture the lord there.
那伙强盗的窝点就在内巴科夫，而他们已制服并抓住了那里的领主。
vyslechni_s_lapky_pracuje_I08y
Olda, the son of Lord Semine, is in league with the bandits!
塞米领主之子奥达竟与强盗勾结在一起！
vyslechni_vilem_byl_sice__iKll
William was suspicious enough, and I probably could have asked him a lot of questions, but why do that when I could just kill him? We'll see what happens now...
威廉身上疑点重重，或许我可以向他盘问一些问题，但是既然我有机会杀死他，还有必要再问吗？就来看看还会发生什么吧......
vyslechni_vilem_je__08bb
I decided I'd hit William with everything I had. He still couldn't be ruled out as a suspect.
我决定全力以赴对付威廉，他仍有嫌疑，无法被排除。
vystav_me_pak_uz_zbyvalo__OQg2
All I had to do was to display the sword on the wall at the town hall for all to see and the ruse was complete.
我要做的就是将行会剑放到市政厅的墙上，好让所有人看到，我们的计策便大功告成。
vystav_me_ted_uz_zbyva_je_nzj5
Now all I have to do is to mount the sword on the wall of the Kuttenberg Town Hall to make the whole ruse work. Somehwere below the clock, I expect. Without being seen, naturally.
现在我要做的就是将行会剑放到库滕堡市政厅的墙上，以确保我们的计策得以奏效，最好就在时钟下面。当然，我可不能被发现。
vystopuj__ovce_pasacka_ne_WQSB

The shepherd boy Natan's sheep are mysteriously disappearing. I promised to help him. I should try to track down this werewolf. At a nearby crossroads I found a bloody stain and a broken arrow. I think Mutt should be able to sniff this werewolf out.
牧童纳坦的羊羔神秘失踪，我答应会给他提供帮助。我得想办法追查到那只狼人。在附近的路口处，我发现了一记血渍和一支折断的箭矢。牧童认为呆呆应该可以帮我们揪出这只狼人。
vystopuj__ovce_pasacka_ne_xtcF

The shepherd boy Natan's sheep are mysteriously disappearing. I promised to help him. I should try to track down this werewolf. Perhaps the best thing would be to start at the nearest crossroads, just north of Natan's hut, where he discovered a bloody stain.
牧童纳坦的羊羔神秘失踪，我答应会给他提供帮助。我得想办法追查到那只狼人，从附近最近的路口开始调查或许是最好的选择，而那些路口就在纳坦小屋的北边，纳坦也曾在那里发现了血渍。
vystopuj__vlkodlaci_stopy_fmfd
From the bloody stain at the crossroads where Natan sent me, the werewolf tracks led me to the camp of the vagrants.
从纳坦让我查看的那记血渍所在的路口出发，狼人的踪迹将我带到了流浪汉营地。
vysvobod__hans_byl_na_pra_Atnb
I managed to get Janosh out. Now all he has to do is escape to the Devil's Den.
我已解救亚诺什，现在他要做的便是逃到“魔窟”。
vysvobod__hans_je_na_pran_3679
I have to free Janosh now.
现在我必须释放亚诺什。
vysvobod__hans_je_na_pran_BnSv
I have to free Janosh now. The local bailiff gave me the keys to let Janosh out of the pillory after I treated the wounded villager.
现在我必须释放亚诺什。在医治了受伤村民后，我从执行官那里拿到了解开木枷的钥匙。
vysvobod__hans_je_na_pran_ceEw
I managed to get Janosh out. The local bailiff let him go after I had treated the wounded villager.
我已解救亚诺什。在医治了受伤村民后，执行官同意让亚诺什离开。
vysvobod__hans_je_na_pran_CoLP
I have to free Janosh now. I managed to steal the key, so all I have to do is let Janosh out when there's an opportunity.
现在我必须释放亚诺什。我已经偷走了打开木枷的钥匙，待时机成熟，我便可以把亚诺什放走。
vysvobod__hans_je_na_pran_Gvog
I have to free Janosh now.
现在我必须释放亚诺什。
vysvobod__hans_je_na_pran_zDzc
I managed to get him out. I released him at a good time using the stolen key.
我已解救亚诺什。凭借偷来的钥匙，我趁机将他放了出来。
vysvobod__pomohl_jsem_na__eZ4O

I found out Vavak was imprisoning two coiners in the secret mint. They were so broken they didn't even want to get out, that's how afraid of Vavak they were. But when I got rid of the guards who were guarding them, they overcame their fear and regained their freedom.
我发现瓦万克在那间秘密铸币厂内囚禁了两个铸币工。他们对瓦万克的恐惧早已让他们万念俱灰，甚至连牢房都不愿踏出半步，但当我处理掉了看管的守卫时，他们克服了恐惧，得以重获自由。
vysvobod__veznenym_preger_iDOx
I found out Vavak was imprisoning two coiners in the secret mint. But I didn't help them escape.
我在那间秘密铸币厂里发现了两个被瓦万克囚禁的铸币工，但并未帮助他们逃脱。
vysvobod__v_tajne_vavakov_yDPK

I found out Vavak is imprisoning two coiners in the secret mint. They're so broken they don't even want to get out, that's how afraid of Vavak they are. If I get rid of the guards guarding them, perhaps they'll overcome their fear and be free again.
我发现瓦万克在那间秘密铸币厂内囚禁了两个铸币工。他们对瓦万克的恐惧早已让他们万念俱灰，甚至连牢房都不愿踏出半步。如果我能解决掉那些看守他们的守卫，或许他们就能克服恐惧，重获自由。
vytahni_l_pak_jsem_ho_vyt_ANa6
I just pulled him out then.
我把他拉了出来。
vytahni_l_tahat_ven_ho_al_t8nX
No way I'm pulling him out, though. He's covered in shit, and he's getting quite putrid himself.
要我把他拉出来，想都别想。他现在不仅满身污秽，而且还尸臭逼人。
vytahni_l_ted_uz_musim_je_MZ54
Now all I have to do is pull him out of there.
现在我得把他拉出来。
vytas_mec_beze_zbrane_se__Ox86
There'll be no swordplay without a sword. I need to have one in my hand.
手中无剑，何谈剑术。先把剑拿好再说。
vytas_mec_beze_zbrane_se__U11q
There's no swordplay without swords, so I took one in my hand.
手中无剑，何谈剑术。手中有剑，锋芒毕露。
vyzen_cer_certi_maji_trop_0wCF
The devils are said to make mischief in the fireplaces on the Crone's side of the castle. All I have to do is to find the fireplaces and sprinkle them with the water I was given.
据说那些魔鬼就在老妪塔一侧城堡中的壁炉里捣乱。我要做的就是找到那些壁炉，然后朝它们泼洒我得到的圣水。
vyzen_cer_certi_udajne_vy_lCoO
The devils are said to come out of fireplaces on the Maiden's side of the castle. I am supposed to visit these gates of hell and treat them with water.
据说那些魔鬼是从少女塔一侧城堡中的壁炉里出来的。我得去瞧瞧这些地狱之门，用圣水处理掉它们。
vyzen_cer_ohniste_jsem_na_tjUq

The devils were said to make mischief in the fireplaces on the Crone's side of the castle. I found the fireplaces and sprinkled them so that the devils wouldn't dare show themselves. That should be enough for Manyeta.
据说那些魔鬼就在老妪塔一侧城堡中的壁炉里捣乱。我找到了那些壁炉，同时也朝它们泼洒了圣水，如此一来那些魔鬼就不敢再现身了。对曼伊塔来说，这样应该足够了。
vyzen_cer_vsechna_ohniste_7PfG
The devils were said to come out of fireplaces on the Maiden's side of the castle. I found all the fireplaces and sprinkled water on them to block their path. I am sure Bertha will be happy.
据说那些魔鬼是从少女塔一侧城堡中的壁炉里出来的。我找到了所有壁炉，也朝它们泼洒圣水，封锁了魔鬼进入人间的道路。我确信伯莎会为此而感到欣喜的。
vyzen_ovc_olbrama_uz_zadn_lhDI
Olbram doesn't have to care about sheep anymore...
奥尔布拉姆没必要再操心那些羊了......
vyzen_ovc_to_nedopadlo_mo_FyzH

vyzrad_me_zminil_jsem_pre_akiO
I told Linhart the cobbler that Menhard and Arne were trying to set them up. He was quite interested and said I should tell Emmeram the butcher about it, since he's the leader.
我将门哈德和阿耳涅企图陷害一事告诉了鞋匠林哈特，他对此饶有兴趣，并让我将这一消息向屠夫艾默拉姆汇报，毕竟他才是真正的话事人。
vyzrad_me_zminil_jsem_pre_eEit

我将门哈德和阿耳涅企图陷害一事告诉了鞋匠林哈特，他对此饶有兴趣，并让我将这一消息向屠夫艾默拉姆汇报，毕竟他才是真正的话事人。但最终，我没有向艾默拉姆透露任何事情。
vyzvedni__damian_mi_stale_HBTz

达米安尚未将赌资交给我。

vyzvedni__hastal_byl_nads_dGHn

vyzvedni__menhart_je_mrtv_xgGO

I beat Thomlin, but as it turns out he no longer has the thunderstone. It was recently stolen from him. Thomlin suspects Peter and Hensel from Dolany, because they had been badgering him about the stone.
我战胜了托姆林，但他已经没有雷石了。雷石最近被偷走了，托姆林怀疑是多兰尼的彼得和亨泽尔干的，因为他们一直在向托姆林打听这块石头的事。
vyzvedni__porazil_jsem_th_wyC7
Thomlin Bruthans' thunderstone is mine now I've bested him in a fight. I should stop by and pick it up.
托姆林·布鲁桑斯的雷石是我的了，因为我战胜了他。我应该顺路去取一下。

任务完成，只需从卡雷尔那里拿回属于我的报酬。

我终于能挑战瑟鲁什并获取他的金质徽章了，但当我打败他时，才发现他早已将那枚徽章输给了特罗斯科维茨的酒馆老板贝蒂。所以如果想得到徽章，我还得打败贝蒂。
vyzvi_a_p_konecne_muzu_vy_He7o
I can finally challenge Thrush and get that beautiful gold badge. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.
我终于可以向瑟鲁什发起挑战，好赢得那枚精美的金质徽章，这可是个千载难逢的机会。

即便是战无不胜的大师也有落败的一天。倘若我向巴纳比发起挑战，或许有机会把他打败。
vyzvi_bar_vyzva_prijata_n_ib4S
It took a bit of doing, but in the end I managed to persuade Barnaby to fight me. I only have one chance, so I have to try my best!
尽管费了一些口舌，但我最终还是成功说服了巴纳比与我进行一场比试。只有一次机会的我必须全力以赴！
vyzvi_dam_ceka_me_zapas_s_unJT
The fight with Damian awaits me.
与达米安的决斗正等着我。
vyzvi_dam_jako_prvniho_ma_i42V
The first person I should challenge is the beggar Damian. He spends his days in the Hole in the Wall drinking or begging somewhere close to the entrance.
我第一个要挑战的人将是乞丐达米安，此人历来都在“墙洞”的大门周围乞讨，其余时间就在店里放歌纵酒。
vyzvi_hej_nejdriv_jsem_me_icMu
I was supposed to fight young Lord Semine first. He is nowhere to be found though. So Gnarly himself will take his place. He said I should challenge him when I'm ready.
塞米少主本该是我的第一个对手，但四处都寻不得他的踪影，因此格纳利将亲自上阵顶替。待我准备就绪后，就可以向他发起挑战。
vyzvi_hej_nejdriv_jsem_me_sGpK
I was supposed to fight young Lord Semine first. He is nowhere to be found though. So Gnarly himself took his place. He may not be a young man anymore, but he still got the better of me.
塞米少主本该是我的第一个对手，但四处都寻不得他的踪影，因此格纳利亲自顶替上阵。或许他早已不复当年之勇，但我依然难以与之比肩。
vyzvi_hej_nejdriv_jsem_me_WTrM
I was supposed to fight young Lord Semine first. He is nowhere to be found though. So Gnarly himself took his place. Let's see what the old captain is made of.
塞米少主本该是我的第一个对手，但四处都寻不得他的踪影，因此格纳利亲自顶替上阵，那就让我们来见识见识这个老队长的本事吧。
vyzvi_hej_nejdriv_jsem_me_yAoa
I was supposed to fight young Lord Semine first. He is nowhere to be found though. So Gnarly himself took his place. He's been in a fight or two, but I still had the upper hand and prevailed.
塞米少主本该是我的第一个对手，但四处都寻不得他的踪影，因此格纳利亲自顶替上阵。他还算有点本事，但我仍然占据上风，在决斗中胜出。
vyzvi_hro_frantisek_uz_ma_fAux
Frantishek already has his most exuberant years behind him, but he likes to reminisce. I hope I win, otherwise I may be just about ripe for his services.
弗兰蒂谢克的风采早已不复当年，但却喜欢将过往成就挂在嘴边。但愿我能打败他，否则我或许就要亲自体验他提供的掘墓服务。
vyzvi_hro_zadny_velmistr__3Ky2
No grandmaster should take his title to the grave. If I challenge him to a fight, maybe I'll manage to defeat Frantishek. I just have to remember his one condition and come to see him at night.
任何一位大师都不应该将他的名号带进坟墓里。倘若要向弗兰蒂谢克发起挑战，我就得尽力击败他。他要求我晚上再去找他，我得谨记于心。
vyzvi_jen_ceka_me_zapas_s_SLZS

我要和亨泽尔搏斗。

vyzvi_mal_ceka_me_zapas_s_a1Yw
I'm going to fight with Malik.
我要和马利克搏斗。
vyzvi_mal_jako_dalsiho_ma_wkKF

vyzvi_mla_jako_prvni_prot_aOWo
My first opponent was young Lord Semine and he got the best of me. Hopefully, I'll have better luck with my next opponent.
我在第一场迎战塞米少主的战斗中落败，但愿我能在与下一位对手对决的过程中多沾好运。

vyzvi_mla_jako_prvni_prot_wygI
My first opponent is young Lord Semine. Now I just have to beat him.
塞米少主是我的第一个对手，现在我必须将其击败。
vyzvi_mla_jako_prvni_prot_xdf6

我在第一场迎战塞米少主的决斗中胜出，现在来看看下一位对手是谁吧。
vyzvi_na__ceka_me_zapas_s_39yc
The fight with Damian and Zavish awaits me. One stinks to high heaven and the other smells like he was just pulled out of a barrel. Perhaps I should hold my breath in the beginning.
眼下我正面临着一场要与达米安和扎维什进行的搏斗。他们这两个人，一个臭得令人作呕，而另一个闻起来就像刚从酒桶里打捞上来，搏斗一开始我或许就得屏住呼吸。
vyzvi_na__ceka_me_zapas_s_fVOa
The fight with Tobias awaits me.
与托比亚斯的决斗正等着我。
vyzvi_na__ceka_me_zapas_s_j8zm
The fight with Marcus awaits me.
与马库斯的决斗正等着我。
vyzvi_na__ceka_me_zapas_s_jTfw
The fight with Paskal awaits me.
与帕斯卡尔的决斗正等着我。
vyzvi_na__ceka_me_zapas_s_S9xl
The fight with Ventza awaits me.
与文扎的决斗正等着我。
vyzvi_na__ceka_me_zapas_s_Sbg5
The fight with Stanley awaits me.
与斯坦利的决斗正等着我。
vyzvi_na__ceka_me_zapas_s_Uv4Y
The fight with Tuma awaits me.
与图马的决斗正等着我。
vyzvi_na__ceka_me_zapas_s_xHSZ
A fight with Goliath, the local champion, awaits me.
与此处冠军搏击手歌利亚的决斗正等着我。
vyzvi_na__jako_druheho_ma_aekg
The farmer Tuma is the second one I have to challenge to a fight. He owns a farm in Horschan, which keeps him busy all day long, though he'll definitely take a moment to fight with me.
农夫图马将是我第二个要挑战的对手。他名下有一间设立在霍斯昌的农场，尽管他整日为工作马不停蹄，但是跟我打上一会对他来说应该不成问题。
vyzvi_na__jako_druheho_ma_eUC1
The hired hand Bohunek is the second person I have to challenge to fight. He takes care of the horses at the inn in Zhelejov.
雇工波胡内克将是我第二个要挑战的对手，而他日常会在哲勒约夫的酒馆照看马匹。
vyzvi_na__jako_druhy_je_n_E9VA
The second one up is the blacksmiths' Paskal. He spends his days in the forge learning his craft, but he'll definitely make time for me.
我要挑战的第二个对手是铁匠帕斯卡尔。他每天都在铁匠铺里学习手艺，但他肯定会抽出时间来“招待”我的。
vyzvi_na__jako_prvniho_ma_5IG7
The hired hand Tobias, who they call Darling, is the first up for me to challenge. He's a hired hand from the horses from Grund, but I can meet him in Horschan, where he goes to Thomlin's to fight.
人们称之为“达令”的雇工托比亚斯将是第一个我要挑战的对手。此人是一位来自格兰德的马夫，他也常到托姆林那里参与搏击，因此我在霍斯昌就能找到他。
vyzvi_na__jako_prvniho_ma_XnDN
The first one I'm supposed to challenge to fight is the hired hand Ventza. He's the son of a local farmer, but I'm certain he prefers rougher entertainment over work.
我第一个要挑战的对手将是雇工文扎。此人是当地农夫的儿子，但我敢肯定，跟农活相比，他更喜欢些爷们干的消遣。
vyzvi_na__jako_prvniho_mu_OHPk
First, I have to challenge the musician Hannes to a fight. He is staying right in the Zhelejov inn.
首先，我得向乐师汉尼斯发起挑战，而他现在就待在哲勒约夫酒馆里。
vyzvi_na__jako_tretiho_ma_2S23
The third challenger for a fight is the Bruthans' hired hand Stanley. He works on Thomlin's farm, so he naturally fights in his club.
我的第三个对手将是布鲁桑斯手下的雇工斯坦利，此人平日就在托姆林的农场里干活，因此在他的俱乐部里打搏击倒也不足为奇。
vyzvi_na__jako_tretiho_my_nDpq
The barber Fiala is the third person I have to challenge to fight. I can apparently find him in the baths by the inn.
理发师菲亚拉将是我第三个要挑战的对手，显然只要到酒馆旁的澡堂里就能找到他。
vyzvi_na__muj_treti_proti_kezC

My third opponent is supposed to be the hulking Goliath. He can usually be found somewhere in the vicinity of Mole's tavern. So far he's an undefeated champion, so he'll definitely agree to a matchup.
大块头歌利亚将会是我的第三个对手，此人通常出没于摩尔的酒馆附近。目前为止，他仍然保持着不败的战绩，所以渴求一败的他定会欣然接受我的挑战。
vyzvi_na__muj_treti_proti_sDcu

My third opponent will be Marcus, the son of the Miskowitz innkeeper. During the day, he helps his father at the tavern, hopefully I'll convince him to put his work aside for a while and come measure his strength with me.
米斯科维茨酒馆老板的儿子马库斯将会是我的第三个对手。他通常在白天协助他父亲打理酒馆，但愿我能说服他暂且将工作搁置一旁，并来与我比划比划。
vyzvi_na__ve_tretim_kole__vLtK
In the third round I'm supposed to fight both Damian and Zavish at the same time. Zavish is probably already waiting for me.
我的第三场搏击将同时迎战达米安和扎维什，估计此时的扎维什早已恭候多时。
vyzvi_na__vyzval_jsem_na__NyOq
The fight with Bohunek awaits me.
与波胡内克的决斗正等着我。
vyzvi_na__vyzval_jsem_na__oJ72
The fight with the barber Fiala awaits me.
与理发师菲亚拉的决斗正等着我
vyzvi_na__vyzval_jsem_na__VAcE
The fight with Hannes awaits me.
与汉尼斯的决斗正等着我。
vyzvi_nes_na_svatbe_jsem__tHGE
I ran into a lonely girl at the wedding who was just about to cry. So I asked her to dance to cheer her up.
我在婚宴上碰到了位姑娘，孤零零的她欲哭无泪，所以我邀请她跳支舞，以此提振她的心情。
vyzvi_nes_oslovila_me_zen_AwtI

I was approached by a woman who asked me to dance with her daughter. She said no local man noticed the poor girl and it made her sad. One dance never killed anybody, so I agreed. Her daughter's name is Doubravka.
有位妇人找上我，希望我能与她的女儿一起跳舞。据说此地的男士都对那个可怜的姑娘视而不见，女孩尤为伤感。妇人的女儿叫做杜布拉娃，不过是和她跳支舞，又不会掉块肉，所以我同意了这一请求。
vyzvi_nes_oslovila_me_zen_WD8L

I was approached by a woman who asked me to dance with her daughter. She said no local man noticed the poor girl and it made her sad. At first, I refused, but then I asked her daughter to dance anyway. Her name is Doubravka.
有位妇人找上我，希望我能与她的女儿一起跳舞。据说此地的男士都对那个可怜的姑娘视而不见，女孩尤为伤感。起初我拒绝了这一请求，但最终还是邀请了那位名叫杜布拉娃的姑娘跳舞。
vyzvi_nes_zatancoval_jsem_HTCi

I danced with Doubravka, a poor girl no one else would dance with. I can't really blame them. Dancing with her is dangerous. Even in battle, no one ever stomped on my feet that hard. So when she asked how I liked it, I told her exactly what I thought of her dancing skills. She started crying and ran off. Should I comfort her?
我与杜布拉娃跳了支舞。没人愿意跟这个可怜姑娘跳舞，如今看来情有可原，毕竟跟她跳舞真是九死一生，即便在战场上，也没人能像她那样用力地践踏我的双脚。当她问我作何感受之时，我把我对她舞技的真实感受全盘托出，随后梨花带雨的她就跑开了，我该去安慰她吗？
vyzvi_nes_zatancoval_jsem_Up4V

I danced with Doubravka, a poor girl no one else would dance with. I can't really blame them. Dancing with her is dangerous. Even in battle, no one ever stomped on my feet that hard. But when she asked how I liked it, I didn't have the heart to tell her the truth. I hope I don't live to regret it.
我与杜布拉娃跳了支舞。没人愿意跟这个可怜姑娘跳舞，如今看来情有可原，毕竟跟她跳舞真是九死一生，即便是在战场上，也没人能像她那样用力地践踏我的双脚。当她问我作何感受之时，我并不忍心说出真相，但愿我不会为此后悔。
vyzvi_pan_nakonec_jsem_vy_bPI9
Finally, I challenged old Lord Semine. Gnarly warned me not to underestimate him despite his age, so let's see what he's got.
最后，我向塞米大人发起了挑战。格纳利还警告我，别因塞米大人的年纪而低估了他的实力，那就来见识一下他的本事吧。
vyzvi_pan_nakonec_jsem_vy_ne6Q

Finally, I challenged old Lord Semine. Gnarly warned me not to underestimate him despite his age. I took his advice to heart and didn't let him catch me off guard. At the end, Lord Semine gave me my well-deserved reward.
最后，我向塞米大人发起了挑战。格纳利还警告我，别因塞米大人的年纪而低估了他的实力，而我也将此警示谨记于心，没让塞米大人打我个措手不及。最终，塞米大人给了我一份丰厚奖励。
vyzvi_pan_nakonec_jsem_vy_RIfe

Finally, I challenged old Lord Semine. Gnarly warned me not to underestimate him despite his age. I reckon I didn't take his advice to heart as closely as I should have because Lord Semine beat me handily.
最后，我向塞米大人发起了挑战。格纳利还警告我，别因塞米大人的年迈而低估了他的实力。我本该把格纳利的警示放在心上，但我疏忽大意了，最终在决斗中全线溃败。
vyzvi_pan_nakonec_mam_vyz_7yKi
Finally, I'm to challenge old Lord Semine. Gnarly warned me not to underestimate him despite his age.
最后，我向塞米大人发起了挑战。格纳利还警告我，别因塞米大人的年纪而低估了他的实力。
vyzvi_ryc_jako_dalsiho_js_dSs3
I then challenged Svatopluk, the Bailiff's son. Even though he's the Bailiff's son, I didn't give him a chance.
我向执行官之子斯瓦蒂亚发起了挑战。即便他是执行官之子，我也没有手下留情。
vyzvi_ryc_jako_dalsiho_js_IuLd
I then challenged Svatopluk, the Bailiff's son. You could really tell he had been practicing. He didn't give me a chance and defeated me.
我向执行官之子斯瓦蒂亚发起了挑战。看得出来他一直在勤加练习，毫无还手之力的我被他击败。
vyzvi_ryc_jako_dalsiho_ma_CdzC
My next opponent is Svatopluk, the Bailiff's son.
我的下一位对手是执行官之子，斯瓦蒂亚。
vyzvi_ryc_jako_dalsiho_ma_Zobd
I then challenged Svatopluk, the Bailiff's son. Let's see if I can beat him.
我向执行官之子斯瓦蒂亚发起了挑战，至于我能否将他击败，拭目以待吧。
vyzvi_vir_ceka_me_zapas_s_771u
I'm going to fight with Vira.
我要和威拉搏斗。
vyzvi_vir_jako_posledniho_wwJM
The only one left is the strongest miller's hand, Vira. During the day, I can find him in the mill, but he'll definitely be glad to drop work for a while and have a proper brawl.
只剩磨坊主最强的手下威拉。白天，他会在磨坊，但肯定会乐意暂时放下工作，好好搏斗一场。
vyzvi_zav_jako_prvniho_mu_VRYr

Zavish is the second person I should challenge. He spends his days and evenings at a table (or under a table) in the Hole in the Wall, so I should have no trouble finding him. But I have to make certain he's well and drunk when the fighting starts.
扎维什是我将要挑战的第二个对手。他向来没日没夜地在“墙洞”里待着，要么在酒桌边畅饮，要么在酒桌底酣睡，总之要想找到他并不困难，但最好在跟他搏斗前确保他能喝到痛快。
vyzvi_zav_zavis_uz_ma_slu_an1Q
Zavish is good and smashed, so he's ready for the fight.
喝醉了的扎维什进入了状态，所以也做好了决斗的准备。
waitforsa_sam_uz_by_mel_b_OoeG
Sam should be back by now.
塞缪尔这个时候也该回来了。
waitforsa_zizka_nechce_ni_dzp2
Zizka doesn't want to do anything till Sam gets back from Kolin. I'm going to have to wait for about a day.
在塞缪尔从科林回来之前，杰式卡并不打算做出任何行动，我也将不得不等上将近一天的时间。
wait_mel_jsem_pockat_az_p_Omo3
I should have waited until the city council meeting, but it doesn't matter anymore. Nothing will come of the plan now.
我本该等待市政会议的到来，但是已经不重要了。这场计划如今毫无成果。
wait_musim_pockat_par_dni_JzGs
Betty and I did what we could. Now we have to wait and see what the council decides and pray they choose her for the City Bathhouse. We'll see.
贝蒂与我已竭尽所能，现在只需耐心等待市议会的决定，但愿他们会将市立澡堂的名号颁给贝蒂，走着瞧吧。
wait_to_e_konsel_si_prohl_ukc3
The alderman is inspecting the bathhouse. I have to wait till he gives his verdict.
市议员正在检查澡堂。我得等他做出裁断。
wait_to_e_mam_to_jako_v_m_VaGX
I shouldn't have committed crimes during the alderman's inspection. I'm going to have a hard time explaining this to him or to Betty.
我就不应该在议员视察期间干那些蠢事，接下来我不蜕几层皮都很难向议员或者贝蒂解释清楚。
waldemar__event_caption_RUFU
Weirdo
古怪之人
waldemar__event_descripti_uFyt
You see a strangely dressed man with spectacles, contentedly whistling.
你看到一个身着奇装异服的眼镜男，正心满意足地吹着口哨。
waldemar__player_caption_udMd
Weirdo
古怪之人
waldemar__player_descript_ZqIm
You see a strangely dressed man with spectacles, contentedly whistling.
你看到一个身着奇装异服的眼镜男，正心满意足地吹着口哨。
wine_nared_vino_XHNf

I heard that the councillor has his own personal cask of wine somewhere here, and that chamomile doesn't agree with him! So I reckon he won't be happy if I add some Chamomile Brew to his wine. Now I just have to find the cask. It's somewhere in the pantry and stands on tall legs, it seems.
据说那位议员在此地私藏了一桶红酒，甘菊熬制剂可不允许这样的事情发生！如果我往他的红酒里渗入甘菊熬制剂，估计他就得咬牙切齿咯。而现在我要做的就是找到那桶酒，看来它应该储藏室里，存放在高挑支架上。
wine_videli_me_pri_redeni_Zjrg

Kurva! I was seen pouring the brew into the cask, so there's no chance they'll serve this wine to Naaz now. I have to find another way to spoil his visit, otherwise the Kingfisher baths will go down the drain.
Kurva（该死）！有人看到我将甘菊熬制剂倒进了那桶酒里，既然如此他们绝对不会再用来招待纳兹。我得想点别的办法来搞砸他的本次造访，不然翠鸟澡堂将会一落千丈。
wine_vino_jsem_naredil_do_vY9c
I found Naaz's cask and poured Chamomile Brew into it. Let's hope the Councillor drinks a lot and feels sick as a dog.
我找到了纳兹的那桶红酒，并朝里灌注了甘菊熬制剂。希望他喝得痛快，也拉个痛快。
wolf_ambu__event_caption_MSdV

狼群

你遇到了一个男人，而一群狼也突然出现，将你团团围住。

You come across a woman and suddenly wolves appear and surround you.
你遇到了一个女人，而一群狼也突然出现，将你团团围住。

wolf_ambu__player_descrip_wncF
You see a poor woman on the road surrounded by wolves. They're closing in.
你看到路上有个可怜的女子被狼群包围了，而狼群还在不断逼近。
wolves__event_caption_zzMG
Wolves!
狼群！
wolves__event_description_hy5K
There are a few dead bodies on the road, and wolves are pacing around them. They notice you straightaway.
路上有群狼正围着一些尸体来回走动，那些狼立马就注意到了你。
wolves__player_caption_bjOV
Wolves!
狼群！
wolves__player_description_dGsV
There are a few dead bodies on the road, and wolves are pacing around them. You're very lucky they haven't noticed you yet.
路上有群狼正围着一些尸体来回走动，十分幸运的你并没有被狼群察觉。
workassig_aby_mohli_micha_kheK
If Michael and George are to leave for Kuttenberg, they'll have to settle their debt with the innkeeper.
如果迈克尔和乔治想要前往库滕堡，他们就必须先还清欠给酒馆老板的债务。
workassig_hospodsky_zemre_NF9p
The innkeeper had an accident and died. It's odd how many people around me this happens to...
酒馆老板遭遇了不测，也因此不幸身亡。诸如此类事件在我身边发生了太多，简直耐人寻味......
workassig_povedlo_se_mi_v_NhVJ
I managed to settle Michael and George's debt with the innkeeper, because as true artistes, of course, labour is not for them...
我成功还清了迈克尔和乔治欠给酒馆老板的债务，毕竟像他们这种艺术家，脏累活确实不适合他们......
workassig_promluvil_jsem__Tqk7
I talked to the innkeeper and found out what needs to be done for Michael and George to settle their debt.
我与酒馆老板进行了交谈，弄清了迈克尔和乔治要还清债务所需完成的事项。
workassig_udelal_jsem_za__Xrbr
Seeing as Michael and George are sensitive musicians averse to labour, I did some work for them so they wouldn't have to. I should tell the innkeeper.
考虑到迈克尔和乔治都是些心思敏感的乐师，对于脏累活很是抵触，因此我替他们完成了些工作，这样他们就不必亲自动手了。我得将成果告知酒馆老板。
zabezpec__jdi_se_podivat__vgYp
An unpleasant surprise was waiting for us inside the inn. Someone must have got in! I need to search the place and secure it.
抵达酒馆的我们迎面撞上了一场令人不快的意外。肯定有人闯进了这里！我必须搜查此地，保证酒馆安全。
zabezpec__po_prichodu_do__7l1S
Upon arriving at the King Solomon, we found that several of Erik's men were already there, and they'd managed to kill Sam's men. I had to deal with them.
抵达所罗门王酒馆后，我们发现埃里克的几个同伙早已来到了酒馆，还杀死了塞缪尔的手下。我不得不将他们解决掉。
zabij_cen_cenek_je_mrtvy__cqoN
Chenyek is dead, just like Knuckles wanted. Now nobody will stand in the way of tough fellahs and good business!
程叶科已死，巧指如愿以偿。现在没人能阻止这些硬汉创立一番事业了！
zabij_cen__stulec_po_mne__UztQ
Knuckles wants me to take care of Chenyek. He's been holding the Guild back for too long, stopping them from reaching their true potential. He wants me to kill him.
巧指想让我处理掉程叶科，后者已经耽误了公会太长时间，让这个组织始终无法真正发挥自身潜力，因此巧指想让我杀掉他。
zabij_cen_stulec_se_splet_jalF
Knuckles made a mistake when he thought I'd want to hurt Chenyek. A mistake he paid for with his life.
巧指竟以为我想伤害程叶科，他因此犯了个错，而犯错的代价就是自己的生命。
zabij_gro_nezbylo_mi_nic__XKF5

Musa's trial didn't exactly go as planned. We managed to convict the leader of the camp, Grozav, of the murder, but instead of surrendering and accepting his punishment, he pulled out his weapon. Thankfully we killed him before he could hurt anyone or escape.
对穆萨的审判并未如期进行，我们找出了营地首领格罗扎夫犯有谋杀罪的证据，但他并没有束手就擒以接受审判，而是拔出了武器！幸好我们在他伤害他人或逃跑之前就将其击毙。
zabij_gro_pokud_chci_tuhl_BxEV
Musa's trial didn't exactly go as planned. We managed to convict the leader of the camp, Grozav, of the murder, but instead of surrendering and accepting his punishment, he pulled out his weapon!
对穆萨的审判并未如期进行，我们找出了营地首领格罗扎夫犯有谋杀罪的证据，但他并没有束手就擒以接受审判，而是拔出了武器！
zabij_hez_karlik_ma_stest_N2Wt
Charlie got lucky and will live on.
查理运气很好，他还能活下去。
zabij_hez_nakonec_to_ale__1oFk
However, it didn't end well. Gules died, and the whole thing fell apart.
不过，结局并不如人所愿。古勒斯死了，事情都搞砸了。
zabij_hez_od_cervenaka_vi_3ZQk

I know from Gules that Charlie has driven a group of starving charcoal-burners crazy somewhere in the forests behind Kerchak, with whom he's now plundering the area. They didn't even try to find a new camp, so I don't have to look for them. The question is whether I have to kill Charlie along with those poor charcoal-burners. Maybe there's a way to negotiate with them. Or if I kill Charlie, maybe they'll leave it alone.
我从古勒斯那里得知，查理在科尔察克后方的森林里让一群食不果腹的烧炭工走上了邪路，他们一起在那附近大肆掠夺。他们甚至没有尝试搭建新的营地，所以我也不必额外费心寻找他们。但问题是，我真的有必要杀死查理和那些可怜的烧炭工吗？或许有办法和他们谈判，又或许只要我杀了查理，其他人都会偃旗息鼓。
zabij_hez_o_karlika_je_po_yg6I
Charlie has been dealt with. He won't be playing the handsome man anywhere anymore.
查理已经被解决了，他再也不会扮演花花公子来骗人了。
zabij_jana_planovane_miro_UA1T

The idea of a peaceful handover was a naive one. First an argument broke out that soon grew into a fight. I had to make a quick decision. Jan might be honourable, but he's also naive, dangerously so. There is a war on, and in war, it's the strong that win. And Baron Farkas is strong. I'm not proud of it, but he offered a better deal. At least Jan is with Peter now.
和平交接的想法太过天真。双方先是发生了争执，很快就发展成争斗。我不得不迅速做出决定。杨可能品格高尚，但他也很天真，这很危险。现在一场战争正在进行，而在战争中，强者才能获胜。而法卡斯男爵是强者。这事虽并不光彩，但他给出的条件更好。至少杨现在和彼得在一起了。
zabij_jana_planovane_miro_uIWj

The idea of a peaceful handover was a naive one. First an argument broke out that soon grew into a fight. I had to make a quick decision. Jan might be honourable, but he's also naive, dangerously so. There is a war on, and in war, it's the strong that win. And Baron Farkas is strong.
和平交接的想法太过天真。双方先是发生了争执，很快就发展成争斗。我不得不迅速做出决定。杨可能品格高尚，但他也很天真，这很危险。现在一场战争正在进行，而在战争中，强者才能获胜。而法卡斯男爵是强者。
zabij_kri_ac_nerad_musel__g3Nx
Reluctantly, I had to kill our potential ally at the Italian Court. We will have to manage on our own.
无奈之下，我不得不杀死意大利宫中本可以成为我盟友的人。后续我们得靠自己了。
zabij_kri_kristian_na_me__EGb6
Christian attacked me. If we want to keep our plan secret, he cannot leave alive.
克里斯蒂安对我发起了攻击。为避免计划败露，我必须取其性命。
zabij_pis_pista_je_nekde__KxWZ
Istvan is somewhere in the Crone. Time to end it with him.
伊斯特万就在老妪塔某处。是时候跟他做个了断了。
zabij_pis_pista_je_ze_hry_xT5Q
Istvan's dead. I finally got my revenge for everything that lying bastard did to us. I have my father's sword back, and most importantly, I found the key that will let us escape the castle.
伊斯特万死了，我终于让这个满口谎言的混蛋为他的所作所为付出了代价。我取回了父亲的佩剑，最重要的是，还找到了能让我们逃离城堡的钥匙。
zabij_pro_dle_dlouhe_deba_Z3QR
After much debate and argument we decided that Father Prokop was the murderer. I then killed him and hopefully stopped his murderous rampage.
经过费尽心力的探究与讨论后，我们断定是普罗科普神⽗就是杀人凶手。随后我便将其杀死，只愿能以此终结他的屠杀行径。
zabij_pro_dle_nasi_dlouhe_CvDv
After a long debate in which we concluded Father Prokop was the murderer, I just couldn't bring myself to kill the old man. I didn't want to have that on my conscience.
经过了漫长的探讨，我们得出了普罗科普神⽗就是凶手的结论，但是并不想让自己良心不安的我，无法下手杀死一位年迈的老者。
zabij_pro_dohodli_jsme_se_LGRP
We agreed that Father Prokop was the murderer and that we needed to kill him to stop his murderous rampage.
我们都认为普罗科普神⽗就是杀人凶手，为阻止他惨无人道的屠杀行为，我们必须把他杀死。
zabij_puk_hospodsky_ma_pr_1ZBM

Eggman's camp lies northwest of Grund in the middle of a small woods. I should head there as soon as possible and get rid of that malodorous murderer. But it won't be easy, he's said to be a real brawler.
鸡蛋佬的营地就位于格兰德西南边的一处小树林内。我得尽快前往那里，并解决掉这个臭气熏天的杀人犯。但这项差事并不简单，据说他非常能打。
zabij_puk_hospodsky_mel_p_zTy5
Problem solved. The innkeeper no longer needs to worry about the Eggman.
麻烦终结，那位酒馆老板再也不用担忧鸡蛋佬了。
zabij_puk_pukavec_sice_ne_B5fB
Eggman may not be completely dead but the inkeeper doesn't know that. Out of sight, out of mind as they say. The main thing is that I get paid.
鸡蛋佬可能没死透，不过酒馆老板对此也毫不知情。总之，眼不见心不烦，重要的是我拿到了报酬。
zabij_sav_abych_dokoncil__9hsE
To complete the ritual and give the sabre its magical powers, I must first kill a dog with it. At least that's what Aranka wants me to do, but what happens if I don't?
要想完成仪式并给军刀赋予魔力，我就必须先使用军刀杀死一只狗。至少这是阿兰卡要求我做的，但是如果我不顺从会怎样呢？
zabij_sav_jolanda_je_mrtv_KvKz
Aranka is dead and so is my hope for a reward. At least I can keep the sabre as a memento.
阿兰卡死了，而我获取报酬的期望也随之消逝。至少，我还能留着那把军刀当做纪念。
zabij_sav_rital_je_hotovy_Z8uP
The ritual is complete. If I did everything right, the sabre gained the power to curse anyone who gets struck with it.
仪式已经完成，如果我没有出任何差错的话，这把军刀已经附上了魔力，能够让被它击中的人受到诅咒。
zabij_sav_ritual_je_hotov_HjVY
The ritual is complete - at least Aranka thinks so… I may not have killed the dog, but I reckon the Voivode will like his sabre anyway.
仪式已经完成了——至少阿兰卡是这么想的......我可能没有杀死那条狗，但不管怎样，我猜司令官会喜欢他的新军刀的。
zabij_ste_nakonec_jsem_mu_5DZB

Musa's trial didn't exactly go as planned. We managed to convict Corporal Stephen Crow of the murder, but instead of surrendering and accepting his punishment, he pulled out his weapon. Thankfully we killed him before he could hurt anyone or escape.
对穆萨的审判并未如期进行，我们找出了斯蒂芬·克劳下士犯有谋杀罪的证据，但他并没有束手就擒以接受审判，而是拔出了武器！幸好我们在他伤害他人或逃跑之前就将其击毙。
zabij_ste_pokud_chci_tuhl_O9m8
Musa's trial didn't exactly go as planned. We managed to convict Corporal Stephen Crow of the murder, but instead of surrendering and accepting his punishment, he pulled out his weapon!

We need to kill all the soldiers in the camp!
我们得把营地里的士兵都杀光！

现在不再是打猎的好时机。

No henchman of Sigismund will be allowed to ravage the region with impunity. That's why the soldiers in the camp had to die.
任何一个西格斯蒙德的走狗都休想不受责罚地肆意破坏这片土地，所以营地里的那些士兵必须死。
zabij_zby_nejvetsi_nebezp_5WzP
The greatest threat has been eliminated, but if we don't kill all the enemies who infiltrated the castle, they might be able to open the gate from the inside!
最大的威胁已被消除，但如果我们不杀光已经潜入城堡的敌人，他们或许能从内部打开大门！
zabij_zby_vsichni_utocnic_Ofgc

所有潜入堡垒的攻击者都被击败了。

zachran_b_nechal_jsem_bra_PGqr
Christopher was in the courtyard at the time of the attack. He tried to defend the captured lords, but he didn't stand a chance.
在袭击发生时，克里斯托弗正在庭院里。他试图保护被俘虏的领主们，但实在寡不敌众。
zachran_b_pokud_se_rozhod_WGtp
The soldiers broke into the courtyard, surrounded Godwin's brother Christopher and cut him off from the others.
士兵们冲进庭院，包围了古德温的兄弟克里斯托弗，切断了他和其他人的联系。
zachran_b_rozhodl_jsem_se_0dPz
Without Godwin's help, Christopher probably would not have lived to see the end of the battle. Fortunately, he escaped only with injuries.
如果没有古德温的帮助，克里斯托弗很可能活不到战后。但万幸的是，他只是受了伤。
zachran_h_podarilo_se_mi__aafu

我成功找到并解救了猎场看守人。
zachran_k_bohuzel_jsem_ce_kHLI
Unfortunately, I waited too long, and the butcher started hanging Adder. I must quickly cut him down before he suffocates.
很遗憾，我等了太久，屠夫已经开始绞死阿德尔。我必须尽快把他救下，免得他窒息而死。
zachran_k_bohuzel_jsem_ko_7E5a
He wants to hang Adder, so I have to cut him loose before he suffocates.
他想要绞死阿德尔，所以我必须在他窒息之前给他松绑。
zachran_k_i_kdyz_se_mi_z__htRT
I managed to talk the butcher out of it, but he couldn't resist choking Adder a bit. I must quickly cut Adder's rope before he suffocates.
我成功说服了屠夫，但他没忍住，还是勒住了阿德尔。我得赶在阿德尔窒息前割断绳子。
zachran_k_jeji_manzel_giu_iLV6
Her husband Giuseppe caught them in flagranti, as they say in Italy. Fortunately, I managed to solve this predicament and rescue Adder.
厨师的丈夫朱塞佩当场抓住了这对奸夫淫妇，正如意大利语所言，他们真是flagranti（明目张胆）。万幸的是，我成功化解了这一窘境，救出了阿德尔。
zachran_k_jeji_manzel_giu_q6nD
Her husband Giuseppe caught them in flagranti, as they say in Italy. I should solve the situation quickly and rescue Adder.
厨师的丈夫朱塞佩当场抓住了这对奸夫淫妇，正如意大利语所言，他们真是flagranti（明目张胆）。我得尽快解决这一矛盾并解救阿德尔。
zachran_k_nakonec_jsem_ko_p7GM
Fortunately, I saved Adder before the butcher hanged him.
真是万幸，我在屠夫绞死阿德尔之前救下了他。
zachran_k_snazil_jsem_se__UTEO
I tried to talk the butcher out of it, but to no avail. The butcher and the rest of the villagers came at me. I have to get rid of them fast so I can save Adder.
我试图说服屠夫，却无济于事。屠夫伙同其余村民向我扑来，为了能够救出阿德尔，我必须尽快解决他们。
zachran_k_ted_ho_musim_za_uboR
The butcher has led Adder outside the village, towards Kuttenberg. I must get there quickly before it is too late.
屠夫已经领着阿德尔离开村庄，前往库滕堡。事不宜迟，我必须尽快赶往那里。
zachran_m_lapkove_v_tabor_5EgN
The bandits were holding the wounded Mikush in their camp. I took care of them, now I have to find out what's wrong Mikush so I can save him.
那伙强盗将受伤的米库什囚禁在了他们的营地里。我已将强盗尽数解决，现在得查看米库什的状态，看看该如何救治他。
zachran_m_lapkove_v_tabor_c11s
The bandits were holding the wounded Mikush in their camp. I took care of them. Poor Mikush was tortured and has infected wounds. I should clean and redress them. I hope that gives him some relief.
那伙强盗将受伤的米库什囚禁在了他们的营地里，而我也已将强盗尽数解决。可怜的米库什先前遭受了严刑拷打，身上的伤已经感染，我得帮他稍做清洗，并重新包扎伤口，但愿这能让他好受一些。
zachran_m_lapkove_v_tabor_ouEg
The bandits were holding the wounded Mikush in their camp. I took care of them, but I can't figure out what's wrong with Mikush.
那伙强盗将受伤的米库什囚禁在了他们的营地里。尽管我已将强盗这一麻烦解决，但却对米库什的状况无能为力。
zachran_m_mikus_byl_v_hro_A84y
I found Mikush, but there's nothing I can do to help him. There's no point now anyway.
尽管我找到了米库什，但却对其当下的状况无能为力，总之已经没必要再做任何事情。
zachran_m_mikus_byl_v_hro_rig1
The bandits were holding the wounded Mikush in their camp. I took care of them. Poor Mikush was tortured and has infected wounds. I tried to help him the best I could.
那伙强盗将受伤的米库什囚禁在了他们的营地里，而我也已将强盗尽数解决。可怜的米库什先前遭受了严刑拷打，身上的伤已经感染，我竭尽所能给他提供了救治。
zachran_m_mikus_byl_v_hro_rx2k
The bandits were holding the gravely wounded Mikush in their camp. Unfortunately, he was beyond help.
那伙强盗将身负重伤的米库什囚禁在了他们的营地里，而且不幸的是，他的状况已无药可救。
zachran_m_mikus_byl_v_hro_unYi
The bandits were holding the wounded Mikush in their camp. I took care of them. Poor Mikush was tortured and has infected wounds. Fortunately, I managed to save him.
那伙强盗将受伤的米库什囚禁在了他们的营地里，而我也已将强盗尽数解决。可怜的米库什先前遭受了严刑拷打，身上的伤已经感染，所幸我成功救治了他。
zachran_m_mikuse_jsem_sic_Wc8j
I found Mikush, but there's nothing I can do to help him. There's no point now anyway.
尽管我找到了米库什，但却对其当下的状况无能为力，总之已经没必要再做任何事情。
zachran_m_mikus_je_v_hroz_SbFf
The bandits are holding the wounded Mikush in their camp. I have to save him!
那伙强盗将受伤的米库什囚禁在了他们的营地里，我必须救他！
zachran_p_panu_ptackovi_h_5JAf
When the bells ring twelve times, Sir Hans will go to the gallows. I have to prevent it.
钟声敲响十二下之后，汉斯爵士就会被送上绞架，我绝不能让此事发生。
zachran_s_certa_zachranim_VyV9
If we are to rescue the Devil, we have to kill all the soldiers who are taking him to the camp.
要想解救酒鬼，我们就得杀光那些正将他押送至营地的士兵。
zachran_s_hanka_uprchl_pr_6gAr
Hanka fled from justice. Hopefully, he’ll leave Mikush’s family alone now.
汉卡逃脱了法律的制裁，只能希望他不要再骚扰米库什一家了。
zachran_s_k_chatrci_jsem__zpCW
I got to the hut too late. Both women came to a terrible end.
我没能及时赶到木屋，母女两早已惨遭不测。
zachran_s_musime_se_dosta_jgOY

I have to get Capon out of the ravine! There's a barricade of fallen trees at the back and steep cliffs on both sides. The only path leads down through the gorge. We'll fight our way to the mill and disappear in the forest beyond the pond.
我必须把卡蓬从峡谷中带出去！我们后方有倒下的树木形成的路障，两旁则是陡峭的山崖，唯一的道路向下穿过峡谷。我们要朝着磨坊杀出一条路来，然后消失在池塘那边的树林里。
zachran_s_nakonec_jsem_ho_lgF4

Hanka the bandit explained his point of view. He said that as a member of the family, part of the inheritance belongs to him, only due to his granfather's ill will towards him, he was left with nothing. I let him leave.
汉卡将他的过往全盘托出。他说他作为家族的一分子，理应得到遗产的一部分，要不是他外公对他嗤之以鼻，他又怎会落得两手空空呢，而我最后放走了他。
zachran_s_nebylo_co_resit_l0pv
I showed Hanka the bandit no mercy. I killed him.
我没有对那个强盗汉卡手下留情，直接将其斩于足下。
zachran_s_pan_jan_ptacek__fRf2
Hans Capon, Lord of Pirkstein, fell in the Trosky gorge.
汉斯·卡蓬，皮克斯坦因的领主，在特罗斯基峡谷中身亡。
zachran_s_podarilo_se_nam_CHdP
We managed to rescue the Dry Devil and spare him a certain death. He got shot in a tender spot, but it was far from a fatal wound, judging by the cadence with which he spewed expletives.
我们成功救出了酒鬼，他也因此免于一死。尽管身上的薄弱部位被射伤，但从他抑扬顿挫的咒骂声中不难看出，如此伤势还远不足以夺他性命。
zachran_s_prezili_jsme_s__I950

On the way to Nebakov fort we walked into a terrible trap. The bandits were waiting for us in the Trosky gorge. Thankfully, Providence was on our side, and me and Capon fought our way out of the gorge. Audentes fortuna iuvat!
在前往内巴科夫的途中我们中了危险的圈套，那些强盗就在特罗斯基峡谷里等着我们。万幸的是，受到上苍护佑，我与卡蓬杀出了一条血路，得以逃离峡谷。Audents fortuna iuvat（天助勇者）！
zachran_s_silenec_hanka_v_jXl7
That crazy bandit Hanka threatened Svatava that he'd slit Vendula's throat. He ended up doing it, then killed Svatava too.
那个强盗汉卡发了疯似地威胁斯瓦塔娅，说要把芙恩德拉的喉咙割破，谁知他竟真的下了如此毒手，随后也杀死了斯瓦塔娅。
zachran_s_svatava_ale_mez_WsXJ
In the meantime, Svatava died, so I reckon this story will stay without an ending.
斯瓦塔娅在此期间与世长辞，看来这场闹剧将永远都见不到它的结局。
zachran_s_u_chatrce_jsem__aWDP
I have to get to Mikush's hut as fast as possible to save Svatava and Vendula!
我得赶快回到米库什的家里解救斯瓦塔娅和芙恩德拉！
zachran_s_u_chatrce_jsem__XWNN
At the hut I found Hanka, the crazed bandit. He slit Vendula's throat, and now he's turning his sights to Svatava. I have to save her!
我抵达木屋，见到了那个疯头癫脑的强盗汉卡。他已将芙恩德拉的喉咙割破，现正打算把魔爪伸向斯瓦塔娅，我必须出手相救！
zacni_boj_bojuj_VHrk
A-Ha! Now I'm going to show everyone what Henry of Skalitz can do with a blade!
来呀！现在就让众人见识见识，斯卡利茨的亨利持剑在手时能使出怎样的本事！
zacni_kov_nakonec_jsem_me_Fcs6
In the end I had more important things to do than forge a sword.
跟锻造一把剑相比，我有更重要的事情要做。
zacni_s_k_pak_jsem_se_do__QW57
I got started, but it's a long time since I helped my father. Thankfully, Radovan is standing by if I need help with anything.
我开始了，但我已经很久没有给我父亲帮过忙了。值得庆幸的是，如果我需要任何帮助，拉多万就在旁边。
zacni_s_k_uz_mam_vsechno__GfP1
I've got everything I need, now I just need to forge the hunting sword and show what I can do.
万事俱备，现在只需要打造出狩猎剑，展示我的手艺就行了。
zahrej_si_zahral_jsem_si__4odW

Sir Hans Capon suffered a concussion during the battle in the ravine, which makes it all the more surprising he was already back to his snide remarks in the evening. I think it was because he finally didn't have to obey the orders of Sir Otto von Bergow and we'll soon be travelling back to Sasau.
在峡谷的那场战斗中，汉斯·卡蓬爵士受了脑震荡，不过，到晚上他就恢复到了先前那种满嘴挖苦之语的状态，这让人很是惊讶。估计是因为他终于不用再听从奥托·冯·波尔高使唤与摆布，而且，我们很快就要启程返回莎邵。
zahrej_si_zahrat_si_kostk_84E6
After all that happened, Capon is unusually cheerful, he even has a bit of his biting humour back. That's not bad at all for someone with a concussion.
经历了如此种种，卡蓬竟还一反常态地兴奋，甚至还拾回了些许往日刁蛮的幽默。对于一个遭受脑震荡的人来说，如此状态也不算太坏。
zajdi_do__doplnil_jsem_si_f4aM
Godwin helped himself to a jug of wine from his father's, or rather the family, cellars.
古德温从他父亲的酒窖，或者说是自家的酒窖里拿出了一壶酒，自己喝了起来。
zajdi_do__katerinu_jsem_v_RYRR
I didn't come across Katherine in the kitchen, but I did come across some wine and decided to steal it. I don't really know why I took such an unnecessary risk.
我在厨房里没有遇到凯瑟琳，但我发现了一些红酒并决定把它们偷走，我不知自己为何要冒如此无谓的风险。
zajdi_do__ve_sklepe_si_pr_YXuS
According to Liechtenstein, Martin Oderin keeps jugs of fine wine somewhere in the fortress for himself and his closest friends.
列支敦士登声称马丁·奥德林在堡垒的某个地方为他自己和好友藏了几壶美酒。
zajdi_si__palecek_me_slib_2GVz
Hermann Littlehead promised me a reward for carrying out the trick with Florian's ring.
赫尔曼承诺过，只要我利用弗洛里安的戒指实施诡计，他就会给我一份报酬。
zajdi_si__palecek_se_mi_o_m28r
Hermann Littlehead rewarded me handsomely afterwards. What's more, I realised that the world of knights and ladies has its unwritten rules and dark corners.
赫尔曼·“长柄斧”事后给了我丰厚的回报。另外，我也意识到骑士和贵妇们的世界也有它的潜规则和黑暗角落。
zajdi_za__aranka_mi_dala__NnxJ
Marika's mother, Aranka, told me what medicine I should bring to the wounded Bohush. Unfortunately, she didn't have all the necessary herbs, so I have to get the rest myself.
玛丽卡的母亲阿兰卡向我介绍了医治博胡什所需的药物。可惜的是，她无法提供所有必要的药草，所以我得亲自去将缺少的药草找来。
zajdi_za__bohuzel_jsem_ne_EXFf
Unfortunately, I didn't have time to go and see the nurse Klara.
很遗憾，我没有时间去找克拉拉。
zajdi_za__cas_vyprsel_zji_XYue
Čas vypršel a závod skončil. Zbývá promluvit s Bibrekem a zjistit, jak jsem si vedl.
zajdi_za__jan_ptacek_nema_jbAB

Sir Hans can't stand being ordered about. He's getting really fed up with serving Lord von Bergow. His conversations with Chamberlain Ulrich are especially unenjoyable. The two of them don't get on well.
汉斯爵士无法忍受遭人使唤，对于为冯·波尔高领主效力一事，他也逐渐心生厌倦。他与管家乌尔里希的交流极不愉快，两人很难相处。
zajdi_za__jan_ptacek_vypa_Rdq4

Sir Hans has looked a bit down since his conversation with Otto von Bergow. He's finally among lots of good-looking women at a feast, yet he stands in a corner in silence. I'll go and ask what's wrong.
在与奥托·冯·波尔高进行了一番交谈后，汉斯爵士看起来略显忧愁。如今的他终于有机会借助这场宴会与众多美人佳丽进行接触，但他此刻却默不作声地站在角落里，我得问问他到底怎么回事。
zajdi_za__katerinu_jsem_v_P90A
I didn't find Katherine in the kitchen, but the local cook helped me. She gave me wine for Capon and let me choose some other supplies for the journey.
我没能在厨房找到凯瑟琳，但是此处的厨师向我提供了帮助。她给了我一些能够交给卡蓬的红酒，还让我拿一些其它物资作为旅途补给。
zajdi_za__klara_me_pozada_BNbl
Klara asked me for help. Every wounded man needs to be treated and given the right medicine for his injury.
克拉拉向我请求帮助。当前每一位伤员都需要得到照料，还得给他们合适的药物进行治疗。
zajdi_za__kocoura_jsem_ne_ff89
I left Tomcat be and went my own way.
我和公猫告别，各奔东西。
zajdi_za__kovar_osina_del_HzaB
Blacksmith Osina was dragging his feet over Capon's armour, but at least I got something from him in the end.
铁匠奥西纳拖拖拉拉，始终没能交出卡蓬的护甲，但至少我最后还是从他那里弄到了点东西。
zajdi_za__mam_zajit_za_ka_bjJW
I'm supposed to go into the castle kitchen and ask for Katherine, a servant who will give me wine for Capon to take on his journey.
我要到城堡厨房里去，跟里边的仆人凯瑟琳要一些红酒，好让卡蓬带着红酒踏上旅程。
zajdi_za__mam_zajit_za_mi_5ose
I'm supposed to go and fetch Capon's sword and armour from Osina, the castle blacksmith.
我要到城堡的铁匠奥西纳那里取走卡蓬的佩剑和护甲。
zajdi_za__musim_od_hospod_ZCHi
People have been saying strange things about the hermit of Apollonia as of late. The innkeeper in Troskowitz should know a thing or two about it.
最近，人们一直在谈论关于阿波罗尼亚隐士的怪事。特罗斯科维茨的旅店老板应该知道一些。
zajdi_za__nestihl_jsem_se_APos
I didn't get a chance to ask Aranka for advice on how to help Bohush.
我没能向阿兰卡询问救治博胡什的办法。
zajdi_za__poustevnik_je_s_kmvH

It's said that Ambrose the hermit recently sold his soul to the Devil. I ought to find out if there's any truth behind the stories before I go and see him. It could help me get his broken sword. The hermit lives in a small hovel in the rocks.
据说，隐士安布洛斯最近把灵魂卖给了魔鬼。在我去见他之前，应该先弄清楚这些故事的真伪。这可以帮助我得到他的断剑。隐士住在山间的一个小屋里。
zajdi_za__slibil_jsem_mar_0TmH
Marika's lover, Bohush, is seriously injured and needs medicine. I should go and see Marika's mother, Aranka. She should know how to help him.
玛丽卡的爱人博胡什身负重伤，急需医治。我得去见见玛丽卡的母亲阿兰卡，她应该知道如何帮助博胡什。
zajdi_za__splnil_jsem_pou_NQS5
The hermit really was a strange bird. It could easily have fulfilled his wish, but all the same I got the feeling that something strange had happened in Apollonia.
隐士真的是个怪人。我本来可以轻易实现他的愿望，但我有种感觉，阿波罗尼亚发生了奇怪的事情。
zajdi_za__tenhle_mrtvy_mi_WEl1
The dead man was not what you'd call a hot lead for finding the broken sword.
那个死人并非寻找断剑的线索。
zajdi_za__ve_spodnim_hrad_9QVq

I offered to help Klara treat some of the wounded men. They all need to be treated properly and with the right medicine, if necessary. I heard I can find some potions in Klara's chest in her cabin right past the gate to the lower castle.
我提出要帮助克拉拉照料一些伤员，他们都需要得到妥当的照顾，如有必要，还得就他们的伤势对症下药。听说克拉拉的箱子里就有些药剂，过了下城堡城门就能看到她的小屋，而那个箱子就在里边。
zajdi_za__v_hradnim_priko_OVOz
But Godwin prepared a wee surprise for us. A literal trial by hellish fire awaited us in the castle fosse.
听说古德温给我们准备了个小惊喜。地狱之火的考验正在城堡护城河处等着我们。
zajdi_za__v_troskovicky_h_61JK

In the vagrants' camp by Rocktower Pond, I met an interesting showman. His name is Tomcat, and he performs various feats of strength. They say he's also good with weapons. It sounds unlikely, but maybe I could learn something from him.
我在石塔池塘旁的游牧营地遇到了一位有趣的艺人。他自称公猫，力大无比，因此能做出各种表演，据说兵器功夫也十分了得。虽然听起来不太靠谱，但我可能可以从他那里学到点什么。
zajdi_za__v_troskovicky_h_X3Sz

In the vagrants' camp by Rocktower Pond, I met the showman Tomcat. This strongman supposedly lets himself be run over by a wagon for fun and bends horseshoes with his bare hands, but otherwise, he's a good-hearted man. When he heard what happened to me, he agreed to train me in swordsmanship and show me some new combat moves.
我在石塔池塘旁的游牧营地遇到了艺人公猫，他强而有力，据说经常让马车从他身上碾过以取乐，还能徒手掰弯马蹄铁。不过他是个善良的人，当他听过我的遭遇后，同意了传授我剑术，还打算给我展示一些独特的招数。
zajdi_za__zebracka_bara_m_siCQ

Bara the Beggar told me that in the gypsies' camp by Rocktower Pond, there’s a showman named Tomcat who performs various feats of strength and is even good with weapons. It sounds unlikely, but maybe I could learn something from him.
乞丐芭拉告诉我，在石塔池塘旁的游牧营地有一位叫公猫的艺人，他力大无比，因此能做出各种表演，据说兵器功夫也十分了得。虽然听起来不太靠谱，但我可能可以从他那里学到点什么。
zajdi_zpa_mel_bych_panu_s_KEGP
I should tell Lord Semine what I found out.
我应该把我的发现告诉塞米大人。
zajisti_a_musim_chakana_p_PW2d
I have to persuade Chakan to leave Katherine alone before he finds out something he shouldn't. I could try to talk to him, or go straight to Chertan, his commander. He should bring Chakan to heel.
在恰坎发现某些他不该知道的事情之前，我得说服他停止对凯瑟琳的侵扰。我可以跟他谈判，或是直接去找他的指挥官赫尔坦，他应该能让恰坎屈服。
zajisti_a_nepodarilo_se_m_benT
I failed to persuade Chakan to leave Katherine in peace.
我没能说服恰坎停止对凯瑟琳的侵扰。
zajisti_a_podarilo_se_mi__LQzB

我成功阻止了恰坎对凯瑟琳的侵扰。
zajisti_z_musime_zajistit_JTCl
We need to secure the west gate, which is still being guarded.
我们得夺取西门的控制权，尽管它现在正受到保卫。
zajisti_z_zajistili_jsme__IrzB
We secured the west gate, which was being guarded. Then we were all supposed to meet by the well.
我们拿下了受人把守的西门，随后约好了在井边会合。
zajmi_pac_z_boje_utekl_je_JWC4

One of the blacksmith's hands fled the battle. The captain ordered me to chase him down and bring him back. I caught up to the hand, Ventza, on the rocks. After some brief but intense persuasion, I conviced him to surrender.
铁匠的工人之一逃离了战场。队长命令我追上他，把他带回来。我在岩石上追到了工人文扎。短暂而激烈的游说之后，我成功劝服他投降。
zajmi_pac_z_boje_utekl_je_r0NO

One of the blacksmith's hands fled the battle. The captain ordered me to chase him down and bring him back. I caught up to the hand, Ventza, on the rocks. We ended up coming to an agreement. Ventza told me where he hid the valuables from the cart, and in return I let him go.
铁匠的工人之一逃离了战场。队长命令我追上他，把他带回来。我在岩石上追到了工人文扎。我们最终达成了协议。文扎告诉我他把马车上的贵重物品藏在了哪，作为回报，我要放他走。
zajmi_pac_z_boje_utekl_je_UlKA

One of the blacksmith's hands fled the battle. The captain ordered me to chase him down and bring him back. I caught up to the hand, Ventza, on the rocks. I tried to convince him to surrender, but to no avail.
铁匠的工人之一逃离了战场。队长命令我追上他，把他带回来。我在岩石上追到了工人文扎。我试图劝服他投降，但无济于事。
zajmi_pac_z_boje_utekl_je_ZGEf
One of the blacksmith's hands fled the battle. The captain ordered me to chase him down and bring him back.

Kozliek, so they called him, sought us out at Bozhena's, and in the end there was no other way than to send him to eternity, otherwise we would have ended up there ourselves. Now he rests underground. I hope he won't come out to haunt me or Bozhena. The sooner the undertaker puts him in his proper place the better, but that won't be my concern any more. I hope...
这位名叫科兹里克的人追杀我们到了博珍娜处，我迫不得已送他上西天，否则倒下的就是我们。现在科兹里克已经入土为安，但愿他的灵魂不会来纠缠我和博珍娜，也希望掘墓人能尽快将他的尸体转移到安息之地。不过我也不用操心这些了。但愿如此……
zakopej_m_dira_je_priprav_ciO9
The hole's been dug. Now I have to put the body in it.
坑挖好了，现在得把尸体放进去。
zakopej_m_jeste_v_noci_na_21XX

At night a scoundrel stalked us at Bozhena's. Capon took care of him, although he caught it pretty badly himself. I figured it best to clear that dead bastard from the yard and put under the ground to calm Bozhena. God have mercy on his sinful soul.
夜里有一个恶徒尾随我们来到了博珍娜家里。尽管被卡蓬解决掉了，但他自己也遭了不少罪。我想最好得把那个混蛋的尸体从院子里搬走让他入土为安，好平复博珍娜的心情。愿上帝宽恕那恶徒罪孽深重的灵魂。
zakopej_m_kurva_ten_zlosy_Tu2t
Fuck! This bastard's as heavy as an ox. No doubt that's the weight of all his sins… Still, I need to move him closer to the stream and bury him there.
操！这王八蛋沉得跟牛一样，他肯定罪孽深重......总之我还是得把他搬到小溪边埋了。
zakopej_m_myslim_ze_u_pot_q9QD
I think I know a place by the stream that will do. Time for some dirty work.
我知道小溪边上有个地方适合埋人，要开始干脏活了。
zakopej_m_nejdriv_si_potr_P3aO
First I need to get hold of a spade. Bozhena said there's one near the dungheap.
我得先找把铁锹，博珍娜说粪堆旁就有一把。
zakopej_m_netrvalo_dlouho_IKbL

It wasn't long before we were stalked by more villains. It wasn't easy to deal with them, but somehow I managed and finally buried one of them in the woods near Bozhena's hut. The old woman will sort it out with the undertaker when he comes around.
没过多久，我们就遭到了更多坏人的尾随。尽管对付他们并非易事，但好在我成功将问题解决，并把他们中的一人埋葬在离博珍娜的小屋不远的林子里。老妇人会等掘墓人来了之后一起善后。
zakopej_m_ryc_mam_ted_pop_pgJA
I've got a spade. Now I have to grab Mikesh's dead body and get to work. Let's hope this doesn’t give me nightmares.
我拿到了铁锹，现在要处理米凯什的尸体了，但愿他不会到梦里找我。
zakopej_m_uz_zbejva_jen_n_dOAW
All that's left is to cover the knave with earth and the job's done.
最后只需将坟墓填平，一切就大功告成。
zanes_hro_dal_jsem_kone_k_kMWs
I gave Kona the stone I took from Thomlin, but it turns out it wasn't a real thunderstone.
