zanes_hro_vzal_jsem_thoml_OYIi
I filched Thomlin's thunderstone. It wasn't the most honest thing to do, but it'll help Kona either way. Now I just have to bring her the stone.
我偷走了托姆林的雷石，这并不诚实，但能帮到柯娜就够了。现在我只需要把石头带给柯娜。
zapal_lis_hotovo_skrze_ko_4rL5
I helped the knights of the military order. The smoke created a diversion, and made the murderer miss.
我帮助了军团的骑士们。烟雾转移了注意力，杀手没有得逞。
zapal_lis_kour_z_listi_od_BtK5
Arnold the knight asked for my help. I'm supposed to create a diversion by setting fire to some leaves. The smoke will make it impossible for the feared murderer to take aim at Arnold's men.
骑士阿诺德向我请求帮助。我得放火烧掉一些树叶，好声东击西。受烟雾干扰，那个令人闻风丧胆的杀手就难以瞄准阿诺德的手下。
zarid_aby_fiala_by_se_oci_ia5i
Fiala would evidently like to join the fights, but he doesn't want to go against his wife's wishes.
虽然菲亚拉确实很想参与比武，但是也不敢违抗妻子的意愿。
zarid_aby_fialova_zena_do_Pian
At first, Fiala's wife Dorothy didn't want to hear about the fights, but then she gave her permission. She emphasised that this really is the last time.
起初，菲亚拉的妻子多萝西并不想听到任何与比武相关的事，但后来还是决定让步，并特意强调这绝对是最后一次。
zarid_aby_fialova_zena_do_PIIx
Though Fiala's wife Dorothy is with the Lord, the widower continues to honour her wish that he should stop fighting.
尽管菲亚拉的妻子多萝西已经去了极乐世界，但这个鳏夫决意遵守她妻子的遗愿，拒绝参加比武。
zarid_aby_nez_vyzvu_prvni_1vwn
Before I challenge my first opponent, I have to find the local champion Fiala, whose wife stopped him from fighting.
在向我的第一个对手发起挑战之前，我必须找到当地的冠军菲亚拉，此人的妻子先前已禁止他参与比武。
zarid_aby_po_trose_presve_XDMC
After a bit of persuasion, I managed to soften Dorothy up and get her permission for Fiala to fight one last time.
短暂的游说后，我成功让多萝西心软了下来，她也同意让菲亚拉最后一次参与比武。
zarid_aby_povedlo_se_mi_f_8pJG
I managed to convince Fiala to get up and go fight.
我成功说服了菲亚拉参与比武。
zarid_hen_chtel_jsem_manc_TqlF
I wanted to arrange a date for Manka and Henik, but I brawled with him instead, so nothing came of it.
我本想给曼卡和亨尼克安排一场约会，但是却跟他打了一架，所以什么事都没办成。
zarid_hen_dohodl_jsem_jim_3k3F

I talked to Henik and suggested I'd take over his watch so the two of them can go on a date. Nobody will be watching the maypole then… Now I just have to convince Manka to agree to go on a secret date with Henik.
我跟亨尼克交谈了一番，并提出要替他站岗，好让他与爱人相见，到时候五朔节花柱也将无人看管......至于现在，我只需要说服曼卡同意前往与亨尼克的秘密约会。
zarid_hen_dohodl_jsem_man_YnhZ
I arranged a date for Manka and Henik and, in the evening, I took Henik's place guarding the maypole. Now there was nothing stopping me from stealing it from the Tachov lot.
我为曼卡和亨尼克安排了一场约会，我也在晚上接管了亨尼克看管五朔节花柱的职责，现在已没有任何事情能够阻止我从这帮塔霍夫人手中偷走它。
zarid_hen_henik_odesel_na_TRGA
Henik went out on a date. Now is the best time to pick up the maypole.
亨尼克已外出约会，现在正是取走五朔节花柱的绝佳时机。
zarid_hen_henik_zminoval__d8DX

Henik mentioned he was having a hard time seeing his sweetheart Manka. I suggested I'd take over his watch so the two of them can go out. Nobody will be watching the maypole then… Now I just have to convince Manka to agree to go on a secret date with Henik.
亨尼克提到他很少有机会与他的爱人曼卡相见，所以我提出了要替他站岗的建议，这样他们两个就能够外出了，到时候五朔节花柱也将无人看管......至于现在，我只需要说服曼卡同意前往与亨尼克的秘密约会。
zarid_hen_manka_souhlasil_nKVG
Manka agreed to go out with Henik. I'll take over his watch and nobody will guard the maypole… I have to tell Henik Manka has agreed to go out with him.
曼卡同意了与亨尼克的约会，而我将接管他的职责，五朔节花柱也将无人看管......我得告诉亨尼克，曼卡同意赴约。
zarid_hen_musim_dohodnout_saAi

Manka hinted she's having a hard time seeing Henik and that it's also because Henik has to guard the maypole. I should try to arrange a date for them. Then maybe I could get rid of Henik and steal the maypole. I need to talk to Henik about that.
曼卡暗示道，因为亨尼克必须得看管着五朔节花柱，她很难见到亨尼克。我得给他们安排一场约会，届时我说不定就能甩开亨尼克并偷走五朔节花柱。现在我得去跟亨尼克商量此事。
zarid_hen_todo_pokud_ukra_MJKR
I thought I'd arrange a date for Henik and Manka, and then I'd take the maypole after Henik leaves. But I found a different way so there was no need for this.
我本想为亨尼克和曼卡安排一场约会，然后趁着亨尼克离开时拿走五朔节花柱，但我却找到了其它办法，所以已经没必要再那么做了。
zarid_hen_uf_henik_s_mank_I6jL
Ugh, I don't think Henik and Manka will be together. Maybe in the next world.
呃，看来亨尼克和曼卡没机会在一起了，或许下辈子吧。
zarid_hen_vytecne_dohodl__BNZV
Excellent, I've arranged a date for Henik and Manka. Tonight, I must meet Henik at the maypole to take over his watch.
大功告成，我为亨尼克和曼卡安排了一场约会。我也必须在今晚于五朔节花柱处跟亨尼克碰面，替他站岗。
zarid_hen_zadne_rande_uz__fEdq
No one will care about any more dates.
不会再有人操心什么约会的事了。
zarid_hen_zkousel_jsem_ma_w9Zs
I tried to arrange a date for Manka and Henik, but Manka was against it.
我尝试为曼卡和亨尼克安排一场约会，但是曼卡却拒绝了。
zarid_ze__fracek_po_mne_c_zAqT
Vuytek wants me to make sure the Cumans never return to Troskowitz. I don't know how to do that yet.
维特克想让我确保库曼人永远不会再回到特罗斯科维茨，我还不知道应该怎么办。
zarid_ze__kumani_se_do_tr_6E4R
The Cumans won't be returning to Troskowitz… I took care of it and defeated them.
库曼人不会再回到特罗斯科维茨了…我解决了问题，打败了他们。
zarid_ze__kumani_se_do_tr_E8MC
The Cumans won't be returning to Troskowitz… Vasko promised me that when he wasn't exactly sober, but I have a feeling I can trust him.
库曼人不会再回到特罗斯科维茨了…瓦斯科酒还没醒的时候向我保证了这点，我感觉可以信任他。
zarid_ze__placeholder_log_Jwg4
To ensure that the Cumans don't return to Troskowitz, I have no choice but to use brute force.
为了确保库曼人不会再回特罗斯科维茨，我除了动用暴力，别无他法。
zasahni_d_nez_jsem_stihl__ntiT
Before I could intervene, the fight was over.
还没来得及插手，他们就打完了。
zasahni_d_v_hospode_zacal_XdmO
A fight broke out at the tavern! Several locals provoked the Cumans, and now they're whacking each other! I should join one of the sides, but which one?
酒馆里有人打架！有几个本地人故意惹怒库曼人，现在他们扭打在一起！我应该加入一边，不过哪一边呢？
zasahni_d_zapojil_jsem_se_mvqF
I didn't want to stand by idly, so I joined in on the fight.
我不想袖手旁观，所以我也跟着一起打。
zasahni_p_pokud_chci_opon_2wcf

If I want to reduce my opponents chances of executing a perfect block, I should attack his unprotected side. I'll show Capon how it's done by striking at the opposite side to the one where he's holding his sword.
若要降低对手完美格挡的成功率，应该攻击他的弱侧。我要向卡蓬展示攻击对手不持剑的一侧效果如何。
zasahni_p_ukazal_jsem_pta_3pqW
I showed Capon how to reduce an opponent's chances of executing a perfect block by striking into his unprotected zone: that is, the one where he's not holding his sword.
我向卡蓬展示了如何降低对手完美格挡的成功率，即攻击对手不持剑的一侧。
zaspin_pr_zaspinene_oblec_cuVO
No one will care about dirty clothes anymore.
不会再有人操心脏衣物的事了。
zaspin_pr_zaspinene_oblec_giba
No one will care about dirty clothes anymore.
不会再有人操心脏衣物的事了。
zastav_kr_starenka_bozena_LsH7
Bozhena sorted out my injured shoulder pretty well, but the wound started bleeding again in the morning. She gave me some bandages and told me to bandage the wound properly. That should help.
博珍娜把我的伤肩处理得很好，但到了早上伤口又开始流血。她给了我一些绷带让我好好包扎伤口。应该能管用。
zastav_se_nastoupil_jsem__5rOM

I joined Menhard and Arne in their duels against the Kuttenbergers. Things looked grim after Master Nicholas seriously wounded Arne, but I managed to win my duels and tip the scales in Menhard's favour. Arne recovered from his injury and Menhard was more than happy about how things turned out. He assumed leadership of the Kuttenberg swordfighting brotherhood, just as stated in King Wenceslas' charter, and gave me a reward fit for a king.
我加入了门哈德和阿耳涅，与他们一同参与了对抗库滕堡人的决斗。阿耳涅受到尼古拉斯大师的重创后，事态变得严峻起来，但好在我在决斗中胜出，协助门哈德一方扭转了局势。之后，阿耳涅的伤势得以恢复，门哈德对于事情的结局也欣喜若狂。正如瓦茨拉夫国王的特许状上所批示的那样，门哈德成为了库滕堡剑术兄弟会的领导者，他给我的奖赏颇丰，可与皇室待遇媲美。
zastav_se_s_menhartem_jse_O1t3

Menhard and I had a falling out and it ended pretty tragically for him. So this is the unfortunate end of the story of Master Menhard and the whole affair with King Wenceslas' charter and the Kuttenberg swordfighting brotherhood.
门哈德与我针锋相对，最终他下场惨淡。这则牵扯到了门哈德大师和库滕堡剑术兄弟会，还关乎瓦茨拉夫国王特许状的故事，如今已迎来了它的结局。
zastav_se_uz_je_to_nejaka_Ahpy
It's been a while since I helped Menhard and Arne beat the Kuttenbergers. The swordfighting hall should be ready by now, Menhard wanted me to stop by and talk to him.
距离上次协助门哈德和阿耳涅战胜库滕堡人也已过去了一段时间，想必那家剑术馆现在已经做足了准备，先前门哈德说过让我前去登门拜访，跟他谈一谈。
zastav_vr_cekali_jsme_ze__wtUC

We expected young von Grolle to fall into our trap. Instead, it turned out to be his mother and her servant. Even though we were mistaken, we managed in the end to make sure they won't be killing anybody else.
我们企盼着小冯·格罗尔会掉入我们的陷阱当中，结果没想到来者竟是其母亲和她的仆人。尽管我们认错了人，但最终还是彻底阻断了他们今后的杀人行径。
zastav_vr_porad_netusim_j_0lyo
I still don't know how it could've happened, but our trap didn't turn out the way it should've and it all ended up in the shit.
我始终不明白为何会落得如此结果，总之我们的陷阱没能奏效，现在事态一团糟。
zastav_vr_stara_grollova__4RLy
The von Grolle woman and her servant are the killers! Who'd have thought? I have to take care of the servant before he manages to kill anyone else!
谁能想到，冯·格罗尔女士和她的仆人居然就是凶手！我得处理掉那个仆人，中断他继续杀人的行径！
zatimcotu_pockej_si_na_sm_nOyo
Wait for the Peeping Tom in the bathhouse.
在澡堂里等待那个偷窥狂。
zatimcotu_porad_se_s_jasa_6Zx1
Consult Jasak.
询问贾萨克。
zatimcotu_prozkoumej_chak_9zMo
Check out Chakan's tent.
调查恰坎的帐篷。
zatimcotu_rekni_katerine__EvCR
Tell Katherine what happened with Chakan.
将恰坎的事告知凯瑟琳。
zatimcotu_zajisti_at_da_c_GE2i
See to it that Chakan leaves Katherine in peace.
确保恰坎不再侵扰凯瑟琳。
zatimcotu_zbij_chakana_IzND
Beat up Chakan.
打败恰坎！
zatimcotu_zjisti_kdo_kate_LTha
Find out who's stalking Katherine.
找出跟踪凯瑟琳的人。
zautoc_na_at_uz_maji_s_vo_AxT8
Whether or not the bandits have anything to do with the stolen cart, Lord Semine won't tolerate any bandits in his region. We're going to charge them!
不管这些强盗是否与被盗的马车有关，塞米大人都无法容忍他的地盘上有强盗。我们要向他们发起进攻！
zautoc_na_ikdyz_nebylo_zp_Iej6
Although it wasn't clear at first if the bandits in the gorge had anything to do with Lord Semine's cart, it didn't stop us from dealing with them swiftly.
虽然一开始并不清楚峡谷中的强盗与塞米大人的马车是否有关，但这并不妨碍我们迅速解决掉他们。
zautoc_na_nasledne_jsme_p_nyXk

We continued on to the main bandit encampment. Lord Semine started negotiating with the robber baron who stole the cart, and it turns out both of the hands were in on it. Lord Semine's negotiation tactics were rather harsh, so it's no wonder they didn't come to an agreement. We had no choice but to attack.
我们继续向强盗主营地前进。塞米大人开始与偷走马车的强盗男爵谈判，结果发现两名工人都参与其中。塞米大人的谈判策略相当严苛，也难怪他们没能达成协议。我们别无选择，只好进攻。
zautoc_na_od_hlidky_jsme__Wsf3
The guards led us all the way to the main bandit encampment. And Lord Semine is leading us to the charge!
警卫将我们一路带去强盗主营地。塞米大人带领我们冲锋陷阵！
zautoc_na_predvedl_jsem_p_Zbpz
I gave Hans a good demonstration of an attack with a longsword.
汉斯领教了我方才漂亮的一剑。
zautoc_na_serm_neni_o_jed_8I1X
Swordfighting isn't about individual strikes, but about how you string together individual techniques. I should show Capon how.
剑斗制敌，不在一招一式，而在于多种招式的串联。接招吧，卡蓬。
zautoc_na_ukazal_jsem_pta_M4Dt
I showed Capon how to string together individual strikes. But you've got to be careful not to exhaust yourself with an exchange like that and keep some strength in reserve for defense.
我向卡蓬展示串联了多种招式的连击。注意不要用力过猛，应适当保存体能用于防御。
zautoc_na_zakladem_boje_j_OQSM
The basis of combat is attacking. I should demonstrate that to Hans.
进攻是战斗的基础。我得让汉斯见识一下。
zavis_zem_korala_zavis_uz_faph
The drunkard Zavish is probably fighting in purgatory now.
酒鬼扎维什或许现在正在炼狱里打拳呢。
zavodnipo_dones_jankovi_p_QkHc
Bring the horseshoes to Janek.
Bring the horseshoes to Janek.
zavodnipo_najdi_podkovu_v_foUr
Find a horseshoe in the nomad's camp.
Find a horseshoe in the nomad's camp.
zavodnipo_pockej_par_dni__6Qyi
Wait a few days and then collect your reward from Janek.
Wait a few days and then collect your reward from Janek.
zavodnipo_promluv_si_s_ci_HWgg
Talk to the nomads about the horseshoes.
Talk to the nomads about the horseshoes.
zavodnipo_vyrob_podkovu_DdnV
Forge spiked horseshoes for Janek.
Forge spiked horseshoes for Janek.
zavod_s_j_nenech_se_zahan_EQnG
Capon challenged me to a race, and I refuse to be disgraced! The first one to the wayside shrines at the crossroads outside Troskowitz wins.
卡蓬向我发起了赛马挑战，我绝不能让自己蒙羞！第一个抵达特罗斯科维茨外一处路口边神龛的人将是本场比试的胜者。
zavod_s_j_ptacek_zavele_k_p3ze
Capon challenged me to a race, but I turned him down. I'm afraid he won't be happy about that.
卡蓬向我发起了赛马挑战，但是我拒绝了。恐怕他会为此而感到失落。
zavod_s_j_spolecne_s_ptac_Tv9Z
Capon and I rode like the wind through the region and made the journey to Nebakov more interesting with a friendly race.
卡蓬与我骑着马风驰电掣，横跨整片地区，以一场友谊竞赛的形式让这趟前往内巴科夫的旅途变得妙趣横生。
zavolej_s_pochvalil_mistn_FQr2
Godwin praised the local specialty and had the cook called. But it turned out that he hadn't even tasted it, so the embarrassed cook returned to the kitchen.
古德温对本地佳肴表达了赞美之情，并将厨师传唤而出。可谁知古德温并没有品尝那道菜，哭笑不得的厨师也因此回到了厨房里。
zavolej_s_pochvalil_mistn_Y2Pj
Godwin praised the local specialty and had the cook called. As a reward, the cook was allowed to stay at the Council and drink for a while, so the kitchen was clear.
古德温对本地佳肴表达了赞美之情，并将厨师传唤而出。作为奖励，那位厨师得到了在议会上小酌几杯的许可，因此厨房里没有任何干扰。
zavolej_s_staci_pochvalit_7QAt
Godwin just needs to praise a local specialty and call for the cook. That should make the kitchen less dangerous for Henry and the others.
古德温只需对一道当地特色菜表达赞赏并将厨师传唤而出，这样应该就能为亨利和其他人排除厨房中的隐患。
zavolej_v_vorech_muj_pes__7sdF
Mutt, my dog from Skalitz, keeps pestering Oats, our cook and general helper, his eyes fixed on the food Oats is preparing for us. I called Mutt away to give the cook some peace.
我在斯卡里茨的宠物狗，呆呆，一直朝奥兹乱吼。奥兹是我们的厨子兼后勤。呆呆一直盯着奥兹为我们准备的饭菜。我得叫走呆呆，让厨子清静些。
zavolej_v_vorech_muj_pes__MmnI
Mutt, my dog from Skalitz, keeps pestering Oats, our cook and general helper. I must call the dog before he scoffs our dinner!
我在斯卡里茨的宠物狗，呆呆，一直朝奥兹乱吼。奥兹是我们的厨子兼后勤。我得叫走呆呆，否则今晚大家都没饭吃！
zazen_vlky_p_poradil_jsem_lzjq
I dealt with the wolves that were bothering Marika and Bohush. They shouldn't give them any more trouble.
我解决掉了那群欲要侵扰玛丽卡和博胡什的狼，它们应该不会再制造任何麻烦了。
zazen_vlky_p_pred_maricin_PCqj
There's a pack of wolves outside Marika's cave! I must get rid of them.
玛丽卡的藏身处外出现了一群狼！我必须把它们赶走。
zazen_vlky_vlky_kteri_ohr_ZnbE
I don't have to deal with the wolves bothering Marika and Bohush now.
我现在不必再去处理那群侵扰玛丽卡和博胡什的狼了。
zbav_se_k_balsan_a_samhna_LXoI

Jan Posy and Miroslav Tugbone asked me to help with the Cumans who stole a chest of theirs, but I don't have time to chase after treasure. They're capable fellows and will surely manage without my help. After all, there are two of them.
扬·“花骨朵”和“扯骨”米洛斯拉夫请求我帮助他们从库曼人那里夺回失窃的箱子，但是我没有时间去完成此事。他们都是些能干的人，而且即便是没有我的帮助也定能夺回箱子，谁让他们是两个人呢。
zbav_se_k_ze_vseho_nejdri_92cQ
The first thing I have to do is get rid of them. Then we'll see…
我首先要做的事情就是解决那些库曼人，那就走着瞧吧…
zbav_se_p_jak_jsem_si_mys_UkgY

As I thought, it didn't take long for trouble to begin. I don't know what happened here, but the entire house is a terrible mess and it seems to have been occupied by the town riff-raff. Lady Rosa has gone to hide and look for her crossbow, but most of the dirty work will be left to me.
不出所料，麻烦果然很快就来临了。也不知此处到底发生了什么，只见整个屋子一片狼藉，似乎是被城里的无赖占用了。罗莎小姐已经躲了起来，正寻找着自己的弩箭，但是大部分麻烦事还是得我来解决。
zbav_se_p_jeden_z_tech_hr_Tnl0

The abandoned Ruthard Palace has been taken over by the town riff-raff. As soon as I got rid of the lowlifes by the gate, Rosa started calling for help from her hideout. She barricaded the door, but even so, I should deal with the rest of the intruders fast and hurry back to her.
废弃的鲁瑟德宫已被城镇中的无赖占用。我刚解决了大门旁的那些无赖，就听到了罗莎在藏身处发出呼救。她抵住了房门，但尽管如此，我也得尽快解决掉剩余的来犯者，随后赶快去解救罗莎。
zbav_se_p_pani_roza_nam_j_Njw0
Lady Rosa will be very useful to us. She had a crossbow in her hideout and managed to shoot one of the attacking vagrants.
罗莎小姐真是我们的得力助手。她从自己的藏身处里取来了一把弩箭，用它射伤了一个进犯的流浪汉。
zbav_se_p_potom_co_jsem_s_AXtw
As soon as I stepped out into the courtyard, I was spotted by some vagrants. They wouldn't listen to reason. They quickly began drawing their weapons and I had no choice but to defend myself.
在踏进庭院的那一刻，几个流浪汉就发现了我。他们完全不给我解释的余地，很快就抄起武器，我别无选择，也只能亮剑自保。
zbav_se_p_presvedcil_jsem_dH0A
I've made sure that there's nobody left alive in Ruthard Palace except me and Rosa.
我已确保鲁瑟德宫内除了我和罗莎，再无其他活人。
zbav_se_p_ukazalo_se_ze_t_Df6F

The abandoned Ruthard Palace has been taken over by the town riff-raff. As soon as I got rid of the oafs in the courtyard, Rosa started calling for help. Someone was trying to break down the door to the chamber she was hiding in. She barricaded the door, but even so, I should get rid of the rest of the intruders as quickly as possible and hurry to her defence.
废弃的鲁瑟德宫已被城镇中的无赖占用。我刚解决了庭院里的那些无赖，就听到了罗莎的呼救，是有人要闯入她藏身的房间。她抵住了房门，但尽管如此，我也得尽快解决掉剩余来犯者，随后赶快去解救罗莎。
zbav_se_v_hrobky_v_krypte_mNGb
The tombs in the crypt under St. James' Church attracted a pair of looters. They might not be dangerous, but they could give us away.
圣雅各布教堂下方的墓穴引来了一对盗墓者。或许他们并不危险，但可能会泄露我们的行踪。
zbav_se_v_nemohli_jsme_ri_N8ia

The tombs in the crypt under St. James' Church attracted a pair of looters. The two thieves were accidentally trapped in the crypt. We offered them a safe passage through Ruthard Palace in exchange for an oath of silence.
圣雅各布教堂下方的墓穴引来了一对盗墓者。那两个小偷意外地困在了墓穴里，我们给他们指明了一条穿过鲁瑟德宫的安全通道，而作为交换，他们必须守口如瓶。
zbav_se_v_ti_dva_zlodeji__ZeQi

The tombs in the crypt under St. James' Church attracted a pair of looters. The two thieves were accidentally trapped in the crypt. We couldn't risk them ratting us out, grave robbers deserve death anyway…
圣雅各布教堂下方的墓穴引来了一对盗墓者。那两个小偷意外地困在了墓穴里，而我们可没打算冒着被他们出卖的风险，反正这种盗墓贼本就该领死......
zbav_se_v_zlodeji_chyceni_86Yf
The thieves stuck in the crypt under St. James' Church attacked us after a brief argument. What a shame, maybe there was another way…
短暂的争执过后，圣雅各布教堂下方墓穴里的盗墓者对我们发起了攻击。真可惜，也许本还有其他的解决方式......
zbij_chak_podarilo_se_mi__99YH
I managed to beat up Chakan.
我成功打败了恰坎。
zbij_chak_souboj_s_chakan_R33j
I lost the fight with Chakan.
我没能打败恰坎。
zbij_chak_vypada_to_ze_se_SwCy
It looks like Chakan won't give up Katherine without a fight.
看来不给恰坎点颜色瞧瞧，他是不会远离凯瑟琳的。
zbij_jimr_jimram_ode_me_d_c7GD
I slapped Emmeram around a little. Next time he'll think twice before trying to trick me.
我把艾默拉姆揍了一顿。要是以后还想耍我，他最好三思而后行。
zbij_jimr_nikdo_si_ze_me__VNyP
Nobody makes a fool of me. Emmeram has to learn a lesson.
谁也别想糊弄我，艾默拉姆得吃点教训了呢。
zbij_jimr_pokusil_jsem_se_9qoJ
I tried to slap Emmeram around for his little rubbish heap joke, but it didn't turn out how I thought.
我本想让艾默拉姆为他那幼稚的玩笑付出点小代价，但事态的发展超出了我的预想。
zbranepan_absolvuj_trenin_n1Xk
Duel with Lord Semine.
与塞米大人决斗。
zbranepan_jed_na_semin_nbL0
Head to Semine.
前往塞米。
zbranepan_nasleduj_pana_s_C031
Follow Lord Semine and Gnarly and keep your eyes peeled.
跟随塞米大人和格纳利，留心观察。
zbranepan_nasleduj_pana_s_STgY
Follow Lord Semine and Gnarly.
跟随塞米大人和格纳利。
zbranepan_placeholder_pro_Pk9K
Get your performance judged.
让别人评判你的表现。
zbranepan_pockej_az_se_se_dKOI
Wait until Lord Semine and Gnarly return.
等塞米大人和格纳利回来。
zbranepan_podej_zpravu_ko_AZg7
Report to the blacksmith.
向铁匠报告。
zbranepan_pokracuj_v_jizd_f9R9
Carry on to Troskowitz.
继续骑马前往特罗斯科维茨。
zbranepan_pribliz_se_k_ta_99OB
Get closer to the camp.
接近营地。
zbranepan_promluv_se_semi_pdDk
Talk to Gnarly.
和格纳利谈谈。
zbranepan_promluv_si_se_s_j4Wb
Talk to Gnarly.
和格纳利谈谈。
zbranepan_promluv_si_se_s_qklF
Talk to Gnarly and Lord Semine.
和格纳利及塞米大人谈谈。
zbranepan_promluv_si_s_ry_MPUn
Talk to the bailiff.
和执行官谈谈。
zbranepan_prozkoumej_okol_Oc3C
Investigate the area of the crossroads by Apollonia.
调查阿波罗尼亚附近的十字路口区域。
zbranepan_prozkoumej_okol_Qdaa
Investigate the area of the crossroads by the cemetery.
调查公墓附近的十字路口区域。
zbranepan_setkej_se_sukem_RwKV
Meet Gnarly and Lord Semine in the courtyard.
在院子里会见格纳利和塞米大人。
zbranepan_stopuj_ukradeny_3vZI
Follow Lord Semine and Gnarly.
跟随塞米大人和格纳利。
zbranepan_svatba_LzLR
Wedding Crashers
宴客之道
zbranepan_utkej_se_s_jurk_e8BU
Defeat Jurko in a fight.
在搏斗中打败朱尔科。
zbranepan_vrat_se_za_semi_cB1u
Go back to Lord Semine.
回去找塞米大人。
zbranepan_vrat_se_za_semi_V4IZ
Go back to Lord Semine.
回去找塞米大人。
zbranepan_vydej_se_na_pru_LmKX
Go scouting.
前去侦察。
zbranepan_zajdi_zpatky_za_TzXi
Go back to Lord Semine.
回去找塞米大人。
zbranepan_zajmi_pacholka_1fBX
Catch the hired hand.
抓住雇工。
zbranepan_zautoc_na_hlidku_igRt
Attack the patrol.
攻击巡逻队。
zbranepan_zautoc_na_tabor_hkPs
Attack the camp.
攻击营地。
zbranepan_zjisti_jak_to_d_TkgR
Find out what happened to the missing cart.
查明丢失的马车出了什么事。
zbyva_pos_zbyva_poslednic_o1iE
Uběhla polovina času.
zemrel_mi_rychtar_je_po_s_lxzF
The bailiff is dead, there is no longer any point in interfering in the running of the fight club.
执行官已死亡，既然如此没必要再继续掺和调查搏击俱乐部的事了。
zeptej_se_bozena_mi_porad_zTA0
Bozhena told me where I could find the Cumans. They're camping near the pond where the nomads are.
博珍娜告诉我库曼人的位置。他们在湖边扎营，和游牧民族待在一起。
zeptej_se_bozeny_se_na_ce_GPgT
I can't ask Bozhena where to find them, because she's dead.
我没法问博珍娜库曼人在哪，因为她死了。
zeptej_se_cenek_mi_zadal__ViQa
Chenyek gave me a task that might be of interest to Knuckles. I can tell him about it.
程叶科给了我一个任务，巧指可能对此感兴趣。我可以和他聊聊这件事。
zeptej_se_cernej_vojak_um_BMLK
To make things worse, Black died. I'll have to somehow explain this to Victoria.
布莱克的死让事态变得糟糕了起来。我得向维多利亚解释此事。
zeptej_se_chtel_jsem_si_p_msyU
I wanted to talk to Thomlin about the thunderstone, but... erm... Thomlin was stricken by the curse of the thunderstone and his life came to a tragic end. Erm. Just like that.
我想和托姆林谈谈雷石的事，但……呃……托姆林被雷石诅咒了，他的人生以悲剧结尾。呃，就这样吧。
zeptej_se_doplnit_prosim__Eb4J
Prochek told me Radovan, the blacksmith from Tachov, could teach me a good recipe for sleeping potions. Perhaps I should pay him a visit.
普罗切克告诉我，来自塔霍夫的铁匠拉多万应该可以教我配制安眠药水，我得去拜访他。
zeptej_se_doslechl_jsem_s_QWgo
Jezhek, the cooper from Troskowitz, has some history with Pavlena. I won't learn any more from him, because Jezhek himself is history now.
特罗斯科维茨的箍桶匠杰泽克和帕芙莱娜有些故事，但他已经死了，我也听不到任何故事了。
zeptej_se_doslechl_jsem_s_V29h
I heard that the local cooper, Jezhek, was interested in Pavlena. Could it be he knows something about her disappearance?
我听说，当地的箍桶匠杰泽克对帕芙莱娜有意思。或许他会知道一些关于她失踪的事？
zeptej_se_dozvedel_jsem_s_8NuZ
I discovered that Mikush was a passionate dice player and that he often played with the local champion, Chernik. I should find out more from him.
通过了解得知，米库什热衷于赌博，并且常跟附近一位名叫切尔尼克的人玩骰子。我得向切尔尼克了解更多线索。
zeptej_se_dozvedel_jsem_s_ak00
I discovered that Mikush was a passionate dice player and that he often played with the local champion, Chernik. Svatava died though, so there was no point to continuing my search.
通过了解得知，米库什热衷于赌博，并且常跟附近一位名叫切尔尼克的人玩骰子。但是斯瓦塔娅已经死了，再继续调查下去已经失去了意义。
zeptej_se_dozvedel_jsem_s_eiu0

Either someone was making a fool of me, or I was talking to a ghost! Brother Morticius, the old keeper of the ossuary, passed away a couple of years ago and his body lies in the crypt downstairs alongside the other monks…
要么就是有人在耍我，要么就是我在和灵魂说话！莫提修斯弟兄曾是骸骨堂的看守，多年前就去世了。他的尸体和其他修士一起躺在楼下的墓室里……
zeptej_se_dozvedel_jsem_s_JKEg
I found out that Mikush was a passionate dice player and that he often played with the local champion, Chernik. But Vendula died, so there was no point in continuing my search.
通过了解得知，米库什热衷于赌博，并且常跟附近一位名叫切尔尼克的人玩骰子。但是芙恩德拉已经死了，再继续调查下去已经没了意义。
zeptej_se_dozvedel_jsem_s_kje5
I discovered that Mikush was a passionate dice player and that he often played with the local champion, Chernik. He gave me details about the night when Mikush was last seen.
通过了解得知，米库什热衷于赌博，并且常跟附近一位名叫切尔尼克的人玩骰子。
zeptej_se_dozvedel_jsem_s_OxsH

Either someone was making a fool of me, or I was talking to a ghost! Brother Morticius, the old keeper of the ossuary, passed away a couple of years ago and his body lies in the crypt downstairs alongside the other monks…
要么就是有人在耍我，要么就是我在和灵魂说话！莫提修斯弟兄曾是骸骨堂的看守，多年前就去世了。他的尸体和其他修士一起躺在楼下的墓室里……
zeptej_se_dozvedel_jsem_s_rbmG
I discovered that Mikush was a passionate dice player and that he often played with the local champion, Chernik. But the trail stopped cold there, so continuing my search was pointless.
通过了解得知，米库什热衷于赌博，并且常跟附近一位名叫切尔尼克的人玩骰子。但踪迹却在那里断掉了，再继续调查下去已然失去了意义。
zeptej_se_hrobnik_by_mel__oJuG
The gravedigger should know Morticius well – after all, he is in charge of the ossuary. Maybe he can tell me where he went.
掘墓人应该很了解莫提修斯——毕竟他负责管理骸骨堂。或许他能告诉我莫提修斯去了哪里。
zeptej_se_jak_se_dostat_d_9Sh8
One of the monk caretakers will tell me how to get into the catacombs under the ossuary. During the day I'll certainly find one in front of the ossuary gates.
负责看守的修士应该知道进入骸骨堂下方墓穴的方法，只要是白天我就定能在骸骨堂的门前找到一个看门的修士。
zeptej_se_jenik_mi_rekl_z_XEOW

Hensel told me he stole Thomlin's thunderstone. On the other hand, Thomlin made no mention of it. So I had a chat with Thomlin. He confirmed that everything was as Hensel had described it. Thomlin simply didn't want to look like a fool, so he kept quiet about the theft...
亨泽尔说他偷了托姆林的雷石，但托姆林根本没说这件事。于是我跟托姆林聊了聊，结果跟亨泽尔说的一样，而托姆林只是因为不想让自己看起来像个傻瓜所以才对被偷的事闭口不谈。
zeptej_se_korenarka_bozen_pBEu
Bozhena the herbwoman will surely know where to find the Cumans.
草药师博珍娜肯定知道去哪找库曼人。
zeptej_se_kovar_radovan_m_kRvM
I found that the best way to put Olbram's bull to sleep was to use a sleeping potion. All you have to do is get some poppies, thistles, herb paris and then off to the nearest alchemist's shop!
我发现让奥尔布拉姆的公牛陷入沉睡的最好办法就是给它使用安眠药剂。现在只需弄点罂粟、蓟草和四叶重楼，然后赶到最近的炼金商店去！
zeptej_se_lazebnice_mi_re_GpbW
One of the bathhouse girls told me to go and see some Mary. It seems she might know something about the councillor. So I'll see if I can find her.
澡堂里的一位姑娘让我去找某位叫“玛丽”的人，似乎此人对那位议员有所了解，也不知我能否找到她。
zeptej_se_lovci_dobros_se_mg0H
Huntsman Dobrosh mentioned that Wolfram the knacker, also knows something about the poacher's hiding place, but in the end, I didn't need his help at all, and found them myself.
猎人多布罗什提到屠夫沃尔夫勒姆也对那些偷猎者的藏身处有所了解，但我根本不需要他帮忙，独自找到了偷猎者。
zeptej_se_lovci_dobros_se_OawQ
Huntsman Dobrosh mentioned that Wolfram the knacker used to do some business with the poachers. He might just know where the band's hiding.
猎人多布罗什提到了屠夫沃尔夫勒姆曾经和偷猎者做过交易。他可能知道那帮人藏在哪里。
zeptej_se_lovci_dobros_se_XO6P
Huntsman Dobrosh mentioned that the knacker knows something about the poachers, but I don't expect him to be of much help since he's dead.
猎人多布罗什提到了屠夫了解偷猎者的底细，但我并不指望他能够帮上什么忙，因为他已经死了。
zeptej_se_lovci_dobros_se_ZRVo

Huntsman Dobrosh mentioned that Wolfram the knacker used to do some business with the poachers. The knacker wasn't involved in killing the roebuck, but at least he had an idea where the poachers might be hiding.
猎人多布罗什提到了屠夫沃尔夫勒姆曾经和偷猎者做过交易。那个屠夫没有参与猎杀白獐，但至少他知道偷猎者可能藏在何处。
zeptej_se_lovci_tibor_mi__IsR2
Natan told me where to find the Cumans. They're camping near the pond where the nomads are.
纳坦告诉我库曼人的位置。他们在湖边扎营，和游牧民族待在一起。
zeptej_se_mel_bych_se_zep_l2P7
I should ask the innkeeper what to do now.
我应该问问旅馆老板，现在该做什么。
zeptej_se_mikus_odchazel__Nitp
Apparently, Mikush left the tavern with Drat the farmhand. I should have a word with this Drat fellah.
很显然，米库什当时跟着那位农场雇工德雷特离开了酒馆。我得跟这个叫德雷特的家伙谈谈。
zeptej_se_mikus_odchazel__P5j0

Mikush left the tavern with Drat the farmhand. Hanka, another refugee from Mesoles, talked Drat into bringing Mikush to a meeting place at a crossroads, on the road leading to Mesoles. He was after the family inheritance, buried in Mesoles, that Mikush had carelessly mentioned in the crowded tavern.
米库什后来与农场雇工德雷特一同离开了酒馆。另一位从梅索莱斯逃亡而出的难民汉卡，曾诱劝德雷特将米库什带到一处通往梅索莱斯的路口与之会面。而汉卡所要寻求的东西，就是米库什曾在人声鼎沸的酒馆里无意间提到的那些埋藏在梅索莱斯的家族遗产。
zeptej_se_mikus_odchazel__Q6Mk
Apparently, Mikush left the tavern with Drat the farmhand, but that's all I found out.
很显然，米库什当时是跟着那位农场雇工德雷特离开了酒馆，可这也是我唯一查到的线索。
zeptej_se_mlynar_krejzl_p_cSmB
Kreyzl the miller apparently lets his hands fight in fist fights. I'd love to know the truth about it.
磨坊主克雷泽显然会让自己的手下参加搏斗。我很想知道其中的真相。
zeptej_se_mlynar_se_nejdr_bUZ1
The miller was none too keen at first, but in the end he offered me a chance to take on his hands.
磨坊主起初并无兴趣，但最后给了我一个机会，让我对抗他的手下。
zeptej_se_mozna_je_obecne_e7EN
Hensel told me he stole Thomlin's thunderstone. But Thomlin didn't mention that at all... it probably wouldn't hurt to talk to him and find out what's going on.
亨泽尔说他偷了托姆林的雷石，但托姆林根本没说这件事……或许我该跟他谈谈，起码了解下情况也好。
zeptej_se_muzu_se_zeptat__ZFXw
I can ask the shepherd Natan, he knows the area around Semine better than anyone.
我可以问牧羊人纳坦，他最熟悉塞米附近的地方了。
zeptej_se_nasel_jsem_mnic_BXMl
I found a Monk named Morticius. He was an odd fellow but told me how to get into the ossuary, in exchange for a small service.
我遇到了一位名叫莫提修斯的修士。尽管他作风怪异，但还是将进入骸骨堂的方法告诉了我，而作为回报，我得帮他个小忙。
zeptej_se_odesel_jsem_pry_tx3l
I went away and blew off Franzi and the Striped Tonies.
我逃离了现场，将弗兰齐和“条纹托尼”甩到脑后。
zeptej_se_od_vostatka_jse_epLf
Vostatek gave me a tip about the Gamekeeper Varel. I stopped by him, not to get a new job, but to end his miserable and sad life.
沃斯塔克给了我关于猎人瓦雷尔的线索。我去找了他，但并非为了讨一份新工作，而是为了结束他那悲惨的一生。
zeptej_se_rekl_jsem_stulc_BTpG
I told Knuckles about the task that Chenyek gave me and about the thieves' symbols, which he was very interested in. If I find out anything else, I'm supposed to tell him.
我向巧指说了程叶科派给我的任务和盗贼符号，他对这些非常感兴趣。如果有其他发现，我应该告诉他。
zeptej_se_snad_budou_neoc_HNA0
Perhaps the other monks will know something about Morticius. I saw two of them begging for alms outside the cemetery.
或许其他修士会知道关于莫提修斯的事。我看见他们中的两个在墓园外乞讨。
zeptej_se_tabor_s_vojakam_Ixsj
The king's soldiers' camp is already gone. They left with Sigismund to God-knows-where! I'll have to find Victoria some other way.
士兵的营地已经搬离，至于他们随同西格斯蒙德去了哪里，只有上帝知道！我得想出别的办法寻找维多利亚。
zeptej_se_ted_bych_se_mel_wfNN
Now I should ask the soldier about Victoria's disappearance.
现在我得向士兵询问维多利亚失踪的事。
zeptej_se_tibor_je_mrtvej_Aiqs
Natan is dead, I'll have to find another way to find the Cumans.
纳坦死了，我得想想其它办法。
zeptej_se_vendula_totiz_z_q7Sz
Vendula died.
芙恩德拉死了。
zeptej_se_ve_vesnici_jsem_3uDp

I heard in the village that Bozhena and Pavlena used to live in Troskowitz. They were later cast out by the villagers, though, because Bozhena failed as a midwife during the birth of Farmer Jakesh's son. At least that's what Jakesh himself told me.
我在村中打听得知，博珍娜和帕芙莱娜曾居住在特罗斯科维茨。但是后来，因为稳婆博珍娜在接生贾克西儿子的时候出现了失职行为，因此他们被村民们赶了出来。至少贾克西是这样说的。
zeptej_se_ve_vesnici_jsem_7qG8
I heard in the village that Bozhena and Pavlena used to live in Troskowitz. I could have asked Farmer Jakesh about it, but unfortunately he died.
我在村中打听得知，博珍娜和帕芙莱娜曾居住在特罗斯科维茨。我本来可以向农夫贾克西打探更多消息的，但是他却已不幸身亡。
zeptej_se_ve_vesnici_jsem_xAml
I heard in the village that Bozhena and Pavlena used to live in Troskowitz. Folk tell me Farmer Jakesh can tell me more.
我在村中打听得知，博珍娜和帕芙莱娜曾居住在特罗斯科维茨。人们还告诉我，农夫贾克西对此知晓更多消息。
zeptej_se_vojak_mi_povede_uAGF

The soldier told me about his relationship with Victoria. It was no fairytale romance, that's for sure. They seemed to just hurt each other. I tried to convince him to take care of Victoria, but my words fell on deaf ears. At least he told me where I could find her. I must get to her quick!
士兵将他与维多利亚的恩怨告诉了我，而他们的爱情也不是什么浪漫的童话故事，因为他们大部分时间都在互相伤害。我试图说服他照顾好维多利亚，但是我的好言相劝却成了耳边风，不过至少他将维多利亚可能会去的地方告诉了我，现在我得尽快找到她！
zeptej_se_vojak_mi_povede_ymR5

A soldier told me about how things were between him and Victoria. It wasn’t a fairy-tale romance; they mostly hurt each other. Even so, I convinced him to take what little responsibility he could muster and try to ensure a better life for her. He advised me where Victoria might have gone, so now I just need to find her quickly!
士兵将他与维多利亚的恩怨告诉了我，而他们的爱情也不是什么浪漫的童话故事，因为他们大部分时间都在互相伤害。尽管如此，我还是说服了他要去承担起责任，要努力让维多利亚过上更好的生活。他将维多利亚可能会去的地方告诉了我，现在我得尽快找到她！
zeptej_se_zeptal_jsem_se__leHu
I asked the innkeeper, Betty, what happened, and she told me everything.
我问了旅馆老板贝蒂发生了什么，她告诉了我整件事。
zeptej_se_zeptal_jsem_se__M1qN
I asked Jezhek the cooper about Pavlena. He's not what you would call a ray of sunshine.
我去了找箍桶匠杰泽克打听帕芙莱娜的下落。他是个讨人厌的家伙。
zeptej_se_z_poulicni_rvac_7iDq
We fortunately got out of the brawl with the Saints, honour intact. Everything would have been fine had Anton not gotten drunk thinking about his dear Tess and her birthday.
我们所幸摆脱了与圣徒帮的冲突，光荣撤离，毫发无伤。要不是安东喝得迷迷糊糊，还一直惦记着他那亲爱的小特和她的生日，事态也不至于走到如此境地。
zeptej_se_z_sarvatky_jsme_eQbM
We got out of the brawl, the question is whether still in one piece.
我们摆脱了那场冲突，但至于是否还安然无恙，这可不好说。
zeptej_se_ztratil_se_krej_abgs
I should ask about Mikush in the tavern in Bylany.
我得到比兰尼的酒馆打探米库什的下落。

I asked about him in the tavern in Bylany.
我已在比兰尼的酒馆打探米库什的消息。

I lost all my leads.
我失去了所有线索。

Svatava died.
斯瓦塔娅死了。

Unfortunately Siegfried met with a bad fate.
很不幸，西格弗里德遭遇了厄运。
zikmunduv_cekame_na_stibo_sKpr
Prepare to defend Musa at the trial.
准备好在审判中保护穆萨。

Find the lost soldiers.
寻找失踪的士兵。

zikmunduv_dezerteri__pomo_0ORN
Help the wounded Myshek.
帮助受伤的麦士克。

Wait till Samuel gets back from Kolin and find Dry Devil's old gang.
等待塞缪尔从科林返回，并找到“酒鬼”的老同伙。

Find Dry Devil's old gang.
找到酒鬼的老同伙。

阅读记载毒药知识的书籍。

Search Stephen Crow's tent.
搜查斯蒂芬·克劳的帐篷。

搜查格罗扎夫的帐篷。

搜查赫尔坦遇刺的地点。

搜查穆萨的帐篷。

告知凯瑟琳布拉格军队正在迁离。

Zavish of Garbow left the country with Sigismund's army encampment. Now I won't get the armour or the horse from him.
加博的扎维什跟随西格斯蒙德的部队离开了这个国家。现在我无法从他那里得到盔甲和马。
zikmunduv_se_zikmundovym__n1nX
With the departure of Sigismund's camp, both Basan and Thomas of Kolin have disappeared from the region. And so ends our little game of swords.
随着西格斯蒙德的部队撤营离去，科林的托马斯和巴桑两人也一同消失在了这片区域，既然如此这场争当剑主的游戏也该终结了。

向杰式卡询问下一步计划。

等待塞缪尔从科林返回。

杀死斯蒂芬·克劳。
ziskat_sa_sazenice_odevzd_Hs5S
Besides the mysterious foul-smelling ingredient, Casper asked me to bring him a few grapevine seedlings from the vineyard garden. I didn't waste any time and brought them to him right away.
除了难闻的奇特材料外，卡斯帕还要求我从葡萄园的花园里给他带几棵葡萄树苗。我丝毫没有耽搁，马上拿给了他。
ziskat_sa_sazenice_uz_mam_mM11

Besides the mysterious foul-smelling ingredient, Casper asked me to bring him a few grapevine seedlings from the vineyard garden. I didn't waste any time and grabbed them right away. Now I should hurry and bring them to Casper before they dry out.
除了难闻的奇特材料外，卡斯帕还要求我从葡萄园的花园里给他带几棵葡萄树苗。我丝毫没有耽搁，马上去拿。现在我应该在它们干枯之前，赶紧带给卡斯帕。
ziskat_sa_ziskat_sazenice_gCef
Besides the mysterious foul-smelling ingredient, Casper asked me to bring him a few grapevine seedlings from the vineyard garden.
除了难闻的奇特材料外，卡斯帕还要求我从葡萄园的花园里给他带几棵葡萄树苗。
ziskej_do_p_mam_je_zpatky_nL9a
I got the document back which tells me where to get the barrel of powder.
我取回了文件，它将告诉我该到何处获取火药桶。
ziskej_do_p_ziskej_dokume_LYQ0
I need to get Eldris' document back so I can find out where to get the barrel of black powder.
我得将埃尔德里斯的文件取回，这样我就能知道在哪里可以弄到黑火药了。
ziskej_du_po_kutne_hore_s_A253

The word around Kuttenberg is Mint Master Vavak is getting much richer than his – rather comfortable – office would warrant. Apparently, he even steals royal silver, which is a capital offence. There is no evidence, though. If Ruthard had such evidence, it would solve his problems with Vavak once and for all. So he instructed me to get him the evidence. My investigation at the Horschan mines was aided by the friendly steward Christian of Pisek and I found out that not all of the ore that goes to the smelter is entered into the mine books. In the smelter, I found out the scheme was organised by the Grund smelter owner, Buresh, and his people. They were sending the undeclared silver to a secret mint. If there is any evidence connecting the crime to Vavak, that's where I'll find it.

在库滕堡，有关铸币官瓦万克的流言不绝于耳，言其财富之丰，远非其闲职所能匹配。显然，他甚至偷用了皇室白银，此乃死罪，不过目前尚缺证据。如果鲁瑟德能查出相关证据，便可一举解决与瓦万克之间的纷争，因此他让我去寻找证据。在我调查霍斯昌矿场的过程中，得到了皮塞克的克里斯蒂安的好心帮助，后来我也发现，并非所有运往冶炼厂的矿石都记录到了矿产记录里。在冶炼厂中，我发现了由格兰德冶炼厂老板布雷斯和他手下一同策划的一起阴谋。他们将未申报的银矿送到了一处秘密铸币厂，倘若瓦万克与此罪行有所关联，我应该就能在那里找到证据。
ziskej_du_po_kutne_hore_s_BGLK

The word around Kuttenberg is Mint Master Vavak is getting much richer than his – rather comfortable – office would warrant. Apparently, he even steals royal silver, which is a capital offence. There is no evidence, though. If Ruthard had such evidence, it would solve his problems with Vavak once and for all. So he instructed me to get him the evidence. My investigation at the Horschan mines was aided by the friendly steward Christian of Pisek and I found out that not all of the ore that goes to the smelter is entered into the mine books. In the smelter, I found out the scheme was organised by the Grund smelter owner, Buresh, and his people. They were sending the undeclared silver to a secret mint. If there is any evidence connecting the crime to Vavak, that's where I'll find it. I should take a thorough look below ground.

ziskej_du_po_kutne_hore_s_gXDC

There is no evidence, though. If Ruthard had such evidence, it would solve his problems with Vavak once and for all. So he instructed me to get him the evidence. My investigation at the Horschan mines was aided by the friendly steward Christian of Pisek and I found out that not all of the ore that goes to the smelter is entered into the mine books. So I will continue with my investigation in the smelter.
在库滕堡，有关铸币官瓦万克的流言不绝于耳，言其财富之丰，远非其闲职所能匹配。显然，他甚至偷用了皇室白银，此乃死罪，不过目前尚缺证据。如果鲁瑟德能查出相关证据，便可一举解决与瓦万克之间的纷争，因此他让我去寻找证据。在我调查霍斯昌矿场的过程中，得到了皮塞克的克里斯蒂安的好心帮助，后来我也发现，并非所有运往冶炼厂的矿石都记录到了矿产记录里，所以我前往冶炼厂继续我的调查。
ziskej_du_po_kutne_hore_s_iv4o

The word around Kuttenberg is Mint Master Vavak is getting much richer than his – rather comfortable – office would warrant. Apparently, he even steals royal silver, which is a capital offence. There is no evidence, though. If Ruthard had such evidence, it would solve his problems with Vavak once and for all. So he instructed me to get him the evidence. My investigation at the Horschan mines was aided by the friendly steward Christian of Pisek and I found out that not all of the ore that goes to the smelter is entered into the mine books. In the smelter, I found out the scheme was organised by the Grund smelter owner, Buresh, and his people. They were sending the undeclared silver to a secret mint. There I found the ultimate proof: Vavak's records of the entire criminal network.

在库滕堡，有关铸币官瓦万克的流言不绝于耳，言其财富之丰，远非其闲职所能匹配。显然，他甚至偷用了皇室白银，此乃死罪，不过目前尚缺证据。如果鲁瑟德能查出相关证据，便可一举解决与瓦万克之间的纷争，因此他让我去寻找证据。在我调查霍斯昌矿场的过程中，得到了皮塞克的克里斯蒂安的好心帮助，后来我也发现，并非所有运往冶炼厂的矿石都记录到了矿产记录里。在冶炼厂中，我也发现了由格兰德冶炼厂老板布雷斯和他手下一同策划的一起阴谋。他们将未申报的银矿送到了一处秘密铸币厂，我也在那里找到了无懈可击的证据，即是瓦万克对整个犯罪网络的记录。
ziskej_fr_herman_palecek__eA8K
Hermann Palitze wanted to take revenge on his rival Florian, but I never learnt how it worked out.
赫尔曼·帕利策想报复他的对手弗洛里安，但我不知道最后结果如何。
ziskej_fr_herman_palecek__mkGp
Hermann Palitze wants to get revenge on Florian for his latest joke. To do that, he'll use the ring Florian recently got from a lady. The ring is locked in his chest in Crone Tower.
赫尔曼·帕利策因为弗洛里安最近对他的一次愚弄而想要报复弗洛里安。为此，他将利用弗洛里安最近从一位小姐那里得到的戒指。这枚戒指就锁在他放在老妪塔的箱子里。
ziskej_fr_ted_uz_staci_je_nIce
Now I just have to take Florian's ring back to Hermann Littlehead.
现在我只需将弗洛里安的戒指拿给“小脑袋”赫尔曼。
ziskej_fr_v_truhle_ve_vez_pMc1

I found a silver ring in Florian's chest in Crone Tower and brought it to Littlehead. His scheme involved furtively giving the ring to a different lady, so Florian would get a scolding from his true admirer.
我在弗洛里安存放于老妪塔中的箱子里发现了一枚银戒指，并将它带给了小脑袋。他计划将那枚戒指暗自交给其他女人，如此一来，弗洛里安真正的爱慕对象便会责备他。
ziskej_hr_dopsat_log__akt_ejIf
I need to get a thunderstone somehow.
我得想办法找到块雷石。
ziskej_hr_mlada_uz_je_na__ct6i
Mlada has breathed her last, God have mercy on her soul. And mine, too, for that matter. I did get the thunderstone she had in her possession, though.
姆拉达去世了，愿主宽恕她的灵魂，还有我的。而且我的确拿到了她的雷石。
ziskej_hr_mlada_uz_je_sic_DHnm
Mlada may have found her place in the heavenly realm, amen, but the stone remains on this earthly plane. I should make the most of the opportunity.
姆拉达或许已在天堂有了自己的位置，但石头仍在人间。阿门。我最好应该利用这个机会。
ziskej_hr_pokusil_jsme_se_QBfZ
I tried to help Mlada's husband, without much success. But I did convince Mlada that the stone was cursed, so she gave it to me.
我试图帮助姆拉达的丈夫，但失败了。但我成功说服了姆拉达让她认为这块雷石被诅咒了，所以她把雷石给了我。
ziskej_hr_pomohl_jsem_mla_enS7
I helped Mlada's husband, who was gravely ill. Mlada gave me the thunderstone as a reward.
我帮助了姆拉达那得了重病的丈夫。她将雷石作为报酬给了我。
ziskej_hr_ten_hromovy_kam_njDB
I managed to get the thunderstone, which was no mean feat. But in the end, I decided the best use of it would be to give it to Master Parler to protect the church he was building.
我设法拿到了雷石。这可不容易，但最后我决定把它送给帕勒大师，用来保护他正在修建的教堂。
ziskej_hr_ukradl_jsem_mla_uFVM
I stole Mlada's thunderstone. It wasn't very honourable of me, but I got the stone and that's what matters most.
我偷了姆拉达的雷石。这并不光彩，但我拿到雷石才是最重要的。
ziskej_hr_vim_ze_kamen_ma_j3oc
I know Mlada has a stone, but she won't just give it to me. I need to get it from her somehow.
我知道姆拉达那有一块，但她不会就这么给我。我得想办法从她那拿到。
ziskej_hr_ziskal_jsem_hro_HKMo

I got the thunderstone from Thomlin Bruthans. But in the end, I decided that, rather than handing it over to Kona, it would be better to give it to Master Parler to protect the church he was building.
我从托姆林·布鲁桑斯那拿到了雷石，但最后我觉得与其给柯娜，不如给帕勒大师去保护他正在修建的教堂。
ziskej_in_abych_zjistil_k_5z1O
I should talk to the leader of the second shift, Paul, about how many corves of ore his "sonnies" extracted on the feast of St. Petronilla.
我得跟第二班的领班保罗谈一谈，询问他的“小弟”们在圣佩特罗尼拉纪念日那天开采了多少车矿石。
ziskej_in_abych_zjistil_k_QlLn
I'm supposed to ask the resting third shift Foreman Samko how many corves of ore his "sonnies" mined on the feast of St. Petronilla.
我要向正休工的第三班领班萨姆科询问他手下的“小伙”们在圣佩特罗尼拉纪念日那天开采了多少车矿石。
ziskej_in_dones_hornikum__Mrbt
I have to get Frank some beer so his "sonnies" can quench their thirst.
我得给弗兰克弄点啤酒来，好让他的“小弟”们解解渴。
ziskej_in_mam_si_s_hornik_ZzTA
Foreman Samko tempts me to play dice with him and says he'll tell me what I want after that.
领班萨姆科企图诱劝我跟他一起玩骰子，还说事后就会将我想知道的事情都告诉我。
ziskej_in_nez_mi_predak_p_jmG6
They say I'll find Paul in a gallery near a cave-in where I'll hear the wind howling. One of his "sonnies" died there recently and Paul's praying for his soul.
人们说我可以在一处坍塌点附近的巷道中找到保罗，在那里，我能听到呼啸的风声。保罗的一位“小伙”最近刚死在那个地方，而保罗正在为他的灵魂进行祈祷。
ziskej_in_pobavil_jsem_se_76v7
Foreman Samko tempts me to play dice with him and says he'll tell me what I want after that. But I couldn't finish the dice game. I should play with him again.
领班萨姆科企图诱劝我跟他一起玩骰子，还说事后就会将我想知道的事情都告诉我。但是我没能完成骰子游戏，还得再跟他玩一次。
ziskej_in_pobav_se_s_pred_YD4e
I am to ask Frank, foreman of the first shift, how many corves his "sonnies" mined on the feast of St. Petronilla
我要向第一班的领班弗兰克询问他手下的“小伙”们在圣佩特罗尼拉纪念日那天开采了几车矿石。
ziskej_in_prece_nebudu_hr_ViTR
Foreman Samko is dead, so I won't be getting anything out of him.
领班萨姆科已死，我也因此无法再向他打探任何事情。
ziskej_in_sezen_pivo_Oa0L
Frank wants me to bring them beer from the chest at the camp to quench their thirst.
弗兰克想让我到营地里的箱子里取点啤酒，给他们解解渴。
ziskej_in_uz_sem_zjistil__n4Sn
Frank, the foreman of the first shift, told me their yield was 36 corves of ore that day.
第一班的领班弗兰克告诉我，他们当天产出了36车矿石。
ziskej_in_ve_stole_jsem_n_lkfs
I learned from the leader of the second shift, Paul, that they extracted 30 corves of ore that day.
我从第二班领班保罗那里得知，他们当天产出了30车矿石。
ziskej_in_za_to_ze_jsem_s_MG7L
I learned from the leader of the third shift, Samko, that they extracted 34 corves of ore that day.
我从第三班的领班萨姆科那里得知，他们当天产出了34车矿石。
ziskej_ji_hans_mi_povedel_ABqt
Janosh told me rations are running out and he can't give me anything extra. I won't be getting any food from Janosh.
亚诺什告诉我口粮几近耗尽，没有多的给我。我从他那儿拿不到食物了。
ziskej_ji_jestli_ma_nekdo_8wuN
If there's anyone who knows about all the food at the fortress, it's Janosh Uher.
要说堡垒里谁最清楚食物的情况，那非亚诺什·乌尔莫属。
ziskej_ka_sice_jsem_spis__06lq

Although I no longer needed Bushek of Velhartice's book for my mission, I did promise Casper I'd get the book back from Adleta Mannlicher. And I made good on that promise. Casper will sell it to pay off at least some of his debts.
尽管我已经不需要维尔哈蒂采的布谢克的书来完成我的任务了，但我答应过卡斯帕从阿德莱塔·曼尼希尔那里拿回这本书。我履行了这个承诺。卡斯帕会卖掉它，偿还他至少一部分的债务。
ziskej_ka_sice_uz_ji_nepo_HrH8
It's true I don't need it anymore, but I promised Casper I'd get hold of the book he lent to Adleta Mannlicher as an act of friendship. I have it now, so all I need to do is take it to Casper.
虽然我已经不需要它了，但我出于义气答应过卡斯帕要拿到他借给阿德莱塔·曼尼希尔的书。现在我拿到它了，所以我把它交还给卡斯帕就行了。
ziskej_ka_sice_uz_ji_nepo_uCHS
It's true I don't need it anymore, but I promised Casper I'd get hold of the book he lent to Adleta Mannlicher as an act of friendship.
虽然我已经不需要它了，但我出于义气答应过卡斯帕要拿到他借给阿德莱塔·曼尼希尔的书。
ziskej_kl_nezbyvalo_tedy__rmlm

There was nothing to do but to go to the vineyard and take a look in the cellars there. And indeed, I found an extremely smelly crate from which I took a thin slice of wood that seems infused with the stench of hell itself.
没办法，只能去葡萄园的地窖里看一看。我的确发现了一个恶臭的箱子，我从里面取出了一片薄薄的木头，上面似乎浸透了地狱的臭味。
ziskej_kl_o_ty_zpropadene_zpYV
I lost Sigismund's damned sausages. What now? I can try to get them back, or just get my hands on some ordinary sausages. The beggars won't be able to tell the difference anyway.
我把西格斯蒙德的香肠弄丢了。现在怎么办？我可以试着把它们找回来，或者弄一些普通香肠代替。反正那帮乞丐也看不出区别来。
ziskej_kl_tento_zvlastni__lAE3
The mysterious foul-smelling ingredient the monks use to make their wine better is most likely kept in the vineyard cellars in Loretz. I should go and have a look.
修士们制作佳酿的神秘恶臭成分，很可能保存在洛雷兹的葡萄园地窖里。我应该去看一看。
ziskej_kn_bergov_drzi_pan_5Avy
Von Bergow is holding Lady Rosa captive in Maleshov. I really hope nothing bad has happened to her.
冯·波尔高在马列索夫抓住了罗莎女士，希望她不会遭遇任何不测。
ziskej_kn_kniha_pani_rozy_EQKQ
Lady Rosa's book is no ordinary document. Fortunately, I managed to return it undamaged. There are still a few blank pages left in it, and Lady Rosa offered to let me help her finish it.
罗莎小姐的书非同寻常，万幸的是，书本已完好无损地回到了她的手中。如今书中尚有几页空白，罗莎小姐请求我协助她完成书籍的撰写。
ziskej_kn_kniha_pani_rozy_Fs3N
Lady Rosa's book was no ordinary document. Fortunately, it returned undamaged, and it might soon grow with more pages.
罗莎小姐的书非同寻常，万幸的是，书本已完好无损地回到了她的手中。或许很快书中就能多添几页内容。
ziskej_kn_malesov_je_doby_7QbL
Maleshov is conquered and Lady Rosa is safe and sound. I'd better hurry to the council at Suchdol now, after that I'll probably have a chance to talk to her.
马列索夫已被占领，而罗莎女士也平安无事。我现在得赶快前往苏赫多尔的市议会寻找罗莎女士并与之交谈。
ziskej_kn_pani_rozu_pry_o_ZieT
Kunzlin Ruthard ended up in captivity. I have no news yet of Rosa, but I hope she's safe.
昆兹林·鲁瑟德终于还是被关押了起来。而我还没有关于罗莎的消息，但愿她能平安无事。
ziskej_kn_podle_rozy_je_k_5CO2
Lady Rosa is certainly impatiently awaiting news of my trip to Maleshov. Before I tell her everything, I must first get Hans Capon to safety.
想必罗莎小姐在焦急地等待我去马列索夫的消息。在我向她汇报情况之前，我必须先将汉斯·卡蓬送至安全地方。
ziskej_kn_skvele_jsem_na__kt0m
Lady Rosa is certainly impatiently awaiting news of my trip to Maleshov. I shouldn't keep her waiting.
想必罗莎女士在焦急地等待我去马列索夫的消息，我不能再让她等下去了。
ziskej_kn_z_malesova_jsem_TgFI
Lady Rosa was notably disappointed with my failure to find the book.
对于我没能成功找回那本书，罗莎女士尤为失望。
ziskej_ma_sice_mi_tu_mapu_Dupj
They may have confiscated the map, but something like that won’t stop me. I got it back again.
或许他们想占有那张地图，但是那种事情可阻止不了我，而我也已将其取回。
ziskej_od_abych_si_mohl_s_32NO

To be allowed to play dice against Bailiff Thrush for his gold badge, I needed to beat Emmerich the apothecary, and get his tin badge. But he lost it in the meantime, so I have no way to win it. I hope Thrush doesn't mind.
要想与执行官瑟鲁什玩骰子并赢取他的金质徽章，我就得先击败草药师艾默里奇，赢得他的锡制徽章。但是那枚徽章已经不在他手上了，因此我无法赢得徽章，希望瑟鲁什不会介意。
ziskej_od_abych_si_mohl_s_jATd

To be allowed to play dice against Bailiff Thrush for his gold badge, I needed to beat Emmerich the apothecary, and get his tin badge. But he lost it in the meantime. In the end, I got it from scribe Gaibl, so I can continue playing.
要想与执行官瑟鲁什玩骰子并赢取他的金质徽章，我就得先击败草药师艾默里奇，赢得他的锡制徽章。但是那枚徽章已经不在他手上了，好在最终我从抄写员盖布尔那里取了回来，这样我便可以继续玩骰子了。
ziskej_od_abych_si_mohl_s_xEu5
To be allowed to play dice against Bailiff Thrush for his gold badge, I have to beat Emmerich the apothecary, and get his tin badge.
要想与执行官瑟鲁什玩骰子并赢取他的金质徽章，我就得先击败草药师艾默里奇，赢得他的锡制徽章。
ziskej_od_jestli_chci_od__hcnG
To win the gold badge from Bailiff Thrush, I had to beat the Chamberlain first, and so I did.
要想赢取执行官瑟鲁什的金质徽章，我必须先击败管家，最终我达成了目标。
ziskej_od_jestli_chci_od__vMme
If I want to win the gold badge from Bailiff Thrush, I must beat the Chamberlain and get his tin badge first.
要想赢取执行官瑟鲁什的金质徽章，我就必须先击败管家并赢取他的锡制徽章。
ziskej_od_nejtezsi_cast_p_Deau
The hardest part of the plan, conquering Maleshov fortress, still awaits us. I have to go to Zizka to get exact orders.
我们正面临着计划中最艰巨的一项任务，即占领马列索夫堡垒。我得去见一见杰式卡，获取确切的行动指令。
ziskej_od_nejtezsi_cast_p_lQxq
The hardest part of the plan, conquering Maleshov fortress, still awaited us. Zizka assigned me to a group whose job it was to take care of both gates to the castle.
我们正面临着计划中最艰巨的一项任务，即占领马列索夫堡垒。杰式卡将我安排进了一个行动小组里，我们将负责控制堡垒的两扇大门......
ziskej_od_pokud_si_chci_s_2jVL
If I want to play against Thrush for his gold badge, I must get a tin badge from Radovan the blacksmith first.
要想与执行官瑟鲁什比试并赢取他的金质徽章，我必须先赢得铁匠拉多万的锡制徽章。
ziskej_od_pokud_si_chci_s_7HUi
To be allowed to play against Thrush for his gold badge, I needed to get a tin badge from Radovan the blacksmith first. Lady luck smiled on me and I won.
要想与执行官瑟鲁什比试并赢取他的金质徽章，我必须先赢得铁匠拉多万的锡制徽章。最终我得到了幸运女神的青睐，在比试中胜出。
ziskej_od_ted_uz_jen_zisk_i3S0
Now that I’ve found the soldiers' camp, I just need to get their writ. The commander is likely the one who has it.
我已经找到了那些士兵的营地，现在只需要获得他们的令状即可。令状应该就在营地指挥官身上。
ziskej_od_ten_nemecky_hos_d9sc
Poor Geldstück sold his last beer. Up in heaven there'll be no soldiers troubling him.
再也没人会购买盖尔斯塔克的酒水了，愿天堂没有给他添乱的士兵。
ziskej_os_nasel_jsem_jano_AuNY

I've found Jan's remains. Thirty years on, all that's left is yellowed bones and a skull with a clump of red hair. No coffin - they simply wrapped him in a shroud and the worms soon got to work on him.
我找到了杨的遗体。三十年过去了，只剩下发黄的骨头和长着一丛红发的头骨。没有棺材——他们只给他用了裹尸布，虫子很快就啃噬了他的身体。
ziskej_os_na_tohle_jsem_n_jLY1
I didn't have the stomach for this - digging up yellowing bones and a skull with empty eye sockets.
挖出发黄的骨头和带着空洞眼窝的头骨——这会让我恶心呕吐。
ziskej_os_za_hrbitovni_zd_z8VG
Apparently, there's a spot by the graveyard wall where Jan's body is buried. Finding and moving all the bones into the sacred ground of the graveyard will be dirty work.
显然，杨的尸体埋在墓地墙边某处。找到所有遗骨，并将它们移到墓地圣土，将是个脏活。
ziskej_pr_krome_tajemne_s_HWJa

Besides the mysterious foul-smelling ingredient, Casper asked me to bring him a few grapevine seedlings from the vineyard garden. Now I just need to find out what the monastery secret is and I can return to him.
除了难闻的奇特材料外，卡斯帕还要求我从葡萄园的花园里给他带几棵葡萄树苗。现在我需要查清修道院的秘方，然后再向他汇报情况。
ziskej_so_pziskej_soudek__XAWq
I can't complete my task without the barrel of black powder! I've got to get it back.
没有火药桶我还怎么完成任务！我得把它弄回来。
ziskej_uc_v_kocovnickem_t_98lh
Když mám teď oba závody odježděné, měl bych s koňáky promluvit a konečně je rozsoudit. Přeci jenom o nich vím první poslední. Nebo ne? Jak se vůbec jmenují jejich koně?
ziskej_uc_v_kocovnickem_t_FFoa
S oběma jezdci jsem si pohovořil. Jako vždy to bylo vyhrocené, ale nakonec se mi je podařilo usmířit, aniž bych se musel přiklonit na něčí stranu.
ziskej_uc_v_kocovnickem_t_hAth
V kočovnickém táboře jsem potkal dva jezdce, kteří se nemohli shodnout, který z koňských závodů je nejlepší. Abych je mohl rozsoudit, musel jsem vyhrát v obou. Nakonec jsem to ale celý zpackal.
ziskej_uc_v_kocovnickem_t_MuMI
S oběma jezdci jsem si pohovořil. Jako vždy to bylo vyhrocené, ale nakonec jsem musel uznat, že lukostřelba byla nejlepší.
ziskej_uc_v_kocovnickem_t_mxHW
S oběma jezdci jsem si pohovořil. Jako vždy to bylo vyhrocené, ale nakonec jsem musel uznat, že dostihy byly nejlepší.
ziskej_vo_neprinesl_jsem__UV14
I didn’t bring the perfume in time, and the Striped Tonies finished their procession without me. They probably thought I’d given up on them.
我没能及时带来香水，条纹托尼他们在没有我帮助的情况下完成了游行。可能他们以为我放弃帮他们的忙了。
ziskej_zb_jama_vykopana_t_u4CT
We discovered a buried chest with guns. Now to pick them up.
我们发现了一个藏有枪炮的箱子，现在把它们都取出来吧。
ziskej_zb_podarilo_se_nam_8jnR
After a seemingly endless search, we finally discovered the buried hand cannons.
在经历了一场看似漫无天日的搜查后，我们终于找到了那些埋藏的手炮。
ziskej_zb_potrebuju_vykop_lN1A

The hand cannons are supposed to be buried underground, but Kubyenka doesn't remember exactly where. Now I have to dig according to his instructions. Fortunately, I don't have to go looking for a shovel as one is leaning near a tent.
那些手炮应该就埋在地下，但是库宾卡却无法记起它们的具体位置。现在我得按照他的描述进行挖掘，所幸帐篷旁就倚着一把铲子，那让我省去了寻找的时间。
ziskej_zb_potrebuju_vykop_mvCw
Kubyenka's not eager to get his hands dirty, so I'll have to do the digging. There is supposed to be a shovel in the camp, leaning against one of the tents.
库宾卡并不想弄脏他的双手，所以将由我来进行挖掘。营地里应该就有一把铲子，倚靠在某个帐篷旁。
ziskej_zl_nasel_jsem_ty_z_MY1F

Sneaking around without being spotted is tricky, but now that I have some good thieves' clothing, it should be a bit easier. The miller told me he had a set "in pawn" at the Zhelejov baths, which I managed to get my hands on. They won't make me invisible, but they should make my job a little simpler.
偷偷摸摸的同时还要瞒天过海可不是件易事。但既然盗贼装束已到手，事情就简单多了。我已成功取得磨坊主说他在哲勒约夫澡堂被“扣押”的那些盗贼装束。即便那并不能让我匿迹隐形，但至少能让任务更为得心应手。
ziskej_zl_plizit_se_a_neb_hrHO

Sneaking around without being spotted is tricky. If I had some good thieves' clothing, it would make things much easier! The miller told me he has some "in pawn" at the Zhelejov baths. The owner, Dorothy, mentioned they were in a chest in the attic.
偷偷摸摸的同时还要瞒天过海可不是件易事。要是有一些盗贼装束，事情就简单多了！据说磨坊主有套类似的装束被“扣押”在哲勒约夫澡堂，而澡堂的老板多萝西提到那套装束就收在阁楼的箱子里。
ziskej_zl_plizit_se_a_neb_SIi7

Sneaking around without being spotted is tricky. If I had some good thieves' clothing, it would make things much easier! The miller told me he has some "in pawn" at the Zhelejov baths. Can I get my hands on them without having to tell with the grumpy owner, Dorothy?
偷偷摸摸的同时还要瞒天过海可不是件易事。要是有一些盗贼装束，事情就简单多了！据说磨坊主有套类似的装束被“扣押”在哲勒约夫澡堂。不知我能否在避免与澡堂那暴躁的老板多萝西交涉的前提下，获取那套装束？
ziskej_zp_a_hreb_je_zase__onAj
I got the nail I need back.
我将钉子找回来了。
ziskejzpa_neziskal_jsem_z_mQKu
I didn’t get the confiscated bouquet back.
我没能取回被没收的花束。
ziskejzpa_zabavene_ruze_j_8LEy
I got the confiscated roses back.
我取回了被收走的玫瑰花。
ziskejzpa_zabavili_mi_ruz_3kgj
They confiscated the roses for Anthony’s beloved, I need to get them back.
他们收走了为安东尼的爱人准备的玫瑰花，我得将其取回。
ziskej_zp_bohuzel_jsem_pr_0FAj
Unfortunately I lost Havel's ledger. I should retrieve it because Kaspar will surely want to see it.
真是倒霉，我弄丢了哈维尔的账本。我得把它拿回来，毕竟卡斯帕真的很想得到它。
ziskej_zp_boty_jsem_z_tru_cvK1
I got the shoes from Goodwife Frenzl's chest, but then I lost them again. If I really want to make soup with Musa, I'll have to get them back again.
我刚从弗伦夫人的箱子里取走了那双鞋，但没多久就弄丢了。如果当真要跟穆萨煲鞋子汤，我就得把它们找回来。
ziskej_zp_boty_pani_frenz_e6uG
I got Goodwife Frenzl's shoes back again, so now there's nothing stopping us making shoe soup.
我又把弗伦夫人的鞋找回来了，没什么能阻止我们煲鞋子汤了。
ziskej_zp_krejcikova_podk_rqwF
The tailor's horseshoe was mine, but I lost it. Without it, I won't be able to forge that axe for Parler.
我拿到了裁缝的马蹄铁，但是将它弄丢了。没有马蹄铁，我就没法为帕勒铸造斧子了。
ziskej_zp_neziskal_jsem_z_wONL
I didn’t get the confiscated perfume back.
我没能取回被没收的香水。
ziskej_zp_o_klasterni_taj_yaPv
I lost the monastery secret. I must get it back before I return to Casper.
我弄丢了修道院的秘方。在回到卡斯帕那里之前，我得将其取回。
ziskej_zp_pametni_mince_j_H84d
I managed to get the commemorative coin back.
我成功将纪念币找回来了。
ziskej_zp_sekere_je_zase__gVZq
I got the horseshoe back.
我将马蹄铁找回来了。
ziskej_zp_strazni_mi_zaba_3qdO
The guards confiscated that stolen dress from me, I should get it back.
警卫从我这里收走了那套偷来的衣物，我得把它取回。
ziskej_zp_strazni_mi_zaba_MB6x
The guards confiscated the stolen seal for Rat. I should get it back.
警卫们为了“耗子”收走了那枚印章，我得把它拿回来。
ziskej_zp_strazni_mi_zaba_VaJl
The guards confiscated the stolen figurine; I should get it back.
警卫从我这里收走了失窃的雕像，我得把它取回来。
ziskej_zp_strazni_mi_zaba_ZA60
The guards confiscated my stolen old sword; I should get it back.
警卫从我这里收走了那柄被盗的旧剑，我得把它取回。
ziskej_zp_ten_zatreceny_h_5Abb
That damn nail slipped through my fingers. I have to get it back!
那该死的钉子从我的指缝里滑落了。我得将它找回来！
ziskej_zp_uz_jsem_drzel_p_Ooo0
I had the coin in my hand, but I lost it. I have to find it quickly.
我拿到了硬币 ，但是弄丢了。我得快点把它找回来。
ziskej_zp_zabavene_vino_n_UpSN
I've retrieved the confiscated wine.
我已取回被收走的红酒。
ziskej_zp_zabavenou_vonav_Bi2t
I got the confiscated perfume back.
我取回了被收走的香水。
ziskej_zp_zabaveny_floria_Ytg2
I've retrieved Florian's confiscated ring.
我已取回被收走的戒指。
ziskej_zp_zabavili_mi_flo_JqOx
They confiscated Florian's ring, I need to get it back.
他们收走了弗洛里安的戒指，我得把它拿回来。
ziskej_zp_zabavili_mi_vin_nbig
They confiscated Capon's wine, I need to get it back.
他们收走了卡蓬的红酒，我得把它拿回来。
ziskej_zp_zabavili_mi_von_nZye
They confiscated the perfume for Anthony’s beloved, I need to get it back.
他们收走了为安东尼的爱人准备的香水，我得将其取回。
ziskej_zp_ziskal_jsem_zab_JNu4
The guards confiscated the stolen seal for Rat but I got it back.
警卫们为了“耗子”收走了那枚印章，但我已将其追回。
ziskej_zp_ziskal_jsem_zpa_4zBT
I got the stolen sword back.
我已将被盗的剑取回。
ziskej_zp_ziskal_jsem_zpa_AgGX
I got the stolen dress back.
我已将那套偷来的衣物取回。
ziskej_zp_ziskal_jsem_zpa_bghq
I got the stolen statuette back.
我已将失窃的雕像取回。
zitra_ran_predak_vlach_by_6WRB

Foreman Vlach was quite uneasy this morning. Anton's romantic rendez-vous with Tess ended most ignominiously for the miners' champion shooter! When running away from Master Linhart, Anton hurt his arm and could not compete in the shooting competition.
领班弗拉赫来度过了一个坐立不安的早晨。谁知安东这位冠军选手竟以极为羞耻的方式结束了他与小特的浪漫幽会！而且在安东逃离林哈特大师的过程中弄伤了手臂，因此将无法参加射鸟比赛。
zitra_ran_predak_vlach_me_OpqC
Foreman Vlach invited me to the miners' shooting competition. I must come to the Kuttenberg shooting range in Hoprink early in the morning and talk to him.
领班弗拉赫邀请我观看一场矿工射鸟比赛，而我必须赶在黎明时分前往库滕堡的霍普林克射击场与他交谈。
zitra_ran_zapomnel_jsem_n_EDwk
A most unpleasant incident happened to Vlach after our meeting. He'll never watch the miners' competition again.
在与弗拉赫的碰面结束以后，他遭遇了令人痛心的意外，将再也观看不到那场矿工竞赛了。
zjisti_bl_nit_kterou_jsem_QSCU
The thread I was following to track down the missing Zdena broke, and I was left empty-handed. And now, due to another murder, I can’t find the killer and help Lumir.
能让我找到失踪女孩兹德娜的线索已中断，我两手空空，一无所获。而现在因为另一个凶手的出现，我无法找到真正的凶手并帮助卢米尔了。
zjisti_bl_zdena_druha_z_n_3TeV

Zdena, the second missing girl, was a member of a band of pickpockets. Her accomplice Strnad sent me to the fence Pint, because she'd just robbed some rich victim. Pint said she'd kept some signet ring as a souvenir. He didn't recall the signet. She'd also mentioned she might stop along the way and dip her feet somewhere.
第二位失踪的女孩名叫兹德娜，是一个扒手团伙的成员。因其不久前刚偷走了富人的一些财物，她的同伙斯特纳德让我前往一处磨坊打探消息。而后派特告诉我兹德娜将某只图章戒指留作纪念，还说兹德娜曾提到过她要穿过树林和溪流到库滕堡去。
zjisti_bl_zdena_druha_z_n_eoPo
Zdena, the second missing girl, was a member of a band of pickpockets. I was told to question her accomplice Strnad, who refused to talk to Lumir, but he might talk to me.
第二位失踪的女孩名叫兹德娜，是一个扒手团伙的成员。我被告知前去与她的同伙斯特纳德交谈，此人先前拒绝向卢米尔透露任何信息，但他也许会愿意跟我交流。
zjisti_bl_zdena_druha_z_n_gGaZ

Zdena, the second missing girl, has finally been found, unfortunately dead, apparently for quite a while. According to Strnad, her accomplice, and Pint, her fence, she was probably murdered by the person she robbed. Why, then, did he leave his signet ring with her? I hoped Lumir would recognise that signet.
终于找到了兹德娜，可不幸的是她已命丧黄泉，而且很明显已经死亡好一段时间了。据她的同伙斯特纳德，以及她的销赃者派特所言，谋害她的凶手很可能就是失窃的富人。既然如此，为什么凶手要把图章戒指留在兹德娜身上呢？但愿卢米尔会认得这些纹章。
zjisti_bl_zdena_druha_z_n_W5BV

After selling the stolen loot to Pint, Zdena, the second missing victim, stopped by a nearby ford to rest. And she still must be resting somewhere nearby, because her overturned basket of silver is still lying here.
将偷来的赃物卖给派特以后，兹德娜，这个第二位失踪的女孩，曾在附近的一处浅滩歇脚。她现在应该也还在附近，因为她翻倒的银器篮子还留在这里。
zjisti_bl_zdena_druha_z_n_xMsx

Zdena, the second missing victim, was a member of a band of pickpockets. Her accomplice Strnad told me that she'd managed to rob some careless rich fellow and went to sell her loot to a man called Pint, the foreman at a "nearby" mill.
第二位失踪的女孩名叫兹德娜，是一个扒手团伙的成员。她的同伙斯特纳德告诉我，兹德娜曾趁着一些富人走神时偷走了他的财物，并将赃物卖给了一个叫派特的人，而后者是“附近”磨坊里的工头。
zjisti_co_dira_ve_zdi_pal_aIUC
The hole in the palace wall shows that the Prague forces have finished building their trebuchets. God preserve us!
城墙上的大洞足以表明布拉格军队已经组装好了他们的投石机，愿上帝保佑！
zjisti_co_dira_ve_zdi_pal_AwYT
The hole in the palace wall shows that the Prague forces have finished building their trebuchets. God preserve us. Peter of Pisek is furious, but that's the least of our concerns now.
城墙上的大洞足以表明布拉格军队已经组装好了他们的投石机。皮塞克的彼得为此勃然大怒，但殊不知我们还将面临更大的麻烦，愿上帝保佑。
zjisti_co_kdyz_lichtenste_4Dsu
When Liechtenstein heard what was about to happen in Kuttenberg, he immediately ordered us to return to the city to try and prevent the worst.
当列支敦士登听说库滕堡即将发生的事情后，他立即命令我们返回城市，试图阻止最坏的情况发生。
zjisti_co_krejci_mikus_se_1Az8

In the forest not far from Bylany, I found a desolate hut and inside two refugees from the ruined village of Mesoles: Svatava and her daughter Vendula. The head of the family, Mikush the tailor, never returned from work. Svatava asked me to find out what happened to him.
就在距离比兰尼不远处的树林里，有座孤凄的小木屋。我在屋内遇到了两位从遇袭村庄梅索莱斯逃出的避难者：斯瓦塔娅以及她的女儿芙恩德拉。据说裁缝米库什，作为这个家的顶梁柱，外出工作后至今未归，斯瓦塔娅请求我寻找他的下落。
zjisti_co_krejci_mikus_se_5VVX

In the forest not far from Bylany, I found a desolate hut and inside two refugees from the ruined village of Mesoles: Svatava and her daughter Vendula. The head of the family, Mikush the tailor, never returned from work. I was supposed to find out what happened to him.
就在距离比兰尼不远处的树林里，有座孤凄的小木屋。我在屋内遇到了两位从遇袭村庄梅索莱斯逃出的避难者：斯瓦塔娅以及她的女儿芙恩德拉。据说裁缝米库什，作为这个家的顶梁柱，外出工作后至今未归，而我得查明他的去向。
zjisti_co_krejci_mikus_se_CF89

In the forest not far from Bylany, I found a desolate hut and inside two refugees from the ruined village of Mesoles: Svatava and her daughter Vendula. The head of the family, Mikush the tailor, never returned from work. I was supposed to find out what happened to him, but I was unsuccesful.
就在距离比兰尼不远处的树林里，有座孤凄的小木屋。我在屋内遇到了两位从惨遭洗劫的梅索莱斯逃出的避难者：斯瓦塔娅以及她的女儿芙恩德拉。据说裁缝米库什，作为这个家的顶梁柱，外出工作后至今未归，而我本该查明他的去向，但是却没能如愿。
zjisti_co_krejci_mikus_se_JZ4j

In the forest not far from Bylany, I found a desolate hut and inside two refugees from the ruined village of Mesoles: Svatava and her daughter Vendula. The head of the family, Mikush the tailor, never returned from work. I was supposed to find out what happened to him, but I was unsuccesful.
就在距离比兰尼不远处的树林里，有座孤凄的小木屋。我在屋内遇到了两位从惨遭洗劫的梅索莱斯逃出的避难者：斯瓦塔娅以及她的女儿芙恩德拉。据说裁缝米库什，作为这个家的顶梁柱，外出工作后至今未归，而我本该查明他的去向，但是却没能如愿。
zjisti_co_lichtenstejn_si_zizd
Liechtenstein will definitely want to hear what is about to happen in Kuttenberg.
列支敦士登肯定想听听库滕堡即将发生的事情。
zjisti_co_mel_jsem_viktor_cj6M
I should've helped Victoria, not hurt her.
我本该帮助维多利亚的，而不是伤害她。
zjisti_co_moje_custom__to_NDoT

While the bodies were being buried and the wounded treated after the battle, the Jewish Quarter of Kuttenberg was about to be ransacked. Both Liechtenstein and Samuel were with the Kuttenberg rabbi in the stronghold at that moment.
战斗结束后，在掩埋尸体和治疗伤员的同时，库滕堡的犹太区即将被洗劫一空。当时，列支敦士登和塞缪尔都和库滕堡的拉比在要塞里。
zjisti_co_pena_s_jenikem__kGgg

Peter and Hensel really did take Thomlin's stone. They were hoping it would bring them luck and help in fighting the military garrison harassing the village and surrounding area. But their little crusade ended in disaster, with the soldiers capturing Hensel, and he was the one who last had the stone.
彼得和亨泽尔的确拿走了托姆林的石头。他们希望这块石头能给他们带来好运，帮助他们对抗骚扰村庄和周边地区的驻军。但他俩的小圣战最终失败了，士兵们抓走了亨泽尔，他是最后拿着石头的人。
zjisti_co_po_bitve_jsem_k_aJg3

After the battle, I was finally able to talk to Godwin about what had happened. Von Bergow's attack was unexpected, but his men were not prepared for so many defenders in the fortress. Still, it was hardly a victory for us. Martin Oderin, Kunzlin Ruthard and others were captured and many fell in battle.
战斗结束后，我终于可以问问古德温发生了什么了。冯·波尔高的突袭出人意料，但他的人没想到要塞中会有如此多的守军。尽管如此，这对我们来说也称不上是胜利。马丁·奥德林、昆兹林·鲁瑟德以及其他领主被俘虏，还有许多人战死。
zjisti_co_po_bitve_jsem_k_WLon

After the battle, I was finally able to talk to Godwin about what had happened. Von Bergow's attack was unexpected, but his men were not prepared for so many defenders in the fortress. Still, it was hardly a victory for us. Martin Oderin, Kunzlin Ruthard and other lords were captured and many others fell in battle, including Godwin's brother Christopher.
战斗结束后，我终于可以问问古德温发生了什么了。冯·波尔高的突袭出人意料，但他的人没想到要塞中会有如此多的守军。尽管如此，这对我们来说也称不上是胜利。马丁·奥德林、昆兹林·鲁瑟德以及其他领主被俘虏，还有许多人战死。其中包括古德温的兄弟克里斯托弗。
zjisti_co_potrebuju_najit_iknj

I need to find this Peter and Hensel in Raborsch and see if they're behind the disappearance of Thomlin's stone. He told me they were stableboys at the first farm on the right of the main road, in the direction away from the fortress.
我得去拉博施找到彼得和亨泽尔，看看是不是他们偷走了托姆林的雷石。他告诉我，他俩在远离要塞方向的大路右边第一家农庄做马倌。
zjisti_co_prilis_dlouho_j_urDg
I've dragged my feet too much on this whole Victoria situation. There's no point dealing with it anymore.
在处理维多利亚的窘境上，我已经耽搁了太久，现在已没必要再去操心此事。
zjisti_co_pry_se_mnou_chc_Vphw
I should go see Samuel, his people are in danger and he needs to know as soon as possible.
我应该去见塞缪尔，他的人民危在旦夕，他得尽快知道这个消息。
zjisti_co_tak_jsme_bezpec_SMbr
Finally, back in the Devil's Den. I need to ask Zizka what our next move is.
终于回到了“魔窟”，我得向杰式卡询问下一步计划。
zjisti_co_ta_rana_muze_zn_DtrJ
That thunderous noise means I've either gone mad after last night or the Prague forces have some new weapon. I should find out.
那声雷鸣般的声响震耳欲聋，除非是我经历昨晚的事后神志不清才会听到如此声响，不然就肯定是布拉格军队搬出了全新的武器，我得找到它。
zjisti_co_uz_jsem_si_mysl_8zgO
I thought that nothing could surprise me anymore. But then Samuel told me that he was sired by my stepfather Martin. If he wasn't in heaven, he'd have a great deal to explain…
我原以为自己对这世上的任何事情都已经见怪不怪了，没想到塞缪尔居然告诉我，他是我继父马丁的儿子。如果他还在世，肯定得费不少口舌解释……
zjisti_co_v_kutne_hore_se_9mH2
While the bodies were being buried and the wounded treated after the battle, the Jewish Quarter of Kuttenberg was about to be ransacked. We had to set out quickly to help.
战斗结束后，在掩埋尸体和治疗伤员的同时，库滕堡的犹太区即将被洗劫一空。我们必须迅速行动去帮助他们。
zjisti_co_v_lese_pobliz_b_rOrj

In the forest not far from Bylany, I found a desolate hut and inside two refugees from the ruined village of Mesoles: Svatava and her daughter Vendula. The head of the family, Mikush the tailor, never returned from work. I was supposed to find out what happened to him, but I was unsuccesful.
就在距离比兰尼不远处的树林里，有座孤凄的小木屋。我在屋内遇到了两位从惨遭洗劫的梅索莱斯逃出的避难者：斯瓦塔娅以及她的女儿芙恩德拉。据说裁缝米库什，作为这个家的顶梁柱，外出工作后至今未归，而我本该查明他的去向，但是却没能如愿。
zjisti_co_vubec_netusim_k_Ce75
I have no idea where to look for Victoria, and I don't have anyone to ask. I have no choice but to search randomly for her.
我也不知道该到哪里去寻找维多利亚，也没人能让我打探消息。我别无选择，要想找她就只能摸石头过河。
zjisti_in_listinu_mel_u_s_a2I5
The miller's hand Zinek used to have the document. I spoke to him and found out where to look for it.
磨坊主的雇工齐内克曾经拿着那份文件。我从他口中得知应该去什么地方寻找文件。
zjisti_in_listinu_mel_u_s_Gatt
The miller's hand Zinek used to have the document. That's about all I'll find out from him, because he's dead.
磨坊主的雇工齐内克曾经拿着那份文件。这就是我从他那里得到的全部信息，因为他已经死了。
zjisti_in_listinu_mel_u_s_msMW
The miller's hand Zinek used to have the document. I could speak to him and ask where in the Rathaus I should look for it.
磨坊主的雇工齐内克曾经拿着那份文件。我可以问他应该去市政厅的什么地方寻找。
zjisti_ja_nakonec_jsem_se_08K0
In the end, I decided to end Varel's life and with it all this pointless running around the woods.
最后，我决定结束瓦雷尔的生命，同时为那些毫无意义的林间奔波画上句点。
zjisti_ja_nakonec_jsem_se_E0Xr
In the end, I decided to end Varel's life and with it all this pointless running around the woods.
最后，我决定结束瓦雷尔的生命，同时为那些毫无意义的林间奔波画上句点。
zjisti_ja_na_sever_od_hra_vZvo

To the north of Trosky castle lies the forest known as Kopanina. It's on the border between Varel's and Vostatek's patches. Somewhere in the rocks there's a poacher operating. And the bloody poacher was none other than Hans Capon, who got into hot water at the Semine wedding.
特罗斯基的北边就坐落着那片人称“科帕尼那”的树林，它就在瓦雷尔和沃斯塔克看管地区的交界处。山岩中的某处正有个偷猎者在肆意妄为，而那个该死的偷猎者不是别人，正是汉斯·卡蓬，先前他曾在塞米的婚礼上陷入了麻烦。
zjisti_ja_na_sever_od_hra_ZLy8

To the north of Trosky castle lies the forest known as Kopanina. It's on the border between Varel's and Vostatek's patches. Somewhere in the rocks there's a poacher operating, knowing that the gamekeepers can't agree whose responsibility it is. I found some tracks in the rocks in the forest, so the poacher must be close by.
特罗斯基的北边就坐落着那片人称“科帕尼那”的树林，它就在瓦雷尔和沃斯塔克看管地区的交界处。山岩中的某处正有个偷猎者在肆意妄为，他也知道那片区域让两位猎场看守很难划清彼此的责任界限。我在树林里的岩石中发现了一些痕迹，那个偷猎者必定就在附近。
zjisti_ja_o_tomase_se_sta_fVYN

Thomas is being cared for by his sister Adela, who's complaining she has no one to help her. Thomas is in a fever and at the moment there's no physician at the castle to give him medicine. What's worse, Adela doesn't know what the sawbones was giving her brother. But it'll surely be in his medical book.
托马斯正由妹妹阿黛拉照顾，她抱怨没人帮助她。托马斯正在发烧，此刻城堡里没有大夫给他开药。更糟糕的是，阿黛拉不知道大夫给她哥哥吃的是什么。但他的医书中肯定有记载。
zjisti_ja_o_tomase_se_sta_guXI

Thomas was being cared for by his sister Adela. He was in a fever and there was no physician at the castle to give him medicine. What's worse, Adela didn't know what the sawbones was giving her brother. So I went to his chambers and found out what the surgeon was giving Thomas to lower his fever.
托马斯正由妹妹阿黛拉照顾。他正在发烧，此刻城堡里没有大夫给他开药。更糟糕的是，阿黛拉不知道大夫给她哥哥吃的是什么。所以我去了他的卧室，找到了大夫给托马斯开的退烧药。
zjisti_ja_pan_semin_a_suk_DKwd
I should go find out how things turned out.
我得去查看事态状况。
zjisti_ja_placeholder_mam_LFwM

Thomas is being cared for by his sister Adela, who's complaining she has no one to help her. Thomas is in a fever and at the moment there's no physician at the castle to give him medicine. What's worse, Adela doesn't know what the sawbones was giving her brother. But it'll surely be in his medical book, which I got my hands on. All that's left is to take a look in it.
托马斯正由妹妹阿黛拉照顾，她抱怨没人帮助她。托马斯正在发烧，此刻城堡里没有大夫给他开药。更糟糕的是，阿黛拉不知道大夫给她哥哥吃的是什么。但他的医书中肯定有记载，而我已经拿到医书。现在只需阅读一下。
zjisti_ja_po_dlouhem_pesi_3OJU
It seems Semine's wedding is our only hope of getting to von Bergow and delivering the message, at least orally.
塞米的婚礼似乎是我们接触冯·波尔高的唯一希望，这样至少我们能给他传口信。
zjisti_ja_po_dlouhem_pesi_SbRV
Without a message or any proof of who we really are, we won't get into the castle. We have to find another way to get to Lord von Bergow.
没有能证明我们信使身份的东西，我们无法进入城堡，得想别的办法接近冯·波尔高领主。
zjisti_ja_vzhledem_k_tomu_cSu5

Considering that I couldn't be bothered looking for the cart, it's no wonder they're none too happy with me at Semine. However, the cart was eventually found. Seems the hands conspired with a certain robber baron called Gules and they simply drove the cart to him. Lord Semine and Gnarly recovered the cart and punished the culprits.
鉴于我不大愿意去寻找马车，也难怪他们对我在塞米的表现不太满意。然而，马车最终还是被找到了。工人似乎与一位名叫古勒斯的强盗男爵合谋，而他们只负责把马车驾到他那里。塞米大人和格纳利找回了马车，惩罚了罪魁祸首。
zjisti_je_je_nacase_zasta_eAGv
I think it's time to go back to Suchdol and ask Mlada if the treatment worked.
我认为是时候回到苏赫多尔，询问姆拉达是否有疗效了。
zjisti_je_mlada_mela_ehm__rKqe
Mlada had an… accident, and she's with the Lord now. Her husband will probably reunite with her soon, but that's not my concern anymore.
姆拉达…遭遇了不测，现在的她已与上帝同在。而她的丈夫或许很快也要与之团聚，但是这也再与我无关。
zjisti_je_petrovi_se_neul_gGQa

Unfortunately, my fears came true. Peter from Suchdol disappeared and Mlada was terrified he committed the worst mortal sin a Christian can commit on himself. The thunderstone was useless to her at this point, so she gave it to me.
不幸的是，我的担忧成了现实。苏赫多尔的彼得消失了，姆拉达担心他自寻短见，犯下被基督徒所不容的罪孽。这样一来，雷石对她就没有用处了，所以她将它交给了我。
zjisti_je_petrovi_se_neul_jwVx
Unfortunately, my fears came true. Peter from Suchdol had disappeared and Mlada was terrified he committed the worst mortal sin a Christian can commit on himself. Is this really what God wanted?
不幸的是，我的担忧成了现实。苏赫多尔的彼得消失了，姆拉达担心他自寻短见，犯下被基督徒所不容的罪孽。难道这真的是天意吗？
zjisti_je_petrovi_uz_neni_LDvr
There's no helping Peter now, for he's met his maker. May his soul rest in peace.
现在已经救不了彼得了，因为他已经归西了。愿他的灵魂安息。
zjisti_je_podarilo_se_pet_eXuw
My feeling turned out to be right. The treatment worked, and Peter gradually started working again. Thanks to Mlada, everyone in Suchdol will learn about my good deed.
我的直觉是对的。治疗奏效了，彼得逐渐恢复了干劲。多亏了姆拉达，苏赫多尔的每个人都将知道我做的这件好事。
zjisti_je_vylecen_a_dosta_t5DW
My feeling turned out to be right. The treatment worked, and Peter gradually started working again. As a result, Mlada no longer needed the thunderstone and gave it to me as a reward.
我的直觉是对的。治疗奏效了，彼得逐渐恢复了干劲。姆拉达也不再需要那块雷石了，所以就将它给我作为回报。
zjisti_kd_katerina_me_poz_Yjsu
Maybe I should go for a walk through the camp. Who knows, maybe I'll be lucky and find Katherine's shoe in someone's tent.
也许我该到那个营地里走一圈，谁知道会发生什么呢？也许我足够走运，能在里边的某个帐篷里找到凯瑟琳的鞋呢。
zjisti_kd_nasel_jsem_kate_8oBv
I found Katherine's stolen shoe in one of the Cumans' tents. It seems I know where the pig lives now.
我在某个库曼人的帐篷里发现了凯瑟琳被盗的鞋子，现在看来那个色狼的住所已得以揭晓。
zjisti_kd_ten_trouba_urci_uY16
Instead of waiting for me, the fool set off on his own! Kurva! If they catch him, I'll have to try to find him as well as the horses! Damn his stubbornness!
那个蠢货居然没有等我就私自离开！Kurva（该死）！万一他被抓住，我要找的就不只有马了，还有他！真是头该死的倔驴！
zjisti_kd_ten_trouba_vyra_ONgM
Instead of waiting for me, the fool set off on his own! Kurva! Worse still, it seems like he's in trouble! Now I have to look for him as well! Damn his stubbornness!
那个蠢货居然没有等我就私自离开了！Kurva（该死）！更糟糕的是，他似乎已经陷入了麻烦！我得赶紧找到他！这该死的倔驴！
zjisti_kd_ten_trouba_vyra_z1kj
The fool set off on his own and got caught! He's being held in some kind of morgue, along with Brabant, that old traitor! I'll be happy to take care of that French rat, but I have to get to Sam fast!
塞缪那个笨蛋竟独自离开，还被抓住了！他现在就困在某处停尸房里，跟布拉班特待在一起。布拉班特就是个死叛徒！我真是巴不得把这个法国佬弄死，但是我得先赶快找到塞缪！
zjisti_kd_vypada_to_ze_te_cCKz
I borrowed Katherine's other shoe from her. Maybe it will help Mutt find the thief.
我向凯瑟琳借来了另一只鞋，或许呆呆能帮我找到那个小偷。
zjisti_kd_zjistil_jsem_ze_qwfh
I found out there's a Cuman called Chakan who has his eye on Katherine.
我找到了那个看上凯瑟琳的库曼人，其名为恰坎。
zjisti_kl_klara_mi_slibil_jK5a
Klara promised to tell me a secret. I can't wait!
克拉拉答应要告诉我一个秘密，我真是等不及了！
zjisti_na_krestanske_zvyk_woqp
Christian rites don't apply to Jews. I should ask Godwin about Jewish burial rites.
基督教的仪式并不适合犹太教，我得向古德温询问犹太葬礼仪式的相关事宜。
zjisti_na_poradil_jsem_se_yJkY
Godwin advised me about Jewish burial rites.
古德温向我提供了与犹太葬礼仪式有关的建议。
zjisti_od_abych_mohl_vyme_PNCs
To replace the suspicious papers, Godwin had to get into the shed. However, it was guarded by the groom. Perhaps he could somehow persuade him to let him in…?
要想调包那些可疑文件，古德温就得进入那座棚屋，可谁知棚屋就被马夫看管着，古德温能说服他让个道也说不定呢？
zjisti_od_bartos_resil_s__jJQR

Bertha the cook was supposed to tell me where I can find Nikvard. She has no idea where he is, but she was preparing some medicine for him. I stole it from her, but I didn't manage to find out what it's for, so I'll have to ask Bertha after all. I reckon she'll be more forthcoming now.
厨娘伯莎本应告诉我在哪里能找到尼克瓦德的。她不知道他现在在哪，但她正在为他准备一些药物。我从她那里偷来了药，但没能弄明白这是用来做什么的，所以最后我还是得去问伯莎。我想她现在应该会更好说话一点了。
zjisti_od_herso_mi_povi_c_b45v

I talked to Hersh the stableboy about Nikvard. He said the nobleman gave him a task, but he'll only tell me details if I bring him any longsword of excellent quality. How I get it is up to me. Forge it, buy it, or steal it?
我和马夫赫什聊了关于尼克瓦德的事。他说那位贵族给了他一项任务，但只有我带给他一把品质上乘的长剑，他才会告诉我细节。至于要怎么弄到，就看我的本事了。是自己锻造，去买，还是去偷？
zjisti_od_jan_mi_rekl_ze__KtB3

The commander - whom the soldiers call "Captain" - said Henry and Capon are here at Nebakov! He says they're alright, but I won't believe it till I see it for myself. He comes across as pretty dangerous…
那位士兵都叫他“队长”的指挥官说，亨利和卡蓬在内巴科夫！他说他们都没事，但我只有亲眼看到了才会相信。他看起来很危险……
zjisti_od_kdo_jiny_by_moh_fom9
Who else would know where to get black powder but the person in charge of its production and sale in the city? Hopefully Eldris the gun forger will be willing to talk to me.
除了负责在城镇生产和销售火药的人，还有谁会知道哪里能弄到火药呢？希望枪商埃尔德里斯愿意跟我好好谈谈。
zjisti_od_kun_hamana_alde_2pM7
Eventually, Godwin managed to get into the shed with the stored belongings.
古德温最终还是成功进入了储存物品的棚屋里。
zjisti_od_podle_dokumentl_AXCp

According to the documents I found at Eldris' house, it looks like the best way to get my hands on some black powder is, Whisker the powder-maker's wagon. I can wait for his wagon when he goes to supply Sigmund's camp via Bohunowitz.
从在埃尔德里斯家中发现的文件可以得知，获取火药的最佳办法似乎就在火药商人威斯克尔的马车上。此人通常会经过博胡诺维茨向西格斯蒙德营地提供火药供给，我可以在途中等待他的马车经过。
zjisti_od_podle_pisare_je_NbDS
I should talk to Hersh the stableboy who met with Nikvard.
我应该和马夫赫什聊聊，他和尼克瓦德见了面。
zjisti_od_podle_pisare_je_xmhS
I should talk to Hersh the stableboy who met with Nikvard.
我应该和马夫赫什聊聊，他和尼克瓦德见了面。
zjisti_od_prinesl_jsem_he_8XVh

I talked to Hersh the stableboy and helped him with his task. In return, he told me Nikvard had given him an assignment - to find something the nobleman had lost beyong the castle wall. The only trouble is he never found out what he was meant to be looking for.
我和马夫赫什聊了聊，并帮助他完成了他的任务。作为回报，他告诉我尼克瓦德让他去做一件差事——寻找贵族在城堡围墙外丢失的东西。唯一的问题是，他一直没明白他要找的到底是什么。
zjisti_od_pripravili_jsme_B0gp
We set up camp, but there's still a lot of time till nightfall. I went to see Sir Hans to ask him what happens now.
营地已然搭好，离夜幕降临还有一段时间。我去向汉斯少主询问眼下还需做些什么。
zjisti_od_pripravili_jsme_tvDf
We set up camp, but there's still a lot of time till nightfall. I should go and ask Sir Hans what we do now.
营地已然搭好，离夜幕降临还有一段时间。我要向汉斯少主询问眼下还需做些什么。
zjisti_od_p_treba_tu_ma_n_deWM

Once again I acted before I thought, and Eldris the gun forger won't talk to me. But maybe I could find out which way the powder is transported through the Kuttenberg region from his notes. I should have a look around.
再次轻举妄动的我失去了与枪商埃尔德里斯交谈的机会，不过或许我可以从他的笔记里查出那些火药的去向。我得四处查看一番。
zjisti_od_puskar_eldris_p_pu0I

After some convincing, Eldris the gun forger agreed to share some information with me. My best bet for getting some black powder would be his rival, Whisker the powder-maker. I'm to wait for his wagon when he goes to supply Sigmund's camp via Bohunowitz.
动用了些许口舌功夫，埃尔德里斯最终同意向我透露一些消息，我也得知能让我取得黑火药的最佳人选就是埃尔德里斯的竞争对手，火药商人威斯克尔。此人通常会经过博胡诺维茨向西格斯蒙德营地提供火药供给，我得在途中等待他的马车经过。
zjisti_od_regina_mela_s_b_qopb

Regina the maid was supposed to tell me what she knows about Nikvard in exchange for reading her the letter the noblemen sent her. I decided to steal the letter, but I don't understand what it says. Like it or not, I'm going to have to talk to her.
女仆雷吉娜本应能告诉我她对尼克瓦德有什么了解的，作为交换，她让我读贵族给她寄来的信。我决定把信偷走，但我没弄明白上面写了什么。无论愿不愿意，我都必须要和她聊聊了。
zjisti_od_sakra_ten_pitom_LGdG
Sakra! The idiot gravedigger won't tell me anything. I'll have to make do on my own somehow.
妈的！那个白痴掘墓人什么都不肯说。我得自己想办法。
zjisti_od_sedlecky_hrobni_bliv
The Sedletz gravedigger will most likely know of every grave in the area. I should speak to him, maybe he'll help me.
塞德莱茨的掘墓人很可能知道这个地区的每个坟墓。我应该和他谈谈，也许他能帮我。
zjisti_od_spravce_tvrze_s_BCxL
I have to find out more about my friends from the commander.
我必须向指挥官打探关于我朋友的消息。
zjisti_od_tovarysstvo_sto_qSGg
The Guild is faced with its greatest task yet: to disrupt Sigismund's delivery of silver by burying the mine. They want me to get black powder and take it to the mines, where others will be waiting.
公会正面临着迄今为止最大的挑战：毁掉西格斯蒙德的银矿场，以此阻断银矿产出。他们想让我弄到黑火药，并带到银矿场，届时会有其他人在那里等候。
zjisti_te_mel_bych_se_pre_gHOG
I should ask Foreman Samko how many corves of ore his "sonnies" mined on the feast of St. Petronilla.
我得向领班萨姆科询问他手下的“小伙”们在圣佩特罗尼拉纪念日那天开采了多少车矿石。
zjisti_te_musim_si_s_pavl_5MlM
Now I need to talk to Foreman Paul about the mining.
现在我得向领班保罗询问采矿的事。
zjisti_te_predak_franta_z_PV8s
Foreman Frank died, so I won't be getting anything out of him.
领班弗兰克已死，我也因此无法再向他打探任何事情。
zjisti_te_predak_pavel_ze_FIdL
Foreman Paul died, so I won't be getting anything out of him.
领班保罗已死，我也因此无法再向他打探任何事情。
zjisti_te_slibil_jsem_pre_LJ7d
I promised foreman Paul I'd pray with him for the soul of his "sonny" Jaybird, who really was like a son to him.

zjisti_vi_kapitan_mi_rek__zLJM
Capon noticed there are quite a few horses at Nebakov for such a poor lord. Adjutant Michael said Lord Nebak inherited them. It might not be a bad idea to ask Peltzel the groom about it as well.
卡蓬发现，如此凄惨的领主在内巴科夫竟有不少马匹，而且副官迈克尔说它们都是内巴克领主继承下来的遗产。看来向马夫佩尔泽尔了解此事是个不错的选择。
zjisti_vi_konak_mi_rekl_z_NvL8
Capon noticed there are quite a few horses at Nebakov for such a poor lord. Peltzel the groom said they took them from some bandits they defeated. I'll ask Michael about it as well.
卡蓬发现，如此凄惨的领主在内巴科夫竟有不少马匹。据马夫佩尔泽尔所言，那些马匹是歼灭一伙强盗后缴获的战利品。我也得向迈克尔询问此事。
zjisti_vi_mel_bych_o_te_c_NyCz
I should find out more about the upcoming wedding.
婚礼近在眼前，我得找出更多信息。
zjisti_vi_nechal_jsme_to__dOwv

我压根就不愿处理此事。

If I follow the road towards Apollonia and turn upwards into the rocks at the point where it crosses a small stream, it should be impossible to miss the place.
如果我沿着通往阿波罗尼亚的路走，在道路跟小溪交汇的地方往上拐进山里，应该能找到这个地方。
zjisti_vi_ptacek_si_vsiml_53we

汉斯爵士先前察觉到内巴科夫有着不少马匹。但如今这一事实已不复存在，我也将不会探究那些马匹的来源……
zjisti_vi_ptacek_si_vsiml_Dch9
Capon noticed there are quite a few horses at Nebakov for such a poor lord. I had a look at them and it was true. Maybe Peltzel the groom will tell me more.
卡蓬发现，如此凄惨的领主在内巴科夫竟有不少马匹。我前去查看，发现卡蓬所言属实，或许马夫佩尔泽尔能向我透露更多信息。
zjisti_vi_ptak_si_vsim_ze_6keF
Capon noticed there are quite a few horses at Nebakov for such a poor lord. I should take a look at the horses and try to find out more.
