zjisti_vi_tech_koni_je_tu_Mtwc
It really is suspicious how many horses there are here. It'd be a good idea to ask Pelzel the groom about it, but he won't tell me much now... I won't find out the truth from him.
此处马匹众多，如此现象定有蹊跷。或许跟马夫佩尔泽尔打探此事是个好主意，但他现在不会跟我透露任何事情......我也因此无法再从他那里获取真相。
zjisti_vi_tech_koni_je_tu_PtR9
It really is suspicious how many horses there are here. It'd be a good idea to ask Michael the adjutant about it, but he won't talk to me anymore, so I probably won't get the truth from him.
此处马匹众多，如此现象定有蹊跷。跟副官迈克尔打探此事或许是个不错的想法，但他不会再与我交谈，我也因此无法再从他那里获取真相。
zjisti_vi_weird_ze_voba_r_4nge

Capon noticed there are a lot of horses at Nebakov, given that the local lord is far from rich. And he was right! Michael and Peltzel had different stories about how they got them. Something smells fishy here.
卡蓬发现，内巴科夫竟有不少马匹，可是此地的领主跟富裕简直毫不沾边。卡蓬的怀疑没有问题！对于他们是如何取得那些马匹的，迈克尔和佩尔泽尔均持有不同的说辞，实在可疑。
zjisti_vi_zahada_nebakovs_5l2N
The mystery of the Nebakov horses seems to have been solved. They most likely belong to a big group of bandits who attacked the fort and took Sir Jaromier captive.
内巴科夫马匹的谜团似乎已被揭开，它们大概曾属于一群袭击过堡垒的强盗，而这伙强盗还俘虏了雅罗米尔爵士。
zjisti_vi_zjistil_jsem_ze_u4Ju

I found out that Olda, Lord Semine's son, is getting married to Agnes, the Troskowitz bailiff's daughter. It's a big celebration for invited guests, but if we can get some job linked to the wedding, we could wangle our way in.
我通过了解得知，塞米领主的儿子奥达将与特罗斯科维茨执政官的女儿阿格尼丝举办婚礼。对于受邀宾客来说，这将是一场盛大庆典。倘若我们能找份和婚礼有关的差事，或许就能混入其中。
zjisti_vo_dalsim_drzitele_r4PW
Regina the maid should tell me what she knows about Nikvard. I'll find her and have a talk with her.
女仆雷吉娜应该能告诉我她对尼克瓦德有什么了解。我会找到她，然后和她聊聊。
zjisti_vo_dalsim_drzitele_srs8
Regina the maid should tell me what she knows about Nikvard. I'll find her and have a talk with her.
女仆雷吉娜应该能告诉我她对尼克瓦德有什么了解。我会找到她，然后和她聊聊。
zjisti_vo_dalsim_drzitele_TWFH

Regina the maid was supposed to tell me what she knows about Nikvard in exchange for reading her the letter the noblemen sent her. We read through the love letter and found out Nikvard was using the book to cook up some sort of potion that would grant him youthful strength and vigour. Unfortunately, it sounded like things didn't exactly go according to plan. He says the book "disappeared into the void"?
女仆雷吉娜本应能告诉我她对尼克瓦德有什么了解的，作为交换，她让我读贵族给她寄来的信。我们读完那封情书，发现尼克瓦德在参照那本书制作某种可以让他青春永驻、精力充沛的药水。不幸的是，听上去事情似乎并没有完全按照计划进行。他说书“消失在了虚空中”？
zjisti_vo_dalsim_drzitele_w6fE
Regina the maid was supposed to tell me what she knows about Nikvard. In exchange, she wants me to read her the letter the nobleman sent her. Should I do it or just steal the letter?
女仆雷吉娜本该将她对尼克瓦德的了解告知于我，但作为交换，她想让我念诵贵族给她寄来的信。我该成人之美吗？还是顺手牵羊偷走信件呢？
zjisti_vo_davalo_smysl_ze_OKYT

The plan of using Enneleyn to get the book is pointless now that the Semine wedding is over. The whole thing is up to me again. I found the Trosky scribe Erazim here at the castle and asked him where the book is. He gave me a few names, the most important of which is Nikvard Libak.
通过恩内琳拿到书的计划已经毫无意义，因为塞米的婚礼已经结束了。现在整件事又落到了我的头上。我在城堡这儿找到了特罗斯基的抄写员埃拉兹姆，并问了他书在哪里。他告诉了我几个名字，其中最重要的一位叫尼克瓦德·利巴克。
zjisti_vo_dava_smysl_ze_b_G6VH

Kreyzl wanted Enneleyn to get the book for him, but that bird has long flown the coop. Now the whole thing is up to me again. The miller mentioned the Trosky scribe Erazim. It makes sense to begin my search with him.
克雷泽原本想让恩内琳帮他拿到那本书，但恩内琳不配合。现在整件事又落到了我的头上。磨坊主曾提到过特罗斯基的抄写员埃拉兹姆，从他那里开始调查应该有用。
zjisti_vo_kniha_se_omylem_0u8c

Bertha the cook was supposed to tell me where I can find Nikvard. She has no idea where he is, but I did learn that Nikvard had an accident involving the privies near the combat arena at Trosky. I'm not sure what Nikvard's intestinal condition has to do with anything.
厨娘伯莎本应告诉我在哪里能找到尼克瓦德的。她不知道他现在在哪，但我知道了尼克瓦德出了点事故，还和特罗斯基竞技场附近的厕所有关。我不确信尼克瓦德的肠道状况是否和这有关系。
zjisti_vo_kniha_se_omylem_CCtZ
Bertha the cook should be able to tell me where I can find Nikvard. I'll go and talk to her.
厨娘伯莎应该能告诉我在哪里能找到尼克瓦德。我会去和她聊聊。
zjisti_vo_kniha_se_omylem_VdNl

Bertha the cook was supposed to tell me where I can find Nikvard. She has no idea where he is, but she was preparing some medicine for him. I have to get her to tell me what it's for, or just steal it and find out myself.
厨娘伯莎本应告诉我在哪里能找到尼克瓦德的。她不知道他现在在哪，但她正在为他准备一些药物。我得让她告诉我这是用来做什么的，或者干脆偷走药自己弄明白。
zjisti_vo_krejzl_puvodne__gEGO

Kreyzl originally meant to get the book through the Trosky chamberlain at the Semine wedding, but he wasn't able to arrange it. The castle was still closed off at the time. But now he knows me, and I have near unlimited access to the castle, making the whole situation a lot simpler. I found Erazim the scribe at the castle and asked him where the book is. He gave me a few names, the most important of which is Nikvard Libak.
克雷泽原本想在塞米的婚礼上通过特罗斯基的总管拿到那本书，但他的安排出了差错。那时候的城堡还处于关闭中。但现在他认识了我，我几乎可以不受限制地进出城堡，这就让整件事简单多了。我在城堡这儿找到了特罗斯基的抄写员埃拉兹姆，并问了他书在哪里。他告诉了我几个名字，其中最重要的一位叫尼克瓦德·利巴克。
zjisti_vo_krejzl_puvodne__hroH

Kreyzl originally meant to get the book through the Trosky chamberlain at the Semine wedding, but he wasn't able to arrange it. The castle was still closed off at the time. But now he knows me, and I have near unlimited access to the castle, making the whole situation a lot simpler. Now I just have to go to the castle writing room and talk Erazim the scribe. He should know where the book is.
克雷泽原本想在塞米的婚礼上通过特罗斯基的总管拿到那本书，但他的安排出了差错。那时候的城堡还处于关闭中。但现在他认识了我，我几乎可以不受限制地进出城堡，这就让整件事简单多了。现在我只需要去城堡的抄写室，和抄写员埃拉兹姆聊聊。他应该知道书在哪里。
zjisti_vo_o_bratosovi_pry_EaOk
Bertha the cook should be able to tell me where I can find Nikvard. I'll go and talk to her.
厨娘伯莎应该能告诉我在哪里能找到尼克瓦德。我会去和她聊聊。
zjisti_vo_poslednim_znamy_JQhD

After gathering all the clues from people who had spoken to Nikvard recently, I consulted the scribe. A fairly filthy story ensued. Apparently, old Nikvard dropped the book in a privy at Trosky, and now it's lying in a pile of shit somewhere outside the castle walls.
在收集了最近与尼克瓦德交谈过的人们所提供的所有线索后，我询问了抄写员。一段相当肮脏的故事浮出水面。很显然，老尼克瓦德把这本书掉进了特罗斯基的厕所里，而现在它就躺在城堡墙外的某个粪堆里。
zjisti_vo_poslednim_znamy_MKaw
I finally found Nikvard. It was a sad ending…
我终于找到了尼克瓦德。真是个悲伤的结局……

这位贵族会在哪里呢？

zkontrolu_musim_si_prohli_GFMA

As part of my patrol duty, I must check to see that all the important posts are manned. One such post is the main gate.

zkontrolu_soucasti_moji_h_TYTM
As part of my patrol duty, I must check to see that all the important posts, like the main gate, are manned. So I went there on my rounds.
作为巡逻任务的一部分，我必须检查所有重要的岗哨例如正门是否有人值守，于是我就去了那儿。
zkontrolu_straz_na_brane__tO9q
The guard at the outer bailey's gate should keep watch all night. I should check to see if he is.

zkontrolu_ze_stanoviste_n_31KH
From the post on the eastern wall, you can see the village where the Praguers set up their camp. I should go and look there to see what the situation is.
从东面城墙的岗哨可以看到布拉格人营地所在的村庄。我应该去那里看看情况。
zkontrolu_ze_stanoviste_n_fvXX
From the post on the eastern wall, I saw that there was peace and quiet in the camp.
在东面城墙的岗哨里，我看到营地里一片平静。
zkontrolu_zkontroloval_js_mwqz
I checked the guard posted at the outer bailey's gate.
我检查了外城门的守卫。
zkuj_novo_bude_to_dost_pr_Us8k
It would take a lot of work, but I think I could repair the old axe with a little luck and some elbow grease.
尽管修理这把老旧斧头会颇费力气，但我想花些功夫、碰点运气应该可以搞定。
zkuj_novo_povedlo_se_seke_1B8y
I worked on the axe at the forge a little and now it's as good as new.
我在铁匠铺里对那把斧头稍加打磨了一番，现在的它已经焕然一新。
zkus_lack_jestli_vezme_ro_p2jt
I mustn't let him leave. If he scarpers, it's all over. I have to knock him out somehow!
我不能让他离开，如果他逃跑，那一切都完了。我得想办法打晕他！
zkus_lack_lacek_je_v_tahu_jyFi
Sakra! It's all gone wrong! I hope Anezhka can get by without the coin from that skirt-chaser.
妈的！一切都搞砸了！但愿阿涅兹卡没有那个色鬼的钱也能生活下去。
zkus_lack_uf_uz_jsem_se_b_c1Jw
Oof! I was afraid it would all come to nothing. Thankfully, I knocked him out.
唉哟！我还担心是不是功亏一篑了，幸好我把他打晕了。
zkus_proh_hrobnik_je_dost_j9S8
The gravedigger is a little slow in the head, but awfully nimble with his hands. Of course he's the one who stole the seal from the grave! Now I've got the seal of the dead mine owner Hanuman Rot.
那位掘墓人虽然脑子略显愚钝，但是却有双极为灵巧的双手，他果然就是那个从坟墓里偷走印章的人！而我现在也已拿到了已故矿主哈奴曼·罗特的印章。
zkus_proh_nekdo_me_predes_BCVE
I should try to find out whether the gravedigger has the stolen seal.
我得尝试查明那枚失窃的印章是否就在掘墓人身上。
zkus_proh_o_pecetidlo_jse_K1N9
I didn't care about the seal anymore.
那枚印章与我再无瓜葛。
zkus_proh_pokud_to_peceti_rmE0
I should try to find out whether the gravedigger hid the stolen seal somewhere in his house.
我得尝试查清掘墓人是否将那枚失窃的印章藏在了他的家里。
zkus_proh_v_hrobnikove_do_Zefn
I found all sorts of strange things in the gravedigger's house, but the dead miner owner's seal was not there.
我在掘墓人的家里发现了各种千奇百怪的东西，除了已故矿主的那枚印章。
zkus_se_p_kdybych_si_v_ta_cnAe
If I don't know what to do in the camp, the camp chaplain could certainly give me advice.
无措的时候，营地牧师肯定能给点建议。
zkus_se_p_lazenska_milada_Oqsk
Milada the bathhouse owner was quite willing to answer my questions.
澡堂老板米拉达非常乐意回答我的问题。
zkus_se_p_lazenska_milada_zda7
Unfortunately, Milada the bathhouse owner didn't tell me much.
可惜，澡堂老板米拉达没有透露很多信息。
zkus_se_p_mohl_bych_zkusi_uIae
I could try my luck with the camp's bathhouse owner, Milada. She's sure to know about all the rumours at the camp.
我或许能问问看营地的澡堂老板米拉达，她肯定知道这里所有的小道消息。
zkus_se_p_musa_byl_ochotn_zqWi
Musa was willing to help me, but warned me to be careful.
穆萨很乐意帮忙，但也告诉我要小心行事。
zkus_se_p_musu_muj_dotaz__3ecj
Musa was surprised by my question. He refused to help and even preached at me.
穆萨被我的问题吓了一跳。他不愿帮忙，还说了我一顿。
zkus_se_p_prohodil_jsem_p_cCcP
I exchanged a few words with the camp chaplain, Bohumil, and things are now much clearer to me.
我和营地牧师博胡米尔交谈了几句，事情变得明朗了许多。
zkus_se_p_taborovy_kaplan_KIOt
The camp chaplain didn't give me much information.
营地牧师提供的信息不多。
zkus_se_p_taborovy_lecite_I9rW
The camp healer, Musa, certainly knows his way around here and where to find people.
营地大夫穆萨肯定很熟悉这里，也知道去哪找人。
zkus_si_l_krejzl_mi_rekl__T2yp
Sometimes out of sight just means it's hidden in a chest that I may not always have the key to. I should try my hand at getting into such a chest. Kreyzl has one used for practice in his barn.
有时候，目所不及之物往往就藏在箱子里，而打开箱子的钥匙未必总是恰好在我身上，所以我得尝试动手将类似的箱子打开。克雷泽的谷仓里正好就有一个可用来练习撬锁的箱子。
zkus_si_l_krejzl_mi_rekl__xUY7

Sometimes out of sight just means it's hidden in a chest that I may not always have the key to. Kreyzl had a practice chest in his barn, so I gave it a try. If I'd like, I can come back and brush up on my skills any time.
有时候，目所不及之物往往就藏在箱子里，而打开箱子的钥匙未必总是恰好在我身上。克雷泽的谷仓里正好就有一个可用来练习撬锁的箱子，因此我进行了一番尝试。只要我愿意，随时都可以回来温习。
zkus_si_o_jestli_si_chci__xnvp
If I want to practice takedowns or picking pockets, I should talk to Hensel the hired hand.
如果想要练习擒拿和扒窃，我就得去请教雇工亨泽尔。
zkus_si_o_omracovani_jsem_NJNy
I practiced takedowns with Hensel. If I'd like, I can practice picking pockets with him too.
我已向亨泽尔练习了擒拿技术。如果我愿意，还可以继续向其请教扒窃技术。
zkus_si_o_s_jenikem_jsem__KhOh
I practiced performing takedowns and picking pockets with Hensel, like Kreyzl suggested.
遵照克雷泽的建议，我已跟亨泽尔练习了擒拿和扒窃。
zkus_si_o_vybirani_brasen_qFn1
I practiced picking pockets with Hensel. If I'd like, I can practice takedowns with him too.
我已向亨泽尔练习了扒窃技术。如果我愿意，还可以继续向其请教擒拿技术。
zkus_zjis_hotove_vyptavani_Cwvp

Stanya, one of the missing girls, worked as an alehouse maid in a tavern called The Hole In the Wall. She disappeared from her room where there were traces of blood. According to the innkeeper Mole, she was known to hang around with a charcoal-burner named Barton. Maybe I can learn something more from him.
斯坦娅是失踪女孩之一，先前在名为“墙洞”的酒馆里从事着招待的工作。后来，她从自己房中神秘失踪，而房间里到处都是血迹。我从酒馆老板摩尔那里得知，斯坦娅曾与一位名叫巴顿的烧炭工交往，此事可谓人尽皆知，也许我能从巴顿那里了解到有关线索。
zkus_zjis_promluv_si_s_sa_9xxh

Stanya, one of the missing girls, who worked as an alehouse maid in a tavern called The Hole In the Wall, is no longer missing. I have to talk to her to finally get to the bottom of what really happened. I'll find her in a cottage in the charcoal-burner's camp.
失踪女孩之一，也就是先前于“墙洞”酒馆从事招待工作的斯坦娅终于现身了。据说她就在烧炭工人营地的一间小屋里，我去得跟她谈谈，彻底查明先前到底发生了什么。
zkus_zjis_promluv_si_v_ho_lvN1

Stanya, one of the missing girls, worked as an alehouse maid in the tavern called The Hole In the Wall. She disappeared from her room where there were signs of a struggle. I have to ask the innkeeper Mole if he remembers anything else about her.
斯坦娅是失踪女孩之一，先前在名为“墙洞”的酒馆里从事着招待的工作。后来，她从自己房中神秘失踪，而房间里到处都是打斗的痕迹。我得问问酒馆老板摩尔，看看他是否还能记起与斯坦娅有关的信息。
zkus_zjis_sarka_byla_dlou_C675
Stanya had been missing and presumed dead for quite a while, but now she's just dead. Without her information it wasn't possible to find out who that rival was, meaning the hideous murderer.
斯坦娅曾一度失踪，人们都以为她已经遇难，而现在她真的死了。缺少了她的线索，就无法找出那个丧心病狂的凶手。
zkus_zjis_skvira_zminil_z_ctoY

Mole mentioned that Stanya was seeing a charcoal-burner named Barton from somewhere southwest of Kuttenberg. I know very well that charcoal burners are usually close to water and the forest, which in the Vrchlitz valley leaves a relatively small area to cover.
摩尔提到，斯坦娅曾与一位名叫巴顿的烧炭工交往，此人来自库滕堡西南边的某片区域。我知道烧炭工们通常会很靠近水源和树林，因此我在弗赫利茨山谷要搜索的区域就小了一些。
zkus_zjis_vyreseno_EdYu

Stanya, alive and well, told me the whole tangled story. A man ambushed her on her way home, but she managed to break free and run away from him. Unfortunately, she didn't know who it was, and given how many people were hanging around her, it could have been anyone.
斯坦娅安然无恙，还向我完整地诉说了那件错综复杂之事。在她回家的路上，她遭到了一个男人的偷袭，好在她最终成功挣脱，逃离了魔爪。遗憾的是，斯坦娅并不知晓行凶者的身份，又考虑到她先前跟很多人打过交道，因此任何人都有行凶的嫌疑。
zkus_zkro_podkoni_si_post_4CZT

The groom was complaining our horses are wasting away due to a lack of movement. He's managed to ride most of them around the fortress, but he couldn't handle one mare named Boudica. I managed to tame her though.
马夫先前一直在抱怨我们的马匹因为缺乏运动而日渐消瘦，后来亲自把堡垒里的每一匹马都骑了一遍，但他却没能驯服一匹名叫波提卡的母马，而我最终成功将其驯服了。
zkus_zkro_podkoni_si_post_c6Ku

The groom was complaining our horses are wasting away due to a lack of movement. He's managed to ride most of them around the fortress, but he couldn't handle one mare named Boudica. It turns out I couldn't handle her either.
马夫先前一直在抱怨我们的马匹因为缺乏运动而日渐消瘦，后来亲自把堡垒里的每一匹马都骑了一遍，但他却没能驯服一匹名叫波提卡的母马，而且事实证明我也办不到。
zkus_zkro_podkoni_si_post_e4bI

The groom was complaining our horses are wasting away due to a lack of movement. He's managed to ride most of them around the fortress, but one mare named Boudica has refused to let anyone touch her since her master died. Perhaps I could tame her.
马夫先前一直在抱怨我们的马匹因为缺乏运动而日渐消瘦，后来亲自把堡垒里的每一匹马都骑了一遍，除了一匹名叫波提卡的母马。自从那匹马的主人去世后，她就没有再允许任何人靠近她，也许我可以驯服她。
zmlat_pes_kumani_ukazali__NxwA
The Cumans showed they're stronger than us, and gave us a proper beating.
库曼人更厉害些，给我们一顿揍。
zmlat_pes_lidi_z_vesnice__VTm3
The villagers showed a lot of strength and beat us all up.
村民很厉害，把我们打得落花流水。
zmlat_pes_porazili_jsme_v_FUHj
We roughed up those village troublemakers, and the Cumans can leave in peace.
我们收拾了那些寻衅滋事的村民，库曼人可以安心离开了。
zmlat_pes_ukazali_jsme_ku_k2VW
We showed those Cumans they're not welcome here.
我们用拳头告诉库曼人，这里不欢迎他们。
zmlat_pes_v_hospode_zacal_41eO
A fight broke out in the tavern, and I joined the Cumans' side. Although I don't have much love for them, I won't tolerate this kind of troublemaking. But no bloodshed!
酒馆里有人打架，我站在库曼人这边。我倒也不是多喜欢他们，只是看不得惹麻烦的人。但别见血！
zmlat_pes_v_hospode_zacal_CLtJ
A fight broke out in the tavern, and I joined the villagers' side. Let's knock the dust off those Cumans! But no bloodshed!
酒馆里有人打架，我站在村民这边。把库曼人打得落花流水！但不见血！
zneskodni_musime_zneskodn_gJi6
We must overcome the defences of the Italian Court from the inside. My job is to take care of the guards in the courtyard.
我们必须攻破意大利宫内部的防卫，而我的任务则是要处理庭院里的守卫。
zneskodni_nepratelske_str_1CSO
We managed to neutralise the enemy shooters.
我们成功消灭了敌人的射手。
zneskodni_ustup_nasich_mu_bi8V

A unit of Praguer pavisiers was trying to stop our men from pulling back. We didn't manage to repel them before their reinforcements arrived, so our men had to fight their way through, which cost some of them their lives.
一支布拉格盾兵部队企图阻止我们的军队撤离，而我们没能赶在他们援军抵达之前将他们击退。将士们不得不拼死突围，牺牲惨重。
zneskodni_ustup_nasich_mu_LIQz
A unit of Praguer pavisiers was trying to stop our men from pulling back. We managed to repel them.
一支布拉格盾兵部队企图阻止我们的军队撤离，但我们成功将其击退。
zneskodni_vez_musime_doby_Z8nG
We must retake the tower, otherwise it'll be all over for us. We have to eliminate all the enemies inside!
我们必须夺回塔楼，不然就要完蛋了。我们要歼灭塔楼上的所有敌人！
zneskodni_vsechny_neprate_53wZ
We eliminated all the enemies inside the occupied tower. The tower is ours once again.
我们歼灭了塔楼里的所有敌人，塔楼又物归原主了。
zneskodni_zleva_blokuje_u_U3to
Our men's retreat is being blocked on the left by a unit of Praguer pavisers. We have to shoot at them to disperse them!
我们在撤退的过程中遭到了一支从左侧袭来的布拉格盾兵的阻挠，此刻必须朝他们射击，将其击散！
zneskodni_zneskodnili_jsm_LVW8
We overcame the defences of the Italian Court from the inside. I took care of the guards in the courtyard.
我们攻破了意大利宫内部的防卫，同时我也解决掉了庭院里的守卫。
zneskodni_z_prave_strany__NlTp
Enemy shooters are attacking from the right. We should shoot back at them before they drive back our men outside.
敌人的射手在右侧发动攻击。我们应当还击，使突袭部队免遭退败。

zpatky_na_musime_rychle_z_i3Ww

我们得赶快回去，身处上城堡的古德温和卡蓬需要我们的帮助！
zpatky_na_prazane_prorazi_48Zj
The Praguers broke through the gate, conquered the fortress, and our friend Godwin died.
布拉格人攻破了城门，占领了堡垒，而我们的朋友古德温不幸身亡。
zpatky_na_prazane_prorazi_UN0l

The Praguers eventually penetrated the fortress. Their strength and determination were too great. Some of us were cut off by the enemy, but the rest fought their way into the castle tower. There we could defend ourselves for a week and wait until Lord von Bergow runs out of patience and begins to parley.
布拉格人最终还是冲破了堡垒，他们的实力与决心不可小觑。我们中的一些人被敌人拦了下来，而其余的人则杀出来一条血路，进入了城堡塔楼。我们可以在里边进行为期一个礼拜的自我防卫，进而等待冯·波尔高失去耐心而决定谈判。
zrada_tov_tady_bude_napsa_3bul
I refused to work for the Guild and exposed them to bailiff Plümel. They didn't deserve any better.
我拒绝为公会效力，并向执行官普卢梅尔检举揭发了他们。公会一行人不值得半点优待。
zradil_si_jsi_padouch_6usx
I behaved so dishonestly in front of Menhard he lost all faith in me. The plan is off now.
我当着门哈德之面背信弃义，最终失去了他所有的信任，我们的计划也就此终结。

I committed a murder, and what's worse, Menhard found out about it. Such a famous and reputable master swordsman wants nothing to do with a murderer.

zucastni__az_budu_priprav_rjFl
Once I'm ready, I can go and see the widow so we can finally set off for the duel. I have the weapon I need, now I just need to come some time during the day.
准备好后我得去找寡妇格尔达，这样我们就可以出发进行决斗了。现在我已拿到所需的武器，只需等到白天便可出发。
zucastni__kovarna_na_grun_t8GP
The people of the smithy in Grund are in mourning. Someone died there under mysterious circumstances. The competition is therefore canceled.
格兰德铁匠铺的人正在哀悼，有人在那里离奇死亡，比赛也因此取消。
zucastni__po_bitve_o_male_Ha69
After the battle of Malesov we have to take care of the wounded and rest a bit. Von Bergow's interrogation will take place tomorrow.
马列索夫的那场战斗之后，我们得照顾伤员，稍作休整。对冯·波尔高的审讯也将于明天开始。
zucastni__sazku_se_zdimir_JQGY
In the end, I managed to win the bet with Zdimir. Years of toil over the anvil paid off.
最后，我赢了跟兹迪米尔打的赌。在铁砧上的多年劳作得到了回报。
zucastni__s_gerdou_jsme_d_mZ3c
Gerda and I have arrived at the site of the duel. Everything is ready, now only the duel with Radmil, itself awaits.
格尔达和我抵达了决斗地点。一切都已准备就绪，与拉德米尔的决斗也将一触即发。
zucastni__ted_uz_nema_smy_gMS8
The deal is off, the duel won't happen.
交易取消，决斗落空。
zucastni__vsadil_jsem_se__09j1
I made a bet with the master blacksmith Zdimir that I could forge a better hunting sword than his apprentice Matthias. If I succeed, I'll not only get some money, but also Matthias's weapon.
我和铁匠大师兹迪米尔打了个赌，赌我能比他的徒弟马蒂亚斯锻造更好的猎剑。如果我赢了，我不仅可以得到一些钱，还可以得到马蒂亚斯的武器。
zucastni__zda_se_ze_nejse_fRBx
It appears that I'm not as good a blacksmith as I thought. I lost Zdimir's bet.
看来，作为铁匠，我并非自己以为的那样优秀。我输掉了跟兹迪米尔打的赌。
